Combine in medium bowl. Set aside. In a small saucepan, combine vinegar, sugar and salt. Simmer until sugar is dissolved. Add celery seed and mustard seed. Cool. Pour vinegar mixture over vegetables. Stir until well coated. Chill and serve. ; name: bell pepper cole slaw no mayonnaise ; ingredients: green cabbage, red cabbage, carrot, green pepper, sugar, red wine vinegar, water, coarse salt, black pepper ; preparation:Combine the green cabbage, red cabbage, carrot and green pepper in a large bowl. Combine sugar, vinegar and water. Whisk. Salt and pepper the slaw. Pour wet ingredients over the slaw. Toss well to coat. Cover and chill at least 1 hour. ; name: spicy hot cole slaw ; ingredients: cabbage, green pepper, red pepper, onion, salt, sugar, oil, vinegar, cold water, jalapenos ; preparation:Dice cabbage, green pepper, red pepper, jalapenos, and onion. Place in large bowl. In small bowl mix together salt, sugar, oil, vinegar, and water. Mix well. Pour over cabbage, peppers, and onions and mix thoroughly. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Before serving, mix well. ; name: sweet and spicy coleslaw ; ingredients: green cabbage, carrots, yellow onion, mayonnaise, mustard, apple cider vinegar, sugar, black pepper, cayenne, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: daigaku imo japanese candied sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potato, vegetable oil, white sugar, oil, sesame seeds ; preparation:Fry the cut-up sweet potatoes in oil and drain. Make sure the potatoes have a crisp exterior. Make the sauce, heating the oil, sugar and sesame seeds together in a large saucepan. Remove from heat, add the potatoes, and stir well to thoroughly cover the potatoes. Place the potatoes on a greased plate or pan so that they do not stick to one another. Serve warm or cold. ; name: japanese sweet potato and rice shojin ryori ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, medium grain rice, salt, sake ; preparation:Peel sweet potato and cut into bite size pieces. Wash rice using several changes of water. Place rice, sweet potato pieces, salt to taste and sake in the rice cooker. Put your hand flat on the top of the rice and pour in cold water until it reaches where your wrist starts. Let it sit for about 20 minutes before cooking the rice. Once the cooking cycle is done, let it sit for about 15 to 20 minutes and fluff with a wooden or plastic rice paddle. ; name: fried sweet potatoes with honey ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, honey, oil, black sesame seed ; preparation:Clean sweet potatoes with water. Cut them into bite-sized chunks with keeping the skin on. Clean the chunks again and wipe off excess water. Slowly deep-fry the potatoes in a skillet over a low heat, until they turn slightly golden. Mix fried sweet potatoes with honey in a bowl. Sprinkle black sesame in the potatoes and serve it hot or cold. ; name: chili roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, sugar, chili powder, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: baked sweet potato with topping ; ingredients: sweet potato, pure maple syrup, raisins, sunflower seeds, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Foil line baking sheet. Prick potato with fork. Place on baking sheet and bake one hour or until very tender. Split sweet potato and top with remaining ingredients. Try eight minutes, rotating potato after four for even cooking. ; name: oven roasted glazed sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper, butter, brown sugar, lemon zest, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375. Toss the potatoes with the oil and season lightly with salt and pepper to taste. Bake for 35 minutes. While the potatoes are baking, place the butter, brown sugar, zest and lemon juice in a small pan over medium heat. Cook until the butter is melted and all is combined. Remove the potatoes from the oven and toss with the butter mixture. Return potatoes to oven and continue cooking for 10 minutes or until the potatoes are cooked through and glazed. ; name: honey roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, honey, fresh lemon juice, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally. ; name: japanese soy glazed sweet potato ; ingredients: brown sugar, low sodium soy sauce, mirin, dark sesame oil, garlic cloves, sweet potatoes, toasted sesame seeds, nori ; preparation:

name: olive oil herb and garlic bread ; ingredients: white bread, olive oil, lemon, garlic cloves, chives, flat leaf parsley, dill ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 200 degrees celsius. Cut bread into 1. 5 cm thick slices but do not cut all the way through. Place oil, lemon rind, garlic, herbs, salt and pepper into a bowl. Mix well, brush over both sides of each slice of bread. Wrap bread tightly in foil. Place on baking tray. Bake 20 - 25 minutes or till hot. Slice all the way through and serve. ; name: stuffed and barbecued tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, herbs, fresh parmesan cheese, garlic cloves, olive oil, pepper ; preparation:Have grill preheated to medium. Cut tomatoes in half crosswise. Remove and discard seeds. In a bowl combine the herbs, cheese, garlic, oil, and pepper medley. Fill the tomatoes with the mixture. Grill the tomatoes until tender and the cheese is starting to melt, 8- 10 minutes. Remove from bbq using a flat spatula. Enjoy. ; name: tomato basil side dish ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, garlic cloves, basil leaves, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oil in a saute pan over medium heat. Add garlic and stir for around 5 minutes until golden, but not burned or bitter. Remove pan from heat, let cool. Place tomatoes and basil in serving bowl, pour cooled oil and garlic over. Toss well. ; name: garlic prawns with squashed tomatoes ; ingredients: head broccoli, egg noodles, peanut oil, large shelled prawns, fresh garlic cloves, cherry tomatoes, dry white wine, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:Cut the florets from the broccoli into bite-sized pieces and set aside. Slice off and discard any rough pieces from the remaining stalk then slice into small pieces. Cook the noodles in a pan of boiling water according to packet instructions. Add the broccoli for the final minute of cooking. Drain. Meanwhile, heat a wok or large non-stick frying pan until hot. Add the oil, prawns and garlic and fry for 1-2 minutes, until the prawns turn pink. Remove from the pan and set aside. Add the tomatoes and squash down with the back of a spatula to release the juices. Cook for 1-2 minutes then add the wine and bubble for 1 minute. Return the prawn mixture to the pan, season with salt and pepper then toss through the drained noodles and broccoli. Divide among four bowls and serve immediately. ; name: wine and black olive pate ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, olives in brine, cumin seed, celery salt, clear honey, red wine ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium sized saucepan, add the cumin seeds and allow them to sizzle for a few seconds. Add the onions and garlic and saute gently for 3-5 minutes, or until soft. Add the tomatoes, olives, honey, a pinch of celery salt and honey. Mix together and cook gently for 10 minutes. Pour in the red wine, bring to the boil and simmer for another 20 minutes, uncovered. Turn up the heat and stir vigorously until the mixture has reduced to the consistency of a soft pate. This final stage will take about 5 minutes, but cooking time will depend on the thickness of the juice the chopped tomatoes are packed in. Turn into a serving dish and allow to cool. The flavours will intensify, the longer you leave the pate before eating. ; name: mediterranean vegetables in a creamy white wine sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, white onion, garlic clove, zucchini, mushrooms, dry white wine, chicken stock cube, heavy cream ; preparation:In a skillet over medium heat, warm up the olive oil. Add the green and red bell peppers, onion and garlic and cook, stirring, for 4 minutes. Add the zucchini and mushrooms and cook, still stirring, for a further 4 minutes. Add the dry white wine and simmer uncovered for 4 minutes. By the end of the 4 minutes, the wine should have reduced a little. Crumble in the chicken stock cube, stir it in and simmer for 2 minutes. Add the cream. Turn up the heat a little and simmer for 5 minutes, until the sauce has reduced and thickened. Serve over pasta, rice, baked potatoes, chicken or as a side dish. ; name: spicy whitefish with olives and cherry tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, tilapia fillets, fresh parsley, dried red pepper flakes, cherry tomatoes, kalamata olive, garlic cloves ; preparation:Heat olive oil in heavy non-stick skillet over medium high heat. Sprinkle fish with salt and pepper. Add fish to skillet and saute until just opaque in the center, about 3 minutes on each side. Transfer fish to platter. Add parsley and crushed pepper to same skillet and saute for one minute. Add tomatoes, olives and garlic. Saute about two minutes until tomatoes soften and get juicy. Season sauce with salt and pepper. Spoon over fish and serve hot. ; name: clams with cherry tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, cherry tomatoes, dry white wine, littleneck clams, garlic cloves, lemon, fresh parsley, french bread ; preparation:

name: baked fried chicken ; ingredients: flour, seasoned bread crumbs, old bay seasoning, salt, pepper, frying chicken, oil ; preparation:Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve. ; name: crusty herb fried chicken baked ; ingredients: chicken, thyme, marjoram, flour, fat, rosemary, parsley, salt, pepper, water ; preparation:Sprinkle chicken with thyme and marjoram. Let stand for 30 minute to 1 hour. Roll in flour and fry in hot fat or salad oil just long enough to brown on both sides. Remove and place in baking pan. Sprinkle with rosemary, parsley, salt and pepper. Pour water into frying pan and stir thoroughly scraping bits from bottom of pan. Pour liquid over chicken. Bake at 375 degrees for 40 to 45 minutes. Prep time includes stand time. ; name: easy tasty baked chicken ; ingredients: chicken, garlic powder, seasoning salt, pepper, paprika, green bell pepper, onion, olive oil ; preparation:In a baking dish arrange chicken pieces. Sprinkle both sides of chicken with seasonings. Top with peppers and onion. Drizzle with oil. Bake uncovered for one hour at 325 degrees after one hour turn temperature to 400 and bake 15-30 minutes longer. ; name: betty s derby fried chicken ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, pepper, salt, paprika, poultry seasoning, garlic powder, egg, milk, fryer, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients in plastic bag. Shake it to mix and set aside. In a bowl, combine egg and milk. Mix well. Skin chicken, if desired. Put 2 or 3 pieces of chicken in bag with flour. Shake well. Dip chicken in egg mixture, return to bag and shake again. Repeat with remaining chicken. Heat 1 inch of oil in a large skillet. Add chicken and fry 15 minutes or until golden brown, turning to brown both sides. Drain chicken on paper towels. ; name: crispy coated garlic chicken ; ingredients: chicken, olive oil, garlic, corn flake crumbs, garlic powder, salt, pepper, paprika ; preparation:Place chicken in a large, shallow container. Combine oil and garlic, pour over chicken, tossing to coat. Cover and marinate 8 hours or overnight. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line a large, shallow roasting pan with foil, grease well with a thin layer of olive oil. Combine crumbs, garlic powder, salt, pepper and paprika in a shallow bowl. Dredge chicken in crumb mixture and place in prepared pan. Bake uncovered for 1 hours, or until done. ; name: savory oven fried chicken ; ingredients: dried breadcrumbs, sharp cheddar cheese, dried ancho chile powder, salt, chicken, eggs ; preparation:In a large shallow bowl mix bread crumbs, cheese, ground chilies, and salt. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Dip in beaten egg and roll in crumb mixture to coat. Place on a foil-lined 12-by 15-inch baking sheet. Bake in a 375 degree oven or 350 degree convection oven until crumbs are browned and chicken is no longer pink at the bone, 45 minutes to 1 hour. ; name: oven fried garlic chicken ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper, butter, garlic cloves, chicken ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow bowl, blend together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, and pepper. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour. ; name: crusty fried chicken ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, garlic salt, salt, celery salt, pepper, paprika, chicken pieces, canola oil ; preparation:

name: pear and cashew slice ; ingredients: pears, raw cashews, gluten-free self-raising flour, soft brown sugar, dairy-free margarine, golden syrup, egg ; preparation:Place the pears, cashews, flour and brown sugar in a bowl and mix together. Place the margarine and golden syrup in a small saucepan and stir over low heat until melted. Gently stir golden syrup mixture and egg into the pear mixture. Pour the mixture into a lightly greased 20cm square tin and bake for 35-40 minutes at 180c, or until golden and cooked through. Leave to cool in the tin before slicing. ; name: baked prickly pears ; ingredients: prickly pears, sugar, butter, cinnamon, lemon juice ; preparation:Gather large ripe fruit. Wash and slit to remove seeds. Preheat oven to 325- 350 degrees. Spread fruits in a sigle layer in a buttered 8 inch pan. Combine sugar, cinnamon, and butter and mix well with fingers. Add lemon juice and stir well with a spoon. Sprinkle mixture evenly over fruits. Bake 30- 35 minutes and serve warm with cream. ; name: baked pears in caramel sauce ; ingredients: pears, sugar, butter, whipping cream ; preparation:Cut pears in half lengthwise. Arrange, cut side down on lightly greased baking dish. Sprinkle with sugar and dot with butter. Bake at 400 for 35 minutes or until tender. Pour whipping cream over pears. Bake 10 more minutes, basting frequently. ; name: pear honey ; ingredients: pears, pineapple, lemon, juice and rind of, sugar ; preparation:Run the pears through a food chopper using fine blades. Combine all ingredients. Cook on low heat, stirring frequently, until the mixture is thick and clear. Pack in hot jars and seal. Process in a water bath for 10 minutes. ; name: chunky pear and vanilla bars ; ingredients: honey, vanilla extract, rolled oats, dried cranberries, pears ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Heat honey in a saucepan, then add the vanilla and stir in the oats, cranberries, and pears. Press the mixture into a 7-inch square nonstick baking pan. Bake for 20 minutes. Let cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then mark into 10 bars and let cool completely. ; name: roasted pears with brown sugar and vanilla ice cream ; ingredients: apple juice, dark brown sugar, unsalted butter, bosc pears, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange the pears cut side up in an 8-inch square glass baking dish. Whisk the apple juice and sugar in a small heavy saucepan over medium-high heat until the sugar dissolves. Whisk in the butter. Pour the sauce over the pears. Bake until the pears are crisp-tender and beginning to brown, basting occasionally with the juices, about 35 minutes. Spoon the pears onto plates. Top with ice cream. Drizzle with any juices and serve. The pears can also be served frozen. To do so, cool the pears, then place them in the freezer until frozen solid, about 8 hours. ; name: french pear bread ; ingredients: pear, water, honey, egg, bread flour, salt, pepper, dry yeast ; preparation:Select either juice or syrup packed canned pears, mash them well. Add mashed pears, water, honey and egg to bread machine. Add dry ingredients, ending with yeast. Select basic white cyle. Follow manufacturers directions. ; name: baked pears with raisins ; ingredients: pears, raisins, maple syrup, butter, vanilla extract, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: roasted potatoes and baby carrots with garlic ; ingredients: red potatoes, baby carrots, garlic cloves, olive oil, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Dry the veggies well with a paper towel and place in a large bowl. Prepare a large non-stick baking sheet, you can line with foil and spray the foil liberally with cooking spray. In a small bowl combine olive oil, chopped garlic, coarse salt and black pepper. Mix well to combine. Pour over the veggies and toss to coat with a wooden spoon or clean hands. Set oven to 400 degrees f. Roast in oven for about 30 minutes or until the potatoes are fork-tender, tossing occasionally with a spatula. ; name: roasted spiced carrots ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, sugar, ground cumin, kosher salt, ground cinnamon, carrots, white raisins, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: basil carrots ; ingredients: carrots, butter, salt, basil ; preparation:Slice carrots. Simmer, covered, in salted water until tender, about 10 to 15 minutes. Drain. Combine remaining ingredients. Toss with carrots. ; name: chile carrots with garlic ; ingredients: carrots, onions, garlic cloves, fresh oregano, pickled jalapeno peppers, olive oil, white wine vinegar, black pepper, bay leaves, salt ; preparation:In a pot of boiling water, blanch the sliced carrots for 30 seconds. Drain. In a bowl, mix all of the ingredients with the hot carrots. Refrigerate 30 minutes before serving. Keeps refrigerated for 6 days. ; name: zucchini and carrots with garlic and herbs ; ingredients: olive oil, carrot, zucchini, garlic, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, fresh basil leaf, fresh oregano ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over moderate heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: butter maple roasted carrots with garden thyme ; ingredients: butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic clove, cayenne pepper, brown sugar, maple syrup, fresh thyme, baby carrots ; preparation:Heat butter, water, salt, pepper, garlic, cayenne, brown sugar and maple syrup together in a small pan. Place carrots and thyme in a greased baking dish. Evenly coat carrots with the maple mixture. Cover with foil and bake at 350 for 1 hour 15 minute. Remove foil and bake for another 25 minutes, until slightly browned and carmelized. ; name: sweet roasted rosemary carrots ; ingredients: carrots, olive oil, dried rosemary, apricot jam, coarse salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Peel and trim carrots and slice lengthwise into thin halves or quarters. Toss carrots in bowl with olive oil, rosemary and salt. Roast at 350 for 30 minutes, stirring half way through. Turn up oven to 425 and roast ten minutes longer or until the ends of the carrots begin to turn black. When carrots are almost done, melt apricot jam in microwave for 15-30 seconds. Remove carrots from oven, place in bowl and toss warm carrots with melted apricot jam. Toss with a little more rosemary if desired. ; name: mashed garlic carrots ; ingredients: carrots, garlic, vegetable stock, dried thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: cream cheese cheddar biscuits ; ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sharp cheddar cheese, butter, cream cheese, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Measure dry ingredients into food processor and pulse until well combined. Add cheese and cut butter and cream cheese into small chunks and distribute throughout processor bowl. Hit pulse about 10 times for 1-2 seconds each pulse until course crumbs develop. Pour milk through feed tube in a slow stream while pulsing until cohesive but crumbly dough forms. Turn dough onto floured surface and gently squeeze it into a ball. Flatten and gently shape into an 8 by 8 inch square. Cut into 16 even squares. Place on ungreased baking sheet and bake 15-18 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: kissey face cream cheese cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, granulated sugar, all-purpose flour, egg, vanilla extract, hershey chocolate kisses ; preparation:Cream butter and cream cheese. Gradually add sugar, beating until light and fluffy. Add flour. Beat well. Stir in egg and vanilla. Shape dough into 1-inch balls. Place 2 inches apart a lightly greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 f for 8 minutes. Remove the cookies from the oven and place one unwrapped hershey kiss in the middle of each cookie. Return to oven and bake 5 minutes. Cool 2-3 minutes on cookie sheets before removing to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: cinnamon cream cheese roll ups ; ingredients: bread, cream cheese, egg yolk, powdered sugar, sugar, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Flatten bread with a rolling pin. Mix cream cheese, egg yolk, and powdered sugar. Combine sugar and cinnamon. Set aside. Spread 1 t cheese mixture on each slice bread. Roll up. Dip in melted butter, then in cinnamon sugar. Place on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 350f for 20 minutes, or until golden. ; name: fantastic buttery cream cheese coffee cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, sour cream, flour, baking powder, salt, cream cheese, egg yolk, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 13 x 9-inch. Cream butter with sugar, add in eggs and sour cream. Beat well. In a bowl, sift together flour, baking powder and salt. Add the flour mixture to the creamed mixture. Beat well until combined. Spread more than half of the batter in the prepared baking pan. In another bowl, cream together all filling ingredients, then carefully spread over the cake batter. Spoon the remaining cake batter over the top of the cheese mixture. For the topping mix all ingredients, and sprinkle over cake. Bake for about 50-55 minutes or until middle feels set and not jiggly. ; name: bacon egg and cheese biscuit casserole ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, butter, milk, eggs, bacon, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through. ; name: strawberry cream cheese sandwich cookies ; ingredients: cream cheese, strawberry preserves, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, vanilla wafers ; preparation:In a medium bowl, smash cream cheese with a fork. Combine the rest of the ingredients together with the cream cheese. Mix well. Let chill in the refridgerator for at least 30 minutes. On the flat side of the wafer, spread 2 tsp of mixture. Then top with another wafer to make a sandwich. Sprinkle with powdered sugar. Serve immediately. ; name: little cheesecakes ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla, chocolate wafers, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Beat cream cheese at medium speed of electric mixer until fluffy. Mix in sugar. Add eggs one at a time, making sure the mixture is well blended. Stir in vanilla. Line 12 muffin cups with muffin paper, and place a chocolate wafer in each lined cup. Spoon the cream cheese mixture over the wafers. Bake for 20 minutes at 350 degrees. Remove muffin tin from oven, but leave the cakes in the muffin pan and refrigerate them overnight. Remove the cheesecakes from the muffin pan. To serve, spoon a tablespoon of cherry pie filling on each mini cheesecake. ; name: cream cheese dessert wedges ; ingredients: refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, cream cheese, sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, ground cinnamon ; preparation:

name: easy taco casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, salsa, taco seasoning, salad dressing, nacho cheese flavored tortilla chips, colby-monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving. ; name: garden taco rice ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, taco seasoning mix, water, zucchini, frozen corn, stewed tomatoes, instant rice, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown meat with onion. Drain. Stir in remaining ingredients except rice and cheese. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice, reduce heat to low, cover, simmer for 5 to 7 minutes or until all the liquid is absorded, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand 3 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: quick taco bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, whole kernel corn, cheddar cheese, bisquick baking mix, milk, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Cook beef and onion until beef is brown, drain. Spoon into ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Stir in taco mix, dry, tomato sauce and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir remaining ingredients until blended, pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minute or until light golden brown. Serve with sour cream, chopped tomato and shredded cheese, if desired. ; name: quick taco casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, onion, taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, whole kernel corn, cheddar cheese, baking mix, milk, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook ground chuck with onion until chuck is brown. Drain off grease. Spoon into ungreased 9x13x2-inch baking dish. Stir in dry taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir baking mix, milk, and eggs until blended and pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: stewed chicken taco meat ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, low-sodium taco seasoning, garlic clove, ro-tel tomatoes, colby-monterey jack cheese, chicken broth ; preparation:Put all ingredients except cheese in crockpot and cook on low for 6 hours. Use two forks to shred the chicken into chunks. Add cheese and stir. Serve immediately in tacos or use as a filling for enchiladas. You can also use chicken breasts, but it turns out drier and not as tasty. ; name: beef taco skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato soup, salsa, water, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese. ; name: easy indian tacos ; ingredients: frozen bread dough, hamburger, pinto beans, taco seasoning ; preparation:Thaw bread dough until workable. Combine hamburger, taco seasoning and pinto beans and cook until meat is done. Remove meat and beans from heat and let cool. Shape bread dough into the shape of a silver dollar pancake. Place dough in fryer and cook on each side until golden brown. Remove bread from grease and place on paper towel. Top bread with taco meat and beans, shredded lettuce, diced tomatoes, shredded cheese, sour cream, olives, guacamole, hot sauces whatever you like. ; name: low carb taco potatoes ; ingredients: aluminum foil, onion, red potatoes, taco seasoning, olive oil, mexican blend cheese ; preparation:

name: crunchy baked bananas ; ingredients: bananas, orange juice, honey, sultanas, walnuts, cinnamon, yoghurt ; preparation:Slice bananas in half lengthways. Place in baking dish. Cut side up. Pour over juice, drizzle honey. Sprinkle on nuts, cinnamon and sultanas. Bake 200 c for 15 minutes. Serve with yoghurt. ; name: banana berry oatmeal ; ingredients: nonfat milk, banana, berries, oatmeal, toasted wheat germ, honey ; preparation:In a small pan, heat milk until simmering. Add banana and berries, stir, then add oatmeal and wheat germ. Simmer for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally, until milk is absorbed. Let stand 2 minutes. Sweeten with honey. ; name: oatmeal banana muffins ; ingredients: flour, rolled oats, baking powder, baking soda, egg, white sugar, butter, mashed bananas, raisins ; preparation:Mix all together well. Place in muffin liners. This recipes is very easily doubled and tripled. You can add nuts or chocolate chips too for a change. Mix all together, place in x-large muffin liners. Bake for 20-25 minutes at 325. Makes 12 big muffins. ; name: bananas foster crunch mix ; ingredients: honey nut chex, cinnamon, pecan halves, dried banana pieces, butter, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, banana extract, rum extract ; preparation:In a large microwave-safe bowl, combine cereals, pecans and banana chips. In a small microwave-safe bowl, combine the butter, brown sugar and cinnamon. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 2 minutes, stirring once. Stir in extracts. Pour over cereal mixture and toss to coat. Cook, uncovered, on high for 3 minutes, stirring after each minute. Spread onto waxed paper to cool. Store in an airtight container. ; name: banana oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: flour, brown sugar, baking powder, baking soda, quick oats, plain yogurt, banana, oil, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Grease a muffin pan. In a large bowl, whisk together flour, brown sugar, baking powder and soda. In another bowl stir together oats and yogurt, stirring in banana, oil and egg. Stir mixture into flour mixture and stir until moistened. Put in muffin pans and bake for 20- 25 minute until done. ; name: peanut butter and banana oat cookies ; ingredients: bananas, peanut butter, rolled oats, oat flour, raisins, butter, salt, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Let sit for 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 350. Drop by spoonfuls onto parchment lined or lightly greased baking sheet. Bake for 15-20 minutes until lightly golden. ; name: crispy bananas with cinnamon chocolate sauce ; ingredients: bananas, flour, egg, half-and-half, panko breadcrumbs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, cinnamon, whipped cream, vegetable oil ; preparation:Add 1 cup half and half and chocolate chips to a small saucepan, and melt together over low heat. Add cinnamon, stir well. Cut bananas into quarters. Beat egg with 1 tbsp half and half. Dredge bananas in flour, egg, and then panko crumbs. Heat oil in a wide skillet over medium heat. Fry bananas just until crisp and lightly browned. Serve 1 banana in each dish, drizzled with chocolate sauce and topped with whipped cream. ; name: crunchy banana cinnamon oatmeal ; ingredients: oatmeal, milk, cinnamon, banana, cereal ; preparation:

name: not hot chili ; ingredients: ground beef, chili beans, crushed tomatoes in puree, green pepper, onions, celery, garlic cloves, chili powder, cumin ; preparation:Brown beef in skillet. In another skillet, saute peppers, onion, celery and garlic. Mix veggies with beef, put into crockpot. Add beans, tomatoes, chili powder and cumin. Cook on low 6 hrs or high 4 hours. ; name: 15 minute chili ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, pinto beans, kidney beans, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, salt, salsa ; preparation:In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired. ; name: chicken chilies ; ingredients: chilies, chicken, butter, peanut oil, onion, chicken broth, nutmeg, salt, pepper, tomatoes ; preparation:Melt butter and oil and brown chicken and set aside, cover with foil to keep warm. Saut onion until soft. Add broth, nutmeg, salt, pepper and chilies-bring to a boil. Add chicken back to the pot, cover and reduce heat to a simmer until done-45 minutes or so. When chicken is done sprinkle chopped tomato on top and serve or cover with lid of pan to heat tomato through--however you would like it. Enjoy. ; name: fast simple and delicious vegetarian chili ; ingredients: onions, kidney beans, textured vegetable protein, tomato sauce, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, garlic, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Coat iron pan with nonstick spray and place on medium heat. Add onion and soy meat to pan. Once onion is brown or wilted add beans, sauce, tomatoes, and chili powder. Bring to a boil, then let simmer over med-low heat for 15 minutes to let thicken. Add garlic and stir. Add tobasco to taste. Turn off heat and let sit for 2-5 minutes. ; name: easy white chicken chili ; ingredients: white chicken meat packed in water, cream of chicken soup, skim milk, great northern beans, onion, diced tomatoes with green chilies, chili seasoning mix, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, open all cans and mix together. Add onion and white chicken chili mix to taste. Stir well. Simmer for 45 minutes, stirring frequently. Sprinkle cheese on the top when serving. ; name: no beans no tomato chili ; ingredients: ground beef, water, chili seasoning mix, pepper, accent seasoning, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, onion powder, salt ; preparation:In the 3 cups of water, simmer the meat for 30 minutes. Crumble the meat up as you add it to the water. There should not be any large pieces. After 30 minutes add the remaining ingredients. Simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Serve this up with some cheese and extra onions if you want. ; name: cheater s chili ; ingredients: oil, lean ground turkey, stewed tomatoes, hot chili beans, chili powder ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet. Crumble turkey and cook over medium-high heat until no longer pink. Stir in all remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: world s easiest chili ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, ground turkey, cumin seed, tomatoes, kidney beans, red chili powder, black pepper, sazon goya, salt ; preparation:

name: cheese and sour cream potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, butter, onions, salt, ground black pepper, corn flakes ; preparation:In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden. ; name: crispy cheese topped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, cheddar cheese, salt, corn flakes, paprika ; preparation:Mix potato slices with butter. Place slightly overlapping in foil-lined baking sheet. Sprinkle lightly with salt. Bake 375 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, sprinkle with cheese. Top with cornflake crumbs and sprinkle lightly with paprika. Return to oven and bake 25-30 minutes or until potaotes are tender. ; name: chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, milk, fresh chives, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes for 10-12 minutes or until fork-tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Mash potatoes, adding cream cheese until it is blended. Stir in milk, chives, and seasonings. Heat on medium heat until just warmed through, then serve at once. ; name: creamy cheddar potatoes ; ingredients: butter, potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, milk, cheddar cheese, parsley ; preparation:In large, nonstick skillet, melt butter. Add potatoes and cook over medium heat until almost tender and lightly browned. Add salt, pepper, and milk, continuing to cook until milk is absorbed and potatoes are tender. Sprinkle with cheese, heating until melted. Stir well, sprinkle with chopped parsley and serve. ; name: blue cheese and chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, blue cheese, butter, fresh chives, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Cook in boiling water for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain well. Mash with a potato masher or mixer until smooth and stir in remaining ingredients. Return to stove and cook for a few minutes more until very hot. ; name: creamy mashed potatoes with chives ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, nonfat milk, salt, light cream cheese with chives and onions ; preparation:Place potatoes in a dutch oven, and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add the milk and salt. Mash the potato mixture with a potato masher to desired consistency. Add the cheese, and stir just until blended. ; name: twice baked potatoes with cream cheese ; ingredients: potatoes, fat free cream cheese, nonfat milk, onion salt, butter, fresh ground pepper, parsley, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Put cream cheese out to soften. Scrub potatoes. Dry them off and grease them with butter and salt the skins. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. Remove from oven and cool to handle. Cut potatoes in half, lengthwise, remove cooked potato and put in large bowl. Be carefully to leave the skin intact. Mash with cream cheese, hot milk, onion salt, butter, and pepper. Pile mixture back into skins. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley and bake 20 more minutes. ; name: crunchy cheese potatoes ; ingredients: sour cream, milk, chives, salt, pepper, potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, corn flakes ; preparation:

name: curried corn salad ; ingredients: red onion, red pepper, green pepper, curry powder, oregano, turmeric, corn, black olives, miracle whip, sea salt ; preparation:Saute onion in oil until tender. Add peppers and saute briefly, just until warmed through. Add curry powder, oregano, and turmeric. While the peppers are sauteing, heat the corn until hot, and drain any liquid. In a large bowl, mix the pepper mixture, drained corn, black olives, miracle whip, and salt. Serve warm. ; name: salmon fusilli salad ; ingredients: tri-colored fusilli, miracle whip, dried dill weed, dried onion flakes, chives, sweet red pepper, lime juice, salt, fresh ground pepper, sockeye salmon ; preparation:Cook pasta in salted boiling water till al-dente. Rinse in cool water and set aside to drain. In the meantime, mix together miracle whip, dill, onion flakes, chives, red pepper, lime juice, salt and pepper. Add the dressing mixture to the pasta and mix thoroughly. Gently fold in the salmon. Cover and chill for 2 hours before serving. ; name: warm chanterelle salad ; ingredients: chanterelle mushrooms, butter, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dill, romaine lettuce, lettuce, rocket, olive oil, white balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Clean the mushrooms, place them in a saucepan and sweat them dry. Strain them and allow them to drip completely dry through a sieve. Then saut them golden brown in butter and season them with salt and black pepper. Wash the lettuces and let them drip dry. Tear them up into a bowl and dress them with olive oil, salt and balsamic vinegar just prior to serving. Put the mixed salad in mounds on the plates and lay the mushrooms on them directly from the pan. Garnish with onion flowers, crown dill, dill sprigs or chopped dill. ; name: tossed romaine and orange salad ; ingredients: orange juice, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, romaine lettuce, mandarin oranges, slivered almonds ; preparation:Prepare the dressing by whisking together the orange juice, olive oil, vinegar, pepper and salt. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine the romaine and oranges. Add enough dressing to coat and toss well. Sprinkle with almonds and serve. ; name: chicken salad oriental ; ingredients: cooked chicken, pineapple tidbits, green onions, water chestnuts, sour cream, ground ginger, salt, pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:Combine and chill first four ingredients. Blend sour cream, ground ginger, salt, and pepper. Add to chicken mixture. Toss lightly. Serve on bed of greens. Sprinkle with toasted almonds. ; name: roasted corn and pepper salad ; ingredients: white shoepeg corn, red bell pepper, olive oil, green onions, sugar, cumin, salt, lime juice, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine corn, bell pepper and oil. Toss to coat. Spread in ungreased 15 x 10 x 1 inch baking pan or on cookie sheet. Broil 4 to 6 inches from heat for 9 to 14 minutes or until corn is light golden brown, stirring once or twice. Place corn mixture in same bowl. Add onions, sugar, cumin, salt and lime juice. Mix well. Sprinkle with cilantro. Serve immediately. ; name: orange salad with olives mint ; ingredients: red onion, navel oranges, olive oil, lemon juice, orange juice, of fresh mint, kosher salt, black olives ; preparation:Soak onions in ice water for 30 minutes, drain. Meanwhile, peel oranges as directed above, making sure as much of the white pith as possible is removed. Slice, crosswise as thinly as possible and save any juice that accumulates from the slicing. Lay the oranges in a spiral on a platter. Combine the oil, lemon and orange juice with salt, mint and any of the accumulated orange juice. Toss the onion slices over the oranges. Spread the dressing over both evenly. Then sprinkle with olives. ; name: fakes salata lentil salad ; ingredients: french lentils, bay leaves, olive oil, oranges, salt, fresh ground black pepper, red onion, orange ; preparation:

name: peanut butter chip chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Cream butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Mix well. Stir in peanut butter chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: favorite chocolate chip and fruit bars ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, butter, sugar, eggs, raisins, dates, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray an 11 x 17-inch pan with pam non stick cooking spray. Combine flour and baking soda in bowl and set aside. Cream butter with sugar. Add eggs one at a time. Alternately stir in raisins and flour mixture. Fold in remaining ingredients. Spread evenly in prepared pan. Bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool and then cut into bars. ; name: chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: butter, creamy peanut butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: delicious chewy peanut butter chocolate chip oatmeal bars ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, white sugar, vanilla, eggs, peanut butter, all-purpose flour, baking soda, oatmeal, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Set oven rack to second-lowest position. Grease a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. In a large bowl using an electric mixer at medium speed cream the butter with both sugars and vanilla until no sugar granules remain. Add in the peanut butter and beat until combined. Add in eggs and beat until combined. In a bowl combine the flour with baking soda and oats. Add to the creamed mixture and mix on low speed until combined. Mix in chocolate chips. Transfer and spread into prepared baking dish. Bake for 22-25 minutes or until just set. Cool then cut into squares. ; name: butterscotch peanut butter bars squares ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, peanut butter, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars. ; name: eatmore chocolate peanut bars ; ingredients: corn syrup, brown sugar, salt, corn flakes, vanilla, peanuts, chocolate chips, peanut butter ; preparation:Bring corn syrup, sugar and salt to a full rolling boil. Stir in peanut butter until well blended. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla and peanuts. Add cornflakes and chocolate chips. Stir until chips are melted. Turn into buttered 8x8 pan. Pack down and chill before cutting into squares. ; name: peanut butter and chocolate chip bars ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, walnuts, chocolate chips, peanut butter ; preparation:

name: skillet chicken cheese enchiladas ; ingredients: corn tortilla, cooked chicken, enchilada sauce, monterey jack and cheddar cheese blend ; preparation:Spray a large skillet with cooking spray. Heat tortillas and chicken over medium-high heat for 7 minutes. Pour sauce in skillet and stir to blend. Sprinkle with cheese and cover. Heat until cheese is melted and sauce is hot. ; name: swiss enchiladas enchiladas suizas ; ingredients: cooked chicken, anaheim chilies, green chili salsa, salt, heavy cream, corn tortillas, oil, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Mix the chicken, chilies, and salsa in a small bowl. Mix the salt and cream in a large shallow dish. Heat the oil in a frying pan over med-high. Fry the tortillas one at a time for a few seconds until they start to blister and turn soft. Immediately dip each one in the cream mixture. Put a large dollop of the chicken mixture on each tortilla and roll it up. Place it in a ungreased baking pan, flap side down. When all of the tortillas are done, pour the remaining cream over them and sprinkle the cheese over the top. Bake uncovered for 20 minutes or so, until they are thoroughly heated. ; name: chicken or turkey enchiladas with sour cream ; ingredients: chicken, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, canola oil, corn tortillas, medium hot salsa ; preparation:In a bowl, mix chicken or turkey, sour cream, 2 cups shredded cheese, and salt. Heat oil in an 8-to 10inch frying pan over low heat. Dip the tortillas, one at a time, in the hot oil just until limp, about 5 seconds. Fill tortillas equally with chicken mixture, roll up, and arrange side by side, slit side down, in a 9-x13 inch baking dish. Pour salsa evenly over top. Bake in a 350 degree oven until heated through, about 20 minutes. If desired sprinkle with more shredded cheese over hot enchiladas before serving. ; name: skillet beef enchiladas ; ingredients: ground round, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, milk, corn tortillas, cheese ; preparation:Brown meat and onion in large skillet. Drain fat. Stir in chilies, cream of mushroom soup, enchilada sauce, and milk. Bring to a boil and then simmer for 20 minutes. Soften tortillas in the microwave wrapped in paper towels. Place grated cheese inside each tortilla and roll up. Place tortillas in sauce in skillet and spoon sauce over tortillas. Top with any remaining cheese. Cover and heat on medium for 5 minutes. ; name: homemade enchilada sauce ; ingredients: oil, cornstarch, chili powder, chicken broth, tomato sauce, salt, cumin, oregano, sugar, cayenne ; preparation:Heat oil with cornstarch in saucepan over medium heat. Cook for 1 minute. Add in chili powder and cook for another minute. Gradually stir in the broth, mixing well with a whisk to make sure you get out the lumps. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Simmer until thickened on low. ; name: four seasons enchiladas ; ingredients: green chilies, cream cheese, cooked turkey, flour tortillas, salsa, chili beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix chile peppers and cream cheese. Stir in chopped turkey. Place the tortillas in a microwave oven. Heat for 1 minute, or until the tortillas are softened. Spread about 2 heaping tablespoons of the chile pepper mixture on each tortilla, and roll up. Place the rolled tortillas, seam-side down, in single layer in the prepared baking dish. In a medium bowl, combine the salsa and beans. Spoon the mixture over the enchiladas. Sprinkle the top with cheese. Bake 20 minutes or til bubbly and lightly browned. ; name: green chili enchiladas ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green chilies, cream of mushroom soup, flour tortillas, salt & pepper, velveeta cheese, rotel tomatoes & chilies ; preparation:Brown beef, onions, salt and pepper in skillet, drain and add chopped green chilies and mushroom soup, mix well. Lightly warm the tortillas in the microwave to make them easy to roll. Place a couple of heaping tablespoons of meat mixture in each tortilla and roll up. Place in a 9 x 13-inch pan sprayed with non-stick spray. If you have any meat mixture left, you can add it into the next step. Melt velveeta and ro-tel in the microwave or on the stove top, add any remaining meat mixture and pour over tortillas. Put into a 350f oven for about 20 minutes or until cheese is bubbly. ; name: super easy cheese enchiladas ; ingredients: extra-sharp cheddar cheese, corn tortillas, vegetable oil, onion, enchilada sauce, chili without beans ; preparation:

name: garlicky chicken foil packets ; ingredients: aluminum foil, carrot, onion, fresh basil, mayonnaise, garlic cloves, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Cut 4 12x12 sheets of foil. Place carrots and onion in centre of foil square. Place chicken on top of vegetables. Combine basil, mayonnaise, garlic and pepper and spread on chicken. Fold foil over chicken and seal. Place on baking sheet and bake 25-30 minutes or done. ; name: tin foil chicken veggies ; ingredients: barbecue sauce, boneless skinless chicken breast, green pepper, red pepper, new potatoes, frozen corn, frozen peas, onion, canned mushroom slices ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f. Tear off four sheets of foil, each about 12 by 15 inches. Smear about a tablespoon of barbecue sauce in a rough rectangular shape in the middle of each sheet. Divide the chicken slices among the four sheets atop the barbecue sauce. Add the peppers, potatoes and any other vegetables. Drizzle another tablespoon of barbecue sauce over top. In half-inch pleats, fold the foil over itself first lengthwise and then crosswise to create tightly sealed packets. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 50 minutes or until chicken is fully cooked. Carefully cut open the packets. ; name: christie s baked onion casserole ; ingredients: butter, sweet onions, potato chips, cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 2 quart casserole dish. In a large pot, cover onions with water. Bring to a boil and cook until onions are just crisp tender, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from heat and drain well. Layer onion pieces, potato chips and cheese in prepared dish, beginning with onions & ending with cheese. Mix soup and milk together. Stir in cayenne pepper. Pour soup mixture over the top of the cheese. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes or until onions are completely tender. ; name: hamburger casserole ; ingredients: hamburger, green beans, onion, sharp cheddar cheese, egg, tomato soup, potatoes ; preparation:Cook and mash potatoes, add egg to potatoes while mashing. Set aside. Brown hamburger and onion, drain. Add beans and soup, stir well. Place in a greased casserole dish. Put mashed potatoes on top of meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 350 for 35-40 minutes. ; name: party tray wrap up ; ingredients: cream cheese spread, fresh spinach, zucchini, marinated artichoke hearts, green olives, pepperoni, gouda cheese, flour tortilla ; preparation:Spread tortilla with cream cheese spread. Arrange spinach leaves in straight line down center of tortilla. Top with pepperoni and cheese. Sprinkle with zucchini, artichokes and olives. Roll tortilla tightly, burrito style. Serve at room temperature. ; name: shipwreck casserole ; ingredients: onions, potatoes, hamburger, white rice, celery, condensed tomato soup, salt, pepper ; preparation:Slice onions in the bottom of a baking dish. Add thinly sliced potatoes. Over potatoes spread hamburger. Next add uncooked rice. Top with a layer of chopped celery. As each layer is added season with salt and pepper to taste. Combine soup with an equal amount of water and pour over all. Cover and bake for 2 hours at 350f. ; name: steak and potato casserole ; ingredients: top round beef, garlic powder, pepper, meat tenderizer, potatoes, red onion, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, red wine and vinegar salad dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender. ; name: boy scout foil dinner ; ingredients: hamburger, lipton onion soup mix, onions, red potatoes, baby carrots, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: cheddar and chive omelet ; ingredients: eggs, fresh chives, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter, extra-sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Whisk eggs, chives, salt, and pepper together in medium bowl. Heat butter in large non-stick skillet. Pour in egg mixture and cook over medium heat until almost set, lifting sides to let uncooked egg run under. Sprinkle omelet with cheddar cheese. Run omelet under hot broiler just until cheese is melted, bubbling, and just beginning to brown. Cut into 4-6 servings and serve immediately. ; name: easy oven omelette ; ingredients: butter, eggs, reduced-fat sour cream, low-fat milk, dijon mustard, scallion, swiss cheese, salt, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Brush the 1 tbsp melted butter into a square baking dish. Beat the eggs, sour cream, milk and mustard together until well blended. Stir in the scallions, swiss cheese, salt and paprika. Pour into the buttered baking dish. Bake at 325 for about 30-35 minutes or until eggs are set but still moist. ; name: easy baked omelets ; ingredients: egg, green pepper, tomatoes, onion, sausage, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with non-stick cooking spray. Add one cracked egg to each tin and whisk the yolk. Add your toppings, saving the cheese for last. Bake 30 minutes or until eggs are completely cooked. Cool and serve. ; name: three cheese omelet ; ingredients: butter, eggs, mild cheddar cheese, provolone cheese, swiss cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Using an 8-inch, non-stick skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add beaten eggs. As the eggs begin to thicken, add the 3 cheeses evenly over the eggs. As cheese begins to melt, and before the eggs get brown, flip or turn egg mixture over. Continue to cook until the cheese melts. Turn omelette 1 more time. The finished omelette will be a nice yellow color with the cheese melted. Serve immediately. ; name: bauern omelette german omelette ; ingredients: eggs, potatoes, onions, turkey bacon, butter, salt, pepper, oil ; preparation:In a medium bowl, whisk eggs togeether well. Add salt and pepper and whisk again. Pour a little oil in a cast-iron pan and saute onion, bacon and potato. Add the butter and allow it to melt before pouring in the egg. Allow it to cook on low heat and, when golden-brown, garnish with chopped herbs. Serve hot. ; name: omelette sandwich ; ingredients: eggs, cumin, extra virgin olive oil, sea salt, black pepper, hoagie rolls, salsa ; preparation:Beat eggs with 1 tbs water and cumin. Coat bottom of non stick pan with 1 tbs oil. Pour in enough egg mixture to coat bottom of pan. Push cooked edges into center allowing uncooked egg to flow around pan, do this twice. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. When almost cooked through, fold in half. Repeat with remaining egg mixture. Split rolls in half and place omelette into each roll. Top with tomato salsa. ; name: cheddar and scallion bread ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, butter, scallions, garlic cloves, kosher salt, black pepper, bread ; preparation:Place an oven rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the cheese mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately. ; name: extra sharp cheddar oven omelet ; ingredients: bacon, green onions, eggs, light cream, seasoning salt, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, sweet onion ; preparation:

name: milk brownies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, margarine, eggs, sugar, vanilla, self-rising flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: dark chocolate butterscotch brownies ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, sugar, egg whites, vanilla, flour, bittersweet chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Melt together butter and unsweetend chocolate in microwave, stir until smooth, then cool slightly. In a large bowl, combine sugar and chocolate mixture. Stir in egg whites and vanilla. Stir in flour. Stir in the chips. Spread into greased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Melt together chips and butter, stir until smooth. Spread over warm brownies. Cool completely before cutting. ; name: sugar brownies with chocolate chips ; ingredients: milk, french vanilla liquid coffee creamer, baking powder, butter, sugar, vanilla extract, flour, egg, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pour ingredients into a mixing bowl. Mix until slightly lumpy. Add chocolate chips. Pour onto cookie sheet and spread. Heat the oven to 400f and bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cornstarch, salt, baking soda, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: soft and yummy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, white sugar, egg, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream margarine. Add gradually and beat in brown sugar and white sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Sift and stir in flour, salt, baking soda. Add chocolate chips. Bake 10 minutes at 375. ; name: butterbrickle brownies ; ingredients: margarine, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, chocolate-covered toffee bits, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl, beat the margarine, white and brown sugars together until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla, beat well. In another bowl, sift flour, baking powder, and salt. Add to the creamed mixture, stirring well. Fold in butter brickle bits, and chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting. ; name: big and chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, white sugar, margarine, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream together sugars and margarine until fluffy with mixer. Blend in eggs, 1 at a time. Blend in vanilla. Combine flour, salt and baking soda. Add flour, combining with a spoon. Add chocolate chips. Use an ice cream scoop for measurement and place on shiny cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350f oven for 18-20 minutes or until golden. ; name: white chocolate chip brownies ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, eggs, flour, cocoa powder, white chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: pasta with beans basil corn ; ingredients: fresh corn, pasta, great northern beans, fresh basil, salt, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, red pepper, yellow pepper ; preparation:Cut the kernels off the uncooked cobs and set aside. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions for al dente. Add the corn kernels to the pot for the last 30 seconds. Drain pasta. And corn in a colander and transfer to a large bowl. Add the beans, basil, salt, olive oil, vinegar and peppers and gently toss. Until blended. This can be served warm or at room temperature. Sprinkle with additional. Fresh chopped basil for an extra color and flavor splash. ; name: aelplermagronen swiss pasta ; ingredients: potatoes, salt, noodles, cheese, cream, butter, onions ; preparation:Peel and dice the potatoes. Boil in salted water. Add the noodles shortly before the potatoes are done. The potatoes should be soft. Drain and arrange in alternate layers with the cheese in a deep baking dish. Pour in the cream and place in the hot oven for a few minutes until the cheese melts. Meanwhile, melt the butter in a skillet. Slice the onions and saute until they turn light brown. Spread over the noodles and potatoes. Serve with apple puree or salad. ; name: pesto chicken and pasta ; ingredients: farfalle pasta, cooked chicken, pesto sauce, roasted red pepper, sliced ripe olives, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Mix the cooked pasta, chicken, pesto, and bell peppers in a saucepan. Heat over low heat, stirring frequently, until hot. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Garnish with olives and sprinkle a little parmesan cheese on top. ; name: italy in a dish ; ingredients: hamburger, spiral shaped pasta, tomato sauce, tomato paste, onion, oregano, cheese ; preparation:Boil the noodles. Cook the hamburger and onions on the stove until hamburger is cooked. Cook the tomato sauce, tomato paste, and oregeno on the stove until the sauce is boiling a little and take it off fast. Layer the noodles, the hamburger, the sauce and the cheese, leave some cheese to put on top. Find a little bit more oregeno and put it on top with the cheese. Put it in the oven on 350 degrees for about 1 hour. ; name: farfalle and pesto salad ; ingredients: farfalle pasta, new potatoes, green beans, pesto sauce, garlic, best olive oil, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the pasta. Drain, reserving a couple tablespoons of cooking water. Keep the pasta warm. Coordinate the cooking so the potatoes are ready at the same time. They will probably need to boil in a separate pan of water for 15 minutes. Drain. Cut the beans in half and boil them in salted water for two minutes. Drain. While the beans, potatoes and pasta are cooking,. Mix the garlic into the pesto, along with the olive oil and the two tablespoons cooking water. Put the pasta, potatoes and beans into the bowl. Toss and serve. ; name: pasta and beans ; ingredients: pasta, olive oil, garlic, tomatoes, kidney beans, italian seasoning, sugar, fresh spinach, feta cheese, sliced ripe olives ; preparation:Cook pasta according to pkg instructions. Meanwhile, heat oil in lg skillet or dutch oven. Add garlic. Cook and stir 1 minute. Add tomatoes, beans, italian seasoning and sugar. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes. Add spinach. Cook 3 minutes. Put drained pasta on serving plates. Top with tomato mixture. Sprinkle with feta and olives. ; name: pesto chicken and penne noodles ; ingredients: penne pasta, cooked chicken breast, basil pesto, butter, olive oil, salt ; preparation:Cook penne noodles til tender. Do not overcook. Rinse. Melt butter in pan. Pour noodles back in pan with butter and toss with the olive oil. Add pesto sauce. Toss. Add cooked chicken breast chunks. Toss well. Serve with finely grated mozzerella cheese. ; name: chef boy i be illinois ligurian pasta ; ingredients: pasta, french style green beans, potatoes, pesto sauce ; preparation:

name: old school mac n cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, eggs, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, italian cheese blend, american cheese, milk ; preparation:Boil pasta till half cooked. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top. ; name: super creamy and cheesy mac and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, milk, flour, salt and pepper, butter, cheese ; preparation:Cook the macaroni and set aside. In a pot, melt the butter and mix in salt and pepper. Slowly add in the flour, stirring continuously. Gradually add the milk and stir the mixture until smooth. Add the cheese on a low heat and melt into the mixture. Once the mixture is at your desired consistency, mix in the drained macaroni. ; name: buttermilk mac n cheese ; ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, buttermilk, butter, salt, elbow macaroni ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat the eggs. Stir in the cheese, buttermilk, butter and salt. Add the cooked macaroni and mix well. Pour into a greased 13 inches x 9 inch x 2 inch baking dish. Bake uncovered, at 350 degrees, for 45-50 minutes or until a thermoneter reads 160 degrees. ; name: comforting baked macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: cooked macaroni, butter, eggs, salt, pepper, milk, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook the macaroni until done as usual. Do not overcook it. Drain macaroni in strainer. Place macaroni, butter, salt, pepper, milk, mozarella cheese, and 3 cups of cheddar cheese in casserole dish. Mix eggs in a bowl first and then stir into mixture. Cover everything with aluminum foil and cook for 45 minutes at 350 degrees. Uncover and add extra cup of cheddar cheese across the top. Bake uncovered for another 15 minutes. ; name: kfc macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, velveeta cheese, cheddar cheese, whole milk, salt ; preparation:In a pot bring water to a boil with salt to taste, once the water comes to a boil add the macaroni and cook for 12 to 15 minutes. When the noodles are cooked drain but do not rinse. To make the cheese sauce in a pan over low heat combine the velveeta cheese, shredded cheddar and the milk. Cook the cheeses till they are melted and then add the salt. Add the noodles and mix through. Place in a casserole dish and bake at 400 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes. You may want to broil the top to make a brown top. ; name: macaroni and cottage cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, cottage cheese, milk, vegetable oil, salt, egg, garlic clove, cracker crumb ; preparation:Cook the macaroni according to directions. Stir cottage cheese with milk until smooth. In a seperate bowl, beat the egg, then beat the oil into it. Add salt and garlic to the cheese mixture. Now mix this with the cooked and drained macaroni, pour it in a baking dish, sprinkle with crumbs, and bake at 350 till set, about 25 minutes. ; name: four cheese macaroni ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, milk, butter, white pepper, salt, american cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. Return to pot. Add milk, melted butter, pepper, and salt. Stir in cheeses. Transfer to a greased 2-quart casserole. Bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Carefully stir mixture. Sprinkle with crushed crackers. Bake 5 minutes more or until crackers are browned and mixture is just heated through. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. ; name: southern macaroni pie ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, egg, flour, salt, milk, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: delicious vegetable beef soup ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, garlic, dried italian herb seasoning, stewed tomatoes, beef broth, frozen mixed vegetables, conchiglie, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a soup pot or large saucepan, cook the ground beef, onion, and garlic over medium heat, stirring often, for about 8 minutes. Add the dried herb seasoning and continue to cook for 1 minute. Place the tomatoes in a blender and break them into smaller chunks and then add to the pot. Add the water-mixed beef broth or beef cube and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to medium and simmer, partially covered for 15 minutes so the flavors can blend. Add the vegetables and conchiglie. Simmer uncovered over medium heat until they are tender, maybe 10 minutes. Season the soup with salt and pepper and stir in the parsley. ; name: beef bean and tomato soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, onion soup mix, kidney beans, tomatoes, parsley, basil, pasta, water ; preparation:Brown the ground beef in a dutch oven or heavy stock pot, season with salt and pepper. Add the chopped onion and green pepper, and saute for 5 to 10 minutes. Add the kidney beans, tomatoes, onion soup mix, parsley, basil, water. Bring to a boil, add the pasta. Reduce heat and simmer for 10- 20 minutes, until pasta is cooked. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: quick vegetable beef soup ; ingredients: beef stock, red potatoes, diced tomatoes, frozen mixed vegetables, roast, water ; preparation:Place 1 cup beef stock and 1 cup water in sauce pan. Add diced potato and bring to a boil. Cook until potatoes are easily pierced with a fork, about 10 minutes. While the potatoes are boiling, cook the frozen vegetables, according to the package, in the microwave. When the potatoes are tender, reduce heat to medium and add the remaining ingredients except water. Use an additional cup of stock if you desire a stronger flavored broth. Add enough water to cover the meat and veggies with broth. Stir to combine. Allow to simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until heated thoroughly. ; name: beef and vegetable barley soup ; ingredients: chuck steaks, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, oregano, beef bouillon cubes, water, bay leaf, carrots, barley ; preparation:Brown beef in oil in large pot. Stir in onion and garlic. Cook until onion is tender. Add water. Stir in oregano, bouillon and bay leaf. Bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer for an hour. Add barley and veggies. Turn heat to medium. Cook for 30 minutes. ; name: hamburger helper soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, hamburger helper mix for beef pasta, water, dried basil, salt, pepper, diced tomatoes, veg-all, fresh parsley ; preparation:Brown ground beef and onion in dutch oven until beef is no longer pink- drain. Stir in cheese sauce mix from hamburger helper package. Stir in water, basil, salt, pepper& tomatoes, and heat to boiling, stirring constantly. Reduce heat, cover& simmer 10 minutes. Stir in macaroni from the hamburger helper package, add veg-all, cover& simmer until pasta is tender, about 15 minutes. Stir in parsely& serve. ; name: cowboy soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, enchilada sauce, vegetable soup, ranch style beans, whole kernel corn ; preparation:Combine ground beef, onion, and green pepper in large saucepan. Cook till onion and pepper are tender. Drain off fat. Add enchilada sauce, soup, beans, and corn to ground beef and onion mixture. Stir to combine. Simmer for 15 minutes. ; name: vegetable soup meatloaf ; ingredients: white bread, vegetarian vegetable soup, onion, egg, salt, pepper, lean ground beef, tomato sauce ; preparation:In a large bowl, soak bread in soup for 5 mintes. Stir in the onion, egg, salt and pepper. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into an 8 in x 4 in loaf. Line and 11 in x 7 in x 2 in baking dish with foil and grease the foil. Place meatloaf in pan. Top with tomato sauce. Bake uncovered at 350 for 50-60 minutes or until a meat thermometer reads 160. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: ground beef soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, carrots, potatoes, corn, tomato paste, water, beef bouillon, garlic ; preparation:

name: mexican red beans and rice ; ingredients: brown rice, olive oil, onions, chili powder, red kidney beans, salsa, hot water, sour cream ; preparation:Cook rice according to package directions. To prepare the beans, heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onions and saute until tender. Sprinkle on chili powder and cook 1 minute, stirring frequently. Add beans, salsa, and water and cook about 5 minutes. Serve beans over rice, with sour cream on top. ; name: rice and peas beans ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, fresh ginger, long-grain white rice, kidney beans, scotch bonnet pepper, unsweetened coconut milk, water, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, scallions ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat the oil over medium heat. Add the onion and ginger and cook over med. Heat, stirring, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the rice and cook, stirring, until coated with the oil. Stir in the kidney beans and scotch bonnet, then stir in the coconut milk and water. Season with salt and pepper and bring to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat until the rice is tender and the liquid is absorbed, 18 minutes. Remove the rice from the heat and let stand, covered, for 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. Stir in the scallions and season with salt and pepper. Discard the scotch bonnet and serve. ; name: sweet and sour baked beans with a kick ; ingredients: dark red kidney beans, tomato sauce, dried onion, white vinegar, brown sugar, jalapeno pepper, garlic powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Rinse the kidney beans, and set aside to drain. Mix the remaining ingredients in a saucepan, and heat until the sugar has dissolved. Taste, and adjust seasoning if needed. Add beans and pour into an oven proof baking dish. I used a 1 quart, ovenproof glass bowl. Bake, uncovered, for 45 minutes. ; name: un refried beans ; ingredients: dried pinto beans, olive oil, onions, chili powder, cumin, salt, cayenne powder, oregano, water, vegetable bouillon granules ; preparation:In a large soup pot, saute the onions in the olive oil over medium-high heat until the onions are soft. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until the spices are fragrant. Add the beans, oregano, and 1 to 2 cups water. Stir in the bouillon. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and allow to simmer, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed to keep the beans from sticking to the bottom of the pan, until the beans are very soft - approximately 1 hour. Using a potato masher, mash the beans until most of them are mashed, and the texture is mostly smooth. ; name: pinto beans ; ingredients: dried pinto bean, bacon, salt, pepper, garlic powder, water, onion powder, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Clean beans and wash well with water. Put beans in large pot, add water. Bring beans to boil and let boil for 1 hour. Check closely, as beans cook, you will probably need to add more water. Run tap water until very hot before adding to beans. Add bacon pieces and cook another 45 minutes. Add spices and reduce heat to low and cook another 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: low fat homestyle refried beans ; ingredients: onion, canola oil, garlic cloves, ground cumin, salt, cayenne pepper, pinto beans, water, lime juice ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the onion in oil until tender. Stir in the garlic, cumin, salt and cayenne. Cook and stir for 1 minute. Add beans and mash. Add water. Cook and stir until heated through and water is absorbed. It only takes a few minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in lime juice. ; name: country style green beans with red potatoes ; ingredients: ham hock, green beans, onion, red potatoes, seasoning salt, ground black pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Place the ham hock and onion into a 4 quart dutch oven and fill half way full with water. Season water with salt, pepper and garlic powder and bring to a boil, then cover and simmer over low heat until meat falls off the bones, about 2 hours. Remove the bones and skin. Return the meat to the pot. Discard bones and skin. Add the green beans to the dutch oven and simmer for 20 minutes, then add the potatoes. Simmer for 10 to 15 minutes more, or until they can be easily pierced with a fork. ; name: red beans rice with tvp ; ingredients: dried kidney beans, onion, fresh garlic cloves, boiling water, brown rice, textured vegetable protein, chili powder, ground cumin, sea salt ; preparation:

name: cheesy spaghetti squash ; ingredients: spaghetti squash, parmesan cheese, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, pimientos, fresh parsley, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Pierce the spaghetti squash several times with a fork or sharp knife to allow steam to escape. Place in microwave and cook on high 5 minutes. Turn over and continue cooking for for another 5 minutes or just until soft. Remove squash from microwave and allow to stand for 5 minutes. Cut squash in half. Remove and discard seeds. Using a fork, scrape the insides of the squash to form strands. Reserving one squash shell.
