With electric mixer, mix cream cheese, splenda, vanilla extract, egg whites until thoroughly mixed. Add cake flour, salt, and milk. With electric mixer, mix thoroughly. Pour the batter into nonstick cake pan or spring form pan and bake for 1 hour at 325 degrees f. Let cool at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Place in refrigerator and chill for at least 2 hours. ; name: no bake orange cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, cool whip, white sugar, orange-flavored liqueur, orange extract, rum, chocolate wafer pie crust, oreo cookies ; preparation:Mix cream cheese, sugar, orange liquor, orange extract and rum until smooth. Fold in cool whip. Spoon mixture into crust. Sprinkle cookie crumbles on top to taste. Refrigerate overnight. ; name: low fat cherry cheesecake pudding pie ; ingredients: reduced fat graham cracker crust, cherry pie filling, skim milk, cheesecake flavor instant pudding and pie filling, cool whip free ; preparation:Spoon half of the pie filling into crust. In a mixing bowl, combine milk, and pudding mixes. Mix until smooth. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon mixture over pie filling in crust. Refrigerate three hours or until set. Top with remaining pie filling. You can sprinkle with some shaved chocolate for a nice effect. ; name: cherry o creamy cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, bottled lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Whip cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually beat in sweetened condensed milk and blend. Blend in reallemon lemon juice and vanilla extract. Pour into pie crust and chill until firm. Top with chilled cherry pie filling and chill for at least 2 hours. ; name: pineapple cheesecake squares ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, butter, pecans, egg, crushed pineapple in syrup, cream cheese, powdered sugar, eggs ; preparation:Mix first four ingredients of bottom layer well. Press mixture in a well greased 9x13 pan. Top with pineapples. Mix remaining ingredients well and pour over pineapples. Bake at 350 for 35-40 minutes until slightly browned. Cool completely and cut into squares. Serve cold, frozen or warm. ; name: low calorie cheesecake ; ingredients: crushed pineapple with juice, orange juice, sugar, orange zest, unflavored gelatin, eggs, vanilla extract, neufchatel cheese, 9 inch pie shell ; preparation:

name: crab spread or dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, imitation crabmeat, celery, green bell pepper, garlic clove, cracker ; preparation:Microwave cream cheese on high for 30 seconds until softened. Add mayonnaise and whisk until smooth. Add crabmeat, green pepper and celery. Add pressed garlic and mix well. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours so that the flavors will blend together. Serve on crackers. ; name: legal seafoods crab dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, heavy cream, onion, prepared horseradish, old bay seasoning, white cheddar cheese, chives, canned crabmeat ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Combine cream cheese and cream, stirring until smooth. Stir in onion, horseradish, old bay, cheddar and chives. Add crabmeat with liquid and fold in gently. Place in a small baking dish, bake 8-10 minutes or until hot. ; name: crab casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, heavy cream, salt, pepper, sherry wine, lump crabmeat, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a double boiler, make cream sauce by melting the butter. Add the flour and stir. Add the cream and stir constantly until sauce is thick. Add salt, pepper and sherry to the double boiler. Take the double boiler off the heat and fold in the crab gently. Pour into buttered 1 quart casserole. Sprinkle with grated cheese. Bake, uncovered, for about 30 minutes, or until cheese melts, at 400 degrees f. ; name: sauced crab ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, lemon juice, onion powder, hot pepper sauce, seafood cocktail sauce, fresh chives ; preparation:Put first 5 ingredients into small bowl. Beat until well combined. Shape into ball. Cover and chill at least 2 hours. Just before serving, place on serving plate. Pour cocktail sauce over crab ball. Garnish with chives. Add more cocktail sauce as needed. ; name: crab melt ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, butter, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic salt, crabmeat, chives, french bread ; preparation:Melt butter and cheese over low heat. Add lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, and garlic salt. Mix well. Process in blender until smooth. In bowl, fold in crabmeat and chives. Slice bread into half inch slices and spread on crabmeat mixture. Place on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: crab omelet ; ingredients: crabmeat, parmesan cheese, salt, black pepper, eggs, water, butter, heavy whipping cream ; preparation:Mix the flaked crabmeat with the cheese and season with salt and pepper. Lightly beat the eggs in a bowl with the water and salt and pepper. Melt the butter in a small skillet and when the froth subsides, pour in the eggs. Place the crab and cheese on top of the eggs just when the eggs are beginning to set. Pour on the cream while the eggs are still liquid and transfer under a hot broiler for a few minutes until the top is golden brown. Do not fold, but slide on to a hot plate and serve immediately. ; name: crabby appetizer ; ingredients: green onions, crabmeat, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, chili powder, pepper, muffins ; preparation:Mix everything except muffins. Spread about one generous tablespoon of mixture onto muffin halves. Broil for about 5 minutes until cheese gets bubbly. Cut each muffin into 4 pieces. Serve warm. ; name: cream cheese and crab wontons ; ingredients: cream cheese, imitation crabmeat, garlic powder, pepper, onion, wonton wrappers, butter, vegetable oil, sweet and sour sauce ; preparation:

name: fat free cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, fat-free cream cheese, sugar, flour, fat free sour cream, egg whites, vanilla extract, strawberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray a 9 inch pie plate with non stick vegetable spray. Add graham crumbs and shake the plate to coat the entire surface. Set aside. In a separate bowl, combine cream cheese, sugar and flour. Beat on medium speed until thoroughly mixed and creamy. Beat in sour cream, egg whites and vanilla. Pour mixture into graham crust and place in center of preheated oven. Bake 40 minutes. Remove from oven and cool on a rack. Refrigerate at least 3 hours before serving. Top with strawberries if desired. ; name: diet key lime cheesecake ; ingredients: sugar-free lime gelatin, half-and-half, fat free cream cheese, splenda sugar substitute, lime juice concentrate, water, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Heat water in microwave. Stir jello into water and set aside. In a mixing bowl, blend splenda, cream cheese, and heavy cream until completely mixed. Add lime juice and dissolved jello and mix well. Pour into empty pie pan and chill 4 hours. Alternately, pour right into parfait glasses. This is nice with whipped cream. ; name: low calorie and low fat cheesecake crustless ; ingredients: splenda sugar substitute, cake flour, salt, egg whites, nonfat milk, fat free cream cheese, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. With electric mixer, mix cream cheese, splenda, vanilla extract, egg whites until thoroughly mixed. Add cake flour, salt, and milk. With electric mixer, mix thoroughly. Pour the batter into nonstick cake pan or spring form pan and bake for 1 hour at 325 degrees f. Let cool at room temperature for about 20 minutes. Place in refrigerator and chill for at least 2 hours. ; name: lynne s cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, marshmallow creme, eggs, flour, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f degrees. Beat cream cheese, marshmallow creme, eggs, and flour until smooth. Pour into graham cracker pie shell. Bake for 45 minutes or until edges are brown. Turn oven off and let cheesecake cool in oven for 1 hour. Remove to wire rack to cool. Refrigerate for at least 4 hours before serving. ; name: strawberry no bake cheesecake bars ; ingredients: cinnamon graham cracker crumbs, butter, sugar, powdered sugar, cream cheese, strawberry jam, strawberries, cool whip ; preparation:Mix the graham cracker crumbs, melted butter or margarine and sugar together. Press firmly into a 13x9 inch pan and refridg while making the filling. Beat the cream cheese till smooth. Slowly add the powdered sugar. Add the jam and mix well. Stir in the strawberries and then fold in the cool whip. Spoon over the crust, cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours to set up enough to cut cleanly. ; name: apple graham cracker dessert ; ingredients: light apple pie filling, butter, splenda sugar substitute, eggs, vanilla extract, graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt, nonfat milk, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 9x9-inch cake pan with non-stick spray. In a large bowl, cream butter and splenda. Beat in eggs and vanilla. In a separate bowl, mix graham cracker crumbs, baking powder, salt. Add dry ingredients to wet, mix well to combine. Add milk and walnuts, stirring until just combined. Spread half of mixture into prepared cake pan. Spread half of pie filling over top. Spread remaining batter carefully over apples and arrange remaining apple pie filling over top. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes. Place cake pan on a wire rack and let set for at least 10 minutes before removing from pan. ; name: no bake citrus cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, lemon gelatin, boiling water, philadelphia cream cheese, fresh lemon rind, lemon, juice of, cool whip topping ; preparation:Combine graham crumbs with melted butter. Press on bottom of 9 in. Springform pan. Dissolve jelly powder with boiling water in large glass bowl. Make sure jelly powder is completely dissolved before adding cream cheese. Blend in cream cheese with a hand mixer on low speed. Whisk in juice and rind of lemon and whipped topping. Pour over prepared crust. Smooth top. Chill 4 hrs. ; name: splenda creamy cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, splenda granular, cream cheese, fat free cream cheese, lime juice, salt, eggs ; preparation:

name: home style creamed corn casserole ; ingredients: cream-style corn, minute rice, egg, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix well. Pour into greased 9 inch square baking dish. Bake uncovered at 375 degrees for 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as above but cover and cook at high for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. ; name: corn spoon bread ; ingredients: whole milk, fresh corn kernels, cornmeal, butter, fresh thyme leave, kosher salt, black pepper, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisking constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: the one only wild rice chicken casserole ; ingredients: wild rice mix, condensed cream of chicken soup, cooked chicken, celery, onion, water chestnuts, soy sauce, chicken broth, seasoned stuffing mix, butter ; preparation:Cook rice according to package directions. Blend in soup and next 6 ingredients. Mix gently. Add broth and mix. Spread in a 9x13x2 inch dish. Sprinkle with topping. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 1 hour. ; name: best corn casserole ; ingredients: butter, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, sour cream, cheese, egg, corn muffin mix ; preparation:Melt butter or margarine in large pan. Add whole kernel corn, cream style corn, sour cream, grated cheese, egg, and corn muffin mix. Stir until well blended. Place in an oblong baking dish, approximately 8 x 11 inches, that has been sprayed with nonstick vegetable spray. Bake at 350 for 40 minutes. ; name: easy creamy corn casserole ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, wide egg noodles, onion, carrot, velveeta cheese, salt and pepper, saltine crackers, butter, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Grease a 1-quart baking dish. Set oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Transfer to a baking dish. Mix cracker crumbs and parmesan cheese together, then add in the butter and butter. Mix to combine, then sprinkle over top. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes or until heated through. ; name: corn and rice ; ingredients: rice-a-roni, whole kernel corn, sweet creamy butter, salt, pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper ; preparation:Pepare either the rice a roni or the rice as directed by the instructions on the box or bag. Once the rice, or rice a roni, is fully cooked drain the corn and add it to the rice. Add the butter next. Then add the salt, pepper, and paprika. Add red pepper to taste, the more pepper the spicier the dish will be. Stir it all together and then let sit for 5 more minutes on low heat. Serve at once or place in fridge for a later meal. It will keep for about 4 days in the fridge. ; name: 5 star creamed corn ; ingredients: frozen corn, heavy whipping cream, whole milk, salt, sugar, cayenne pepper, butter, flour, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Combine all ingredients, except butter and flour. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes. Blend melted butter with the flour to make a roux. Add roux to the corn and mix well. Remove from heat. Pour into a casserole dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Broil until cheese is nicely browned. ; name: pioneer woman fresh corn and wild rice casserole ; ingredients: cooked wild rice, fresh corn kernels, eggs, heavy cream, kosher salt, cayenne pepper, butter, milk ; preparation:

name: mixed pepper salad ; ingredients: green bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, olive oil, garlic clove, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats. ; name: roasted red bell peppers ; ingredients: red peppers, garlic cloves, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, capers, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Char peppers in broiler or on grill until black and blistered. Seal peppers in a baggie or container to steam for about 15 minutes. Wash peppers, removing char, remove seeds and slice in strips. Add all other ingredients. Refrigerate for 1 hour. ; name: onion and pepper confit ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, red bell peppers, garlic cloves, fresh ground white pepper, kosher salt ; preparation:Warm the olive oil in a large saut pan over high heat. Add the onions, bell peppers, and garlic. Saut until they are soft and golden, about 10 minutes. Cover and reduce the heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, until very soft, about 45 minutes. Drain and season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: lemon broccoli and peppers ; ingredients: broccoli florets, water, butter, olive oil, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, lemon juice, white pepper ; preparation:Place broccoli on bottom of glass casserole dish. Add water, cover, and heat in microwave for 4 minutes on high. Remove broccoli from microwave, add bell peppers, and saut in butter and olive oil in a skillet over medium heat for approximately 2 minutes. Sprinkle on lemon juice and white pepper. Mix thoroughly, and saut for 1 more minute remove from heat. ; name: red pepper bean medley ; ingredients: fresh green beans, sweet red peppers, green onions, lemon juice, olive oil, lemon zest, salt, pepper ; preparation:Steam beans for 5 minutes. Add pepper strips. Steam 5-6 minutes longer or until vegetables are tender-crisp. Combine remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Transfer beans and peppers to a serving dish. Pour dressing over and toss to combine. Serve immediately, or chill to serve as a salad. ; name: broccoli and bell peppers ; ingredients: soy sauce, lemon juice, toasted sesame oil, broccoli florets, red sweet peppers ; preparation:For sauce, in a small bowl stir together soy sauce, lemon juice and sesame oil. Set aside. Place a steamer basket in a 12 inch skillet. Add enough water to come just below bottom of basket and bring to a boil. Place broccoli in steamer basket and reduce heat to medium low. Cover and steam for 4 minutes. Add sweet peppers. Cover and steam for 3 to 4 minutes more or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Transfer vegetables to a serving bowl. Drizzle sauce over vegetables and toss gently to coat. ; name: tri color peppers in garlic onions and tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, green peppers, red bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, garlic cloves, red onion, parsley, cilantro, fresh tomatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large frying pan. Add peppers and onions and cook gently for 2-3 minutes, stirring frequently. Add parsley, cilantro and garlic and cook another 2-3 minutes. Add chopped tomatoes and their juice to the pan, stir and season with salt and pepper. Cover the pan and simmer for about 20 minutes or until the peppers are tender but somewhat crisp. The sauce should be somewhat thick. If too much liquid remains when the peppers are crisp tender, remove the peppers and onions and boil rapidly to reduce the liquid. Check the seasoning again at this point. Add the peppers and onions back into the sauce, if necessary. Serve immediately. The dish may be made ahead of time and rewarmed when served. ; name: green bell pepper rings ; ingredients: green peppers, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:

name: sweet cabbage salad ; ingredients: cabbage, carrot, green bell pepper, red onion, sugar, white wine vinegar, olive oil, dry mustard, celery seed, salt ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in a large bowl. Toss well. Combine sugar and remaining ingredients in a small bowl, stirring with a whisk. Pour vinegar mixture over cabbage mixture, tossing gently to combine. Cover. Chill 1 hour. ; name: rotkrautsalat red cabbage salad ; ingredients: bacon, vegetable oil, sugar, salt, vinegar, pepper, red wine, caraway seed, red cabbage ; preparation:Fry bacon in medium-size fry pan until crisp. Remove and reserve bacon. Add sugar, vinegar, and wine to bacon fat. Stir and cook until sugar is dissolved. Pour this hot mixture over the cabbage. Toss with vegetable oil, salt, pepper, and caraway seeds. Sprinkle crumbled bacon over mixture. Serve at room temperature. ; name: southern cabbage salad with sweet onion and peppers ; ingredients: cabbage, bell peppers, carrot, onion, lemon, juice and zest of, apple cider vinegar, sugar, salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Mix vegetables in a large bowl. Thoroughly combine lemon zest, lemon juice, vinegar, sugar, salt, and pepper. Whisk in oil. Fold into vegetables. Season to taste with salt. Store up to 12 hours in the refrigerator to marry flavors. Return to room temperature before serving. ; name: sweet sour red cabbage salad ; ingredients: bacon, onions, brown sugar, cornstarch, salt, vinegar, water, red cabbage ; preparation:Cook bacon until crips. Crumble. Measure 3 teaspoons of bacon fat into skillet. Stir in remaining ingredients, leaving out cabbage. Cook mixture over medium heat, stirring constantly, until mixture is smooth and clear. Cool to room temperature. Put cabbage into salad bowl. Pour cooled dressing over it. Add crumbled bacon. Chill. ; name: lettuce and egg salad ; ingredients: red leaf lettuce, hard-boiled eggs, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, onions, dill, salt, pepper ; preparation:Clean any yellow leaves from the lettuce. Wash the lettuce very well and cut in pieces. Drain well. Chop the onion and dill. Peel the eggs and cut in medium size pieces, cutting 1 egg in round slices. Mix the lettuce, eggs, onion and dill in a glass bowl. Lay the egg slices on top. Whisk together oil and lemon juice. Drizzle over salad. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: spicy broccoli salad ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red bell pepper, miniature corn cobs, red onion, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, light brown sugar, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Steam broccoli florets for 2 minutes, then rinse quickly in cold water. Drain well. Place broccoli in serving bowl, adding the onions, bell peppers, and miniature corn. In a small bowl, whisk together the vinegar, oil, brown sugar and red pepper flakes. Just before serving toss dressing with vegetables. Season with salt. ; name: mixed pepper salad ; ingredients: green bell peppers, yellow bell peppers, red bell peppers, olive oil, garlic clove, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Place peppers on a broiler pan and place under the broiler, turning occasionally, until the skins become blackened. Remove from the oven and place in a paper bag or cover with foil until cool enough to handle. Using a sharp knife, peel off and dispose of the charred skins. Core and seed the peppers. Cut each pepper into 8-10 long strip. Place in a bowl. In a small bowl stir together the oil and garlic. Seed and stem the pepperocinis, slice into thin rounds and stir into the oil. Pour oil mixture over the peppers, toss, cover and refrigerate until chilled. Refreshing with grilled or broiled meats. ; name: colorful red cabbage salad ; ingredients: red cabbage, orange bell pepper, canola oil, whole cumin seed, chili powder, celery seed, balsamic vinegar, white sugar, mayonnaise, peanuts ; preparation:

name: pomegranate and poppy seed salad ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, red onion, pomegranate seeds, mayonnaise, sugar, milk, white vinegar, poppy seeds ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix the romaine, onion and pomegranate seeds. In a small bowl, mix the remaining ingredients until well blended. Pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: fruited spinach salad with honey mustard dressing ; ingredients: vinegar, honey, oil, poppy seed, dry mustard, fresh spinach, papayas, grapes ; preparation:In a screw top jar combine vinegar, oil, honey, poppy seed, and dry mustard cover. Shake well to mix. Combine spinach, papaya or pears, and grapes. Shake dressing again and pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: poppy seed pasta salad ; ingredients: pasta, cucumber, kiwi, strawberry, cashews, swiss cheese, poppy seed dressing ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package. Allow to cool, or rinse under cold water. Add cucumber, kiwi, strawberries, cashews, and swiss cheese. Stir gently to mix. Mix in dressing. Chill until ready to serve. ; name: not french dressing ; ingredients: onion powder, dry mustard, sugar, salt, paprika, white wine vinegar, olive oil, sunflower oil ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients and vinegar in a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover and shake well until sugar is dissolved. Add oil. Cover and shake well. Let stand at least half an hour before using. Shake well just before pouring onto salad greens. Refrigerate unused portion. ; name: cornbread dressing salad ; ingredients: cornbread mix, mexican cornbread mix, milk, eggs, tomatoes, onion, bell pepper, celery, mayonnaise ; preparation:Mix both packages of the cornbread mixes with the milk and eggs and bake according to package directions. Cool and crumble. Chop the tomatoes, onion, bell pepper and celery. Add the chopped vegetables to the crumbled dressing along with the mayonnaise. Refrigerate. This recipe is better a day old as that gives all the flavors time to blend together better. ; name: homemade italian salad dressing ; ingredients: salad oil, wine vinegar, salt, sugar, dried oregano leaves, dry mustard, paprika, garlic clove ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a jar with a lid. Cover and shake to mix thoroughly. Let stand at least 2 hours to blend seasonings. Shake well before using. Wonderful on italian lettuce salad. ; name: fresh tomato and roasted garlic salad dressing ; ingredients: garlic, olive oil, tomatoes, lemon juice, scallions, vinegar, basil ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Brush the garlic cloves with 1 teaspoon of the oil, reserving the remaining oil. Roast the oiled garlic cloves in a pan until golden and soft, about 10 to 15 minutes. Watch carefully so garlic does not get over-brown or burn. Carefully remove pan from oven and cool. When cool enough to handle, squeeze out the garlic pulp. Combine the pulp with the reserved olive oil and rest of the ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth and use the dressing on any mixed garden salad. Refrigerate leftover. ; name: anne s poppy seed dressing for fruit salad ; ingredients: sugar, dry mustard, salt, cider vinegar, onion juice, canola oil, poppy seeds ; preparation:

name: peach pie ; ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, brown sugar, white sugar, cornstarch, ginger, cinnamon, vanilla, peaches, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400-degrees f. Prepare pastry or use pre-packages pastry and put bottom crust in a 9-inch pie pan. In a large skillet combine sugars, cornstarch, ginger, cinnamon and vanilla. Fold in peaches and simmer for 5 minutes or until filling thickens slightly. Remove from heat and stir in lemon juice. Spoon filling into prepared pie pan. Fit top crust on top of filling. Crimp and seal edges. Cut slits in dough on top of pie. Place pie on baking sheet and cover loosely with foil. Bake for 15 minutes, remove foil and bake for 45 more minutes or until crust is brown and filling is bubbly. ; name: old fashioned fresh peach pie ; ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, sugar, flour, nutmeg, fresh peaches, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Line 9-inch pie plate with pastry. Combine sugar, flour, spice and salt. Add to peaches and mix lightly. Fill pie shell with peach mixture. Dot with butter. Place top crust and crimp edges. Bake for 40-45 minutes or until done. ; name: apple peach pies ; ingredients: apple pie filling, peach slices in syrup, caster sugar, olive oil flavored cooking spray, shortcrust pastry, egg, double cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c combine the apple, peach and 2 tablespoons of sugar in a medium bowl. Spray four 185ml capacity ramekins or ovenproof dishes with olive oil spray to lightly grease. Divide the apple mixture evenly among the prepared ramekins. Use a 9cm-diameter round pastry cutter to cut 4 discs from the pastry. Place a pastry disc on top of each ramekin and gently press the edges to seal. Use a fork to prick the pastry of each pie. Brush the pies with egg and sprinkle over the remaining sugar. Place the pies on a baking tray and bake in oven for 20-25 minutes or until the pastry is golden brown. Serve the pies immediately with cream. ; name: peaches and cream bars ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, cream cheese, sugar, almond extract, peach pie filling, flour, brown sugar, butter, sliced almonds ; preparation:Unroll crescent roll dough into one long rectangle. Press onto bottom and slightly up sides of greased 9x13 baking pan and seal perforations. Bake at 375 for 5 minutes and cool completely. In a mixing bowl, beat together cream cheese, sugar and almond extract until smooth. Spread over the crust and spoon pie filling over cream cheese layer. In bowl, combine flour and brown sugar and cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in almonds and sprinkle over peach filling. Bake at 375 for about 25 minutes or til edges are golden brown. Cool for 1 hour on wire rack and store in refrigerator. ; name: peach dessert ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, margarine, cinnamon, eggs, heavy cream, peach halves in syrup ; preparation:Sift flour, baking powder, salt and 3 tbsp sugar together in a bowl. Cut in margarine with pastry blender until mixture looks like coarse cornmeal. Pat an even layer of mixture on bottom and halfway up sides of 8 inch square baking pan, pressing pastry firmly with your hands until it holds. Arrange peaches over bottom pastry and sprinkle with remaining sugar and cinnamon. Bake for 15 minutes in 400 degree oven. Then pour mixture of beaten eggs and heavy cream over the top. Bake for 30 minutes longer. Serve warm or cold. ; name: creamy peach pie ; ingredients: peach jell-o, boiling water, peach ice cream, water, instant vanilla pudding, non-dairy whipped topping, 8-inch baked pie shell ; preparation:Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Add ice cream and stir until melted. Combine milk and pudding mix in small mixer bowl. Beat at low speed for 2 minutes. Add gelatin mixture. Whip until fluffy. Fold in non-dairy whipped topping. Spoon into pie shell. Chill about 2 hours. Garnish with additional whipped topping and peach slices. ; name: strawberry or peach pie ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, cornstarch, cold water, sugar-free strawberry gelatin, sugar, reduced fat graham cracker crust, reduced-fat whipped topping ; preparation:Set aside four whole berries for garnish. Slice remaining strawberries and set aside. In a large saucepan, combine cornstarch and water until smooth. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 2 minutes or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Stir in gelatin and sugar until dissolved. Stir in sliced strawberries. Pour into the crust. Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours or until firm. Cut reserved strawberries in half. Garnish each serving with whipped topping and a berry half. ; name: southern peach pie ; ingredients: refrigerated pie crusts, sugar, cornstarch, apple pie spice, peaches ; preparation:

name: hot chile cheese corn dip ; ingredients: corn, black olives, green chilies, jalapeno pepper, chopped pimiento, parmesan cheese, monterey jack cheese, mayonnaise, ground cumin ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. In a large mixing bowl combine all ingredients until well combined. Spoon into a 1 quart glass casserole dish. Bake for 28-32 minutes until dip is hot bubbly and slightly browning on the top. Serve warm with chips. ; name: dynamite chili dip ; ingredients: chili, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, chopped tomato, green onion, black olives ; preparation:Place chili in a medium saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and slowly stir in sour cream and cheese. When cheese is melted, stir in tomatoes and onion. Place in a serving dish and garnish with black olive slices, if desired. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: mexican beer and cheese dip ; ingredients: unsalted butter, onion, garlic clove, flour, beer, canned tomato, green chilies, cheddar cheese, cream cheese, black beans ; preparation:Saute onion in butter. Add garlic and cook for 30 seconds. Add flour and blend well. Pour in beer and stir until smooth. Add tomatoes and chilies and cook until mixture thickens. Add both cheeses and cook until bubbly. Remove from heat and stir in beans before serving. ; name: hot mexican bean dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, refried beans, chives, fresh parsley, onion flakes, chili powder, medium cheddar, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:Mix first seven ingredients in a bowl and spread in a 3 quart casserole. Sprinkle with cheddar, then monterey jack. Top with second amount of chili powder. Can chill ahead of time. Bake, uncovered in a 350 oven for 20 minutes or until hot and cheese is melted. ; name: eggs and chiles ole ; ingredients: green chilies, monterey jack cheese, eggs, sour cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Grease a 13x9 pan. Line bottom of the pan with chiles. Slice the cheese and place on top of the chiles to cover evenly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with sour cream until well blended. Add salt and pepper to taste. Pour egg mixture over chiles and cheese. Bake 30-40 minutes or until knife inserted into dish comes out clean. ; name: spicy cajun dip ; ingredients: sun-dried tomato, reduced-fat cream cheese, nonfat plain yogurt, chili sauce, green pepper, green onion, garlic clove, celery seed, ground red pepper ; preparation:In small bowl, pour 1 cup boiling water over tomatoes. Let stand at room temperature 5-10 minutes. Drain and chop tomatoes. Meanwhile, in another small bowl, combine cream cheese, yogurt and chili sauce. Mix well. Add tomatoes and all remaining ingredients. Mix well. Refrigerate till serving time. Just before serving. Stir dip. Serve with cut up fresh veggies or garlic flavored bagel crisps. ; name: chunky cheese dip ; ingredients: ground beef, velveeta cheese, tomatoes and green chilies, worcestershire sauce, chili powder, tabasco sauce ; preparation:In saucepan, brown meat. Drain grease. Add remaining ingredients. Simmer until blended, stirring occasionally. I serve with doritos. ; name: mexican green chile dip ; ingredients: cooked chicken, green chilies, cream of chicken soup, cream cheese, cumin, garlic, pepper, colby-monterey jack cheese ; preparation:

name: spinach ricotta frittata ; ingredients: baby spinach leaves, green onions, button mushrooms, roasted red pepper, fresh basil, butter, eggs, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spray a non-stick 9 or 10 inch omelet pan with cooking spray. Place over medium high heat, add butter. When butter is melted add the prepared vegetables and basil. Cook stirring often just until spinach is wilted. Whisk together the eggs and ricotta cheese. Pour egg mixture over cooked vegetables, cook until almost set, lifting edges frequently to allow uncooked portions to run to bottom of pan. When almost set, reduce heat, cover and allow to cook covered for 1 to 2 minutes. Invert onto a large plate and slip back into pan to finish cooking, top with grated parmesan cheese. Cut in half and serve on warmed plates. ; name: ricotta stuffed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, pepper, egg ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees. Bake potatoes about 1 hour, until tender. Cut thin lengthwise slice from each potato. Scoop out inside, leaving a thin shell. Mash potatoes in a large bowl until no lumps remain. Mix in remaining ingredients and blend well. Increase oven temperature to 400 degrees. Place potato shells on ungreased cookie sheet. Fill shells with potato mixture. Bake uncovered 20 minutes until filling is hot. ; name: spinach stuffed chicken breasts ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, low-fat ricotta cheese, part-skim mozzarella cheese, tarragon, boneless chicken breast halves, reduced fat margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine spinach, cheeses, and seasonings. Lift up skin of each chicken breast and divide mixture evenly among them. Be careful not to tear skins. Smooth skin over stuffing. Tuck skin edges underneath to form a neat package. Brush chicken with melted margarine. Place in 2-quart baking dish. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes. Remove skin before serving. ; name: three cheese spinach lasagna ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, pasta sauce, baby spinach leaves, lasagna sheets ; preparation:Pre hear oven to 180c. Grease lasagne pan. Spread some of tomato sauce on bottom of dish. Lay lasagne sheets on top of sauce. Spread half riccotta cheese on top. Spread a third of the mozzarella and a third of the cheddar cheese. Lay half of the spinach on top of cheeses. Spread some more of the tomato sauce on top and repeat. Finish with lasagne sheets and top with remaining mozzarella and cheddar cheese. Bake in oven for 40 minutes. ; name: spinach and cheese stuffed chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, fresh spinach, sour cream, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, onion, whole wheat bread crumbs, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Prepare chicken breasts by cutting a slit or flap in the largest part of the breast. Mix all filling ingredients and spoon into chicken breast. Place stuffed chicken breasts into a glass 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle with bread crumb mixture and parmesan cheese. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: creamed spinach like boston market ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, salt, half-and-half cream, cream cheese, onions, garlic, frozen chopped spinach, water, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until transparent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended. ; name: easiest creamed spinach ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, cream cheese, garlic, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Thaw and cook spinach til most water is gone. Add cream cheese. Add garlic to taste. Stir over medium heat until cream cheese is melted. Put parmesan over the top. Cover and set off the heat until cheese melts. Serve. ; name: spinach and ricotta pillows ; ingredients: baby spinach, low-fat ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, cracked black pepper, wonton wrappers, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: blackened salmon with broccoli ; ingredients: salmon fillets, cajun seasoning, broccoli, water, olive oil, shallots, kosher salt, golden raisin, lemon ; preparation:Over medium heat heat a skillet. Coat both sides of salmon with seasoning and then place in skillet and cook for 3-5 minutes on each side or until done and blackened. In another skillet cook broccoli and water in a skillet, bring to a boil and simmer until tender. Drain. Wipe out skillet and heat oil over medium heat. Stir in shallots and salt and cook for 3-5 minutes or until softened. Stir in broccoli and raisins. Serve broccoli with salmon and lemon wedges. ; name: balsamic glazed salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, garlic cloves, white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, salt, ground black pepper, fresh oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f line a baking sheet with aluminum foil, and spray with non-stick cooking spray. Coat a small saucepan with non-stick cooking spray. Over medium heat, cook and stir garlic until soft, about 3 minutes. Mix in white wine, honey, balsamic vinegar, mustard, and salt and pepper. Simmer, uncovered, for about 3 minutes, or until slightly thickened. Arrange salmon fillets on foil-lined baking sheet. Brush fillets with balsamic glaze, and sprinkle with oregano. Bake in preheated oven for 10 to 14 minutes, or until flesh flakes easily with a fork. Brush fillets with remaining glaze, and season with salt and pepper. Use a spatula to transfer fillets to serving platter, leaving the skin behind on the foil. ; name: salt roasted salmon ; ingredients: olive oil, salmon fillets, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, lemon ; preparation:Heat the oven to 400 degrees f. Heat 1 t oil in a ovenproof skillet until it just shimmers. Add the salmon skin side down and cook until the skin begins to crisp, about 2-3 minutes. Mound the salt around and over each piece, trying to get it to really make a cohesive crust on each one. Roast in oven for 5 minutes per inch of thickness. Remove the salmon from the oven and let sit for 2 minutes in the crust. Carefully brush away the salt. Transfer to a clean work surface and finish removing salt with a pastry brush. Season with a drizzle of extra-virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, and serve with a little lemon. The salmon will seem a little dry but will not be overcooked. This really brings out the flavor of the salmon. ; name: special salmon supper ; ingredients: salmon fillets, salt, onion, pickling spices, lemon, garlic clove, cucumber, mayonnaise ; preparation:Salt salmon to taste. Arrange onion and lemon slices, spices and garlic in a well-greased casserole. Place salmon skin side up over the seasonings. Cover tightly and bake in a moderate oven, 350 degrees for 1 hour. Chill. Place on a serving platter and remove skin carefully. Garnish with mayonnaise and cucumber slices. Serves 6. ; name: lime salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, dried thyme, salt, ground black pepper, butter, green onions, lime zest, lime ; preparation:Sprinkle the side of salmon fillets without skin with thyme, salt and pepper. In a skillet, melt butter at medium-high heat. Add salmon fillets, skin side up, and cook for about 4 minutes or until the bottom of fillets is lightly golden. Flip the salmon fillets and sprinkle with green onions and lime zest. Keep on cooking for 3 to 6 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve with quarters of lime. ; name: beer salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, garlic salt, brown sugar, butter, red onion, beer ; preparation:Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Using aluminum foil, create an oblong cooking tray to be placed directly on grill. Place salmon fillet in center of tray. Season first with garlic salt, sprinkle with brown sugar, and then cover with pieces of butter. Top with sliced red onions. Pour beer of choice into tray to just below the highest point of the fillet. Cover tray with aluminum foil to envelope fish completely. Place tray on grill, cover with lid, and grill for approximately 8 minutes or until just cooked through. ; name: creamy baked salmon ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, cream, dried basil, salt and pepper, salmon fillets ; preparation:Saut onion and garlic in butter on medium high until onions are translucent. Add tomatoes and cook on high for 5 to 10 minutes untill tomatoes start to break a part. Add cream and simmer on medium low for 5 minutes. Stir basil, salt and pepper in to cream sauce. In an oiled baking dish, pour cream sauce over salmon. Cover and bake for 12 minutes at 350f. Serve over pasta, rice or steamed veggies. ; name: blackened country french salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, french dressing, lemon, garlic, salt, paprika, capers ; preparation:

name: portuguese style roast chicken ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemons, olive oil, garlic cloves, dried oregano, sweet paprika, cayenne pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve. ; name: perfect roast chicken ; ingredients: lemon, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, whole chickens, coarse salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Rinse and dry chicken and sprinkle with salt and pepper inside the cavity as much as you like. Place the lemon and ginger slices and garlic cloves inside the cavity. Place in a shallow roasting pan and rub on some olive oil. Season the outside with more salt and pepper. Roast 15 minutes then decrease heat to 375 degrees. Roast an additional 65 minutes. Do not open the door during this process. Remove from oven and let rest 10 minutes. ; name: pan roasted chicken and veggies ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, black pepper, dried rosemary, boneless skinless chicken thighs, fresh spinach ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until spinach wilts. Toss before serving. ; name: slow roasted garlic lemon chicken ; ingredients: roasting chicken, garlic, lemons, fresh thyme, olive oil, white wine, black pepper ; preparation:Pre-heat the oven to 160c. Put the chicken pieces into a roasting tin and add garlic cloves, lemon chunks and the thyme. Just roughly pull the leaves off the stalks, leaving some intact for strewing over later. Add the oil and using your hands mix everything together, then spread the mixture out, making sure all the chicken pieces are skin side up. Sprinkle over the white wine and grind on some pepper, then cover tightly with foil and put in the oven to cook, at flavour-intensifying low heat, for 2 hours. Remove the foil from the roasting tin, and turn up the oven to 200c and cook the uncovered chicken for another 30-45 minutes, by which time the skin on the meat will have turned golden brown and the lemons will have begun to scorch and caramelise at the edges. Serve straight from the roasting tin to plate. ; name: simple asian lemon chicken ; ingredients: oil, chicken breast, frozen asian-style vegetables, red pepper, lemon jell-o gelatin, cornstarch, chicken broth, italian salad dressing, garlic cloves ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until cooked through. Add peppers and veggies. Cook about 2 minutes. Mix dry jello and cornstarch, in small bowl. Add broth, dressing, and garlic. Stir until jello is dissolved. Add to skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook about 3 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Serve over hot rice. ; name: simple roast veggies ; ingredients: potatoes, red pepper, yellow pepper, mushrooms, onion, zucchini, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, minced garlic cloves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Chop up potatoes. Put in microwave for 2 minutes while chopping rest of veggies. Place all veggies in bowl. Add oil, vinegar and garlic, and toss to coat. Spread out in roasting pan and cook for about an hour. ; name: roasted herbed chicken with lemon ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemon, fresh rosemary, garlic, white wine, butter, red potatoes, fresh green beans, salt and pepper ; preparation:Clean and dry chicken and place in the crockpot. Pour butter over chicken and rub with rosemary. Add salt and pepper. Add to crockpot the garlic cloves, wine, and potatoes. Add green beans. Place lemon wedges on top of the chicken. Cook on high 4 hours, or on low for 8 hours. ; name: mini roast chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast, potato, red onion, tomatoes, lemon juice, lemon zest, olives, garlic cloves, olive oil ; preparation:

name: spicy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic clove, ground cumin, black beans, red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, add the oil, onion, and garlic. Sweat the onions for about 2 minutes. Add the cumin and beans. Stir and add the red pepper flakes. Simmer for about 5 minutes. ; name: simmered black beans ; ingredients: onion, green bell pepper, olive oil, garlic, ground cumin, chili powder, black beans, diced tomato, dried thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Cook and stir onion, green pepper and olive oil in medium skillet over low heat until vegetables are tender, about 5 minutes. Add garlic, cumin and chili powder, cook 1 minute. Add beans, tomatoes and thyme. Stir to combine. Cover and cook over very low heat about 10 minutes. Uncover and cook, stirring until beans are thickened, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: soupy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, scallions, garlic cloves, green chilies, black beans, water, salsa, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salsa and stir until heated through. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: easy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic clove, black beans, onion, sour cream ; preparation:Saute garlic in olive oil over low heat. Add black beans and bring the heat up to medium to begin cooking out liquid. Stir frequently and mash beans as you stir. Cook 10-15 minutes. Top with sour cream and chopped onions. ; name: beans and bacon ; ingredients: bacon, baked beans in tomato sauce, onion, green pepper, brown sugar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, liquid smoke, salsa, mustard ; preparation:Cook bacon until crisp. Drain well. Turn into slow cooker. Add remaining ingredients. Stir. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 7 hours. ; name: black bean burger ; ingredients: black beans, onion, rolled oats, chili powder, cumin, salt, black pepper, egg, liquid ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Combine the beans, onion, oats, chili powder, cumin, salt, pepper, and egg in a food processor. Pulse until chunky, but not pureed. The mixture should be moist, but not sticky. Add a little liquid if needed. Grease a baking sheet. Use your hands, a spoon, or an ice-cream scoop to make patties. Drop these onto the baking sheet. Bake for about 15 minutes, or until the bottoms are nicely colored and lift easily from the baking sheet. Flip and bake for 15 more. You can also broil these burgers, or cook them in a hot cast iron skillet, or on the grill. They cook a lot faster using these other methods, so just be sure to keep an eye on them. ; name: black bean and salsa soup ; ingredients: black beans, beef broth, thick & chunky salsa, cumin, sour cream, green onion ; preparation:In a food processor with a metal blade or a blender container, combine the beans, broth, salsa, and cumin. Process 1 minute, or until smooth. Heat bean mixture in a medium saucepan over medium heat, until thoroughly heated. To serve, ladle soup into 2 individual bowls. Spoon 1 tablespoon of sour cream on top of each. Swirl gently. Sprinkle with green onions. ; name: bacon and black bean smash ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, bacon, onion, garlic cloves, black beans, salt and pepper, ground cumin, hot sauce, sour cream ; preparation:

name: tex mex chicken pot pie ; ingredients: chicken breasts, frozen corn, black beans, cheddar cheese, monterey jack pepper cheese, salsa, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Mix all ingredients together except pie crusts. Line pie plate with first crust, deep dish is best. Add chicken mixture. Top with second pie crust. Cut slits into top crust. Bake for 45-50 minutes, until golden. Serve with sour cream and guacamole. ; name: tex mex cheeseburgers ; ingredients: egg, chunky salsa, mexican seasoning, lean ground beef, monterey jack cheese, fine breadcrumbs ; preparation:In medium sized bowl whisk egg. Add salsa and seasoning. Mix in cheese, meat and bread crumbs. Shape into 4 patties. Grill over medium heat until done- about 15 minutes. ; name: tex mex egg burritos ; ingredients: pork sausage, eggs, green chilies, picante sauce, cheddar cheese, 8-inch flour tortillas ; preparation:Brown sausage in a large skillet, stirring to crumble. Drain and return to skillet. Add eggs and chilies to sausage. Cook, stirring gently, until eggs are thickened, but still moist. Do not stir constantly. Microwave tortillas about 10 seconds each until soft. Spoon egg mixture down centers of warm tortillas. Top each with picante sauce and cheese. Fold opposite sides over filling. Serve immediately. ; name: tex mex pasta bake ; ingredients: penne, ground beef, onion, chili powder, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, salsa, diced green chilies, cheddar cheese, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Cook penne according to directions and drain. Cook ground beef and onion in a large skillet. Drain off fat, then add chili powder, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, salsa and chilies, and cook for about 5 minutes. Toss pasta and sauce together and spoon into a 13x9-in. Baking dish. Top with the cheese and bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes, then serve. ; name: tex mex kraft dinner ; ingredients: kraft macaroni and cheese, butter, low-fat milk, lean hamburger, taco seasoning, salsa ; preparation:Cook kraft dinner according to package directions, including butter and milk. Meanwhile borwn hamburger. Add taco seasoning. Mix hamburger into kraft dinner. Stir in salsa. ; name: tex mex carnitas ; ingredients: pork roast, taco seasoning, water, green chilies, flour tortillas ; preparation:Cook pork roast 3 hours at 325. Cool. Shred meat, discarding any fat. Place shredded meat, taco seasoning, water and green chilies in a large saucepan and simmer over low heat for 2 hours. When ready to serve, steam tortillas to soften. Place a generous portion of shredded pork mixture on each tortilla and fold over. May be served with refried beans, guacamole, shredded lettus, shredded cheese, sour cream, pico de gallo, picante sauce, or any other garnish of your choice. ; name: tex mex taco soup ; ingredients: ground beef, garlic cloves, whole kernel corn, pinto beans, kidney beans, salsa, taco seasoning, ranch dressing mix, water, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a dutch oven or other large pot, over medium-high heat, brown ground beef with garlic until beef is crumbly. Drain well. Add remaining ingredients, except for cheese, and stir. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat and simmer for 45-60 minutes. Serve in bowls, if desired over broken tortilla chips. Top with grated cheese to garnish when serving. ; name: tex mex pot pie ; ingredients: lean ground beef, red beans, salsa, prepared polenta, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: creamy mashed potatoes with chives ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, nonfat milk, salt, light cream cheese with chives and onions ; preparation:Place potatoes in a dutch oven, and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add the milk and salt. Mash the potato mixture with a potato masher to desired consistency. Add the cheese, and stir just until blended. ; name: goat cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, whole milk, onion, butter, soft fresh goat cheese ; preparation:Cook potatoes in large pot of boiling salted water until tender, about 30 minutes. Meanwhile, bring milk, onion and butter to boil in small saucepan over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. Drain potatoes and return to pot. Add hot milk mixture and mash. Add goat cheese and mash until blended. Season to taste with salt and pepper. ; name: seasoned yukon gold wedges ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, olive oil, dry breadcrumbs, paprika, salt, dried oregano, dried thyme, ground cumin, pepper, cayenne pepper ; preparation:In a large bowl, toss potatoes with oil. Combine the remaining ingredients. Sprinkle over potatoes and toss to coat. Arrange potatoes in a single layer pan coated with non-stick cooking spray. Bake, uncovered, at 425 for 40-45 min or until tender, stirring once. ; name: baked sweet savory mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, sweet potatoes in syrup, cream cheese, bacon, sour cream, chicken broth, pepper ; preparation:Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil. Cook 30 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add sweet potatoes and cream cheese. Mush until smooth with potato masher. Stir in bacon, next 3 ingredients, remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Spoon mixture into lightly greased 11x7-inch baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350f for 20 minutes. Garnish with the rest of the bacon. ; name: chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, milk, fresh chives, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes for 10-12 minutes or until fork-tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Mash potatoes, adding cream cheese until it is blended. Stir in milk, chives, and seasonings. Heat on medium heat until just warmed through, then serve at once. ; name: blue cheese and chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, blue cheese, butter, fresh chives, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Cook in boiling water for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain well. Mash with a potato masher or mixer until smooth and stir in remaining ingredients. Return to stove and cook for a few minutes more until very hot. ; name: ranch mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, ranch dressing mix, sour cream, milk, margarine, bacon ; preparation:In 3-quart saucepan, cover potatoes with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer 20 minutes or until potatoes are very tender. Drain. Return potatoes to saucepan. Mash. Stir in remaining ingredients. ; name: mashed yukon gold potatoes with goat cheese and basil ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, soft fresh goat cheese, butter, half-and-half, fresh basil, garlic ; preparation:

name: new york steak with garlic cheese sauce ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, vegetable oil, green onion, red wine, half-and-half cream, boursin cheese, parsley ; preparation:Sear steaks in hot oil, until cooked to your preference. Remove steaks, cover and keep warm. In same pan saute onions for 2 minutes, add wine and cook over high heat until reduced to 1 tbsp. Add half and half cream. Boil until reduced by half. Stir in boursin cheese or garlic cream cheese until thick and hot. Pour sauce over hot steaks, garnish with parsley. ; name: lamb steak ; ingredients: boneless lamb shoulder, onion, dark soy sauce, oyster sauce ; preparation:Trim off the meat of fat. Add dark soy sauce and oyster sauce, mix throughly and marinate for 1 hour or overnight in the refrigate. Heat the oil in a large saucepan, saute the onion till soft. Add the lamb to pan and brown the lamb on all sides, adding a little more oyster sauce, if necessary. Turn heat down to slow and fry till dark brown on all sides, serve with warm rice. ; name: baked country style steak ; ingredients: cube steaks, cream of mushroom soup, kitchen bouquet, flour, water, onion, oil ; preparation:Preheat oven 200 degrees. Flour and brown steaks in a small amount of oil in skillet. Place steaks in 8x12 casserole. Add mushroom soup, water, and onion to meat drippings in skillet in which meat was browned. Simmer together and add kitchen bouquet, pour over steaks and bake covered for 2 hours. ; name: grilled steak ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, crystallized ginger, teriyaki sauce, garlic, onions, brown sugar, black pepper, steak, port wine ; preparation:Place all ingredients except for steak in storage bag and give a shake to mix marinade. Add steak and marinade 6-8 hours or even overnight. Remove steak from marinade. Bring steak to room temperature. Place marinade in a small saucepan add 2 tablespoons port and simmer 5-10 minutes. Grill steak on a medium high heat for 4-6 minutes each side. Let steak sit for 10 minutes before slicing and serve along with the hot sauce. ; name: beef strips ; ingredients: round steak, oil, soy sauce, beef-flavor ramen noodles, frozen vegetables ; preparation:Cook the steak strips in oil in a large skillet for 4 minutes or until it is brown. Add soy sauce and seasoning packet from soup mix. Add the vegetables. Cook for 6 minutes or until the vegetables are tender. Prepare the noodles from the soup mix using directions from package, drain well. Add the noodles to the steak and toss. ; name: flank steak with teriyaki marinade ; ingredients: flank steaks, garlic, fresh lemon juice, soy sauce, honey, olive oil ; preparation:Make inch slits in one side of the steak with a sharp paring knife. Fill slits with garlic and put steak in a shallow dish large enough to hold it. Whisk together remaining ingredients until emulsified. Pour over steak, turning steak to coat well, let marinate, covered, turning occasionally, for 1 hour at room temperature and up to 10 hours, chilled. Let steak come to room temperature and discard garlic. Broil 4 inches from heat, turning once, 10-12 minutes for medium-rare meat and reserve pan juices. Alternatively, remove steak from marinade and grill over hot coals, brushing occasionally with marinade for the same amount of time as the broiler. Transfer to a platter and let stand 10 minutes. Slice thin across the grain and serve with reserved pan juices. ; name: steak paste ; ingredients: steak, anchovies, butter, salt, pepper, cayenne ; preparation:Remove any fat from the steak. Place meat into a double-boiler and cook for 4 hours. Place meat into blender with butter and blend to a paste. Add other ingredients and blend to mix. Place into sterilized jars. Store in refrigerator. ; name: carpetbag steak ; ingredients: new york strip steaks, oysters, teriyaki sauce, olive oil ; preparation:

name: maple splurge ice cream sauce ; ingredients: maple syrup, brown sugar, water, butter, kahlua, heavy whipping cream, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:First, fill a glass with ice water and place close to stove. Combine syrup, brown sugar, water, butter and kahlua in a medium sauce pan and bring to a boil over medium high heat, stirring occasionally. Turn down heat to medium and stir constantly for 6-7 minutes while mixture boils and until it begins to get thick. Place a drop or two of the mixture into the cup of ice water and then pick it up with your fingers. It should be able to be shaped into a soft ball. Remove from heat. Cool slightly, about 5 minutes, and then whisk in the whip cream, vanilla, and pecans until they are well blended. For a thicker sauce use slightly less whipping cream. Pour into a container, a glass jar is best, and refrigerate until serving, preferably overnight. For a more boozy version, add kahlua with the whip cream, vanilla, and pecans. ; name: maple walnut brownies ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, maple flavoring, eggs, flour, baking powder, walnuts ; preparation:In bowl, combine brown sugar, butter and maple flavoring. Beat in the eggs one at a time. Combine flour and baking powder and add to egg mixture. Stir in walnuts. Pour into greased 9 inch square baking pan. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until brownies test done. Cool. ; name: sugared walnuts ; ingredients: walnut halves, sugar, water, cinnamon, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Spread the walnuts out on a large cookie sheet. Bake at 275 for about 15 minutes, stirring frequently. Remove from oven and set aside. Combine the sugar, water, cinnamon and salt in a 3 quart saucepan and cook to 236, soft-ball stage, without stirring. You get much better results. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla and the nuts. Stir gently until the nuts are well coated and mixture has begun to cool down. Turn out onto a greased cookie sheet, separating any pieces that have clumped together. Cool completely. ; name: maple sauce for strawberries ; ingredients: sour cream, pure maple syrup, strawberries, brown sugar ; preparation:In a medium bowl, combine sour cream and maple syrup. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour. Arrange strawberries in eight dessert bowls. Sprinkle brown sugar evenly over them and refrigerate. To serve, pour sour cream mixture over strawberries. ; name: cream cheese walnut drop cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, milk, sugar, vanilla, flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a mixing bowl, beat together butter, cream cheese and milk. Beat in sugar and vanilla. Gradually mix in flour. Stir in walnuts. Drop by tablespoonful 2-inches apart on to ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 10 minutes or until edges begin to slightly brown. ; name: ice cream pancake with honey and walnuts ; ingredients: flour, sugar, honey, walnuts, egg, water, oil, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Chop the walnuts into halves. Heat sugar to caramalize slightly and add honey. In a mixing bowl, mix flour along with egg and oil. Add water and mix to a smooth batter. Make small pancakes and keep aside. Place a scoop of icecream in the pancake and roll. Cut the pancake into two. Serve immediately, garnished with chocolate sauce, caramalize honey and walnuts. ; name: soft serve vanilla ice cream ; ingredients: milk, vanilla instant pudding mix, sugar, cool whip, vanilla flavoring ; preparation:Place milk in electric mixing bowl. Make pudding according to directions on box. Add pudding & sugar to mixer, blend well. Add cool whip and vanilla to mixer, blend well. Pour mixture into 1 gallon ice cream maker. ; name: maple walnut ice cream sauce ; ingredients: maple syrup, brown sugar, butter, water, half-and-half cream, vanilla extract, walnuts ; preparation:

name: melon and green grape salad ; ingredients: cantaloupe, honeydew melon, watermelon, green seedless grape, fresh mint leaves, lime, juice of, honey, red leaf lettuce, mint sprig ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, combine the first 3 ingredients. In a small bowl, mix together the chopped mint leaves, lime juice, and honey. Pour over fruit. Toss to coat. Cover and refrigerate several hours. In a large glass serving bowl, line lettuce leaves along the bottom and sides of bowl. Spoon melon mixture into the center of bowl. Garnish with mint sprigs. ; name: mixed greens with honey lime dressing ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, honey, lime zest, salt and pepper, red onion, mixed greens, plum tomatoes ; preparation:Whisk first 4 ingredients in a small bowl to blend, season dressing with salt and pepper. Transfer 2 tablespoons dressing to another smaller bowl. Mix in onions. Let onion and remaiming dressing stand at least 1 hour and up to 3 hours. Toss onion mixture occasionally. Mix lettuces, tomatoes, and onion mixture in bowl. Toss with dressing, serve. ; name: grapefruit orange medley salad ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, mandarin oranges, grapefruits, green seedless grapes ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated. ; name: fruited spinach salad with honey mustard dressing ; ingredients: vinegar, honey, oil, poppy seed, dry mustard, fresh spinach, papayas, grapes ; preparation:In a screw top jar combine vinegar, oil, honey, poppy seed, and dry mustard cover. Shake well to mix. Combine spinach, papaya or pears, and grapes. Shake dressing again and pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: strawberry melon avocado salad ; ingredients: honey, sherry wine vinegar, of fresh mint, fresh ground pepper, salt, baby spinach, avocado, cantaloupe, strawberries, sesame seeds ; preparation:Whisk honey, vinegar, mint, pepper and salt in a small bowl. Divide spinach among 4 salad plates. Arrange alternating slices of avocado and cantaloupe in a fan on top of the spinach. Top each salad with strawberries, drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Add sesame seeds and stir constantly until golden and fragrant, about 2 minutes. Transfer to a small bowl and let cool. ; name: autumn fruit salad ; ingredients: granny smith apples, red seedless grapes, mandarin orange segments, miniature marshmallows, low-fat vanilla yogurt, nuts, lime, zest of ; preparation:Core and wedge apples. Combine apples, grapes, and mandarin oranges in medium bowl. Add marshmallows, yogurt and lime zest. Mix gently. Sprinkle nuts over top. Cover. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: strawberry asparagus salad ; ingredients: asparagus, strawberries, lemon juice, vegetable oil, honey ; preparation:Toss the asparagus and strawberries together in a bowl. Set aside. In a small bowl, combine the dressing ingredients and mix well. Pour dressing over salad and toss. Chill before serving. ; name: salad with lemonade honey dressing ; ingredients: frozen lemonade concentrate, honey, poppy seed, red seedless grapes, watermelon, nectarines, pears ; preparation:

name: white choc chip cookies ; ingredients: brown sugar, white sugar, butter, egg yolk, vanilla essence, self-raising flour, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 c. Grease or line cookie tray. Mix together sugar and butter. Add egg yolk and vanilla, mix well. Stir in flour and choc chips. Place teaspoonfuls onto tray and bake for 12 minutes. ; name: semi sweet chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, oatmeal, baking soda, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350f. Cream butter, sugars and eggs until smooth. Combine flour, salt and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy. ; name: chocolate chewy cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsifted flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: one of a kind grandma s choc chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla essence, self raising flour, milk chocolate chips, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees celcius. Grease 2 40cm x 30cm baking trays with oil spray. Cream butter until close to white. Add caster and brown sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Gradually add egg and vanilla essence. Beat well. Fold in sifted flour, chocolate chips and salt. Combine. Pinch off tablespoons of mixture and place on greased trays. Bake for 15 minutes or until firm. Cool on wire rack and place in airtight container. ; name: fat free chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, baking soda, salt, karo syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg white until blended. Drop by rounded teaspoon onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack. ; name: cocoa chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: salted butter, dark brown sugar, cocoa, vanilla extract, cake flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Place butter in a microwave safe bowl and microwave on high for 15-30 seconds, or until just melted. Stir in brown sugar, cocoa and vanilla. Mix well. Stir in cake flour. Stir in chocolate chips. Cover with plastic wrap and chill 1 hour, or until firm. Preheat oven to 350f. Break off small pieces of dough and form into balls. Place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until firm but not browned. Cool on baking sheets 5 minutes, then remove to rack to cool completely. ; name: chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, light corn syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: triple choc cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, self raising flour, cocoa, brown sugar, dark chocolate, unsalted butter, eggs, milk chocolate chips, white chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: spicy oven fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, oil, flour, onion powder, garlic powder, paprika, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Put oil in 9x13 pan, swirl around. Scrub potatoes. Cut each lengthwise into 8 wedges. Combine flour and seasonings in a bowl or baggie. Add potato wedges and shake or toss to coat. Arrange skin-side-down in oiled pan. Bake 35-40 minutes. ; name: old bay steak fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, oil, old bay seasoning, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat baking sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine potato wedges with oil, seasoning, and salt. Toss to coat well. Spread potatoes in a single layer on the baking sheet. Bake without turning until tender and browned, about 40-45 minutes. ; name: tasty home fries ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, salt, pepper, paprika, vegetable oil ; preparation:Toss potatoes and onions with the seasonings. Heat oil in nonstick skillet. Add potatoes. Cover and cook on low heat for 15 minutes. Turn potatoes and cook another 15 minutes. ; name: oven baked crispy potato fries ; ingredients: idaho baking potatoes, olive oil, fresh rosemary, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 550 degrees. Halve each potato, then cut each half in 5 slices lengthwise. Place on a baking sheet and drizzle the olive oil over them, work the potatoes around in the oil until evenly coated. Season with the rosemary, salt, pepper and red pepper. Throw the garlic cloves on the sheet with the potatoes. Roast 25 minutes. Make sure to turn them all once at the halfway point or they will end up sticking to the baking sheet. ; name: twice baked french fries ; ingredients: russet potatoes, butter, salt and pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Spread potatoes on lightly greased jelly roll pan and bake at 375 for 15 minutes. Drizzle melted butter over. Sprinkle liberally with salt and pepper, then add other seasonings as desired. Toss together to be sure all of potatoes are coated with butter and seasonings. Return to oven until potatoes are crisp and tender. ; name: zesty oven fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, fresh parmesan cheese, olive oil, sea salt, garlic powder, paprika, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: loaded potato fries ; ingredients: waffle-shaped french fries, steak seasoning, cheddar cheese, green onions, bacon bits ; preparation:Arrange waffle fries in a greased 15 x 10 inch baking pan. Bake at 450 for 20-25 minutes or until lightly browned. Sprinkle with steak seasoning. Toss to coat. Top with cheese, onions, and bacon bits. Bake 2-3 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. ; name: skinny fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, oil, cajun seasoning, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: artichoke and chicken bake ; ingredients: water-packed artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Spray an 11x7 inch baking dish with pam. Salt and pepper the chicken breast halves and place in the dish. In a bowl, combine the artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise and garlic powder. Mix well. Spread artichoke mixture over chicken breasts. Bake, uncovered, 30-35 minutes or until chicken juices run clear. ; name: artichoke parmesan dip ; ingredients: water-packed artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, salt, white pepper, parsley ; preparation:Drain the artichoke hearts. Cut them into halves. Combine mayo, cheese, garlic powder, salt, and pepper in a large bowl until thoroughly mixed together. Add artichoke hearts to this mixture. Transfer to a desired dish or bowl and garnish with parsley if desired. Refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving. Best if served cold on melba toast or crackers. ; name: artichoke garlic parmesan dip ; ingredients: artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, garlic, wheatables crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Drain artichoke hearts and puree them in your food processor. Mix pureed artichoke hearts, one cup of mayonnaise, one cup of parmesan cheese and garlic to taste in an oven safe bowl or small casserole dish. Bake in oven at 350f degrees for 25-35 minutes until light golden brown. Let cool for 10 minutes before serving with wheatables vegetable flavored crackers. ; name: artichoke black olive baked chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, marinated artichoke hearts, sliced ripe olives, chicken broth, fresh tarragon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Place chicken breasts in a 9x13 casserole dish and spread olives and artichoke hearts all over and around the chicken breasts. Pour the chicken broth over all. Sprinkle with tarragon. Bake for 1 hour. ; name: chicken and artichoke bake ; ingredients: artichoke hearts, fresh spinach, shallot, garlic, chicken broth, white wine, chicken thighs, cream of chicken soup, milk, diced green chilis ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Drain and cut the artichokes into smaller pieces and place in a medium size bowl. Add the spinach, garlic and shallots. Mix the chicken broth and wine and pour over spinach and artichokes mixture. Mix well and set aside. Skin the thighs and remove any fat. Place in a 9 inch square baking dish. Mix the chicken soup, milk and green chilies together and set aside. Spread spinach mixture over the chicken. Pour soup mixture over spinach mixture. Cover with a lid or foil. Put it in the oven and bake for 1 hour or until chicken is done and juices are hot and bubbly. ; name: curried chicken and artichoke hearts casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, garlic, artichoke hearts, mayonnaise, cream of chicken soup, lemon juice, curry powder, soft bread cubes, sharp cheddar cheese, butter ; preparation:Heat olive oil and saute garlic and drained artichoke hearts together. Put mixture in a greased 9 x 13 pan. Mix together mayonnaise, soup, lemon juice and curry powder and pour over the chicken and artichoke hearts. Top with bread cubes and cheese then drizzle melted butter over top. Bake at 350 for 25 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: hot artichoke dip vegan ; ingredients: vegan cream cheese, artichoke hearts, vegan mayonnaise, vegan parmesan cheese, garlic clove, smoked paprika ; preparation:Preheat your oven to 350 degrees. Let the cream cheese come to room temperature, and mix all of the ingredients together in a medium sized bowl. Spread the mixture into an oven safe serving dish. Sprinkle the smoked paprika over the top. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes, or until very lightly browned. Serve on crostini or with chips. ; name: parmesan artichoke stuffed chicken breasts ; ingredients: artichoke hearts, parmesan cheese, thyme leaves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper ; preparation:
