Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes ot until browned. ; name: double delicious cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In 13x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars. ; name: raisin coconut treasure cookies ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, flour, baking powder, eagle brand condensed milk, margarine, raisins, coconut, walnuts ; preparation:

name: tortilla beef ; ingredients: garlic, round steaks, salt, pepper, limes, onion, carrot, marjoram, beef broth, tomatoes ; preparation:Spread minced garlic on round steak and sprinkle with salt, pepper and lime juice. Place in the slow cooker and add remaining ingredients. Set cooker on low and cook for 8 hours. Meat should be fork tender and shred easily. Fill tortillas with favorite fillings and meat. ; name: spinach and tortellini soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, chicken broth, dried italian herb seasoning, tortellini, diced tomatoes with juice, fresh spinach, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In oil in a large pot over medium heat, cook onion and garlic about 10 minutes until lightly browned. Add broth and herbs, bring to boil. Stir in tortellini, reduce heat and simmer 10-15 minutes. Stir in tomatoes with juice and simmer 5 more minutes. Add chopped spinach and simmer 3-5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Serve with a sprinkling of cheese on top. ; name: portuguese potato and cilantro soup ; ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, olive oil, potatoes, vegetables, salt, cayenne, cilantro ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the onions and garlic in 3 tablespoons of oil for 5 minutes, until limp, then add the last tablespoon of oil and the potatoes and stir-fry for a minute. Add the stock, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes, until the potatoes are mushy. Remove from heat and puree. Return the soup to the pot, season with salt and cayenne, and stir in the chopped cilantro. You can serve the soup cold--or reheat by slowly bringing it to a simmer. Ladle into soup plates and top with a sprinkling of cilantro or chives. ; name: spinach torttellini soup ; ingredients: onion, garlic, olive oil, reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, sugar, salt, pepper, refrigerated cheese tortellini, diced tomatoes ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute onion, and garlic in oil until tender. Add the broth, water, sugar, salt, and pepper, and bring to a boil. Add tortellini, cook 7-9 minutes or unttil tender, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat, stir in tomatoes, and spinach, and heat through. Just before serving, sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: spinach tortellini soup ; ingredients: tortellini, fresh spinach, chicken stock, garlic cloves, olive oil, white beans, salt, pepper, fresh nutmeg, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In large saucepan heat olive oil and saute garlic. Add chicken stock and bring to a boil. Add pasta and cook until desired tenderness. Add beans and heat. Add spinach. The heat should cook the spinach. Add seasonings. Ladle into bowls and sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: picadillo de carne filipino beef soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, tomatoes, lean ground beef, seasoning salt, beef bouillon, potatoes ; preparation:In a dutch oven or other large pot, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute garlic, onion, and tomato until garlic is crisp and onion is tender. Add beef and salt. Simmer, covered, for 15 minutes. Add bouillon and simmer until meat is done. Add potatoes and simmer until potatoes are tender. Serve hot. ; name: braised beef and tortelloni olive garden copycat ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless beef short rib, garlic clove, tomatoes, fresh mushrooms, marsala wine, flour, italian seasoning, tortellini ; preparation:Heat oil on high heat in a large nonstick pan. Toss short ribs in flour, add to pan, and sear on all sides. Reduce heat to low and add garlic. Cook and stir for about 1 min. Add tomato, mushrooms, marsala wine, and italian seasoning one at a time, allowing about 1-2 min between each for liquid to evaporate. Cover pan and braise for 3 hr or until very tender, checking and stirring every 30 min to make sure liquid has not evaporated away. Increase heat to medium high and heat thoroughly. Serve over tortelloni. ; name: carne asada torta ; ingredients: round steaks, garlic salt, black pepper, oil, parsley, rolls, mayonnaise, water ; preparation:

name: red pepper cheddar dip ; ingredients: sharp white cheddar cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, roasted red pepper, tabasco sauce, bacon, scallion, salt and pepper ; preparation:Blend all ingredients, excepts the bacon and scallions in a food processor until fairly smooth. Saute the bacon until crispy and drain. Reserve some of the bacon to use as a garnish, the stir the rest into the the cheese mixture. Chill for at least 1 hour. Just before serving, garnish with remaining bacon and scallions. Serve with favorite bread sticks, veggies, toasted baguettes, etc. ; name: unstuffed bell pepper skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, crushed tomatoes, green bell peppers, salt, pepper, garlic powder, dried italian seasoning, cooked rice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Brown ground meat and onion. Drain. Season with salt, pepper, garlic and italian seasoning. Add crushed tomatoes and green pepper. Cover and simmer until peppers are tender crisp. Serve over cooked rice. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: chili cheese grits ; ingredients: water, grits, velveeta mexican cheese, butter, eggs, jalapeno peppers, red bell pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 ovenproof dish. Boil the water and add the grits. Stir and lower the heat to simmer and simmer 5 minutes. Turn off heat and add the cheese and butter into the grits and stir. Let the cheese and butter melt then stir in the eggs. Stir in the peppers and the salt. Transfer in the the 9x9 dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: cheese stuffed bread ; ingredients: sourdough bread, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, green pepper, red pepper, salt, parmesan cheese, ground cumin, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Slice top off bread, clean out round. Reserve top and cut scooped out bread into cubes. Mix all ingredients and fill bread cavity. Wrap bread in foil and bake for 1 hour. Meanwhile spread cubes on cookie sheet and crisp on lower rack uncovered about 10 minutes. Remove bread from foil, stir carefully. Surround with toasted cubes to dip. ; name: garlic red pepper dip ; ingredients: bell peppers, instant minced garlic, cream cheese, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut, seed, and dice peppers, and place into pan. Add olive oil and to peppers and stir around thoroughly. Add minced garlic and stir thoroughly. Place in oven and cook for hour and a half. Add cream cheese and stir until thoroughly melted and blended. Transfer into serving dish and serve right away or refrigerate. ; name: eggs with chilies and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, monterey jack cheese, cottage cheese, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, diced green chilies, red bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: jalapeno pepper stuffed cherry peppers ; ingredients: sweet red cherry peppers, cream cheese, green onions, garlic sausage, jalapeno peppers, mayonnaise ; preparation:Cut cherry peppers in half, vertically, leaving stem for presentation. Remove seeds. Drain well on paper towel. In a small bowl combine all remaining ingredients and mix well. Spoon filling into pepper halves. ; name: cheese filled peppers ; ingredients: red bell peppers, coarse salt, ground beef, tabasco sauce, garlic salt, pepper, lemon, breadcrumbs, jarlsberg cheese, butter ; preparation:

name: spicy pork patties ; ingredients: ground pork, curry paste, fresh breadcrumbs, onion, lime juice, fresh cilantro, red chile, soft brown sugar, oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix all ingredients, except the oil, in a large bowl and chill for 30 minutes. Divide the mixture evenly into 12 portions and shape each one into a flat round pattie. Heat the oil over moderate heat for 3-4 minutes on each side, or until cooked through. Remove and drain on a paper towel if you wish. Serve hot with dipping sauce or raita. ; name: slow cooked oriental pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, vegetable oil, garlic clove, soy sauce, chicken broth, brown sugar, chili pepper flakes, cornstarch, cold water ; preparation:In pan, brown chops both sides in oil then transfer to crockpot. Add garlic to drippings in pan, cook and stir about 1 min or until golden brown. Stir in soy sauce, broth, brown sugar, pepper flakes and cook and stir until dissolved. Pour over chops, cover& cook 7-8 hours on low heat. Remove chops. Combine corn starch& cold water until smooth and stir into slow cooker. Return chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Serve over white rice or with a boxed oriental style rice. ; name: ww chili rubbed pork chops ; ingredients: chili powder, brown sugar, ground cumin, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, boneless pork chops, green beans, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat broiler and coat broiler pan with cooking spray. In a small bowl, combine chili powder, sugar, cumin and garlic powder. Add worcestershire sauce and stir until paste forms. Rub paste onto both sides of each pork chop, place on prepared pan and broil 4 minutes on each side until inside is no longer pink. Serve with string beans drizzled with fresh lemon juice. ; name: grilled pork chops with cilantro lime vinaigrette ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, salt, pepper, canola oil, fresh lime juice, garlic clove, red pepper flakes, olive oil, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Whisk together 1st four vinaigrette ingredients, slowly add oil whisking constantly. Add cilantro. Set dressing aside. Season chops with salt and pepper, brush with oil, grill over med-high heat 5-6 minutes, or until done, turning once. Put chops onto serving platter, pour dressing over chops and serve immediately. ; name: spicy pork soup ; ingredients: oriental sesame oil, pork tenderloin, green onions, fresh ginger, low sodium chicken broth, linguine, mung bean sprouts, soy sauce, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Heat sesame oil in heavy large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add pork, sliced green onions and minced ginger and stir-fry 1 minute. Add chicken broth, pasta, bean sprouts and soy sauce. Bring soup to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until pork is cooked through and pasta is just tender, about 3 minutes. Season soup to taste with cayenne pepper and salt. ; name: boneless pork chops with spicy rub ; ingredients: olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, dried oregano, ground cumin, ground black pepper, pork chops, lime ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine olive oil, chili powder, paprika, garlic, salt, oregano, cumin and pepper. Rub the mixture evenly over the pork chops. Cover and refrigerate for 15 minutes. Heat broiler. Broil pork chops for 5-6 minutes on each side, until browned and cooked through. Or you could also bake the chops at 375 degrees for 20-25 minutes or till done. Serve immediately, with 2 wedges of lime for each chop. ; name: simple grilled pork chops ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper, pork rib chops ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately. ; name: pork with spicy greenbeans ; ingredients: green beans, vegetable oil, curry paste, dried shrimp, pork, chicken stock, fish sauce, palm sugar, fresh lime leaves ; preparation:

name: chicken stuffed with bacon and cheese ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cheddar cheese, bacon, diced tomatoes, olive oil ; preparation:Cut a slit in each chicken breast. Stuff with cheese and crumbled bacon. Use a toothpick to secure the pocket closed. Brown stuffed chicken in olive oil in a fry pan until golden brown, then add diced tomatoes and cover, cooking until chicken is thoroughly done. Before serving, remove toothpicks. ; name: spinach and cheese stuffed chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, fresh spinach, sour cream, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, onion, whole wheat bread crumbs, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Prepare chicken breasts by cutting a slit or flap in the largest part of the breast. Mix all filling ingredients and spoon into chicken breast. Place stuffed chicken breasts into a glass 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle with bread crumb mixture and parmesan cheese. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: stuffed chicken ; ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Continue stuffing breasts until all breasts are used. If you have left over stuffing go back and open breasts and continue stuffing until all stuffing is used. Combine soup and sour cream. Spread over chicken breasts. Cover and bake for 45 minutes to an hour until chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: italian herbed grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian dressing, oregano, lemon pepper, garlic powder, mayonnaise ; preparation:Mix mayo and seasonings. One hour before grill time, brush both sides of each breast with about half of mixture & return to refrigerator. Grill for 6-9 minutes each side generously coating each side with mixture. We usually grill 4 minutes, brush & flip then 4 minutes two times each side -- if that makes any sense. Great on ciabatta bread as a sammie, try over rice and even the left overs are great sliced up on a salad. ; name: grilled chicken and cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: cooked chicken, raisins, almonds, celery, mayonnaise, monterey jack cheese, whole wheat bread, butter ; preparation:For the chicken mixture, stir the first five ingredients together. Using half the bread place 1 slice of cheese on each slice of bread. Spread the chicken mixture on evenly and top with cheese. Spread butter on one side of each of the sandwiches, cook with butter side down on medium heat for about three minutes or until light and brown. Spread the other side with remaining butter and cook for three minutes. ; name: my stuffed chicken breasts ; ingredients: fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, dried parsley, dried basil, dried rosemary, butter, whole chicken breasts, boiled ham, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Combine stuffing, butter, parmesan cheese, parsley, basil and rosemary. Butterfly chicken breasts and lie flat on cutting board. Take slice of ham, spoonful of stuffing mixture and slice of cheese. Wrap breast around and place seam-side down in 9 inch glass baking dish. Repeat with other breast and cover dish with foil to prevent burning. Bake for 45 minutes to 1 hour, or until chicken is no longer pink. You can make a sauce with this or serve it alone. ; name: rosemary grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lime peel, lime juice, fresh rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place each chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place in a resealable bag. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic, and salt. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink. ; name: grilled stuffed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, bacon, cream cheese, cheddar cheese, garlic salt, parsley ; preparation:

name: pitcher of frozen margarita s ; ingredients: tequila, triple sec, frozen limeade concentrate, ice, water, lime juice, salt, lime wedge ; preparation:Add first 5 ingredients to a blender and liquify. Add extra water if needed to keep blender moving. Dip rims of glasses in lime juice then salt. Place a lime wedge on glass rim. Serve. ; name: berry margarita dessert ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, water, mixed berries, margarita mix, tequila, orange liqueur, lime wedge, sugar, mint ; preparation:Sprinkle gelatin over cold water in a small saucepan. Allow 5 minutes and then heat gently just until dissolved. Meanwhile puree berries in a blender with margarita mix and orange liqueur. Strain, pressing down on the solids well, and return to blender. Blend in gelatin. Rub the rim of 4 or 6 martini glasses with the wedge of lime. Place sugar on a plate and dip edge of the glasses into the sugar. Divide the berry mixture between the glasses. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate a few hours or until set. Garnish with fresh berries and mint. ; name: designated driver margaritas ; ingredients: lime wedge, coarse salt, ice cube, cold water, frozen limeade concentrate, frozen orange juice concentrate, lime juice, lime slice ; preparation:Run the lime wedge around the rim of 3 glasses to moisten them. Dip the rims into the salt to lightly coat the edges of the glasses. Place the glasses in the freezer to chill. Place the ice, water, limeade, orange juice concentrate and lime juice in the container of a blender. Process until combined and slushy. Pour into the prepared glasses. Garnish each glass with a lime slice, if desired. Serve immediately. ; name: tropical party punch ; ingredients: water, sugar, pineapple juice, frozen orange juice concentrate, frozen lemonade concentrate, almond extract, carbonated lemon-lime beverage ; preparation:In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda. ; name: margarita limeade on the rocks ; ingredients: frozen limeade concentrate, tequila, triple sec, water, ice, lime wedge, salt ; preparation:Rub rim of cocktail glass with lime, rub rim of glass in margarita salt. Combine limeade, tequila, triple sec & water in cocktail shaker. Shake well. Pour in cocktail glass with crushed ice. Serve with lime slice. For extra tang, squeese a small lime wedge over finished drink. ; name: blood orange margaritas ; ingredients: kosher salt, ice, blood orange juice, tequila, triple sec, orange wedge ; preparation:Moisten rim of 2 margarita glasses and dip in kosher salt. Fill a cocktail shaker with crushed ice. Add orange juice, tequila, and triple sec. Shake well and strain into glasses. Garnish with orange wedges, if desired. ; name: margarita soaked cake ; ingredients: instant vanilla pudding, yellow cake mix, eggs, vegetable oil, cold water, margarita mix, butter, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large bundt pan. Combine all of the ingredients for the cake and mix on medium speed for 2 minutes or until smooth. Pour batter into bundt pan. Bake for 35-45 minutes or until knife insterted comes out clean. Invert onto a plate. Combine ingredients for the topping in a saucepan. Boil mixture for about 2 minutes. While still warm, poke holes in the top and sides of the cake with a fork. Pour margarita mixture over cake. ; name: margarita punch ; ingredients: frozen limeade concentrate, frozen lemonade, orange extract, water, 7-up soda, tequila ; preparation:

name: crustless broccoli tuna quiche ; ingredients: frozen broccoli, butter, flour, salt, milk, yellow cheese, lemon juice, tuna ; preparation:Cook broccoli in slightly salted water until tender. Rinse under cold water and drain well. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Melt butter in a medium size pot. Add flour stirring until combined. Slowly add milk and continue stirring until sauce has thickened. At this point, add salt, cheese, lemon juice and mix until well combined. Remove pot from heat and add broccoli and tuna. Mix well, pour into a pyrex or glass baking dish. Bake covered for 35 minutes. Remove cover and continue baking for a further 10-20 minutes until nice and bubbly. ; name: low carb crustless ham broccoli quiche ; ingredients: eggs, heavy cream, cheddar cheese, deli ham, broccoli, green onions, salt & pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a medium sized heavy skillet. Saute green onions until soft and add the shredded ham and stir until slightly browned. In a large bowl, beat the eggs and heavy cream together by hand. Stir in the onions& ham, broccoli, cheese and seasonings. Pour into a buttered deep-dish pie plate. Bake at 375degrees for 45-50 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Start checking it halfway through the cooking time. Let stand 10 minutes and cut into wedges to serve. ; name: ham quiche ; ingredients: cooked ham, red bell pepper, green onion, swiss cheese, all-purpose flour, half-and-half, eggs, pie crusts ; preparation:Mix ham, bell pepper, green onion, cheese and flour. Toss all ingredients lightly. Mix half-and-half gently into eggs. Still gently. Fold ham mixture into egg mixture. Pour this mixture into unbaked pie shell. Bake 10 minutes at 425 degrees, and then lower heat to 325 degrees and bake 20 minutes more or till done. ; name: quick crustless quiche ; ingredients: cheese, bacon, broccoli, onion, eggs, flour, butter, salt, milk ; preparation:If using frozen, thaw and drain thoroughly. Preheat oven to 175c. Layer 1st 4 ingredients in 10 buttered pie plate. Blend remaining ingredients and pour over layers. Bake for 35-40 minutes. ; name: chowder quiche ; ingredients: clam chowder, eggs, swiss cheese, green onions, parsley, pepper, pie crust ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In mixing bowl, combine chowder, eggs, cheese, onions, parsley& pepper. Blend well. Set empty piecrust on baking sheet on extended oven rack. Ladle chowder mixture into crust. Carefully slide rack back into place. Bake 1 hour or till set. Cool 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: lazy day brunch casserole crustless quiche ; ingredients: broccoli, tomatoes, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, milk, flour, eggs, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix milk, flour and eggs well. Add the remaining ingredients and pour into 8 x 8 greased baking dish. Bake for 40-45 minutes. Let sit 10 minutes before serving. ; name: any flavor easy quiche ; ingredients: ready-made pie crust, eggs, nonfat milk, green onion, salt, pepper, ground nutmeg, zucchini, cheese, flour ; preparation:Heat oven to 450 degrees. Line pricked pastry shell with foil and bake 5 minutes. Remove foil and bake 5 additional minutes. Remove from oven and reduce temperature to 325 degrees. In a bowl, stir together eggs, milk, onion, salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Add vegetables or meat and stir. Toss shredded cheese with flour and add to egg mixture, stirring well. Pour into pastry shell and bake for 35 to 40 minutes. You might want to add foil around the edges to prevent over browning. ; name: broccoli salmon quiche ; ingredients: pie crusts, fresh broccoli, salmon, swiss cheese, fresh chives, eggs, whipping cream, red cayenne pepper, dried dill weed ; preparation:

name: yummy stuffed french toast ; ingredients: french bread, milk, egg, sugar, cinnamon, vanilla extract, cream cheese, powdered sugar, syrup ; preparation:Tear or cut bread into bite sized pieces. Mix all remaining ingredients except the cream cheese together and pour over the bread. Stuff randomly with chunks of the cream cheese. Refrigerate overnight and bake at 350 for 45-60 minutes. Dust with powdered sugar and serve with assorted warm syrups. ; name: cinnamon toast delight ; ingredients: bread, butter, cinnamon, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Smear butter over both surfaces of each slice of bread. Add lots of brown sugar to the tops, enough to cover the tops without seeing the butter. Sprinkle the cinnamon over the top of the brown sugar. Let bake for about 5-6 minutes, then turn to broil till the top of the brown sugar is bubbling. Remove from oven and let cool for 1-2 minutes. ; name: brown sugar cinnamon french toast ; ingredients: cinnamon-swirl bread, eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, ground nutmeg ; preparation:In a shallow bowl, beat together eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon and nutmeg. Dip bread slices into egg mixture, coating both sides. In a skillet or on a griddle, melt 1 tablespoon of the butter over medium heat. Add half of the bread slices and cook for 2 to 3 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Repeat with remaining butter and bread slices. Serve warm. If desired, serve with maple syrup. ; name: bacon and cheese toast ; ingredients: egg, milk, baking powder, cheese, bread, bacon ; preparation:Beat egg. Add milk, baking powder and cheese. Mix well and spread on bread slices. Place a strip of bacon on top. Place under broiler and cook until golden brown. ; name: french toast with chocolate and almonds ; ingredients: eggs, milk, vanilla essence, olive oil, butter, sourdough bread, almonds ; preparation:Put eggs, milk & vanilla essence in a large bowl and whisk until combined. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Spread the flaked almonds over a small plate. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate, and top each with another slice. Dip sandwiches into egg mixture, then press into the almonds, to coat. Heat the remaining butter and oil in a pan. Add almond-coated, chocolate-filled sandwiches and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side or until golden. Cut into quarters and serve immediately. ; name: cinnamon cream cheese roll ups ; ingredients: bread, cream cheese, egg yolk, powdered sugar, sugar, cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Flatten bread with a rolling pin. Mix cream cheese, egg yolk, and powdered sugar. Combine sugar and cinnamon. Set aside. Spread 1 t cheese mixture on each slice bread. Roll up. Dip in melted butter, then in cinnamon sugar. Place on ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 350f for 20 minutes, or until golden. ; name: broiled apricot and cheese toast ; ingredients: apricot jam, bread, cream cheese, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Heat broiler with rack 4 inches from the heat source. Spread jam over one side of toasted bread. Top with cheese. Sprinkle cinnamon over the cheese. Broil until cheese is hot and slightly bubbly, about 3 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: cream cheese stuffed cinnamon toast with fruit ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, vanilla extract, cream cheese, cinnamon-swirl bread, fruit, sweet cream ; preparation:

name: appetizing shrimp scampi ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, fresh parsley, salt, pepper, garlic cloves, lemon juice, fresh shrimp ; preparation:Heat butter over low heat. Add olive oil, and next 5 ingredients. Cook about 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Add shrimp and let stand for 30 minutes. Serve on large platter with toothpicks. ; name: scampi shrimp skewers ; ingredients: shrimp, margarine, olive oil, garlic cloves, dry white wine, fresh parsley, lemon peel, ground black pepper, green onions, sweet red pepper ; preparation:If your shrimp is frozen, thaw before using. Peel shrimp leaving tails intact and devein. In a small saucepan using medium-high heat, melt margarine or butter and oil. Add garlic and cook for 2 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in wine, parsley, lemon peel, and ground pepper. Set aside. Using 6-inch long appetizer skewers thread shrimp, green onion, and pepper pieces and brush with garlic mixture. Grill the shrimp and vegetable skewers on a grill rack directly over medium heat for approximately 6 to 8 minutes or until shrimp turns pink. Turn once and brush with garlic mixture halfway through grilling. Serve immediately. ; name: microwave shrimp scampi ; ingredients: butter, dried parsley flakes, lemon juice, garlic clove, salt, jumbo shrimp, paprika, cooked rice ; preparation:In a microwave safe 2-quart casserole, place in butter and cook until melted. Remove and stir in parsley flakes, lemon juice, garlic and salt. Add shrimp. Toss to coat. Cover and microwave on hight for 3 - 5 minutes. Cooking time will vary with the size of the shrimp. When cooked, shrimp will be pink. Serve over hot cooked rice and sprinkle with paprika. ; name: quick shrimp scampi bake ; ingredients: butter, white wine, fresh lemon juice, garlic, fresh parsley, salt, medium raw shrimp ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. In a small saucepan over medium heat, combine the butter, white wine, lemon juice, garlic, and parsley. When the butter melts completely, remove from heat. Arrange shrimp in a shallow baking dish. Pour the butter mixture over the shrimp. Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes or until the shrimp are pink and opaque. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: greek shrimp scampi ; ingredients: olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, red wine, tomatoes, feta cheese, parsley, kalamata olive, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes. ; name: famous red lobster shrimp scampi ; ingredients: medium shrimp, pure olive oil, garlic, white wine, fresh lemon, italian seasoning, butter, parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat cast iron skillet and add olive oil. Add shrimp and cook until tender and no longer translucent, reduce heat. Remove shrimp and set aside. Add garlic and cook 2-3 minutes. Do not allow garlic to brown - it will make it bitter. Add white wine, and lemon juice. Cook until wine is reduced by half. After it is reduced, add italian seasoning. Reduce heat to low, and add butter. If pan is too hot, the butter will separate. Add shrimp back into sauce, add parsley, and season to taste with salt and pepper. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: easy lemon dijon shrimp scampi ; ingredients: large shrimp, fresh garlic, butter, dried chili pepper flakes, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, fresh parsley, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook and stir shrimp, garlic and chili flakes in butter in a large skillet over medium heat, until shrimp are pink and cooked. Blend mustard, lemon juice, parsley, salt and pepper, add to shrimp mixture. Heat thoroughly. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese if desired. Serve with white rice or cooked pasta. Delicious. ; name: broiled shrimp scampi ; ingredients: unsalted butter, lemon juice, fresh parsley, garlic, ground black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, shrimp ; preparation:

name: heavenly raspberry pie ; ingredients: 9-inch pie shell, fresh raspberries, sugar, cold water, cornstarch, lemon juice ; preparation:Prepare pie crust as directed and bake. Set aside. In medium saucepan mix 2 cups raspberries, sugar, cold water, lemon juice and cornstarch. Cook and stir over medium heat until it is thick and bubbles. Then cook it 2 more minutes. Remove from heat and cool slightly. Cover and refrigerate until thoroughly chilled. Gently fold in 2 more cups of raspberries. Spoon into the cooled pie shell. Cover and chill for at least 2 more hours or until firm. Serve with remaining cup of berries and whipped cream. ; name: traditional cherry pie ; ingredients: unsweetened tart red cherries, granulated sugar, quick-cooking tapioca, almond extract, pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie, butter ; preparation:Combine cherries, granulated sugar, tapioca and almond extract in a large mixing bowl, mix well. Let cherry mixture stand 15 minutes. Line a 9-inch pie plate with pastry, fill with cherry mixture. Dot with butter. Adjust top crust, cutting slits for steam to escape. Bake in a preheated 400-degree oven 50 to 55 minutes, or until crust is golden brown and filling is bubbly. ; name: raspberry cream cheese pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, butter, cinnamon, cream cheese, cream, unflavored gelatin, water, fresh raspberries, whipped cream ; preparation:Combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, melted butter, and cinnamon. Press into a 9-inch pie pan, set aside. Beat cream cheese and sugar until smooth. Whip cream and gently fold into cheese mixture. Soak gelatin in water 5 minutes in the top of a double boiler, over hot water. Stir gelatin mixture until completely dissolved. Stir gelatin into cream cheese mixture. Fold in raspberries. Pour into prepared crust. Chill for 2 to 3 hours. Before serving, decorate with whipped cream. ; name: lemon berry pie ; ingredients: raspberries, frozen lemonade, cool whip topping, sweetened condensed milk, yellow food coloring, graham cracker pie crusts ; preparation:Set aside 1 cup berries for garnish. In a large bowl and using a rubber spatula, carefully mix lemonade concentrate and whipped topping. Fold in condensed milk, food coloring and remaining berries. Refrigerate covered up to six hours. Fold mixture into crust. Place reserved berries in a decorative manner on top of filling. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: raspberry topped lemon pie ; ingredients: 9-inch graham cracker crust, frozen raspberries in light syrup, cornstarch, egg yolks, eagle brand condensed milk, realemon juice, yellow food coloring, whipped topping ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 deg. In saucepan, combine raspberries and cornstarch. Cook and stir until thickened. In bowl, beat egg yolk. Stir in sweetened condensed milk, realemon juice and food coloring if desired. Pour over crust. Bake 8 minutes. Spoon raspberry mixture over top. Chill 4 hours. Spread with whipped topping. Garnish as desired. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: fabulous raspberry cream pie ; ingredients: reduced fat graham cracker crust, sugar-free raspberry gelatin, boiling water, raspberry yogurt, fat-free whipped topping ; preparation:In a large bowl dissolve jello completely in boiling water. Stir in yogurt with a wire whisk. Fold in 1 container of whipped topping. Spread in crust. Refrigerate several hours or overnight. I serve the slices with extra container of whipped topping but that can be optional. ; name: cherry pie ; ingredients: cherries, sugar, flour, cinnamon, pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie ; preparation:Mix ingredients for filling. Place in pastry-lined pie pan. Put top crust on. Cut vent slits in top crust, and flute edges. Brush with milk and sprinkle with sugar. Bake at 425f for 25 minutes, reduce heat to 350f and bake for 25-30 minutes more. Add the cherries and toss to coat. This coats them more even than doing it in a bowl and the filling is firmer. ; name: raspberry sour cream pie ; ingredients: pastry for a double-crust 9-inch pie, frozen unsweetened raspberries, sugar, quick-cooking tapioca, lemon juice, cinnamon, sour cream ; preparation:

name: chocolate raisin cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham crackers, raisins, flaked coconut, nuts, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Melt butter in 13x9-inch baking pan in preheated 350f oven. Remove from oven. Sprinkle graham crumbs in butter. Mix well. Press into bottom of pan. Sprinkle with chocolate-covered raisins, coconut and nuts. Press down firmly. Pour sweetened condensed milk over top. Bake for 25-30 minutes or ntil light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: layered coconut bars ; ingredients: margarine, vanilla wafer crumbs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, walnuts, flaked coconut, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Combine butter and crumbs in an 8-inch square baking dish. Press down to form a crust. Sprinkle with chocolate chips, nuts and coconut. Pour milk over all. Bake at 350f for 25 minutes. ; name: chocolate hazelnut truffles ; ingredients: milk chocolate, chocolate hazelnut spread, thickened cream, slivered almonds ; preparation:Place the cream and chocolate in a medium heatproof, microwave-safe bowl. Heat, uncovered, stirring every minute, for 2 minutes or until smooth. Stir in the spread until well combined. Cover with plastic wrap and place in the fridge for 1 hour or until firm enough to roll into balls. Place the slivered almonds in a shallow bowl and line a tray with non-stick baking paper. Scoop out a teaspoonful of the chocolate mixture and use your hands to roll it into a ball. Roll the truffle ball in the almonds until it is completely covered and then place it on the lined tray. Repeat with remaining chocolate mixture. Refrigerate for 45 minutes or until firm and set. ; name: pineapple almond bars ; ingredients: flour, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, butter, almond extract, sliced almonds, pineapple preserves ; preparation:In a processor combine flour, oats, brown sugar. Pulse to blend. Add butter and extract. Pulse until crumbly. Remove half the mixture and stir in almonds. Preheat oven to 350f. Coat a 9-inch square dish with non-stick cooking spray. Add the second half of the mixture to the pan, pressing down. Spread preserves over crust. Sprinkle crumb mixture with almonds on top. Bake 25-30 minutes. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: hazelnut brittle ; ingredients: white sugar, water, light corn syrup, butter, hazelnuts, salt, baking soda, vanilla, chocolate ; preparation:Put a large pot or kettle over a medium heat. Add sugar, water, and corn syrup and bring to a boil. When mixture comes to a boil, add butter. Cook to 260 degrees f on a candy thermometer without stirring and add the sliced hazelnuts. Bring mixture to 300 degrees f and stir in salt, baking soda and vanilla. Pour mixture onto a greased baking sheet and spread out and allow to cool. Break up into pieces and decorate with melted chocolate. ; name: chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: butter, creamy peanut butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: turkish hazelnuts ; ingredients: hazelnuts, egg whites, sugar, salt, butter ; preparation:In a large shallow baking pan, toast hazelnuts in 325 oven, 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Meanwhile, beat egg whites until foamy. Gradually add sugar and salt, beating until stiff. Fold in toasted hazelnuts. Melt butter in same pan. Spread nut mixture on top. Bake 30 to 40 minutes at 325 or until nut are browned and butter is absorbed. Stir nuts thoroughly every 10 minutes during baking. ; name: hazelnut slice bars ; ingredients: butter, golden syrup, sweetened condensed milk, biscuit, slivered almonds, copha, chocolate ; preparation:

name: crab pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, alfredo sauce, crabmeat, green onions, sliced mushrooms, bacon, old bay seasoning, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Place pizza dough on a lightly greased pizza pan and press out to 12 inches. Evenly distribute alfredo sauce. Evenly distribute crab meat. Evenly distribute cheddar and motzarella cheeses. Top with the old bay seasoning, onions, bacon and mushrooms. Bake on the lowest rack for 20-25 minutes. ; name: pub style zucchini appetizers ; ingredients: zucchini, garlic, flour, eggs, seasoned dry bread crumbs, olive oil, soy sauce ; preparation:Slice the zucchini into uniform size pieces suitable for finger food. Wash the slices in cold water and dry. Mix the garlic, oil, and soy sauce. Place the zucchini into the marinade and allow to sit for at least 30 minutes. Remove zucchini from marinade, dredge in the flour, and then dip into the beaten eggs. Roll zucchini in the breadcrumbs, making sure that each piece is fully coated with breadcrumbs. Deep fry until golden brown. Drain on paper towels and serve with your favorite dip. ; name: parmesan crusted zucchini ; ingredients: zucchini, egg, parmesan cheese, garlic and herb seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut zucchini into wedges, like you would steak cut fries. Beat egg with 1 tablespoon water. Mix parmesan cheese with herb seasoning. Dip zucchini into egg, then coat with cheese by pressing slices into mixture. Bake on well greased baking sheet for approximately 15 minutes, or until they reach desired browness. You can also turn them carefully to brown on both sides. I do not turn them when i make them. ; name: crabby appetizer ; ingredients: green onions, crabmeat, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, chili powder, pepper, muffins ; preparation:Mix everything except muffins. Spread about one generous tablespoon of mixture onto muffin halves. Broil for about 5 minutes until cheese gets bubbly. Cut each muffin into 4 pieces. Serve warm. ; name: zucchini chile casserole ; ingredients: zucchini, eggs, milk, monterey jack cheese, salt, baking powder, fresh parsley, green chilies, butter, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Cook zucchini in salted water just until tender, drain and cool. Beat eggs and mix all ingredients except butter and bread crumbs. Add zucchini. Pour into a well buttered 2-quart casserole dish. Top with crumbs and dot with butter. Bake uncovered at 325f for 30 minutes. ; name: fried crab sticks ; ingredients: imitation crab sticks, eggs, milk, panko breadcrumbs, all-purpose flour, vegetable oil ; preparation:Heat vegetable oil to 350 degrees. Unwrap crabsticks and line them on foil or a plate. Whisk together eggs and milk to create egg wash. Dredge crab stick in flour. One at a time. Then dredge the crabstick in egg wash. Now roll the crabstick in the panko breadcrumbs until completely covered. Repeat steps 4 thru 6 for about two or three more crabsticks. Deep fry at 350 degrees for about 2 minutes, turning over once. While these are cooking, prepare the remaining crabsticks. Fry in batches for best results. ; name: crab stuffed eggs ; ingredients: eggs, white crab meat, mayonnaise, relish, tabasco sauce, fresh chives, salt and pepper, mixed salad greens ; preparation:Spoon out the egg yolks and put them into a large bowl, keeping the egg whites on the side. Mash the yolks with a fork and mix well with the crab meat, mayonnaise, relish and tabasco. Adjust seasoning as necessary. Spoon the mixture back into the egg whites, piling it up. Sprinkle the chives over the eggs. Arrange salad leaves on a plate and place the eggs on top. Chill for about 1 hour until ready to serve. ; name: zucchini crab cakes from wynn ; ingredients: egg, mayonnaise, italian seasoning, old bay seasoning, onion, zucchini, breadcrumbs ; preparation:

name: hot chocolate pudding ; ingredients: granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, all-purpose flour, salt, milk, vanilla ; preparation:In heavy saucepan, mix sugar, cocoa powder, flour and salt. Gradually whisk in milk until smooth. Cook, whisking constantly, over medium-high heat for about 5 minutes or until boiling and thickened. Remove from heat. Whisk in vanilla. Divide among custard cups or dessert dishes. Let cool to lukewarm or serve chilled. ; name: oma s chocolate pudding ; ingredients: milk, eggs, sugar, cocoa, custard powder ; preparation:Scald the milk. In a bowl, beat the eggs. Add the sugar, the cocoa and the custard powder. When milk is scalded, add one cup of it to the egg mixture slowly. Then add the egg mixture back into the scalded milk slowly. Cook until boiling. Stir constantly. ; name: pudding au chomeur ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, light brown sugar, boiling water, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the milk. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: old fashioned chocolate pudding ; ingredients: white sugar, cornstarch, cocoa, milk, margarine, vanilla ; preparation:In a sauce pan combine sugar, cornstarch and cocoa. Slowly add milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat and continue. Stirring until thick. Remove from heat and add margarine and vanilla. ; name: bread chocolate pudding ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the bread and chocolate chips in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the bread. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: easy apple pudding ; ingredients: apples, self raising flour, cinnamon, butter, sugar, egg ; preparation:Peel, core and slice apples into bite-size pieces. Wash and place them in a saucepan. Combine the dry ingredients with the egg and sprinkle the mixture on top of the apples. Melt butter and pour over the topping. Cover and heat the pan over medium heat for 15-20 minutes. Reduce heat and cook for 15 minutes. This yummy pudding can be served hot or cold. ; name: chocolate rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked rice, milk, sugar, cocoa, salt, vanilla, butter ; preparation:Place cooked rice and milk in top of double boiler. Mix in sugar, cocoa and salt. Cook over boiling water 45 mins, stirring occasionally. It should be creamy. Add vanilla and butter before serving. ; name: chocolate orange pudding with cocoa sauce ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, self rising flour, vanilla, orange, zest of, orange juice, cocoa powder, water ; preparation:

name: cow pattie cookies ; ingredients: white sugar, butter, milk, cocoa, salt, vanilla, oatmeal, coconut ; preparation:Boil the first five ingredients for 5 minutes. Then add the last three ingredients. Stir. Remove from heat. While hot, drop by spoonful onto waxed paper. ; name: snickerdoodle bars ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, cinnamon, kosher salt, brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, granulated sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease a 9x13 inch pan. Mix together first 4 ingredients in a small bowl. In a large mixing bowl, beat brown sugar and butter til fluffy. Add eggs and beat til well blended then beat in vanilla. Stir in flour mixture til well combined. Spead mixture in pan. Combine granulated sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle over the dough. Bake for 20-23 minutes. Do not overcook. The center surface of the bars should stay very slightly depressed when done. ; name: simple whipped shortbread ; ingredients: butter, superfine sugar, salt, vanilla, almond extract, all-purpose flour, cornstarch ; preparation:Line baking sheet with parchment paper. Preheat oven to 275 degrees fahrenheit. In a large bowl, whip butter, sugar and salt untill fluffy. Add vanilla and almond extracts. Stir in flour and cornstarch a bit at a time to incorporate. Form into two thick ropes, rolling on wax paper. Refrigerate 30 minutes. They will be firm and easy to slice into coins. Bake slices until they just begin to turn golden on the bottom. I added chocolate chips to half, and they were nice too. ; name: chocolate milk mix no bake cookies ; ingredients: white sugar, salt, butter, milk, peanut butter, rolled oats, vanilla extract, powdered chocolate milk mix ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, over medium heat, combine the sugar, salt, butter and milk. Bring to a boil, then boil for 1 full minute. Remove from heat and stir in the peanut butter, oats, vanilla and chocolate milk mix. Drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Let stand until completely cool. ; name: west virginia skillet cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, dates, vanilla, rice krispies, pecans, shredded coconut ; preparation:In a large saucepan over low heat melt butter. Add sugar, eggs and dates. Stir constantly until sugar is dissolved and mixture is thick. Remove from heat, stir in vanilla. Add rice krispies and nuts. Shape into small balls and roll in coconut. Cool. ; name: brown sugar oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: oatmeal, whole wheat flour, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, dark brown sugar, milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin cups or use paper liners. Mix oats, flours, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and brown sugar in another bowl. When smooth, whisk in milk, melted butter and vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients and fold in just until dry ingredients are moistened. Scoop into mufifn cups. Bake 15 to 25 minutes or until springy to the touch in the center. ; name: chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, light corn syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: fiddle diddles ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, milk, cocoa, quick-cooking rolled oats, coconut, walnuts, salt, vanilla ; preparation:

name: gingernut biscuits ; ingredients: butter, sugar, golden syrup, flour, ground ginger, baking soda ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream the butter and the sugar. Add the golden syrup and the dry ingredients. Mix everything together and roll into little balls. Put onto a greased baking tray, pressing the balls down very slightly with a fork. Bake at 350f and 180c for 15 minutes. Cool on a wire rack and keep in an airtight container once cold. ; name: easy gingersnap cookies ; ingredients: molasses, butter, flour, ginger, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Pretheat oven to 425. Grease a baking sheet. Heat molasses in saucepan, until it boils. Put the butter into large mixing bowl, combine hot molasses. Sift together salt, baking soda and flour. Blend in ginger. Blend mixture well. Let mixture chill in refrigerator, just until cold. Take out, roll batter very thin. Cut with cookie cutter. Using the spatula, put on baking sheet. Bake for approximately 5 minutes, or until golden. ; name: favorite gingersnaps ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, molasses, egg, plain flour, baking soda, cinnamon, clove, ginger, salt ; preparation:Cream shortening and sugar. Add molasses and egg, beat well. Add sifted dry ingredients and mix. Roll into marble size balls and dip in sugar. Place 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes. ; name: eggless autumn spice cookies ; ingredients: flour, salt, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, ground ginger, baking soda, dark brown sugar, white sugar, sugar, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix flour, baking soda, ginger, cloves, cinnamon, and salt. Set aside. Cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Add maple syrup, blend. Slowly add the dry ingredients, mix well. Drop a tablespoon at a time in the reserved sugar, coat and roll in to a ball. Place on parchment lined cookiesheet at least an inch apart. Bake for 12-14 minutes or until lightly golden brown. Cool on a wire rack. Store in a sealed bag. ; name: gluten free gingerbread cookies ; ingredients: eggs, unsalted butter, fine sea salt, molasses, brown sugar, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, coconut flour ; preparation:With a mixer, blend together the eggs, butter, salt, molasses, sugar, and spices. Stir in the coconut flour and mix thoroughly. Batter will thicken slightly as the flour absorbs moisture. Drop batter by scant teaspoonsfuls onto parchment paper or silpat lined cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes. Watching carefully, as these cookies can easily burn. Remove from cookie sheet to a rack to cool completely and package in airtight container, separating each layer with parchment or wax paper. ; name: goldy bear s honey gingersnaps ; ingredients: honey, butter, sugar, egg, flour, baking soda, salt, ground ginger, cinnamon, ground cloves ; preparation:Set oven temp to 375f. Cream honey, butter, sugar and egg. Sift together and the flour, soda, salt, and spices. Chill one hour. Roll level tablespoons of dough into balls and place 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheet. Bake 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: gingerbread men dough ; ingredients: flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, allspice, ginger, butter, brown sugar, egg ; preparation:Sift flour, soda, spices and salt. In a separate bowl, beat butter and brown sugar until creamy. Add egg and beat well. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture, mixing well. Chill. Roll out on a floured board, and cut with gingerbread men cookie cutter. Decorate with raisins, candied fruit or small candies. Bake on a lightly greased cookie sheet at 325f, until browned. Decorate with icing after cooled. ; name: my favourite gingerbread lebkuchen ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, treacle, eggs, plain flour, self raising flour, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, bicarbonate of soda ; preparation:

name: easy creamy corn casserole ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, wide egg noodles, onion, carrot, velveeta cheese, salt and pepper, saltine crackers, butter, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Grease a 1-quart baking dish. Set oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Transfer to a baking dish. Mix cracker crumbs and parmesan cheese together, then add in the butter and butter. Mix to combine, then sprinkle over top. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes or until heated through. ; name: home style creamed corn casserole ; ingredients: cream-style corn, minute rice, egg, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix well. Pour into greased 9 inch square baking dish. Bake uncovered at 375 degrees for 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as above but cover and cook at high for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. ; name: best corn casserole ; ingredients: butter, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, sour cream, cheese, egg, corn muffin mix ; preparation:Melt butter or margarine in large pan. Add whole kernel corn, cream style corn, sour cream, grated cheese, egg, and corn muffin mix. Stir until well blended. Place in an oblong baking dish, approximately 8 x 11 inches, that has been sprayed with nonstick vegetable spray. Bake at 350 for 40 minutes. ; name: corn sausage casserole ; ingredients: sausage, corn, milk, egg, saltine crackers, tater tots, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown the sausage & drain. To the sausage, stir in the corn. Crumble the saltines by hand and add them. Whisk the egg with milk and stir into the sausage mixture. Add salt & pepper to taste. Pour into a baking dish & top with tater tots. Bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes, until the tater tots are nice & golden brown. ; name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: corn spoon bread ; ingredients: whole milk, fresh corn kernels, cornmeal, butter, fresh thyme leave, kosher salt, black pepper, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisking constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: chicken fried corn on the cob ; ingredients: milk, egg, flour, seasoning salt, pepper, corn, oil ; preparation:Combine milk and egg in shallow dish and mix well. Combine flour, seasoned salt and pepper in shallow dish and mix well. Dip each ear of corn into milk and egg mixture, then roll in seasoned flour. Knock off excess flour. In a large skillet, heat oil to 350 degrees. Add corn and fry for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. ; name: corn casserole from food network ; ingredients: fresh corn kernels, salt and black pepper, ground nutmeg, vegetable oil, onions, eggs, milk, aged white cheddar cheese, oil ; preparation:

name: catalan style cauliflower ; ingredients: boiling potato, cauliflower florets, extra virgin olive oil, white wine vinegar, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Cut potatoes the same size as the florets. Add to a large sauce pan, cover with water and salt lightly. Bring to a boil and cook until easily pierced with a skewer, about 20 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving plate. Mix oil, vinegar, salt and pepper, pour over potatoes and cauliflower, breaking them up a bit as you do. Serve immediately. ; name: vegetables supreme ; ingredients: cauliflower, fresh broccoli, condensed cream of mushroom soup, parmesan cheese, french-fried onions ; preparation:If using fresh vegetables, break into florets. Steam vegetables until almost done. Put into a 2 quart buttered baking dish. Cover with soup, parmesan cheese and onions. Bake, covered at 350 degrees for 15 minutes. Remove cover and bake for an additional 15 minutes. If microwaving, follow above directions, using a 2 quart glass baking dish. Microwave on high for 4-5 minutes, or until heated through. ; name: veggie stir fry ; ingredients: broccoli florets, cauliflower florets, baby carrots, bamboo shoot, water chestnut, scallion, teriyaki marinade, garlic, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil, garlic, and scallions in saut pan for about 1 minute. Add broccoli, cauliflower, and carrots and saut on medium heat adding cup of water can help steam the vegetables. Cover pan for about 2 minutes. Add bamboo shoots, water chestnuts and 2 cups teriyaki marinade. Cover for 1 to 2 minutes. Then uncover and saut until done ideally 1 more minute to keep veggies crisp. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: roasted florets ; ingredients: cauliflower, extra virgin olive oil, salt, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh ground pepper, lemon wedge ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Place florets in a large bowl with oil, salt, pepper & pepper flakes and toss to coat. Spread out on a baking sheet. Roast the vegetables, stirring once, until tender-crisp and browned in spots, 15 to 25 minutes. Serve hot or warm with lemon wedges, if desired. Enjoy. ; name: cauliflower with scallions ; ingredients: cauliflower florets, butter, scallions, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook cauliflower until tender, 3-5 minutes. Drain and transfer to a serving dish. In a small skillet, melt butter over medium low heat. Add scallions and cook 2 minutes. Pour over cauliflower and toss. Season with salt and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: sauteed broccoli cauliflower and mushrooms ; ingredients: broccoli, cauliflower, mushrooms, garlic, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix cut-up broccoli and cauliflower, sliced mushrooms and minced garlic. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Cover and let stand an hour, if possible. Heat oil in a large saute or fry pan until very hot. Add vegetables all at once, spreading in an even layer. Do not stir until bottom of layer begins to brown. Flip and stir to get unbrowned pieces to bottom. Let cook until beginning to brown. The trick here is to keep heat high and brown pieces without overcooking or burning them. If pieces are browned, but not soft enough for your taste, turn off heat and cover pan for a few minutes. ; name: creamy cauliflower pea medley ; ingredients: water, frozen cauliflower, frozen green peas, cucumber, ranch salad dressing, nonfat sour cream, dried dill weed ; preparation:Combine the first 3 ingredients in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover and cook 5 minutes. Drain well. Combine the cauliflower mixture and the remaining ingredients in a bowl, and toss well. Serve warm or chilled. ; name: steamed vegetable medley ; ingredients: cauliflower florets, carrot, red onion, fresh mushrooms, margarine, lemon juice, dried basil, dried marjoram ; preparation:

name: banana honey and walnut ice cream ; ingredients: milk, honey, egg yolks, whipping cream, bananas, walnuts ; preparation:Combine milk and honey in medium saucepan. Bring almost to simmer, stirring occasionally. Beat yolks until pale yellow. Gradually beat in hot milk. Set bowl into a larger bowl filled with ice. Cool custard completely, stirring occasionally. Fold in whipped cream and bananas. Process according to ice cream makers manufacturers instructions, until half set. Add walnuts and process until set. Let ripen in freezer several hours before serving. ; name: ice cream pancake with honey and walnuts ; ingredients: flour, sugar, honey, walnuts, egg, water, oil, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Chop the walnuts into halves. Heat sugar to caramalize slightly and add honey. In a mixing bowl, mix flour along with egg and oil. Add water and mix to a smooth batter. Make small pancakes and keep aside. Place a scoop of icecream in the pancake and roll. Cut the pancake into two. Serve immediately, garnished with chocolate sauce, caramalize honey and walnuts. ; name: strawberry cheese cake ice cream ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, fresh lemon juice, sugar, salt, heavy cream, eggs, vanilla, strawberry ; preparation:Bring milk just to a boil in a heavy saucepan. Whisk together eggs, sugar, and salt in a bowl, then add hot milk in a slow stream, whisking. Pour custard back into saucepan and cook over moderately low heat, stirring with a wooden spoon, approx 2 to 3 minutes, the custard will coat the back of the spoon. Immediately pour custard through a fine-mesh sieve into a clean bowl. On very low speed, blend in cream cheese until thoroughly incorporated. Stir in cream and vanilla. Place plastic wrap directly onto surface of custard mixture and refrigerate for at least 4 hours or over night. Freeze completely cooled custard in ice cream maker. When custard is nearly done, add sliced strawberries. Complete freezing process and transfer to an airtight container. Place in the freezer to cure for about two hours. Allow to stand at room temperature 5-10 minutes before serving. ; name: frosted creams ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, eggs, molasses, sour milk, baking soda, salt, flour, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream shortening and sugar well. Add beaten eggs and molasses, mixing well. Dissolve soda in sour milk and add to creamed mixture. Mix together flour, salt and cinnamon, then add to creamed mixture. Bake at 350 in greased jelly roll pan for 20-25 minutes. Cool and frost with thin powdered sugar butter icing. ; name: deep fried ice cream ; ingredients: ice cream, eggs, corn flakes, cinnamon, honey, whipped cream, oil ; preparation:Form ice cream into balls about the size of a baseball. You will need to put each one in the freezer as you make them. Roll each in corn flakes then roll in eggs, then once more in flakes to completely coat. Immediately put back in freezer to harden. Heat enough oil to cover the ice cream as it cooks. When oil is hot dip ice cream in for 15 seconds or just till lightly browned. Drain on paper towel and sprinkle with cinnamon, put a dollop of cream on top, and drizzle with honey. ; name: hershey s homemade chocolate ice cream ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, condensed milk, chocolate milk, vanilla, semisweet chocolate ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add sugar and mix well. Add condensed milk, chocolate milk, melted chocolate, and vanilla one ingredient at a time, stirring well after each addition. Mix until smooth. Pour directly into ice cream mixer or machine. For best results let ice cream freeze over night. ; name: honey puff ; ingredients: cream cheese, flour, milk, eggs, honey, vanilla, salt, baking powder, butter, powdered sugar ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, flour, milk, eggs, honey, vanilla, salt, and baking powder in a blender and process on high for 3-4 minutes or until well blended. Heat the butter in a 10-inch baking pan at 375 degrees until melted. Swirl to coat pan. Pour the cream cheese mixture into the prepared pan. Bake at 375 degrees for 25-30 minutes or until a knife inserted in the middle comes out clean. Sprinkle baked puff with powdered sugar. ; name: honey ginger ice cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, whole milk, brown sugar, honey, gingerroot, egg yolks ; preparation:

name: new mexican hot chocolate ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, water, cinnamon, nutmeg, milk, pure vanilla extract, whipped cream, cinnamon sticks ; preparation:Whisk together sugar, cocoa, water, cinnamon, and nutmeg in a saucepan over medium heat. Add milk and cook, stirring, until hot. Add vanilla and stir. Pour chocolate into serving cups and top with whipped cream. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and nutmeg and serve with a cinnamon stick. ; name: country living hot chocolate mix ; ingredients: unsweetened cocoa, semisweet chocolate, sugar, cinnamon, pure vanilla extract, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, milk ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is incorporated and mixture is warmed through. Serve immediately. ; name: spanish hot chocolate ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, milk, sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:If your chocolate is in a bar form, chop or grate. Solid bars do not melt well. Put chocolate, milk and sugar in a heavy saucepan over low heat. Whisk slowly until the chocolate melts and sugar dissolves. When it is smooth and steamy, put into mugs and top with a little cinnamon. ; name: french style hot chocolate ; ingredients: chocolate pieces, milk, half-and-half, sugar, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, ground allspice, vanilla, almond extract, heavy cream ; preparation:Melt chocolate in 1 cup of milk, over low heat, stirring constantly. Gradually add remaining milk and half and half, followed by remaining ingredients, except vanilla and almond extract. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until completely heated. Stir in vanilla and almond extract. Serve with whipped cream and sprinkle with nutmeg if desired. ; name: guiltless hot chocolate ; ingredients: dutch-processed cocoa powder, granulated sugar, hot water, salt, fat-free half-and-half, vanilla extract, almond extract ; preparation:Combine cocoa powder, sugar, salt, and hot water in a medium saucepan. Stirring frequently, cook over medium heat until mixture boils. Stir in the half and half and heat through, but do not boil. Remove from heat and add vanilla and almond extracts. Blend well. ; name: hot chocolate with pink peppermint whipped cream ; ingredients: heavy cream, peppermint candies, powdered sugar, peppermint candy, whole milk, salt, semisweet chocolate, creme de cacao, instant coffee granules, vanilla extract ; preparation:This recipe can also be made with white chocolate. Simply substitute white chocolate and leave out the coffee. Beat the cream, pulverized peppermints and sugar untill stiff peaks form. Pipe or spoon onto a parchment paper lined baking sheet, sprinkle with the crushed peppermints, and freeze until firm, about 20 minutes. Heat the milk and salt for the hot chocolate in a saucepan over medium heat until steam begins to rise. Whisk in the remaining ingredients until smooth. Ladle into mugs and top with a rosette of frozen whipped cream. Doubling the whipped cream will give you quite a few rosettes to keep in the freezer until needed. Store them in an airtight container and try to use them within 2 or 3 weeks. ; name: fiesta hot chocolate ; ingredients: cocoa, flour, dark brown sugar, milk, cloves, cinnamon stick, powdered sugar, vanilla, whipped cream, cinnamon sticks ; preparation:Mix cocoa and flour in 2-quart saucepan. Stir in brown sugar, milk, cloves, and 1 stick cinnamon. Heat just to boiling over medium heat, stirring constantly. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered for 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Remove cloves and cinnamon. Stir in powdered sugar and vanilla. Beat with molinillo, wire whisk or hand beater until foamy. Pour into 4 cups or mugs. Serve with whipped cream and cinnamon sticks. ; name: aztec hot chocolate ; ingredients: skim milk, sugar, honey, ground ginger, ground cloves, ground red pepper, unsweetened cocoa, vanilla extract, whipped cream ; preparation:

name: turkey chile casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, diced green chilies, onion, cream of chicken soup, corn tortillas, butter, sharp cheddar cheese, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine turkey meat, chilies, onion, and soup. If desired, spread tortillas with butter. Cut each tortilla in half and arrange 6 halves over bottom of a 13- x 9-inch baking dish. Spread a third of the turkey mixture over tortillas, top with a third of the cheese. Reapeat layers of tortillas, turkey, and cheese two more times. Carefully pour the chicken broth over all. Cover and bake for 25-30 minutes or until heated throughout and bubbly. Remove from oven and let stand 5 minutes. Cut in squares with sharp knife and use a spatula to remove each serving. ; name: leftover turkey or chicken enchiladas ; ingredients: cooked turkey, vegetables, cheddar cheese, mexican blend cheese, salsa, cumin, chili powder, hot sauce, tortillas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl toss turkey, vegetables, cheese, salsa, hot sauce, chili powder, and cumin. Spoon filling into tortilla shells. You may need to use more than four if your shells are small. Roll the tortilla up and place seam side down into a lightly greased baking pan. Top with extra cheese and salsa if desired. Baked until heated through, about 15-20 minutes. ; name: hot turkey and dressing sandwiches ; ingredients: onion, butter, cream of mushroom soup, chicken broth, stuffing cubes, turkey ; preparation:Saute onions in butter. Add soup and broth and stuffing. Stir over medium heat a few minutes. Stir in turkey. Put in crock pot and cook on low 8 hours. Serve on buns. ; name: easy quick hot turkey sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, carrot, onion, celery, thyme, salt, pepper, turkey gravy, deli turkey, french bread ; preparation:In skillet, melt butter. Add carrots, onion, celery, and spices. Cook on med until tender. Stir in gravy. Heat to boiling. Add turkey and heat through. Place bread slices on serving plates. Divide turkey and gravy evenly among bread slices. ; name: leftover turkey casserole ; ingredients: prepared stuffing, sour cream, condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed cream of celery soup, dry onion soup mix, french style green beans, sliced mushrooms, turkey meat ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Stir together sour cream, condensed soups, and dry onion soup mix in a mixing bowl. Spread the turkey in the bottom of a buttered 9x13-inch casserole dish. Top with green beans and mushrooms. Spread the soup over the meat and vegetable mixture. Crumble the stuffing and spread evenly over the top. Bake at 350f for 25-30 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. ; name: leftover turkey or chicken casserole ; ingredients: cooked turkey, celery, onion, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, pimientos, potato chips, paprika ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together and place them in a casserole dish. Cover with crushed potato chips and sprinkle with paprika. Bake uncovered at 350f. For about 30 minutes or until heated through and chips are lighty brown. Serve with noodles and a salad. ; name: leftover turkey ; ingredients: butter, celery, onion, turkey, water, turkey gravy mix, milk, flour, salt ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or til tender, stirring occasionally. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, and salt. Pour over turkey. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes serve over rice. ; name: easy turkey tetrazzini ; ingredients: spaghetti, white mushroom, butter, cooked turkey, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:

name: snack pizza spread ; ingredients: margarine, onion, mushroom pieces, green pepper, celery, parsley, pizza sauce, tomato paste, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Fry onions in butter in a small sauce pan. Add mushrooms, green peppers, celery, parsley and any other vegetable you may want to add. Add pizza sauce, tomato paste, cheeses and spices. Keeps for a couple of weeks in the fridge if sealed. I also add deli meats or left overs on top and broil over buns, toast, or mini pizza shells. Enjoy. ; name: garlic pizza wedges ; ingredients: bread pizza crust, parmesan cheese, mayonnaise, red onion, garlic, dried oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place crust on an ungreased 14 in pizza pan. In a small bowl, combine cheese, mayonnaise, onion, garlic and oregano. Spread over crust. Bake at 450 degrees for 8 to 10 minutes or until edges are lightly browned. Cut into wedges and serve warm or slightly cooled. ; name: mini snack pizzas ; ingredients: refrigerated dinner rolls, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet try to flatten rolls so they resemble flat circles. Take a spoonful of sauce and spread ontop of each rolls. Then cut up cheese into small bits and garnish. Add meat ontop of cheese and then place remaining cheese ontop of meat. Cook for about 15 min of until rolls are golden. ; name: pizza by the slice ; ingredients: tomatoes, hard salami, mozzarella cheese, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, dried oregano ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Remove stem end of tomato and cut tomato into several large chunks, then coarsely chop. Stack salami slices, two at a time and cut into small wedges. Unroll crescent dough on cutting board and separate into 8 triangles. Arrange the triangles on a flat baking stone or pizza pan so they do not touch. Sprinkle triangles with equal amounts of tomato, salami, cheese and oregano. Bake 15-18 minutes or until edges are golden brown. ; name: pizza steak ; ingredients: plain flour, salt, pepper, boneless eye of round beef steak, onion, canola oil, pizza sauce, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Combine flour, salt, & pepper. Pound into steaks. In large skillet, brown onions in oil over medium heat. Remove & set aside to drain. Add steaks to skillet, & brown well on both sides. Return onion to skillet, piling them on top of steaks. Pour pizza sauce over all. Cover skillet, reduce heat to medium low, and simmer 10-12 minutes, until steaks are cooked through. Uncover and top evenly with parmesan and mozzarella. Cover, and cook 3-5 minutes until cheeses are melted. ; name: homemade hamburger pizza ; ingredients: biscuits, tomato sauce, oregano, hamburger, mozzarella cheese, pineapple chunks ; preparation:Leave the refrigerator biscuits in the container on the counter for about 10 minutes, it is easier to spread the refrigerator rolls out when they are at room temperature. Open the containers and squish the rolls out onto a greased pizza pan, slightly over lapping the rolls. On big you want your pizza depends on how spread out you put the rolls and how thick you want the dough. Bake in the oven for 7-10 minutes at 375 only until the dough puffs and starts to get stiff to the touch, just before it starts to brown. Remove dough from the oven. Mix the tomato sauce and oregano together. Spread tomato sauce mix onto the dough. Spread the hamburger over the sauce. Spread the shredded mozzerella cheese over the hamburger. Sprinkle pineapple over the cheese. Bake the pizza another 10 minutes at 375 or until the cheese is melted and the dough just starts to turn brown. ; name: tomato basil pizza snack ; ingredients: whole wheat english muffin, no-salt-added tomato sauce, part-skim mozzarella cheese, fresh basil, tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Place english muffin on a small baking sheet. Spread tomato sauce over top of muffin. Top with cheese. Sprinkle fresh basil and tomato on top. Broil until cheese is brown and sauce is bubbly. Serve immediately. ; name: pizza flavored snack mix ; ingredients: crispix cereal, parmesan cheese, spaghetti sauce mix, garlic powder, pretzel nuggets, vegetable oil ; preparation:

name: pork chop casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, raw rice, consomme, marjoram, thyme, onion, tomatoes, green pepper, salt and pepper, fat ; preparation:Brown chops in fat in skillet. While browning put rice in bottom of greased casserole and slice vegetables. Lay chops on rice and top each with one slice tomato and one slice pepper. Season as you go. Pour consomme in, add majoram and thyme. Cover and bake in pre-heated 350 degree oven for one hour. ; name: baked pork chops with rice ; ingredients: rice, onion soup mix, pork chops, cream of mushroom soup, water ; preparation:Pour uncooked rice into greased casserole dish. Sprinkle onion mix over rice. Layer pork chops on top of rice mixture. Pour can of cream of mushroom soup over pork chops. Add water. Cover. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. Remove and brown a few minutes on top. ; name: pan fried pork chops with onions ; ingredients: pork chops, creole seasoning, all-purpose flour, vegetable oil, onions, water ; preparation:Sprinkle pork chops with creole seasoning. Dredge pork chops in flour, shaking off excess. Cook pork chops in hot vegetable oil in a large skillet over med-high heat 1-2 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Remove from skillet and keep warm. Add in onions and water, stirring to loosen particles from the bottom of the skillet. Saute 10 minutes or until golden brown. Return pork chops to skillet. Lower heat to low. Cover and simmer 5 minutes. ; name: tomato onion pork chop ; ingredients: corn oil, pork chops, onion, water, tomato basil soup mix, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:In skillet, heat corn oil over medium heat, add chops& onion, brown.
