Set chops aside. Add remaining ingradiants. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil, return chops to skillet. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes or until tender. Spoon sauce over pork chops. ; name: pork chops etc ; ingredients: butter, pork chops, potato, cream-style corn, salt, pepper, garlic ; preparation:Melt butter or margarine. If desired add garlic. Brown pork chops on both sides arrange in bottom of a casserole dish. Put drained potatoes in skillet and stir to coat in pork chop drippings. Layer potatoes over pork chops season to taste. Pour creamed corn evenly over potatoes. Cover and bake at 350f for 30-90 minutes. Serve with applesauce. ; name: baked pork chops with potatoes ; ingredients: pork chops, chicken bouillon cubes, water, bay leaf, flour, potatoes, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:Bring 2 cups water to a boil. Add bouillon cubes and bay leaf. Remove from heat and set aside to allow to cool. Layer potatoes in casserole dish. Layer onion slices on top of potatoes. Place pork chops on top of onions. Remove bay leaf from broth then whisk flour in chicken broth. Pour over pork chops and potatoes. Salt and pepper to taste. Cover dish with aluminum foil. Bake in preheated 350f oven for one hour and thirty minutes. ; name: skillet pork chops and rice ; ingredients: pork chops, long grain and wild rice blend, water, whole tomatoes, scallions, golden raisin ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook pork chops over medium high heat, turning once until browned on both sides, about 5 minutes. Remove to a plate. Add rice and seasonings from mix to skillet, along with water, tomatoes and their liquids, scallions and raisins. Mix well. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat and place pork chops on top of the rice. Cover and simmer for 45 minutes or until rice is cooked. ; name: pork chop onion and rice casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, dry onion soup mix, frozen mixed vegetables, uncooked rice, beef broth ; preparation:

name: garlic and mushroom burgers ; ingredients: field mushrooms, sunflower oil, gruyere, garlic clove, butter, hamburger buns, lettuce ; preparation:Heat grill to high, rub mushrooms with oil. Grill for 3 minutes each side or till cooked but still firm. Mix cheese, garlic, butter, salt and pepper together in a bowl. Spoon mixture into mushrooms. Grill until cheese melts. Place in toasted buns with salad. This could also be done in the oven. ; name: little grilled mushroom bites ; ingredients: mushrooms, extra virgin olive oil, sea salt & fresh black pepper, garlic cloves, fresh herbs, fresh breadcrumb, cheese, sherry wine ; preparation:Prepare a medium-hot fire in the grill with a vegetable grill in place. Remove stems from mushrooms and hollow out the caps. Brush both sides of mushroom caps with olive and sprinkle inside of caps with salt and pepper. Grill mushrooms, hollow side down, until partially cooked and set aside. Combine reserved mushroom stems and trimmings with remaining olive oil and garlic and toss to coat well. Grill, tossing frequently, until lightly cooked. Finely chop the mushroom pieces and garlic, either by hand or with a food processor. Combine in medium-sized bowl with the breadcrumbs, cheese, sherry and herbs. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Stuff into the mushroom caps, mounding up the filling and pressing with your fingers to pack tightly. Grill stuffed mushrooms, stuffing side up, until the mushrooms are completely cooked and the cheese is melted. Serve hot or warm. ; name: barbecue bbq mushroom and green bean salad ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, caster sugar, fresh thyme leave, button mushrooms, green beans, cherry tomatoes, baby spinach leaves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine oil, lemon juice, caster sugar, thyme leaves and salt and pepper in a large bowl and whisk until well combined. Set aside 2 tblsp dressing to add later. Add mushrooms to the large bowl and stir gently to combine, then cover and set aside for 30 minutes. Meanwhile cook beans in a saucepan of salted boiling water for 2 minutes, until bright green. Drain and refresh in cold water, allow to drain & come to room temp, and cut into thirds. Preheat barbecue plate on high. Cook the mushrooms, turning occasionally for 3-4 minutes until golden. Remove from bbq plate and set aside to cool to room temperature. Meanwhile, combine beans, tomatoes, spinach and parmesan in a large bowl. Add the reserved dressing, mushrooms, salt and pepper and toss to combine. ; name: fresh creamy mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, salt, pepper, flour, milk ; preparation:Wash, dry and slice mushrooms. Cook in butter till tender. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly. ; name: barbecued chilli and cheese mushrooms ; ingredients: mushrooms, green chilies, tasty cheese, salt ; preparation:Chop chillies finely and sprinkle a little on each mushroom. Sprinkle cheese on top just enough to cover mushroom. Sprinkle a little salt if desired. Place on the barbie until tender and cheese is melted. Can also be place in a moderate oven until cooked. ; name: roasted mushroom medley ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt & pepper, fresh rosemary, fresh sage, fresh parsley, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Remove the stems from the caps, chop off the ends, and cut into large pieces. Cut the mushrooms into pieces no larger than 2 inches in size. Mix the olive oil with the garlic, herbs and seasonings in an ovenproof casserole dish large enough to fit all of the mushrooms. Add the mushrooms, and mix well, coating the mushrooms with the flavored oil. Bake for about 30 to 40 minutes, or until cooked through. Remove from the heat, and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar. ; name: stir fry mushrooms and bell peppers ; ingredients: olive oil, green onions, garlic cloves, bell peppers, champignon mushrooms, chinese rice wine, soy sauce, sesame oil ; preparation:Heat oil til really hot. Stir fry onions, then garlic. Then add peppers and mushrooms. Stir-fry until it becomes a bit soft,. Add the wine and soy sauce and continue to stir for 2 minutes. When done, remove from heat and add the sesame sauce mixing it all together, and serve. ; name: mushrooms for the bbq ; ingredients: oil, butter, mushrooms, garlic, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: killer kahlua ; ingredients: water, sugar, instant coffee, pure vanilla extract, monarch 151 rum ; preparation:Bring to boil water and sugar. Remove from heat and add instant. Coffee. Bring to boil again. Remove from heat and add vanilla extract. Cool before adding rum. Put in bottles and cork. Makes about 3 fifths. ; name: thai tea ; ingredients: water, thai tea, sugar, evaporated milk ; preparation:Bring the water to a boil in a large saucepan. Add the tea and remove the pan from heat. Stir to submerge all the tea leaves in the water. Steep for about 5 minutes. Pour the brew through a coffee filter or a fine-mesh strainer into a large pitcher. Add the sugar to the hot tea and stir to dissolve. Cool to room temperature. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. Fill tall glasses with crushed ice. Add enough of the tea to fill the glasses to within 1 inch from the top. Then float 3 to 4 tablespoons of evaporated milk over the ice in each glass. ; name: southern sweet tea ; ingredients: water, tea bags, sugar, baking soda ; preparation:Bring 4 cups water to a boil over high heat in 2-quart saucepan. Remove from heat. Add tea bags and brew 15 minutes, dunking tea bags several times. Remove tea bags and squeeze. Stir in sugar and baking soda until completely dissolved. Stir in remaining 12 cups water. ; name: spareribs sauerkraut ; ingredients: sauerkraut, spareribs, paprika, beef bouillon cubes, caraway seed, pepper, bacon, flour ; preparation:Rinse and drain the sauerkraut. Place sauerkraut in large 4-quart casserole. Add 2 quarts hot water. Add uncooked spareribs, paprika, bouillon cubes, caraway seeds, and pepper. Cook covered, over low heat, 3 to 4 hours. Fry floured bacon slices. Break bacon into sauerkraut. Remove bones from the sauce before serving. Serve with dark bread and steins of beer. ; name: my cuppa tea plain ; ingredients: water, milk, sugar, tea leaves ; preparation:Bring water to a boil. Add sugar and tea leaves. Bring to a boil again and reduce heat. Keep simmering for around 2 minutes. Add milk and bring to boil again. Reduce heat and simmer for a minute. Take off the gas and strain into 2 cups. Enjoy some kadak chai indian ishtyle and fay ishtyle too. ; name: pork sauteed with sauerkraut ; ingredients: bacon, boneless pork chop, yellow onion, garlic, sauerkraut, paprika, sugar, lager beer, salt and pepper ; preparation:Render the fat out of the bacon, then cook until crisp. Removed the bacon from the pan, without draining oil. Saute the onion in the bacon fat until nicely caramelized. Add the pork strips and brown on all sides. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add garlic about 1 minute before the pork is done. Add the sauerkraut and saute about 10 minutes, until the sauerkraut starts to brown and wilt a bit. Sprinkle the sugar over the sauerkraut and mix in. Mix the paprika into the beer, and add to the pan. Cook until most of the beer has evaporated. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with reserved bacon crumbled on top. ; name: diabetic chai tea ; ingredients: water, black tea, nonfat milk, splenda sugar substitute, ground ginger, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Heat water to boiling. Add tea bags. Reduce heat and simmer for 2 to 4 minutes, depending on how strong you like your tea. Remove tea bags and add spices. Simmer for additional 2 minutes. Add milk and splenda, heat to a near boil stirring constantly. Serve and enjoy. ; name: sahlep salep sahlab ; ingredients: instant tea, sugar, cinnamon, milk ; preparation:

name: dry and spicy curry ; ingredients: ghee, onion, curry powder, red chili powder, cooked beef, salt, water ; preparation:Heat the ghee or oil in a pan and stir-fry the onion over moderate heat until crisp and light brown. Do not burn. Add the curry powder, chili, and the cooked meat or fish and mix well. Add the salt and water and cook for 5 minutes as a rich, brown sauce develops. Serve warm with rice. ; name: keema style curry ; ingredients: oil, green pepper, onion, salt, ground black pepper, ground cumin, garam masala, ground cinnamon, ground beef, tomatoes ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large pan and lightly fry the peppers for 1 min, remove them from the pan. Fry the onions till golden, add the salt, pepper and all of the spices, stir and fry for 2 minutes. Add the meat to the pan and cook for 15 minutes. Stir in the peppers and cook for 10 minutes. Serve with the tomatoes as a garnish. ; name: basic garam masala indian spice ; ingredients: cinnamon, bay leaves, cumin seeds, coriander seeds, green cardamom seeds, black peppercorns, cloves, ground mace ; preparation:Break the cinnamon sticks into pieces. Crumble the bay leaves. Heat a heavy frying pan and after 2-3 minutes put in the whole spices. Dry roast over a medium heat until the color darkens, stirring or shaking the pan frequently to prevent burning. Leave to cool, then grind and blend with the mace. In an airtight container, the mixture will keep for 3-4 months. To make a mild and subtle moghul masala, use only green cardamoms, cinnamon, black peppercorns, mace and a few cloves. For a hot gujerati masala, add sesame seeds, fennel seeds, ajowan seeds and chiles. For a mildish kashmiri masala, use black cumin seeds, green cardamoms, black peppercorns, cloves, cinnamon, mace, and add a little grated nutmeg. For a hot parsi dhansak masala, add fenugreek seeds, mustard seeds, chiles and ground turmeric, and double the amount of coriander seeds. ; name: african chicken curry ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, bay leaf, whole canned tomatoes, curry powder, salt, chicken, unsweetened coconut milk, lemon ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large, heavy skillet over medium heat. Stir in the onion, garlic, and bay leaf, and saute until onion is lightly browned. Mix tomatoes, curry powder, and salt into the skillet, and continue cooking about 5 minutes. Mix in the chicken, and cook 15 to 20 minutes, until no longer pink and juices run clear. Reduce skillet heat to low. Stirring constantly, gradually blend in the coconut milk over a period of about 10 minutes. Mix in lemon juice just before serving. ; name: curried papaya chutney ; ingredients: papayas, white vinegar, water, brown sugar, mustard seeds, salt, garam masala, curry powder, onion ; preparation:Put a heavy bottomed pan over medium heat and add vinegar, water, sugar and mustard and bring to boil. Cook until liquid becomes syrupy. Add papayas and curry powder, salt, garam masala. Cook 2 minutes more, stirring constantly. Remove from heat and mix in onion. Cool to the room temperature. Pour in jar and refrigerate for 5 days before using. ; name: garam masala spice blend ; ingredients: coriander seeds, cumin seed, cardamom seed, whole black peppercorn, fennel seed, mustard seeds, whole cloves, dried hot red chili peppers, ground turmeric ; preparation:Combine the coriander seeds, cumin seeds, cardamom seeds, peppercorns, fennel seeds, mustard seeds, cloves, and red chile peppers in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Toast until fragrant, about 2 minutes. Grind the toasted spices in a clean coffee grinder or spice mill to a fine powder. Spoon in the turmeric, and process to combine. Use immediately, or store in a sealed jar for up to 1 month. ; name: mujadara ; ingredients: olive oil, sweet onions, green lentil, brown basmati rice, water, salt ; preparation:Saute onion in oil until caramelized. While onions are cooking place lentils in saucepan and cover with water by an inch. Bring to boil over medium heat. Reduce to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes. Drain lentils and set aside. When onions are ready stir in rice, lentils, salt and 2 cups water. Bring to a boil, cover and reduce heat to a simmer. Simmer for 40 minutes or until rice is tender. ; name: curry massalla gravy ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, passata, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, green cardamom seeds, vegetable oil, water, salt ; preparation:

name: paprika potato wedges ; ingredients: baking potatoes, vegetable oil, paprika, salt ; preparation:Heat the oven to 425. Scrub the potatoes, rinse, and pat dry. Cut each potato length ways into 8 wedges. Put the wedges in a roasting tin, drizzle over the oil and toss well to coat the potatoes. Sprinkle with the paprika and salt. Roast potatoes for 35-40 minutes, spooning the oil over them 2-3 times. Remove from oven and sprinkle with a pinch of salt. ; name: mushroom potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, salt, cream of mushroom soup, milk, onion, paprika ; preparation:Cover potatoes with water, add salt and cook until tender. Mix soup, milk and onion. Add potatoes and toss to mix well. Pour into greased 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: potato appetizers ; ingredients: potato, olive oil, salt and pepper, chives, paprika, wheat germ ; preparation:Peel and chop potatoes. Place potatoes in a pot and cover with water. Boil until soft. Mash cooked potatoes with oil, then add seasonings. Meanwhile, heat oven to 375 degrees. Shape mix into 1-inch balls. Mix the paprika and wheat germ together in a dish. Roll potato balls in paprika and wheat germ mixture until coated. Place on oiled baking sheet. Bake at 375 degrees for about 20 minutes. Let stand on folded paper towels before serving with toothpicks. ; name: rosemary roasted chicken with potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, paprika, rosemary, garlic, black pepper, salt, chicken breast halves, small red potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Line 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil and spray with no-stick cooking spray. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: creamy mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, garlic, butter, paprika ; preparation:Peel and boil potatoes until soft. Drain potatoes, and mash. Add cream cheese, sour cream, and minced garlic to potatoes and mix until smooth. Grease a 13x9 baking dish and add mashed potatoes. Set the 4 pats of butter in various spots on top of potatoes, sprinkle with paparika. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: cheddar potato wedges ; ingredients: garlic salt, seasoning salt, paprika, potatoes, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine thegarlic salt, seasoned salt and paprika. Add potatoes, seal bag and toss to coat. Transfer potatoes to an ungreased microwave-safe dish. Dot with butter. Microwave, uncovered, on hig for 3 minutes. Turn potatoes. Cook 2-3 minutes longer or until tender. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand until cheese is melted. ; name: peppered potatoes ; ingredients: idaho potato, garlic, black peppercorns, skim milk, salt, paprika ; preparation:Peel potatoes and thinly slice. Place potatoes in saucepan with garlic and peppercorns. Cover with water and bring to a boil. Cook 20 minutes or until potatoes are soft. Drain well, and puree in a food processor, food mill, or blender. Return potato mixture to pot, add milk and salt and heat through. Sprinkle paprika over potatoes to garnish if desired. ; name: potatoes paprika ; ingredients: butter, shallot, hungarian paprika, tomatoes, salt and pepper, sour cream, potatoes, chicken stock ; preparation:

name: cheese and bean burritos ; ingredients: flour tortillas, vegetarian refried beans, green chilies, cumin, garlic powder, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Prepare filling by mixing refried beans, chilies, cumin and garlic together in a bowl. Spoon approximately 4 ounces bean filling into the center of each tortilla and top with about one tablespoon of cheese. Fold in ends and then sides. Place burritos seam side down on baking sheets that have been sprayed with vegetable oil spray. Bake for 2025 minutes until golden brown. ; name: healthy breakfast burrito ; ingredients: low-carb flour tortillas, reduced-fat cheddar cheese, egg whites, frozen southern style hash brown potatoes, bacon bits, onion, garlic powder, pepper, salt, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Scramble the egg whites with a little pam. Remove. Dice onion and saute with with a little pam till golden brown. Add the hash browns, cover and cook for 10 minutes, stirring once. Add salt, pepper, garlic powder and worcestershire if using. Add the scrambled egg white, cheese and bacon. Divide filling evenly between the tortillas. Roll up and place seam size down in an empty pan and heat on medium till a little brown. Flip over and brown the other side of the tortilla. ; name: beef and bean burritos ; ingredients: beef round steak, garlic, pinto beans, diced green chilies, cilantro, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Fold bottom up, fold sides over. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: tostadas burros pronto ; ingredients: refried beans, green chili, beef broth, tostadas, flour tortillas, lettuce, chopped tomato, cheddar cheese, salsa, enchilada sauce ; preparation:Mix beans, green chiles, and broth. Heat in microwave until hot or heat on the stove if desired. Warm tostada shells in 350 oven for 3 to 4 minutes. Place some of the bean mixture on the flour tortillas with cheese and roll up. Wrap with foil and place in oven for a few minutes to melt cheese. Serve the tostadas cafetieria style by having each person make their own. Put some bean mixture on top of the shell and sprinkle with cheese. Microwave to melt the cheese if desired. Put lettuce, tomatoes, and salsa on top and eat. Remove burros from the foil and top with any of the lettuce, tomatoes, salsa, or my favorite the enchilada sauce. ; name: sweet bean burritos ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, black beans, sweet potatoes, cumin, flour tortillas, cilantro, cheese ; preparation:In a 2- or 3-quart saucepan, saute onion and garlic over medium-high heat. Add beans, mashed sweet potatoes, and cumin. Mix well. Warm the tortillas and make burritos with the cheese. Good with salsa and sour cream. ; name: beef and bean burrito filling ; ingredients: oil, onion, garlic, ground beef, chili powder, cumin, salt and pepper, tomato sauce, refried beans ; preparation:Saute the onion in the oil until tender. Add the beef and garlic and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add the chili powder, cumin and other seasonings. Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for five minutes. Add refried beans and cook and stir until well blended. ; name: broccoli burritos ; ingredients: flour tortillas, fresh broccoli, monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, onion, jalapeno, tomato sauce, sour cream ; preparation:Wrap tortillas tightly in aluminum foil. Bake at 350 degrees f for 15 minutes. Combine broccoli, cheese, tomato, jalapenos if you want, and onion. Spoon mixture evenly in center of each tortilla. Roll up each tortilla. Place seam side down in a lightly greased 12x8 2-inch baking dish. Top with tomato sauce or other tomato variant. Cover dish, and bake at 350 degrees f. For 45 minutes. Spread sour cream over top. Garnish with parsley if desired. ; name: lower fat burrito casserole ; ingredients: flour tortillas, refried beans, enchilada sauce, onion ; preparation:

name: broccomoli ; ingredients: broccoli, low-fat yogurt, onions, low-fat mayonnaise, lemon juice, chili powder, garlic clove ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth. Chill at least a few hours before tasting. Can serve with chips, crackers, or as a veggie dip. Keeps well in fridge. Cooking time listed is for chilling time. ; name: broccoli and bell peppers ; ingredients: soy sauce, lemon juice, toasted sesame oil, broccoli florets, red sweet peppers ; preparation:For sauce, in a small bowl stir together soy sauce, lemon juice and sesame oil. Set aside. Place a steamer basket in a 12 inch skillet. Add enough water to come just below bottom of basket and bring to a boil. Place broccoli in steamer basket and reduce heat to medium low. Cover and steam for 4 minutes. Add sweet peppers. Cover and steam for 3 to 4 minutes more or until vegetables are crisp-tender. Transfer vegetables to a serving bowl. Drizzle sauce over vegetables and toss gently to coat. ; name: garlic broccoli spears ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, extra virgin olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Set florets into a saucepan with a very small amount of water, cover with lid, and let steam until tender, about 5-10 minutes or so- it should still be bright green, but fork tender. Meanwhile, combine remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Drain broccoli and place in serving dish. Pour lemon mixture over broccoli and toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: steamed broccoli italian style ; ingredients: broccoli, fresh lemon, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, salt and pepper ; preparation:Rinse the broccoli and trim off the very bottom of the thick stem. You can either steam the entire head whole or cut it up into florets. Steam the broccoli. Lay out on a platter. Drizzle with lots of fresh lemon juice. Drizzle with extra virgin olive oil to taste. Add fresh minced garlic to taste. Add salt and pepper to taste. This can be served either hot or room temperature. ; name: chinese style broccoli ; ingredients: canola oil, broccoli, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Heat oil in a large wok or high-sided skillet over med-high heat. Add broccoli and stir-fry for 2 minutes. Add soy sauce, garlic, and lemon juice. Continue to stir-fry until broccoli is crisp-tender, about 5 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: caramelized broccoli with garlic ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, broccoli, water, garlic cloves, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh lemon juice, cashews ; preparation:In a large, deep skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Add the broccoli, cut side down, cover and cook over moderate heat until richly browned on the bottom, about 8 minutes. Add the water, cover and cook until the broccoli is just tender and the water has evaporated, about 7 minutes. Add the remaining 1 tablespoon of olive oil along with the garlic and the crushed red pepper and cook uncovered until the garlic is golden brown, about 3 minutes. Season the broccoli with salt and black pepper, drizzle with the lemon juice, toasted cashews and serve. ; name: orange sauced broccoli and peppers ; ingredients: broccoli florets, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, butter, green onions, garlic clove, cornstarch, orange juice, dijon-style mustard ; preparation:Place the broccoli and bell peppers in a steamer basket. Place over 1 to 2 inches of boiling water, cover and steam for 6 to 8 minutes or just until crisp tender. In a small saucepan, melt the butter, add green onions and garlic. Cook until onion is tender. Stir in cornstarch, orange juice and mustard. Cook and stir until mixture is thickened and bubbly. Stir and continue to cook for 2 minutes more. Place steamed broccoli in a serving bowl, pour sauce over and toss gently to coat. ; name: chili garlic broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, red chili pepper, garlic clove, vegetable oil, dark soy sauce ; preparation:

name: slow cooker chicken supreme ; ingredients: dried beef, boneless skinless chicken breasts, bacon, sour cream, all-purpose flour, cream of mushroom soup, pasta ; preparation:Arrange dried beef to cover the bottom and lower sides of a slow cooker --. Wrap each piece of chicken with a slice of bacon and arrange on top of dried beef -- some pieces of chicken may overlap --. In a small bowl, thoroughly blend sour cream, flour and soup --. Pour mixture over chicken. Cover and cook on low setting for 8-10 hours or on high for 5 hours --. Serve on hot buttered pasta of choice. ; name: chicken supreme oscar ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, flour, crabmeat, salt, pepper, asparagus spear, hollandaise sauce ; preparation:Dredge the chicken in flour seasoned with salt and pepper. Saute in clarified butter until lightly browned on both sides, approximately 6-7 minutes. Reduce heat, and cover. Cook until chicken is done. Remove chicken to serving platter and top with the shellfish and asparagus laid across the top. Coat with hollandaise sauce. Serve immediately. ; name: glorious chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, margarine, water, ritz cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushrooms ; preparation:Roll chicken breasts first in the margarine, then in the crumb mixture. Place in a 9x13 pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix soup, mushrooms, water, and sour cream. Pour this mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle with remaining crumbs and drizzle on any leftover margarine. Bake at 350 for one hour or until done. ; name: saucy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, celery seed, paprika, garlic, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix first 8 ingredients in plastic bag. Add chicken and marinate in refrigerator overnight. Remove chicken from bag and coat with crumbs. Heat oven to 350. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. ; name: oriental chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, teriyaki sauce, water, orange marmalade, garlic ; preparation:In a large skillet, brown chicken on both sides in butter. Combine the teriyaki sauce, water, marmalade, and garlic in a bowl. Pour over chicken. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes or until the juices run clear on the chicken. I was thinking of trying this with sugar free marmalade for a more diabetic friendly recipe. ; name: scrumptious chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, dry onion soup mix, fresh basil ; preparation:Grease the bottom and sides of slow cooker. Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine all the remaining ingredients except fresh herbs. Pour over chicken. Cover. Cook on low for 6 hours. Sprinkle with fresh herbs just before serving. Serve with rice, couscous, or over toast as a sos meal. ; name: chicken with creamy paprika sauce ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, chicken broth, paprika, salt, cornstarch, water, light sour cream with chives, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Place sliced onion in bottom of slow cooker topped with chicken. Mix broth and paprika and pour over chicken. Sprinkle salt on top. Cook on low setting 7 to 8 hours or until chicken is done. With a slotted spoon, remove chicken from slow cooker and place on warm platter. Cover with alumnimum foil and place in preheated 200 degree oven. Pour pan drippings into small sauce pan and mix with cornstarch mixture. Heat until thickened about 10 minutes. Sir in sour cream. Pour sauce over chicken. ; name: chicken supreme ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, fresh mushrooms, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, garlic salt, paprika, swiss cheese ; preparation:

name: light lemon mousse ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, nonfat milk, lemon juice, lemon zest, vanilla extract, light whipped topping, yellow food coloring, whipped topping ; preparation:In a small saucepan, combine the sugar or splenda and cornstarch. Over medium low heat, stir in milk until smooth. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Cook for 1 to 2 minutes or until thick and bubbly. Remove from heat. Stir in the lemon juice, zest and vanilla. Place the pan in a bowl of ice water and stir for 2 minutes to cool. Fold in whipped topping and food coloring if using. Spoon into dessert dishes, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving. Garnish with additional whipped topping if desired. ; name: lime mousse ; ingredients: whipping cream, sugar, lime juice, lime zest, vanilla extract, lime slice, of fresh mint ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, combine the cream, sugar, lime juice, peel and vanilla. Beat on high speed until soft peaks form, about 4 minutes. Spoon into dessert dishes. Garnish with lime and mint, if desired. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: super easy chocolate mousse ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, heavy cream, instant coffee, dark chocolate ; preparation:Melt chocolate and set aside. In a blender combine egg yolks and sugar, mix for 2 minutes. Add chocolate and heavy cream and coffee, blend for 2 minutes. Add egg whites and blend for 4 minutes. Pour into serving dish and refrigerate for at least 3 hours. ; name: easy blender chocolate mousse ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, egg, vanilla extract, heavy cream ; preparation:Place chocolate chips, egg and vanilla into blender and blend for 30 seconds. Remove center of blender lid and while machine is running, slowly pour heated cream into the chocolate mixture. Blend until well mixed and chocolate chips are melted. Pour into parfait or wine glasses and refrigerate until set. Can serve with a garnish of sweetened whipped cream. ; name: chocolate mousse the easy way ; ingredients: milk, chocolate chips, eggs, sugar, salt ; preparation:Pour milk in heavy saucepan and heat to boiling point. Combine remaining ingredients in blender container. Pour in the hot milk, then blend at low speed for 1 minute or until smooth. Pour into 6 custard cups, and chill for at least 2 hours before serving. Garnish with mint leaves, homeade chocolate leaves and fresh fruit. ; name: chocolate mousse ; ingredients: evaporated milk, vanilla extract, sugar, chocolate chips, salt, heavy whipping cream, chocolate curls, fresh strawberries ; preparation:In blender, combine the milk, vanilla, sugar, chocolate and salt. Cover and process until smooth, about 1 minute. Transfer to a large bowl. In small mixing bowl, beat cream until soft peaks form. Fold into chocolate mixture. Spoon into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until serving. Garnish with chocolate curls and strawberries, if desired. ; name: mint mousse tart ; ingredients: brownie mix, cream cheese, marshmallow creme, junior mints, heavy cream ; preparation:Prepare brownie mix according to directions but in a greased 9 inch round pan. Cool completely. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Blend in marshmallow creme. Melt junior mints stir in melted junior mints into creamed mixture. Fold in the whipped cream. Spread over brownie. Loosely cover and chill several hours or overnight. Cut into wedges and serve. ; name: easy lemon mousse ; ingredients: double cream, lemon, juice of, lemon, zest of, sugar, low-fat cream cheese ; preparation:

name: sea scallops in sweet pepper sauce ; ingredients: sea scallops, butter, sweet pepper, onion, garlic, dry white wine, chicken broth, milk, fresh parsley ; preparation:In lg skillet, melt butter and cook scallops for about 7 minutes, until golden brown. Remove and keep warm. In same skillet, add pepper, onion and garlic. Cook 2 minutes. Add wine, stir 1 minute. Add broth, milk, and parsley. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until sauce thickens, 1-2 minutes. Add scallops and heat through. ; name: simple scallops ; ingredients: garlic, butter, dry sherry, mushroom, scallions, parsley, scallops, flour, half-and-half ; preparation:Combine garlic, butter, sherry, mushrooms, scallions and parsley in a saucepan. Saute 2 minutes over medium heat. Add scallops, stir and simmer 2 minutes. Add flour, stir to incorporate. Slowly add the half and half stirring until thickened and scallops are tender. Serve in a bowl or over rice. ; name: creamy scrumptious scallops ; ingredients: sea scallops, butter, cream cheese, mustard, whipping cream, white wine, blue cheese, fresh strawberries ; preparation:Melt half of the butter in a medium frying pan, cook and turn the scallops for 4 minutes or until they are opaque and still soft and tender. Transfer the scallops to a plate and set aside until the sauce is prepared. In the same frying pan melt the other half of the butter. As the butter melts add the cheese spread and mustard, whisk until smooth for about 2 minutes. Add the whipping cream. Stir and bring to a boil, stir in the wine until combined and smooth, about 3 minutes. Return the cooked scallops to the pan, stir just until the scallops are warmed, about 2 minutes and then immediately remove the pan from the heat. Do not overcook or the scallops will become rubbery. Place the scallops on three scallop shaped dishes or on small plates lined with lettuce. Sprinkle the crumbled blue cheese around the scallops. Pour the cream sauce over the scallops. Slice the strawberries partly through leaving the green top to hold the slices together, garnish with the sliced strawberry. ; name: scallop saute ; ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, salt, pepper, bay scallops, fresh parsley, red pepper flakes, lemon juice ; preparation:Heat butter in 12in skillet. Add onion, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir and saute 1 minute. Add scallops. Stir and saute 4-6 minutes, until scallops are opaque. Add parsley, red pepper flakes, and lemon, heat through. ; name: scallops w miso sauce ; ingredients: scallops, olive oil, butter, mirin, seasoned rice vinegar, soy sauce, water, grainy mustard, sesame seeds, green onion ; preparation:Heat a nonstick frying pan on medium-high heat. Swirl in the olive oil. Add the scallops and cook for 1 minutes each side to brown. Remove the scallops from the pan to a plate and tent with tin foil to keep warm. Turn heat to medium and to the pan, add the butter, mirin, seasoned rice vinegar, soy sauce, miso water, mustard and water. Stir well and when the sauce begins to bubble, add the browned scallops back into the pan to finish cooking for 1-2 minutes. Garnish with toasted sesame seeds and scallion greens. ; name: speedy scallops with corn and sweet peppers ; ingredients: butter, garlic cloves, onion, orange bell pepper, sweet corn, red wine, chicken broth, salt, ground black pepper, sea scallops ; preparation:Pre-heat skillet with 1 tbs butter over medium-high heat. Add garlic and onion. Saute about 2 minutes. Add bell pepper and saute about 5 minutes. Add corn and saute about 3 minutes. Add wine, broth, salt and pepper and simmer until most of the liquid is evaporated, about 4 minutes. Remove vegetable mixture from pan and place on serving plates. Cover to keep warm. Add remaining butter to pan. When butter is melted add scallops. Saute until slightly golden and cooked thoroughly. Serve scallops on top of corn mixture. ; name: scallops alexandra ; ingredients: scallions, garlic, paprika, salt, pepper, butter, scallops, seasoned bread crumbs ; preparation:Mix scallions, garlic, paprika, salt, and pepper together. In a saute pan, melt butter. When butter is melted, add saute scallion mixture. In a separate bowl, coat the scallops with bread crumbs. Add the coated scallops to the saute mixture. Stir and cook for about 2 to 4 minutes, until golden brown. ; name: scallops in garlic cream sauce ; ingredients: scallops, butter, garlic cloves, parsley, scallions, white wine, salt, pepper, cream ; preparation:

name: dark chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop by tablespoonsful on ungreased cookies sheets, 2 inches apart, and bake in preheated 375 oven about 12 minutes, til tops are puffed and set. Cool on rack. ; name: cake mix german chocolate cookies ; ingredients: german chocolate cake mix, butter, eggs, water, flaked coconut, nuts, cocoa ; preparation:With mixer on low speed blend, butter, eggs and water. By hand stir in cake mix. Add coconut and nuts. Chill dough for approximately 1 hour before placing on parchment lined baking sheet. Form into large balls, place on baking sheet and press down with hand. Bake 350 degrees for 12 minutes. Let cool before removing from baking sheet. ; name: nikki s health cookies ; ingredients: bananas, vanilla extract, coconut oil, rolled oats, almond meal, coconut, cinnamon, sea salt, baking powder, dark chocolate bars ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl combine bananas, vanilla and coconut oil. In another bowl wisk oats, almond meal, coconut, cinnamon, salt and baking powder. Add dry ingredients to wet ones. Fold in chocolate chunks. Drop small dollops on parchment or silpat lined baking sheet. Bake 14-18 minutes, as long as possible without burning. ; name: steamed chocolate cake ; ingredients: granulated sugar, milk, butter, sweetened condensed milk, cocoa powder, plain flour, baking powder, baking soda, eggs ; preparation:Over low heat, stir sugar, water, milk powder, butter and condensed milk in a saucepan until sugar and butter dissolved. Pour a little of this hot milk slowly into cocoa powder, stirring to a make a cocoa paste, then add in the rest of the milk. Let cool. Sift flour, baking powder and baking soda, set aside. Beat eggs lightly and add the chocolate milk of step, mix well. Add flour mixture and mix well. Pour into a lined 20cm round tin. Steam for 1 hour, test with a skewer. Frost or fill with your favourite chocolate fudge or frosting if desired. ; name: boiled chocolate cake ; ingredients: sugar, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda, cocoa, self raising flour, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarb soda& cocoa in a saucepan& bring to the boil. Once boiling, time for 2 minutes, then remove from heat. Grease& line base of a loaf pan. Once chocolate mixture has cooled, add the flour& egg. Mix well until smooth. Place in pan& cook in oven for 35 minutes. ; name: no bake chocolate cookies chokladbollar ; ingredients: quick-cooking oatmeal, sugar, butter, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, coffee, coconut ; preparation:Combine butter, sugar, oats, cocoa powder, vanilla, and coffee. Roll into balls about the size of a meatball. Roll balls in coconut or pearl sugar to decorate. Eat right away, or refrigerate, or freeze if you prefer a harder consistency. Makes about 15. On pearl sugar. Pearl sugar is coarsely ground sugar used for decorating baked goods. ; name: no bake chocolate cookies ; ingredients: cocoa, sugar, milk, margarine, peanut butter, quick-cooking oatmeal, vanilla, salt ; preparation:Bring first 4 ingredients to a boil. Cook for 1 minute. Remove from heat. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well and drop by teaspoon onto wax paper. Let cool. They seem to harden better, plus they taste good that way. ; name: buddha s ultimately moist chocolate cookies ; ingredients: neufchatel cheese, butter, egg, vanilla extract, chocolate cake mix ; preparation:

name: crumb topped tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, salt and pepper, butter, onion, dry breadcrumbs, parsley, thyme ; preparation:Cut tomatoes in half and arrange in shallow pan. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, cut side up 6 inches from heat for 5 minutes. In small skillet, cook onion in butter, until soft. Stir in rest of ing. Spoon onto tomatoes. Broil about 3 minutes longer -- until lightly browned. ; name: cherry tomato crisp ; ingredients: sandwich bread, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, olive oil, garlic, sea salt, fresh pepper, cherry tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Put the first 7 ingredients into a food processor bowl. Pulse until bread is very coarsely chopped, 4-6 times. Grease an 8 inch square baking dish and arrange the cherry tomatoes in a single layer. Sprinkle with the bread crumb mixture. Bake until crust is browned and tomatoes are tender, about 20 minutes. ; name: broccoli tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, frozen chopped broccoli, shredded cheddar cheese, dry breadcrumbs, celery, light mayonnaise, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Steam the broccoli in a small amount of water for about 3 minutes. Drain well. Combine broccoli with cheddar, breadcrumbs, celery, mayo, and salt. Take the stem off the top of each tomato. Carefully cut 5 wedges in each tomato without cutting all the way through the bottom - the wedges should stay connected at the bottom. Spoon equal amounts of the broccoli filling into each tomato. Gently press the wedges back toward the center of the tomato. Sprinkle each with some of the parmesan cheese. Place tomatoes in a shallow pan and bake at 325 degrees for about 25 minutes. ; name: tomatoes and peppers for lunch ; ingredients: whole wheat bread, balsamic vinaigrette, tomatoes, red pepper, fat free mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Toast your bread. Douse with a balsamic vinaigrette add thinly sliced tomatoes. Add a layer of roasted peppers, any color. Add mozzarella. Sprinkle with herbs and salt and pepper. If you want melted cheese, place in broiler for a few minutes, do not nuke it, this will make it soggy. ; name: hot herbed tomatoes ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, soft breadcrumbs, onion, fresh parsley, garlic, fresh basil, fresh thyme, salt, pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Place cherry tomato halves in a lightly greased 11x7 baking dish. Combine breadcrumbs and next 7 ingredients in a medium bowl, stirring well. Sprinkle breadcrumbs mixture evely over cherry tomatoes. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake, uncovered, at 400 degrees for 7-9 minutes, or until thoroughly heated. Serve immediately. ; name: buttered tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, salt and pepper, sugar, basil ; preparation:Peel tomatoes and remove pulp and seeds. Discard pulp and seeds. Dice the fleshy part of the tomatoes. Melt butter in a skillet. Saut tomatoes in the butter. Stir in the salt and pepper, sugar and basil. Cover and cook about 5 minutes. ; name: stuffed and barbecued tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, herbs, fresh parmesan cheese, garlic cloves, olive oil, pepper ; preparation:Have grill preheated to medium. Cut tomatoes in half crosswise. Remove and discard seeds. In a bowl combine the herbs, cheese, garlic, oil, and pepper medley. Fill the tomatoes with the mixture. Grill the tomatoes until tender and the cheese is starting to melt, 8- 10 minutes. Remove from bbq using a flat spatula. Enjoy. ; name: savory breaded tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, fine breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, chives, dried basil, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: super creamy fruit salad ; ingredients: pineapple chunks in juice, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas, miniature marshmallows, instant vanilla pudding, cool whip ; preparation:Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Mix pineapple juice and dry instant vanilla pudding together and set in the refrigerator for 30 minutes. Mix the pineapple, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas & marshmallows together. Gently fold in pudding mixture. Lastly, fold in cool whip. Cover and refrigerate. ; name: banana split surprise ; ingredients: margarine, graham cracker crumbs, eggs, powdered sugar, vanilla, crushed pineapple, bananas, frozen whipped topping, pecans, maraschino cherry ; preparation:Combine melted margarine and cracker crumbs, mold and pat into bottom of a 13x9x2-inch pan. Beat eggs at high speed until light, about 4 minutes. Add powdered sugar, softened margarine and vanilla. Beat 5 minutes at high speed. Spread mixture over crumbs mixture. Chill 30 minutes. Spread pineapple over cream mixture. Arrange bananas over the pineapple, then spread with whipped topping. Sprinkle with pecans and garnish with cherries. Chill 6 hours or overnight. ; name: instant fruit salad ; ingredients: instant lemon pudding, pineapple chunk, mandarin orange, fruit cocktail ; preparation:Open and drain liquid from all cans except pineapple. Place all fruit in serving container. Pour lemon pudding powder onto fruit and stir. Add can of pineapple with liquid. Refridgerate until ready to serve. ; name: banana split smoothies ; ingredients: bananas, crushed pineapple, milk, fresh strawberries, honey, ice cubes, whipped topping, chocolate syrup, maraschino cherry ; preparation:In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries. ; name: barbecued banana splits ; ingredients: banana, miniature marshmallows, miniature chocolate chips, ice cream ; preparation:Make slit down center of unpeeled banana and spread apart to open. Stuff marshmallows and chocolate chips into opening. Place bananas directly on cooking grate of grill. Grill over medium heat until skin is blackened, about 6- 8 minutes. Marshmallows should be golden brown, chocolate melted, and banana carmelized to a dark golden brown. Remove with tongs, transfer to plate, and serve with a scoop of ice cream. Can also add whipped cream and chopped nuts if desired. ; name: breakfast fruit and nuts salad ; ingredients: oranges, banana, walnut halves, coconut ; preparation:Peel and slice banana, and peel and cut oranges in little bits. Cut walnut halves in bits. Mix in a bowl. Sprinkle with coconut. Eat quickly. ; name: marshmallow fruit salad ; ingredients: mini marshmallows, mandarin oranges, fruit cocktail, sour cream ; preparation:Drain liquid from canned fruit. Dump everything into large bowl. Mix really well. Chill at least 1 hour. Serve. ; name: the realtor s banana split salad ; ingredients: pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, miniature marshmallows, sour cream, lettuce leaf, bananas, flaked coconut, maraschino cherries ; preparation:

name: chinese style noodle and pork soup ; ingredients: noodles, cabbage, cooked pork, green onion, low sodium chicken broth, white mushroom, fresh gingerroot, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency, drain. Meanwhile, in a large pot combine all remaining ingredients. Stir in the cooked noodles. Bring to a full boil over high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil for about 10 minutes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped green onions if desired. ; name: chinese soup ; ingredients: oil, mushrooms, water, garlic clove, ramen noodles, sherry wine, lemon juice, tabasco sauce, green onion ; preparation:Fry mushrooms, and garlic in oil. Add water and the flavour packs from the instant noodles. Bring to a boil. Add the noodles. Simmer 3 minutes. Add onions and your choice of any garnishes. ; name: oriental vegetable noodle soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, sugar snap pea, fresh bean sprout, fresh mushrooms, ginger, noodles ; preparation:Combine the chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, and peas in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Add the bean sprouts, mushrooms, and ginger. Simmer for 5 more minutes. Add the cooked noodles and heat for 2-3 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: asian pork and noodle soup ; ingredients: boneless pork sirloin, garlic cloves, gingerroot, chicken broth, water, soy sauce, fine egg noodles, carrot, red bell pepper, fresh spinach leaves ; preparation:Spray 3-quart saucepan with cooking spray. Heat over medium-high heat. Add pork, garlic and gingerroot. Stir-fry 3 to 5 minutes or until pork is brown. Stir in broth, water and soy sauce. Heat to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer uncovered 5 minutes. Stir in noodles, carrot and bell pepper. Simmer uncovered about 10 minutes or until noodles are tender. Stir in spinach. Cook until heated through. ; name: spicy pork soup ; ingredients: oriental sesame oil, pork tenderloin, green onions, fresh ginger, low sodium chicken broth, linguine, mung bean sprouts, soy sauce, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Heat sesame oil in heavy large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add pork, sliced green onions and minced ginger and stir-fry 1 minute. Add chicken broth, pasta, bean sprouts and soy sauce. Bring soup to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until pork is cooked through and pasta is just tender, about 3 minutes. Season soup to taste with cayenne pepper and salt. ; name: chinese cucumber soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, salt and pepper, cucumbers, sesame oil, mushrooms, rice vinegar, scallions, ginger powder ; preparation:Place the broth in a soup pot and bring it to a boil. Add the cucumbers, mushrooms, scallions, salt, and pepper. Cover the soup pot and cook gently over low-medium heat for 15 to 20 minutes. Blend the soup in a blender. Add the extra seasonings-sesame oil, vinegar and ginger- and blend well. Refrigerate the soup for a few hours and serve cold. Or reheat the soup and serve it hot as the chinese do. ; name: chinese fish and lettuce soup ; ingredients: fresh white fish, light soy sauce, peanut oil, white pepper, iceberg lettuce, fresh ginger, salt, chicken stock, chinese rice wine, sesame oil ; preparation:Thinly slice the boneless fish and soak in the marinade. Shred the lettuce and set aside. Cook the ginger, oil and salt just until the ginger begins to brown a little bit. Add to the soup stock and bring to a heavy simmer. Just prior to serving, drain the marinade from the fish and add the fish to the soup pot, all at once, along with the lettuce and the rice wine or sherry. Bring back to a full simmer, then remove from stove. Do not overcook the soup. Add a few drops of sesame oil and pepper for garnish, and serve immediately. ; name: cantonese soup ; ingredients: lean pork, oil, soy sauce, pepper, ground ginger, chicken broth, chinese cabbage, chow mein noodles ; preparation:

name: spinach with rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, cooked rice, fresh spinach, carrot, garlic clove, italian dressing, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Generously spray a wok or non stick deep frypan with veggie spray. Heat to medium. Add cooked rice and grated carrot into wok and mix. Add minced garlic. Stir fry to heat through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Add spinach. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Turn over with a spatula several times to mix the spinach evenly with the rice mixture, heat and turn until the spinach is starting to wilt, about 3 minutes. Pour the italian dressing evenly over and turn several times to mix. Cook about 3 minutes or until the spinach is well wilted and the dressing is heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: saute spinach with garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach, salt & freshly ground black pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:In a large saut pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm. ; name: spinach and feta pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, sweet onions, olive oil, pesto sauce, frozen spinach, sun-dried tomato, feta ; preparation:In large non-stick skillet, heat oil over medium high heat. Add onions. Once onions begin to brown reduce heat to low. Continue to cook onions until soft and caramelized. This should take a total of 20-30 minutes. Roll dough out. Spread pesto. Layer remaining ingredients and onions over sauce. Bake according to dough directions. ; name: spinach with olives and lemon ; ingredients: baby spinach, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, rind of, kalamata olive, sea salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Wash the spinach and place in a large covered pan over low heat. Steam for 1-2 minutes until the spinach wilts. Drain well. Heat the garlic in 1 tablespoon of the olive oil until fragrant. Add the preserved lemon, olives and spinach. Cook for another minute, season with salt and pepper, and stir in the remaining olive oil. Serve immediately or chill and serve cold as a salad. ; name: italian spinach saute ; ingredients: olive oil, frozen chopped spinach, garlic cloves, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: spinach and feta pasta with olives ; ingredients: fusilli, spinach, garlic cloves, olive oil, reduced-fat feta cheese, pine nuts, nutmeg, black olives, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil the pasta according to pack instructions. Meanwhile, boil a kettle of water, then slowly pour over the spinach in a colander until it wilts. Shake off the excess water, then put the spinach into a food processor. Add the garlic, oil, half of the cheese and most of the pine nuts to the processor with the spinach, then pulse to a pesto-like sauce. Season with the nutmeg and salt and pepper. Stir through the hot, drained pasta and serve topped with the olives and the remaining crumbled cheese and pine nuts. ; name: spinach tomato scramble ; ingredients: eggs, egg whites, olive oil, roma tomato, baby spinach, feta cheese, walnuts, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Whisk together eggs and egg whites and set aside. Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium-high heat. Saute roma tomato until slightly tender. Add egg mixture and scramble until eggs are soft set. Add baby spinach leaves, stir for 30 seconds, turn off heat and cover skillet for one minute. Portion on two plates and top with feta cheese and chopped walnuts. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: warm spinach and feta dip ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, baby spinach, feta, creme fraiche, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: oven baked parmesan romano chicken ; ingredients: italian breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, romano cheese, fresh ground black pepper, seasoning salt, fresh flat-leaf parsley, paprika, butter, fresh garlic, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. Combine breadcrumbs, cheeses, black pepper, salt, parsley and paprika in shallow bowl. Set aside. Combine butter and garlic in a 9-inch pie pan. Dip 1 chicken breast at a time into butter mixture. Place into breadcrumb mixture, turning to coat evenly. Place chicken breasts into ungreased 13x9-inch glass baking dish. Drizzle with any remaining butter mixture. Bake for 25-35 minutes or until chicken is lightly browned and juices run clear when pierced with a fork. ; name: parmesan breaded chicken ; ingredients: seasoned bread crumbs, romano cheese, oregano, rosemary, basil, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, buttermilk ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients in a shallow bowl. Dip chicken in buttermilk. Roll in bread crumb mixture. Coat a baking pan with cooking spray. Place chicken in pan. Bake, covered, at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 10 minutes or until done. ; name: creamy italian chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing mix, water, cream of chicken soup, cream cheese ; preparation:Mix water and dressing. Pour over chicken in the bottom of a skillet. Cover and cook chicken until done and no longer pink. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: savory oven fried chicken ; ingredients: dried breadcrumbs, sharp cheddar cheese, dried ancho chile powder, salt, chicken, eggs ; preparation:In a large shallow bowl mix bread crumbs, cheese, ground chilies, and salt. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Dip in beaten egg and roll in crumb mixture to coat. Place on a foil-lined 12-by 15-inch baking sheet. Bake in a 375 degree oven or 350 degree convection oven until crumbs are browned and chicken is no longer pink at the bone, 45 minutes to 1 hour. ; name: oven fried cheesy italian chicken ; ingredients: margarine, bisquick baking mix, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, salt, garlic powder, pepper, broiler-fryer chickens ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Heat margarine in 9 x 13 pan in oven until melted. Mix remaining ingredients except chicken. Coat chicken. Place skin side down in pan. Bake 35 minutes. Turn. Bake until done. About 15 minutes. ; name: romano casserole ; ingredients: raw rice, green capsicum, onion, pasta sauce, red kidney beans, lean ground beef, cheese, bacon ; preparation:Place the rice in a greased casserole dish. Cover the bottom evenly with the rice. Sprinkle with the capsicum and onion. Pour over half the pasta sauce. Layer the kidney beans on top of the sauce and then spread the uncooked mince over the top of that. Pour over the remaining pasta sauce and sprinkle with the bacon and cheese. Bake, covered, at 180 degrees c for 1 hour. Remove the lid for the last 10 minutes to brown the cheese. ; name: italian baked chicken ; ingredients: butter, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, chicken breasts, salt and black pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan combine the margarine, italian salad dressing, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, and crushed garlic. Cook, over medium heat, stirring, until the butter melts. Place the chicken in a 12 x 8 x 2-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with the salt and pepper to taste. Pour the sauce over the chicken. Bake, uncovered, at 325-degrees for 1 hour or until tender and cooked through. ; name: oven chicken romano ; ingredients: whole chickens, butter, seasoned dry bread crumbs, romano cheese, parsley ; preparation:

name: broccoli pasta salad ; ingredients: medium pasta shells, mayonnaise, white vinegar, sugar, broccoli florets, red onion, golden raisin, bacon, sunflower seeds ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and rinse under cold running water. Combine mayonnaise, vinegar and sugar in mixing bowl. Mix well. Add pasta, broccoli, onion, raisins, bacon and sunflower seeds. Mix gently. Cover. Refrigerate at least 2 hours to allow flavors to blend. ; name: easy italian pasta salad ; ingredients: pasta, monterey jack cheese, peas, red onion, miracle whip, italian dressing, italian seasoning, red pepper, cucumber, carrot ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. Mix seasoning, italian dressing and miracle whip in large bowl. Add remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: zesty italian pasta bean salad ; ingredients: spiral shaped pasta, fresh broccoli, carrots, diced tomato, black olives, black beans, italian salad dressing, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook macaroni until tender. Drain and rinse with cold water. In a large bowl, mix broccoli, carrots, diced tomato, and black olives. Add rest of ingredients and stir. Cover and chill before serving. ; name: spicy tomato pasta salad ; ingredients: italian dressing, buttermilk ranch salad dressing mix, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, black olives, dried sweet basil leaves, crab boil, tri-color spiral pasta, bow tie pasta, baby shrimp ; preparation:Pour italian dressing into large bowl and add dry ranch dressing mix, stirring well. Add diced cucumbers, sliced tomatoes, olives and basil, cover and marinate a couple of hours. In a large pot, place enough water for pasta and drop crab boil bag into water. When water comes to boil, place pasta into water and cook until almost done, then turn heat off, add the frozen shrimp and let sit in crab boil water until pasta is tender. Drain shrimp and pasta mixture into a large bowl. Pour dressing mixture over pasta and shrimp, mixing well. Cover and let chill before serving--overnight is even better. ; name: versatile pasta salad ; ingredients: rotini pasta, italian salad dressing, onion, green peppers, tomatoes, turkey pepperoni, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain and set aside. Dice onion, peppers, and tomatoes and add to salad. Cut pepperonis into quarters and add to pasta mixture. Toss all with entire bottle of italian dressing. Mix italian seasoning into parmesan cheese and fold into salad. Refrigerate overnight for best flavor. Serve cold. ; name: garlic pasta salad ; ingredients: pasta, orange bell pepper, red bell pepper, carrot, fresh parsley, garlic vinaigrette dressing, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions on package, drain and cool by running cool water over it. Let drain thoroughly. Combine pasta with peppers, carrots and parsley. Add vinaigrette and mix well. Add feta cheese, mix lightly, lifting the pasta and cheese mixture until the cheese is distributed throughout. Chill for an hour before serving. ; name: pasta salad with spinach olives and mozzarella ; ingredients: orecchiette, fresh mozzarella cheese, baby spinach, kalamata olives, parmesan cheese, red wine vinegar, kosher salt, black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Bring a medium pot of heavily salted water to a boil over high heat. Cook pasta according to the package directions, or until al dente. Drain, then rinse under cold water until cool. Transfer pasta to a large bowl and add mozzarella, spinach, olives, and parmesan. Toss to combine. In a separate, nonreactive bowl, combine vinegar, salt, and pepper. While whisking constantly, slowly add oil by pouring in a thin stream down the side of the bowl. Whisk until completely incorporated. Pour vinaigrette over salad and toss until pasta is coated. Taste, adjust seasoning as desired, and serve. ; name: colorful pasta salad ; ingredients: broccoli floret, celery, black olives, red onion, ham, cheddar cheese, tri-color spiral pasta, italian dressing ; preparation:

name: german french toast ; ingredients: eggs, white bread, muenster cheese, milk, butter, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a skillet on medium heat. In a small bowl, beat together eggs, milk and salt. Dip bread slices one at a time in egg mixture, and fry in butter until bolden brown. After turning once, top each slice of bread with a slice of muenster cheese. Cover skillet until the cheese is melted. Serve and enjoy. ; name: basic french toast ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, salt, white bread, butter, maple syrup ; preparation:Put the eggs in a shallow bowl and whisk them until well mixed. Add the milk, sugar and salt. Mix well. Place one slice of bread at a time in the mixture until the egg mixture is absorbed. Transfer bread slices to griddle or skillet, heating slowly until bottom is golden brown. Turn and brown the other side. Serve french toast hot with butter and syrup. ; name: french toast with chocolate and almonds ; ingredients: eggs, milk, vanilla essence, olive oil, butter, sourdough bread, almonds ; preparation:Put eggs, milk & vanilla essence in a large bowl and whisk until combined. Heat 1 tablespoon of the oil and half of the butter in a large, non-stick frying pan over a medium heat. Spread the flaked almonds over a small plate. Sprinkle 2 slices of bread with chocolate, and top each with another slice. Dip sandwiches into egg mixture, then press into the almonds, to coat. Heat the remaining butter and oil in a pan. Add almond-coated, chocolate-filled sandwiches and cook for 1-2 minutes on each side or until golden. Cut into quarters and serve immediately. ; name: cheesy baked french toast ; ingredients: white bread, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, vanilla extract, cinnamon, brown sugar ; preparation:Butter the bottom of an 8 x 12 inch baking pan. Cover the bottom with 6 slices of the bread. Place the slices of cheese over the bread, and cover the cheese with the remaining 6 slices of bread. Beat the eggs with the milk and the seasonings in a medium bowl. Pour the egg mixture over the bread, cover, and refrigerate for at least 2 hours. Preheat the oven to 325 degrees. Bake 50 to 60 minutes until the french toast is brown and puffed. Sprinkle with cinnamon and brown sugar. ; name: frozen french toast ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, nutmeg, vanilla, milk, dry bread ; preparation:Beat all but the bread in a large bowl. Dip each slice of bread in mixture so it absorbs as much as possible. Brown on both sides in margarine over moderate heat. Cool. Freeze in single layer on greased cookie sheet overnite. Stack and wrap in foil and return to freezer until ready to use. To heat place slice in toaster until hot. ; name: egg free french toast ; ingredients: whole grain bread, milk, cornstarch, sugar, vanilla extract, butter, salt ; preparation:Preheat griddle to just above medium heat. In a medium bowl, combine all ingredients except bread and butter. Mix until the cornstach is disolved. Transfer mixture to a shallow bowl or pan. Dip both sides of each bread slice into the mixture. Melt butter on the griddle or skillet. Place bread on heated surface and cook each side to a light golden brown. Serve immediately. ; name: peanut butter butter and sugar toast ; ingredients: white bread, peanut butter, butter, sugar ; preparation:Mix peanut butter, butter and sugar in small bowl. Set aside. Toast bread. Spread toast with peanut butter mixture. Enjoy while warm. ; name: savory toast strips ; ingredients: white bread, butter, margarine, onion salt, garlic salt, corn flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: filled custard with fresh fruit ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, nutmeg, milk, half-and-half, egg yolks, vanilla, fresh fruit ; preparation:Combine sugar, cornstarch and nutmeg in top of double boiler. Gradually whisk in milk, half and half, yolks and vanilla until smooth. Set over simmering water. Stir until thick. Cover and continue cooking 10 minutes. Spoon custard into two 1-cup molds. Refrigerate until firm, about 4 hours. Invert custard onto plates. Top with fresh fruit. ; name: vanilla custard ice cream ; ingredients: whole milk, sugar, salt, egg yolks, heavy cream, vanilla extract ; preparation:Place milk in a small pan and heat over low heat until bubbles form, and milk becomes hot. Add sugar and salt, stirring to dissolve. Remove from heat and add 1-2 tbsp of the hot milk to the egg yolks, mixing well. Add more milk to eggs and bring it up to temperature. Pour egg mixture back into pan and continue to cook over low heat, stirring constantly, until it starts to thicken and reaches 160 degrees, about 10-12 minutes. Place the pan in a sink or basin full of ice water to cool down, continuing to stir. When custard is just barely warm, stir in the cream and vanilla. Refrigerate mixture until ready to use. Just prior to making, pour through strainer into the ice cream maker and follow your appliances instructions for operating. ; name: easy baked custard ; ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, vanilla extract, salt, milk, eggs, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven 350 f. Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a buttered 9-in. Deep-dish pie or cake pan. Bake at for 50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack until room temperature. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: baked custard cups ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, nutmeg, vanilla, milk ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients, stir until blended. Slowly add scalded milk, stirring constantly. Pour into 4 custard cups. Set cups in 9x9 inch baking pan. Pour 1 inch hot water into pan. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes, or until knife comes out clean. Remove from pan, cool. Chill. ; name: a very proper english custard ; ingredients: milk, cream, egg yolks, sugar, cornstarch, vanilla ; preparation:Bring milk and cream to a simmer slowly on low heat. Whisk the sugar and cornstarch together, add the egg yolks, combine well. Slowly whisk the warm milk into the egg mixture, whisking constantly. Add vanilla. Return to the saucepan and stir gently until thickened. Serve hot, or cool to use as a layer in trifles, or fill tart pans. If using it hot, it can be kept warm in a jug set in a pan of hot water with a bit of cling film on top to prevent a skin forming. ; name: custard tart ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, cornflour, milk, vanilla essence, ground nutmeg, unbaked pastry shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar till thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean. ; name: maple pots de creme ; ingredients: heavy cream, maple syrup, salt, egg yolks, vanilla extract ; preparation:Bring the cream, maple syrup and salt to a simmer in a sauce pan. Mix the egg yolks and vanilla in a large bowl. Mix the cream mixture into the egg yolks a little at a time. Strain the mixture through a fine sieve. Pour the mixture into 4 ramekins. Place the ramekins in a baking dish and fill the baking dish with hot water until it come halfway up the ramekins. Bake in a preheated 300f oven until set, about 50-60 minutes. Remove from hot water bath and let cool to room temperature. ; name: maple custard ; ingredients: eggs, maple syrup, whole milk, salt, nutmeg ; preparation:

name: taverns ; ingredients: water, onion, ground beef, ketchup, chili powder, yellow mustard, hamburger buns ; preparation:Add onions to water in medium saucepan. Boil on medium heat until onions are transparent. Add ground beef and ketchup. Continue cooking on medium heat for 15 minutes. Add mustard and chili powder. Serve on hamburger bun. ; name: hot dog tag alongs ; ingredients: hot dogs, cheddar cheese, onion, pickle relish, prepared mustard, ketchup, chili, hot dog buns ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, stir together all ingredients except buns. Have 12 pieces of aluminum foil ready. Partially hollow out centers of buns. Fill each bun with hot dog mixture. Wrap in aluminium foil, sealing securely. Place on a cookie sheet and bake in a preheated 375 degree fahrenheit oven for 20 minutes or place on top rack of outdoor grill. Cover grill and grill for 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: dressed up burger patties ; ingredients: ground beef, dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, egg, onion, beef broth, fresh mushrooms, water, cornstarch ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients. Shape into patties. Cook and brown patties, add onion, broth and mushrooms. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Heat onion to boiling. Remove patties. Mix water and cornstarch. Add to skillet and stir until thickened. ; name: schroom burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, fresh mushrooms, butter, onion, dry mustard, sour cream, parsley flakes ; preparation:Saut mushrooms and onions in butter till onion is soft but not brown. Stir in dry mustard, sour cream and parsley flakes. Cook till thoroughly heated. Make 6 hamburger patties. Broil or cook as you prefer. Serve topped with mushroom sauce. ; name: hot n spicy cheeseburgers ; ingredients: ground beef, banana pepper, ground cumin, barbecue sauce, cheddar cheese, hamburger buns ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the beef, peppers& cumin. Shape the beef into 1-inch thick patties. On the grill rack, place the patties over medium hot coals. Grill, uncovered until done. Flip burgers and brush often with the bbq sauce. The last minute of grilling place a cheese slice on each burger. Heat until melted. Serve on the toasted buns. These can also be broiled in the oven. ; name: bacon stuffed burgers ; ingredients: bacon, onion, mushroom pieces, lean ground beef, ground pork, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic powder, steak sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Cook bacon until nice crisp. Remove bacon and keep 2 tablespoons of fat drippings. Saute onions in drippings. Crumble bacon with mushrooms add to skillet and set aside. Combine beef, pork, cheese, pepper, garlic powder, and steak sauce. Shape into 16 patties. Divide bacon mixture and place over eight of the patties. Place remaining patties on top and press edges to seal. Fry patties until done. Check for doneness. ; name: sloppy joes sandwiches ; ingredients: ground beef, ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, hamburger buns ; preparation:In a large saucepan, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in the ketchup, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, mustard, garlic powder, onion powder, and salt. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 30-40 minutes. Serve on buns. ; name: stuffers ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, mushrooms, ketchup, relish, cheese, prepared mustard, hot dog buns ; preparation:

name: fried chicken dumplings ; ingredients: ground chicken, ginger, garlic, sweet chili sauce, cornflour, water chestnuts, wonton wrappers, oil ; preparation:Place the minced chicken, ginger, garlic, water chestnut, corn flour and sweet chilli sauce in a bowl and stir till it is combined. Lay a wonton wrapper on a flat surface and brush a little water around the edge of the wrapper. Place 2 teaspoons of the chicken mixture in the middle of the wrapper. Bring the corners together and pinch the edges together to seal. Repeat with the remaining mixture and wonton wrappers. Heat a pan of hot oil, and deep fry them till they are golden brown. ; name: liver dumplings calf pork beef or lamb ; ingredients: liver, onion, butter, soft breadcrumbs, eggs, flour, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Simmer liver in water for a few minutes before grinding and force meat through a food chopper. Fry onion in butter. Add bread crumbs. Combine liver and eggs. Mix well. Add bread crumb mixture. Season to taste. Stir in flour to make a batter stiff enough to drop from the spoon. Drop into a kettle of hot broth or soup. Cover tightly and cook for 30 minutes. Shake pan frequently to prevent dumplings from sticking to each other. ; name: simple grilled pork chops ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, fresh rosemary, salt and pepper, pork rib chops ; preparation:Combine all the ingredients except the pork chops and whisk together. Pour into a re-sealable bag or a covered glass dish. Add the pork chops and toss to coat. Marinate for thirty minutes in the refrigerator. Remove the pork chops from the refrigerator and allow to come to room temperature. Grill over high heat for three minutes on each side. This will sear the meat. Allow to cook for six to eight minutes over medium heat. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and serve immediately. ; name: pork strips ; ingredients: sugar, soy sauce, pork, extra virgin olive oil, mushroom, whole corn, tomatoes and green chilies, water, white rice, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a mixing bowl add the sugar and soy together. Make it more of a marinade sauce than a paste. Add the pork strips and refrigerate at least one hour or over night. When ready to cook add the extra virgin olive oil to a large skillet brown the pork then remove from the skillet add the tomatoes with green chilli, corn and mushrooms. Let them get warm. In a sauce pan bring the water to a boil then add the rice. When the veggies are warm add the sauce in the skillet along with the pork. Put the rice on the bottom of the plate then add the mixture of pork and veggie. Salt and pepper to your liking. Enjoy. ; name: pork chop casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, raw rice, consomme, marjoram, thyme, onion, tomatoes, green pepper, salt and pepper, fat ; preparation:Brown chops in fat in skillet. While browning put rice in bottom of greased casserole and slice vegetables. Lay chops on rice and top each with one slice tomato and one slice pepper. Season as you go. Pour consomme in, add majoram and thyme. Cover and bake in pre-heated 350 degree oven for one hour. ; name: slow cooked oriental pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, vegetable oil, garlic clove, soy sauce, chicken broth, brown sugar, chili pepper flakes, cornstarch, cold water ; preparation:In pan, brown chops both sides in oil then transfer to crockpot. Add garlic to drippings in pan, cook and stir about 1 min or until golden brown. Stir in soy sauce, broth, brown sugar, pepper flakes and cook and stir until dissolved. Pour over chops, cover& cook 7-8 hours on low heat. Remove chops. Combine corn starch& cold water until smooth and stir into slow cooker. Return chops, cover, set to high heat and cook for 20 minutes. Serve over white rice or with a boxed oriental style rice. ; name: perfect pulled pork ; ingredients: boneless pork butt, smoked paprika, black pepper, cayenne, dried thyme, garlic powder, salt, water, sandwich buns ; preparation:Combine all the seasonings in a small bowl and rub evenly over roast. Place meat in a 6-quart slow cooker. Add water. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or high for 4-5 hours or until pork is very tender. Remove pork to a large cutting board or platter and let rest for 10-15 minutes. Pull, slice or chop to serve. Serve in buns with barbecue sauce. ; name: fried pork dumplings ; ingredients: ground pork, green onions, hoisin sauce, low sodium soy sauce, water chestnuts, egg, wonton wrappers, oil ; preparation:
