Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: garlic lemon green beans ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, garlic, lemon juice, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Steam green beans until tender, then drain. Heat olive oil in pan over medium heat and saute garlic 1 minute. Add beans and turn to coat with oil. Add lemon juice, salt& pepper and mix. Serve sprinkled with parmesan cheese. ; name: green bean and parmesan soup ; ingredients: butter, green beans, garlic clove, vegetable stock, parmesan cheese, light cream, salt, black pepper, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium saucepan and add the green beans and garlic cooking for 2-3 minutes over medium heat, stirring frequently. Stir in the stock and season with salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer, uncovered, for 10-15 minutes until beans are tender. Pour soup into a food processor and process until smooth. Return to pan and reheat slowly. Stir in parmesan cheese and cream and sprinkle with parsley. ; name: greens and beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, dried oregano, fresh parsley, escarole, white beans, chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil in saucepan. Stir in garlic and seasoning and saute for 3 minutes. Stir in greens. Cover and cook until wilted. Remove cover and stir in beans. Cook for 3 minutes. Add chicken broth for juice and most importantly, flavor. ; name: parmesan bean fettuccine ; ingredients: salt water, green beans, butter, canadian bacon, fettuccine pasta, parmesan cheese, reduced-fat half-and-half, salt and pepper ; preparation:Bring water to a boil. While water heats, steam beans until they are tender crisp, about 3 minutes. Melt butter in a saute pan and saute canadian bacon until browned, 2-3 minutes. Add beans and toss to coat. Keep warm. Cook pasta in boiling water until al dente. Drain well and toss with beans and bacon in a large bowl. Add parmesan cheese and cream to hot pasta and toss. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve immediately. ; name: greek style green beans ; ingredients: diced tomatoes, water, onions, fresh parsley, garlic, of fresh mint, oregano leaves, salt, black pepper, green beans ; preparation:Wash,. Place in pan with water to cover beans. Simmer uncovered until beans are just tender, stirring a few times. Meanwhile, combine undrained tomatoes with water, onions, parsley, garlic, mint, oregano, salt and pepper in a saucepan. Cover. Bring just to a boil, reduce heat and let simmer 10 minutes, stirring frequently. When tomato sauce is thick, drain green beans and top with sauce. Serve promptly. ; name: green beans parmesan ; ingredients: margarine, shallots, fresh green beans, chicken broth, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: baked garlic catfish ; ingredients: catfish fillets, butter, garlic, breadcrumbs, seasoning salt ; preparation:Preheat over to 375f. Dredge filets in butter. Dredge filets in bread crumbs. Dredge filets in minced garlic. Sprinkle with seasoning salt. Spay small casserole dish add filets and bake covered with foil for 25 minutes. Uncover and broil for 3 or more minutes, depending on if ya want them crispier. Good served with rice and veggie of your choice. ; name: deep fried fish ; ingredients: white fish fillets, plain flour, salt, egg, butter, milk, lemon wedge ; preparation:Half-fill a deep pan with melted fat or oil. Heat until a faint haze rises from it. Sift the flour and salt into a bowl. Beat to a smooth batter, unbeaten egg, butter and milk. Then add the flour and salt mixture. Coat 2 pieces of fish with batter. Lift into the pan with a fork or kitchen tongs. Fry until crisp and golden, allowing about 6-8 minutes for large pieces and 4-5 minutes for medium. Remove from the pan and drain on absorbent kitchen paper. Repeat with the remaining fish. Garnish with lemon wedges. ; name: mediterranean catfish ; ingredients: catfish fillets, olive oil, bell pepper, onion, garlic, chicken broth, diced tomatoes, dried oregano, dried basil, black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add bell pepper, onion and garlic, and saute for 2-3 minutes, or until vegetables are tender. Add chicken broth, tomatoes, oregano, basil and black pepper. Bring to a boil and cook for 2 minutes. Reduce heat to medium-low. Place catfish fillets in the sauce, cover, and simmer for 7-9 minutes, or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Individual fillets with sauce may be served over a bed of cooked rice. ; name: catfish with pecan brown butter ; ingredients: unsalted butter, catfish fillets, salt, fresh ground pepper, cayenne pepper, all-purpose flour, pecans, lemon, zest of, fresh lemon juice, lemon wedge ; preparation:Melt 2 tablespoons of the butter in a large skillet. Season the catfish fillets with salt and pepper and the cayenne. Coat the catfish fillets lightly with flour, then add them to the skillet and cook over moderately high heat, turning once, until golden brown on both sides and cooked though, about 10 minutes. Transfer the catfish fillets to a platter. Tent with foil and keep warm. Melt the remaining 4 tablespoons of butter in the skillet. Add the pecans and cook over moderately high heat, until the pecans and butter are browned and fragrant, about 3 minutes. Stir in the lemon zest and juice and season with salt. Spoon the pecan butter over the catfish fillets and serve immediately with lemon wedges. ; name: beer battered fish ; ingredients: vegetable oil, cod fish fillets, salt and pepper, all-purpose flour, garlic powder, paprika, salt, ground black pepper, egg, beer ; preparation:Heat oil in a deep fryer to 365 degrees f. Rinse fish, pat dry, and season with salt and pepper. Combine flour, garlic powder, paprika, 2 teaspoons salt, and 2 teaspoons pepper. Stir egg into dry ingredients. Gradually mix in one beer until a thin batter is formed. You should be able to see the fish through the batter after it has been dipped. Dip fish fillets into the batter, then drop one at a time into hot oil. Fry fish, turning once, until both sides are golden brown. Drain on paper towels, and serve warm. ; name: bistro catfish ; ingredients: sun-dried tomato packed in oil, garlic, catfish fillets, salt and pepper, fresh spinach ; preparation:Heat 2 tablespoons reserved oil in a large skillet, over medium heat. Saute garlic for 1 to 2 minutes or until golden. Sprinkle both sides of the fish with salt and pepper. Place fish in the skillet. Cover, and cook for 8 to 10 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Add the spinach and sun-dried tomatoes to the skillet. Cover and cook for 1 to 2 minutes, or until spinach is wilted but still bright green. Place the spinach on a serving plate. Top with fish fillets. Drizzle pan drippings on top and serve. ; name: crispy baked fish ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, whole wheat bread crumbs, fresh ground black pepper, parsley, reduced-calorie mayonnaise, water, hot pepper sauce, fish fillets, lemon wedges ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly spray a baking sheet with vegetable oil spray and set aside. Sprinkle crumbs onto an ungreased baking sheet and allow to bake 5-7 minutes or until lightly browned. Combine bread crumbs, black pepper and parsley in a shallow pan and set aside. Raise oven temperature to 400f. Combine mayonnaise, water and hot pepper sauce in shallow bowl, mixing well. Dip fish in mayonnaise mixture and then dredge in bread crumbs. Place fish on greased baking sheet and bake in oven 17-18 or until fish flakes easily. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: catfish salt and pepper catfish ; ingredients: buttermilk, catfish fillets, cornmeal, flour, sea salt, black pepper, vegetable oil ; preparation:

name: chocolate mousse ; ingredients: evaporated milk, vanilla extract, sugar, chocolate chips, salt, heavy whipping cream, chocolate curls, fresh strawberries ; preparation:In blender, combine the milk, vanilla, sugar, chocolate and salt. Cover and process until smooth, about 1 minute. Transfer to a large bowl. In small mixing bowl, beat cream until soft peaks form. Fold into chocolate mixture. Spoon into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until serving. Garnish with chocolate curls and strawberries, if desired. ; name: weight watchers ww strawberry mousse ; ingredients: strawberries, low-fat cream cheese, sugar-free strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, egg whites ; preparation:Mix the strawberries with the cream cheese until the berries are slightly broken up and the cheese in pinky in hue. Make up the jello according to the packet and pour over the strawberry mix. Stir well and leave until just starting to set. Whisk the egg whites until stiff peaks and fold into the strawberry mix. Spoon the mix into glasses and chill for one hour. ; name: cream cheese strawberry mousse weight watchers ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, light cream cheese, powdered sugar, frozen fat-free whipped topping ; preparation:Process first 3 ingredients in a food processor until smooth. Transfer strawberry mixture to a large bowl. Fold in whipped topping. Spoon into 6 dessert dishes. Cover and chill at least 4 hours. ; name: cream filled strawberries ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, nonfat milk, sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix, reduced-fat whipped topping, almond extract ; preparation:Remove stems from strawberries. Cut a deep x in the top of each berry. Spread berries apart. In a bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Fold in whipping topping and almond extract. Pipe or spoon about 5 teaspoons into each berry. Chill until serving. ; name: coffee and cream mousse ; ingredients: heavy cream, instant coffee granules, splenda granular, vanilla extract, sugar-free instant vanilla pudding mix ; preparation:Pour the cream into a large mixing bowl. Gently stir in the instant coffee until dissolved. Gently stir in the splenda and vanilla. Gradually whisk in the pudding mix until no longer grainy, then briskly whisk until thick. Chill well before serving. Can be frozen. ; name: french vanilla coffee mousse ; ingredients: heavy whipping cream, instant coffee, semisweet chocolate, milk chocolate candy bars, vanilla extract, sugar ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, combine 1 cup cream and coffee. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Remove from heat. In a medium bowl, combine chocolates. Through a fine-mesh strainer, strain cream mixture over chocolates. Stir until chocolates are melted. In a medium bowl, beat remaining 2 cups cream and vanilla at high speed with an electric mixer until soft peaks form. Gradually add sugar, beating until stiff peaks form. Fold whipped cream mixture into chocolate mixture. Cover and chill. Chilling can take up to 4 hours. ; name: strawberry special blender dessert ; ingredients: strawberry, heavy cream, sugar, vanilla extract ; preparation:Put strawberries in a blender and blend until the berries are just mashed up. You may need to add a little of the cream to get the mixture going. Add the other remaining ingrediets and blend for 30 seconds or so. Put mixture into 4 individual serving dishes and chill. When ready serve, add whipped cream if desired. ; name: american cancer society strawberry mousse ; ingredients: fresh strawberries, sugar, low-fat sour cream, reduced-calorie whipped topping ; preparation:

name: finnish baked mushrooms ; ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, onions, butter, salt and pepper, flour, heavy cream, egg yolks, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix the breadcrumbs with 1 tbsp butter and toast until golden brown, stirring often to prevent burning. To the sliced mushrooms add the lemon juice, onion, butter, salt, and pepper. Saute until onions tender. Heat the cream to just short of the boiling point. Stir the flour into the mushrooms, stirring rapidly to prevent lumping. Stir in a bit of the cream. Stir in each egg yolk separately. Stir in the remaining cream. Cook, covered, until the sauce is just short of boiling. Sprinkle with the toasted bread crumbs and let sit 5 minutes before serving. Half and half is better than milk and whipping cream is best of all. ; name: baked mushroom bacon rice ; ingredients: basmati rice, bacon, butter, celery, onion, fresh mushrooms, chicken broth, garlic, fresh ground black pepper, dried oregano ; preparation:Pre-heat the oven to 425 f or 220 c. If you are using a fan assisted oven, you can cut the heat by about 10 percent. In a large skillet, melt the butter and saut the rice and bacon for two minutes. Add the celery, onion and mushrooms. Cook and stir for a further 2-4 minutes, until the vegetables just start to soften. Pour into a large casserole dish. Stir in the broth and garlic. Add a generous amount of black pepper and a couple pinches of oregano. Mix well. Cover and bake for 30 minutes, or until the liquid is absorbed and the rice is cooked. ; name: company rice ; ingredients: butter, long grain rice, consomme, green onions, water, button mushrooms, oregano ; preparation:Put washed rice in a 2 quart casserole. Add remaining ingredients and stir well. Cook, covered, at 350 for 30 minutes. Uncover and stir well. Replace lid and continue to cook for another 30 minutes. ; name: creamy rice with peas and mushrooms ; ingredients: onion, italian dressing, fresh mushrooms, chicken broth, frozen peas, quick-cooking rice, cream cheese, lemon peel, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook and stir onion in dressing in large saucepan on medium-high heat for 2 minutes or until tender. Add mushrooms. Cook 2 to 3 minutes, or until mushrooms are tender. Add broth and peas. Stir. Bring to boil. Stir in rice and cream cheese. Cover. Remove from heat. Let stand 8 minutes. Stir in lemon peel and parmesan cheese. Garnish with lemon slices and fresh dill, if desired. ; name: mushroom barley casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, water, barley, onion and mushroom soup mix, dried thyme, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook onion in hot, melted butter over med heat until tender. Add in mushrooms and garlic. Cook about 5 minutes or until mushrooms are tender, stirring occasionally. Transfer mixture to a greased 3-quart baking dish. Stir in the water, barley, dry soup mix, thyme, and salt. Bake, covered, at 350 for about 1 hour and 15 minutes or until barley is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed, stirring once or twice. Let stand, covered, for 15 minutes before serving. ; name: vegetable barley bake ; ingredients: sweet red peppers, mushrooms, onions, butter, vegetable broth, pearl barley, pepper ; preparation:In a large non-stick skillet, saute the peppers, mushrooms, and onions in butter until tender. Transfer to a 13-inch by 9-inch by 2-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Stir in the broth, barley, and pepper. Cover and bake at 350f for 50 minutes. Uncover and bake for another 5-10 minutes or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed. ; name: salmon rice bake ; ingredients: water, carrots, onion, chicken bouillon powder, broccoli floret, instant rice, condensed cream of mushroom soup, canned pink salmon, paprika ; preparation:Combine water, carrot, onion and bouillon powder in a large saucepan. Cover and cook until onion is almost tender. Add broccoli. Cook for 4 minutes. Do not drain. Stir in rice. Cover and let stand for 5 minutes. Add soup and salmon. Stir to mix well. Turn into greased 2 qt casserole dish. Sprinkle with paprika if desired. Cover and bake at 350f for 30 minutes. ; name: mushroom rice bake ; ingredients: water, salt, long-grain rice, fresh mushrooms, onion, butter, cream cheese, eggs, evaporated milk ; preparation:

name: chocolatey hot cocoa for one ; ingredients: unsweetened cocoa, sugar, milk, vanilla extract, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, marshmallows, whipped cream ; preparation:In a small, heavy saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar, crushing any lumps. First by approximately tablespoons, and then in a slow steady stream, stir in the milk. Heat over medium heat, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom of the pan, just until bubbles appear at the sides. Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla or liqueur. Top with ground nutmeg or cinnamon, whipped cream or marshmallows. ; name: snow capped cinnamon hot cocoa ; ingredients: milk, chocolate flavored syrup, ground cinnamon, sweetened whipped cream, miniature semisweet chocolate chips, cinnamon sticks ; preparation:Combine milk and syrup in 1-quart microwave-safe bowl. Microwave on high power for 5 minutes or until hot. Stir in ground cinnamon. Pour into 4 large mugs. Garnish with whipped cream, morsels and cinnamon sticks. ; name: orange cocoa ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, water, milk, orange rind, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar. Add water. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Allow to boil for two minutes, still stirring. Add milk and orange peel and heat to serving temperature. Add vanilla and serve. ; name: dutch cocoa spread ; ingredients: dutch-processed cocoa powder, hot water, sugar, salt, butter, vanilla extract ; preparation:In a small bowl, sift the cocoa powder. Transfer it to the top of a double boiler. Slowl whisk in the water, then the sugar and salt, until the mixture is smooth. Cook over simmering water, whisking constantly, until the sugar dissolves, about 1 minute. Remove pan from heat. Whisk in the butter, one bit at a time, beating just until the butter melts and is absorbed. Whisk in the vanilla. Let the mixture cool completely, then rewhisk it to aerate the butter. Transfer to a covered container. Refrigerate for up to 1 month. Bring to room temperature before serving. ; name: low carb sugar free spiced cocoa ; ingredients: unsweetened cocoa powder, fructevia, ground cinnamon, ground cardamom, ground nutmeg, salt, milk, hot water, vanilla extract ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine cocoa, steviva brand stevia blend, fructevia or steviva brand stevia powder, cinnamon, cardamom, nutmeg, and salt. Blend in hot water. Bring to a boil over medium heat. Boil, stirring for 2 minutes. Add milk. Stir and heat thoroughly, but do not boil. Remove from heat. Stir in vanilla. Beat until foamy. Serve hot with cinnamon sticks, if desired. ; name: cocoa cake brownies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking cocoa, baking powder, salt ; preparation:In a bowl, combine the butter and sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, stirring well after each addition. Stir in vanilla. Combine the flour, cocoa, baking powder and salt. Gradually add to butter mixture. Stir until moistened. Transfer to a greased 13x9x2-inch baking pan. Bake at 350 for 20-25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. ; name: cocoa dreams ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, butter, milk, quick oats, peanut butter, vanilla ; preparation:In large pan bring first 4 ingredients to a boil. Boil for 1 minute. Remove from heat. Add remaining ingredients and mix well. Drop by tablespoonfuls on waxed paper to set--they are not baked. ; name: special dark cocoa ; ingredients: dark cocoa, splenda brown sugar blend, cinnamon, chili powder, water, milk, vanilla, cinnamon stick, whipped cream ; preparation:

name: spaghetti with zucchini and garlic ; ingredients: zucchini, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, spaghetti, parmigiano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Pile up 2 or 3 layers of paper towels on a work surface. Working on the paper towels, shred zucchinis using a grater holding the zucchini at an angle. Heat a large skillet over moderate heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil to the pan add chopped garlic to the oil. When garlic starts sizzling in oil, add shredded zucchini. Season zucchini with salt and pepper. Saute shredded zucchini 7 to 10 minutes. Add hot, drained pasta to the pan. Toss spaghetti with zucchini and garlic oil. Add a couple of handfuls of grated cheese to the pan. Adjust seasoning and serve. ; name: cherry tomato caper spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, olive oil, garlic clove, red chili pepper, cherry tomatoes, capers, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Boil the spaghetti. Meanwhile, heat the oil in a small non-stick pan, add the garlic and fry, stirring all the time, until golden. Add the chili, tomatoes and capers and fry for a further 3-4 mins until the tomatoes start to break down. Add 2 tbsp of the pasta cooking water to the tomatoes, then drain the pasta and return to the pan. Pour in the tomato sauce and toss everything together well. Serve as it is or sprinkled with freshly grated parmesan. ; name: tomato and bell pepper spaghetti ; ingredients: whole wheat spaghetti, olive oil, green pepper, grape tomatoes, parmesan cheese, garlic, oregano, basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. While the spaghetti is cooking, heat a large saut pan over medium heat with olive oil. Saut green peppers. Add tomatoes and herbs once pepper softens. Heat until warmed. Combine pasta and tomato mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top and fold edges of pasta toward the center. Heat until warm. Transfer to plate, stir, and serve. ; name: spaghetti with summer tomatoes ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, yellow cherry tomato, shallots, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt, pepper, spaghetti, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large skillet combine cherry tomatoes, yellow cherry tomatoes, shallots, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Simmer for 5 minutes or until tomatoes are tender. Remove from heat. Bring a pot of water to a boil over high heat. Add spaghetti and cook according to package directions. Just before pasta is done reheat sauce. Slice basil leaves and add to the sauce. Drain pasta and return to pot. Add sauce to pasta and toss. Serve. ; name: spaghetti and fried eggs ; ingredients: salt, thin spaghetti, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, eggs, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a pot of salted water to the boil. Start the sauce in the next step, and start cooking the pasta when the water boils. Combine garlic and 4 tablespoons of the oil in a small skillet over medium-low heat. Cook the garlic, pressing it into the oil occasionally to release its flavor. It should barely color on both sides. Remove the garlic, and add the remaining oil. Fry the eggs gently in the oil, until the whites are just about set and the yolks still quite runny. Drain the pasta, and toss with the eggs and oil, breaking up the whites as you do. Season to taste, and serve immediately, with cheese if you like. ; name: lemon spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, olive oil, parmesan cheese, fresh lemon juice, salt, pepper, lemon zest, fresh basil ; preparation:Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling, salted water according to package directions stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes. Meanwhile, whisk the olive oil, parmesan cheese and lemon juice in a large bowl. Drain the pasta, reserving 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Toss the pasta with the lemon sauce, and add the reserved cooking liquid and toss again. Season with the salt & pepper. Garnish with lemon zest and chopped basil. ; name: italian spaghetti frittata ; ingredients: spaghetti, parmesan cheese, butter, fresh parsley, eggs, salt & pepper ; preparation:Drain the spaghetti and stir in the cheese, 3 tbsp butter and the parsley. Let it cool slightly. Add salt& pepper to the beaten eggs. In a large non stick skillet heat remaining butter, over medium heat until foaming but not brown pour in the spagetti mixture and spread evenly. Cook for 4-5 minutes until the bottom is brown. Loosen with a spatula and invert onto a plate. Slide the frittata back into the pan and cook the other side until golden 3-4 minutes. ; name: home from work spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, streaky bacon, zucchini, cherry tomatoes, olive oil, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: country style scrambled eggs ; ingredients: bacon, red potatoes, onion, green pepper, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Using a slotted spoon, remove to paper towels to drain. Cook and stir potatoes in drippings over medium heat for 12 minutes or until tender. Add onion and green pepper. Cook and stir for 3 or 4 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Stir in the reserved bacon. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Add to skillet. Cook and stir until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand until cheese has melted. ; name: southern egg scrambled breakfast ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, cheddar cheese, ham, onion, fresh mushrooms, green bell pepper, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. Saute until onions are translucent and tender. Add diced ham and stir until steaming. In the meantime, in large mixing bowl, crack and add the dozen eggs, salt and pepper to taste, one heaping tablespoon of sour cream. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny. ; name: scrambled egg and bacon sandwich ; ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, egg, water, salt and pepper, bacon ; preparation:Slice the 2 slices bacon in half and cook to a crisp. Drain on paper towel, and pour drippings out of pan. Whip egg with water, add salt and pepper and scramble eggs in same pan in which the bacon was cooked. Remove egg to cool. After bread has toasted, spread with mayo and layer on eggs and bacon. Slice and serve with favorite breakfast beverage. ; name: creamy cheesy scrambled eggs ; ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, butter, light spreadable cheese with garlic and herbs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Over medium to medium low heat, melt butter in frying pan. Add the wedges of laughing cow cheese and slowly melt. In mixing bowl, crack and whisk eggs until puffy. Add eggs to pan & turn with a spatula. When the eggs are pretty well set, add the shredded cheddar and take the pan off the heat. Mix the cheddar in by folding over the eggs until cheddar is melted. Serve immediately. ; name: make ahead breakfast ; ingredients: sausage, bread, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, mustard ; preparation:Brown sausage in skillet and drain well. Grease 13 x 9 inch casserole dish. Line dish with bread, then top with cheese and sausage. In bowl, combine eggs, milk, and seasonings. Beat well and pour into casserole. Refrigerate overnight. In the morning, bake casserole at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: bacon spinach and egg scramble ; ingredients: egg, egg whites, fresh spinach, bacon, milk, shredded cheddar cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Fry chopped bacon in a non stick skillet. Beat together egg, egg whites, milk, salt, and pepper. When bacon is almost done, add chopped spinach and saute until just wilted. Add egg mixture and scramble. Top with cheddar cheese. ; name: hominy bacon and eggs scramble ; ingredients: yellow hominy, eggs, green pepper, bacon, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Fry bacon in skillet. Set bacon aside. Reserve two tbs bacon drippings, turn heat down,. Drain hominy, add to skillet along with the green pepper. Allow to cook until pepper is tender, about 5 minutes on med heat. Beat eggs and pour over hominy mixture in skillet. Stir until eggs are just set. Crumble bacon and add to mixture. Sprinkle cheese on top. ; name: scrambled breakfast ; ingredients: eggs, bacon, onion, green pepper, red pepper, cheddar and colby cheese ; preparation:

name: roasted red pepper and feta spread ; ingredients: feta cheese, roasted red pepper, olive oil, fresh oregano, jalapeno peppers, fresh lemon juice, sea salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Blend feta and roasted red peppers in blender until nearly pureed. Blend in olive oil and oregano. Blend in minced jalepenos, lemon juice, and salt and pepper to taste. Transfer mixture to bowl, cover and chill 2 hours. Serve on bread, crackers, or on burgers, pasta, or potatoes. ; name: red pepper hummus ; ingredients: garlic cloves, garbanzo beans, tahini, fresh lemon juice, jar, salt and pepper ; preparation:Wtih processor running, drop garlic through feed tube and mince. Scrape down sides of work bowl. Add chickpeas, tahini and lemon juice. Process until mixture is smooth. Add roasted peppers. Process until peppers are finely chopped. Season with salt and pepper. Transfer hummus to small bowl. ; name: chickpea feta and olive salad ; ingredients: chickpeas, feta cheese, cherries, black olives, flat leaf parsley, lettuce, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic clove, salt ; preparation:Place the chickpeas in a bowl and add the feta cheese cubes. Cut the tomatoes in half if necessary, to make them bite-sized. Add tomatoes to the chickpeas and feta cheese mixture. Add the black olives, parsley, and lettuce. Combine dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over chickpea mixture, toss gently, and chill. Serve chilled or at room temperature. ; name: spicy hummus ; ingredients: lemon, juice of, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, black pepper, dried ancho pepper, hot sauce, cumin, sesame seeds, chickpeas ; preparation:Drain 1 can of chick peas and use the other with the liquid. Add ingredients to blender in order listed. Mixture will be very thick and may need tamping. Blend until smooth. Taste, and adjust seasoning to your liking. This makes a large batch of hummus. It keeps very well in the fridge. ; name: chickpeas chorizo beans and sausage ; ingredients: red onions, extra virgin olive oil, red bell peppers, chorizo sausages, chickpeas, parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Saute onions in oil in a large pan or wok over medium heat for 5 minutes. Add the chopped peppers and cook for 10 minutes, stirring occasionally. Move the vegetables to one side of the pan. Add the sliced chorizo to the cleared space and brown on both sides. Cook chorizo for 10 minutes or until cooked through, stirring occasionally. Add chickpeas and mix together. When heated through season with the salt and pepper to taste. Serve. ; name: garlicky hummus ; ingredients: garlic, garbanzo beans, lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, part-skim ricotta cheese, salt, fresh ground black pepper, paprika, allspice, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Wrap garlic heads in aluminum foil. Cook in oven until very soft, about 30 minutes. Remove from oven, and allow to cool in the foil. When cool, cut each head in half horizontally, and squeeze cloves into the bowl of a food processor. Add remaining ingredients, and puree until smooth. Add up to 2 tablespoons water if mixture is too thick. Refrigerate in an airtight container, up to 3 days, until ready to serve. Great served with pita chip or crackers. ; name: feta topped broiled chicken ; ingredients: no-added-salt tomato paste, red wine vinegar, dried rosemary, dried oregano, paprika, salt, fresh ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, tomatoes, feta cheese ; preparation:In a small bowl, stir together the tomato paste, vinegar, rosemary, oregano, paprika, salt, and pepper. Rub the mixture onto the chichen breasts and set aside. Preheat the broiler. Broil the chicken 6 inches from the heat, turning once. Broil for 6 min or until chicken is cooked through. Top the chicken with tomato slices and broil for 1 minute. Top with the feta and broil for 1 min, or untill the cheese is melting. Place the chicken breasts on 4 plates and serve. ; name: red pepper feta and garlic hummus ; ingredients: chickpeas, red peppers, garlic, feta cheese, hot red pepper sauce, pepper, salt ; preparation:

name: coffee with coconut milk ; ingredients: coconut milk, sweetened coconut, coffee, sugar ; preparation:In a casserole, heat the coconut milk and coconut at medium heat. Let simmer 15 to 20 minutes or until the mixture is creamy. Strain the mixture. Set aside. Grill the coconut in a preheated oven of 350 f until lightly gril. Set aside. Distribute the coconut milk and coffee in 4 mugs equally. Put sugar if you want and gasnish with grilled coconut. ; name: indian spiced coffee ; ingredients: water, cardamom pods, cinnamon stick, nutmeg, clove, brewed coffee, milk, sugar ; preparation:In a medium-size pot, bring water to a boil. Stir in the spices, cover, and simmer over low heat for 5 minutes. Stir in the pre-brewed coffee. Meanwhile, in a saucepan, heat milk until almost boiling. Strain the coffee through a fine mesh strainer covered with cheesecloth into the milk. Add sweetener, stir, and serve in mugs. ; name: spiced rum breakfast coffee ; ingredients: ground coffee, cinnamon stick, cardamom seeds, rum extract, water, milk, sugar ; preparation:In basket of drip coffee make place coffee grounds, cinnamon stick, and the 3 cardamom seed pods broken open. Add 10 cups of water and brew. When done brewing add 1 teaspoon rum extract to brewed coffee. Serve. Can add milk and sweetener if you like. ; name: spiced iced coffee ; ingredients: hot coffee, sugar, cinnamon sticks, cloves, allspice, black peppercorns, half-and-half ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Stir well. Let stand at room temperature 1 hour. Strain and serve over cracked ice. Serve with half-and-half and sugar. ; name: coffee almond macaroons ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, coffee, vanilla, flaked coconut, slivered almonds ; preparation:In a big bowl, mix condensed milk with coffee and vanilla. Stir in coconut and almonds. Mix well. Drop spoonfuls onto wax paper-lined cookie sheets. Bake on middle rack of preheated 325 degree oven, 10-12 minutes or until browned around the edges. Remove immediately to wire racks. Cool completely. ; name: honey coffee ; ingredients: brewed coffee, milk, honey, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, vanilla extract ; preparation:In small saucepan, combine the coffee, milk, honey, cinnamon and nutmeg. Cook and stir until heated through. Remove from the heat. Stir in vanilla. Pour into cups or mugs. Serve immediately. ; name: philippine mung beans in coconut milk ; ingredients: mung beans, onion, vegetable oil, salt, fresh gingerroot, fresh chili pepper, garlic cloves, coconut milk, soy sauce, chard leaves ; preparation:Soak the beans in water for several hours or overnight. Drain, then cook them until tender. Drain. While the beans are cooking, saute the onions in the oil with salt. When translucent, add ginger, chiles, and garlic. Simmer on low heat for a few minutes. Add the coconut milk and simmer for 5 more minutes. Combine the beans and the coconut milk mixture in a large pot. Add the soy sauce and chard, and cook until the chard wilts. Remove from heat and serve. ; name: spiced coconut coffee ; ingredients: coffee beans, crushed red pepper flakes, whole cloves, cinnamon sticks, water, coconut milk, honey ; preparation:

name: potato salad with bacon and parsley ; ingredients: new potatoes, kosher salt, black pepper, bacon, extra virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, dijon mustard, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Place potatoes in water and 1 tsp salt and simmer until tender, about 15 to 18 minutes. Drain and run under cold water to cool. Cut into quarters. Meanwhile, cook bacon in skillet untel crisp. Crumble when cooled. Whisk oil, vinegar, mustard, remaining salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Toss with the potatoes, bacon and parsley. ; name: bacon and cheddar potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, green onion, bacon, milk, apple cider vinegar ; preparation:In a 4-quart saucepan, cover potatoes with water and bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer uncovered 10 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Drain and cool slightly. While potatoes are cooking, combine remaining ingredients in a large bowl. Add potatoes and toss to coat. Season, if desired, with salt and ground black pepper. ; name: dijon potato salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, olive oil, parsley, salt & pepper ; preparation:Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Tossing occasionally. In a serving bowl, combine vinegar and dijon. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper, and toss. ; name: new york style potato salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, lemon juice, vegetable oil, salt and pepper, celery ribs, hard-boiled eggs, red onion, fresh parsley, mayonnaise, cider vinegar ; preparation:Boil the potatoes just until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain, peel and dice. Toss with the lemon juice, oil and salt and pepper to taste. Let cool. Add the celery, eggs, chopped red onion, and parsley toss gently. Combine 1 cup mayonnaise with vinegar, blend well then toss over the potato salad, gently folding until completely coated. Add more mayonnaise, if necessary. ; name: potato salad with mustard and honey ; ingredients: baby potatoes, bacon, spring onions, white wine vinegar, honey, coarse grain mustard, olive oil ; preparation:Cut any larger potatoes in half, then cook until tender. Drain and cool. Put the baking on a baking tray and grill until crisp. Cool and break up into pieces. Thinly slice the spring onions on the diagonal. Mix together the potato, bacon and spring onions in a bowl. To make the mustard and honey dressing, put all ingredients into a screw top jar and shake until well mixed. Pour over the potato salad. ; name: warmed herbed potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, rice wine vinegar, dry white wine, dijon mustard, salt, ground pepper, red onion, fresh parsley, fresh herbs ; preparation:Cook potatoes until tender. While potatoes are cooking, combine olive oil, rice wine vinegar, wine if using, mustard, salt and pepper in large mixing bowl. Whisk well. When potatoes are tender peel or not. Dice potatoes. Add to dressing. Add the onions, parsley and herbs, and toss all gently to combine. Serve warm. Leftovers can be served cold, or reheated gently in microwave. ; name: bacon and chipotle potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, salt, sour cream, mayonnaise, pepper sauce, dijon mustard, garlic, bacon, hard-cooked eggs ; preparation:Place potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with water. Add 2 teaspoons salt and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook 12 to 15 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Drain and cool. Meanwhile in a small bowl, combine sour cream, mayonaise, tabasco sauce, mustard and garlic. Mix well. Place potaotes in a large bowl with bacon and eggs. Add dressing and toss to coat. Season to taste with salt. Cover and refrigerate. ; name: potato and bacon salad ; ingredients: small red potatoes, bacon, olive oil, chicken broth, whole grain dijon mustard, apple cider vinegar, salt, black pepper, green onion, parsley ; preparation:

name: brown sugar brownies ; ingredients: golden brown sugar, butter, eggs, unsweetened chocolate, all-purpose flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat over to 325 degrees. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool in pan and cut into bars. ; name: milk brownies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, margarine, eggs, sugar, vanilla, self-rising flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: sinful brownies ; ingredients: butter, dark chocolate, eggs, sugar, golden syrup, plain flour, cocoa, salt, nuts ; preparation:Pre heat oven 180c. Butter 20cm square cake tin. Melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares. ; name: ghirardelli brownies ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla, butter, ghirardelli sweet ground chocolate and cocoa, flour, baking powder, salt, walnuts, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Grease a 8x8 inch baking pan and set aside. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a medium bowl stir together the eggs, sugar and vanilla. Mix well. Add butter mixing to incorporate. Sift the ground chocolate with the flour, baking powder and salt. Stir into the egg mixture and add the walnuts. Spread into the prepared baking pan. Bake for 20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: sugar brownies with chocolate chips ; ingredients: milk, french vanilla liquid coffee creamer, baking powder, butter, sugar, vanilla extract, flour, egg, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pour ingredients into a mixing bowl. Mix until slightly lumpy. Add chocolate chips. Pour onto cookie sheet and spread. Heat the oven to 400f and bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: butterbrickle brownies ; ingredients: margarine, white sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, chocolate-covered toffee bits, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl, beat the margarine, white and brown sugars together until fluffy. Add eggs and vanilla, beat well. In another bowl, sift flour, baking powder, and salt. Add to the creamed mixture, stirring well. Fold in butter brickle bits, and chocolate chips. Spread in a greased 9x13-inch pan. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Can be frosted with chocolate frosting. ; name: dark chocolate butterscotch brownies ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, sugar, egg whites, vanilla, flour, bittersweet chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Melt together butter and unsweetend chocolate in microwave, stir until smooth, then cool slightly. In a large bowl, combine sugar and chocolate mixture. Stir in egg whites and vanilla. Stir in flour. Stir in the chips. Spread into greased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Melt together chips and butter, stir until smooth. Spread over warm brownies. Cool completely before cutting. ; name: nestle golden brownies ; ingredients: unsifted flour, baking powder, salt, butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, nestle semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: spiced couscous ; ingredients: butter, oil, onion, curry powder, cumin, cayenne pepper, couscous, chicken broth, salt ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat butter and oil over medium heat. Saute onion until softened, about 5 minutes. Add curry, cumin and cayenne, stirring constantly, for 1 minute. Adjust heat to medium-high, add couscous, blend well and cook 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add chicken broth, stir to incorporate, and bring to boiling point. Cover pan, remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork, season with salt if needed, and serve hot. ; name: butterflied grilled chicken with curry and cumin ; ingredients: chicken, curry powder, cumin, salt ; preparation:Rinse split chicken and pat dry, lay on cutting board skin side up and push on breastbone to flatten. Combine the curry, cumin and salt and rub half of it over both sides of the chicken. Start at the neck and insert you finger to separate skin from flesh, then season the flesh under the skin with the rest of the mixture. Let chicken absorb flavors for 45 minutes before cooking. Grill chicken until internal temperature reaches 165. Chicken can alternatively be broiled or baked. ; name: crock pot curried chicken rice ; ingredients: curry powder, green onion, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, olive oil, cayenne pepper, chicken, minute rice, chicken broth ; preparation:Combine curry, onion, ginger, oil and cayenne in a medium mixing bowl. Stir in meat, working spice mixture into meat with fingers. Place in ziploc and refrigerate 1 24 hours. Brown meat mixture and place in crock pot. Add rice and broth to crock pot and mix well. Cook on low 3-4 hours or until chicken is cooked through and all liquid is absorbed. ; name: lentils couscous recipe ; ingredients: lentils, couscous, onions, olive oil, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, cayenne ; preparation:Saute onions with olive oil until golden brown. Reserve 4 tablespoons of browned onions for garnish. Meanwhile place lentils, water salt, and black pepper in a different saucepan and cook for around 20 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add couscous, browned onions, cumin, and dash of cayenne to the lentils, stir, cover and simmer for about 5-10 minutes or until water is absorbed. Place lentils and couscous in serving dish and garnish with 4 tablespoons of reserved browned onions. This recipe is best when served with tomatoe salad. See my recipe for tomatoe salad. ; name: couscous with peas and parmesan ; ingredients: couscous, chicken broth, butter, parmesan cheese, frozen peas, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Bring chicken broth to a boil. Add butter, parmesan and cous cous and return to a boil. Remove from heat. Add peas and cover for five minutes. Fluff with fork and add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: india chicken curry ; ingredients: onion, celery, margarine, flour, curry powder, chicken broth, worcestershire sauce, chicken, tomato juice, rice ; preparation:In a medium saucepan cook the onion and celery in hot margarine or butter until tender. Stir in flour and curry powder. Add the chicken broth and worcestershire sauce. Cook and stir until bubbly. Stir in the cooked chicken and tomato juice. Heat through. Season with salt and pepper if desired. Serve over hot rice. ; name: peppermint tea couscous ; ingredients: peppermint tea bag, couscous, cumin, chicken broth, water, raisins, salt and pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:Boil water and broth. When water is boiling add peppermint tea bag to water and lower heat. After 3 minutes, remove the tea bag. Add cumin and couscous and stir. Stir in raisins and pepper and salt. If using bouillon do not add salt. Remove pan from heat and cover tightly. After ten minutes, fluff couscous and serve. Garnish with slivered almonds. ; name: chicken curried couscous skillet ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, cumin, pepper, chicken broth, curry powder, couscous, frozen peas, raisins ; preparation:

name: brunch panini ; ingredients: provolone cheese, country bread, prosciutto, raspberry jam, eggs, butter ; preparation:Preheat a panini press. Divide half the cheese among 4 slices of the bread, then top with the prosciutto. Spread 1 tablespoon jam on each and top with the remaining cheese. Set the remaining bread slices in place. In a shallow bowl, beat the eggs with the butter. Working in batches, dip both slices of each sandwich in the egg mixture and place in the panini press. Grill until the bread is crisp and golden, about 3 minutes. ; name: panini with scrambled eggs and tomatoes ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, fresh black pepper, olive oil, pesto sauce, panini bread, tomatoes, provolone cheese ; preparation:In a bowl, mix eggs, milk, salt and pepper. In a skillet, heat oil at medium heat. Add the mixture of egg and cook, stirring often, until it makes big creamy pieces. Spread pesto in the panini, add scrambled eggs and garnish with slices of tomatoes and cheese. Heat another large skillet or a skillet with ridges at medium heat. Add panini and cook, pushing them, for about 8 minutes or until golden and crispy and cheese has melted. ; name: roasted red pepper provolone panini ; ingredients: bread, prosciutto, roasted red pepper, provolone cheese, olive oil ; preparation:Place prosciutto, pepper, and cheese on bread. Heat grill pan and have something heavy near by to weigh down the lid. Lighty oil pan and add panini. Press down on top with another pan or heavy plate, cook untill ightly browned. Flip and cook other side. Enoy. Add whatever additions. ; name: scrambled egg and breakfast sausage panini ; ingredients: butter, green onions, breakfast sausage, pecan pieces, eggs, salt and pepper, italian bread, bocconcini, fresh fruit ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add the onions, sausages and pecans. Saut until onions are just softened, about 3 minutes. Add eggs and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon, until eggs are firm but not dry. Remove from heat and set aside. Meanwhile, heat a panini maker or a grill pan over medium-high heat. Divide sausage mixture into 4 portions and mound each portion on one slice of bread. Top each with bocconcini slices and top with remaining bread slices. Lightly butter the outside of each panini. Cook until both sides of each panini are golden. Serve immediately. Serve warm and garnish with maple syrup and fresh fruit if desired. ; name: italian fried sandwiches ; ingredients: french mustard, bread, cheddar cheese, salami, eggs, olive oil, salt and pepper, oil ; preparation:Spread the mustard evenly over the buttered side of the bread. Arrange the cheese on four slices, and top with the salami and remaining bread. Press firmly together. Beat the eggs and olive oil together, adding salt and pepper to taste. Heat the cooking oil in a frying pan. Dip each sandwich into the egg mixture, fry 2 sandwiches at a time until golden brown, turning with a spatula to crisp both sides. Drain on absorbent kitchen paper and serve. ; name: english muffin panini with goat cheese and tomato ; ingredients: english muffins, pesto sauce, goat cheese, tomatoes, radicchio ; preparation:Spread toasted side of each english muffin half with pesto. Spread cheese over 4 english muffin halves. Top with tomato slices, radicchio, and remaining english muffin halves. Spray panini with cooking spray. Coat skillet or grill pan with cooking spray and heat over medium heat. Place panini in pan. Weight with smaller-diameter saucepan weighted with 2 cans. Cook 2 minutes. Flip, replace weight, and cook 2 minutes more. ; name: russian panini ; ingredients: hoagie rolls, olive oil, russian salad dressing, provolone cheese, deli roast beef, deli corned beef, tomatoes ; preparation:Cut rolls open. Brush outside of rolls with olive oil. Brush both sides of inside of rolls with russian dressing. Cut cheese in half, add 4 halves to each roll. Add 3 slices roast beef, 3 slices corned beef and 2 slices tomato to each roll. Cut in half. Heat in your panini press or george foreman grill. Enjoy. ; name: muffuletta panini ; ingredients: butter, bread, provolone cheese, olive salad, black forest ham, mortadella, genoa salami ; preparation:

name: cinnamon sugared almonds ; ingredients: sugar, water, whole almonds, ground cinnamon, salt ; preparation:In a large, heavy bottomed, skillet place the sugar and water. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add the almonds and cook, stirring constantly, until almost all the water has evaporated. About 5 minutes. Add the cinnamon and salt and cook until the sugar has dried on the almonds. About 2 minutes. Pour onto a large sheet pan and let cool. ; name: candied almonds ; ingredients: water, sugar, cinnamon, almonds ; preparation:Bring water, sugar and cinnamon to a boil. Stirring constantly. Add almonds and toss to coat. Remove almonds with slotted spoon. Arrange on greased baking pan. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes, basting twice with reserved syrup. Cool. Store airtight. ; name: peppered almonds ; ingredients: almonds, vegetable oil, sugar, ground black pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat almonds. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and almonds are toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool. ; name: ginger glazed almonds with dried fruit ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, water, fresh ginger, sea salt, ground ginger, blanched almonds, cooking spray, berries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Melt butter in a large skillet on medium heat. Stir in sugar, water, fresh ginger, salt, and ground ginger. Cook until sugar dissolves. Stir in almonds and remove from heat. Line a baking sheet with foil and coat with cooking spray. Spread almonds onto foil, and bake 25 to 35 minutes, stirring once, until almonds are golden. Transfer almonds on foil to a rack and cool completely. Loosen with a spatula and combine with dried fruit. Store mixture airtight for up to 3 days. ; name: sugar and spice nuts ; ingredients: egg white, cashews, pecan halves, almonds, white sugar, ground cinnamon, cayenne pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container. ; name: vendor style honey roasted peanuts ; ingredients: roasted peanuts, sugar, salt, honey, water, oil ; preparation:Mix the sugar and salt in a bowl and set aside. Bring the honey, water and oil to boil in a saucepan. Add the peanuts to the honey mixture. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes stirring frequently. When the liquid is practically gone, add the sugar and salt and continue stirring on low heat until sugar has turned reddish-brown approximately 5 more minutes. You will recognize the honey roasted peanut look. Take off heat and spread in one layer on a cookie sheet or foil until it cools. Break into pieces and store in an airtight container. ; name: sweet savory nuts ; ingredients: pecans, almonds, walnuts, pure maple syrup, extra virgin olive oil, mixed herbs, cayenne pepper, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, toss the nuts with the maple syrup, olive oil, herbs and cayenne. Spread the nuts on a rimmed baking sheet and bake for 15 minutes., stirring occasionally, until browned. Season the nuts with salt and pepper and toss frequently until cooled. ; name: honig brat mandeln honey roasted almonds ; ingredients: almonds, sugar, salt, honey, water, almond oil ; preparation:

name: chocolate rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked rice, milk, sugar, cocoa, salt, vanilla, butter ; preparation:Place cooked rice and milk in top of double boiler. Mix in sugar, cocoa and salt. Cook over boiling water 45 mins, stirring occasionally. It should be creamy. Add vanilla and butter before serving. ; name: instant rice pudding ; ingredients: white rice, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Combine cooked rice, milk, sugar and salt in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil, then lower the heat to a simmer and stir in the vanilla. Cook until just about all of the milk is absorbed, stirring occasionally. Stir in cinnamon and nutmeg. Serve warm or chilled. ; name: indian rice pudding ; ingredients: cooked long-grain rice, whole milk, heavy cream, coconut milk, sugar, ground cardamom, golden raisins, pistachios ; preparation:In a large nonstick saut pan over medium heat, combine cooked rice and whole milk. Heat until mixture begins to boil. Decrease heat to low and cook to a simmer, stirring frequently, until mixture begins to thicken, approximately 5 minutes. Increase heat to medium, add heavy cream, coconut milk, sugar, and cardamom. Continue to cook until mixture just begins to thicken again, approximately 5-10 minutes. Use a whisk to prevent the cardamom from clumping. Once mixture begins to thicken, remove from heat and stir in raisins and pistachios. Transfer the mixture to individual serving dishes or a glass bowl and place plastic wrap directly on the surface of the pudding. Serve chilled or at room temperature. I like my rice pudding a little sweet, so i also added a little bit more sugar than the 2 oz. Called for in the recipe to suit my personal taste. ; name: near instant rice pudding ; ingredients: egg, cooked white rice, milk, ground cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven 350f. Whisk together egg, milk, cinnamon and sugar in a small bowl, stir in cooked rice. Pour into a small baking dish. Bake for about 20 minutes or until golden on top. Serve warm or cold. ; name: rice pudding for one ; ingredients: water, long-grain rice, milk, egg, sugar, vanilla extract, raisins ; preparation:Bring water to a boil and add rice. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Whisk milk and egg together, then whisk in sugar and vanilla. Stir into the hot cooked rice and then stir in raisins. Pour rice mixture into a small greased casserole dish and bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes. Serve warm with pouring cream. ; name: baked old fashioned rice pudding ; ingredients: long grain rice, evaporated milk, butter, sugar, water ; preparation:Boil rice until done. Place cooked rice in a baking dish. Add milk, water, butter, sugar. Stir all of it together and bake until done about 1 hr at 350 degrees. The water measurement is done with the can from the milk so 1 cup is a guess. ; name: my favorite rice pudding ; ingredients: eggs, milk, sugar, butter, vanilla, salt, cooked rice, raisins, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add milk, sugar, rice, eggs, butter, vanilla and salt to the eggs. Pour into buttered baking dish. Sprinkle with cinnamon and nutmeg. Bake at 350 degrees for 35 minutes or until set. ; name: individual white chocolate amaretti rice puddings ; ingredients: amaretti cookie, short-grain rice, caster sugar, whole milk, white chocolate ; preparation:

name: pasta masquerade ; ingredients: extra lean ground beef, water, onion, carrot, zucchini, spaghetti sauce, rotini pasta, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Brown meat in large skillet. Water, vegetables, spaghetti sauce and pasta. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium. Simmer 20 min., stirring occasionally. Stir in cheese just before serving. ; name: saucy italian roast ; ingredients: boneless beef rump roast, salt, garlic powder, pepper, sliced mushrooms, onion, spaghetti sauce, red wine, cooked pasta ; preparation:Cut the roast in half. Combine the salt, garlic powder, and pepper. Rub over roast. Place in a 5 quart slow-cooker. Top with mushroom and onion. Combine the spaghetti sauce and wine or broth. Pour over meat and vegetables. Cover and cook on low for 8-9 hours or until meat is tender. Slice roast. Serve over pasta with pan juices. ; name: all in one bolognaise ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, steak, pasta sauce, mushroom, red wine, seasoning, small shell pasta ; preparation:Heat oil in large pot. Saute onion till tender. Add mince and brown well, breaking up lumps. Stir in sauce, mushrooms, wine and seasonings. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat and stir in pasta. Simmer for 20 minutes. Serve with grated cheese. ; name: pasta with marinated tomatoes and mozzarella ; ingredients: beefsteak tomatoes, sweet onion, extra virgin olive oil, bocconcini, kosher salt, pepper, fettuccine, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large bowl, gently combine the tomatoes, onion, oil, bocconcini, salt, and pepper. Set aside and let marinate at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package directions. Add the drained pasta and basil to the marinated tomatoes and toss to combine. Divide among individual bowls. The longer the tomato mixture marinates, the more flavorful it becomes. Keep it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Spoon it over chicken or warm bread. ; name: chicken and mushroom saute ; ingredients: butter, chicken breasts, mushroom, onion, bacon, cream of mushroom soup, milk, parmesan cheese, noodles ; preparation:Melt half of butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Saut chicken until no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Remove from skillet. Set aside. Melt remaining butter in same skillet over medium heat. Saut mushrooms and onion until tender and liquid is evaporated, stirring often. Stir in soup, milk, and cheese. Bring to boil. Return chicken to skillet and add bacon. Heat through, stirring occasionally. Serve over noodles. ; name: gf cheeseburger pasta ; ingredients: onion, lean ground beef, cream of mushroom soup, beef broth, water, ketchup, gluten-free pasta, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef & onion. Use a large skillet for a single recipe, or a stock pot for a double recipe. Add other ingredients and heat to a boil. Cook over medium heat 10 to 20 minutes or until pasta is done, stirring often. Add cheese. Turn off heat and cover until cheese melts. Sauce will thicken a bit as it cools. Serve & enjoy. ; name: italy in a dish ; ingredients: hamburger, spiral shaped pasta, tomato sauce, tomato paste, onion, oregano, cheese ; preparation:Boil the noodles. Cook the hamburger and onions on the stove until hamburger is cooked. Cook the tomato sauce, tomato paste, and oregeno on the stove until the sauce is boiling a little and take it off fast. Layer the noodles, the hamburger, the sauce and the cheese, leave some cheese to put on top. Find a little bit more oregeno and put it on top with the cheese. Put it in the oven on 350 degrees for about 1 hour. ; name: all in one pot saucy pasta ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, water, pasta sauce, pasta, sliced mushrooms, cheese ; preparation:

name: hamburger steak with gravy ; ingredients: ground beef, lipton onion soup mix, egg, worcestershire sauce, seasoning salt, black pepper, garlic powder, self rising flour, beef broth ; preparation:Combine all hamburger ingredients except flour. Shape into patties and dredge in flour. Brown patties in oil in heated skillet over medium high heat. Remove from skillet. Combine all gravy ingredients in a bowl, mixing well with a whisk. Pour into skillet, stirring constantly until thickened. Taste and adjust salt and pepper. Can also add a little more seasoned salt. Place patties into gravy and turn to coat. Cover, reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes or until done. ; name: steak and potato casserole ; ingredients: top round beef, garlic powder, pepper, meat tenderizer, potatoes, red onion, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, red wine and vinegar salad dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender. ; name: slow cooked corned beef and cabbage ; ingredients: carrots, potatoes, onions, garlic, beef brisket, salt, black pepper, thyme, beef broth, cabbage ; preparation:In bottom of crockpot, place carrots, potatoes, onions and garlic. Trim fat from brisket and sprinkle with salt, black pepper and thyme. Place brisket on top of vegetables. Add beef broth, cover and cook on low for 10 to 12 hours. Before serving, remove 1 cup of broth from crockpot and pour into skillet. Add cabbage wedges and simmer until cabbage is tender. Cut meat across the grain and serve with vegetables and broth. ; name: beef hot pot ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, beef stew meat, beef stock, butter, parsley, carrots ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Heat a little oil in frying pan and brown stew meat along with onions and carrots. Remove from pan. Layer sliced potatoes, onion, carrot and meat in a 3 pint casserole, finishing with a layer of potatoes. Pour over the stock. Brush the potatoes with 1 tbsp melted butter. Cover and bake for 1 hour. Remove the hot pot from the oven. Uncover and brush the potatoes again with melted butter or dripping. Return to the oven for a further 30 minutes, uncovered, to brown the potatoes. Serve garnished with parsley. ; name: beef n gravy on potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, water, ground beef, garlic powder, onion powder, brown gravy mix, milk, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes and water in a microwave-safe dish. Cover and microwave on high for 8-10 minutes or until tender. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in garlic powder and onion powder. Prepare gravy according to package directions. Place the potatoes in a mixing bowl. Add milk, butter, salt and pepper. Beat on medium speed until smooth. Serve beef and gravy over mashed potatoes. ; name: broiled fish steaks with tomato glaze ; ingredients: tuna steaks, oil, salt and pepper, diced tomato, garlic, lemon wedge ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Brush a baking sheet with oil. Lay the fish on the baking sheet in a single layer. Brush with 1 t of oil and season with salt and pepper. Combine the tomatoes and garlic in a small bowl. Stir in the remaining t oil. Season with salt and pepper. Broil the fish for 4 minutes. Turn over with a spatula, top with the tomato mixture, and continue to broil for another 4 to 5 minutes. Check doneness by inserting a knife between layers of the flesh. The meat should be just translucent. Spoon pan juices back over the fish and serve with lemon wedges. ; name: meat cholent ; ingredients: beef brisket, dried lima beans, onions, pearl barley, fat, salt, pepper, ginger, flour, paprika ; preparation:Submerge beans in water and soak overnight. Drain well. Use a heavy saucepan or dutch oven and brown the meat and onions in the fat. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and ginger. Add the beans and barley. Sprinkle with the flour and paprika. Add enough boiling water to cover one inch above the mixture. Cover tightly. Cholent may be baked for 24 hours in an oven 250f, or, for quicker cooking, bake in a 350f oven for 4 to 5 hours. Slice the meat and serve with the barley and beans. ; name: simmering steak ; ingredients: steak, onions, carrots, potatoes, green pepper, beef broth, gravy mix ; preparation:

name: onion rice ; ingredients: long-grain white rice, chicken broth, salt, butter, yellow onion, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Bring to a boil. Decrease heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving. ; name: bacon and rice creole ; ingredients: bacon, green bell pepper, onions, salt, canned tomatoes, brown rice ; preparation:Simmer vegetables and spices in a saucepan. At the same time, fry the bacon. When bacon is done, remove from pan and crumble into small pieces. Drain off all fat. Let rice brown lightly. Add the vegetables and bacon. Let simmer over very low heat for 30 minutes. Check after 20 minutes to see if it is drying out. If so, add more tomatoes, or some water, or a combination of both. ; name: rice herbs ; ingredients: oil, long grain rice, onion, green pepper, chicken broth, salt, dried oregano, bay leaf, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place oil in a large saucepan coated with cooking spray. Place pan over med-high heat until pan is hot. Add rice and saut until golden brown. Add onion and pepper. Saut till tender. Add chicken broth, salt, oregano and bay leaf. Bring to boil and then reduce heat. Simmer 20 minutes. Remove from stove and let sit for about 5 minutes, or till liquid is absorbed. Remove bay leaf and stir in parsley. ; name: brown rice and vegetable saute ; ingredients: quick-cooking brown rice, vegetable broth, olive oil, onion, broccoli florets, baby portabella mushrooms, garlic clove, thyme, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:Prepare rice as directed on box using broth of your choice. Meanwhile over medium-high heat, heat olive oil and add onion. Saute for 3 minutes, stirring often. Add broccoli and cover for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add mushrooms and remaining ingredients to pan and saute until mushrooms release their juices, approximately 5 minutes. Serve over brown rice. ; name: bacon fried rice ; ingredients: cooked rice, bacon, green onions, egg, soy sauce, garlic powder ; preparation:Fry bacon until crisp. Add onion and stir fry for 1 minute. Add egg and scramble until egg forms small flakes. Stir in rice and garlic, continue to stir fry until heated through. Gently separate grains of rice with fork so mixture is fluffy. Add soy sauce and stir until mixture is well blended. ; name: bacon and egg rice ; ingredients: long-grain white rice, water, bacon, eggs, salt, black pepper, onion, vegetable oil, scallion, sesame oil ; preparation:Bring rice and water to a boil in a 3 quart heavy saucepan, then reduce, heat to low and cook, tightly covered, until water is absorbed and rice is tender, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand, covered, 5 minutes. Gently stir rice from top to bottom of saucepan with a heatproof rubber spatula. Cook bacon in a 12-inch nonstick skillet over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until golden and crisp, about 6 minutes. Pour into a sieve set over a heatproof bowl and reserve bacon and fat separately. Whisk together eggs, t salt and t pepper in a medium bowl. Return 3 tablespoons fat to skillet and saut onion over moderately high heat, stirring occasionally, until pale golden, about 5 minutes. Add eggs and cook, stirring, until eggs are just set, about 1 minute. Make a well in center of egg mixture, then pour in vegetable oil and 2 tablespoons reserved bacon fat. Add rice, remaining teaspoon salt and remaining teaspoon pepper and cook, stirring, 2 minutes. Add bacon, scallions, and sesame oil and cook mixture, stirring, 1 minute. Serve immediately. ; name: baked mexican brown rice ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, garlic cloves, jalapeno peppers, long grain brown rice, water, canned tomato, dried ancho chile powder, fine sea salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In an ovenproof saucepan or dutch oven, heat oil on medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic, and jalapeos and cook, stirring, 4 minutes. Add rice and cook, stirring, 1 minute. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stir, and cover. Place in oven and bake until rice is tender, about 50 minutes. Fluff with fork before serving. ; name: country corn brown rice ; ingredients: bacon, brown rice, onion, celery, chicken broth, dried chervil, black pepper, corn, parsley ; preparation:

name: cinnamon sugared almonds ; ingredients: sugar, water, whole almonds, ground cinnamon, salt ; preparation:In a large, heavy bottomed, skillet place the sugar and water. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Add the almonds and cook, stirring constantly, until almost all the water has evaporated. About 5 minutes. Add the cinnamon and salt and cook until the sugar has dried on the almonds. About 2 minutes. Pour onto a large sheet pan and let cool. ; name: candied almonds ; ingredients: water, sugar, cinnamon, almonds ; preparation:Bring water, sugar and cinnamon to a boil. Stirring constantly. Add almonds and toss to coat. Remove almonds with slotted spoon. Arrange on greased baking pan. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes, basting twice with reserved syrup. Cool. Store airtight. ; name: peppered almonds ; ingredients: almonds, vegetable oil, sugar, ground black pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Stir all ingredients in small baking pan to coat almonds. Arrange in single layer. Bake until coating is crisp and almonds are toasted, stirring occasionally, about 12 minutes. Cool. ; name: sweet and salty cinnamon nuts ; ingredients: egg white, pecans, sugar, cinnamon, salt ; preparation:Heat oven to 300 degrees. Mix sugar, salt and cinnamon. Set aside. Place nuts in a bowl and pour the egg white over them. Stir until nuts are coated and sticky. Sprinkle cinnamon-sugar mixture over nuts and stir until nuts are completely coated. Spread on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake 30 minutes. ; name: sugar and spice nuts ; ingredients: egg white, cashews, pecan halves, almonds, white sugar, ground cinnamon, cayenne pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container. ; name: almond sugar cookies ; ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, milk, baking powder, almond extract, salt, eggs ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and almond extract. Combine dry ingredients, add to sugar mixture. Drop onto cookie sheet. Bake 350 for 1012 minutes. ; name: white chocolate chunk almond cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, almond extract, flour, baking soda, salt, white baking chocolate, slivered almonds ; preparation:With an electric mixer cream the butter & sugar in a large bowl. Add the eggs one at a time until well blended. Add the almond extract. In a separate bowl combine the flour, baking soda, & salt. Gradually beat flour mixture into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir in white chocolate chips & almonds. Drop cookies in heaping tablespoonfuls about 1-inch apart on ungreased cookie sheet & bake at 375 degrees for 10 minutes or until cookies are lightly browned. Let cookies cool on cookie sheet for 2 minutes then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely. These cookies freeze well. ; name: sugared cinnamon almonds ; ingredients: whole almonds, sugar, cinnamon, egg white, vanilla, salt ; preparation:

name: spinach with olives and lemon ; ingredients: baby spinach, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, rind of, kalamata olive, sea salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Wash the spinach and place in a large covered pan over low heat. Steam for 1-2 minutes until the spinach wilts. Drain well. Heat the garlic in 1 tablespoon of the olive oil until fragrant. Add the preserved lemon, olives and spinach. Cook for another minute, season with salt and pepper, and stir in the remaining olive oil. Serve immediately or chill and serve cold as a salad. ; name: garlic spinach stir fry ; ingredients: spinach, tomatoes, black bean sauce, garlic cloves, vegetable oil, chili sauce, fresh lemon juice, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a wok. Add tomatoes, garlic, black bean sauce, stir fry for 1 minute. Stir in the spinach, chili sauce, and lemon juice, and mix well. Keep stirring for about 3 minutes, until spinach gets wilted. Season with salt and black pepper. Serve immediately. ; name: spinach with rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, cooked rice, fresh spinach, carrot, garlic clove, italian dressing, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Generously spray a wok or non stick deep frypan with veggie spray. Heat to medium. Add cooked rice and grated carrot into wok and mix. Add minced garlic. Stir fry to heat through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Add spinach. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Turn over with a spatula several times to mix the spinach evenly with the rice mixture, heat and turn until the spinach is starting to wilt, about 3 minutes. Pour the italian dressing evenly over and turn several times to mix. Cook about 3 minutes or until the spinach is well wilted and the dressing is heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: sauteed spinach garlic and mushrooms ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, mushrooms, garlic cloves, spinach, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a big saucepan over medium heat, melt the butter with the olive oil. Add in the mushrooms and garlic. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Add in spinach. Toss with 2 forks, about 5 minutes, until wilted. Season with salt and pepper. Mix well. Serve immediately. ; name: saute spinach with garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach, salt & freshly ground black pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:In a large saut pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm. ; name: seasoned spinach ; ingredients: fresh spinach, green onion, sesame seeds, low sodium soy sauce, dark sesame oil, kosher salt, garlic cloves ; preparation:Steam half of spinach, covered, for 5 minutes or until the spinach wilts. Place steamed spinach in a colander. Repeat proceduce with remaining spinach. Cool slightly, and squeeze dry. Place spinach in a bowl. Add onions and remaining ingredients. Toss mixture well to combine. Serve chilled or at room temperature. ; name: efo spinach ; ingredients: fresh spinach, onion, tomatoes, red bell pepper, olive oil, chicken bouillon cubes, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Wash and drain spinach leaves, removing any thick stems. Slice onions, tomatoes and red peppers into strips. Heat oil in a saute pan. Add onions and peppers and cook until wilted. Add tomatoes and cook. Crumble bouillon cubes into pan and add spinach with whatever water clings to the leaves. Cook until spinach wilts. Season with salt and white pepper, to taste. ; name: garlic spinach bell peppers ; ingredients: spinach, olive oil, garlic cloves, hot pepper flakes, sweet red pepper, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: fettuccine alfredo ; ingredients: fettuccine pasta, flour, parmesan cheese, butter, light cream, milk, salt, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter over low heat in large saucepan. Add flour, heat until bubbly. Add milk and light cream. Bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Add cheese, salt and parsley. Toss with fettucine. ; name: garlic fettuccine alfredo ; ingredients: fettuccine, butter, garlic, evaporated milk, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, fresh italian parsley ; preparation:Add butter to a large skillet and melt. Add garlic and saute until just golden. Pour in evaporated milk and bring to a boil. Boil 2-3 minutes. Add cheese and stir until melted and smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Toss cooked fettuccine with sauce and parsley. Serve immediately. ; name: alfredo pasta primavera ; ingredients: cream cheese, parmesan cheese, butter, milk, vegetables, fettuccine, parsley ; preparation:Cook cream cheese, parmesan cheese, butter and milk over medium-low heat, until melted and well blended, stirring occasionally. If you are using raw veggies cook in the microwave while sauce is cooking. Boil pasta while sauce is cooking. Drain pasta and vegetables. Toss pasta and vegetables lightly with the sauce. If using dried parsley toss with the pasta and sauce. If using fresh parsley sprinkle over the top after it is all tossed. ; name: mushroom alfredo ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, milk, red pepper, parmesan cheese, garlic, parsley, linguine ; preparation:In saucepan, combine soup, milk, red pepper, cheese, garlic and parsley.
