Bring to boil at medium heat, stirring often. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 mins. Pour sauce over noodles and sprinkle with pepper and additional cheese if desired. I usually increase the garlic to 2 plus cloves. ; name: easiest ever fettuccine alfredo ; ingredients: fettuccine pasta, butter, egg yolk, heavy cream, parmesan cheese, salt and black pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Boil fettucini according to package directions. Meantime, cream butter until fluffy, then add egg yolk and cream. Beating constantly, add parmesan cheese. Drain noodles and toss in butter mixture immediately to melt. Season with salt and pepper and add some chopped parsley for color. Serve immediately. ; name: my very best alfredo ; ingredients: butter, fresh parmesan cheese, heavy whipping cream, garlic cloves, white pepper ; preparation:Saut garlic in butter until soft. Add cream and bring to a boil. Slowly add parmesan, allowing to melt. Season to taste with white pepper. Toss with pasta and serve with garlic toast. ; name: alfredo bake ; ingredients: pasta, broccoli florets, mushroom, cooked chicken, alfredo sauce, garlic cloves, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Coat the bottom of the two small or one medium baking dish with a thin layer of alfredo sauce. In a medium bowl, mix the pasta, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken, garlic and alfredo sauce until combined. Place mixture into baking dish and top with mozzarella and parmesan cheese. Cut the butter into small pieces and scatter on top of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes or until cheese is hot and bubbly. ; name: ziti alfredo ; ingredients: ziti pasta, butter, cream cheese, garlic powder, milk, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, parsley flakes ; preparation:

name: cowboy soup ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, enchilada sauce, vegetable soup, ranch style beans, whole kernel corn ; preparation:Combine ground beef, onion, and green pepper in large saucepan. Cook till onion and pepper are tender. Drain off fat. Add enchilada sauce, soup, beans, and corn to ground beef and onion mixture. Stir to combine. Simmer for 15 minutes. ; name: beefy nacho soup ; ingredients: lean ground beef, taco seasoning mix, nacho cheese soup, tomatoes and green chilies, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, corn tortilla chips ; preparation:In medium saucepan, cook ground beef over medium-high heat, 5-7 minutes, stirring occasionally, until cooked well, drain. Reduce heat to medium. Stir in remaining ingredients, except shredded cheese and tortilla chips. Cook 8-12 minutes or until thoroughly heated, stirring frequently. Top individual servings with shredded cheese and tortilla chips. ; name: taco soup with beans ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, pinto beans, tomatoes and green chilies, tomatoes, tomato paste, ranch dressing mix, taco seasoning mix, corn ; preparation:Brown meat and onions in skillet. Drain. Add meat and remaining ingredients in slow cooker. Cover. Cook on low 4 hours or until ingredients are heated through. ; name: mealie soup south african corn soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, tomatoes, frozen corn, creamed corn, fat-free evaporated milk, chicken broth, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter over moderate heat. Add the onions and saut for 5 minutes. Stir in the tomatoes and cook for about 5 more minutes. Add the corn, creamed corn milk, chicken broth, salt, and pepper. Simmer for about 15 minutes. Serve with crackers. ; name: creamy bean tortilla soup ; ingredients: bacon, onion, celery, salt, red pepper, garlic powder, rotel tomatoes, chicken broth, refried beans, water ; preparation:Saute onion and celery in bacon grease you get from frying your bacon strips. Combine all ingredients including the crumbled bacon and heat till hot. Add water to desired consistency. Soup should be creamy. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: three bean tortilla soup ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, garlic, chili beans, black beans, small white beans, chicken broth, 6-inch corn tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat a small non-stick skillet over medium-high heat until hot. Add whole tomato to skillet and heat until skin is blistered and slightly charred, turning frequently. Cool tomato slightly and coarsely chop. In a large saucepan, combine tomato, onion, and garlic. Cook over medium heat until onion and garlic are softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in beans and broth, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, simmer 15 to 20 minutes. Meanwhile, heat oven to 425f cut tortillas into strips and place in a single layer on a large baking sheet. Bake for 5 to 8 minutes or until crisp. To serve, ladle soup into bowls and top with tortilla strips and cheese. ; name: crock pot taco soup ; ingredients: cooked ground beef, v8 vegetable juice, onion powder, whole kernel corn, kidney beans, tomato sauce, taco seasoning mix, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook ground beef until no longer pink. Place all ingredients except cheese in crock pot and stir. Cook on low 4 hours or until heated through. If eating immediately, pour in bowls and top with cheddar cheese. If freezing, let cool and place in freezer container. When ready to eat, pull and let thaw in fridge. Microwave on high 2 minutes or until heated through. Top with cheddar cheese. Also you can make this on the stove top. Combine all ingredients except cheese and let simmer for an hour. Top with cheddar cheese and serve. ; name: roasted corn soup ; ingredients: corn on the cob, water, chipotle chiles, salt, feta cheese ; preparation:

name: cheesy macho nachos ; ingredients: green onions, tomatoes, jalapenos, tortilla chips, refried beans, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, sour cream, chili with beans ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Lay chips on oven safe platter. You will be layering this so split them. Warm beans and chili on stove or in microwave. Stir beans until smooth. Spread beans over tortillas. Top with onion, cheese, jalepenos, chili and cheddar cheese. Repeat by layering tortilla chips and toppings until gone. Place in oven and bake until cheese is melted. Dollop with sour cream. Add tomatoes and green onions on top. ; name: bean and cheese nachos ; ingredients: corn tortilla chips, refried beans, monterey jack cheese, salsa ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Spread refried beans over each tortilla chip. Top with a mound of cheese, and lay the chips in a single layer on a baking sheet. Heat under the broiler until the cheese is melted and bubbly, about1 minute. Top each chip with a dollop of salsa. Serve at once. ; name: nachos ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, taco sauce, refried beans, cream of mushroom soup, taco seasoning, salt, velveeta cheese, tortilla chips, sour cream ; preparation:Brown beef and onions in saucepan. Drain. Combine all ingredients except tortilla chips and sour cream in slow cooker. Cover and cook on high 1 hour stirring occasionally until cheese if fully melted. Serve warm with chips and sour cream. ; name: breakfast nachos ; ingredients: tortilla chips, refried beans, eggs, salsa, monterey jack pepper cheese, scallions ; preparation:Cover the bottom of a large oven-safe platter with tortilla chips. Microwave refried beans for 1 minute, then spread over the tortilla chips. Crumble scrambled eggs evenly over beans. Evenly pour warmed salsa over eggs. Top with grated cheese. Broil entire platter in oven until cheese is melted. Serve immediately, garnishing with scallions. ; name: spicy cheeseburger nachos ; ingredients: lean ground beef, garlic, velveeta mexican cheese, rotel tomatoes, green onion, tortilla chips ; preparation:In a big non-stick skillet, cook the ground beef and garlic until the beef is no longer pink, stir frequently. Drain. In a 4-quart slow cooker, add the ground beef mixture, cheese, and tomatoes. Stir to mix. Cover and cook on low for 3-4 hours or until the cheese is melted and mixture is well heated. Stir after 2 hours. Add in the onions, stir to combine. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: nachos agrios sour cream nachos ; ingredients: refried beans, tortilla chips, swiss cheese, provolone cheese, jalapeno, sour cream, pimiento ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees f. Heat refried beans in a pan over medium heat until hot. Spread chips out evenly on large oval oven-proof dish. Spread beans on top of chips, sprinkle cheeses over beans, and scatter jalapenos over cheese. Bake until cheese is completely melted, about 5 minutes. Garnish with dollops of sour cream then scatter pimentos over nachos. Serve immediately. ; name: cheesy nachos ; ingredients: baked corn tortilla chips, scallion, salsa, canned kidney beans, low-fat cheddar cheese, guacamole ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Place chips on a foil-lined baking sheet. Top with salsa, beans, scallions and cheese. Heat until cheese is melted. Top with guacamole. Enjoy with vegetable sticks dipped in dressing. ; name: macho nachos courtesy of paula deen ; ingredients: refried beans, white corn tortilla chips, onion, monterey jack pepper cheese, jalapeno, chili, cheddar cheese, sour cream, green onion, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: savory pork ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, olive oil, butter, fresh mushrooms, fresh green beans, garlic cloves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops. ; name: roasted pork loin with mustard garlic and herbs ; ingredients: boneless pork loin, garlic cloves, dijon mustard, herbes de provence, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Slice small slits all over the pork loin. Insert the garlic slivers into the holes. Spread the dijon mustard evenly over the entire loin, using your hands or a spatula. Sprinkle loin with the herbes de provence, the salt and the pepper. Place on a roasting rack set in a roasting pan and bake for about 1 hour, or until meat thermometer reaches 155 degrees. Remove from the oven, and let rest for 5-10 minutes before slicing. ; name: spicy beer brined rotisserie pork loin ; ingredients: boneless pork loin, beer, dark corn syrup, green onions, prepared mustard, vegetable oil, chili powder, fresh garlic, black pepper ; preparation:Place the pork loin roast in a heavy large plastic ziploc bag. In a bowl whisk together beer, corn syrup, onions, mustard, chili powder, garlic and black pepper. Pour the marinade over the pork. Seal the bag tightly and turn to coat the meat. Place the bag in a large bowl and place in the refrigerator for 8-24 hours. When ready to cook prepare the rotisserie. Remove the roast from the marinade and bring to almost room temperature before cooking. Place the pork on the spit then set over heat and baste every 10-15 minutes or the internal temperature reads 155-160f. Discard any remaining marinade. Remove the roast from the spit and let rest for 15 minutes before slicing. ; name: tender pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, garlic clove, salt, pepper, ground cumin, extra virgin olive oil, chicken broth, dry white wine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the tenderloin and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the tenderloin well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. It will continue to cook as it sits. Slice and serve immediately. ; name: wienerschnitzel ; ingredients: pork cutlets, egg, salt and pepper, breadcrumbs, oil ; preparation:Mix egg, water, salt and pepper. Dust each cutlet lightly with flour. Then dredge first in egg mixture, then in breadcrumbs. Cover and set aside in refrigerator. In a large skillet over medium-high heat, saut cutlets, being careful not to overcook. And please. Do not poke around on these cutlets with a fork. It will only make the meat tough. ; name: polish pork chops ; ingredients: pork loin chops, peanut oil, onion, tomato soup, sour cream, dill pickle, sherry wine, salt, peppercorn ; preparation:Trim some of the fat from chops and use along with the peanut oil for browning. Sear chops on high heat in heavy skillet for 1 minute each side. Set aside chops and keep warm. Lower heat to medium and add onion. Saute until translucent. Return chops to pan and reheat with sauce to warm through. Add remaining ingredients, stir until hot. Serve. ; name: slow cooker german style pork roast ; ingredients: white potatoes, garlic, salt and pepper, boneless pork loin roast, sauerkraut, caraway seeds ; preparation:Place the potatoes, garlic, salt and pepper in a slow cooker. Stir to coat. Season the pork roast with salt and pepper. Lay atop the potatoes. Pour the sauerkraut over the roast, sprinkle with caraway seeds. Cook in slow cooker on low 8-10 hours. ; name: german schweinepfeffer peppered pork ; ingredients: vegetable oil, pork loin, mushroom, onion, cracked black pepper, salt, red wine, parsley ; preparation:

name: creole okra ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, green bell pepper, tomatoes, dried thyme, fresh parsley, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, frozen cut okra ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute the onion and garlic until limp. Add the green pepper. Cook and stir until tender. Drain the tomatoes, reserving juice, and pour them into the skillet. Season with thyme, parsley, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes over medium heat. Add the frozen okra, and pour in enough of the reserved juice from the tomatoes to cover the bottom of the pan. Cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until okra is tender. ; name: cajun okra stew ; ingredients: fresh tomatoes, lima beans, black-eyed peas, fresh okra, onion, garlic cloves, cajun seasoning, salt & pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large stew pot. Add chopped onions and garlic and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add chopped tomatoes, lima beans, blackeye peas and cajun seasoning. Bring to a boil, stir well. Reduce heat and simmer on low 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. If the stew gets too thick add water as needed. Add chopped okra, stir well. Simmer another 15 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: baked okra etouffe ; ingredients: okra, olive oil, tomatoes, onion, green pepper, salt, pepper, cayenne, cracker crumbs ; preparation:Spread okra in a greased casserole. Sprinkle a little of the olive oil on and mix with okra. Cover okra with tomatoes, onion, green pepper and seasonings. Cover loosely with foil. Bake at 400f for 1 hour, or until tender, stirring occasionally. Uncover. Top with crumbs and brown lightly. ; name: corn and okra casserole ; ingredients: onion, garlic clove, green pepper, bacon drippings, tomatoes, frozen okra, mexicorn whole kernel corn, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Saute onion, garlic and green pepper in bacon drippings. Add tomatoes, mixing well. Cook 1 minute. Stir in okra and corn. Season with salt and pepper. Spoon into baking dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes. ; name: okra goulash ; ingredients: ground beef, whole tomatoes, water, okra, onions, worcestershire sauce, creole seasoning, pepper, cooked rice ; preparation:Cook ground beef in a large dutch oven until the meat is browned, stirring to crumble the meat. Drain well. Add the tomatoes and the next 6 ingredients. Stir well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer, uncovered, 3 hours or until thickened. Serve over rice, if desired. ; name: onion frittata ; ingredients: butter, onions, eggs, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, chili ; preparation:Put the butter, garlic, diced chili and onions in a frying pan and fry gently until the onions are a nice golden brown. Beat the six eggs well with the salt and pepper. Scoop the onions out of the pan and mix with the eggs. Melt the extra butter in the pan and pour in the egg mixture. Cook on both sides until browned slice in wedges and serve hot. ; name: okra in lemon butter ; ingredients: okra pods, butter, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Wash okra weell. Trim stem end, leaving enough on the pod to keep the juice inches. Cover with boiling water and boil gently until tender, approximately 15 minutes. When half done add a little salt. To serve, drain very well, pour into a hot dish and add melted butter and lemon juice. ; name: okra with green chilli ; ingredients: okra, onion, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, green chilies, ground cumin, ground coriander, water, oil, lemon, juice of ; preparation:

name: easy key lime pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, key lime juice, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:Beat cream cheese, sugar and lime juice until fluffy. Fold in 6 oz of the thawed cool whip. Pour into prepared graham cracker crust. Top with remaining cool whip. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving. ; name: mom s key lime pie ; ingredients: egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, key lime juice, graham cracker crust, egg whites, granulated sugar, pure vanilla extract ; preparation:Beat egg yolks with mixer until light in color. Slowly add condensed milk mixing well. Stir while adding lime juice. Pour into prepared pie shell. Set aside and prepare meringue. For meringue, beat egg whites until stiff. Add sugar and vanilla just at the last minute. Top pie with meringue. Brown in 325 degree preheated oven just until peaks brown and the rest is golden in color. Serve cool. ; name: raspberry lime pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lime juice, cool whip, red food coloring, fresh raspberry, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:In a bowl, combine milk and lime juice. Mix well. Mixture should thicken. Add cool whip and food coloring if desired. Fold in raspberries. Spoon mixture into pie crust. Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving. ; name: emerils key lime pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, butter, condensed milk, key lime juice, eggs, sour cream, powdered sugar, lime zest ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. In a bowl, mix the graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and butter with your hands. Press the mixture firmly into a 9-inch pie pan, and bake until brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool to room temperature before filling. Lower the oven temperature to 325 degrees f. In a separate bowl, combine the condensed milk, lime juice, and eggs. Whisk until well blended and place the filling in the cooled pie shell. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes and allow to chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours. Once chilled, combine the sour cream and powdered sugar and spread over the top of the pie using a spatula. Sprinkle the lime zest as a garnish on top of the sour cream and serve chilled. ; name: easy key lime cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, lime zest, fresh lime juice, vanilla, eggs, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:Beat cream cheese, sugar, lime zest, lime juice, and vanilla with a mixer on medium until well blended. Add eggs. Mix just until blended. Pour into crust. Bake at 350f for 40 minutes or until center is almost set. Cool. Refrigerate 3 hours or overnight. Garnish with cool whip and lime slices. ; name: no bake key lime cheesecake ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, unsalted butter, light cream cheese, whipped topping, key lime juice, lime zest, fat-free sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Melt the butter in a small microwave-safe bowl. Divide the graham cracker crumbs evenly amongst individual serving bowls or ramekins and press down to make a crust. Drizzle some of the butter over the crumbs in each dish. Place the bowls in the freezer. In a large mixing bowl, beat together the cream cheese, whipped topping, key lime juice, zest, and the condensed milk until well-combined. Remove the bowls from the freezer. Pipe or spoon the filling into each bowl. Add additional whipped topping and other desired toppings. Cover and refrigerate at least 4 hours before serving. ; name: key lime tarts ; ingredients: cookies, cream cheese, egg, sugar, key lime juice, key lime zest, whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Fill 2 mini muffin tins with paper cups and spray with cooking spray. Place 1 key lime cooler cookie in the bottom of the cup, flat side down. Beat together cream cheese, egg, sugar, lime juice and zest until well mixed. Fill the cups to the top. Bake for 10 minutes. Remove tarts to cool. When completely cool, top with whipped cream. ; name: key lime pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, egg yolks, key lime juice, graham cracker pie crust, whipped cream, lime ; preparation:

name: simple rhubarb cake ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, shortening, egg, baking soda, vanilla, sour milk, flour, rhubarb, cinnamon-sugar mixture ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 inch pan. Cream together both sugars and shortening. Add egg and mix together. Mix in all remaining ingredients and pour into prepared pan. Sprinkle with a little cinnamon and sugar. Bake for 35 minutes or until toothpic comes out clean. ; name: green tea pound cake ; ingredients: eggs, flour, sugar, butter, green tea powder, baking powder ; preparation:Cream butter in a bowl. Add sugar in the butter and mix well. Gradually add beaten eggs and stir well. Sift flour, baking powder, and green tea powder together and add the flour to the egg mixture. Pour the batter into a buttered loaf pan. Bake in preheated 340 degrees f oven for about 30-40 minutes. ; name: rhubarb dessert ; ingredients: white cake mix, rhubarb, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert ; preparation:Mix cake mix according to package directions. Put into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix the rhubarb, sugar, & jello together. Spoon onto cake mix. Bake according package directions. ; name: dump it in rhubarb cake ; ingredients: rhubarb, strawberry gelatin, sugar, cinnamon, yellow cake mix, water, whipped topping, flour ; preparation:Spread rhubarb in an 9x13 pan. Sprinkle with sugar and dry jello powder. Sprinkle dry cake mix over sugar. Pour a cup of water evenly over mixture. Cover tightly with foil. Bake 350 f for 30 minutes or so until cake is done. ; name: featherweight breakfast cake ; ingredients: butter, egg, milk, all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 8x8 square pan. Melt butter and cool slightly and add milk and beaten egg, set to the side. In bowl, sift the next four ingredients, 2 times. Add butter, milk, and egg mixture and stir only enough to smooth out any lumps. Combine the remaining sugar and cinnamon for the topping, in a small bowl or in a ziploc bag. Pour batter into greased pan and sprinkle the mixture of sugar and cinnamon over the top and bake 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: lots of cinnamon coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, baking powder, cinnamon, egg, milk, sour cream, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 5 dry ingredients together. Beat egg, add milk, sour cream, melted butter and vanilla. Combine with dry ingredients only until blended. Pour into a greased, floured 8 or 9 inch round or square pan. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake in a 400 degree oven for 25 minutes. ; name: luscious rhubarb sponge dessert ; ingredients: rhubarb, golden brown sugar, water, flour, baking powder, sugar, butter, eggs, whole milk, whipping cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Butter 11 x 7 x 2 baking dish. Place rhubarb slices in an even layer. Scatter the brown sugar and 2 tablespoons water overtop of rhubarb slices. Mix sugar into flour and baking powder mixture. Add butter and beat for about 3 minutes. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Alternate adding milk in 2 additions and fold in flour in 3 additions. Blend slightly after each addition and pour batter over the rhubarb slices. Smooth over the top. Bake about 40 minutes at 375 until the top is golden brown. Cool 30 minutes and serve with a nice dollop of whipping cream. ; name: rosas rhubarb cake ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, eggs, vegetable oil, white sugar, rhubarb, brown sugar, quick-cooking oats, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: cornmeal cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, pure vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour ; preparation:Mix softened butter and sugar until creamy. Add the egg and vanilla and beat well. In a separate mixing bowl, mix together the cornmeal, baking powder, salt and flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: chocolate mint cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, cocoa powder, brown sugar, sugar, butter, applesauce, vanilla, mint extract, egg white ; preparation:Combine flour, baking soda and cocoa together in a bowl and combine. In a separate bowl, combine brown sugar, sugar, butter, applesauce, vanilla, mint extract and egg white. Beat with a hand mixer until well blended. Combine flour mix with sugar mix to form dough. Roll into a log and cover with plastic wrap. Place in freezer for about 1 hour until firm. Slice into quarter inch pieces and place on a baking sheet that has been sprayed with baking spray. Bake at 350 for about 10 minutes. Cool on wire rack. ; name: eggless autumn spice cookies ; ingredients: flour, salt, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, ground ginger, baking soda, dark brown sugar, white sugar, sugar, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix flour, baking soda, ginger, cloves, cinnamon, and salt. Set aside. Cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Add maple syrup, blend. Slowly add the dry ingredients, mix well. Drop a tablespoon at a time in the reserved sugar, coat and roll in to a ball. Place on parchment lined cookiesheet at least an inch apart. Bake for 12-14 minutes or until lightly golden brown. Cool on a wire rack. Store in a sealed bag. ; name: gold cookies ; ingredients: butter flavor shortening, sugar, egg yolks, milk, vanilla, flour, baking powder, salt, pecans, cinnamon ; preparation:Mix together shrtening, sugar and egg yolks. Stir in milk and vanilla. Add in flour, baking powder and salt. Chill dough. Roll into balls the size of walnuts and roll balls in mixture of nuts and cinnamon. Place 3 inches apart on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 400 degrees for 12-15 minutes, until golden brown, but still soft. Yields 5 dozen 2-inch cookies. ; name: white chocolate pudding cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, vanilla instant pudding mix, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and two sugars until well combined. Beat in vanilla pudding mix. Add eggs, one at a time, until well incorporated. Mix in vanilla extract. In another small bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, and salt. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just incorporated. Fold in m&ms and white chocolate chips. Drop tablespoon size cookie dough onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes, or until just turning golden brown. Cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes before removing to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: eggless chocolate cookies ; ingredients: margarine, oil, sugar, water, salt, baking soda, flour, cocoa ; preparation:Cream margarine, oil, sugar and 1 t water until light and fluffy. Mix in remaining 2-3 t of water and beat well. Mix dry ingredients. Add to margarine mixture and mix until combined. Refrigerate for 30 minutes to an hour. Preheat oven 400f and grease a cookie sheet well. Make 24 balls. Bake for 10 minutes, should be very puffy. Allow to cool for 5 minutes on baking sheet, they will fall considerably due to the lack of egg. ; name: cherry chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: eggnog cookies ; ingredients: white sugar, butter, eggnog, vanilla extract, egg yolks, ground nutmeg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, ground cinnamon ; preparation:

name: kfc macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, velveeta cheese, cheddar cheese, whole milk, salt ; preparation:In a pot bring water to a boil with salt to taste, once the water comes to a boil add the macaroni and cook for 12 to 15 minutes. When the noodles are cooked drain but do not rinse. To make the cheese sauce in a pan over low heat combine the velveeta cheese, shredded cheddar and the milk. Cook the cheeses till they are melted and then add the salt. Add the noodles and mix through. Place in a casserole dish and bake at 400 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes. You may want to broil the top to make a brown top. ; name: four cheese macaroni ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, milk, butter, white pepper, salt, american cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. Return to pot. Add milk, melted butter, pepper, and salt. Stir in cheeses. Transfer to a greased 2-quart casserole. Bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Carefully stir mixture. Sprinkle with crushed crackers. Bake 5 minutes more or until crackers are browned and mixture is just heated through. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. ; name: super creamy and cheesy mac and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, milk, flour, salt and pepper, butter, cheese ; preparation:Cook the macaroni and set aside. In a pot, melt the butter and mix in salt and pepper. Slowly add in the flour, stirring continuously. Gradually add the milk and stir the mixture until smooth. Add the cheese on a low heat and melt into the mixture. Once the mixture is at your desired consistency, mix in the drained macaroni. ; name: old school mac n cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, eggs, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, italian cheese blend, american cheese, milk ; preparation:Boil pasta till half cooked. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top. ; name: dump macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, butter, eggs, evaporated milk, salt and pepper, dry mustard, paprika ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Mix cooked pasta and all ingredients in a sprayed casserole dish. Sprinkle paprika on top for color if desired. Bake in 350 degree fahrenheit oven for 30 to 45 minutes until done. Serve hot. ; name: one pot macaroni and cheese by consumer reports ; ingredients: water, salt, elbow macaroni, sharp cheddar cheese, margarine, heavy cream, paprika, white pepper, cayenne ; preparation:Using a two-quart saucepan, bring salted water to a boil. Stir in the macaroni and return the water to a boil. Stirring occasionally, continue boiling for four minutes. Then lower the heat to medium and continue to boil the macaroni with frequent stirring for seven more minutes. Add the remainder of the ingredients, stirring well until the cheese is melted. To modify and reduce saturated fat and salt, eliminate the salt, substitute low-cholesterol cheese and skim milk for the cheddar and the cream and add two teaspoons of fried onions. ; name: home style macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, elbow macaroni, salt, alfredo sauce, sharp cheddar cheese, olive oil, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Lightly mist an 11x7 inch glass or ceramic baking dish with vegetable oil cooking spray and set aside. Bring a large pot of water to a boil over high heat. Add salt, if using, and stir in the macaroni. Reduce heat to medium-high and cook uncovered about 8 minutes. Reserve 1 cup of the pasta cooking water, then drain the macaroni well in a colander. Transfer the macaroni to the prepared baking dish. Add the pasta sauce, 2 cups of the cheese, and the reserved pasta cooking water, and stir until ingredients are well combined. Scatter the remaining 1 cup of cheese over the top. In a small bowl, toss the olive oil with the bread crumbs, and then scatter on top of the cheese. Bake until the macaroni and cheese is bubbly and the crumbs are lightly brown, 25 to 30 minutes. ; name: home made macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, evaporated milk, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, velveeta cheese, ground cayenne pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: chicken with ginger ; ingredients: fresh ginger, canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, garlic cloves, soy sauce, white vinegar, sugar, scallion ; preparation:Soak ginger in cold water 10 minutes. Drain. Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions. ; name: grilled ginger chicken ; ingredients: soy sauce, lime juice, liquid honey, fresh ginger, garlic, tabasco sauce, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:In a small bowl, stir soy sauce, lime juice, honey, ginger, garlic and tobasco. If you want this as a marinade, make this several hours in advance, pour into a ziploc bag, add chicken and marinate in fridge for several hours shaking often. Alternatively, you can brush both sides of the chicken after making the sauce for a quick meal. Lightly oil grill and then heat bbq to medium. Bbq with lid closed, turning and basting halfway through with remaining marinade. Remember not to baste chicken before taking off grill since raw chicken was in it. Make sure the baste is fully cooked before removing from grill. Grill for 12- 16 minutes until juices run clear. ; name: garlic ginger chicken for two ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, butter, garlic cloves, cumin, ground ginger, lemon juice, dark brown sugar, water ; preparation:Use one tablespoon of the olive oil to saute the chicken breast over medium heat until brown, set aside. Add second tablespoon of olive oil, butter, garlic and spices and saut until fragrant. Add lemon juice and stir until mixed. Add reserved chicken, brown sugar and enough water or wine to create a sauce with the spices and sugar. Simmer about 10 minutes, turning once, until the flavors begin to penetrate the meat. Add more water as needed. ; name: ginger chicken with peaches and onions ; ingredients: peach, red onions, gingerroot, soy sauce, olive oil, toasted sesame oil, chicken breasts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Place frozen peaches and onion slices on a large rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle with ginger, soy sauce, one tablespoon of olive oil, sesame oil, and red pepper flakes, and toss to coat. Rub chicken breasts with remaining teaspoon of olive oil, and season with salt and pepper to taste. Arrange chicken skin-side up among peaches and onions. Roast until chicken is opaque throughout and registers 160 on a thermometer inserted in the thickest part of the breast, about 25 to 30 minutes. Serve over rice, couscous, or bulgur. ; name: spicy ginger orange chicken ; ingredients: orange marmalade, orange juice, fresh ginger, dijon mustard, tabasco sauce, salt & pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Blend together all the ingredients except the chicken. Brush the breasts all over with the marmalade mixture. Place in a baking dish lined with foil. Bake for 20-25 minutes until done, basting every 8 minutes. If there is any sauce left, heat, and serve along side the chicken. Serve. ; name: broiled chicken in spicy marinade ; ingredients: chicken breasts, red pepper flakes, fresh gingerroot, garlic, sea salt, ground cumin, ground coriander, saffron thread, plain yogurt, lime juice ; preparation:Place the red pepper flakes in a small bowl and cover with 1 tbs. Of boiling water. After 10 minutes mash the flakes with the back of a spoon. Mix this paste with the ginger, garlic, sea salt, cumin, coriander and saffron. Add it all to the yogurt and stir well, incorporating the lime juice last. Spoon about three-quarters of the marinade over the breats, moving them around until the are completely covered. Refrigerate until ready to cook. Thiscan be done 2 to 3 hours before cooking or overnight. Reserve the rest of the marinade in the refrigerator. Preheat the broiler and broil the breasts about 4 to 5 minutes on each side, until done. Serve with a dollop of the marinade with each breast as an accompaniment. ; name: marinated herbed grilled chicken ; ingredients: lemon juice, olive oil, herbs, garlic ; preparation:In a gallon sized ziploc baggie take all the above listed ingredients. And thrown in any desired chicken pieces. You can use a whole chicken or drunsticks or thighs or breasts. I used about 6-8 thighs and marinate at least 4 hours overnight is better turning every 4 hours or so. Heat a grill on one side on medium high heat making sure to place the chicken on the side of the grill that doesnt have fire underneath as the oil will cause it to flame and burn cook untill 165 degrees or juices run clear. Cooking times will vary depending on the grill you use my grill is a charcoal grill and took about 20-35 minutes depending on breast size you will need to adjust accordingly also i prefer to let my chicken set just a minute or 2 before servig i also served this with my quick and easy mederterainian rice recipe. ; name: marinated ginger chicken ; ingredients: frying chickens, lemon juice, vegetable oil, soy sauce, gingerroot, onion salt, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: down and dirty rice ; ingredients: rice, ground beef, french onion soup, reduced-fat cream of mushroom soup, green onion, red bell pepper, celery, parsley, fat-free chicken broth, creole seasoning ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together. Spray a 9x13-inch pan with nonfat, nonstick cooking spray. Place ingredients into pan. Bake for 1 hour. After the first 15 minutes stir ingredients to break-up the ground beef. Continue to stir every 15 minutes until the ground beef is broken into bite-sized pieces. Serve. You can also substitute ground chicken, turkey or pork. ; name: red rice sausage ; ingredients: vegetable oil, hot smoked sausage, onion, green pepper, celery, water, tomato sauce, salt, black pepper, parboiled rice ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy pan over medium heat. Add the sausage pieces and cook until brown, about 5 minutes. Add the onions, green peppers, and celery. Cook for 3 minutes. Add the water, tomato sauce, salt and pepper. Heat to boiling. Stir in the rice. Reduce heat to simmer. Cook covered, until rice is tender, about 30 minutes. Remove from heat and keep covered until time to serve. ; name: brown rice and vegetable saute ; ingredients: quick-cooking brown rice, vegetable broth, olive oil, onion, broccoli florets, baby portabella mushrooms, garlic clove, thyme, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:Prepare rice as directed on box using broth of your choice. Meanwhile over medium-high heat, heat olive oil and add onion. Saute for 3 minutes, stirring often. Add broccoli and cover for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add mushrooms and remaining ingredients to pan and saute until mushrooms release their juices, approximately 5 minutes. Serve over brown rice. ; name: easy texas rice ; ingredients: white rice, oil, onion, bell pepper, chicken stock, diced tomatoes, chili powder, garlic salt ; preparation:In a saute pan, brown the rice in oil over low to medium heat, stirring constantly. When the rice is brown, add the onion, bell pepper, chili powder and garlic salt. Turn the heat to high, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the tomatoes, and then chicken stock. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce the heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and let stand for 15-20 minutes. ; name: chinese beef rice ; ingredients: rice, vegetable oil, salt, boiling water, beef bouillon cubes, soy sauce, ground beef, onions, celery ribs, green peppers ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook the rice in oil over medium heat, stirring, until golden brown. Add salt, water, bouillon and soy sauce. Cover tightly and simmer 20 minutes. Brown ground beef. Drain. Stir meat, onions, celery and green pepper into rice. Cover and simmer 10 minutes longer or until all liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. ; name: sausage rice skillet with broccoli ; ingredients: kielbasa, scallions, rice, beef broth, frozen mixed vegetables, frozen broccoli, garlic powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:In a skillet, cook sausage over medium high heat, stirring occasionally, until browned, 8-10 minutes. Drain off fat. Stir in scallions, rice, broth, vegetables, garlic powder, salt and pepper. Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat to medium low, cover and simmer for 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed and rice is tender. ; name: thai celery rice cooker rice ; ingredients: butter, garlic clove, celery, carrot, rice, water, dried chili ; preparation:Saute. Carrot. Add celery. Add garlic. Put into rice cooker. Add rice water and chili. Cook. ; name: baby kay s dirty rice ; ingredients: pork sausage, ground beef, cayenne pepper, black pepper, salt, onion, celery, green bell pepper, long grain rice ; preparation:

name: danish dessert cake mignon s recipe sarah ; ingredients: white cake mix, water, egg whites, oil, cream cheese, powdered sugar, whipping cream, junket danish dessert mix, frozen strawberries ; preparation:Use a little more than half of the cake mix, add water, egg whites and oil. Bake as directed in a 9x13 inch pan. Let cake cool. Mix the powered sugar with the cream cheese together till smooth. Whip the whipping cream and fold into powered sugar and cream cheese mixture. Pour on cooled cake and put in fridge. Cook danish dessert according to package directions. When danish dessert has cooled add fruit and put on top of cream cheese mixture. ; name: norwegian gold cake ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, eggs, sugar, baking powder, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Place butter and flour in a mixing bowl. Mix 5 minutes at low speed. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Sift together sugar, baking powder and salt. Add gradually to creamed mixture. Add vanilla and mix additionaly 2 minutes. Turn into greased and floured 10 inch tube or bundt pan. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. ; name: coffee and sour cream cake ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, eggs, coffee, hot water, self raising flour, plain flour, milk, sour cream ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar, add egg, mix. Add coffee, mix. Add milk and flour alternately. Add sour cream. Bake 25 minutes 350. ; name: low fat apple spice cake ; ingredients: apple pie filling, spice cake mix, egg, egg whites ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray bundt pan with non stick cooking spray. Combine all ingredients in bowl using hand mixer, until well blended. The apples should be pretty well pulverized. Pour into bundt pan. Bake for approximately 40 minutes. ; name: norwegian noodle pudding ; ingredients: medium noodles, butter, cinnamon, raisins, sugar, salt, almond extract, eggs, milk ; preparation:Boil noodles in salted water until just barely tender. Strain the noodles and rinse with cold water. Place in bowl. Melt the butter and put half in a large casserole or baking dish, coating the sides and bottom. Preheat oven to 350 and place the empty dish in the oven. Add cinnamon, raisins, sugar, salt and almond extract to the noodles. In a separate bowl, beat eggs. Add milk and beat again until well blended. Add to the noodles with the remainder of the melted butter. Stir well. Pour into the heated casserole dish and bake until the top is golden brown, 1 hour or longer. ; name: marshmallow cake ; ingredients: margarine, marshmallows, toffee pieces, rice krispies ; preparation:In a pan melt together the margarine, marshmallows and toffee pieces. When melted, take off the heat. Add the rice krispies. Mix well. Pour into a greased tray. Flatten mixture and leave to set. ; name: apple spice cake ; ingredients: spice cake mix, apple pie filling, eggs, walnuts, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine all ingredients. Mix throughly with a spoon. Make sure lumps from the cake mix, are broken up. Pour into a greased and floured 10-inch bundt pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool for 20 minutes, before removing cake from pan. Delicious when served slightly warm, with vanilla ice cream. ; name: norwegian lingonberry cake with streusel topping ; ingredients: flour, sugar, cardamom, baking powder, unsalted butter, egg, lingonberry preserves, oatmeal, butter, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: pickled garlic ; ingredients: garlic cloves, white vinegar, water, salt, sugar, dill, mustard seeds, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Bring vinegar, water and spices to a boil. Add garlic and bring back to a boil. Pour into clean, sterilized jars. Seal tight and store in cool place. Keep sealed for 3 weeks before using to get best flavor. Separating garlic into cloves and soaking them for 2 or 3 hours makes the outer skin easier to remove. ; name: microwave sweet pickles ; ingredients: salt, turmeric, mustard seeds, celery seed, white vinegar, sugar, cucumbers, onion ; preparation:In small bowl mix salt, tumeric, mustard seed, celery seed, vinegar and sugar. In microwavable bowl, mix cucumbers and onion. Pour vinegar mixture over cucumbers and onion. Microwave, uncovered, on high for 5 minutes. Stir well, return to microwave for 5 minutes more. Cool. Pour into quart jar and refrigerate. Pickles are ready to eat when thoroughly chilled. ; name: pickled cabbage and peppers ; ingredients: cabbage, bell peppers, pickling salt, sugar, white wine vinegar, hot pepper flakes, mustard seeds, garlic cloves ; preparation:In a large bowl or cork, toss the cabbage and peppers with the salt. Cover and let stand in a cool place for 8-12 hours. In a non-reactive saucepan, combine the sugar and vinegar. Bring to a boil, then let it cool. Rinse the cabbage, and drain it well. Toss with the pepper flakes, mustard seeds and garlic. Pack the vegetable mixture firmly into pint mason jars. Pour the vinegar mixture over the vegetables. Close the jars with hot two-piece caps. Process the jars for 20 minutes in a boiling water bath. Store the cooled jars in a cool, dry, dark place for at least 3 weeks before eating the cabbage. ; name: sugar free pickle relish ; ingredients: dill pickle spears, onion, splenda sugar substitute, celery seed, mustard seeds, cider vinegar ; preparation:Drain liquid from pickles into a non reactive pan. Throw in the onion, splenda, celery seed and mustard seed. Bring to a simmer for about 20 to 30 minutes. While that is simmering chop the pickles either by hand or in the food processor to the consistancy you like your relish to be, fine or coarse. Add the 2 tablespoons of cider vinegar to the chopped pickles. Put the chopped up pickles back in the jar and pour the brine back over the whole thing. Store in the fridge and use like store bought relish. ; name: quick pickles ; ingredients: sugar, vinegar, salt, celery salt, dill seed, cucumbers, onion ; preparation:Stir sugar in the vinegar until dissolved. Add salt, celery salt, and dill seed, mixing together. Pour over cucumbers and onions. Stir and push under liquid. Let stand for 24 hours. Put in jars and refrigerate. No need to can, just keep in refrigerator. They will keep indefinetely in refrigerator. ; name: new pickle ; ingredients: cucumbers, yellow onion, sugar, water, white vinegar, dried dill, garlic clove ; preparation:Peel and cut cucumbers into thin slices. Mix with the yellow onion and minced garlic. Bring to a boil the sugar, water, white vinegar, and dill. Pour over cucumber mixture, and chill for 1 hour before serving. This keeps for several days in the fridge. ; name: solar dill pickles ; ingredients: water, white vinegar, kosher salt, alum, garlic cloves, dill ; preparation:Dissolve in 1 gallon glass jar. Pack with clean cucumbers. Put on lid. Let stand in the sun for 48 hours. Chill in frig until gone. ; name: joanne s sweet and hot pickles ; ingredients: kosher dill pickles, sugar, tabasco sauce, garlic ; preparation:

name: basmati chaaval ; ingredients: basmati rice, salt, unsalted butter, water ; preparation:Pick the rice over and put in a bowl. Wash in several changes of water. Drain. Pour 3 times the water you have rice over the rice and let soak for 30 minutes hour. Drain thoroughly. Combine the rice, salt, butter and the water in a pot. Bring to a boil. Cover with a tight fitting lid, turn heat to very low and cook for 20 minutes. Lift the lid, mix gently but quickly with a fork and cover again. Cook for 5-10 minutes until tender. ; name: renkon butter ; ingredients: butter, peanut oil, fresh lotus root, soy sauce, bonito flakes ; preparation:Over medium-high temperature, heat a saut pan. Add the butter and peanut oil, melt together, and simmer until the butter is almost browned. Add the lotus root slices and saut until edges are browned on each side. Add the soy sauce, stir, turn slices over, remove the pan from heat, and let sit for about 15 to 20 seconds. Move the lotus root to a shallow serving bowl and cover with the bonito flakes. Serve immediately. ; name: country club corn ; ingredients: cream, whole kernel corn, black pepper, butter, saltine crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease or butter a small, shallow casserole dish. In the prepared dish, combine the cream, corn, and pepper. Cut butter in small pieces and put on top of corn. Put the broken saltine pieces on top of casserole. Bake until slightly brown on top. ; name: mujadara ; ingredients: olive oil, sweet onions, green lentil, brown basmati rice, water, salt ; preparation:Saute onion in oil until caramelized. While onions are cooking place lentils in saucepan and cover with water by an inch. Bring to boil over medium heat. Reduce to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes. Drain lentils and set aside. When onions are ready stir in rice, lentils, salt and 2 cups water. Bring to a boil, cover and reduce heat to a simmer. Simmer for 40 minutes or until rice is tender. ; name: colombian frijoles ; ingredients: red beans, pork knuckle, vegetable oil, lard, tomatoes, green onion, cumin, cilantro, salt ; preparation:Cut the pork knuckle into little pieces, the size of your thumbnail. In a non stick pan, fry the pork until the pieces are crisp, and golden brown in colour. Remove from pan, and drain. Rinse the beans and run them through your hands to make sure that there are no small stones or bits of earth among them. Put the beans, pork fritters and lard into the pot and add enough water to cover the beans. Boil for about 2 hours stirring occasionally every 20 minutes, covered until they are tender, but not soft. In a separate pan, saut the green onions and tomatoes for about 8- 10 minutes, until you get a nice thick sauce and all the tomatoes are dissolved. Remove from fire and add the tomato sauce to the bean stew. Add the salt, cumin and cilantro, and simmer for another 30 minutes, adding water if necessary. Serve with rice. ; name: corn spoon bread ; ingredients: whole milk, fresh corn kernels, cornmeal, butter, fresh thyme leave, kosher salt, black pepper, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisking constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: dry potato sabji ; ingredients: potatoes, mustard seeds, hing, chili powder, coriander powder, turmeric, fenugreek seeds, salt, oil, cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in a wok. Add mustard seeds, cover to avoid splatter. After seeds crackle, add potatoes and hing. Cook 1 minute. Add chili powder, coriander powder, turmeric, salt, and fenugreek seeds. Stir well. Reduce heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, until potatoes are crispy and tender. Stir in cilantro. ; name: gramma grampa fjerstad s lefse ; ingredients: potatoes, heavy cream, butter, salt, flour ; preparation:

name: sugar free pumpkin custard ; ingredients: egg, egg white, equal sugar substitute, canned pumpkin, evaporated milk, cinnamon ; preparation:Put pumpkin and evaporated milk in mixing bowl. Break an egg and egg white into the mixture. With mixer or wooden spoon, beat mixture until smooth. Add the cinnamon. Mix well. Pour into custard cups. Place water inside casserole pan and put custard cups inches. Bake 15 minutes at 425f. Lower temperature to 350f and bake for another 40 to 45 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: ground rice sweet custard ; ingredients: short-grain rice, cornstarch, milk, sugar, rose water, almonds, pistachio nut, ground cinnamon, syrup ; preparation:Blend the ground rice and the cornstarch together into a smooth paste, adding a little of the cold milk. Bring the remaining milk to a boil in a saucepan. Add the sugar, lower heat enough to maintain a gentle simmer. Gradually add the ground rice mixture to the milk, stirring constantly with a wooden spoon. Simmer on very low heat for 10-15 minutes or until the mixture has thickened, stirring often and being very careful not to allow it to burn- especially on the bottom of the pan. Add the rosewater and half of the ground almonds, simmer 5 minutes. Let cool a few minutes and then pour into a serving bowl or 4 serving dishes. Sprinkle remaining ground almonds and all of the ground pistachios on top and dust with some ground cinnamon. Serve with syrup or honey on the side. Grind the raw rice in a blender or food processor. ; name: festal golden pumpkin pie ; ingredients: canned pumpkin, deep dish pie shells, eggs, granulated sugar, salt, cinnamon, clove, nutmeg, ginger, carnation evaporated milk ; preparation:Prepare 1 pie crust. Combine eggs, sugar, salt, and spices and beat well. Blend in pumpkin. Add milk and beat well. Turn into pastry lined pie pan. Bake in a hot oven for 10 minutes, then reduce heat and bake at 350 degrees for 40 to 45 minutes. Pie is done when knife, inserted in center, comes out clean. Cool on rack for 2 hours, then serve immediately or refrigerate. ; name: polenta pumpkin casserole ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, canned solid-pack pumpkin, salt, ground nutmeg, evaporated milk, skim milk, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a medium saucepan, combine cornmeal, pumpkin, salt and nutmeg. Gradually stir in evaporated milk and skim milk until mixture is smooth. Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture thickens, about 10 minutes. Stir in butter. Spoon mixture into a 1-quart casserole dish. Bake 30-35 minutes, or until casserole is firm on top and lightly golden. ; name: baked cinnamon bread custard ; ingredients: cinnamon-swirl bread, eggs, egg yolks, sugar, milk, half-and-half, vanilla, powdered sugar ; preparation:Arrange bread in a double layer in a lightly greased 9-by-13-inch baking pan. Whisk togather eggs, egg yolks and sugar. Gradually add milk, half and half and vanilla. Pour mixture over bread. Bake in a 375-degree oven for 25 to 30 minutes, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Dust with powdered sugar while warm and serve. ; name: baked custard cups ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, nutmeg, vanilla, milk ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients, stir until blended. Slowly add scalded milk, stirring constantly. Pour into 4 custard cups. Set cups in 9x9 inch baking pan. Pour 1 inch hot water into pan. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes, or until knife comes out clean. Remove from pan, cool. Chill. ; name: easy baked custard ; ingredients: sugar, all-purpose flour, vanilla extract, salt, milk, eggs, margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven 350 f. Combine all ingredients in a blender. Blend until smooth. Pour into a buttered 9-in. Deep-dish pie or cake pan. Bake at for 50 minutes or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack until room temperature. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: microwave pumpkin custard ; ingredients: canned pumpkin, evaporated skim milk, light-brown sugar, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, ground nutmeg, salt, egg, egg white ; preparation:

name: creamed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, vegetable oil, cream of chicken soup, water, salt, black pepper, sour cream, english muffins, cayenne pepper, paprika ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute the chicken in oil until no longer pink. Stir in the soup, water, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat and stin in sour cream. Serve over toasted english muffins. Can also serve over cooked noodles. Sprinkle with cayenne pepper or paprika. ; name: saucy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, celery seed, paprika, garlic, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix first 8 ingredients in plastic bag. Add chicken and marinate in refrigerator overnight. Remove chicken from bag and coat with crumbs. Heat oven to 350. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. ; name: diamond chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, swiss cheese, seasoning salt, seasoned stuffing mix, cream of chicken soup, white wine ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in an 8x8-inch pan. Lay swiss cheese over each breast. Sprinkle with seasoned salt. Mix soup with wine, pour over chicken. Sprinkle with stuffing mix. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. ; name: cream of chicken casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, lemon juice ; preparation:Boil chicken breasts until fully cooked. Put in casserole dish and set aside. Mix soup, mayonnaise, and cheese together. Pour over chicken. Bake at 350f for 20 to 30 minutes. Sprinkle with lemon juice during last 5 minutes of baking. ; name: easy and basic boneless chicken breasts ; ingredients: vegetable oil, salt, boneless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, chicken broth, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:In a large skillet, brown the salted chicken pieces in oil. Cook over medium heat for 10 minutes or until browned. Crush garlic cloves and scatter over the chicken add the broth. Turn heat to low. Cover and cook for about 15 minutes each side or until cooked through. Remove cover, add salt and red pepper flakes. Add water and simmer over low heat until water is cooked off. ; name: stove top and chicken ; ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:Prepare stove top with 1 cup water. In small mixing bowl mix soup and sour cream. Place chicken breast on bottom of 9x13 baking pan. Pour soup mix over top. Spoon stuffing on top. Bake covered for 30 minutes. Uncover bake an additional 5 to 10 minutes. ; name: scrumptious chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, dry onion soup mix, fresh basil ; preparation:Grease the bottom and sides of slow cooker. Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine all the remaining ingredients except fresh herbs. Pour over chicken. Cover. Cook on low for 6 hours. Sprinkle with fresh herbs just before serving. Serve with rice, couscous, or over toast as a sos meal. ; name: chicken breasts royal ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, fat free sour cream, all-purpose flour, green onions, white wine, seasoning salt, paprika, liquid gravy browner ; preparation:

name: mediterranean cod ; ingredients: cod, olive oil, red onion, plum tomatoes, black olives, dried thyme, dried basil ; preparation:Rinse fish, pat dry with paper towels. Season fish with salt and pepper to taste. In a large skillet heat 4 tsp of the oil over medium high heat. Add fish and onion. Cook 1 minute, turning once. Top fish with tomatoes, olives and thyme. Reduce heat. Cover and cook 2 minutes. Drizzle with remaining 4tsp oil, sprinkle with basil. Cover and cook 2-3 minutes more or until fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: roasted cod with potatoes and olives ; ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, olive oil, salt and pepper, cod fish fillets, cherry tomatoes, kalamata olive ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450f. On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes with the garlic, rosemary, and 1 tbs oil. Season generously with salt and pepper. Arrange potatoes in a single layer, cut side down. Bake, tossing potatoes once, until beginning to brown, about 20 minute. Meanwhile, rub fillets with remaining tsp oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Remove baking sheet from the oven. Add the tomatoes and olives to the potatoes. Stir to combine. Push the vegetable mixture to one side of the baking sheet and place the fillets flat on the baking sheet next to the vegetables. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast until the fish is cooked through and potatoes are brown and tender, about 15-20 minute. Transfer the fish and vegetables to a serving platter and serve immediately. ; name: cod portuguese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, chopped tomatoes, paprika, orange, juice of, cod fish fillets, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy fry pan and saute the onion, garlic and pepper for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, paprika and orange juice. Season, stir well and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Lay the fish fillets on top, cutting them to fit the pan if necessary. Season lightly, cover and simmer gently for 12-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked but still firm. Transfer to serving dishes and sprinkle with parsley. Serve. ; name: easy oven baked cod ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, lemon, zest of, coarse salt, cod fish fillets, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f line your pan with aluminum foil and lightly brush with olive oil, or use a bit of cooking spray. Combine parsley, garlic, lemon zest, and coarse salt on the cutting board. Finely chop, then combine with the breadcrumbs in a shallow plate. Brush top of each fillet with olive oil. Press fillet into the crumb mixture. Place fillets in baking dish, crust-side up. Bake until firm, about 12-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of the fish. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: crunchy topped cod ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, tomatoes, whole wheat bread crumbs, fresh parsley, sunflower oil, lemon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Arrange the cod fillets in a wide ovenproof dish. Arrange the tomato slices on top. Mix the bread crumbs, fresh parsley, oil, lemon zest and juice. Season to taste. Spoon the crumb mixture evenly over the fish, then bake for 15-20 minutes. Serve. ; name: roasted cod with prosciutto cherry tomatoes and olives ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, pitted black olives, capers, lemon, juice and rind of, thyme, extra virgin olive oil, cod fish fillets, prosciutto, salt and pepper, basil leaves ; preparation:Combine the tomatoes, olives, capers, lemon rind, thyme and oil in a roasting pan and season with salt and pepper. Fit the cod fillets into the pan, spooning some of the tomato mixture over the fish. Scatter the ham over the top and roast in a preheated oven, 425 degrees f, for 15 minutes. Remove the pan from the oven, drizzle over the lemon juice, cover with foil and let rest for 5 minutes. Garnish the cod with basil leaves and serve with new potatoes and a green salad. ; name: lemon cod ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, vegetable oil cooking spray, parsley, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, lemon ; preparation:Spray a nonstick frypan with veggies cooking spray and heat to medium. Spray veggie cooking spray over both sides of the cod fillets. Squeese 2 lemon sections over cod surfaces. Sprinkle parsley, italian seasoning, salt and pepper over both sides of the cod filets. Place cod into medium hot frypan, cook for about 5 minutes, carefully turn and cook a further 5 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve hot with the other 2 lemon sections for garnish. ; name: mediterranean skillet cod south beach diet phase 1 ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, zucchini, onion, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper, diced tomatoes, roasted red pepper, cod, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: raspberry s mores ; ingredients: graham crackers, marshmallows, chocolate candy bars, fresh raspberry ; preparation:Adjust rack to middle position and heat broiler. You may also use a toaster oven. Break the crackers in half to form squares and place on a baking sheet. Arrange 4 marshmallow halves on top of each square. Broil for 30-60 seconds or until golden brown. Remove from oven. Break chocolate bar into 12 pieces. Arrange the chocolate and raspberries on one half of the crackers. Invert remaining marshmallow topped crackers onto the raspberry and chocolate topped crackers, pressing gently to for a cookies sandwich. ; name: s more smoothies ; ingredients: marshmallow creme, chocolate syrup, milk, ice, graham cracker squares, mini marshmallows, mini chocolate chip ; preparation:Add the marshmallow creme to the container of an electric blender. Add in the chocolate syrup and milk. Add the ice on top and crumble the graham crackers over the ice. Cover and blend on high until smooth and all the marshmallow creme has been incorporated. Pour mixture into 2 chilled glasses. Garnish with the mini marshmallows and chocolate chips. ; name: pound cake s mores ; ingredients: poundcake, mini marshmallows, semi-sweet chocolate chips, caramel ice cream topping, nuts ; preparation:Place pound cake slices on a baking sheet. I line the sheet with foil for easy clean-up. Sprinkle each slice with marshmallows and chocolate chips. Above measurements are approximate for these toppings. I make sure each slice is covered but not heaping. Broil 4-6 inches from the heat for 1-2 minutes or til marshmallows are lightly browned. Transfer to a plate. Drizzle with caramel ice cream topping and sprinkle on nuts if desired. ; name: hershey s homemade chocolate ice cream ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, condensed milk, chocolate milk, vanilla, semisweet chocolate ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add sugar and mix well. Add condensed milk, chocolate milk, melted chocolate, and vanilla one ingredient at a time, stirring well after each addition. Mix until smooth. Pour directly into ice cream mixer or machine. For best results let ice cream freeze over night. ; name: popcorn s mores ; ingredients: light brown sugar, butter, corn syrup, baking soda, popped popcorn, mini marshmallows, graham crackers, chocolate chips ; preparation:Combine the brown sugar, butter, and corn syrup in a medium saucepan and cook over high heat for 5 minutes. Remove from the heat and stir in the baking soda. Combine the popcorn and the marshmallows in a large metal or heat-resistant glass bowl. Drizzle the sugar mixture mixture over the popcorn, then gently stir in the graham cracker cookies and chocolate chips. Let the mixture set until cool enough to handle, then using buttered plastic sandwich bags on your hands, form the mixture into golf-ball-sized balls. Store in an airtight container. ; name: mexican s mores ; ingredients: flour tortillas, mini marshmallows, mini chocolate chip, peanut butter, aluminum foil ; preparation:Spread peanut butter on a tortilla. Scatter a few chips and marshmallows on the peanut butter. Fold sides in on tortilla. Roll up tortilla. Wrap tightly in foil. Bake at 350 for 10 minutes or grill til melted. ; name: s more muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, graham cracker crumbs, brown sugar, baking soda, salt, egg, buttermilk, vegetable oil, semi-sweet chocolate chips, miniature marshmallows ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the dry ingredients. Combine egg, buttermilk and oil. Mix well. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fold in chocolate chips and 1 cup marshmallows. Fill greased jumbo muffin cups three fourths full. Sprinkle with remaining marshmallows. Bake at 375 degrees for 18-20 or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to wire rack. Serve warm. ; name: s mores ice cream homemade ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, heavy cream, milk, vanilla, honey graham crackers, hershey bar, miniature marshmallow ; preparation:

name: so simple oyster stew ; ingredients: oyster, milk, margarine, fresh ground white pepper, salt, paprika, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oysters in their liquid in medium saucepan over high heat until oyster edges begin to curl, about 2 to 3 minutes. Heat milk and margarine together in large saucepan over medium high heat just to boiling. Add the salt and pepper. Stir in the oysters and their liquid. Do not bring back to a boil or oysters will get tough. Pour stew in a large serving soup bowl. Dust with paprika and sprinkle with parsley. ; name: golden fried oysters ; ingredients: flour, yellow cornmeal, chili powder, salt, pepper, peanut oil, oysters, mayonnaise, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Combine flour, cornmeal, chili powder, salt and pepper. Set aside. Heat oil in cast iron skillet until it reaches 350 or flour bubbles immediately upon being sprinkled in it. Dredge oysters in flour mixture, shake off excess flour and fry in oil until golden brown, about 2 minutes. Transfer to paper towels. ; name: oysters with soy and sesame dressing ; ingredients: light soy sauce, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, oysters, green onions ; preparation:Place the soy sauce, vinegar and oil in a screw-top jar and shake until well combined. Place the oysters on a large serving platter. Drizzle over the soy and sesame dressing. Sprinkle with the green shallots. Serve immediately. ; name: big john s cajun fried oysters ; ingredients: oyster, butter, eggs, milk, habanero sauce, cornmeal, cajun seasoning, cayenne pepper, baking powder, hot pepper oil ; preparation:Drain oysters, reserving the liquid. Mix oyster liquid, eggs, hot sauce and milk. Mix cornmeal, cajun seasoning, cayenne and baking powder. Saute oysters in butter until edges curl. Remove from heat and let cool. Dip oysters first in liquid, then dredge in cornmeal mixture. Fry oysters in hot pepper oil for three minutes over medium heat, turning once, they are done when golden brown. Remove, drain on paper towels. Serve immediately. ; name: stir fried oysters with garlic ; ingredients: oyster, cornstarch, oyster sauce, soy sauce, oil, white wine, garlic, green onions, ginger ; preparation:Boil 4 cups water in pot and add oysters for 10-15 seconds. Remove with slotten spoon to paper towels to drain. Blend cornstarch with 4 tbs water and add oyster and soy sauce. Heat oil in wok, add wine, oysters, green onion& ginger. Stir fry 15 seconds. Add cornstarch mixture and stir fry 1 minute. Enjoy. ; name: pan fried oysters ; ingredients: oyster, flour, cornmeal, parsley, garlic, oil, margarine, lemon juice ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients. Dredge oysters in this and let sit on paper 5 minutes. Heat oil and butter until sizzling hot. Add oysters. Brown lightly 30-40 seconds on each side. Serve immediately with lemon juice or tartar sauce. ; name: fire and ice oysters with horseradish sauce ; ingredients: sour cream, prepared horseradish, fresh lemon juice, fresh chives, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, oysters ; preparation:Prepare the sauce by whisking together all ingredients except for the oysters. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes, or until ready to serve. Rinse and scrub the oysters with a stiff brush. To open them, on a folded kitchen towel, grip the oyster flat side up with another kitchen towel protecting your hand. Find the small opening between the shells near the hinge and pry open with an oyster knife. Try to keep the juices in the shell. Loosen the oyster from the shell by running the oyster knife carefully underneath the body. Discard the top, flatter shell, keeping the oyster in the bottom, deeper shell. Grill the oysters, shell side down, over direct high heat until the juices around the oysters boil and almost completely evaporate, 2-4 minutes. Using tongs, carefully remove the oysters from the grill. Spoon a small dollop of sauce on top of each oyster and serve with cocktail forks while oysters are hot. ; name: quick light oyster stew ; ingredients: water, butter, worcestershire sauce, canned oysters, salt, russet potato, low-fat milk, white pepper, ground nutmeg ; preparation:

name: yellow squash with basil ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow squash, garlic, water, salt, black pepper, basil ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium-high heat. Saute squash until browned, about 5 minutes. Add garlic. Saute 1 minute. Add water, salt and pepper. Simmer until squash is tender, 6-7 minutes. Stir in basil. ; name: butternut squash with garlic and olive oil ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, butternut squash, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel and cube squash. In a large bowl mix minced garlic and olive oil. Add cubed squash and coat with the oil mixture. Dump all ingredients out of bowl and in to a glass casserole dish. Any size will do really but it will cook faster if it is more spread out. Cook 40-45 minutes, stirring once or twice. Squash is done when it is tender. ; name: squash snackers ; ingredients: yellow squash, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh garlic, fresh basil, celery salt, asiago cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Coat the bottom of a casserole dish with olive oil. Line the bottom of the dish with the squash making sure that they are laid out evenly and sprinkle with vinegar. Top with even amounts of garlic, basil and celery salt. Bake uncovered at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and add about one cube of cheese per slice. Cook for another 15 minutes remove and let cool for five minutes and serve on crackers or eat by themselves. ; name: yellow squash and corn saute ; ingredients: corn, yellow squash, water, butter, fresh parsley, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Place corn into large pot and cover with salted water, bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer until tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Drain and cool corn. Cut corn off the cobs. Place squash into a skillet and add water. Cook suash over medium heat until tender, 5- to 10 minutes. Drain any excess water fromskillet. Stir corn butter parsley salt and pepper into squash. Cook, stirring occasionally, until heated through, about 5 minutes. ; name: squash and pepper saute ; ingredients: yellow squash, zucchini, sweet red pepper, olive oil, italian salad dressing mix, red wine vinegar ; preparation:In a large skillet or wok, stir fry the vegetables in oil until crisp-tender. Sprinkle with salad dressing mix. Toss to coat. Stir in vinegar. Mix well. ; name: yellow squash with fresh basil and toasted pecans ; ingredients: pecans, pattypan squash, olive oil, fresh basil ; preparation:Toast pecans in dry skillet over medium-high heat 4 to 6 minutes, or until golden brown and fragrant, shaking pan often. Set aside to cool. Fill large pot with 1 inch water. Set steamer basket in pot, cover, and bring water to a boil. Place squash in basket. Cover, reduce heat to medium low, and steam 4 to 6 minutes, or until squash is tender. Transfer squash to large bowl. Toss with olive oil, basil and pecans. Serve hot, or at room temperature. ; name: squash zucchini and potatoes ; ingredients: squash, zucchini, potatoes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Put water in pot add potatoes. Cook potatoes until a little soft. Add vegetables and cook until desired texture of veges. Olive oil or butter can be spread on top. Salt and pepper to desired taste. Since i am always watching my weight i do not put butter or olive oil on top only salt and pepper. ; name: smothered yellow squash with basil ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow squash, garlic cloves, water, salt, pepper, fresh basil ; preparation:

name: green beans with mushroom cream ; ingredients: fresh green beans, butter, mushrooms, garlic, heavy cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place a large covered pot of lightly salted water on the stove and bring it to a boil. In the meantime, melt butter in a small skillet, increase heat to high, add mushrooms and stir fry until golden brown. Reduce heat to low, add garlic and cook 1 minute. Add cream, salt and pepper and heat through on low. Add beans to boiling water and cook until just tender, drain. Place beans on a serving plate, spoon the mushroom cream across the middle of the beans, sprinkle with parmesan and parsley and serve. ; name: fresh creamy mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, butter, salt, pepper, flour, milk ; preparation:Wash, dry and slice mushrooms. Cook in butter till tender. Add salt, pepper and flour. Mix thoroughly. Add milk gradually and simmer for 5 to 8 minutes, stirring constantly. ; name: green beans with shiitake mushrooms ; ingredients: butter, fresh shiitake mushrooms, shallots, garlic cloves, green beans, low sodium chicken broth, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Melt 3 tablespoons butter in large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add shiitake mushrooms and saut until tender, about 5 minutes. Transfer mushrooms to medium bowl. Melt remaining 3 tablespoons butter in same skillet. Add shallots and garlic and saut until tender, about 2 minutes. Add green beans and toss to coat with butter. Pour broth over green bean mixture. Cover and simmer until liquid evaporates and green beans are crisp-tender, about 10 minutes. Stir in shiitake mushrooms. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to platter and serve. ; name: green bean medley ; ingredients: fresh green beans, carrots, butter, onion, fresh mushrooms, seasoning salt, garlic, white pepper ; preparation:Steam or cook carrots and green beans in boiling water. Cook until tender, but still firm. Melt butter over medium heat. Saute onions and mushrooms until almost tender. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for 3 minutes.
