Add eggs one at a time, beating thoroughly after each addition. Line a 9x13 pan with the crescent rolls. Pinch dough together to seal seams. Pour in filling and sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes. ; name: crescent taco roll ; ingredients: refrigerated reduced-fat crescent rolls, ground chuck, taco seasoning, low-fat cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, green peppers, fat free sour cream, taco sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Brown meat and drain fat. Follow taco mix preparation directions, make sure all water gets absorbed. Add cheese to meat and stir until meat sticks together and cheese is melted. On a 13-inch baking stone or large size pizza pan, arrange rolls with points outside and bases together. It helps to arrange a square with 4 of the rolls, and then arrange the rest of the rolls in a circle around the square with points facing out. Spoon taco mix over rolls, fill in and fold points over taco mix, pinch to seal. Bake for 11-13 minutes. Serve with lettuce, tomato, peppers, sour cream, taco sauce, or any taco toppings of your choosing. Can be sliced like a pie or cut into squares. ; name: crescent roll up sandwiches ; ingredients: crescent rolls, meat, cheese, mustard ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Seperate the crescent roll dough into the 8 triangles. Spread the mustard on the dough. Put 1 piece of meat and 1 piece of cheese on each roll, folding the meat over the cheese to copy the crescent triangle. Roll up the crescent roll, wide to narrow, and place on a cookie sheet with the point of the crescent on the bottom. Bake 15 to 20 minutes or until golden. Serve warm. ; name: crescent roll bars ; ingredients: crescent rolls, sugar, egg, vanilla, cream cheese, cinnamon ; preparation:Remove roll from the refridgerator 20 minutes ahead of time. Mix together 1 cup of sugar, egg yolk, vanilla and cream cheese in mixer. Place 1 package of crescent rolls in bottom of a greased 9x13 pan. Pour cream cheese mixture over top. Put second package of rolls over top. Beat egg white and spread over the top of rolls. Mix remaining sugar and cinnamon and sprinkle on top. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes. Cuts better if chilled overnight. ; name: chicken egg pie ; ingredients: crescent roll dough, cheddar cheese, bacon, cooked ham, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Unroll crescent dough. Separate into triangles. Arrange in a greased 9 inch pie plate, forming crust. Seal seams and perforations. Sprinkle with 1 cup cheese, bacon and ham. In a bowl, beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour over the ham. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Cover edges of crust loosely with foil. Bake at 350 for 20 to 25 minutes. Remove foil. Bake 20 minutes longer or until a knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: chicken and cheese crescent rolls ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cheddar cheese, cream of chicken soup, whole milk, crescent rolls ; preparation:

name: pasta with walnut lemon cream sauce ; ingredients: whipping cream, lemon peel, pasta, butter, sliced mushrooms, walnuts, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:In small saucepan, stir together whipping cream and lemon peel. Simmer until cream is reduced by one-third, about 15 minutes. Cook the pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, in large skillet, melt butter. Saute mushrooms. Drain pasta and combine with cream, mushrooms, walnuts and cheese. Toss lightly. Add salt and pepper. Sprinkle with parsley. ; name: pasta with pancetta and gorgonzola sauce ; ingredients: pasta, pancetta, onion, heavy cream, sherry wine, gorgonzola, ground nutmeg, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. While pasta is cooking, heat a cast iron skillet to medium high. Add pancetta and saute until fat begins to render. Add onion and saute until the onion is translucent and the pancetta begins to brown, about 5 minutes. Add the heavy cream and the sherry. Bring to a boil and then remove from heat. Add the gorgonzola and stir until smooth. Place the pan back on the heat just until the cheese is fully melted and stir in the nutmeg. Drain the pasta and put back into the pasta pot or a pasta bowl. Pour sauce over pasta and mix. Serve in shallow bowls and pass parmesan cheese for diners to grate over the hot pasta. ; name: pasta with zucchini sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, zucchini, walnuts, ricotta cheese, hot pepper flakes, tomatoes, pasta ; preparation:Saut garlic in oil until golden, about 3 minutes. Add zucchini and saut until tender crisp, about 8 minutes. Add nuts, cheese, pepper flakes and tomato. Stir and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes. Serve over hot pasta. ; name: pasta with herb butter ; ingredients: linguine, butter, fresh parsley, garlic powder, oregano leaves, lemon juice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook linguine according to package directions and then drain. Melt butter in large pyrex measuring cup and blend in remaining ingredients except cheese. Place pasta and butter back into saucepan used to cook the pasta in. Cook pasta for two minutes until reheated. Stir constantly. Put cooked pasta into serving bowl topped with parmesan cheese. ; name: pasta with egg salt and garlic ; ingredients: penne pasta, egg, sea salt, olive oil, garlic cloves, pepper ; preparation:Boil the pasta to taste. Meanwhile, chop the garlic into pieces the size of an electron. Whisk the egg. Drain the pasta. Mix in the garlic, egg, salt, oil and pepper. ; name: bacon pasta ; ingredients: bacon, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, penne pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream, pepper, green onion ; preparation:Cook bacon until crisp, drain on paper towel and crumble. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Saute mushrooms and garlic in bacon drippings until tender. Stir in cooked pasta, parmesan cheese, heavy cream and pepper. Simmer over low-med heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat. Stir in bacon and green onions. Serve hot. ; name: pasta with lemon pepper and parmigiano ; ingredients: egg noodles, olive oil, chicken stock, lemon, juice of, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, black pepper, salt, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a big casserole, cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain. Put pasta in a bowl. Add olive oil, chicken stock, lemon juice, parmigiano and pepper. Add salt if needed. Mix well. Serve immediately and sprinkle with parsley. Delicious with veal. ; name: pasta with courgette and walnut sauce ; ingredients: butter, onion, courgettes, pasta, walnuts, parsley, cream, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: frosty fruity smoothie ; ingredients: blueberries, unsweetened sliced peaches, milk, vanilla yogurt, honey, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Combine blueberries or huckleberries, peaches and milk in a blender. Cover and process on high until smooth. Add yogurt, honey, cinnamon and nutmeg. Process until well blended. Serve immediately. ; name: simple chocolate iced coffee ; ingredients: strong coffee, milk, chocolate syrup, ice ; preparation:Fill a tall glass with ice. Pour milk and chocolate syrup over the ice. Add cold coffee and stir well until chocolate syrup is dissolved. Can be fancied up with a dollop of whipped cream, a shot of kahlua, and a few curls of shaved chocolate if you like. Diabetics and dieters can substitute sugar-free chocolate syrup. ; name: chocolate cherry breakfast smoothie ; ingredients: sweet cherries, vanilla yogurt, nonfat milk, unsweetened cocoa powder, ice cubes, honey ; preparation:In the jar of a blender, combine the cherries, yogurt, milk, cocoa, and ice cubes. Blend on high speed or ice crush setting for 30-60 seconds, or until smooth. Stir in the honey, if desired. Pour into a glass. Serve immediately. ; name: frozen coffee squares ; ingredients: marshmallows, strong coffee, whipping cream, chocolate shavings ; preparation:Combine coffee and marshmellows in a pan cook on low til melted. Microwave might work too. Cool and fold in whipped cream. Spoon into an 8 x 8 inch pan and freeze for 3 hours until firm. Sprinkle top with chocolate shavings. Cut into squares and serve. ; name: strawberry banana papaya smoothie ; ingredients: strawberries, banana, papaya nectar, sugar, ice cubes ; preparation:Wash then hull strawberries. Slice in half. Peel banana and slice into thirds. Place in a blender or food processor. Pour in juice and optional ice cubes. Whirl until pured and frothy. Pour into tall glasses and serve. ; name: smoothie quick sob no dairy ; ingredients: tangelo, strawberries, splenda sugar substitute, banana, ice cubes ; preparation:Peel tangelo, section, and remove white strings. Place in blender. Hull strawberries and cut in quarters. Place in blender. Add splenda or sugar to blender. Peel banana and place 1 inch chunks in blender. Place ice cubes in blender. Blend for 30-40 seconds until smoothie reaches desired consistency. The blender may need to be jiggled at the beginning as there is no liquid in the bottom. ; name: banana split smoothies ; ingredients: bananas, crushed pineapple, milk, fresh strawberries, honey, ice cubes, whipped topping, chocolate syrup, maraschino cherry ; preparation:In a blender, combine the first five ingredients. Cover and process until smooth. Gradually add ice, blending until slushy. Pour into chilled glasses. Garnish with whipped topping, chocolate syrup and cherries. ; name: frozen coffee smoothie ; ingredients: strong coffee, brown sugar, vanilla bean, bananas, blanched almonds, ice cubes ; preparation:

name: low fat turkey in the garden meatloaf ; ingredients: ground turkey, frozen chopped spinach, quick oats, onion, carrot, nonfat milk, egg whites, italian herb seasoning, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Combine in a large mixing bowl the turkey or beef, the spinach, which has been squeezed to drain, the oats, onion, carrots, egg, milk, herbs, salt and pepper. Use a three-tined kitchen granny fork or wooden mixing fork to blend the meat ingredients. Pat into a 9x5-inch loaf pan that has been sprayed with a no-stick oil product, or shape into a loaf and place in the middle of a 13x9-inch baking pan. Bake 1 hour or until a thermometer registers 170 degrees and the center is no longer pink. If substituting beef for turkey, bake 50 to 55 minutes and thermometer should register 160 degrees internal temperature. Let loaf stand out of the oven for 5 minutes before slicing. ; name: meatloaf simple and delicious ; ingredients: ground beef, onion roasted garlic soup mix, ketchup, eggs, oatmeal, brown sugar, mustard ; preparation:Mix the ground beef, soup mix, ketchup, eggs and oatmeal together. Spray a 9x13 pan with cooking spray. Press the meatloaf into the pan. Mix the ketchup, brown sugar and mustard together and spread over the meatloaf. Bake at 350 for about 50 minutes. ; name: rosemary meatloaf ; ingredients: eggs, water, rolled oats, instant minced onion, salt, thyme leaves, rosemary, pepper, lean ground beef, ketchup ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13 x 9 x 2 inch baking pan with nonstick spray. In a large bowl, beat eggs slightly with a fork. Add water and oatmeal and let stand until liquid is absorbed stir in remaining ingredients, except meat. Mix well. Add meat, using your hands or a sturdy spoon and mix until well blended. Shape into a loaf in your baking pan. Make an indentation down center of loaf and fill with ketchup. Bake for 1 hour or until loaf is done. Remove from oven and cover with foil--let stand 10 to 15 minutes before serving and it will cut nicely. ; name: lighter meatloaf ; ingredients: worcestershire sauce, egg whites, black pepper, salt, hot pepper sauce, onion, canned tomato sauce, old fashioned oats, lean ground turkey, lean ground beef ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray loaf pan with cooking spray. Combine beef, turkey, onion, and oats in a large bowl, set aside. Mix together tomato sauce, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, egg whites, salt, and pepper. Add to meat mixture and mix well with hands. Press into pan and bake for 60-70 minutes. ; name: simple and delicious meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, carrot, mushrooms, celery, onion, bread, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Individually process carrot, mushroom, celery, and onion in a food processor until pieces are ground fine. Add to mixing bowl. Process three slices bread into crumbs and add to bowl. Add ground beef, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper and eggs. Combine well with hands. Form into loaf on a cookie sheet. Bake for 1 hour - 1 hour 20 minutes. Let cool for 15 to an hour. You can serve this right away or cut into thick slices and fry on the stove top for an extra crunchy-licious crust. ; name: beefy turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, beef bouillon cubes, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, lemon juice, pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Add more bouillon if you like a stronger beef flavor. Let it sit for about 15 minutes to soak all the flavor. Take wax paper, parchment paper or foil and cut 12 square shaped pieces. Lay the wax paper down on the counter, and make a patty from the meat and place on top, layer another sheet and patty up to 2 patties. I made 12 patties, but you can make bigger ones than i did. Place remaining patties and wax paper in a gallon sized freezer bag. Freeze nicely for up to a month. Pull them out as needed. Great grilled or even just placed in the broiler. Cooking time is about 10-15 minutes. ; name: honey garlic meatloaf ; ingredients: ground beef, egg, dry breadcrumbs, honey, lemon pepper seasoning, garlic cloves, ketchup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8x10 glass baking dish. Set aside. In a bowl, combine all ingredients then transfer to bakind dish. Top with desired amount of ketchup. Bake at 350 for 1. 25 hours. Let stand for 3-5 minutes before serving. ; name: hearty turkey meatloaf ; ingredients: ground turkey, cream of mushroom soup, eggs, oats, minced garlic cloves, onion ; preparation:

name: ground turkey stew ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, potatoes, carrot, celery, onions, frozen corn, chicken broth, bay leaves, thyme, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute ground turkey in stock pot. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat. Simmer for 45 minutes - 1 hour. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve. ; name: turkey and cabbage casserole ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, rice, tomato soup, water, stewed tomatoes, cabbage, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease covered casserole dish. Cut cabbage into large pieces and place in casserole dish. Brown turkey and onion. Add rice to turkey and stir. Salt and pepper to taste. Put turkey mixture over cabbage. Add tomato soup, water, and stewed tomatoes. Bake for 30 to 45 minutes until rice and cabbage are tender. ; name: garden taco rice ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, taco seasoning mix, water, zucchini, frozen corn, stewed tomatoes, instant rice, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown meat with onion. Drain. Stir in remaining ingredients except rice and cheese. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice, reduce heat to low, cover, simmer for 5 to 7 minutes or until all the liquid is absorded, stirring occasionally. Remove from heat. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand 3 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: turkey dinner casserole ; ingredients: turkey gravy, mixed vegetables, prepared stuffing, cooked turkey, mashed potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Layer the first 4 ingredients in a large casserole. Lightly mix. Spread mashed potatoes evenly over the top. Sprinkle the cheese evenly over and sprinkle the pepper over the cheese. Bake on middle oven rack for approximately 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Alternately place in 4 to 6 small single serving casseroles. Either way these casseroles freeze well. ; name: mini turkey loaves ; ingredients: ground turkey, apple, onion, old fashioned oats, dijon-style mustard, dried rosemary, poultry seasoning, salt, cranberry sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, apple, onion, oats, mustard, rosemary, poultry seasoning and salt in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce. ; name: turkey fiesta ; ingredients: margarine, flour, salt, milk, cooked turkey, frozen peas, chopped pimiento ; preparation:Melt butter in pan. Add flour and salt. Slowly add milk, stirring with a fork or whisk to keep mixture smooth. Heat until thickened. Stir in turkey, peas, and pimentos. Cook until thoroughly heated. Serve over puff pastry shells or toast. ; name: rice slice with turkey and asparagus ; ingredients: rice-a-roni, asparagus, cooked turkey, eggs, herbs, garlic cloves ; preparation:If you make risotto the night before, keep some aside before you add the final ingredients and fold some cheese inches. You will need to warm it through before proceeding with this recipe. If using rice-a-roni or similar, just prepare as directed. Stir in asparagus, turkey, eggs, herbs and garlic. Spoon into a greased and lined 9x11-inch pan and bake at 180c for 15-20 minutes. Cut into squares and serve warm, at room temperature or even cold. Serves 6 as a light lunch with a green salad, or at a party as finger food. ; name: 1 2 3 ground turkey mexican rice ; ingredients: mexican rice, black beans, mexicorn, lean ground turkey ; preparation:

name: swiss steak pressure cooker ; ingredients: round steaks, flour, salt and pepper, cooking oil, onions, green peppers, tomato juice ; preparation:Season flour with salt and pepper, pound flour into beef. Heat cooker and add oil, brown meat. Add remaining ingredients. Close cover securely. Place pressure regulator on vent pipe and cook 15 minutes at 15 pounds pressure. Let pressure drop of its own accord. ; name: raspberry chicken for the pressure cooker ; ingredients: sweet red wine, vinegar, raspberry jam, soy sauce, honey, dijon mustard, garlic clove, whole chickens, orange zest ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together except chicken and zest, stir until well combined. Taste and adjust sweetness to your personal preference. Pout mixture over chicken and let it marinate at least 4 hours, preferable overnight, in the refrigerator. Place chicken with marinade in the pressure cooker and bring to a boil. Seal, bring up to 15 pounds pressure, reduce heat to stabilize pressure and cook for 12 minutes. Remove from heat, depressurize using cold water, remove lid and remove chicken leaving marinade in pot. If a thicker sauce is desired, boil sauce in uncovered pot until it thickens. Pour thickened sauce over chicken and sprinkle with orange zest. ; name: pressure cooker cranberry chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, onion soup mix, whole berry cranberry sauce, french dressing, egg noodles ; preparation:Mix onion soup, cranberry sauce and french dressing together. Place chicken in pressure cooker and top with cranberry mixture. Bring to pressure and cook 12 minutes. Meanwhile cook egg noodles according to package directions on your stove. When pressure is released, open top and stir in cooked egg noodles. The dish is ready to serve. ; name: amazing and fast pressure cooker short ribs ; ingredients: beef short ribs, light olive oil, beef broth, red wine, sweet onion, garlic cloves, honey, brown sugar, coarse salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in heavy pan then brown short ribs in the oil. Put short ribs in pressure cooker. Put in pressure cooker red wine, beef broth, onion,. Garlic, honey, brown sugar, salt and pepper. Bring to high pressure. Cook at high pressure for one hour. Turn off and let steam come down naturally -- do not open cooker until steam is completely released. Serve. ; name: cotter s kettle ; ingredients: chicken stock, carrots, leek, rutabagas, bratwursts, salt and pepper ; preparation:Bring the vegetables to a boil in chicken stock. Reduce heat to simmer and cook for 15 to 20 minutes or until vegetables are fork tender. Remove the skin from sausage, cut in thick slices, and add to vegetables. Adjust salt and pepper to taste and simmer covered for a few minutes. Serve with coarse grain mustard, dark rye bread and boiled potatoes. ; name: crockpot ribs and taters ; ingredients: pork spareribs, salt & pepper, onion, bay leaf, pork seasoning, beer, potatoes ; preparation:Rinse and dry the ribs. Cut down serving size. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Place ribs in crockpot on high heat. Peel and quarter potatoes, rough chop onions and add to the ribs in the crock. Add bay leaf and pork seasoning. Pour beer into crock, cover and cook on high 6-8 hours or until done. Stir halfway through. ; name: mushroom risotto in pressure cooker ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, onion, garlic cloves, portabella mushrooms, arborio rice, chicken broth, parmigiano-reggiano cheese ; preparation:In a presssure cooker, heat 4tbs olive oil and 2 tbs butter. Add onion and garlic. Saute until translucent. Add portabella and rice. Stir until rice is coated with oil. Add chicken broth. Cover and cook under high pressure for 7 minutes. Release pressure and add remaining 2 tbs of butter. Stir in parmesan cheese and serve. ; name: new england boiled dinner pressure cooker ; ingredients: ham shank, water, potatoes, onions, carrots, cabbage, pepper ; preparation:

name: a very special gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, bacon, leeks, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, skim milk, parmesan cheese, cheddar cheese, cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, baby spinach leaves ; preparation:Cook gnocchi according to package directions. Set aside. Saut bacon until crisp. Set aside. Saut leeks in bacon fat. In medium saucepan, melt butter. Over medium heat, whisk in flour. Whisk in milk, stirring constantly until boiling. Add cheeses & stir until melted. In large bowl, combine all components & stir well, adding spinach last. ; name: baked gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, olive oil, garlic cloves, frozen spinach, diced tomatoes, italian seasoning, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 grease lagrge casserole dish. Cook gnocchi according to directions. Drain. Heat oil in large skillet. Add garlic, cook 30 sec. Add tomatoes and seasoning. Cook and stir 5 minutes. Add gnocchi to spinach mixture in skillet, stir gently. Transfer gnocchi mixture to prepared casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheeses. Bake 20-30 minutes or until bubbly and sheese is melted. Enjoy. ; name: gnocchi ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, flour, olive oil, salt, pepper, italian seasoning, garlic powder, onion salt ; preparation:In large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix into a soft dough. Turn dough out onto a floured surface and knead 20 times. Divide dough into fourths and roll each quarter into a 12 inch long rope. Cut each rope into inch pieces, and set on a floured surface. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Roll each piece of dough across the tines of a fork to get groves on it and drop it into the pot of water. Cook gnocchi until it floats to the top. Drain and serve. ; name: creamy spinach and pine nut gnocchi ; ingredients: cream, tomatoes, garlic cloves, sun-dried tomato, black olives, gnocchi, spinach, pine nuts ; preparation:Combine cream, canned tomatoes and garlic in large pan and bring to the boil. Simmer until sauce slightly thickens. Add sun-dried tomatoes and olives. Simmer for 2 minutes. Add gnocchi to saucepan of boiling, salted water and cook until gnocchis rise to the top of the saucepan. Drain. Gently toss gnocchi, spinach and pine nuts in pan with sauce until spinach wilts. ; name: brown butter gnocchi with spinach and pine nuts ; ingredients: gnocchi, butter, pine nuts, garlic cloves, fresh spinach, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook gnocchi according to package directions, drain. Heat butter in a large non stick skillet over medium heat. Add pine nuts to pan. Cook 3 minutes or until butter and nuts are lightly browned, stirring constantly. Add garlic to pan. Cook 1 minute. Add gnocchi and spinach to pan. Cook 1 minute sor until spinach wilts,. Stirring constantly. Stir in salt and pepper. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: spinach and cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt and pepper, green onions, butter, spinach, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Set oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 2-quart casserole dish. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. If desired, roasted garlic may be added to mixture. ; name: baked eggs with spinach and parmesan ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, baby spinach leaves, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, eggs, cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200d celsius lightly grease 4 ramekins and place on a baking tray. Heat a medium sized fry pan over a moderate heat and add the oil to the pan, then add the spinach and season with salt and pepper. Cook until the leaves are just softened. Drain the spinach in a colander and as soon as spinach is cool enough to handle, squeeze out excess liquid. Divide the spinach between the ramekins and break two eggs on top of the spinach. Pour one tablespoon of cream over the eggs and sprinkle with one tablespoon of parmesan. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until the eggs are set and puffed up. Serve immediately with toast. ; name: nana s spinach gnocchi ; ingredients: spinach, potatoes, egg yolks, parmesan cheese, salt, flour, boiling water, butter ; preparation:

name: witch hat treats ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, sugar ice cream cone, decorative candies, wax paper, doughnuts, chocolate icing, multicolored sugar nonpareils, chewing gum ; preparation:Melt semisweet chocolate according to the package instructions. Holding the open end of the cone, dip the bottom half at an angle into the melted chocolate. Immediately press candy pumpkins into the chocolate. Place the cone on waxed paper and let sit until the chocolate sets. Frost the top and side surfaces of the doughnut with icing. Sprinkle the icing with nonpareils or sprinkles. Center the open end of the cone on the frosted doughnut. Use a sharp knife to cut candies or gum pieces into quarters and stick them around the bottom of the hat with icing. ; name: original licorice candy ; ingredients: molasses, licorice root, dried anise, flour, icing sugar ; preparation:Warm the molasses and add licorice and anise powder. Mix in enough flour to make a workable dough. Roll mixture into small tubes, cut into desired lengths. Roll in icing sugar if desired. The mixture will harden when cool. ; name: sugar and spice nuts ; ingredients: egg white, cashews, pecan halves, almonds, white sugar, ground cinnamon, cayenne pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f degrees. Grease a baking sheet and set aside. Beat egg white in a large bowl with a fork or whisk until foamy. Stir in two cups of unsalted nuts until coated. Stir in sugar and spices. Toss with nuts until coated. Put nuts onto prepared baking sheet. Spread out well. Bake, stirring often, until golden-- about 20-25 minutes. Cool completely. Store in an airtight container. ; name: candy corn ; ingredients: carrots, potato, bacon, olive oil, onion, maple syrup, corn ; preparation:Cook carrots and potatoes in boiling salted water until done. Drain. Fry bacon until golden. Add olive oil to 1 tablespoon bacon drippings and cook onion 10 minutes over medium low heat. Add maple syrup and cook 5 minutes. Stir in corn, bacon, carrots and potatoes and season to taste. Cook until warmed through. ; name: sugar gems ; ingredients: powdered sugar, white sugar, vegetable oil, margarine, egg, salt, baking soda, vanilla, white flour, cream of tartar ; preparation:Mix sugars, margarine, oil and egg. Stir in rest of ingredients. Roll in small walnut sized balls. Flatten with the bottom of a beverage glass that has been sprayed with vegetable oil and dipped in sugar. Bake at 350 degrees for 12 to 15 minutes. They will not be brown when finished. Do not over bake. Leave on cookie sheets for 5 minutes and then remove to cool. ; name: peanut puffs ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, peanuts, vanilla extract, flour, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 325. Grease a baking sheet with cooking oil spray or a small amount of margarine. Cream margarine and sugar in medium mixing bowl. Add peanuts, vanilla & flour, mix well. Using your fingers roll dough into small balls about 1 inch across. Place the balls on the greased baking sheet. Bake for 35 minuites. Remove from the oven. While still warm roll puffs in the powdered sugar. Roll in the sugar again when puffs are cool. ; name: chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: butter, creamy peanut butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: dragon hair candy or dragon beard candy ; ingredients: white sugar, peanuts, corn syrup, rice flour ; preparation:

name: rye popovers ; ingredients: rye flour, unbleached all-purpose flour, salt, milk, butter, eggs ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450 degrees. Combine the flours with the salt in a medium bowl. Add the milk, butter and eggs and whisk to combine thoroughly. Pour into well-greased muffin cups or a popover pan. Bake at 450 for 20 minutes, turn oven to 350 degrees and bake 15 minutes longer. ; name: whole wheat flatbread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, salt, warm water, vegetable oil ; preparation:Mix flours together. Mix salt into water to dissolve. Add water and oil to flour, mix well. Knead briefly on floured surface, let rest 10-15 minutes. Cut into 12 equal parts. Roll each flat, do not stack them. Cook on ungreased griddle, a few minutes on each side until golden brown. Optional - brush with melted butter or olive oil immediately after removing from griddle. ; name: whole wheat flat bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, water, extra virgin olive oil, flax seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices. ; name: whole wheat rolls ; ingredients: whole wheat bread flour, white bread flour, salt, sugar, non-fat powdered milk, yeast, vegetable oil, egg, warm water ; preparation:Combine ingredients in the order your bread maker calls for on dough cycle. Check on dough half way through needing adding a bit more flour or water as needed so dough is fairly tacky. Turn out onto greased cutting board and work with greased hands. Shape into 15 rolls and place in greased 9x13 pan making 5 rows of 3. Let rise 30-45 minutes or until doubled in size. Bake at 350 for 15-20 minutes. ; name: whole wheat beer bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, beer, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix down with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Pour melted butter over top of dough. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: whole wheat tortillas ; ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, warm water, vegetable oil, salt, cornstarch ; preparation:Stir together the first 6 ingredients. On a floured board knead until smooth. Divide dough into 12 equal balls. Dust lightly with cornstarch. Roll into a circle as thin as possible on a lightly-floured board. Drop onto a very hot ungreased griddle. Cook until brown spots appear on one side. Turn and cook on second side. Repeat with other balls. ; name: simple whole wheat muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, canola oil, maple syrup, cinnamon, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: whole wheat popovers ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, butter, eggs, milk, salt ; preparation:

name: monterey green beans ; ingredients: green onion, butter, green beans, mushrooms, lemon pepper seasoning, monterey jack pepper cheese ; preparation:In a saucepan, saute onions in butter until tender. Add beans, mushrooms and lemon pepper. Cover and cook over medium heat for 5 minutes or until beans are tender. Sprinkle with cheese. Cover and let stand for 1 minute or until cheese is melted. ; name: beef and bean burritos ; ingredients: beef round steak, garlic, pinto beans, diced green chilies, cilantro, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Fold bottom up, fold sides over. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: garden green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, fresh mushrooms, onions, garlic, olive oil, sliced water chestnuts, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: chicken and white bean stew ; ingredients: bacon, onion, garlic cloves, red potatoes, chicken broth, rotisserie-cooked chicken, small white beans, baby arugula, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large soup pot or dutch oven, cook the bacon over medium heat until cooked, but not crisp. Add the onion and garlic. Cook, stirring, until softened. Add the potatoes and chicken broth. Simmer until the potatoes are just tender. Meanwhile, pull the meat off the rotisserie chicken, discarding skin and bones. Add the chicken and white beans to the stew. Cook until heated through. Just before serving, stir in the arugula and season to taste with salt and freshly ground black pepper. ; name: ultimate great northern beans ; ingredients: great northern beans, chicken broth, diced tomatoes with green chilies, white onion, cooking oil, pork jowl, salt, black pepper, water ; preparation:Soak the beans in cold water overnight. Make sure that there is twice as much water as beans because they will swell up. In a large cooking pot, pour in the cooking oil and toss in the smoked jowl pieces. Stir and allow them to sizzle over medium heat for 5 or 6 minutes. After they brown a bit, deglaze the pot with about 4 ounces of the chicken broth. Add the onion and allow to simmer until the onion is tender, stirring often. Rinse the beans in fresh water a final time and, after draining, add them, plus all the remaining ingredients into the pot. This should include the 48 ounces of water listed in the ingredients. Boil, covered, over low heat until beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Serve with cornbread, fried potatoes, eggs and biscuits. If you wish, you can use chunks of ham or bacon instead of pork jowl. ; name: canadian baked beans with maple syrup no molasses ; ingredients: white pea beans, onion, dry mustard, summer savory, ground black pepper, chili powder, maple syrup, salt pork, salt ; preparation:Soak beans overnight to cut down on cooking time. Drain and place in a 4 quart bean pot. Mix seasonings and maple syrup together and stir into beans. Add enough water to cover. Peel onion and remove root and blossom ends. Push whole onion down into beans and place the salt pork next to it. Bake covered in a 250 degree oven for about 8 hours. Check on them every hour or so and see if you need to add water so they never dry out. When finished if you want the sauce to be thicker then you can always stir in some refried bean flakes and let sit to thicken. ; name: california yucchi dip ; ingredients: hamburger, refried beans, velveeta cheese, avocado, onion, salsa, garlic powder ; preparation:In a crockpot, simmer the refried beans, the chopped avocado, and salsa, along with the velvetta cheese. In a skillet, brown the hamburger along with the chopped onions and garlic powder. After the hamburger is browned, add to the crockpot with the other ingredients and allow to cook for about 20 minutes on the high setting. Be sure to stir occasionally to prevent burning or sticking. Serve as a dip with tortilla chips or in mini-taco shells. ; name: greg s monterey jack ; ingredients: kidney beans, italian-style stewed tomatoes, lean ground beef, sweet onion, green bell pepper, monterey jack cheese, butter, salt and pepper, paprika ; preparation:

name: 15 minute chili ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, pinto beans, kidney beans, stewed tomatoes, chili powder, cumin, salt, salsa ; preparation:In a large pot, brown meat with chopped onion. Drain grease, if necessary. Add beans, tomatoes, garlic, chili powder, cumin, salt and salsa to meat mixture. Cook until heated through. Serve with cornbread, cooked pasta, cooked rice, or on top of a baked potato. Sprinkle with cheese if desired. ; name: un refried beans ; ingredients: dried pinto beans, olive oil, onions, chili powder, cumin, salt, cayenne powder, oregano, water, vegetable bouillon granules ; preparation:In a large soup pot, saute the onions in the olive oil over medium-high heat until the onions are soft. Stir in the chili powder, cumin, salt, and cayenne powder, and continue sauteing for 1 minute or so - just until the spices are fragrant. Add the beans, oregano, and 1 to 2 cups water. Stir in the bouillon. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and allow to simmer, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed to keep the beans from sticking to the bottom of the pan, until the beans are very soft - approximately 1 hour. Using a potato masher, mash the beans until most of them are mashed, and the texture is mostly smooth. ; name: refried beans without the refry ; ingredients: onion, dry pinto beans, fresh jalapeno pepper, garlic, salt, black pepper, ground cumin, water ; preparation:Place the onion, rinsed beans, jalapeno, garlic, salt pepper, and cumin into a slow cooker. Pour in the water and stir to combine. Cook on high for 8 hours, adding more water as needed. Once the beans have cooked, strain them, and reserve the liquid. Mash the beans with a potato masher, adding the reserved water as needed to attain the desired consistency. ; name: beef and bean burrito filling ; ingredients: oil, onion, garlic, ground beef, chili powder, cumin, salt and pepper, tomato sauce, refried beans ; preparation:Saute the onion in the oil until tender. Add the beef and garlic and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add the chili powder, cumin and other seasonings. Stir in tomato sauce and simmer for five minutes. Add refried beans and cook and stir until well blended. ; name: unfried refried beans ; ingredients: onion, dry pinto beans, fresh jalapeno pepper, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, ground cumin, water ; preparation:Place the onion, rinsed beans, jalapeno, garlic, salt, pepper, and cumin into a slow cooker. Pour in the water and stir to combine. Cook on high for 8 hours, adding more water as needed. Once the beans have cooked, strain them, and reserve the liquid. Mash the beans with a potato masher, adding the reserved water as needed to attain desired consistency. ; name: beef bean chile verde ; ingredients: ground beef, red bell pepper, onion, garlic cloves, chili powder, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, green chili salsa, water, pinto beans ; preparation:Cook beef, bell pepper and onion in a large saucepan over medium heat, crumbling the meat with a wooden spoon, until the meat is browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add garlic, chili powder, cumin and cayenne. Cook until fragrant, about 15 seconds. Stir in salsa and water. Bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in beans and cook until heated through, about 1 minute. ; name: no beans no tomato chili ; ingredients: ground beef, water, chili seasoning mix, pepper, accent seasoning, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, onion powder, salt ; preparation:In the 3 cups of water, simmer the meat for 30 minutes. Crumble the meat up as you add it to the water. There should not be any large pieces. After 30 minutes add the remaining ingredients. Simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Serve this up with some cheese and extra onions if you want. ; name: refried bean chili ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, chili beans, thick & chunky salsa, refried beans, beef broth, chili powder, ground cumin ; preparation:

name: penne with sun dried tomatoes and asiago cheese ; ingredients: dry penne pasta, sun-dried tomatoes, oil, asiago cheese, dried basil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, kosher salt ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Closer to the end of the pasta cooking, heat oil in pan and add garlic. Saut for about 1 minute. Reduce heat to medium-low. Do not brown garlic. Combine sun dried tomatoes, basil, pepper flakes, salt and cheese for about 1 to 2 minutes. Pour oil mixture over pasta and mix. Serve with additional shredded asiago cheese on top. For additional flavour you can add kalamata olives to the pan and saut with sun dried tomatoe mixture. ; name: spinach feta penne with pine nuts ; ingredients: penne pasta, olive oil, fresh garlic, feta cheese, parmesan cheese, baby spinach, pine nuts ; preparation:Cook penne pasta according to package directions. As pasta is cooking, toast pine nuts lightly in a small skillet over medium-low heat, stirring frequently and keeping a close eye on them to prevent burning. Remove pine nuts from heat when lightly browned, after about 1-2 minutes. Set aside pine nuts. Drain cooked pasta and set aside. Heat olive oil in a large, deep skillet or wok. Add garlic and saute over medium heat for about 30 seconds, being careful not to let garlic brown. Stir in cooked pasta. Stir in feta and parmesan cheese and cook for a 2-3 minutes, until feta cheese just starts to melt and pasta and cheese is thoroughly heated through. Stir in spinach and continue to heat until spinach barely starts to wilt. Take pasta off heat and stir in the toasted pine nuts. Transfer to serving dish and serve. ; name: penne with spinach and feta ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, pine nuts, garlic cloves, frozen spinach, plum tomatoes, penne pasta, feta cheese ; preparation:Melt butter with 2 tblsps oil in large skillet over medium heat. Add pine nuts and garlic and saute until pine nuts are light brown, about 5 minutes. Add spinach and tomatoes and saute until heated through, about 3 minutes. Place penne in large serving bowl. Add remaining 4 tblsps olive oil to pasta and toss to coat. Pour spinach-nut mixture over and toss to coat. Add feta. Season with salt and pepper and toss thoroughly. Serve immediately. ; name: penne pasta with tomatoes and cheese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, plum tomatoes, dried basil, ground red pepper, chicken broth, penne pasta, havarti cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat 3 tbsp oil in pan. Saute onion and garlic. Mix in tomatoes, basil and ground red pepper. Bring to a boil, breaking up tomatoes. Add broth and boil. Reduce heat and simmer about 1 hour. Cook pasta and drain. Toss with 3 tbsp oil. Mix pasta with sauce and then mix in havarti cheese. Put into 9x13 baking dish and sprinkle top with parmesan cheese. Bake in 375 oven about 30 minutes. Of this recipe will easily serve 4. ; name: penne with tomato black olives and feta ; ingredients: penne, olive oil, chili pepper flakes, garlic cloves, tomatoes, kalamata olive, feta cheese, fresh basil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling water, cook pasta until tender but firm, drain and return to pot to keep warm. Meanwhile, in a large non-stick skillet, heat oil & chili pepper flakes over medium heat. Stir in garlic. Add tomatoes and cook, stirring, for 3 minutes or until heated through. Transfer to pot with drained pasta. Add olives, feta cheese and basil. Toss gently to mix. Sprinkle each serving with parmesan. ; name: penne with sun dried tomato pesto ; ingredients: penne pasta, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper, fresh basil leaf, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until tender but still firm to the bite, stirring occasionally, about 8 minutes. Drain, reserving 1 cup of the cooking liquid. Meanwhile, blend the sun-dried tomatoes and their oil, garlic, salt and pepper, to taste, and basil in a food processor and blend until the tomatoes are finely chopped. Transfer the tomato mixture to a large bowl. Stir in the parmesan. Add the pasta to the pesto and toss to coat, adding enough reserved cooking liquid to moisten. Season the pasta, to taste, with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: penne with chicken and pesto ; ingredients: penne pasta, butter, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, heavy cream, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add pasta and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Heat butter and oil in large skillet over medium heat. Saute chicken and garlic until chicken is almost cooked through. Reduce heat and stir in salt, pepper, cream, pesto, and parmesan cheese. Cook until chicken is no longer pink inside,. Stir in cooked pasta. ; name: penne with chard and pine nuts ; ingredients: olive oil, pine nuts, penne pasta, garlic cloves, red swiss chard, chicken broth, salt, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: teriyaki chicken thighs ; ingredients: low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, dry sherry, rice vinegar, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, red pepper flakes, skinless chicken thighs, sesame seeds ; preparation:Combine the soy sauce, sugar, sherry, vinegar, garlic, ginger and red pepper flakes and stir until the sugar dissolves. Transfer to a resealable plastic bag and add the chicken. Seal the bag and marinate the chicken in the refrigerator, turning once, for 1 hour. The chicken can be marinated for up to 4 hours. Heat the broiler to high. Arrange the chicken on a broiler pan skin side down and broil until brown and crispy, 8 to 10 minutes. Flip the chicken and broil until almost cooked through, about 8 minutes longer. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and cook until the seeds turn golden brown and the chicken is done, 1 to 2 minutes longer. ; name: hawaiian teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken thighs, cornstarch, cold water, sugar, gluten-free soy sauce, vinegar, garlic clove, fresh ginger, pepper, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Place chicken in a casserole dish. Combine all ingredients and pour over chicken. Bake covered for 2 hours. Stir several times while baking. Add pineapple just before serving. Serve over cooked rice. ; name: orange teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, frozen vegetables, quick-cooking tapioca, chicken stock, orange marmalade, teriyaki sauce, dry mustard, ground ginger ; preparation:In a skillet, heat oil to medium-high heat. Add chicken and brown. Put chicken in crockpot. Add frozen vegetables and tapioca. Mix well. In a small bowl, mix all remaining ingredients. Pour on the chicken. Cover and bake at low heat for 4 hours. ; name: easy crock pot teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken thighs, low sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, fresh ginger, garlic cloves ; preparation:Wash and dry chicken. Place in slow cooker. Combine remaining ingredients. Pour over chicken. Cover. Cook on high 1 hours reduce heat to low, cook 6-7 hours. ; name: easy delicious grilled teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: chicken drumsticks, dijon mustard, soy sauce, teriyaki sauce ; preparation:Mix dijon mustard, soy sauce and teriyaki sauce into ziploc bag or bowl. Add chicken and marinate overnight or 4 hours. Let chicken sit out while heating up the grill. Grill for about 20 minutes or until done. Basting frequently. ; name: pork teriyaki ; ingredients: teriyaki sauce, water, all-purpose flour, pork tenderloin, vegetable oil, cooked rice ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine teriyaki sauce mix and water until dissolved. Set aside. Place flour in a large resealable plastic bag. Add pork and shake to coat. In a large skillet, brown pork in oil until juices run clear. Add teriyaki sauce. Bring to a boil. Cook and stir for 1-2 minutes or until slightly thickened. Serve with rice. ; name: toni s teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: chicken, teriyaki sauce, soy sauce, garlic powder, onion powder, bay leaves, lemon, black pepper ; preparation:Wash and seperate chicken legs from thighs. De-bone chicken if desired. Combine remaining ingredients in pitcher. Place chicken in 2 gallon zipper-top bag. Pour marinade on top of chicken. Squeeze air out of bag and seal, place in refridgerator. Allow the chicken to marinade for at least tow hours, but up to two days. Turn bag over mul. Chicken can be frozen in marinade. Grill chicken as desired, discard marinade. ; name: timely teriyaki chicken ; ingredients: chicken thighs, sesame oil, scallions, soy sauce, brown sugar, gingerroot ; preparation:

name: roasted brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, olive oil, kosher salt, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: lemony shredded brussels sprouts ; ingredients: olive oil, brussels sprouts, sea salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add brussels sprouts and 2 tablespoons water. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until crisp-tender, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in lemon juice. Serve immediately. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts with almonds and honey ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, unsalted butter, slivered almonds, salt & freshly ground black pepper, honey, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place sprouts, butter, and almonds on a rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine. Roast, stirring, until golden brown and tender, 35 to 40 minutes. Transfer to a serving bowl. Immediately dress with honey and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: really good brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, bacon, salt, green onions, lemon, juice of, sugar ; preparation:Trim the bottoms off of the brussels sprouts and then cut in half vertically. Fry bacon in a large pan until crispy. Remove from pan and reserve the fat. Add the brussels sprouts to the bacon fat and fry on medium. Do not stir too often as they need to brown. Sprinkle with the salt. Once the brussels sprouts are browned, add the green onion. Crumble the bacon and add to the brussels sprouts. Stir together the juice of the lemon and the sugar. Pour juice over the brussels sprouts and cook until evaporated. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts ; ingredients: fresh brussels sprouts, extra virgin olive oil, garlic powder, ground black pepper, salt, dried sage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussels sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold. ; name: lemon dilled brussels sprouts ; ingredients: fresh brussels sprout, butter, lemon juice, dill weed, lemon zest, salt, pepper, almonds ; preparation:Wash and trim the sprouts, cut an x in the core end. In a large saucepan, bring 1 inch of water and the sprouts to a boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 10 to 12 minutes or until fork tender. In a small microwave safe dish, melt the butter and blend in lemon juice, dill weed and lemon zest. Drain the sprouts, return to pan and dry over heat for 1 to 2 minutes. Pour the butter mixture over, tossing to coat, stir in chopped almonds. Enjoy. ; name: brussels sprouts with fried onions and pancetta ; ingredients: brussels sprout, olive oil, butter, pancetta, lemon juice, sea salt, cracked black pepper, fried onions ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan. Add the pancetta and fry for 2 minutes until just becoming crisp. Toss in the sprouts, then the lemon juice. Season well. Cook for 2 minutes until heated through. Serve topped with fried onions. ; name: glazed brussels sprouts with lemon and pepper ; ingredients: brussels sprout, kosher salt, unsalted butter, fresh lemon juice, water, sugar, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: jumbo shrimp with chive butter ; ingredients: dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, butter, fresh jalapeno, chives, jumbo shrimp, flour ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Place mustard in a bowl, whisk in lemon juice, then melted butter. Add chopped chives and jalapeno. Season with pepper. Arrange shrimp cut side up, on broiler pan. Brush with some butter mixture. Broil until cooked through 4 minutes. Serve, garnishing with whole chives if using and pass remaining butter for dipping. ; name: thai almond butter shrimp ; ingredients: coconut milk, almond butter, shrimp, chicken stock, diced tomato, unsweetened applesauce ; preparation:Add chicken stock and diced tomato in a small pot and simmer over low heat. Add coconut milk and continue to simmer to meld all the flavors together and that the sauce has thickened. Add shrimp and cook for another 5 minutes. Turn off heat and take shrimp out on a separate dish and add almond butter and apple sauce and whisk in the thickened sauce. Add the shrimp into bowls and add extra tomato slices for garnish as desired. ; name: shrimp and mixed green dinner salad ; ingredients: walnut halves, water, balsamic vinegar, sugar, mixed greens, zucchini, baby shrimp, strawberries, feta cheese, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:Toss the walnut halves with water and vinegar. Place in a heavy skillet over medium heat and toast until water and vinegar have evaporated. Sprinkle with the sugar and warm, stirring frequently until the sugar melts and coats the nuts. Set aside to cool. Divide the baby greens between two well chilled salad plates. Assemble the salad by distributing each plate with zucchini slices, 6 of the strawberries sliced and feta cheese. Top with shrimp, quarter the boiled eggs and divide evenly on each of the plates. Cut the reserved strawberries from bottom to stem without cutting through stem. Fan out slices and place on top of salad. Drizzle each salad with prepared dressing of your choosing and enjoy. ; name: spinach and shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, garlic, butter, fresh parmesan cheese, baby spinach, lemon juice ; preparation:Boil shrimp till pink. Drain and set aside. Saute garlic in butter till barely brown. Add shrimp back into pan, along with parmesan. Turn off heat but leave pan on burner. For gas turn lowest. Add spinach and stir, till barely barely limp. If desired, add lemon juice. Serve with dressing. ; name: shrimp with rice stick noodles and vegetables ww ; ingredients: rice vinegar, soy sauce, honey, sesame seed oil, rice sticks, large shrimp, red bell pepper, snow peas, cucumber, cilantro ; preparation:In a small cup combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Transfer to a large bowl. Return cooking water to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days. ; name: shrimp and potato salad ; ingredients: shrimp, potatoes, celery, sweet pickle relish, hardboiled egg, salt, sour cream, mayonnaise, italian salad dressing mix ; preparation:Mix together the potatoes, celery, relish, eggs, and salt. Mix together sour cream, mayo, and dry italian dressing mix. Combine the potatoe mixture with sour cream mixture. Refrigerate. To serve, add the shrimp and serve in a salad bowl lined with lettuce. ; name: chunky shrimp spread ; ingredients: water, fresh shrimp, onion, fresh lemon juice, curry powder, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper, parsley sprig ; preparation:Bring the water to a boil. Add the shrimp and cook 3-5 minutes, just until done. Drain the shrimp well and rinse under cold water. Chill. Peel and devein the cooked shrimp and coarsely chop. Add remaining ingredients except parsley, mixing well. Chill. Garnish the spread with a sprig or two of parsley. Serve with party-size rye or whole wheat bread. ; name: buttermilk and shrimp soup ; ingredients: buttermilk, dijon mustard, salt, granulated sugar, shrimp, cucumber, green onions ; preparation:

name: scrunchy apple pie ; ingredients: pie apples, ground cinnamon, caster sugar, phyllo pastry, olive oil flavored cooking spray, icing sugar, whipped cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190c fan forced. Combine apples, cinnamon and sugar in a bowl and spoon mixture into a rectangular ceramic baking dish. Place fillo on a clean work surface and lightly spray one filo sheet with olive oil spray. Fold each in half crossway and scrunch into a rosette sheape. Place on the apple mixture, repeating with remaining fillo. Lightly spray the pastry again. Bake for 15 minutes or until golden. Dust with icing sugar and. Cut and serve with cream or i think custard would work well too. ; name: classic apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, lemon zest, butter, lard, salt, cold water ; preparation:Pastry for double crust pie-------------. Combine flour, lard and salt with a pastry blender or fork until balls are the size of a large pea. Add cold water by the spoonful and blend until the bowl starts to clean itself as you work the dough. Then it is ready for rolling. Preheat oven to 450f. Combine sliced apples with sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg and lemon rind. Line pie plate with unbaked pie crust, trim pastry, crimp to edge of pie plate. Fill pie crust with apple mixture and dot with softened butter. Brush crust edge with water and place pie crust top on top of pie, crimp to the bottom crust. Make some slits in the top crust for steam to escape. Bake for 10 minutes. Turn oven down to 350f and bake for 45 minutes longer. ; name: easy swiss apple pie ; ingredients: egg, sugar, flour, baking powder, salt, apple, nuts ; preparation:In a bowl mix together egg and sugar. Add flour, baking powder, salt, apple, and nuts. Fold into a greased pie plate. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice cream. ; name: crustless apple cinnamon pie ; ingredients: apples, splenda brown sugar blend, cinnamon, salt, water, butter, cheddar cheese, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Peel, core and slice apples into a bowl. Add brown sugar, cinnamon, water and salt. Mix well to coat apples. Place in two ramikins or small au gratin dishes, sprayed with cooking spray. Dot with butter and spread cheese over top. Bake for 20 to 30 minutes or until apples fall. ; name: yummmmy crustless apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla sugar ; preparation:Pre-heat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: katia s apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, water, cinnamon stick, self-rising flour, margarine, egg ; preparation:Peel the apples and cut them into pieces. Put in a saucepan the apples, one glass of water, the glass of sugar and the cinnamon stick. Let them boil until the apples are more like applesauce, approximately 50 minutes. In mixer bowl, blend the shortening with the rest of the sugar for 3-4 minutes and then add the egg. Continue for 2 minutes more. Then add slowly the flour using hand to make a dough. In a baking pan put at the bottom foil. Divide the dough in half. Place by fingers half of the dough at the bottom of the pan. Remove the cinnamon stick and layer the apples. The rest of the dough shape it into a disk on a foil and then turn it over the apples. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour. ; name: classic two crust apple pie ; ingredients: tart apples, lemon juice, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. ; name: schnitz pie dried apple pie ; ingredients: dried apple, water, orange, juice and zest of, cinnamon, salt, sugar, pie crusts ; preparation:

name: fruited spinach salad with honey mustard dressing ; ingredients: vinegar, honey, oil, poppy seed, dry mustard, fresh spinach, papayas, grapes ; preparation:In a screw top jar combine vinegar, oil, honey, poppy seed, and dry mustard cover. Shake well to mix. Combine spinach, papaya or pears, and grapes. Shake dressing again and pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: asian salad ; ingredients: white vinegar, vegetable oil, soy sauce, sugar, butter, ramen noodles, sliced almonds, sesame seeds, head of cabbage ; preparation:Combine dressing ingredients and heat until it comes to a boil. Let cool and refrigerate. Melt butter in frying pan. Brown broken noodles, almonds, and sesame seeds in butter. Set aside. Keep dressing, dry mixture, and cabbage seperate. Mix all 3 together 15 minutes before serving. This is best served cold and fresh. ; name: spinach salad with egg vinaigrette ; ingredients: egg, fresh spinach, garlic clove, vegetable oil, cider vinegar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat egg and water to cover in small saucepan to boiling. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 10 minutes. Meanwhile, trim large stems from spinach. Rinse thoroughly and drain. Run cool water over egg, then peel. Rub salad bowl with garlic. Mash egg in bowl with fork. Add oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Beat with fork to blend. Add spinach to vinaigrette and toss to coat. ; name: warm spinach and basil salad ; ingredients: spinach leaves, fresh basil, olive oil, garlic, pine nuts, prosciutto, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine the spinach and basil in a large salad bowl. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and pine nuts. Mix well. Saut until the pine nuts are brown. Add the prosciutto. Mix well. Cook just until heated through, stirring constantly. Pour over the spinach mixture, tossing to coat. Season with the salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the parmesan cheese. ; name: baby spinach salad with lemon and parmesan ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, extra virgin olive oil, garlic clove, baby spinach, parmesan cheese, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place the lemon juice in a small bowl. Whisking constantly, slowly add the oil in a steady stream, whisking until the vinaigrette is creamy. Set aside. Rub the inside of a large bowl with the cut sides of the garlic halves. Add the spinach. Drizzle with the reserved lemon vinaigrette. Toss gently to coat. Divide the salad among 4 plates. Shave the cheese in wide sheets over each salad with a vegetable peeler. Season with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: korean seasoned spinach ; ingredients: spinach, soy sauce, sugar, sesame seeds, sesame oil, green onion, salt ; preparation:Remove roots from spinach and wash well. I soak in a solution of vinegar and water and then rinse. In bowl, combine soy sauce, sugar, sesame seeds, sesame oil, and green onions. In a large pot bring water to boil. Add spinach and immerse only until leaves turn bright green. Do not over boil. Spinach will not taste right. Drain and rinse with cold water. Squeeze out as much water as possible. Add the spinach to the sauce and mix well. This can be served warm or even refrigerated for another time. ; name: sauteed spinach with sesame korean ; ingredients: dark sesame oil, garlic, spinach, sugar, soy sauce, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:Put 2 t. Of the oil in a large skillet over medium heat for one minute. Add garlic. The instant it begins to sizzle, add spinach and cook, stirring occasionally, until it is completely wilted. Turn heat to low. Stir in sugar and soy sauce. Cook for a few more moments. Turn off heat. Taste to see if you need additional salt or soy sauce. Serve hot, warm, room temp or cold. Before serving, drizzle with remaining sesame oil and spinkle with sesame seeds. ; name: oriental spinach salad ; ingredients: baby spinach leaves, sesame oil, sugar, rice wine vinegar, soy sauce, dijon mustard, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:

name: raspberry lime pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lime juice, cool whip, red food coloring, fresh raspberry, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:In a bowl, combine milk and lime juice. Mix well. Mixture should thicken. Add cool whip and food coloring if desired. Fold in raspberries. Spoon mixture into pie crust. Refrigerate at least 2 hours before serving. ; name: lemon berry pie ; ingredients: raspberries, frozen lemonade, cool whip topping, sweetened condensed milk, yellow food coloring, graham cracker pie crusts ; preparation:Set aside 1 cup berries for garnish. In a large bowl and using a rubber spatula, carefully mix lemonade concentrate and whipped topping. Fold in condensed milk, food coloring and remaining berries. Refrigerate covered up to six hours. Fold mixture into crust. Place reserved berries in a decorative manner on top of filling. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: easy key lime pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, key lime juice, cool whip, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:Beat cream cheese, sugar and lime juice until fluffy. Fold in 6 oz of the thawed cool whip. Pour into prepared graham cracker crust. Top with remaining cool whip. Cover and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving. ; name: mom s key lime pie ; ingredients: egg yolks, sweetened condensed milk, key lime juice, graham cracker crust, egg whites, granulated sugar, pure vanilla extract ; preparation:Beat egg yolks with mixer until light in color. Slowly add condensed milk mixing well. Stir while adding lime juice. Pour into prepared pie shell. Set aside and prepare meringue. For meringue, beat egg whites until stiff. Add sugar and vanilla just at the last minute. Top pie with meringue. Brown in 325 degree preheated oven just until peaks brown and the rest is golden in color. Serve cool. ; name: cherry o creamy cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, bottled lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Whip cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually beat in sweetened condensed milk and blend. Blend in reallemon lemon juice and vanilla extract. Pour into pie crust and chill until firm. Top with chilled cherry pie filling and chill for at least 2 hours. ; name: emerils key lime pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, granulated sugar, butter, condensed milk, key lime juice, eggs, sour cream, powdered sugar, lime zest ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. In a bowl, mix the graham cracker crumbs, sugar, and butter with your hands. Press the mixture firmly into a 9-inch pie pan, and bake until brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from the oven and allow to cool to room temperature before filling. Lower the oven temperature to 325 degrees f. In a separate bowl, combine the condensed milk, lime juice, and eggs. Whisk until well blended and place the filling in the cooled pie shell. Bake in the oven for 15 minutes and allow to chill in the refrigerator for at least 2 hours. Once chilled, combine the sour cream and powdered sugar and spread over the top of the pie using a spatula. Sprinkle the lime zest as a garnish on top of the sour cream and serve chilled. ; name: frozen peanut butter pies ; ingredients: peanut butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, whipped topping, graham cracker pie crust, peanuts ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except pie crusts. Divide mixture equally between the three pie crusts. Top with chopped peanuts or graham cracker crumbs, if desired. Freeze. Leave out or refrigerate to soften a bit before cutting. Store leftover in freezer. ; name: frozen lime mousse pie ; ingredients: lime juice, sugar, gelatin, condensed milk, green food coloring, lime rind, whipping cream, graham cracker pie crust ; preparation:

name: absolutely best brownies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, cocoa, salt, self-rising flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm. ; name: brown sugar brownies ; ingredients: golden brown sugar, butter, eggs, unsweetened chocolate, all-purpose flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat over to 325 degrees. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool in pan and cut into bars. ; name: milk brownies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, margarine, eggs, sugar, vanilla, self-rising flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: sinful brownies ; ingredients: butter, dark chocolate, eggs, sugar, golden syrup, plain flour, cocoa, salt, nuts ; preparation:Pre heat oven 180c. Butter 20cm square cake tin. Melt butter and choc in saucepan over low heat. When melted ans smooth, set aside to cool. Beat eggs and sugar in large bowl till thick and creamy. Stir n cooled chocolate and golden syrup. Then add flour, cocoa, salt and nuts. Pour into tin, bake 30 minutes. Remove from oven, cool in tin then cut into squares. ; name: 1 brownies in the world best ever ; ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, eggs, granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, vanilla extract, brewed espresso, kosher salt, all-purpose flour ; preparation:Heat the oven to 350f and arrange the rack in the middle. Line an 8-by-8-inch glass baking dish with aluminum foil. Combine chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until evenly melted. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature. Combine eggs, sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, espresso, and salt in a large bowl and briefly stir until just evenly incorporated. Add cooled chocolate and mix until uniform in color. Add flour and stir until just incorporated. Transfer batter to the prepared baking dish. Bake until a tester inserted in the center of the brownies comes out clean, about 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool completely before cutting. ; name: can t be beat brownies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa, salt, shortening, eggs, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Mix the flour, sugar, salt and cocoa in a bowl until they are blended well. Cut the shortening into the dry ingredients as you would into a pie crust dough. Add the eggs and vanilla and mix until dough is moist. The batter will be stiff. Pour into a greased pan and bake at 350 until a toothpick comes out clean. I use an 8 x 8 pan because i like thick brownies. I bake them between 25- 30 minutes. A 9 x 13 pan would bake between 20- 25 minutes. ; name: tanner s brownies ; ingredients: oleo, sugar, flour, eggs, cocoa, vanilla ; preparation:Melt oleo in medium saucepan. After melted. In same pan add all the other ingredients. Stir well and pour into a 8x8 pan. Bake at 325 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes. ; name: brownies oma s ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, flour, cocoa, vanilla, walnuts ; preparation:

name: lavender mint tea single serving ; ingredients: lavender flowers, dried mint, boiling water, honey ; preparation:If you have a tea ball, place the herbs in it. If not, you can brew this in the tea and strain it in a fine strainer after it has brewed. Pour the boiling water over the herbs. Let steep for 5 minutes. Strain, if needed, and serve hot. Sweeten, if desired. This can also be made as iced tea- double the herbs and let steep in 1 qt of water overnight in the fridge. You can add more water, to taste, if it is too strong. Again, sweeten, if desired. ; name: fresh mint and ginger lemonade ; ingredients: fresh mint leaves, fresh ginger, honey, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, water, ice cube, lemon slice ; preparation:Combine chopped mint, ginger and honey in medium bowl. Add boiling water and allow to steep for 30-40 minutes. Strain into 4-cup glass measuring cup, pressing on solids to extract liquid. Add lemon juice and enough cold water to measure 4 cups total. Fill glasses with ice cubes. Add lemonade. Garnish with mint leaves and fresh lemon slices. ; name: brewed iced tea with lemon ; ingredients: water, black tea, unbleached cane sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:In a teapot or large saucepan heat water until boiling. Steep tea bags in water for 2 hours. Add lemon juice and sugar to a 2 quart pitcher. Pour tea into pitcher and mix thoroughly. Set in refrigerator to chill. ; name: iced green tea with ginger ; ingredients: water, fresh ginger, green tea leaves, sugar, lemon juice, ice, lemon balm leaves ; preparation:Measure water into a saucepan, add ginger and bring to boil. Add tea leaves. Brew 1-3 minutes. Add sugar and lemon juice, strain tea. Allow to cool and add ice. Garnish with lemon balm leaves. ; name: mint julep sweet tea ; ingredients: fresh mint leaves, lemon, sugar, tea, bourbon, ice, mint sprig ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a 2 quart pitcher. Press mint leaves against sides of pitcher with back of spoon to release flavors. Stir in tea and bourbon. Serve over crushed ice. Garnish with mint leaves. ; name: perfect iced tea ; ingredients: tea bags, water, sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:In a 4-cup measuring cup, heat 4 cups water in microwave to boiling. Place tea bags in water and let steep for 5- 10 minutes. Pour sugar into 2 quart pitcher and pour hot tea over it. Squeeze tea bags to get out any remaining tea. Add tea to pitcher and discard bags. Stir hot tea until sugar is dissolved. Add 4 cups cold water and lemon juice. Stir well. Chill until very cold and serve over ice with lemon. ; name: touch of mint iced tea ; ingredients: boiling water, tea bags, of fresh mint, frozen lemonade concentrate, lemon slice, mint ; preparation:In a heat proof bowl or pitcher, pour boiling water over tea bags. Cool at least 15 minutes. Add mint and let tea bags steep for at least 5 minutes. Strain. Add lemonade concentrate. Stir well. Refrigerate. Serve with lemon slices and extra mint. ; name: lavender lemonade tea hot or iced ; ingredients: water, lavender, fresh lemon, fresh lemon juice, sugar, lemon slice ; preparation:

name: chocolate raisin cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham crackers, raisins, flaked coconut, nuts, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Melt butter in 13x9-inch baking pan in preheated 350f oven. Remove from oven. Sprinkle graham crumbs in butter. Mix well. Press into bottom of pan. Sprinkle with chocolate-covered raisins, coconut and nuts. Press down firmly. Pour sweetened condensed milk over top. Bake for 25-30 minutes or ntil light golden brown. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: temptation bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, sweetened flaked coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips, sweetened condensed milk, unsalted peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread melted butter evenly in bottom of 9 x 13 inch pan. Evenly layer crumbs, then coconut and finally chips. Pour condensed milk over all. Sprinkle with peanuts. Bake for 25 minutes or until edges are light brown. Cool on wire rack. Chill until set and cut into bars. ; name: graham chocolate nut chewies ; ingredients: honey graham crackers, brown sugar, butter, walnuts, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a greased 10 x 15 cookie sheet evenly with graham crackers. Combine brown sugar and butter and bring to a boil in microwave or on stovetop. Pour mixture over crackers and sprinkle with nuts and chips. Bake for 10 minutes. Cool in refrigerator. Cut or separate into bars. ; name: pecan praline bars ; ingredients: graham crackers, butter, brown sugar, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Arrange graham crackers in ungreased 15x10x1-inch pan. Place butter and sugar in sauce pan. Heat to boiling point. Boil 2 minutes. Stir in pecans and spread evenly over crackers. Bake about 10 minutes. Cut each graham cracker in half while warm. ; name: coconut chocolate bars ; ingredients: graham crackers, sweetened condensed milk, flaked coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat over to 350f grease 9-inch square baking pan. Combine all ingredients. Stir until well blended. Press mixture into pan. Bake for 30 minutes until set.
