Let cool before cutting into pieces. ; name: double delicious cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In 13x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars. ; name: cherry magic cookie bars ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, maraschino cherries, flaked coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter. Mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan. Pour eagle brand evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly with fork. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Chill if desired. Cut into bars or diamonds. Store covered at room temperature. ; name: cissy bars ; ingredients: graham crackers, margarine, brown sugar, nuts ; preparation:

name: bacon fried carrots ; ingredients: carrots, onions, pepper, sugar, accent seasoning, bacon ; preparation:Peel carrots, cut in half and slice lengthwise. Chop onion into small pieces. Cook bacon until crisp. Remove and blot. Using all the bacon grease, add carrots, onions and seasonings. Mix well and cook covered on low heat for 15-20 minutes. Cook uncovered about 45 minutes or until lightly browned. Stir occasionally. Crumble bacon and add to carrots. ; name: carrots for a change ; ingredients: carrots, bacon, onion, brown sugar, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Boil carrots until barely tender. Fry bacon until crisp, then drain and crumble. Brown onion in part of the bacon grease after draining off some juice. In a buttered baking dish, combine carrots, bacon, onion, salt and pepper. Sprinkle brown sugar over top and pour melted butter all over. Bake carrots covered until thoroughly heated. ; name: glazed carrots with onions ; ingredients: butter, carrots, onions, ground ginger, orange juice, currant jelly, salt, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a medium skillet, melt butter over medium-low heat. Add carrots, onions, and ginger, cover and cook, stirring, for about 7 to 10 minutes, until just tender. Stir in the orange juice, jelly, and salt. Cook, uncovered, for about 4 minutes, stirring frequently, until vegetables are tender and nicely glazed with the jelly and orange juice mixture. Sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley just before serving. ; name: basil carrots ; ingredients: carrots, butter, salt, basil ; preparation:Slice carrots. Simmer, covered, in salted water until tender, about 10 to 15 minutes. Drain. Combine remaining ingredients. Toss with carrots. ; name: roasted carrot stick snack ; ingredients: carrots, olive oil, fresh herbs, salt ; preparation:Peel carrots. Cut into strips 3 inches long and inch wide. In a large bowl combine carrots, olive oil and herbs. In a baking pan, spread carrots in a single layer. Roast, uncovered, in a 475 oven for 10 minutes, or until just tender. Sprinkle with salt. ; name: roasted spiced carrots ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, sugar, ground cumin, kosher salt, ground cinnamon, carrots, white raisins, lemon, juice of, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 f. Combine the oil, garlic, sugar, cumin, salt, cinnamon, and carrots in a shallow baking pan. Roast 20 minutes or until fork-tender. Remove from oven and add the raisins, lemon juice, and parsley. Toss well. ; name: dilled carrots ; ingredients: chicken broth, sugar, salt, baby carrots, dill, butter ; preparation:In a small sauce pan combine chicken broth, sugar and salt. Bring to a boil. Add carrots and cover. Reducing heat to medium. Simmer until carrots are tender. Drain. Return carrots to pan and add the dill and butter. Toss until butter melts. ; name: fried carrots ; ingredients: raw carrots, onion, salt and pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: cashew crusted chicken breast ; ingredients: chicken breasts, breadcrumbs, cashews, egg, flour, canola oil, cognac, butter ; preparation:Slice chicken into thin strips. Dredge in flour seasoned with salt and pepper. Dip in beaten egg. Crush nuts in food processor with bread crumbs until finely chopped, but not mushy. Dredge chicken in nut mixture. Fry in hot oil until browned on both sides. Add cognac and butter to pan drippings and boil for a minute. Pour over chicken. ; name: almond crusted chicken breasts ; ingredients: sliced almonds, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, flour, egg, water, butter, lemon juice, fresh basil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Lightly crush almonds with your hands. Place chicken breasts between two pieces of plastic wrap and flatten with meat mallet. Season chicken with salt and pepper, then dredge in flour. Mix egg and water together. Dip chicken in egg wash. Press almonds onto chicken, being sure to fully coat each breast. Butter a baking sheet. Place chicken on sheet and bake for 15-20 minutes. While chicken is baking combine lemon juice, butter and basil. Drizzle butter of cooked chicken breasts. ; name: herb crusted chicken bites ; ingredients: dried herbs, fresh whole wheat breadcrumbs, salt and black pepper, flour, eggs, chicken breasts, lemon wedge ; preparation:Preheat oven to 210c place the mixed herbs, breadcrumbs, salt and pepper in a large bowl and mix until combined, then set aside. Place the flour in another bowl and the eggs in a third bowl. Toss the chicken cubes in the flour, dusting off any excess. Working in batches, dip the chicken pieces into the egg, then the breadcrumbs, pressing to coat well. Once all the chicken is crumbed, heat a little oil in a large non-stick frying pan. Cook the chicken in batches until golden. Remove and transfer to a baking tray lined with baking paper. Place in oven for 4-5 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Serve chicken with lemon wedges and a little whole egg mayonnaise for dipping, if desired. ; name: crispy balsamic baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, dry parsley flakes, garlic powder, garlic salt, balsamic vinegar, egg whites, boneless chicken breasts, salt & pepper ; preparation:Put bread crumbs, parsley, garlic powder, and salt in medium bowl and mix. Whisk together vinegar and egg whites in smaller bowl. Dip chicken in vinegar mixture then dry mixture. Place on sprayed cookie sheet. Spray the top of the chicken breasts with cooking spray. Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper. Bake 400 for 30-40 minutes, till fork tender and juices run clear. ; name: egyptian chicken panne breaded fried chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, lemon, juice of, onion, salt & pepper, fine breadcrumbs, oil ; preparation:Take and slice your chicken breasts into thinner slices. Put slices into glass mixing bowl or dish. Squeeze the juice of lemon onto chicken slices. Add the onion liquid. Add salt & pepper and cover with plastic wrap, put in refrigerator for at least an hour. When ready to fry, take a slice and dip into bowl filled with bread crumbs. Do this until all chicken is breaded, setting each slice on a plate. Add oil in a large frying pan, not too much, just enough to cover bottom of each slice. Fry until golden brown on each side. ; name: saucy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, celery seed, paprika, garlic, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix first 8 ingredients in plastic bag. Add chicken and marinate in refrigerator overnight. Remove chicken from bag and coat with crumbs. Heat oven to 350. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. ; name: best baked chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried parsley, salt, pepper, lemon juice, garlic powder, butter ; preparation:Preheat your oven to 350. In a large bowl mix the breadcrumbs, parmesan, parsley, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Dip the chicken breasts in the melted butter. Dip the chicken in the breaded mix. Brush lemon juice onto the tops of the chicken. Place chicken on a baking sheet and bake at 350 for one hour. ; name: crusted chicken breasts ; ingredients: chicken breasts, egg whites, cornstarch, lemon, juice of, breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, kosher salt, ground black pepper, olive oil ; preparation:

name: lemon berry pie ; ingredients: raspberries, frozen lemonade, cool whip topping, sweetened condensed milk, yellow food coloring, graham cracker pie crusts ; preparation:Set aside 1 cup berries for garnish. In a large bowl and using a rubber spatula, carefully mix lemonade concentrate and whipped topping. Fold in condensed milk, food coloring and remaining berries. Refrigerate covered up to six hours. Fold mixture into crust. Place reserved berries in a decorative manner on top of filling. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: creamy lemonade jello ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, boiling water, frozen lemonade, frozen whipped topping ; preparation:Dissolve jello in boiling water, then stir in lemonade concentrate until dissolved. Chill until partially set. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into a 13 x 9 glass dish. Chill until firm. ; name: lime yogurt dessert ; ingredients: boiling water, lime gelatin, ice cubes, yogurt ; preparation:Pour boiling water over jello in large bowl. Stir until dissolved. Add ice cubes. Stir until jello begins to thicken. Remove any unmelted ice. Add yogurt, beat with hand mixer until smooth. Pour into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until firm, about 45 minutes. Top with cool whip if desired. ; name: pink lemonade meringue pie ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, frozen pink lemonade concentrate, evaporated milk, pie shell, cold water, sugar, red food coloring ; preparation:Bake pie shell first, then cool. In a small saucepan, soften gelatin in cold water. Add lemonade concentrate to the gelatin and then stir in sugar until dissolved. Chill completely. Chill evaporated milk in a small bowl in th freezer until crystals form on the edges. Beat milk in the chilled bowl on high speed until stiff. Fold into chilled gelatin mix and add food coloring with a whisk. Pour into pie shell. Chill for a minimum of 3-4 hurs until it sets. ; name: tangy lemonade pie ; ingredients: sugar-free lemon gelatin, reduced-fat cream cheese, sugar-free lemonade-flavored drink mix, reduced fat graham cracker crust, reduced-fat whipped topping ; preparation:Prepare gelatin according to package directions. Chill until almost set. Transfer to a blender or food processor. Add cream cheese and lemonade mix and process until mixture is smooth. Pour into pie crust. Refrigerate overnight. Put 1 tablespoon of whipped topping on each piece just before serving. ; name: simple light lemon pie ; ingredients: sugar-free vanilla pudding mix, sugar-free lemon gelatin, water, lemon juice, reduced fat graham cracker crust, light whipped topping ; preparation:In small saucepan, combine pudding mix and gelatine. Add water and lemon juice. Stir until smooth. Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil. Cook and stir 1-2 minutes longer or until thickened. Remove from the heat. Cool clightly. Pour into crust. Cover and refrigerate for 3 hours or until set. Spread with whipped topping. ; name: fruit cocktail dessert ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, fruit cocktail, cream cheese, dream whip ; preparation:Make lemon jello, use juice from fruit cocktail for part of liquid. Mash cream cheese and add to jello. Let set. When jello begins to set add fruit cocktail and dream whip. Pour into a shallow dish. Put in refrigerator. ; name: lemony mousse dessert ; ingredients: lemon gelatin, boiling water, frozen lemonade concentrate, cream cheese, frozen whipped topping, yellow food coloring ; preparation:

name: grilled potatoes with garlic ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, fresh parsley, grainy mustard, lemon juice, butter, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cut potatoes into large wedges. Place on greased oven trays, bake for about 30 minutes or until just tender. Combine oil, garlic, herbs, mustard and juice in a bowl. Add potatoes and toss until potatoes are well coated with mixture. Return potatoes to oven trays and drizzle with melted butter. Cook under hot grill until golden brown, turning potatoes when necessary. Serve sprinkled with salt if desired. ; name: roasted garlic and rosemary potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh rosemary, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp. ; name: roasted potatoes with sage and garlic ; ingredients: small potatoes, flour, oil, garlic cloves, sage leaf, unsalted butter, kosher salt, fresh pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f and place a large, heavy skillet or roasting pan in the oven to heat. Place the potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with cold salted water. Put on high heat to boil. Once boiling, lower heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain the potatoes well, and place on paper towels. Put the flour on a plate. When the potatoes are dry, roll them in the flour to coat. Remove the hot skillet from the oven and add the oil and potatoes. Roast, shaking the pan occasionally until the potatoes are golden brown all over, about 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and add the garlic, sage and butter. Return to the oven for one minute. Season generously with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: garlic skillet red potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, small red potatoes, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Stir in potatoes. Cover skillet. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are almost tender, about 12-15 minutes. Uncover, reduce heat to low. Stir in garlic, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are tender, about 2 minutes. Sprinkle parsley and add salt to taste if desired. ; name: garlic balsamic and rosemary roasted potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, garlic cloves, rosemary sprigs, coarse sea salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine all ingredients on a large greased baking sheet. Arrange in a single layer. Roast in preheated oven for about 50 minutes, turning once during cooking, until potatoes are tender. Serves 6. ; name: roasted potatoes and baby carrots with garlic ; ingredients: red potatoes, baby carrots, garlic cloves, olive oil, coarse salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Dry the veggies well with a paper towel and place in a large bowl. Prepare a large non-stick baking sheet, you can line with foil and spray the foil liberally with cooking spray. In a small bowl combine olive oil, chopped garlic, coarse salt and black pepper. Mix well to combine. Pour over the veggies and toss to coat with a wooden spoon or clean hands. Set oven to 400 degrees f. Roast in oven for about 30 minutes or until the potatoes are fork-tender, tossing occasionally with a spatula. ; name: german home fried potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, red onion, garlic clove, canola oil, olive oil, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in their jackets, until done. Cool slightly and peel. Cut into thin slices while still warm. In a non-stick skillet, add a mixture of canola oil and olive oil- just enough to coat the bottom of pan. Heat oil and add potato slices, garlic, and onion. Season with salt and pepper. Saute until golden brown. Sprinkle liberally with chopped chives or parsley. ; name: garlic roasted potatoes barefoot contessa ina garten ; ingredients: small red potatoes, olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, garlic ; preparation:

name: sugar coated molasses cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, molasses, eggs, flour, salt, baking soda, ground ginger, ground cloves, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the molasses and eggs. Separately, combine the dry ingredients, then slowly mix into the wet ingredients. When blended and smooth, roll the dough into small balls, about 1 inch around. Dip the tops in sugar and place on greased or non-stick baking sheets. Bake at 350f or 180c for 10-12 minutes. Cool on a wire rack, then store in a tightly covered container to keep the cookies soft. ; name: molasses sugar cookies ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, molasses, egg, baking soda, flour, ground ginger, clove, cinnamon, salt ; preparation:Melt shortening in a 3 or 4 quart saucepan over low heat. Remove from heat and let cool. When cool, add sugar, molasses, and egg. Beat well. Sift together the flour, soda, cloves, ginger, cinnamon and salt. Add to first mixture. Mix well. Form into 1-inch balls, roll in granulated sugar and place on greased cookie sheet 2 inches apart. Bake at 375 degrees for 8 to 10 mminutes. ; name: canadian molasses cookies no butter ; ingredients: dark molasses, brown sugar, cider vinegar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking soda, ground ginger, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f & grease several cookie sheets. In large bowl, stir together molasses, brown sugar, vinegar & egg. In another sift or whisk together flour, baking soda, ginger & salt, then add to molasses mixture, mixing until well blended. Spoon dough by teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheets, about 2 inches apart. Bake until edges are golden. Remove from oven & let cool on pans on wire rack for 5 minutes before removing. ; name: eggless autumn spice cookies ; ingredients: flour, salt, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, ground ginger, baking soda, dark brown sugar, white sugar, sugar, maple syrup ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix flour, baking soda, ginger, cloves, cinnamon, and salt. Set aside. Cream butter and sugars until fluffy. Add maple syrup, blend. Slowly add the dry ingredients, mix well. Drop a tablespoon at a time in the reserved sugar, coat and roll in to a ball. Place on parchment lined cookiesheet at least an inch apart. Bake for 12-14 minutes or until lightly golden brown. Cool on a wire rack. Store in a sealed bag. ; name: grandma georgias molasses cookies ; ingredients: vegetable shortening, sugar, molasses, egg, baking soda, all-purpose flour, ground ginger, cinnamon, table salt ; preparation:Melt the shortening and let it cool. Mix the dry ingredients together. Add the sugar, molasses, and egg to the shortening. Stir in the dry ingredients and mix until combined. Chill until firm. Preheat the oven to 375f. Form the dough into balls about 1 inch in size. Place a little white sugar in a small bowl and roll each ball in the sugar. Place the balls about 2 inches apart on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes. Leave the cookies on the cookie sheet for 3 to 5 minutes. The cookies will be soft but they will harden as they cool. ; name: pumpkin molasses muffins ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, canned pumpkin, molasses, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, ground ginger, pecans ; preparation:Beat butter at medium speed of an electric mixer until creamy. Gradually add brown sugar, beating well. Add egg, beating well. Add pumpkin and molasses, beating well. Combine flour and next 3 ingredients. Gradually add to pumpkin mixture, beating at medium-low just until blended. Stir in pecans. Spoon into greased muffin pans, filling three-fourths full. Bake at 375 for 20 minutes. Remove from pans immediately. ; name: gluten free gingerbread cookies ; ingredients: eggs, unsalted butter, fine sea salt, molasses, brown sugar, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, coconut flour ; preparation:With a mixer, blend together the eggs, butter, salt, molasses, sugar, and spices. Stir in the coconut flour and mix thoroughly. Batter will thicken slightly as the flour absorbs moisture. Drop batter by scant teaspoonsfuls onto parchment paper or silpat lined cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes. Watching carefully, as these cookies can easily burn. Remove from cookie sheet to a rack to cool completely and package in airtight container, separating each layer with parchment or wax paper. ; name: silver palate molasses cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, granulated sugar, molasses, egg, all-purpose flour, ground cloves, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, salt, baking soda ; preparation:

name: spinach feta orzo ; ingredients: garlic clove, red pepper, olive oil, orzo pasta, chicken broth, dry white wine, fresh spinach, feta cheese, salt ; preparation:Saute garlic and pepper flakes in olive oil in a large saucepan for 30 seconds over medium heat. Add orzo, stirring 2 minutes to coat with oil to prevent sticking. Add chicken broth and wine. Cover, reduce heat to low and cook 10 minutes. Add spinach and feta to the hot pasta to wilt the spinach. Season with salt to taste. ; name: vegetable orzo side dish ; ingredients: orzo pasta, onions, oil, green pepper, red pepper, squash, mushrooms, bamboo shoots, margarine, onion soup mix ; preparation:Cook and drain orzo. Saute onions in oil for ten minutes, until translucent. Add peppers and squash. Saute until tender. Add mushrooms and bamboo shoots and cook until all vegetables are soft. Add margarine, soup mix, and orzo. Mix well. Cook for fifteen minutes or bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: chicken and orzo salad ; ingredients: pesto sauce, white wine vinegar, salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil, orzo pasta, cooked chicken, cherry tomatoes, baby spinach leaves ; preparation:In the bowl in which you will serve the salad, whisk together the pesto, vinegar, salt and pepper. Gradually whisk in oil until smooth. Set aside. Bring a large pot of water to a boil add 2 t. Salt and the orzo. Cook, stirring occasionally until done. About 9 minutes. Follow package directions. Drain, rinse under cold water and drain again. Add to bowl with vinaigrette and toss to coat. Add chicken, tomatoes and spinach leaves. Toss to combine and serve. ; name: cheesy orzo ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, orzo pasta, parmigiano, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat an 8-inch pot with a tight fitting cover over moderate heat. Add oil, onion and garlic and saute for 2 or 3 minutes. Add broth to the pan and bring to a boil. Stir in orzo and return to boiling. Cover pot and reduce heat to simmer. Cook 15 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until liquid is absorbed and orzo is tender. Remove lid and stir in cheese. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: orzo with parsley and lemon ; ingredients: orzo pasta, coarse salt, olive oil, lemons, zest of, black pepper, parsley ; preparation:Cook orzo in salted water 12 min, to al dente. Drain well, but do not rinse. Transfer to a serving bowl. Drizzle with oil, and season with salt and pepper. Toss with zest and parsley, and serve. ; name: swiss mushroom orzo ; ingredients: orzo pasta, swiss cheese, butter, garlic, salt, pepper, fresh mushrooms ; preparation:Cook orzo according to package directions. Melt 3 tablespoons of butter in microwave. Combine cheese, garlic, salt and pepper and add butter. In a saucepan, saute the mushrooms in remaining butter until tender. Drain orzo and add to mushrooms. Stir in cheese mixture and cook until melted. ; name: orzo and snap pea salad ; ingredients: coarse salt, orzo pasta, sugar snap pea, yellow squash, lemon juice, olive oil, parmesan cheese, ground pepper ; preparation:In a large pot of boiling salted water, cook orzo 5 minutes. Add sugar snap peas and squash. Cook until orzo is al dente and vegetables are crisp-tender, about 3 minutes. Drain well. Return to pot. Add lemon juice, olive oil, and parmesan. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine and serve. ; name: spinach orzo ; ingredients: orzo pasta, frozen chopped spinach, lemon, garlic, butter, parmesan cheese, onion powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: fantastic meat lasagna ; ingredients: extra lean ground beef, tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, pasta sauce, ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, dry basil, lasagna noodles, salt & pepper ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 375 degrees. In a non-stick skillet brown meat with salt and pepper. When browned stir in basil, tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, pasta sauce, ricotta and parmesan, and simmer for a couple of minutes. Place 3 lasagna noodles on the bottom of bake dish and top with half the sauce. Add another layer of noodles and then the remaining sauce. Top with mozzarella cheese and cover dish with foil. Bake for 45 minutes, remove from oven and let sit for 15 minutes before serving. ; name: my homemade lasagna ; ingredients: lasagna noodles, alfredo sauce, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, spaghetti sauce, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 9 x 13 pan. Put a bit of sauce on bottom of pan, put a layer of 3 noodles, meat sauce, some of the alfredo sauce, parsley, parmesan cheese, then mozzarella cheese. Repeat layers in that order ending with mozzarella cheese on top. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour or until cheese on top is golden brown. This is also good if made the night before, and left in the fridge over night. Can also be frozen. ; name: three cheese spinach lasagna ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese, pasta sauce, baby spinach leaves, lasagna sheets ; preparation:Pre hear oven to 180c. Grease lasagne pan. Spread some of tomato sauce on bottom of dish. Lay lasagne sheets on top of sauce. Spread half riccotta cheese on top. Spread a third of the mozzarella and a third of the cheddar cheese. Lay half of the spinach on top of cheeses. Spread some more of the tomato sauce on top and repeat. Finish with lasagne sheets and top with remaining mozzarella and cheddar cheese. Bake in oven for 40 minutes. ; name: homemade hamburger pizza ; ingredients: biscuits, tomato sauce, oregano, hamburger, mozzarella cheese, pineapple chunks ; preparation:Leave the refrigerator biscuits in the container on the counter for about 10 minutes, it is easier to spread the refrigerator rolls out when they are at room temperature. Open the containers and squish the rolls out onto a greased pizza pan, slightly over lapping the rolls. On big you want your pizza depends on how spread out you put the rolls and how thick you want the dough. Bake in the oven for 7-10 minutes at 375 only until the dough puffs and starts to get stiff to the touch, just before it starts to brown. Remove dough from the oven. Mix the tomato sauce and oregano together. Spread tomato sauce mix onto the dough. Spread the hamburger over the sauce. Spread the shredded mozzerella cheese over the hamburger. Sprinkle pineapple over the cheese. Bake the pizza another 10 minutes at 375 or until the cheese is melted and the dough just starts to turn brown. ; name: cheesy cheddar mock lasagna ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Prepare dinner according to package directions. Meanwhile, brown meat in large skillet. Drain. Add spaghetti sauce to meat. Mix well. Layer half each of the meat mixture and prepared dinner in 8-inch square baking dish. Repeat layers. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until heated through. ; name: italy in a dish ; ingredients: hamburger, spiral shaped pasta, tomato sauce, tomato paste, onion, oregano, cheese ; preparation:Boil the noodles. Cook the hamburger and onions on the stove until hamburger is cooked. Cook the tomato sauce, tomato paste, and oregeno on the stove until the sauce is boiling a little and take it off fast. Layer the noodles, the hamburger, the sauce and the cheese, leave some cheese to put on top. Find a little bit more oregeno and put it on top with the cheese. Put it in the oven on 350 degrees for about 1 hour. ; name: pizza turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, egg, onion, mushroom, garlic powder, oregano, black pepper, pizza sauce, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce. ; name: lasagna sandwiches ; ingredients: sour cream, onion, oregano, italian bread, bacon, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, butter ; preparation:

name: tropical party punch ; ingredients: water, sugar, pineapple juice, frozen orange juice concentrate, frozen lemonade concentrate, almond extract, carbonated lemon-lime beverage ; preparation:In a large saucepan, bring the water and sugar to a light boil. Cook and stir for 2 mins. Pour into a large container. Add pineapple juice, concentrates and extract. Cover and freeze. Remove from freezer 1-2 hours before serving. Just before serving, mash the mixture with a potato masher and stir in lemon-lime soda. ; name: orange party punch ; ingredients: frozen orange juice concentrate, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, pineapple juice, orange sherbet ; preparation:Prepare orange juice according to package directions. Pour into a punch bowl. Stir in the soda and pineapple juice. Top with scoops of sherbet. Serve immediately. ; name: earl grey rum punch ; ingredients: white rum, earl grey tea, pineapple juice, apricot liqueur, fresh lime juice, fresh lemon juice, simple syrup, angostura bitters, ice cube, apricots ; preparation:Mix rum and tea in small bowl. Let stand 1 hour. Strain mixture into 2-cup glass measuring cup. Mix in pineapple juice and next 5 ingredients. Fill 2 highball glasses with ice. Pour punch over. Garnish with fresh apricot wedges or pineapple chunks, if desired. ; name: red hot punch ; ingredients: sugar, water, red-hot candies, pineapple juice, frozen lemonade, ginger ale, ice ; preparation:In a large pan place sugar, water, and candies. Heat until candies are melted. Set aside and cool. Mix together pineapple juice, lemonade, water, and ginger ale. Serve with ice immediately. ; name: lorisdene s peach punch ; ingredients: peaches, pineapple juice, lemon juice, sugar, ginger ale ; preparation:Blend peaches, juices, and sugar in blender. Chill. At serving time, add gingerale. For a slush, add vodka and then freeze. Fill glass two-thirds full and then fill with the gingerale. ; name: pacman punch ; ingredients: pineapple juice, fresh orange juice, kalamansi juice, white rum, dark rum, sugar, water ; preparation:In a large bowl or pitcher, combine the fruit juices with the rums and stir to combine. In a smaller bowl, combine the reserved kalamansi rinds with the sugar and then muddle with a muddler or wooden spoon until sugar soaks up citrus oils. Bring a cup of water to a boil, pour into the sugar and citrus peel mixture, and then stir until sugar dissolves. Strain and discard the kalamansi rinds, then pour the kalamansi syrup into the juice and rum mixture. Taste the punch. Depending on your pineapple and orange juice, sweetness will vary. Add more kalamansi juice if needed, or more sugar if needed. Chill the punch well, make the night before you serve it if you have time. ; name: holiday pina colada punch ; ingredients: pineapple juice, 7-up soda, cream of coconut, limes, light rum ; preparation:Chill all ingredients first. Mix 2 cups of the pineapple juice with cream of coconut in a blender. Now add this mixture with the remaining pineapple juice, 7-up soda, juice of 1 lime and the rum if you desire. Garnish cups with cut lime slices. Serve over ice cubes or crushed ice. ; name: caribbean punch ; ingredients: orange juice, pineapple juice, lime juice, honey, ginger ale, rum, pineapple chunk, melon ball ; preparation:

name: thai shrimp and cabbage stir fry low carb ; ingredients: cabbage, cooking oil, salt and pepper, onion, garlic cloves, shrimp, water, soy sauce, fresh cilantro, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Heat 3 tsp of oil in a skillet or a stir fry pan. Add cabbage and stir fry cabbage for about 2 minutes or until tender. Remove cabbage and keep warmed. Sprinkle with salt and pepper, to taste. In the same pan, add 3 tsp of oil and stir fry onions and garlic until tender. Add the shrimp, water and soy sauce. Cook until shrimp turns pink. Sprinkle with cilantro and red pepper flakes, stir. Serve shrimp mixture over cabbage. ; name: shrimp with rice stick noodles and vegetables ww ; ingredients: rice vinegar, soy sauce, honey, sesame seed oil, rice sticks, large shrimp, red bell pepper, snow peas, cucumber, cilantro ; preparation:In a small cup combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Transfer to a large bowl. Return cooking water to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days. ; name: chicken cacciatore w shirataki noodles lower cal lower carb ; ingredients: shirataki noodles, butter, olive oil, green pepper, onion, boneless skinless chicken breast, fresh mushrooms, tomato and basil pasta sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare noodles according to package directions. Heat non-stick 12-inch skillet with 2-inch sides over medium high heat. Add butter and oil. Add peppers and onions and chicken and cook until soft and onions are lightly browned. Add mushrooms, cook 1- 2 minutes. Pour in sauce, mix well. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer gently 5 minutes. Spray a non-stick pan with oil, add noodles and stir-fry 1 minute until hot and dry. Place noodles on 4 warm serving plates and portion the chicken and sauce on top. Sprinkle 2 tablespoons parmesan cheese over each serving. ; name: creamy quick cajun shrimp ; ingredients: large shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, cajun seasoning, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, cream of chicken soup, milk, paprika ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine shrimp, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce and cajun seasonings. Toss to coat& set aside. In a large skillet, saute onion& garlic in vegetable oil until tender. Add soup, milk, and paprika, and bring to a boil. Add seasoned shrimp and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: thai almond butter shrimp ; ingredients: coconut milk, almond butter, shrimp, chicken stock, diced tomato, unsweetened applesauce ; preparation:Add chicken stock and diced tomato in a small pot and simmer over low heat. Add coconut milk and continue to simmer to meld all the flavors together and that the sauce has thickened. Add shrimp and cook for another 5 minutes. Turn off heat and take shrimp out on a separate dish and add almond butter and apple sauce and whisk in the thickened sauce. Add the shrimp into bowls and add extra tomato slices for garnish as desired. ; name: florida shrimp ; ingredients: key lime, olive oil, creole seasoning, garlic powder, shrimp ; preparation:In preparation, zest the lime and cut it in half. Set aside for later. In a large saucepan over medium high heat, drizzle enough olive oil to lightly cover the surface of your saucepan. Add the garlic powder, creole seasoning, and lime zest. Then add shrimp. Cook until pink. Serve immediately with remaining lime halves squeezed over the top. ; name: quick n easy curried shrimp ; ingredients: butter, curry powder, onion, celery, garlic, fresh shrimp, all-purpose flour, sour cream, whipping cream ; preparation:In a large non-stick fry pan, melt butter, stir in curry powder and cook and stir for 5 minutes to develop flavor of the curry powder. Add the onion, celery and garlic. Cook and stir until onion is softened. Add shrimp and cook for 3 to 4 minutes until shrimp have turned pink and are almost cooked. Stir in the flour until it has been absorbed. Add sour cream and whipping cream, stirring all the time until mixture comes to a boil and thickens. Seve immediately over rice. ; name: shrimp egg foo yong low cal fat carb ; ingredients: canola oil, eggs, yellow onion, bok choy, soy sauce, garlic powder, salt, pepper, bamboo shoot, medium shrimp ; preparation:

name: rosemary apricot chicken ; ingredients: salt, dried rosemary, black pepper, garlic cloves, chicken quarters, apricot jam, lemon juice, dijon mustard ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Mix salt, rosemary, pepper and garlic. Rub mixture into chicken. Place chicken, meaty side up, in pan and bake for 25 minutes. Meanwhile, mix apricot jam, lemon juice, and mustard. Brush apricot mixture over chicken. Bake for 20 minutes longer or until juices run clear. Serve. ; name: apricot pecan chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, dried apricot, pecans, celery, green onions, cilantro, low-fat sour cream, salt, ground pepper ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Set aside. Whisk together sour cream, salt and pepper in a separate bowl. Pour over first six ingredients. Toss well. Serve with dry wheat toast. ; name: apricot rosemary chicken ; ingredients: dried rosemary, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, fat free chicken broth, apricot preserves, honey mustard ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken breasts. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done. ; name: pecan crusted honey chicken ; ingredients: dijon mustard, honey, lemon juice, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, pecans, dry breadcrumbs, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Mix mustard, honey and lemon juice. Brush mixture onto both sides of chicken breasts. Place chicken breasts in a single layer in a shallow baking pan. Combine pecans, bread crumbs, and butter. Sprinkle evenly over chicken, press lightly into chicken to secure. Bake 20 to 25 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: lemon herbed chicken tenderloins ; ingredients: chicken tenderloins, lemon juice, dijon mustard, fresh rosemary, fresh thyme, fresh parsley, fresh basil, olive oil ; preparation:Place tenderloins in a flat dish with sides. In a small bowl, mix together all lemon juice, mustard, and herbs. Pour marinade over the chicken. Marinate for 30 minutes and up to 12 hours, covered, in the refrigerator. In a large nonstick skillet, heat the oil over medium heat. Add in the tenderloins. Saute for 3 minutes on each side until they are just cooked through. Remove from heat immediately so they remain tender. Serve. ; name: hot sweet and sticky chicken drumettes ; ingredients: apricot preserves, rosemary, chili-garlic sauce, dijon mustard, brown sugar, chicken drummettes, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:In large bowl stir preserves, garlic sauce, brown sugar, vinegar, minced rosemary and mustard. Add the drumettes and toss well to coat. Cover and marinate in the fridge stirring occasionally for 1 hour. Grill turning often basting and cooking a total of about 30 minutes. Dont bast at the last 10 minutes of cooking. ; name: lemon mustard chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, cooking oil, dijon-style mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, dried oregano, ground red pepper ; preparation:Skin chicken. Place chicken pieces, bone side up on unheated rack of a broiler pan. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat, about 20 minutes or until light brown. Meanwhile in a bowl stir together oil, mustard, lemon juice, lemon pepper seasoning, oregano and red pepper. Brush mustard mixture onto chicken. Turn chicken, brush with remaning mixture. Broil for 5-15 minutes more or until chicken is no longer pink. ; name: sesame pecan chicken tenders with apricot dipping sauce ; ingredients: egg whites, sesame seeds, pecans, vegetable oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, hoisin sauce, dijon mustard, apricot preserves ; preparation:

name: avocado and lime soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, avocados, fresh lime juice, garlic powder, half-and-half, lime slice, salt, pepper ; preparation:Peel, pit and dice the avocados. In a blender, puree chicken broth, diced avocados, lime juice and garlic powder. Transfer mixture to a large bowl, stir in half and half. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate until well chilled. To serve, divide soup into chilled bowls and garnish with lime slices. ; name: chilled cucumber avocado and shrimp soup ; ingredients: avocado, cucumber, chicken broth, plain low-fat yogurt, lime juice, salt, cooked shrimp, green onions, shrimp ; preparation:Cut the avocado in half and remove the pit. Wrap half the avocado in plastic wrap and set aside. Peel the other half of the avocado, then cut it into chunks. Place the avocado, cucumber, broth, yogurt, lime juice and salt in the bowl of a blender. Process until smooth and creamy. Transfer the mixture to a bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or until very cold. To serve, peel and dice the remaining avocado half. Stir the avocado into the soup along with the diced shrimp. Ladle the soup into 4 bowls, sprinkle with green onions and float a single shrimp on top of each. ; name: chilled avocado soup with ginger and lime ; ingredients: butter, shallots, fresh ginger, reduced-sodium chicken broth, fresh lime juice, cayenne pepper, avocados, half-and-half, fresh cilantro, lime slice ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium pan over medium heat. Add minced shallots and minced ginger. Saut for about 1 minute. Add chicken broth, lime juice, cayenne pepper. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for about 3 minutes. Transfer mixture to a large bow. Pure avocados and half & half in a blender. Whisk into soup. Season with salt and pepper. Cover and refrigerate for at least 3 hours. Garnish soup with cilantro and lime slices. ; name: spiced avocado soup ; ingredients: avocados, sour cream, chicken broth, yellow onion, canola oil, coriander powder, chili powder, salt, tomatoes, cilantro ; preparation:Chop and saut onion in oil, until caramelization starts. Add chili and coriander, and saut for a minute longer. Add chicken broth and bring to boil. While waiting for boil, finely dice tomato and cilantro, for garnish. Remove from heat, and add sour cream. Cut avocados in half, and remove pit. Scoop out flesh with spoon into soup. Using hand blender, pure ingredients. Add salt to taste. If serving hot, put in bowl and top with garnish. If serving cold, put soup in refrigerator for at least two hours, then when ready to serve, top with garnish. ; name: spicy cajun crab and greens soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, all-purpose flour, cajun seasoning, bottled clam juice, diced tomatoes with sweet onions, baby spinach leaves, fresh thyme, garlic clove, lump crabmeat ; preparation:Whisk oil and flour in heavy large saucepan over medium-high heat until smooth and golden brown, about 3 minutes. Add enough cajun seasoning to season to taste and stir 30 seconds. Add clam juice and stir until smooth. Add tomatoes with juices. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer 3 minutes. Add spinach, thyme, and garlic and simmer until spinach is just wilted, about 1 minute. Add crabmeat and simmer until heated through, stirring gently. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Ladle soup into bowls and serve. ; name: avocado banana chilled soup ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, bananas, milk, sugar, lemon juice, cinnamon, nutmeg, plain yogurt, salt ; preparation:In a blender or food processor, puree avocados and bananas. Add the milk, sugar, lemon juice, cinnamon, nutmeg and yogurt. Blend until smooth. Add salt, if needed. Chill at least 3 hours prior to serving. ; name: green goddess soup ; ingredients: avocados, lime juice, salt, pepper, nutmeg, chicken broth, heavy cream ; preparation:Place avocado, lime juice, salt, pepper and nutmeg in an electric blender. Add 1 can of chicken broth. Cover and blend 30 seconds at high speed. Stir in remaining can broth. Chill until ice-cold. Garnish with a spoonful of whipped cream and a sprinkling of nutmeg. Prep time does not include refrigeration time. ; name: avocado crab soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, green onion, garlic clove, lemon juice, avocados, plain low-fat yogurt, crabmeat ; preparation:

name: raspberry jello fruit fluff ; ingredients: raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, raspberry sauce, cold water, frozen whipped topping, fresh raspberries ; preparation:Completely dissolve the raspberry gelatin in the boiling water. Add cold water. Stir in the raspberry sauce. Cool until thickened but not firm. Whip the gelatin until frothy and lighter in color. Fold the whipped topping into the whipped gelatin until there are no white streaks. Gently fold the raspberries into the mixture. Use a few berries for decoration. Refrigerate until firm, about three hours. ; name: cran raspberry jello salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, frozen raspberries, whole berry cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple in juice ; preparation:Be sure that raspberries and pineapple are well drained. If too much liquid is left in them, the jello will not set up. Mix the jello according to package directions, using the juices from the drained fruits as part of the cold liquid. Stir in the remaining ingredients, breaking up the cranberry sauce well. Put into a 9x13 pan and chill until set. ; name: rhubarb cream dessert ; ingredients: rhubarb, water, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, sugar, frozen strawberries, vanilla ice cream, whipped cream ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, combine rhubarb and water. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer over medium heat until rhubarb is tender, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in gelatin and sugar until dissolved. Add frozen strawberries and ice cream. Alow to thaw, stirring occasionally. Pour into indivitual servind dishes. Refrigerate several hours or until firm. Serve with a garnish of whipped cream on top. ; name: jelly jello slice bar ; ingredients: plain sweet biscuits, butter, sweetened condensed milk, lemons, unflavored gelatin, water, jello gelatin, boiling water, cold water ; preparation:Combine crushed biscuits and butter mixing well. Press into greased 30cm x 23cm pan and refrigerate. Combine condensed milk, lemon juice and gelatin mix. Mix well and pour over prepared base. Refrigerate 2 hours. Mix jelly powder and boiling water together, then add cold water. Refrigerate until consistency of unbeaten egg white, pour over lemon layer. Refrigerate, then cut into squares when set. I prefer a red jelly for this, but any flavour would be ok. ; name: creamy lemonade jello ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, boiling water, frozen lemonade, frozen whipped topping ; preparation:Dissolve jello in boiling water, then stir in lemonade concentrate until dissolved. Chill until partially set. Fold in whipped topping. Pour into a 13 x 9 glass dish. Chill until firm. ; name: j e l l o fruit and cookie dream ; ingredients: strawberry yogurt, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, cool whip, blueberries, raspberries, strawberry, oreo cookies ; preparation:Mix yogurt and dry gelatin mix in medium bowl until well blended. Add whipped topping. Stir with wire whisk until well blended. Spoon layers of yogurt mixture, berries and chopped cookies alternately into each of six dessert dishes. Store leftovers in refrigerator. ; name: strawberry jello ice cream mold ; ingredients: strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, salt, vanilla ice cream, boiling water, gelatin ; preparation:Combine gelatin, salt and jello. Add water and dissolve. Add ice cream. Stir well. Rinse mold with ice water before adding mixture. Chill until firm. ; name: raspberry jello pretzel dessert ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, frozen raspberries, pretzels, butter, sugar, cream cheese, cool whip ; preparation:

name: cowboy casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, baked beans, barbecue sauce, bisquick baking mix, milk, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef and drain, preheat oven to 425f. Stir baked beans and barbecue sauce into beans heat to boiling while stirring, pour into sprayed 2 quart casserole dish. Stir bisquick mix, milk, and butter until dough forms. Drop by spoonfuls onto beef mixture. Bake uncovered 20 minutes until topping is golden brown. Sprinkle with cheese and cook about 3 minutes more or until cheese is melted. ; name: southern living mexican casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, onions, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes and green chilies, ranch style beans, corn tortillas, processed cheese ; preparation:Cook gound chuck and diced onion in a dutch oven, stirring until meat crumbles and is no longer pink. Drain meat mixture, and return to dutch oven. Stir in chicken soup, diced tomato and green chiles, and beans. Layer half of the tortillas evenly into 2 lightly greased 13 x 9 inch baking dishes. Top each with one-fourth of meat mixture and one-fourth of cheese cubes. Repeat layers with remaining tortillas, meat mixture, and cheese. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: hearty baked bean casserole ; ingredients: bacon, lean ground beef, onion, pork and beans, stewed tomatoes, brown sugar, chili powder, celery salt, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f degrees. In a large skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Remove and drain fat from skillet. Crumble bacon and set aside. In the same skillet, brown the ground beef and onion. Drain off any fat. Combine all ingredients in a casserole dish and bake for 2 hours. I keep it covered during the first hour, then remove the cover and stir, and leave the cover off for the last hour of cooking, although the original recipe did not specify this. ; name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: comfort casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, celery, garlic, pepper, fresh mushrooms, beef bouillon powder, boiling water, soy sauce, long grain white rice ; preparation:Scrambly-fry the beef, onion, celery, garlic, and pepper in a non-stick skillet until the beef is no longer pink. Drain. Add the mushrooms, saute for 5 minutes. Dissolve the bouillon powder in the boiling water. Add to the beef mixture. Mix well. Stir in the soy sauce and rice. Simmer, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until the rice is tender. ; name: mexican potato casserole 5fix ; ingredients: simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion, cream of chicken soup, velveeta mexican cheese, sour cream, nacho cheese flavor doritos ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large bowl, mix together soup, cheese and sour cream. Fold in simply potatoes diced potatoes with onion. Add potato mixture to large greased casserole dish. Top with doritos and bake for 45 minutes. ; name: southwestern mushroom casserole ; ingredients: mushrooms, beef broth, flour, heavy cream, cayenne pepper, salt, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the mushrooms in a 2-quart pie pan. In a medium bowl, combine the beef broth and flour. Microwave at low power until slightly thickened, 2-3 minutes. Stir in the heavy cream and cayenne. Season with salt. Immediately pour the sauce over the mushrooms. In a medium bowl, mix together the breadcrumbs and parmesan. Sprinkle on top of the mushrooms. Top with the butter and bake until browned, about 45 minutes. ; name: cowboy casserole sp5 ; ingredients: simply potatoes shredded hash browns, ground beef, black beans, thick & chunky salsa, nacho cheese soup ; preparation:

name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: mighty good chicken dish ; ingredients: cooked chicken, cream of chicken soup, ritz crackers, sliced almonds, celery, water chestnuts, margarine ; preparation:Boil chopped celery for 7 minutes, and drain. Add soup, drained and sliced water chestnuts, and diced chicken. Put in 9x13 pan. Melt margarine, and add crushed ritz crackers and sliced almonds. Spread this mixture on top. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. ; name: baked fried chicken ; ingredients: flour, seasoned bread crumbs, old bay seasoning, salt, pepper, frying chicken, oil ; preparation:Heat oil on medium high heat in large skillet or frying pan. Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Combine dry ingredients. Moisten chicken pieces with water. Dredge chicken in flour and crumb mixture. Quickly fry chicken on all sides until browned and crisp. Place in covered baking dish and bake at 300 degrees for 30 minutes. Remove cover and bake additional 20-30 minutes to re-crisp chicken, serve. ; name: savory oven fried chicken ; ingredients: dried breadcrumbs, sharp cheddar cheese, dried ancho chile powder, salt, chicken, eggs ; preparation:In a large shallow bowl mix bread crumbs, cheese, ground chilies, and salt. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Dip in beaten egg and roll in crumb mixture to coat. Place on a foil-lined 12-by 15-inch baking sheet. Bake in a 375 degree oven or 350 degree convection oven until crumbs are browned and chicken is no longer pink at the bone, 45 minutes to 1 hour. ; name: crispy chicken casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, chicken broth, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, frozen mixed vegetables, ritz crackers, butter, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Boil your chicken in a pot of water with the chicken broth. When the chicken is done let it cool. Then debone the chicken and remove the skin. Cut chicken meat into bite size pieces. Cook the vegetables and drain liquid. In a large bowl mix chicken meat, vegetables, sour cream, can of soup, and spices. Place chicken mixture in 13x9 casserole dish. In another bowl crush ritz crackers into small pieces and spread over chicken mixture. Place dots of butter all over the crackers. Place in oven preheated at 350 for about 45 minutes or until bubbly in the middle. If crakers start to get too brown before done place a piece of tin foil over the top of chicken. ; name: baby food chicken ; ingredients: butter, unbleached flour, milk, chicken, potato, white cheddar cheese, vegetables, salt ; preparation:Grill or bake chicken, remove bones and shred. Bake or boil potato and chop into small cubes or mash. Melt butter in a saucepan. Add milk, flour, and cheese and make a sauce. Add chicken and potato to it. Add remaining ingredients. ; name: pretzel fried chicken ; ingredients: broiler-fryer chickens, eggs, milk, pretzel crumbs, vegetable oil ; preparation:Dry the chicken pieces with paper towel. Mix the eggs and milk well. Place the pretzel crumbs in a bag. Dip each piece of chicken in egg-milk mixture. Then place in bag and coat well. Drop into 350f vegetable oil and fry till golden brown. Place the chicken pieces on foil in a large baking pan and bake in 300f oven for 35 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: escalloped chicken ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, soft breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, salt, eggs, chicken broth ; preparation:

name: steamin mussels ; ingredients: chicken broth, dry white wine, salt, pepper, fresh mussels ; preparation:In a large soup kettle, over high heat, combine the chicken broth, wine, salt, and pepper. Bring to a boil. Add the mussels, cover, and cook for about 3 to 4 minutes or just until the mussels open. Do not over cook the mussels. Discard any mussels that do not open by themselves. ; name: great eastern s steamed mussels ; ingredients: fresh mussels, onion, garlic cloves, celery, olive oil, white wine, bay leaf, lemon peel, fresh parsley ; preparation:Rinse mussels in cold water and discard any broken or open mussels. Saute onion, garlic, celery and bay leaf in the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat for 1 minute. Add the mussels, wine, and cook for about 4-5 minutes until the mussels open. Shake the pot occasionally while cooking. Serve in soup plates, garnished with lemon peel, parsley, broth and crusty bread for dipping. Serves 4 as an appetizer or 2 as a main course. ; name: beer steamed clams ; ingredients: beer, bay leaves, old bay seasoning, mustard seeds, coriander seed, cayenne pepper, littleneck clams, fresh parsley ; preparation:Crush the mustard seeds and the coriander seeds lightly in a mortar and pestle, or place the seeds in a heavy plastic bag and lightly crush with a mallet or rolling pin. In a large pot, bring beer, bay leaves, old bay, mustard seeds, coriander seeds and cayenne pepper to a boil over medium heat. Add the clams. Cover and steam 3-6 min or until the clams open, stirring once or twice. Discard any clams that do not open. Serve clams with the broth in shallow bowls. Sprinkle with the chopped parsley. ; name: steamed fish and vegetables for one ; ingredients: white fish fillet, carrot, zucchini, lemon juice, dried parsley flakes, lemon-pepper seasoning, dill weed ; preparation:Place fish in a 15-inch x 12-inch piece of heavy-duty foil. Add the vegetables and sprinkle with lemon juice, parsley, lemon pepper and dill. Fold foil over and fold in edges twice, forming a pouch. Place on a baking sheet. Bake at 450 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until vegetables are tender and fish flakes easily with a fork. Carefully open pouch to allow steam to escape. ; name: baked herbed salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillets, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, dried oregano, lemon juice, butter, tomatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients, except salmon, together. Pour a small amount of the mix into the bottom of a baking pan - just enough to lightly cover the bottom. Add the salmon, and pour the remaining mix over top. Bake for about 20 minutes, or until salmon flakes easily with a fork. ; name: haddock steamed with veggies ; ingredients: haddock, red cabbage, spanish onion, tomatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Bring water in a steamer to a boil, lower heat to a simmer. Layer ingredients in the steamer. Cabbage, break the slice up a little, the slice of onion, broken into rings. Sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle 1 tablespoon cheese over evenly, add the slice of tomato. Season the fish with salt and pepper and place the fish fillets evenly over the tomato and top with the other tablespoon of cheese. Steam for approximately 10 minutes or until the cabbage is tender crisp and the fish is flaky. Try to retain the layers to remove to plate. ; name: savory salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillet, ranch salad dressing, dried dill, dried parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Place salmon into a glass baking dish. Pour salad dressing over salmon. Sprinkle with dill and parsley. Bake until fish flakes easily when tested with fork, about 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: pacific northwest microwbrew steamers with bread ; ingredients: unsalted butter, garlic cloves, fresh ground black pepper, shallots, dried tarragon, dried thyme, fresh parsley, fresh chives, ale, fresh mussels ; preparation:

name: angel hair pasta with basil tomato sauce and chicken ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, shallot, roma tomatoes, salt and pepper, fresh basil, whole wheat angel hair pasta, water, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Saut garlic and shallot in oil over medium heat until garlic golden and shallot wilted. Add tomatoes and season with salt, pepper, and basil. Chop cooked chicken into bite size pieces. Add pasta, water, and chicken to sauce, stir gently in to coat. Move to serving platter, sprinkle with parmesan cheese, and serve. ; name: basil chicken over angel hair pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, olive oil, onion, garlic clove, chopped tomatoes, boneless chicken breast halves, fresh basil, salt, hot pepper sauce, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a large pot of salted boiling water, cook angel hair pasta until it is al dente, about 8 to 10 minutes. Drain, and set aside. In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Saute the onions and garlic. Stir in the tomatoes, chicken, basil, salt and hot pepper sauce. Reduce heat to medium, and cover skillet. Simmer for about 5 minutes, stirring frequently, until mixture is hot and tomatoes are soft. Toss sauce with hot cooked angel hair pasta to coat. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: lemon garlic chicken over angel hair pasta ; ingredients: flour, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, boneless skinless chicken breast, butter, lemon, juice of, white wine, hot water, chicken bouillon cube, angel hair pasta ; preparation:Combine flour, parmesan, and garlic powder. Dredge chicken in mixture. Melt butter in large skillet. Add chicken and brown. Add liquid. Stir until thickened. Meanwhile cook pasta according to package directions. Drain pasta and place in large serving bowl. Pour chicken and sauce over pasta. Toss gently. Top with grated cheese. Garnish with fresh lemon slices and fresh parsley. ; name: italian chicken noodles ; ingredients: italian salad dressing mix, water, boneless skinless chicken breasts, mushroom soup, cream cheese, cooked noodles ; preparation:Mix italian dressing mix with water. Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour italian dressing over chicken. Mix soup and cream cheese. Pour over chicken. Cover with lid or foil. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Serve over cooked noodles. ; name: creamy italian chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing mix, water, cream of chicken soup, cream cheese ; preparation:Mix water and dressing. Pour over chicken in the bottom of a skillet. Cover and cook chicken until done and no longer pink. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until no longer lumpy. Pour over chicken and heat through. Serve over rice or pasta. ; name: summer fresh pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, plum tomatoes, fresh basil, sweet corn, crabmeat, sweet butter ; preparation:Heat oil in a large pan. Saute onions and garlic till translucent. Add remaining ingredients except for butter just to heat through. Stir in pasta. Place into a large pasta bowl. Top with butter while hot. Garnish with pepper flakes to taste. ; name: toasted angel hair pasta with roasted red peppers and sausage ; ingredients: sausage links, garlic cloves, angel hair pasta, chicken broth, dried basil, roasted red pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook sausage in large skillet, crumble. Saute garlic. Remove from skillet, leave grease in skillet. Add pasta to skillet and brown in grease 8-10 minutes. Add broth, peppers and spices, stir to mix. Cook until all liquid is absorbed, uncovered. Add meat to heat, mix. Serve with fresh parmesan over top. ; name: chicken with angel hair pasta ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, italian salad dressing mix, white wine, cream of mushroom soup, cream cheese with chives, angel hair pasta ; preparation:

name: dreamy frozen fruit salad ; ingredients: whipped dessert topping mix, cream cheese, lemon juice, sweetened condensed milk, pecans, pineapple chunks, cherry pie filling, paper baking cups ; preparation:Prepare whipped topping mix per package directions. Set aside. In a bowl, add the cream cheese and lemon juice. Beat until smooth. Add in the milk, pecans, and pineapple. Stir to combine. Gently fold in the whipped topping and cherry pie filling. Put 24 paper baking cups in muffin tins. Spoon the mixture into the paper cups. Cover and freeze 4 hours. One the salads are frozen, they can be removed from the muffin tins and stored in a heavy-duty plastic freezer bag. ; name: frozen strawberry banana salad ; ingredients: strawberry pie filling, vanilla ice cream, bananas, pecans, lemon juice ; preparation:Stir together pie filling& ice cream. Sprinkle bananas with lemon juice. Add bananas& nuts to ice cream mixture. Turn into 8 individual molds- freeze until firm. Move to the refrigerator 15 minutes before serving. Unmold onto lettuce lined plates. ; name: pineapple salad ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, white sugar, dry tapioca, cider vinegar, crushed pineapple, apples, unsalted peanuts, frozen whipped topping ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, stir together the flour, sugar, tapioca, vinegar, and the reserved pineapple juice. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until thick. Remove from heat and chill. In a large bowl, combine the pineapple, apples, peanuts, and chilled tapioca mixture. Fold in the whipped topping and chill for at least 1 hour before serving. ; name: sweet pea salad ; ingredients: frozen sweet peas, sliced water chestnuts, celery, red onion, smoked gouda cheese, low-fat sour cream, sugar, salt and pepper, cashews ; preparation:Place peas, chestnuts, celery, onion, and cheese in a large salad bowl. In a small mixing bowl, stir together the sour cream and sugar until well blended. Add the sour cream mixture to the salad, then season with salt and pepper. Toss thoroughly with a large spoon. Place in refrigerator for several hours. Add the cashews just before serving, and toss well to thoroughly blend all ingredients. ; name: super creamy fruit salad ; ingredients: pineapple chunks in juice, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas, miniature marshmallows, instant vanilla pudding, cool whip ; preparation:Drain pineapple, reserving juice. Mix pineapple juice and dry instant vanilla pudding together and set in the refrigerator for 30 minutes. Mix the pineapple, fruit cocktail, mandarin oranges, bananas & marshmallows together. Gently fold in pudding mixture. Lastly, fold in cool whip. Cover and refrigerate. ; name: frozen pineapple salad good use for those muffin tins ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, brown sugar, crushed pineapple, pineapple yogurt, pecans ; preparation:Blend cream cheese and sugars, beating well. Add pineapple and yogurt. Spoon into cupcake liners placed in a muffin tray. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Cover and freeze until firm. Remove from freezer about 10 minutes prior to serving. ; name: george washington cherry salad ; ingredients: cherry gelatin, cherry pie filling, crushed pineapple, cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, pecans ; preparation:In large mixing bowl, mix gelatin with 2 cups boiling water until dissoved. Add cherry pie filling and pineapple with juice. Mix well. Pour into 13x9x2 inch pan and refrigerate until gelatin is set. Mix cream cheese, sour cream and sugar until smooth. Spread over salad after gelatin is set. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Sprinkle with nuts just before serving. ; name: paper cup frozen salad ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, sugar, salt, crushed pineapple, banana, red food coloring, pecans, bing cherries ; preparation:

name: banana coconut bread ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, mashed banana, shredded coconut, flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, pecans ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done. ; name: wonderful banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, wheat bran, baking soda, salt, butter, applesauce, splenda brown sugar blend, eggs, mashed bananas, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool. ; name: big moist banana bread ; ingredients: sugar, shortening, eggs, milk, banana, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, walnuts ; preparation:Mix together sugar, shortenign and eggs. Stir in milk and bananas. Sift together and stir in flour, baking powder, soda and salt. Blend in chopped nuts. Pour into well greased 9 x 5 x3 inch pan. Let stand for 20 minutes before baking. Bake at 350 degrees until it tests done. ; name: moist banana nut bread ; ingredients: sugar, eggs, butter, flour, baking soda, baking powder, bananas, nuts, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cream sugar, eggs and butter. Add dry ingredients. Add mashed bananas, nuts, cinnamon and vanilla. Cook in greased loaf pan for about an hour. For small-medium muffins. 20-30 minutes. ; name: our favorite banana bread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, bananas, sour cream, walnuts ; preparation:Cream butter. Gradually add sugar, beating with a mixer at medium speed. Combine flour with baking powder, baking soda, and salt, stirring well. Combine eggs, banana, and sour cream. Stir well. Add flour to creamed mixture, alternately with banana mixture, beginning and ending with flour mixture. Mix until blended after each addition. Stir in walnuts. Pour batter into greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until a wooden pck inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool completely on a wire rack. Yield 1 loaf. ; name: naturally sweetened banana bread ; ingredients: bananas, unsweetened applesauce, eggs, water, vanilla extract, whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 f. Mash the bananas until they are mostly lump-free. With a hand mixer, beat together the banana, applesauce, eggs, vanilla, and water until creamy. In a separate bowl, sift the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and spices. Gradually add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients, beating well. Pour the batter into a gently oiled and floured 95 inches loaf pan and spread evenly. Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick is inserted and comes out clean. Cool completely on wire rack before slicing. ; name: one pan banana bread ; ingredients: vegetable oil, bananas, vanilla extract, eggs, bisquick baking mix, sugar, nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Generously grease the bottom only of a 9x5x3-inch loaf pan. Stir all ingredients in pan with a fork until moistened. Beat vigorously 1 minute. Bake 55 to 60 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool 5 minutes. Run knife around sides of loaf to loosen, remove from pan. Cool completely. ; name: ba nana s bread ; ingredients: unbleached flour, sea salt, baking soda, sweet creamy butter, unbleached cane sugar, pure vanilla extract, mashed bananas, eggs, pecan pieces ; preparation:

name: boiled chocolate cake ; ingredients: sugar, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda, cocoa, self raising flour, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarb soda& cocoa in a saucepan& bring to the boil. Once boiling, time for 2 minutes, then remove from heat. Grease& line base of a loaf pan. Once chocolate mixture has cooled, add the flour& egg. Mix well until smooth. Place in pan& cook in oven for 35 minutes. ; name: hot chocolate cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, vanilla extract, hot cocoa, butter, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In a large bowl, beat together the eggs and sugar until very thick. The batter should fall from the beaters in a thick ribbon. Beat in the vanilla. While youre beating the eggs and sugar, heat the hot chocolate and butter in a small saucepan to just simmering. Add the hot chocolate mixture to the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream as you continue beating. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, and salt. Fold the dry ingredients into the wet ingredients, stirring until theyre just combined. Pour the batter into a lightly greased 9 inch cake round. Bake for 50 minutes, or until the cake is a deep golden brown and starting to pull away from the sides of the pan. Remove the cake from the oven and cool it in the pan for 10-15 minutes. Run a knife around the sides of the pan. ; name: mix in the pan chocolate cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vegetable oil, white vinegar, cold water, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a square 9 inch pan stir together flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Add oil, vinegar, water, and vanilla. Mix until combined, making sure there are no clumps of flour mixture. Spread batter evenly in pan. Bake until toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 35 to 40 minutes. Let cake cool completley on a cooling rack. ; name: eggless moist chocolate cake ; ingredients: cake flour, granulated sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, white vinegar, vegetable oil, cold water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt in a bowl and mix well. Make three holes in mixture for next three liquid ingredients. Pour vanilla into 1st hole, vinegar into 2nd and oil into 3rd. Pour cold water over all. Mix with fork or wire wisk just until well blended. Pour into two 9 inch pans coated with cooking spray. Bake for 25 - 30 minutes. Cool completely in pans on a wire rack. ; name: double chocolate cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, cocoa, baking soda, salt, water, vegetable oil, vinegar, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Mix flour, brown sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt with fork together. Mix in remaining ingredients except chocolate chips and pour into an ungreased 8x8x2-inch baking pan. Sprinkle chocolate chips over batter. Bake until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean, 35-40 minutes. Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired. ; name: nineteen forty eight cocoa cake ; ingredients: cocoa, cold water, baking soda, butter, eggs, flour, sour milk, sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Mix water, cocoa, and baking soda first, set aside while mixing remaining ingredients. Cream butter and sugar add eggs. Add half the flour and half the milk beat then add rst of flour and rest of milk. Last, add the cocoa mixture and mix well. Stir in vanilla. Bake in two well greased and floured pans at 350f for 30 minutes or until cake test done. Frost with your favorite icing. Cake will take on a red color after cooling. ; name: one bowl chocolate cake ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, milk, self-rising flour, cocoa, bicarbonate of soda, almond meal, eggs, almond essence ; preparation:Heat butter, sugar and milk in saucepan till melted. Stir to combine and remove from heat. Sift flour, cocoa and soda together into saucepan. Stir in almond meal, eggs and essence. Pour into greased and lined 20 cm round cake tin. Bake at 180 degrees celsius for 40 - 50 minutes. Cool in tin and the turn onto rack. Ice with your favourite frosting or ganache. ; name: homemade chocolate cake ; ingredients: cocoa, flour, baking soda, sugar, salt, eggs, buttermilk, wesson oil, vanilla, boiling water ; preparation:

name: cheesy broccoli rice casserole ; ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, cream of broccoli soup, broccoli cheese soup, velveeta cheese, minute rice, butter, chicken in a biscuit crackers ; preparation:Melt the soups and velveeta in microwave until smooth. Stir in broccoli and rice. Pour miixture into a greased 13 x 9 pan or glass baking dish. Stir cracker crumbs into melted butter. Sprinkle bread crumbs over casserole. Cover with foil and bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake 10-15 minutes longer or untilcasserole is golden brown. ; name: cheesy rice and broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli florets, chicken broth, minute white rice, cheese ; preparation:Place broccoli and broth in medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in rice, cover. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Stir in cheese, cover. Let stand 5 minutes. Stir until cheese is melted. ; name: broccoli and rice casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, minute rice, salt, water, fresh broccoli, cheez whiz, chicken mushroom soup, corn flake crumbs ; preparation:Saute onions in butter. Add rice and brown with the onions about 5 minutes. Add salt and water and cover until water is absorbed. Mix rice, cooked broccoli, cheez whiz, and soup together and pour mixture into a large well greased casserole. Top with corn flake crumbs browned in a little butter. Bake at 350 degrees for about 45 minutes. ; name: healthy cheesy broccoli casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, flour, low-fat milk, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, mustard, dried onion flakes, reduced-fat cheese, broccoli, corn flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Stir the flour, milk, chicken broth, mustard, and onion flakes in a glass baking dish. Microwave on high for 4-6 minutes, stirring well every 2 minutes until the cream sauce is thick and bubbly. While cooking the cream sauce, steam the broccoli for about 4 minutes. Mix the cheese into the cream sauce. Put the broccoli and diced chicken in a 9 x 13 pan. Pour the cheese sauce over the top. Mix the cornflakes and parmesan together, and pour over the top. Broil until golden brown. ; name: too easy cheesy chicken broccoli and rice casserole ; ingredients: broccoli and cheese flavored rice mix, boiling water, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic powder, frozen broccoli, low-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees and boil water. In a 13x9 casserole dish, combine rice and contents of seasoning packet. Add boiling water to dish and mix well. Add chicken, sprinkle with garlic powder. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Add broccoli and cheese. Cover and continue to bake for another 8-10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink in center. ; name: chicken casserole with broccoli ; ingredients: baking mix, cooked chicken, frozen chopped broccoli, cheddar cheese, milk, eggs, seasoning salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving. ; name: good broccoli casserole ; ingredients: broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, butter, herbed breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients.
