Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top of broccoli mixture. Combine crumbs and melted butter and sprinkle on top of cheese. Bake 35 minutes in a pre-heated 350 degree oven. This dish will serve 8. Any leftovers are reheated very nicely in microwave. ; name: cheesy broccoli and rice casserole ; ingredients: cooked white rice, broccoli, butter, onion, cheese whiz, sour cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: sour cream chive and olive burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, salt and pepper, swiss cheese, sour cream, black olives, green onions, onion rolls ; preparation:Season beef with salt and pepper. Form into four patties. Grill to your taste. Top with cheese to melt. Lightly toast rolls. Spread sour cream on rolls and top with olives and green onions. Place burger on this then place top bun. Enjoy. ; name: cheese stuffed bread ; ingredients: sourdough bread, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, green pepper, red pepper, salt, parmesan cheese, ground cumin, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Slice top off bread, clean out round. Reserve top and cut scooped out bread into cubes. Mix all ingredients and fill bread cavity. Wrap bread in foil and bake for 1 hour. Meanwhile spread cubes on cookie sheet and crisp on lower rack uncovered about 10 minutes. Remove bread from foil, stir carefully. Surround with toasted cubes to dip. ; name: caramelized onion dip ; ingredients: olive oil, yellow onion, garlic clove, sour cream, chevre cheese, fresh chives ; preparation:Heat oil in a medium frying pan over medium-low heat. When it shimmers, add onion and garlic, season with salt and freshly ground black pepper, and cook, stirring occasionally, until vegetables are caramelized and brown, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat and let cool slightly. Combine sour cream, chvre, and chives in the bowl of a food processor fitted with a blade attachment. Add onion mixture, and pulse until combined, about 10 pulses. Adjust seasoning with salt and freshly ground black pepper and pulse a few more times to mix in seasoning. Transfer to a serving bowl, cover, and refrigerate until chilled, about 1 hour. Serve with potato chips or crudits. ; name: chive egg dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, hard-boiled eggs, chives, sweet peppers ; preparation:In a small bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth. Gradually beat in milk and mayonnaise until blended. Add the mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper. Stir in eggs and chives. Mix well. Serve with peppers or crackers. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: cheese stuffed italian style burgers ; ingredients: low-fat mayonnaise, dried basil leaves, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, five cheese blend, hamburger buns, lettuce leaves, tomatoes, pepperoncini peppers ; preparation:Heat grill to medium-high heat. Mix mayo and basil. Refrigerate until ready to use. Combine meat and garlic. Shape into 8 thin patties. Top 4 patties with cheese. Cover with remaining patties. Pinch edges together to seal. Grill 7 to 9 minute on each side or until burgers are done. Spread buns with mayo mixture. Fill with lettuce, tomatoes, burgers and peppers. ; name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: chicken with veggies in sour cream sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless chicken breasts, garlic, cashews, red bell pepper, snow peas, chicken broth, sour cream, dijon mustard, honey ; preparation:In a large cast iron skillet or wok, heat oil over medium-high. Add chicken and garlic - cook for about 4 minutes. Add cashews, bell pepper and snow peas - cook until tender, about 2 minutes. Add chicken broth, reduce heat and simmer for 8-10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Move chicken and vegetables to a bowl and keep warm. Whisk in sour cream, dijon and honey to juices in skillet and heat only until warmed through. Pour sauce over chicken mixture and toss to combine. Serve over rice, noodles or mashed potatoes. ; name: sourdough sandwiches ; ingredients: chive & onion cream cheese, lemon juice, dijon-style mustard, garlic pepper seasoning, sourdough bread, smoked turkey breast, provolone cheese, roasted sweet peppers, spinach leaves ; preparation:

name: crumb top apple pie ; ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, water, lemon juice, butter, tart apples, brown sugar, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Combine sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg in a large bowl. Add apple slices. Sprinkle water and lemon juice over apple slices and toss until coated with sugar. Spoon into a deep dish pie pan. Dot with butter. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add flour and stir until smooth. Dab on top of apples. Bake for 50- 60 minutes. Serve warm. ; name: rustic crunchy apple pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, cinnamon, apples, unbaked pie shell, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs, sugar, flour, walnuts, salt, and cinnamon. Roll apple slices in the crumb mixture. Arrange apples in unbaked pie shell. Sprinkle remaining crumb mixture over top of apples. Pour melted butter evenly over the top of the apples. Bake for 1 hour. Serve with whipped cream or vanilla ice-cream. ; name: tasty applesauce pie ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie crust, unsweetened applesauce, brown sugar, eggs, crisco, lemon juice, lemon, rind of, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon ; preparation:Heat oven to 450. Combine applesauce, brown sugar, eggs, crisco, lemon juice, lemon peel, salt, nutmeg and cinnamon. Mix well. Pour filling into pie shell. Bake for 15 mins. Reduce heat to 300. Continue baking for 45-55 mins or until knife inserted in the middle comes out clean. Coool thoroughly on wire rack before cutting. ; name: cran apple pie ; ingredients: 9-inch double-crust pie shells, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, tart apples, butter, sugar, cinnamon, fresh cranberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugars, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add fruit. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and cut slits in top crust. Seal edges. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: classic apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, lemon zest, butter, lard, salt, cold water ; preparation:Pastry for double crust pie-------------. Combine flour, lard and salt with a pastry blender or fork until balls are the size of a large pea. Add cold water by the spoonful and blend until the bowl starts to clean itself as you work the dough. Then it is ready for rolling. Preheat oven to 450f. Combine sliced apples with sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg and lemon rind. Line pie plate with unbaked pie crust, trim pastry, crimp to edge of pie plate. Fill pie crust with apple mixture and dot with softened butter. Brush crust edge with water and place pie crust top on top of pie, crimp to the bottom crust. Make some slits in the top crust for steam to escape. Bake for 10 minutes. Turn oven down to 350f and bake for 45 minutes longer. ; name: yummmmy crustless apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla sugar ; preparation:Pre-heat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: classic two crust apple pie ; ingredients: tart apples, lemon juice, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, butter, pie crusts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Peel, core and thinly and thickly slice the apples. Toss with lemon juice if using. Combine and mix apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon and nutmeg. Pour into crust-lined pie plate. Dot with butter. Place top crust, seal and vent. Cover edges of crust with narrow band of aluminum foil, shiny side out. Bake at 425f for 20 minutes. Reduce temperature to 375f and bake another 30-40 minutes until filling is bubbling and crust is nicely browned. If necessary remove foil last 10 minutes to brown edges. ; name: streusel crumb topped apple pie ; ingredients: unbaked 9-inch pie shell, granny smith apples, sugar, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg, flour, light brown sugar, butter ; preparation:

name: low carb oriental cabbage salad ; ingredients: green cabbage, red cabbage, soy sauce, oil, white vinegar, sugar substitute, scallion, almonds, sesame seeds, sesame oil ; preparation:Place the green and red cabbage in a large bowl and set aside. In a small sauce pan, heat the soy sauce, oil and vinegar on medium high heat just until the mixture comes to a light boil. Whisk in the splenda and set aside. In a small saute pan, heat the sesame oil, almonds and sesame seeds on medium high. Toast the almonds and seeds stirring constantly until the sesame seeds start turning golden brown. Immediately pour the nuts and seeds into the soy sauce mix and stir. Add in the scallions, and then pour the dressing over the salad. Toss the salad until the dressing is completely incorporated. Allow the salad to sit at room temperature for at least 30 minutes before serving up to 4 hours. ; name: asian salad ; ingredients: white vinegar, vegetable oil, soy sauce, sugar, butter, ramen noodles, sliced almonds, sesame seeds, head of cabbage ; preparation:Combine dressing ingredients and heat until it comes to a boil. Let cool and refrigerate. Melt butter in frying pan. Brown broken noodles, almonds, and sesame seeds in butter. Set aside. Keep dressing, dry mixture, and cabbage seperate. Mix all 3 together 15 minutes before serving. This is best served cold and fresh. ; name: carrot and radish salad ; ingredients: carrots, radish, salt, sesame oil, rice vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, cayenne ; preparation:Put the carrot and radish in a bowl. Add the salt, mix well and let sit for 1 hour. Drain thoroughly, pressing out as much liquid as possible. Add the sesame oil, vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, and cayenne. Mix and eat. ; name: sweet and sour cabbage and carrots ; ingredients: butter, green cabbage, carrots, onion, brown sugar, reduced sodium soy sauce, cider vinegar, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add to the skillet the cabbage, carrots, onion and brown sugar. Cook, stirring often, for about 10-12 minutes until the veggies are well-browned and softened. Remove from heat and stir in the soy sauce, vinegar and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: asian beef and cabbage salad ; ingredients: ground beef, plum sauce, napa cabbage, scallions, carrots, cilantro, rice vinegar, canola oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Brown ground beef. Stir in plum sauce. Toss together cabbage, scallions, carrots, cilantro, vinegar, and oil. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with the beef. ; name: oriental cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, salt, chili, rice vinegar, sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar ; preparation:Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated. ; name: cucumber carrot salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, seasoning salt, carrot, rice wine vinegar, sesame oil, sugar, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Combine cucumbers and salt in large mixing bowl. Toss to coat. Let stand at room temperature 15 minutes. Rinse salt off of cucumbers and return to bowl. Add carrot. In a small bowl mix together remaining ingredients. Pour over cucumber mixture and toss well to coat. Cover and refrigerate at least four hours. ; name: light oriental style vegetables ; ingredients: slivered almonds, frozen mixed vegetables, celery, sliced mushrooms, reduced sodium soy sauce, water ; preparation:

name: mushroom barley casserole ; ingredients: onion, butter, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, water, barley, onion and mushroom soup mix, dried thyme, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook onion in hot, melted butter over med heat until tender. Add in mushrooms and garlic. Cook about 5 minutes or until mushrooms are tender, stirring occasionally. Transfer mixture to a greased 3-quart baking dish. Stir in the water, barley, dry soup mix, thyme, and salt. Bake, covered, at 350 for about 1 hour and 15 minutes or until barley is tender and most of the liquid is absorbed, stirring once or twice. Let stand, covered, for 15 minutes before serving. ; name: barley bake ; ingredients: celery, sliced mushrooms, green onion, garlic clove, butter, barley, fresh cilantro, chicken broth, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute celery, mushrooms, onions and garlic in butter until soft. Add barley and cook until light brown. In a 2 quart buttered casserole combine barley mixture, parsley or cilantro and chicken broth. Cover and bake at 350 for 30 minutes and then uncover and bake for 45 minutes more or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed. If necessary, add more broth. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: vegetable barley bake ; ingredients: sweet red peppers, mushrooms, onions, butter, vegetable broth, pearl barley, pepper ; preparation:In a large non-stick skillet, saute the peppers, mushrooms, and onions in butter until tender. Transfer to a 13-inch by 9-inch by 2-inch baking dish coated with cooking spray. Stir in the broth, barley, and pepper. Cover and bake at 350f for 50 minutes. Uncover and bake for another 5-10 minutes or until barley is tender and liquid is absorbed. ; name: comfort casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, celery, garlic, pepper, fresh mushrooms, beef bouillon powder, boiling water, soy sauce, long grain white rice ; preparation:Scrambly-fry the beef, onion, celery, garlic, and pepper in a non-stick skillet until the beef is no longer pink. Drain. Add the mushrooms, saute for 5 minutes. Dissolve the bouillon powder in the boiling water. Add to the beef mixture. Mix well. Stir in the soy sauce and rice. Simmer, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until the rice is tender. ; name: broccoli potato casserole ; ingredients: frozen broccoli, condensed mushroom soup, mashed potatoes, cheese, salt and pepper, paprika, garlic powder, butter ; preparation:Cook potatoes until tender and mash them. Cook broccoli until tender. Dot casserole dish with butter or mushroom. Add broccoli. Top the broccoli with the mushroom soup and grated cheese. Add the mashed potatoes on top. Sprinkle with salt, pepper, paprika, and garlic powder. Bake in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. ; name: meat and potato casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, tomato sauce, oregano, garlic clove, corn, mashed potatoes, american cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Brown beef and onions in skillet. Drain. Mix in tomato sauce, garlic and oregano. Place in a 2-quart casserole dish. Top with corn. Then spread mashed potatoes over the corn. Lay cheese over the mashed potatoes in a single layer. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until the cheese is completely melted. ; name: savory vegetable rice casserole ; ingredients: basmati rice, cauliflower, chili pepper, eggs, fresh mushrooms, onion, tomatoes, olive oil, paprika, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the rice according to the method that you prefer. Steam the cauliflower until tender. Heat the oil in a saucepan, add the mushrooms and onions and saute until soft. Add the chile pepper and tomatoes, continue sauteing until completely cooked through. Mix the rice with the sauteed vegetables. Add the eggs and mix well. Add the paprika, and the salt and pepper to taste. Pour into a greased baking dish. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 40 minutes. ; name: delicious barley casserole ; ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, fresh mushrooms, pearl barley, chicken broth, fresh ground black pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: apple dumpling bake ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, granny smith apples, sugar, butter, mountain dew soda, ground cinnamon, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Seperate crescent rolls into 16 triangles. Cut each apple into eight wedges. Wrap a triangle around each apple wedge. Place in a greased 13-in. X 9-in. X 2-in. Baking dish. In a bowl, combine sugar and butter and sprinkle over rolls. Slowly pour the soda around the rolls. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 35-40 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm with ice cream. ; name: quick and easy apple dumplings ; ingredients: granny smith apples, orange juice, sugar, butter, cinnamon, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 f. Wrap each apple piece with a piece of crescent roll. Place in a baking dish that has been greased. Bring orange juice, sugar, butter and cinnamon to a boil and pour over apples. Bake until brown, approximately 35 minutes. Spoon juice over apples occasionally while baking. ; name: the easiest apple dumplings ; ingredients: granny smith apples, crescent roll, butter, sugar, apple juice concentrate, apple pie spice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Put butter, sugar, apple pie spice, and apple juice concentrate into glass pyrex baking dish. Microwave until all is melted. Mix well. Unroll each roll and place a slice of apple in each roll, starting with the largest end. Place rolls in the baking dish. Spoon juice over top of dumplings. Bake 20-25 minutes, until apples are tender. Spoon sauce over dumplings occasionally as they bake. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream or cool whip. ; name: butterscotch dumplings ; ingredients: self raising flour, butter, water, golden syrup, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Lightly grease a shallow 2l ovenproof dish. Sift flour into a large bowl, rub in butter until mixture resembles breadcrumbs. Add water and golden syrup and mix to a soft sticky dough. Divide into about 10 equal portions and shape into round dumplings, place in dish. Make the butterscotch sauce by combining all ingrediants in a saucepan. Stir over a low heat until sugar has dissolved. Bring to the boil then remove from heat. Pour sauce over the dumplings and bake 20 mins. Turn dumplings and spoon over sauce and bake a further 10 mins. Serve immediately with icecream. ; name: cinnamon apple syrup from peel ; ingredients: water, sugar, cinnamon, apples ; preparation:Bring all four ingredients to a boil in a large stockpot. Stir until sugar dissolves. Reduce heat to medium and simmer until peels lose their bright color. Remove apple peels with tongs or a slotted spoon. Continue simmering until mixture has reduced by half. Test consistency by dipping a spoon into the mixture and then rubbing your finger across it. You will be able to tell when it has thickened. Cooking time will vary. You may can this in sterile jars or let it cool and keep in the refrigerator. ; name: apple squares ; ingredients: rolled oats, flour, shortening, baking soda, brown sugar, sliced apples, butter, cinnamon, white sugar ; preparation:Mix rolled oats, flour, shortening, soda and brown sugar together and put half of mixture in bottom of baking pan. Mix together sliced apples, butter, cinnamon and white sugar. Spread over first layer of rolled oats. Cover with remaining rolled oat mixture. Bake in 350 degree oven 35- 40 minutes til done. ; name: cinnamon applesauce bars ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, cinnamon, butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsweetened applesauce, raisins ; preparation:Suft together flour, baking soda and cinnamon. Beat butter and sugar until smooth and creamy. Add eggs. Stir in vanilla. Blend mixture and stir in the applesauce with raisins. Spread in a prepared 13 by 19-inch pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-35 minutes. Let cool on rack or serve warm with cream. ; name: mountain dew apple dumplings ; ingredients: crescent rolls, tart apples, sugar, butter, cinnamon, mountain dew soda ; preparation:

name: winter squash pumpkin pie ; ingredients: squash, evaporated milk, eggs, rum, vanilla, sugar, cinnamon, ground ginger, salt, pie shell ; preparation:Wash-peel and cube fresh pumpkin or squash. Steam for one hour. Drain in a colander for a long time mashing the pumpkin periodically. This mixture freezes well in zip bags. In a large bowl combine the squash, milk, eggs, rum and vanilla, mix well. Stir in the rest of the ingredients. Pour the batter into the pie shell. Bake at 300f for one hour. ; name: my real pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, ground cloves, sweetened condensed milk, evaporated milk ; preparation:Combine the eggs, pumpkin, sugar, salt, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and milk. Mix well and pour into prepared pie crusts. Bake in a 425f oven for 15 minutes. Reduce temperature to 350f and bake an additional 50-60 minutes or until the center of the pie is no longer wobbly or liquid. Cool and serve with whipped topping or vanilla ice cream. ; name: sugar free pumpkin pie ; ingredients: eggs, pumpkin, splenda granular, salt, cinnamon, ginger, clove, evaporated milk, unbaked pie shell ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 425 degrees. Combine ingredients. Pour into pie crust. Bake 15 minute at 425. Reduce heat to 350 degrees and bake 45 minutes. Cool and garnish with whipped cream. ; name: pumpkin cream pie ; ingredients: powdered sugar, cream cheese, butter, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, canned pumpkin, 9-inch graham cracker crust, sugar, heavy cream ; preparation:Beat first 5 ingredients together until fluffy, 1-2 minutes. Blend in pumpkin. Spoon into crust. Chill throughly. Top with whipped cream. ; name: pumpkin pie french toast baked ; ingredients: eggs, milk, pumpkin puree, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, brown sugar, texas toast thick bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Mix the eggs, milk, pumpkin puree, vanilla, pumpkin pie spice, and brown sugar in low flat bowl for easy dipping. Line two cookie sheets with foil and spray with pam. Dip the bread into the egg mixture on both sides and place on cookie sheet. Bake for 25 minutes, flipping them over half way through. Serve with maple syrup, powdered suger, or eat them plain if you are on the go. ; name: creamy pumpkin pie ; ingredients: 9 inch pie shell, pumpkin, sweetened condensed milk, eggs, cinnamon, salt, ginger, nutmeg, clove ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f degrees. Mix all ingredients in lg bowl. Mix well. Pour into crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Reduce heat to 350 and bake another 40 min, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean. Garnish with pecans if desired. ; name: easy sweet potato pie ; ingredients: sugar, flour, evaporated milk, egg, vanilla, cooked sweet potatoes, unbaked pie shells ; preparation:In a bowl, combine sugar, flour, milk, egg and vanilla. Stir in the sweet potatoes. Pour into pie shell. Cover edges of pastry loosely with foil. Bake at 375 degrees for 45 minutes. Remove foil. Bake 15 minutes longer or until crust is golden brown and a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. ; name: kahlua pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie crust, evaporated milk, light brown sugar, kahlua, light corn syrup, pumpkin pie spice, salt, canned pumpkin, eggs ; preparation:

name: italian meat sauce ; ingredients: ground beef, sausage, onions, tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, basil, oregano, crushed red pepper flakes, black pepper, water ; preparation:Cook ground beef, sausage together in large pot. Use a potato masher to break up the meat into fine pieces. Drain the fat into a skillet, cook onions in fat. Drain fat and return onions to meat mixture. Add tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, basil, oregano, crushed red pepper, black pepper, and water. Simmer on stove for two hours or till the sauce reduces,. Serve with pasta, ravioli, etc --. ; name: casserole italiano ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, oregano, salt, black pepper, tomato soup, cooked elbow macaroni, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef with onions and seasonings. Drain fat. Combine beef mixture, soup, and cooked noodles in a 1. 5 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle cheese over top of casserole. Bake 30 minutes at 350 degrees. ; name: seafood pasta ; ingredients: thin spaghetti, bay scallop, medium shrimp, garlic cloves, butter, onion salt, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place spaghetti into 2 quarts boiling water to which 2 heaping teaspoons salt has been added. Cook for 6 to 8 minutes or till your desired doneness. Drain and serve. Over medium heat, melt butter in saute pan, add garlic and remaining seasonings, stir. Add shrimp and scallops, saute just until shrimp are no longer translucent, do not overcook. Serve over spaghetti topped with parmesan cheese and additional butter if desired. ; name: pasta with marinated tomatoes and mozzarella ; ingredients: beefsteak tomatoes, sweet onion, extra virgin olive oil, bocconcini, kosher salt, pepper, fettuccine, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large bowl, gently combine the tomatoes, onion, oil, bocconcini, salt, and pepper. Set aside and let marinate at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package directions. Add the drained pasta and basil to the marinated tomatoes and toss to combine. Divide among individual bowls. The longer the tomato mixture marinates, the more flavorful it becomes. Keep it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Spoon it over chicken or warm bread. ; name: italian spaghetti frittata ; ingredients: spaghetti, parmesan cheese, butter, fresh parsley, eggs, salt & pepper ; preparation:Drain the spaghetti and stir in the cheese, 3 tbsp butter and the parsley. Let it cool slightly. Add salt& pepper to the beaten eggs. In a large non stick skillet heat remaining butter, over medium heat until foaming but not brown pour in the spagetti mixture and spread evenly. Cook for 4-5 minutes until the bottom is brown. Loosen with a spatula and invert onto a plate. Slide the frittata back into the pan and cook the other side until golden 3-4 minutes. ; name: solo italian sausage and pasta medley ; ingredients: cooked italian sausage, dry pasta, green bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, tomato sauce, dried basil, olive oil, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta in 2 quarts of salted water and cook until soft, which should take about 10 to 12 minutes. Chop the pepper and onions into half inch pieces and saute in olive oil. After 5 minutes, add the garlic, basil, and the tomato sauce and simmer until it starts to thicken. If the sauce become to thick, add a little of the water from the pasta. Add the precooked sausage to the vegetable and sauce mixture, and stir over low heat while waiting until the pasta is done. Add drained pasta to the pan, stir, check to see if salt is needed, and plate. Serve with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: mediterranean pasta ; ingredients: linguine, bacon, boneless chicken breast, salt, diced tomatoes with juice, dried rosemary, feta cheese, pitted black olives, artichoke hearts ; preparation:Bring large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Add linguine and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente. Drain. Season chicken with salt. Stir chicken with bacon in a large skillet or saucepan. Add tomatoe and rosemary, simmer 20 minutes. Stir in feta cheese, olives and artichoke hearts and cook until heated through. Toss with fresh cooked pasta and serve warm. Garnish with extra feta if desired. ; name: italian fish ; ingredients: flounder fillets, dried oregano, salt, pepper, spaghetti sauce, fresh parsley, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: creamy cauliflower soup ww friendly ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, celery, chicken broth, cauliflower, half-and-half, nutmeg, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Clean and chop the leeks and celery. Heat oil in a large nonstick sauce pan, over medium heat. Add the leeks and celery, stir frequently, cook until softened, not browned, about 4 minutes. Add the broth and cauliflower, bring to boil. Cover and simmer until the cauliflower is tender, about 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. In batches or with a blender stick, puree to desired texture. You may want to spoon out and reserve some cauliflower pieces for added texture. Stir in half & half and nutmeg and blend. Top with grated cheddar cheese. ; name: leek cream soup ; ingredients: leeks, cauliflower, onion, vegetable bouillon granules, cream, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Cut the leek in small pieces. Cut the center out of the cauliflower and separate the flowerets. Cook the leek, onion and cauliflower in the vegetable bouillon until soft. With the mixer, mix the soup until smooth. Heat again, stirring the cream in. Serve with the parsley sprinkled on top. ; name: creamy leek soup ; ingredients: leeks, garlic cloves, butter, vegetable broth, heavy cream, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Saute leeks and garlic in melted butter over medium heat until tender but not colored. Reduce heat, add broth, cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Puree using blender, food processor, or immersion blender. Add cream and season to taste with salt and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: cauliflower white cheddar soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chicken stock, cauliflower, evaporated skim milk, nutmeg, white cheddar cheese, fresh ground pepper, salt ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, 5-8 minutes. Add the cauliflower and cook, stirring occasionally, until light golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add the stock, milk, nutmeg, and pepper and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer until the cauliflower is easily pierced with a fork, about 10 minutes. Remove 1 cup of cauliflower florets and set aside., puree soup in blender or food processor until smooth. Return soup to pot and stir in the cheese and remaining cauliflower florets and adjust seasonings to taste. ; name: leek onion and potato soup ; ingredients: leeks, potatoes, onion, butter, chicken stock, milk, heavy cream ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add leeks, onions and potatoes and stir. Cover saucepan and sweat veg for 10-15 minutes. Add stock and milk and bring to boil. Replace lid and simmer for 20 minutes. Blend the soup and return to the saucepan. Season and add cream to taste. ; name: indian spiced cauliflower soup ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, onion, garlic, curry paste, cauliflower, chicken stock, natural yoghurt, cream, pappadams ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a large saucepan. Add onion and cook over low heat until soft. Add garlic and cook for a further 30 seconds. Add curry paste cook for 30 seconds. Add cauliflower and stir to coat with the curry paste. Add stock. Simmer for 15 minutes. Cool slightly before pureeing. Return to the heat and stir in the yoghurt. Serve drizzled with cream and with pappadums. ; name: purple cauliflower soup with walnut oil ; ingredients: butter, leek, purple potatoes, cauliflower florets, whole milk, kosher salt, white pepper, walnut oil ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, melt butter over medium-low heat, add leeks and cook until soft, about 5 minutes. Add cauliflower, potatoes, milk and salt and bring to a simmer. Cover and simmer on low heat until vegetables are soft, about 25 minutes. Do not boil. Remove the vegetables from the heat, let cool slightly and pure them in a blender, with an immersion blender or in a food mill. If serving warm, reheat gently and serve with a drizzle of walnut oil. If serving cold, chill in the refrigerator before serving. ; name: creamy cauliflower leek soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, leek, chicken stock, nutmeg, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:

name: crock pot chicken breasts with stove top stuffing ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, swiss cheese, condensed cream of chicken soup, condensed cream of mushroom soup, chicken broth, milk, stove top stuffing mix, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in crock pot. Pour chicken broth over chicken breasts. Season chicken with salt and pepper. Put one slice of swiss cheese on each breast. In a separate bowl, combine both cans of soup and milk. Pour soup mixture evenly over chicken breasts. Sprinkle stuffing over entire top of dish. Drizzle melted butter on top of stuffing. Cook on low for 6-8 hours or on high for 4 hours. ; name: crock pot chicken over pasta ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, low sodium chicken broth, season-all salt, italian seasoning, onion powder, garlic powder, salt & pepper, cream of chicken soup, cream cheese, medium egg noodles ; preparation:Pour the broth into a crock pot then add the chicken & spices. Cook on high for 2. 5 hours or on low for 5 hours. Remove the chicken & shred, place back in the pot. Mix in the soup & cream cheese, stir until melted. Cover with the lid & continue to cook on low for 30 minutes. During the last 10 minutes cook the noodles as directed on the package. Once done, drain & add to the chicken mixture. Serve hot. ; name: creamy italian crock pot chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing mix, water, cream cheese, cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces ; preparation:Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine salad dressing mix and water. Pour over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Stir in mushrooms, pour over chicken, and cook 1 hours longer or until chicken juices run clear. Serve over rice or noodles. ; name: easy chicken and noodles ; ingredients: egg noodles, chicken breasts, water, chicken soup base ; preparation:Boil water in a large pan. Salt to taste. Add egg noodles. Bring back to a boil. Remove from heat and let them sit in the water for 15 minutes covered. Add soup base and chicken breast. Place pan back on burner and heat to your desired warmth if not hot enough for your liking. ; name: creamy crock pot chicken with mushrooms ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, dry onion soup mix, cream cheese, onion, sliced mushrooms, garlic cloves, chicken broth, parsley flakes ; preparation:Grease the inside of the slow cooker. Place chicken breasts in the bottom of the crock pot. Combine the rest of the ingredients in a medium pot and heat on medium high. Stirring occasionally until cream cheese is incorporated. Pour sauce over chicken in crock pot, and heat on low approximately 4 hours until chicken is tender and falling apart. Sprinkle with parsley flakes. Serve over pasta, egg noodles, or rice. ; name: italian chicken noodles ; ingredients: italian salad dressing mix, water, boneless skinless chicken breasts, mushroom soup, cream cheese, cooked noodles ; preparation:Mix italian dressing mix with water. Place chicken breasts in baking dish. Pour italian dressing over chicken. Mix soup and cream cheese. Pour over chicken. Cover with lid or foil. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Serve over cooked noodles. ; name: chicken with egg noodles ; ingredients: chicken thighs, wide egg noodles, cream of chicken soup, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken until tender. Drain a little of the water off. Add noodles and cook til tender. Add can of cream of chicken soup and stir until well blended. Serve. ; name: crockpot chicken noodles ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, butter, egg noodles ; preparation:

name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: cheddar broccoli bake ; ingredients: frozen broccoli, garlic salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 9 by 13-inch casserole dish with pam. Put broccoli, garlic salt and pepper in a bag and toss. Place in casserole dish and top with cheddar cheese. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. ; name: cream cheese cheddar biscuits ; ingredients: unbleached all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sharp cheddar cheese, butter, cream cheese, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Measure dry ingredients into food processor and pulse until well combined. Add cheese and cut butter and cream cheese into small chunks and distribute throughout processor bowl. Hit pulse about 10 times for 1-2 seconds each pulse until course crumbs develop. Pour milk through feed tube in a slow stream while pulsing until cohesive but crumbly dough forms. Turn dough onto floured surface and gently squeeze it into a ball. Flatten and gently shape into an 8 by 8 inch square. Cut into 16 even squares. Place on ungreased baking sheet and bake 15-18 minutes until lightly browned. ; name: bacon egg and cheese biscuit casserole ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, butter, milk, eggs, bacon, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through. ; name: cheesy chicken dippers ; ingredients: white bread, cheddar cheese, egg whites, plain flour, chicken fillets ; preparation:Preheat oven to 190c. Line a large baking tray with baking parchment. Place bread in a blender or food processor and blend to make fine breadcrumbs. Mix the breadcrumbs with the grated cheese and. Place the egg white and flour in 2 separate shallow bowls. Dip the chicken pieces in the flour first to lightly dust then dip into the egg whites and finally into the cheesy breadcrumbs, turning to evenly coat. Place on prepared baking tray. Bake for 25-30 minutes, until the chicken is thoroughly cooked, there is no pink meat and the juices run clear when pierced with a sharp knife. Serve the chicken dippers with tomato sauce or mayonnaise. ; name: cheddar and scallion bread ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, butter, scallions, garlic cloves, kosher salt, black pepper, bread ; preparation:Place an oven rack in the center of the oven. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. In a food processor, combine the cheese and butter. Process until the mixture is smooth. Add the scallions and pulse until combined. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Spread the cheese mixture on the cut sides of the bread. Place on a baking sheet and bake for 10 to 12 minutes until golden. Remove from oven and serve immediately. ; name: cheddar garlic biscuits ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, milk, cheddar cheese, margarine, garlic powder ; preparation:Heat oven to 450f. Stir baking mix, milk and cheese until soft dough forms. Drop by 9 spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 8-10 minutes or until golden brown. Stir together margarine and garlic powder. Brush over warm biscuits. ; name: cheddar baked bagels and eggs ; ingredients: bagels, butter, eggs, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: cinnamon apple oatmeal ; ingredients: old fashioned oats, water, apple juice, dried apples, ground cinnamon, salt, pure maple syrup, flax seed oil, walnuts ; preparation:Place all the ingreients except the maple syrup, flaxseed oil, and nuts in a medium saucepan and stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 5 minutes, stirring once or twice. Remove from heat and let sit, covered, for 2 to 5 minutes. Stir in maple syrup and flaxseed oil, if using. Sprinkle one tablespoon nuts over each serving, if desired. ; name: apple crisp no oats ; ingredients: apples, cinnamon, water, butter, flour, sugar, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 8 x 8 dish. Peel and cut apples. Place apples in pan. Add cinnamon and water. Separately, mix melted butter, flour and sugars. Spread evenly and firmly on top of apple mixture. Bake 45-50 minutes. ; name: lancaster farmhouse baked oatmeal ; ingredients: old fashioned oats, unsalted butter, milk, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, salt, dried apple, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Butter a medium baking dish. Add the oats and butter to a heatproof mixing bowl. Pour 1 cup boiling water over them and let stand 5 minutes. Stir in the milk, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. When well mixed, stir in the apples. Spoon mixture into the prepared dish. Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and continue to cook for 5-10 minutes, until thick and bubbly. Spoon into bowls and serve hot with cream drizzled around the cereal and a dusting of cinnamon. ; name: oatmeal treats ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, oil, evaporated milk, vanilla, oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnuts ; preparation:Combine eggs, sugar, oil, milk, and vanilla in mixing bowl. Combine oats, flour, and salt, and add to egg mixture. Stir in raisins and nuts. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 12-14 minutes or until set. ; name: apple cinnamon oatmeal ww points 4 5 ; ingredients: quick-cooking oatmeal, low-fat milk, unsweetened applesauce, raisins, cinnamon, splenda sugar substitute ; preparation:Combine oatmeal and milk in microwave safe bowl. Give it a quick stir to make sure oats are covered. Make sure the bowl is wide or deep enough so the oatmeal does not overflow. Put it into the microwave for 3 minutes. Remove bowl from microwave. Add apple sauce, raisins, cinnamon and splenda. Mix it all together. The oatmeal may be stiff until the apple sauce is incorporated. ; name: harvest baked apples ; ingredients: apples, quick oats, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, pecans ; preparation:Cut all ingredients together in a bowl except apples. Place apples in a glass baking dish. Stuff each of them as full as you can get them with the oatmeal mixture, sprinkling the remainder over the tops. Bake in a 425f oven for 20 min or till very soft. Serve while still warm with vanilla or caramel ice cream. ; name: vegan apple oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, white sugar, applesauce, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, rolled oats, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Mix sugars and applesauce. Add flour, baking powder, and salt and mix well. Add rolled outs. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto a lightly greased cookie sheet. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake for 10 minutes. ; name: baked apple oatmeal ; ingredients: apples, old fashioned oats, raisins, ground cinnamon, salt, soymilk, real maple syrup, walnuts ; preparation:

name: rao s lemon chicken ; ingredients: fryer chickens, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, red wine vinegar, garlic, salt and pepper, fresh oregano ; preparation:Broil chicken, skin side down, then turn to char skin. Cool chicken. Cut into pieces. Arrange in pan- skin side down. Pour marinade on top. Broil 3 minutes. Turn, cook 1 minute. Arrange on serving platter& pour juices all over. ; name: chicken with lemon ; ingredients: whole chicken, salt, black pepper, butter, shallot, lemon slices, dry white wine ; preparation:Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Add butter to large 12-inch, heavy bottomed skillet set over medium heat. When foaming subsides, add chicken pieces, skin side down. Cook until skin is golden brown and crispy, 4- 5 minutes. Turn pieces over and cook until browned on other side, about 3 minutes. Add shallots, and place lemon slices on top of chicken pieces. Cook 5 minutes. Pour in wine. Cover skillet and cook until chicken is cooked through, about 15 minutes. Serve chicken with pan jus, just as it is. Rice would be an excellent side dish. ; name: lemongrass steamed chicken ; ingredients: chicken thighs, salt and pepper, corn oil, lemongrass, soy sauce, lime wedge, cilantro ; preparation:Sprinkle the chicken with salt and pepper. Put oil in a deep skillet over medium high heat. Spread the lemongrass in the skillet. Cover. When lemongrass begins to fry and is fragrant, place the chicken, skin side down over the lemongrass. Turn the heat to medium, cover. Cook, turning and basting with the soy sauce every 10 minutes or so until the chicken is cooked through, about 30 minutes. Discard the lemongrass and serve the chicken with lime wedges and cilantro. ; name: chicken with spiced yogurt ; ingredients: yogurt, ground cardamom, fresh ginger, onion, olive oil, chicken, salt and pepper, blanched almond ; preparation:Mix the yogurt, cardamon and ginger together in a bowl, and set aside whilst you cook the chicken. Heat the oil in a large skillet, fry the onion until soft. Add the chicken pieces and saute until the onions are golden and the chicken pieces lightly browned. Add the salt, pepper and a cup of water and cook over a low heat-20 minutes for the quarters, less for breasts. The chicken should be tender and the sauce reduced. Keep turning the chicken pieces, and add a little water if the sauce reduces too much. Remove from the heat, stir in the yoghurt mix, and serve sprinkled with the almonds. ; name: the infamous lemon chicken recipe ; ingredients: unsifted flour, salt, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, realemon juice, sugar, sliced mushrooms, cooked rice ; preparation:In zip-lock bag combine pepper, salt, and flour. Add chicken and shake a few pieces at a time. In large skillet brown chicken in butter. Add lemon juice, sugar, and mushrooms, decrease heat. Cover and simmer 15 min, or until chicken is cooked. Serve over rice. ; name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: zesty lemon chicken ; ingredients: cooking spray, chicken breasts, lemon juice, lemon rind, chicken stock powder, brown sugar, honey, soy sauce, cornflour, water ; preparation:Coat a large non stick frypan with cooking spray. Fry the chicken until cooked through. Remove from the pan and leave to one side. Place all other ingredients into pan except the water and cornflour. Stir ingredients well until boiling. Combine cornflour with water and add to pan. Bring back to the boil stirring constantly. Cut chicken into large slices then return to the pan and re-heat, coating with sauce. ; name: farmgirl s funky chicken ; ingredients: chicken, relish, salt, oil, ground black pepper, lemon ; preparation:

name: tomato basil sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, onion, crushed tomatoes, diced tomatoes, salt and pepper, fresh basil leaves, penne rigate ; preparation:Put large pot of water on to boil for penne. Salt boiling water and cook penne to al dente. Heat a medium pot on stove top over medium low to medium heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil, garlic and onion for the tomato basil sauce. Let onions cook with garlic slowly over 15 minutes, be careful not to brown onions. After 15 minutes, stir in tomatoes and raise heat to warm tomatoes. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in basil and wilt it into the sauce. Remove sauce from heat. When ready to serve, place sauce in the bottom of a large serving bowl to toss with hot pasta. ; name: one pot tomato basil pasta ; ingredients: pasta, diced tomatoes with juice, sweet onion, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, dried oregano leaves, basil sprigs, vegetable broth, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta, tomatoes, onion, garlic, basil, in a large stock pot. Pour in vegetable broth. Sprinkle on top the pepper flakes and oregano. Drizzle top with oil. Cover pot and bring to a boil. Reduce to a low simmer and keep covered and cook for about 10 minutes, stirring every 2 minutes or so. Cook until almost all liquid has evaporated i left about an inch of liquid in the bottom of the pot but you can reduce as desired. Season to taste with salt and pepper, stirring pasta several times to distribute the liquid in the bottom of the pot. Serve garnished with parmesan cheese. ; name: creamy tomato sauce for pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, salt, fresh ground pepper, cream cheese, pesto sauce, parmesan cheese, cream, fresh basil ; preparation:Heat olive oil over medium heat. Saut crushed garlic for 1-2 minutes. Stir in tomato sauce. Add salt, pepper, and pesto. Add cream cheese and stir or whisk well until fully melted. Stir parmesan cheese until melted. Add cream and stir well. ; name: authentic italian spaghetti sauce ; ingredients: fresh tomatoes, olive oil, fresh garlic, fresh basil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:To cook sauce, heat olive oil over medium heat in a large iron skillet or heavy saucepan. Add garlic and cook until tender. Add fresh tomatoes and cook until heated through. Stir in basil, crushed red pepper, black pepper and salt. Serve sauce over cooked spaghetti or other italian pasta and top with parmesan cheese. ; name: garlic pasta ; ingredients: garlic, dried basil, salt, pepper, crushed tomatoes, olive oil, spaghetti ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: pasta with beans basil corn ; ingredients: fresh corn, pasta, great northern beans, fresh basil, salt, extra virgin olive oil, balsamic vinegar, red pepper, yellow pepper ; preparation:Cut the kernels off the uncooked cobs and set aside. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions for al dente. Add the corn kernels to the pot for the last 30 seconds. Drain pasta. And corn in a colander and transfer to a large bowl. Add the beans, basil, salt, olive oil, vinegar and peppers and gently toss. Until blended. This can be served warm or at room temperature. Sprinkle with additional. Fresh chopped basil for an extra color and flavor splash. ; name: italian style tomato sauce ; ingredients: italian plum tomatoes, olive oil, onions, tomato paste, basil, oregano, sugar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place tomatoes in food processor. Process on high for 1 minute. In dutch oven on medium heat, saut onions in olive oil till soft but not browned. Add tomatoes, tomato pure and all spices. Cook sauce on very low heat for about 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Add a little water if necessary as sauce cooks. ; name: tomato and basil pasta sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, dried chili pepper flakes, balsamic vinegar, sugar, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:

name: simple brown rice pilaf ; ingredients: instant brown rice, chicken stock, butter, green onion, garlic, onion flakes, garlic salt, salt & fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Mix chicken stock and next 5 ingredients in saucepan and bring to a boil. Add rice, return mixture to boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with fork. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: basic rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, onion, rice, salt, black pepper, chicken stock, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in saucepan and cook onion over medium heat until golden. Stir in rice and cook for 1 minute. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in chicken stock and bring to a boil. Cover and turn heat down to low. Simmer gently for 20 minutes. Fluff rice with a fork and stir in parsley. ; name: shrimp rice pilaf ; ingredients: unsalted butter, garlic cloves, shrimp, long-grain rice, chicken stock, fresh dill, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Cook garlic until tender and fragrant but not browned, about 1 minute. Add shrimp and mix well. Stir in rice. Pour in stock and bring to a boil. Cover. Reduce heat and simmer gently for 20 to 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Stir in dill. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: braised pilaf rice ; ingredients: butter, onions, long grain rice, chicken stock, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place 3 oz butter in an ovenproof pan. Add onion. Cook gently without colour, 2-3 minutes, and then add the rice. Cook gently without colour, 2-3 minutes. Add the hot stock should be about twice the amount of liquid to rice. Stir well and season. Cover with a lid or buttered greaseproof paper. Place in a hot oven 230-250c approx 20 minutes or until rice is tender. When cooked carefully mix in the remaining butter with a fork. For variations try mixing in some fried mushroom slices and toasted pine nuts and parsley, or peas and diced peppers or ham, or add some grated cheese just before serving. ; name: awesome rice pilaf ; ingredients: long-grain rice, butter, onion, celery, broth, dried parsley, frozen peas, carrot, soy sauce, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in dutch oven. Add rice, onion, and celery. Cook on medium heat till rice is light brown with a nutty aroma stirring often. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Add rest of ingredients, almost over season to taste. Bring to boil on medium heat. Turn off heat. Cover tightly with foil then put lid on top. Bake for 45 minutes then remove from oven and let rest for 15 minutes. Take lid and foil off, fluff with fork and serve. ; name: parmesan rice pilaf ; ingredients: butter, white rice, chicken broth, garlic powder, parsley flakes, ground black pepper, parmesan cheese, sliced almonds ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium sauce pan on medium heat. Add rice, cook and stir three minutes. Stir in chicken broth, garlic powder, parsley flakes and pepper. Bring to a boil, reduce to low, cover and simmer 20 minutes or until rice in tender. Stir in parmesan cheese and sliced almonds. ; name: rice pilaf with mushrooms ; ingredients: butter, onion, mushroom, salt & freshly ground black pepper, long-grain white rice, low sodium chicken broth ; preparation:Melt butter in a large flameproof casserole and cook the onion over low heat for 5 minutes. Add the mushrooms, salt and pepper and continue cooking 5 minutes longer or until the mushrooms release their liquid. Turn up the heat and cook, stirring constantly, until the moisture in the mushrooms evaporates. Add the rice and stir it for a few minutes or until the grains are transparent. Pour in the stock or stock mixed with water and bring to a boil. Lower the heat, cover the pan and cook the rice for 20 minutes or until all the liquid is absorbed. Transfer half the rice to a plastic container. Serve remaining rice at once. ; name: brown rice pilaf ; ingredients: brown rice, onion, garlic cloves, carrot, frozen peas, frozen corn, salt and pepper, basil, oregano, olive oil ; preparation:

name: cheesy beef noodles ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato sauce, taco seasoning, sharp cheddar cheese, egg noodles ; preparation:Brown and drain ground beef. Cook and drain noodles. Mix ground beef, tomato sauce and taco seasoning. Spread noodles in the bottom of a 9x13 pan. Spread beef mixture over noodles. Mix slightly. Cover with cheese. Bake 350 for about 20 minutes until heated though and cheese is melted. ; name: cheesy tuna pasta ; ingredients: pasta, cream cheese, cheddar cheese, milk, granulated garlic, tuna ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, melt cream cheese in milk in med saucepan over low heat. Add cheedar and garlic. Add tuna and mix well. Once pasta is cooked, drain and pour tuna mix on top. Mix well and serve. ; name: cheesy spaghetti squash ; ingredients: spaghetti squash, parmesan cheese, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, pimientos, fresh parsley, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Pierce the spaghetti squash several times with a fork or sharp knife to allow steam to escape. Place in microwave and cook on high 5 minutes. Turn over and continue cooking for for another 5 minutes or just until soft. Remove squash from microwave and allow to stand for 5 minutes. Cut squash in half. Remove and discard seeds. Using a fork, scrape the insides of the squash to form strands. Reserving one squash shell. Toss squash with remaining ingredients adding salt and pepper to taste. Scoop back into the reserved squash shell and serve. ; name: cheesy pasta with spinach ; ingredients: whole wheat penne, fat-free cottage cheese, cheese soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, spinach, garlic, breaded chicken patties ; preparation:Put the pasta on to boil. While pasta is cooking, mix cottage cheese, cheddar cheese soup, and sour cream together, with a stick blender until creamy. Defrost the chicken and cut up into bite size pieces. Dice the spinach into small bits. Add half a cup of the cheddar cheese and the garlic. By this time the pasta should be done. Drain and add to the mix. Toss it all together, put in a 9x13-inch pan and bake at 350f for about 30 minutes. Some option include adding corn and peas. ; name: stove top pasta quick and easy ; ingredients: pasta, ground beef, garlic cloves, dried oregano leaves, dried basil leaves, salt, diced tomatoes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta in boiling water for 10-12 minutes, till tender. Drain. Brown the meat with the garlic. Drain it. Stir in the oregano and basil leaves and cook 1 more minute. Add the tomatoes and heat to boiling. Reduce heat and simmer, uncovered, for 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in the pasta and heat through. Serve with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti cupcakes ; ingredients: spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, pasta sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Grease 12-cup muffin pan. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, and pepper. Evenly press mixture into muffin cups to form a crust. Evenly top each cup with pasta sauce, then mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until bubbling. Let stand 5 minutes before serving. ; name: cheesy cheddar mock lasagna ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Prepare dinner according to package directions. Meanwhile, brown meat in large skillet. Drain. Add spaghetti sauce to meat. Mix well. Layer half each of the meat mixture and prepared dinner in 8-inch square baking dish. Repeat layers. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake 15 minutes or until heated through. ; name: easy cheesy pasta ; ingredients: pasta shells, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, light sour cream, whipping cream, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: macaroni and bacon casserole ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, shredded cheddar cheese, vegetable cocktail, bacon, salt, pepper, milk ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on package, drain. Add shredded cheese to cooked noodles while still hot and mix together. Add v8. Add enough milk so there is juice on the bottom of casserole dish, enough that it doesnt dry out, so the milk may not be necessary. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover casserole with uncooked bacon slices. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 45 minutes to an hour. Bacon needs to be cooked on top. ; name: macaroni tuna casserole ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, milk, butter, condensed cream of celery soup, canned tuna, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Prepare macaroni and cheese according to package directions. Stir in soup, tuna and milk. Pour into a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered, for 20 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: super budget macaroni cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, milk, flour, salt, ground black pepper, cheese, fresh breadcrumb ; preparation:Cook pasta. Drain. Set aside. Warm milk in saucepan. When it is just warm to the touch, whisk in half the flour. Let the milk begin to simmer, whisking all the time. You be the judge of the thickness - we like it really thick. If you want it thicker, add the remaining flour and continue to whisk until smooth and thick. Stir through the cheese and the salt and pepper until the cheese is melted. Take off the heat. Pour into a baking dish and sprinkle the breadcrumbs over the top. Bake for 30 minutes at 180 degrees celcius. ; name: comforting baked macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: cooked macaroni, butter, eggs, salt, pepper, milk, mozzarella cheese, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook the macaroni until done as usual. Do not overcook it. Drain macaroni in strainer. Place macaroni, butter, salt, pepper, milk, mozarella cheese, and 3 cups of cheddar cheese in casserole dish. Mix eggs in a bowl first and then stir into mixture. Cover everything with aluminum foil and cook for 45 minutes at 350 degrees. Uncover and add extra cup of cheddar cheese across the top. Bake uncovered for another 15 minutes. ; name: cheesiest macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: macaroni, milk, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, flour, butter, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:This step will take approximately 20 minutes, so preheat oven to 350 while working on this step. Put macaroni to boil. In a medium pot heat butter and saut onions. Add milk, flour, salt and pepper. Bring to a rolling boil. Slowly add cheddar cheese, stirring while adding. After cheddar has dissolved, add the mozzarella, stirring while adding. Drain macaroni. Add macaroni directly to the cheese mixture in the pot. Pour mac and cheese mixture into large lasagna pan. Put in oven and bake for 30 minutes or until top is bubbly and golden brown. ; name: macaroni and cheese casserole ; ingredients: cooking spray, elbow macaroni, fat free cream of celery soup, fat-free mayonnaise, low-fat cheddar cheese, sweet red pepper, pimientos, whole wheat crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Coat 9x10 baking dish with cooking spray. Cook macaroni in a large pot of boiling water until just tender. Drain macaroni and transfer to a large pot. Add soup, maonnaise, cheese, pepper and pimentos. Mix well to combine with pasta. Transfer mixture to prepared baking dish and top with cracker crumbs. Bake, uncovered, until top is golden, about 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: cheesy stove top macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: butter, flour, milk, parmesan cheese, colby-monterey jack cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, dry mustard, pepper, salt, cooked macaroni ; preparation:Start cooking the macaroni while you prepare the sauce to save time. Melt butter in a medium sauce pan. Whisk in flour. On medium-high heat, whisk in milk a little at a time. Continue to whisk til thick and bubbly. Do not allow to burn, turn down heat if sauce is cooking to fast to keep from burning. Whisk in mustard, salt and pepper. Reduce to medium heat, stir in cheeses. When melted and blended pour over cooked and drained macaroni. Taste, add more salt if needed. Mix and cook 1 or 2 minutes on medium heat. Serve. ; name: kid s macaroni cheese casserole ; ingredients: macaroni and cheese mix, cheddar cheese, breadcrumbs, tuna fish, potato chips ; preparation:

name: better for you egg salad ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, celery, onion, green pepper, fat-free mayonnaise, spicy brown mustard, table salt, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and rinse eggs. Discard two of the egg yolks. Chop remaining 4 whites and 2 yolks. Mix remaining ingredients. Refrigerate any leftovers, or chill. ; name: traditional egg salad ; ingredients: eggs, water, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Fill a medium pot with three to four quarts of water and bring to a boil. Gently place each egg one at a time into the pot with a long-handled slotted spoon, resting them on the bottom of the boiling water. Bring back to a full boil and cook for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and let eggs sit in the hot water for 13 minutes. Drain all the water and then shake the pot with the eggs still inside to break the shells. Under running warm water, peel off shells and set cooked eggs on a paper towel to dry. Roughly chop eggs into a medium bowl and add mayonnaise, salt and pepper. Stir and taste. Add more salt or pepper if needed. Cover bowl and place in the refrigerator until egg salad is below 40 degrees. Serve with crisp lettuce and your favorite bread. ; name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: healthy egg salad sandwich ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, scallions, dijon mustard, lettuce, whole grain bread, salt and pepper ; preparation:With the back of a fork, mash egg yolk with mustard to make a thick paste. Stir in chopped scallions and chopped egg white. Mix in salt and pepper as desired. Divide mixture on top of 2 slices of bread. Top with lettuce leaves, and cover with remaining slices of bread. Makes 2 sandwiches. ; name: easy homemade chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, green onion, lemon juice, pepper, mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, prepared mustard, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:In medium mixing bowl combine first three ingredients. Stir in the lemon juice and pepper. Combine the mayo, pickle relish and prepared mustard. Add this sauce to chicken and gently stir in the eggs. Cover and chill until ready to serve. ; name: layered lettuce salad ; ingredients: lettuce, celery, hardboiled egg, frozen peas, green pepper, sweet onion, bacon, mayonnaise, sugar, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Tear the cleaned crisp lettuce into small bite sized pieces and place in the bottom of 9x12 inch cake pan. Layer the rest of the ingredients in the order given, do not cook peas. Add the sugar to the mayonnaise and spread over the top as you would frosting. Top with grated cheese. Cover and refrigerate for 8 to 10 hours. Bacon bits can be used for bacon. ; name: green and white salad ; ingredients: cooked bacon, fresh broccoli florets, cauliflower florets, celery, onion, low-fat sour cream, low-fat mayonnaise, garlic powder, salt ; preparation:Cover bacon with paper towel and microwave 2-3 minutes to crisp. Cool. Rinse broccoli and cauliflower. Drain well. Break or chop florets into bite sized pieces. Place florets in bowl. Add celery and onion to the other vegetables. In bowl mix sour cream, mayonnaise, garlic powder, and salt. Pour dressing over vegetables. Crumble bacon over the top. Toss to mix well. Serve at once, or refrigerate up to 24 hours before serving. ; name: eggless salad vegan or vegetarian ; ingredients: extra firm tofu, vegan mayonnaise, celery, onions, dijon mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: garlic lover s shrimp ; ingredients: garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, butter, crushed red pepper flakes, large shrimp, coarse salt, cracked black pepper, toothpick ; preparation:Process garlic in food processor to finely chop. Heat a large skillet over medium high heat and add oil and butter. Add garlic and crushed pepper flakes to oil and butter. Season shrimp with salt and toss to coat. Add shrimp to the pan and cook, stirring frequently, until pink and heads curl to tails. Add black pepper, to your taste. Serve immediately. ; name: garlic shrimp ; ingredients: vegetable oil, butter, garlic, shrimp, salt and pepper, lemons ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: another garlic shrimp recipe ; ingredients: medium shrimp, butter, olive oil, dijon mustard, garlic, kosher salt, red chili pepper flakes, lemons, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place shrimp in a large broiler safe pan and pre-heat broiler, set aside. In a large saute pan, melt butter and oil until bubbly. Add garlic and saute 1-2 minutes-- be careful not to burn garlic. Add the dijon mustard, chili flakes and salt and stir until well blended. Pour sauce over shrimp and broil for approximately 5 minutes or until shrimp has turned pink. Remove from broiler and place on large platter, sprinkle with lemon juice and fresh parsley. Serve with fresh bread and extra lemon. ; name: 4 minute spicy garlic shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, garlic cloves, red pepper flakes, steak seasoning, lemon, zest of, lemon juice, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over medium high heat. Add olive oil, garlic, red pepper flakes, and shrimp. Season with grill seasoning or salt & pepper. Cook shrimp 3 minutes or until just pink. Toss with lemon zest, juice, & chopped parsley. Remove shrimp to a serving platter, leaving the garlic cloves in the pan. ; name: orange garlic shrimp ; ingredients: large shrimp, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, orange zest, sea salt ; preparation:Heat olive oil in heavy skillet over medium high heat. Saute shrimp for 2 minutes or just until opaque. Reduce heat and add garlic and salt. Saute for 1 minute until garlic is soft. Remove from heat and toss with orange zest. Serve with crusty bread. ; name: garlic lime shrimp ; ingredients: butter, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, garlic cloves, white sugar, lime peel, cayenne, shrimp, parsley ; preparation:Melt butter in a medium-heave skillet over medium heat. Mix in the next six ingredients. Saut for 30 seconds and add shrimp. Saut shrimp until they are opaque in centre, about 3 minutes, turning occasionally. Stir in parsley and serve over rice or pasta. ; name: broiled shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, garlic, parsley, crushed red pepper flakes, oregano, salt and pepper, fresh breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Put shrimp in lg. Bowl. Add all other ingredients. Toss well to coat shrimp. Place on shallow baking sheet. Broil 7 in from heat for about 6-7 min, turning once. Serve with sauce from pan. Add a little butter if you like. ; name: garlic lover s shrimps ; ingredients: olive oil, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, raw shrimp, salt, dry sherry, fresh parsley, old bay seasoning ; preparation:

name: chocolate bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: bread, butter, chocolate chips, eggs, milk, sugar, sherry wine, vanilla ; preparation:Cut crusts from bread. Butter and bread, cut into triangles and layer with chocolate in a ovenproof dish. Beat eggs, milk, sugar, sherry and vanilla together and pour over the bread. Leave to stand for 15 minutes to fully absorb liquid. Heat oven to 160 c. Bake for 30 minutes until golden and set. Dust with icing sugar to serve. Hope it tastes good. ; name: sweet bread bread pudding ; ingredients: sweet bread, raisins, butter, milk, sugar, eggs, apple pie filling, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:Grease a 9x12 pan. Scald milk. Add sugar and butter. Mix until butter is melted. Cool. Break sweet bread into pieces. Spread apple pie filling on top of the sweet bread. Sprinkle raisins over the filling. Combine cooled milk mixture with beaten eggs. Pour liquid over the bread. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes. ; name: cinnamon bread pudding ; ingredients: rolls, milk, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, nutmeg, pecans ; preparation:Place cubed bread or rolls in slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. In a mixixng bowl, combine milk, eggs, both sugars, butter, vanilla, and nutmeg and beat until smooth. Stir in pecans. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. Seerve with lemon sauce or whipped topping. ; name: easy bread pudding ; ingredients: eggs, egg whites, skim milk, honey, vanilla, cinnamon raisin bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot. ; name: bread chocolate pudding ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the bread and chocolate chips in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the bread. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: bread pudding for 2 ; ingredients: challah, golden raisins, eggs, nonfat milk, brown sugar, vanilla, ground cinnamon, salt, butter ; preparation:Spray two 6 to 7 oz ramekins with non-stick cooking spray. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cube bread and measure out 1 cup of cubes, place cubes in prepared ramekins and divided the raisins or blueberries between the two. In a small dish, beat together the milk, egg or egg substitute, stir in brown sugar, cinnamon and vanilla. Mixing well. Pour the mixture evenly over the bread cubes and drizzle with melted butter. Place on a cookie sheet, just in case it cooks over, and bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until a knife inserted near center comes our clean. Serve warm. ; name: old fashioned chocolate pudding ; ingredients: white sugar, cornstarch, cocoa, milk, margarine, vanilla ; preparation:In a sauce pan combine sugar, cornstarch and cocoa. Slowly add milk. Bring to a boil over medium heat and continue. Stirring until thick. Remove from heat and add margarine and vanilla. ; name: irish bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: dry white bread, sweet butter, nutmeg, golden raisin, eggs, heavy cream, milk, vanilla, superfine sugar, white sugar ; preparation:

name: yam or sweet potato puff ; ingredients: yams, butter, eggs, sugar, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and butter a casserole dish. Peel potatoes and boil until soft. Mash and add remaining ingredients. Beat well and pour into prepared casserole. Dot with additional butter and bake until brown, 30 to 40 minutes. ; name: spicy sweet potato puff ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, low-fat milk, brown sugar, eggs, butter, nutmeg, cinnamon, chipotle chile in adobo, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mash the sweet potatoes. Add the remaining ingredients and blend until smooth and creamy. Spread mixture into a greased 9x9 inch casserole. Bake for 20 minutes or until set. While puff is baking, combine ingredients for topping. After 20 minutes, or once puff has set, spread topping over puff and bake for ten more minutes. ; name: banana sweet potato puff casserole ; ingredients: mashed sweet potatoes, banana, curry powder, sour cream, salt, egg ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Beat with electric mixer until light and very fluffy. Turn into 1 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees f. In the oven for 20 minutes or until puffed and lightly browned. ; name: magic potato puffs ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, olive oil, cracker crumb, salt, pepper, egg yolks ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Put potatoes in large pot and add enough water to cover them. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat to medium and cook for 12-15 minutes or until fork tender. Drain off water, mash and allow to cool. Coat a baking sheet with pam. In a small saucepan, saut onion in the olive oil over medium heat until tender. Add the onion, cracker crumbs, salt and pepper to the potatoes and remash. With your hands, roll into balls and place onto baking sheet. Brush with the egg yolks. Bake 40-45 minutes or until crispy brown. Makes 24-72 small puffs. ; name: candied sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, brown sugar, orange zest, vanilla, cinnamon, salt, nutmeg ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Place potatoes in 13x9 baking pan. In lg saucepan combine remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Boil for 2 minutes. Pour over potatoes. Cover and bake for 45 minutes. ; name: garlicky potato puffs ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, garlic cloves, potato starch, salt, fresh ground black pepper, eggs, parsley, paprika ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 400f. Add the minced garlic to the melted butter and allow to stand until needed. Peel, dice, and boil potatoes till tender. Mash with a potato masher. Add all ingredients to the potatoes and mix well. Place large tablespoons of the mixture in a buttered baking dish or on a cookie sheet. Sprinkle each with paprika, if desired. Bake in the oven for about 10 to 12 minutes, or until golden brown. ; name: chili roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, sugar, chili powder, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: sweet potato puffs ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, milk, salt, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice, blanched slivered almond ; preparation:

name: braised salmon with leeks dill ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, garlic cloves, tomatoes, kosher salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, dry white wine, salmon fillets, fresh dill ; preparation:Heat oil in a large nonstick skillet over medium-high heat. Add leek. Saut 3 minutes. Add garlic. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add tomato, salt, and pepper. Saut 2-3 minutes. Add wine and salmon. Sprinkle with dill, and bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, and simmer 8 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. ; name: beets leeks and onions ; ingredients: beet, onions, baby leeks, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh rosemary, bay leaves, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat the oven to 425 degrees f. Heat a heavy-based oven roasting pan on top of the stove and toss the vegetables and garlic. Sprinkle with the oil. Stir until they start to brown. Add the herbs, sprinkle over the vinegar and season well. Put the pan in the oven and roast for about 15 minutes, then reduce the heat to 375 degrees f and continue cooking for another 30 minutes or so, stirring 2 or 3 times until the beets are tender. If the vegetables start to burn, add a little more oil and vinegar to the pan. ; name: leeks tossed in balsamic vinaigrette ; ingredients: leeks, balsamic vinegar, olive oil, parsley ; preparation:Split the trimmed leeks lengthwise, leaving the white root ends whole. Make certain all sand is rinsed away. Bundle leeks and tie with string. Drop into saucepan of boiling water and simmer, covered, about 12 minutes, until just tender.
