Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink. ; name: baked chicken with onions garlic rosemary ; ingredients: chicken parts, salt, pepper, onions, garlic, olive oil, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Position oven rack in center of oven. Preheat to 400f degrees. Rinse chicken parts& pat dry. Season liberally with salt& pepper. In a large bowl, toss together onion rings, garlic, oil& rosemary. Spread half of the onion mixture in a shallow baking dish or roasting pan just large enough to hold the chicken pieces in a single layer. Arrange the chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Drizzle with an additional 2 tbsp olive oil. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes. ; name: portuguese style roast chicken ; ingredients: whole chickens, lemons, olive oil, garlic cloves, dried oregano, sweet paprika, cayenne pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c or 180c fan. Using kitchen scissors or poultry shears, cut down either side of the backbones of chickens and discard. Open out chickens and flatten, pressing with the heel of your hand. Rub chicken skin with cut lemon. Reserve lemons. Combine oil, garlic, oregano, paprika, cayenne and salt, and rub into skin. Arrange chickens skin side up in a large baking dish and add reserved lemons. Roast for 45 minutes, until golden brown and cooked through. Set aside to rest for 10 minutes, then carve into pieces. Drizzle with reserved pan juices to serve. ; name: garlic roast chicken with rosemary and lemon ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, mccormick grill seasoning, dry white wine ; preparation:

name: lemony shredded brussels sprouts ; ingredients: olive oil, brussels sprouts, sea salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:In a large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add brussels sprouts and 2 tablespoons water. Season with salt and pepper. Cook, stirring occasionally, until crisp-tender, 8 to 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and stir in lemon juice. Serve immediately. ; name: brown sugar brussels sprouts ; ingredients: fresh brussels sprout, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, lemon, crushed red pepper flakes, salt, balsamic vinegar, brown sugar ; preparation:Steam the brussels sprouts over boiling water until tender, about 10-15 minutes. Heat oil and garlic over medium-high heat until fragrant, being careful not to burn. Add brussels sprouts, lemon juice, red pepper flakes, and salt. Stirring until they begin to brown, about 5 minutes. Add balsamic vinegar and brown sugar, stir for a minute and remove from heat. Serve immediately. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts with mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, thyme, salt and pepper, whole mushrooms, fresh brussels sprouts, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Preheat over to 450f. On a rimmed baking sheet, toss mushrooms and thyme with brussels sprouts and olive oil. Season with salt and pepper. Roast on lower rack until golden brown and tender when pierced with a knife, 20 minutes. Serve hot, drizzled with balsamic vinegar, if desired. ; name: really good brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, bacon, salt, green onions, lemon, juice of, sugar ; preparation:Trim the bottoms off of the brussels sprouts and then cut in half vertically. Fry bacon in a large pan until crispy. Remove from pan and reserve the fat. Add the brussels sprouts to the bacon fat and fry on medium. Do not stir too often as they need to brown. Sprinkle with the salt. Once the brussels sprouts are browned, add the green onion. Crumble the bacon and add to the brussels sprouts. Stir together the juice of the lemon and the sugar. Pour juice over the brussels sprouts and cook until evaporated. ; name: sweet and sour brussels sprouts ; ingredients: apple cider vinegar, honey, chicken broth, fresh bay leaf, red onion, red bell pepper, mustard seeds, brussels sprouts, celery salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a deep skillet, combine vinegar, honey and broth with a whisk. Stir in bay, onion, pepper, mustard seed and turmeric, stir and bring to a boil. Defrost brussel sprouts and halve them. Add to broth mixture and season with celery salt and pepper. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 10 minutes, uncover and cook 5 minutes more. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, olive oil, kosher salt, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: shredded brussels sprouts with bacon and onions ; ingredients: bacon, yellow onion, salt, water, dijon mustard, brussels sprout, cider vinegar ; preparation:Cook bacon in a large skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain on paper towels, then crumble. Add onion and salt to the drippings in the pan and cook over medium heat, stirring often, until tender and browned. Add water and mustard, scraping up any browned bits, then add brussels sprouts and cook, stirring often, until tender. Stir in vinegar and top with the crumbled bacon. ; name: linda s string bean and brussels sprouts saute ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, green beans, butter, garlic clove, salt and pepper, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: savory oven fried chicken ; ingredients: dried breadcrumbs, sharp cheddar cheese, dried ancho chile powder, salt, chicken, eggs ; preparation:In a large shallow bowl mix bread crumbs, cheese, ground chilies, and salt. Rinse chicken and pat dry. Dip in beaten egg and roll in crumb mixture to coat. Place on a foil-lined 12-by 15-inch baking sheet. Bake in a 375 degree oven or 350 degree convection oven until crumbs are browned and chicken is no longer pink at the bone, 45 minutes to 1 hour. ; name: easy oven fried chicken breasts ; ingredients: butter flavor crisco, flour, paprika, salt, pepper, chicken breasts ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Melt crisco in a 13 x 9 baking pan. Combine flour, paprika, salt and pepper in a bag. Shake chicken pieces, one at a time, in bag to coat with flour mixture. Place chicken skin side down in baking pan. Bake, uncovered, 30 minutes. Turn chicken. Bake 30 minutes longer. ; name: crispy chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, buttermilk, garlic, hot sauce, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, cornstarch, salt, vegetable oil ; preparation:Flatten the chicken breasts between parchment paper or between plastic sheets. Mix the buttermilk with the hot sauce and the garlic, put the chicken covered in the buttermilk mixture in a non-metallic dish, marinate for at least two hours turning them over once. Mix the flour, cornmeal, cornstarch and seasoning in a shallow dish, take the chicken out of the marinade, let the buttermilk drip off, coat in the flour, coat the other breast then repeat the coating again starting with the first one. If you still see wet parts on the breasts, coat again. Put the chicken back in the fridge for at least half an hour. Discard the marinade. Heat the vegetable oil in a frying pan until it is pretty hot. Fry the breasts until golden brown on both sides, lower the temperature and fry them until they are done, approx 10 minutes in total depending on the thickness of the breasts. ; name: oven baked chicken with tasty rub ; ingredients: chicken breasts, salt, garlic, oregano, paprika, pepper, chili powder, onion powder, thyme, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Take all ingredients except for olive oil and chicken and combine in small bowl. Vary amount of chili powder depending on desired level of spice. Take chicken and lightly coat both sides with olive oil. Place chicken in oven-safe dish and rub both sides heavily with ingredients previously mixed. Pour a little bit more olive oil into the bottom of the dish, enough so that it is lightly covered. Cook for roughly 35-45 minutes. ; name: saucy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, celery seed, paprika, garlic, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix first 8 ingredients in plastic bag. Add chicken and marinate in refrigerator overnight. Remove chicken from bag and coat with crumbs. Heat oven to 350. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. ; name: oven fried garlic chicken ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper, butter, garlic cloves, chicken ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a shallow bowl, blend together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, and pepper. In a small saucepan, heat butter and garlic over very low heat until butter melts. Remove from heat. Brush chicken pieces with garlic butter, then roll in bread crumb mixture to coat. Place chicken skin side up on a large foil-lined baking sheet. Mix together any remaining crumb mixture and butter and sprinkle over chicken. Place in oven and bake 1 hour. ; name: commando fried chicken ; ingredients: buttermilk, hot sauce, chicken, egg substitute, dijon mustard, corn flakes, parmesan cheese, dried oregano, cooking spray ; preparation:Combine buttermilk and hot sauce in a bowl. Place chicken in a shallow pan and pour buttermilk mixture over chicken. Cover tightly and marinate in the refrigerator for 2 hours. Preheat oven to 350f. Combine egg substitute and whole-grain mustard in a shallow dish. Combine cereal, parmesan, and oregano in a second shallow dish. Remove chicken from marinade and drain excess liquid. Dip chicken pieces, 1 at a time, into the egg mustard mixture and then dredge in the cereal mixture. Place chicken on a wire rack set on top of a baking sheet. Lightly spray the chicken with cooking spray. Bake for 35 minutes or until chicken is fully cooked through and juices run clear when pierced with a knife. ; name: spicy oven fried chicken breasts ; ingredients: dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, paprika, dried thyme, garlic salt, ground red pepper, low-fat buttermilk, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cooking spray, margarine ; preparation:

name: chicken and artichoke bake ; ingredients: artichoke hearts, fresh spinach, shallot, garlic, chicken broth, white wine, chicken thighs, cream of chicken soup, milk, diced green chilis ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Drain and cut the artichokes into smaller pieces and place in a medium size bowl. Add the spinach, garlic and shallots. Mix the chicken broth and wine and pour over spinach and artichokes mixture. Mix well and set aside. Skin the thighs and remove any fat. Place in a 9 inch square baking dish. Mix the chicken soup, milk and green chilies together and set aside. Spread spinach mixture over the chicken. Pour soup mixture over spinach mixture. Cover with a lid or foil. Put it in the oven and bake for 1 hour or until chicken is done and juices are hot and bubbly. ; name: creamy mushroom artichoke sauce ; ingredients: butter, oil, mushroom, onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, cream cheese, artichoke hearts, fresh lemon juice, ground red pepper ; preparation:Melt butter with oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add mushrooms, onion, and garlic and saute 5-7 minutes or until tender. Stir in chicken broth and cream cheese and cook, stirring constantly, 2-3 minutes or until cream cheese melts. Stir in artichoke hearts, lemon juice and red pepper. Reduce heat to low and cook 2 minutes or until mixture is hot. ; name: pan fried artichokes with basil and pine nuts ; ingredients: artichokes, lemon juice, salt, olive oil, garlic cloves, basil leaves, pine nuts ; preparation:Trim the stalk of each artichoke, leaving about 4 centimetres still attached to the artichoke. Peel the remaining stalk and remove the tough outer leaves and discard them. Blanch the artichokes in water with lemon juice and a little salt. Cook for 5 minutes or until just tender. Drain. Cut the artichokes into quarters lengthwise, and set aside. Heat the oil in a saut pan over a medium heat, add the garlic and cook until golden. Add the artichokes and saut until the outsides are just browned. Stir through the basil leaves and pine nuts and serve. ; name: shrimp pasta ; ingredients: shrimp, mushroom, green onions, garlic, white wine, pasta, olive oil ; preparation:Cook your shrimp or scallops on high heat in 2-3 tablespoons of olive oil, for approx. 1 min. On each side. You want the shrimp& scallops seared quickly on both sides, overcooking will toughen the meat. Cook the pasta according to the directions. Remove the meat from the pan, put it on the back of the stove while you finish the dish. Saute the mushrooms and green onions, & garlic. Saute for 3-5 min. Add the shrimp, cooked pasta and the white wine. This is a very quick dinner and is also very light but has loads of flavor. ; name: sauteed artichokes in lemon garlic sauce ; ingredients: artichoke heart, garlic, lemon, juice of, salt and pepper, parsley, white wine, olive oil ; preparation:Heat oil in a saute pan over medium high heat. Add garlic and artichokes and season with salt and pepper. Saute garlic and artichokes 3-5 minutes, add remaining ingredients and lower heat to medium low. Simmer about 10 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: artichoke and green olive dip ; ingredients: artichoke hearts, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, garlic clove, green olives, fresh ground pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Drain artichoke hearts and rinse in cool water. Pat them dry with paper towels and place in a food processor with olive oil, lemon juice and garlic. Puree until smooth, 2 to 3 minutes. Transfer to a bowl and stir in green olives. Season with pepper to taste. Chill at least 2 hours. Before serving, stir in the chopped parsley. ; name: artichoke omelette ; ingredients: light butter, onion, eggs, artichoke hearts, green olives, milk, cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute onions in butter in 12 inch fry pan. Beat eggs in bowl with artichoke hearts, olives, milk, salt and pepper. Pour mixture over onions in pan and cover. Cook over medium heat until the bottom of the omelette is golden brown, carefully lift edge with spatula to check. Lay cheese over half of omelette. Flip other half of omelette over cheese half. Wait about 1 minute. Slide out of pan and serve hot. ; name: shrimp with artichokes ; ingredients: shallots, mushroom, butter, dry white wine, artichoke hearts, chives, chopped pimiento, shrimp, lemon, parsley ; preparation:

name: homemade dinner rolls ; ingredients: yeast, bread flour, milk, sugar, salt, butter, egg ; preparation:Scald cup of milk and cool to lukewarm. Dissolve yeast in cup of hot water in large mixing bowl, let stand 5 minutes. Mix remaining ingredients and beat well with mixer. Oil a large bowl, turn so both sides are oiled, cover with wax paper till doubled in size. Punch down, form into rolls on greased cookie sheet and let rise until double in size. Bake in preheated 400 degree f oven for 15 to 20 minutes. Brush tops with butter or margarine. Prep time is in the rising. If using bread machine follow mfg instructions. ; name: homemade rolls ; ingredients: water, butter, bread flour, salt, sugar, bread machine yeast ; preparation:Place ingredients in breadmachine in order as listed. Run on dough cycle. Shape rolls and place on lightly greased baking pan. Cover with cloth and let rise in warm place for 1 hour. Bake at 375 for 10-15 minute. ; name: whole wheat rolls ; ingredients: whole wheat bread flour, white bread flour, salt, sugar, non-fat powdered milk, yeast, vegetable oil, egg, warm water ; preparation:Combine ingredients in the order your bread maker calls for on dough cycle. Check on dough half way through needing adding a bit more flour or water as needed so dough is fairly tacky. Turn out onto greased cutting board and work with greased hands. Shape into 15 rolls and place in greased 9x13 pan making 5 rows of 3. Let rise 30-45 minutes or until doubled in size. Bake at 350 for 15-20 minutes. ; name: basic rolls ; ingredients: warm water, active dry yeast, sugar, butter, egg, salt, flour ; preparation:Measure water into a warm bowl. Dissolve yeast into water. Add sugar, butter, egg, and salt. Add enough flour to make the dough easy to handle. Knead the dough until it becomes smooth and elastic. Place in a greased bowl to rise until double in size. Divide the dough into small balls and place in greased muffin cups. Brush with butter, if desired. Let rise again until double in size, about another hour. Bake at 375 for 10 - 15 minutes. ; name: 100 whole wheat rolls ; ingredients: yeast, water, honey, olive oil, eggs, salt, whole wheat flour ; preparation:Dissolve yeast in water and honey for about 5 minutes. Combine honey, olive oil, eggs, and salt in a large mixing bowl. Slowly add flour and knead until it loosens from sides of the bowl. Place in large oiled bowl, cover and let rise until about double. About one hour, be sure it is in a warm place. Punch down and remove dough. Shape dough into rolls about 2 inch in diameter. Place on an oiled or non stick baking sheet, cover and let rise for 30 minutes. Pre-heat oven to 375 degrees. Bake at about 375 degrees for about 20 minutes or until browned. ; name: spoon rolls ; ingredients: dry yeast, warm water, butter, self-rising flour, egg, sugar ; preparation:Dissolve yeast in warm water, let stand for 5 minutes. Combine yeast mixture with butter and flour. Stir in egg and sugar. Mixture will be a very soft batter. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Heat oven to 350 degrees. Fill greased muffin tins two-thirds full with batter. Bake for 25 minutes. ; name: german roll kuchen ; ingredients: flour, eggs, baking powder, salt, sour cream ; preparation:Mix and make a soft but not sticky dough. Roll and cut into oblong pieces. Make a cut in the centre. Take an end and pull through the middle. Fry in hot oil until golden brown. Let cool. Sprinkle with icing sugar. Eat with watermelon. ; name: liisa s dinner rolls abm ; ingredients: water, egg, sugar, butter, dry milk, salt, bread flour, yeast ; preparation:

name: easy homemade chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, green onion, lemon juice, pepper, mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, prepared mustard, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:In medium mixing bowl combine first three ingredients. Stir in the lemon juice and pepper. Combine the mayo, pickle relish and prepared mustard. Add this sauce to chicken and gently stir in the eggs. Cover and chill until ready to serve. ; name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: chicken nuggets chicken salad ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, breaded chicken nuggets, mayonnaise, salt, ground black pepper, sugar ; preparation:In a medium sized bowl, combine all ingredients mixing well. If mixture looks a little too dry, add a little more mayonnaise until. Desired moistness is reached. Now taste to see if seasonings need to be adjusted. Refrigerate for at least 3 hours. ; name: traditional egg salad ; ingredients: eggs, water, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Fill a medium pot with three to four quarts of water and bring to a boil. Gently place each egg one at a time into the pot with a long-handled slotted spoon, resting them on the bottom of the boiling water. Bring back to a full boil and cook for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and let eggs sit in the hot water for 13 minutes. Drain all the water and then shake the pot with the eggs still inside to break the shells. Under running warm water, peel off shells and set cooked eggs on a paper towel to dry. Roughly chop eggs into a medium bowl and add mayonnaise, salt and pepper. Stir and taste. Add more salt or pepper if needed. Cover bowl and place in the refrigerator until egg salad is below 40 degrees. Serve with crisp lettuce and your favorite bread. ; name: lettuce and egg salad ; ingredients: red leaf lettuce, hard-boiled eggs, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, onions, dill, salt, pepper ; preparation:Clean any yellow leaves from the lettuce. Wash the lettuce very well and cut in pieces. Drain well. Chop the onion and dill. Peel the eggs and cut in medium size pieces, cutting 1 egg in round slices. Mix the lettuce, eggs, onion and dill in a glass bowl. Lay the egg slices on top. Whisk together oil and lemon juice. Drizzle over salad. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: better for you egg salad ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, celery, onion, green pepper, fat-free mayonnaise, spicy brown mustard, table salt, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and rinse eggs. Discard two of the egg yolks. Chop remaining 4 whites and 2 yolks. Mix remaining ingredients. Refrigerate any leftovers, or chill. ; name: chicken and chickpea salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, cherry tomatoes, chickpeas, flat leaf parsley, red onion, feta, olive oil, lemon juice, baby spinach ; preparation:Combine chicken, tomatoes, chickpeas, parsley, onion and feta in a large bowl. Season with black pepper. Toss gently to combine. Whisk oil, juice and salt and pepper together in a small bowl until well combined. Add spinach to chicken, drizzle with dressing and toss again to combine. Serve with crusty bread. ; name: which came first the chicken or the egg salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, hard-boiled eggs, celery, green onion, sweet pickle relish, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, fresh curly-leaf parsley ; preparation:

name: tangy barbecue sauce ; ingredients: unsalted butter, celery, yellow onions, ketchup, fresh lemon juice, granulated sugar, cider vinegar, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:In medium saucepan over medium heat, melt butter. Add celery and onion and cook 2 to 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add remaining ingredients and whisk together. Bring to boil, reduce heat, cover and simmer 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Transfer to a bowl, cover and refrigerate until ready to use. ; name: grammy s bbq sauce ; ingredients: ketchup, brown sugar, white vinegar, onions, garlic, dried mustard, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Toss all ingredients into a pot. Cook over medium heat and bring to slow boil then reduce heat to lower setting and continue cooking for about 15 to 30 min longer. Best if used on ribs or chicken. Can use this sauce if baking or bbq. Usually, depending on the qty i am cooking, i have to double or triple this recipe. ; name: carolina mustard barbecue sauce ; ingredients: prepared yellow mustard, honey, light brown sugar, distilled white vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Combine the mustard, honey, sugar and vinegar in a saucepan and whisk to mix. Bring to a simmer over low heat and cook gently, uncovered, until richly flaovred, about 5 minutes, whisking from time to time. Remove from heat and season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve warm or at room temperature. The sauce will keep, tightly covered in the refrigerator, for several weeks. ; name: bobbie q sauce barbecue sauce ; ingredients: heinz ketchup, water, garlic clove, worcestershire sauce, chili powder, sugar, prepared yellow mustard ; preparation:Combine ingredients, bring to a boil and simmer over low heat for 5 minutes. Use this as a basting sauce for barbecue, or combine with chopped or shredded beef, chicken or pork, and simmer until heated throughout and flavor is well through the meat. If you want to make up a batch of this to keep in the freezer, leave out the water, and it will not freeze solid. You can take out the container and just scoop out however much you need. I sometimes make it up by the gallon just to have it on hand for easy meals. ; name: baked beans and hamburger casserole ; ingredients: worcestershire sauce, ground beef, onion, ketchup, salt and pepper, yellow mustard, butter, sugar, pork and beans ; preparation:Brown ground beef and onion. Drain. Remove from heat. Add all other ingredients and stir well. Place in a casserole dish and bake, covered, at 325 for 45 minutes. ; name: homemade worcestershire sauce ; ingredients: apple cider vinegar, low sodium soy sauce, water, brown sugar, ground ginger, mustard powder, onion powder, garlic powder, cinnamon, black pepper ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a medium saucepan and stir thoroughly. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Simmer 1 minute. Cool. Store in the refrigerator. ; name: crock pot bbq beef ; ingredients: chuck roast, water, barbecue sauce, worcestershire sauce, mustard, onion, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place roast in crock pot. Combine remaining ingredients in saucepan and bring to boil. Cover roast with sauce mixture. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. Chop meat and stir. ; name: texas mop sauce barbecue sauce ; ingredients: water, instant coffee granules, tomato sauce, red wine vinegar, worcestershire sauce, sugar, dried oregano leaves, pepper, butter ; preparation:

name: raspberry almond muffins ; ingredients: almond paste, butter, sugar, eggs, baking powder, baking soda, almond extract, flour, buttermilk, raspberry preserves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line muffin pan with foil baking cups. Cut almond paste into 16 pieces and pat into a round disc. In mixer cream butter and sugar until fluffy. Beat in eggs then add baking powder, soda and extract. Fold in 1 cup flour, buttermilk then remaining flour until well blended. Spoon about 2 tablespoons batter into each cup and smooth surface. Top with level teaspoonful of preserves, then the piece of almond paste. Top each muffin with another 2 tablespoons of batter. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: ever ready muffins ; ingredients: raisin bran cereal, flour, sugar, salt, baking soda, eggs, buttermilk, oil, raisins, walnuts ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients. Combine other ingredients and add to dry ingredients. Mix with spoon just to moisten. Fold mixture. Put in refrigerator overnight. Spoon into greased muffin pans, being careful to take batter from sides and not mix batter anymore. Bake on bottom rack at 400 degrees for 5 minutes. Then bake on top rack 15 minutes. ; name: peach shortcake muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, ginger, margarine, milk, peaches, cinnamon ; preparation:Combine first five ingredients in large bowl. Cut in margarine with pastry blender until mixture is crumbly. Add milk and peaches, stirring just until blended. Spoon into greased muffin cups. Sprinkle with topping mixture. Bake at 400f for 20-25 minutes or until set and golden. ; name: raisin and bran muffins ; ingredients: wheat bran, milk, egg substitute, canola oil, unbleached white flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, raisins ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. Combine the wheat bran and milk in a mixing bowl. Let stand 2 minutes or until most of the moisture is absorbed. Add the egg and oil. Beat until well blended. Sift together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add the dry ingredients to the bran mixture and stir just until all are moistened. Fold in raisins, but do not over mix. Spoon the batter into oiled muffin cups and bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve hot. ; name: lemon and mango muffins ; ingredients: self rising flour, sugar, ground ginger, egg, lemon, juice and zest of, buttermilk, butter, mangoes in syrup, caster sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 220c. Sift the flour, sugar and ginger into a bowl, make a well in the centre. Combine the egg, lemon juice, rind and buttermilk. Stir into the dry ingredients, alternatively with melted butter and mango slices. Divide evenly between 12 greased muffin tins, sprinkle with castor sugar. Bake for 15-18 minutes or until well risen and cooked. Leave in the tins for 5 minutes before turning onto a wire rack to cool. ; name: simple whole wheat muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, canola oil, maple syrup, cinnamon, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: citrus muffins ; ingredients: grapefruit, zest of, orange, zest of, buttermilk, sugar, salt, butter, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda ; preparation:In mixer or food processor, mix the peels of grapefruit and orange with the buttermilk until the peels are finely chopped. Add sugar, salt and butter and beat well. In a bowl, mix flour, baking powder and baking soda. Add the mixture of buttermilk and mix until the mixture is wet, but do not mix too much. Spread the mixture in 12 greased muffins tins. Cook in a preheated oven of 375 f 20 to 25 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the muffins comes out clean. Let cool on a rack for about 5 minutes. Remove from the pan and let cool completely. ; name: plum muffins ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, egg, butter, almond extract, red plum ; preparation:

name: irish mashed potatoes colcannon ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, onion, kale, milk, sour cream, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in water until tender. Drain. While potatoes are cooking. Melt butter in large skillet. Add chopped onion and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in kale and cook 5 more minutes. Remove from heat. Mash potatoes, milk, sour cream, salt and pepper with mixer. Stir in kale mixture. ; name: broccoli mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, broccoli florets, onion, garlic clove, chicken broth, parmesan cheese, ground black pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Melt butter in a large dutch oven. Add broccoli, onion and garlic. Saute until tender. Place in blender container with chicken broth. Process until mixture is pureed. Add to mashed potatoes. Stir in parmesan cheese and pepper. Transfer to buttered ovensafe serving dish. Top with shredded cheese. Broil until hot and bubbly and cheese melts and browns. Serve immediately. ; name: kale and potato soup ; ingredients: potatoes, vegetable oil, water, salt, pepper, kale, garlic sausage ; preparation:Peel and chop potatoes. Combine with vegetable oil and water. Cook for 20 to 30 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Remove potatoes and reserve liquid. Mash potatoes through a sieve and return to potato liquid. Add salt and pepper and simmer for 20 minutes. Wash kale discarding all tough leaves and cut into shreds. Add to potatoes and cook for 25 minutes. Add sausage. Simmer gently for 5 minutes. ; name: impressive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, water, fresh parsley, cheese, milk, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the onion. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies. ; name: braised kale potatoes and mushrooms ; ingredients: water, kale, red potatoes, olive oil, portabella mushroom, shallots, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in medium saucepan of salted water. Bring to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer until tender, 7 to 10 minutes. Drain well and set aside. Meanwhile, in large, wide skillet, heat oil over medium heat. Add mushrooms, shallots and garlic and cook, stirring often, until shallots are soft and mushrooms are tender, about 5 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Add kale to mushroom mixture and cook, stirring often, 1 minute. Add water and cooked potatoes. Cover and cook until kale is bright green, about 5 minutes. Serve warm. ; name: spicy mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, crushed red pepper flakes, garlic cloves, milk, butter, sea salt ; preparation:Partially peel the potatoes and then cut in half. Boil potatoes in slightly salted water until cooked. Drain potatoes and blend to desired consistency with a mixer or potato masher. Return to a burner on low and add red pepper, garlic, milk, butter and garlic salt. Mix well. Add more milk if necessary. ; name: kale with tomatoes and green chiles ; ingredients: kale, garlic, yellow onions, olive oil, tomatoes and green chilies, salt, pepper ; preparation:Rinse the kale and remove the fibrous middle rib, slice the leaves into ribbons. Over medium heat, saute the garlic in the olive oil until fragrant. Then add the onions and saute together, stirring constantly until the onions are limp. Do not allow the garlic or onions to brown. Add the kale and saute for 15-20 minutes or until tender, stirring frequently to prevent the greens from scorching. Add the tomatoes and green chiles and salt and pepper to taste, stirring everything together and cooking until heated through--about 1-2 minutes. Serve over rice or combine with blackeyed peas or refried beans and rice to make a tasty and hearty filling for vegetarian wraps. ; name: mashed potatoes with kale really ; ingredients: kale, potatoes, chicken broth, parmesan cheese, butter, salt, garlic powder, pepper ; preparation:

name: spicy sausage and pepper stew ; ingredients: reduced-fat italian sausage, green pepper, celery, flour, reduced-sodium beef broth, no-salt-added diced tomatoes, kidney beans ; preparation:Cook sausage, pepper and celery in large saucepan on medium-high heat 8 to 10 minutes or until sausage is no longer pink, stirring frequently. Drain. Add flour. Cook and stir 1 minute. Stir in broth, tomatoes with their liquid and beans. Bring to boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover. Simmer 20 minutes, stirring occasionally. Serve with crackers. ; name: solo italian sausage and pasta medley ; ingredients: cooked italian sausage, dry pasta, green bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, tomato sauce, dried basil, olive oil, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta in 2 quarts of salted water and cook until soft, which should take about 10 to 12 minutes. Chop the pepper and onions into half inch pieces and saute in olive oil. After 5 minutes, add the garlic, basil, and the tomato sauce and simmer until it starts to thicken. If the sauce become to thick, add a little of the water from the pasta. Add the precooked sausage to the vegetable and sauce mixture, and stir over low heat while waiting until the pasta is done. Add drained pasta to the pan, stir, check to see if salt is needed, and plate. Serve with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: sausage potatoes and peas ; ingredients: italian sausages, sweet peas, potatoes, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, butter, parsley, oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spread sausage links, potatoes and peas in 13 x 9 baking dish. In saucepan over medium heat mix rest of ingredients until boullion cube is dissolved. Pour over sausage, potatoes and peas. Cover tightly with aluminum foil. Bake in 350 degree oven 45 minutes to 1 hours. ; name: roasted sausages peppers potatoes and onions ; ingredients: potato, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, italian pork sausage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: italian tomato sausage sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, italian sausage, shallots, garlic clove, plum tomatoes, mixed italian herbs, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat oil. Add sausage and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add shallots and garlic. Cook one minute. Add tomatoes, herbs and sugar. Bring to a fast boil, then simmer uncovered for 40 minutes. Stir frequently and skim off fat. Add salt and pepper. Serve over pasta. ; name: italian white bean soup ; ingredients: italian turkey sausage, onion, garlic cloves, cooking oil, cannellini beans, nonfat chicken broth, plum tomato, oregano, kale ; preparation:In a large sauce pan cook onion and garlic in hot oil about 5 minutes or until onion is tender. Stir in beans, broth, tomatoes and marjarom. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer covered for 15 minutes. Stir in cooked sausage, kale or spinach simmer for about 5 minutes more or until kale is tender. Season to taste with pepper. ; name: italian meat sauce ; ingredients: ground beef, sausage, onions, tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, basil, oregano, crushed red pepper flakes, black pepper, water ; preparation:Cook ground beef, sausage together in large pot. Use a potato masher to break up the meat into fine pieces. Drain the fat into a skillet, cook onions in fat. Drain fat and return onions to meat mixture. Add tomato paste, crushed tomatoes, basil, oregano, crushed red pepper, black pepper, and water. Simmer on stove for two hours or till the sauce reduces,. Serve with pasta, ravioli, etc --. ; name: italian sausage and beef stew ; ingredients: stewing beef, mild italian sausage, onions, garlic clove, green pepper, potatoes, kidney beans, salt and pepper, beef broth, basil ; preparation:

name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: hot chicken salad most requested ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, miracle whip, cheddar cheese, water chestnuts, onion flakes, celery, lemon juice, salt & pepper, potato chips ; preparation:Cut chicken breasts into 2-inch squares. Boil chicken chunks 5 minutes. Drain. Mix all ingredients. Spread into greased 13x9-inch pan. Top with crushed chips. Bake at 350f for 25 - 30 minutes until cheese melts & chips brown. ; name: yummy chicken salad for sandwiches ; ingredients: chicken breasts, olive oil flavored cooking spray, salt and pepper, sliced almonds, celery ribs, red onion, whole grain mustard, mayonnaise ; preparation:Preheat oven broiler. Spray the chicken breasts with olive oil spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Broil the chicken breasts for 7 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Chop chicken breasts and put in refrigerator to cool. While oven is still hot, spread your almond flakes on a cookie sheet and toast on the broiling rack. Please keep an eye on them because they toast quickly, and you dont want burnt almonds. Once the chicken is cooled, mix in the almonds, celery, onion, mustard and mayo. You can either put the salad straight onto your choice of bread and add whatever you like on your sandwiches or can be eaten out of iceburg lettuce leaves for a no carb version. ; name: chicken and chickpea salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, cherry tomatoes, chickpeas, flat leaf parsley, red onion, feta, olive oil, lemon juice, baby spinach ; preparation:Combine chicken, tomatoes, chickpeas, parsley, onion and feta in a large bowl. Season with black pepper. Toss gently to combine. Whisk oil, juice and salt and pepper together in a small bowl until well combined. Add spinach to chicken, drizzle with dressing and toss again to combine. Serve with crusty bread. ; name: hot chicken salad sandwiches ; ingredients: white bread, butter, chicken breasts, hard-boiled eggs, green olives, celery, onions, mayonnaise, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Trim crust from bread. Mix butter and cheese together and spread on the bread slices. Mix together chicken, eggs, olives, onions, and mayonnaise. Spread mixture on 6 slices of bread. Place remaining bread slices, cheese side up, over the chicken filling. Place sandwiches in single layer on large baking sheet. Torefrigerate for later baking, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate now. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Heat sandwiches, uncovered, for about 20 minutes or until hot and cheese topping melts and bread is toasted. ; name: stir fry chicken salad ; ingredients: oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, vegetables, garlic cloves, broccoli floret, mixed baby greens, italian dressing, reduced sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Heat the oil in a wok over a medium heat for 1 minute. Add the chicken and stir-fry for 5 minutes or until golden. Stir in the vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes, or until tender-crisp. Transfer the contents of the wok to a large salad bowl, add the salad greens and mix well. Whisk together the dressing and the soy sauce in a small bowl, drizzle it over the salad-vegetable mixture and toss to combine. Serve with noodles or rice. ; name: easy homemade chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, green onion, lemon juice, pepper, mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, prepared mustard, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:In medium mixing bowl combine first three ingredients. Stir in the lemon juice and pepper. Combine the mayo, pickle relish and prepared mustard. Add this sauce to chicken and gently stir in the eggs. Cover and chill until ready to serve. ; name: warm chicken salad ; ingredients: skinless chicken breasts, green beans, asparagus spears, cherry tomatoes, pine nuts, fresh basil, baby salad leaves, extra virgin olive oil, cider vinegar, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: ham and eggs ; ingredients: eggs, cooked ham, flour, baking powder, salt, small curd cottage cheese, monterey jack cheese, butter, green chilies ; preparation:Beat eggs. Add dry ingredients, cottage cheese, ham and shredded cheese. Add melted butter and chilies. Pour into well greased 13x9 inch baking dish. Bake at 350 for 35 to 45 minutes or until center is firm. Reheats nicely. ; name: eggs and ham breakfast bake ; ingredients: cooked ham, cheddar cheese, hash brown potatoes, bell pepper, mushrooms, eggs, small curd cottage cheese, black pepper, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Spray bottom of baking dish with cooking spray, sprinkle three cups of the has browns in bottom of dish. Layer with ham cheese, bell peppers and mushrooms. Sprinkle remaining potatoes on top. Beat eggs and milk with wire wisk, add cottage cheese and pepper. Pour over mixture in baking pan. Bake 45 min or until golden brown and set in the center. ; name: creamy ham and eggs ; ingredients: butter, flour, dry mustard, salt, pepper, milk, cooked ham, hardboiled egg, toast ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan. Stir in flour and seasonings till smooth and bubbling. Stir in milk stirring constantly, till thick and bubbly. Stir in ham and eggs. Heat till hot. Serve on toast. ; name: eggs cheese green chiles and sour cream bake ; ingredients: eggs, cheese, diced green chilies, sour cream, salt and pepper, hot sauce, bacon bits ; preparation:Spray or grease small baking dish. Line bottom of dish with green chiles and spread evenly. Cover green chiles with shredded cheese and spread evenly. Beat eggs with sour cream, using a fork. Add hot sauce and salt and pepper to taste, and mix well. Pour into baking dish. Sprinkle with bacon bits and additional shredded cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 30 minutes, or until eggs are set. ; name: ham egg cheese cups ; ingredients: eggs, ham, frozen spinach, cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray muffin tin with cooking spray. Press a slice of ham into each muffin cup. Evenly distribute spinach between muffins cups. Evenly distribute cheese between muffin cups. Crack 1 egg to each muffin cup. Season with salt and pepper. Bake for 25 min or until done. ; name: ham cheese noodle casserole ; ingredients: ham, egg noodles, sharp cheddar cheese, cream of chicken soup, butter, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles in accordance with package and drain. In a medium mixing bowl, combine melted soup and milk and stir until well blended. In 13 x 9 baking dish, combine ham, cooked noodles, liquid soup mixture and half of the cheese. Bake for 20 minutes. Sprinkle remaining cheese over top of casserole. Dot with butter. Bake for additional 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly. ; name: eggs with chilies and cheese ; ingredients: eggs, monterey jack cheese, cottage cheese, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, pepper, diced green chilies, red bell peppers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350-degrees f. Grease a 9 x 13 inch pan. Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir in green chilies and red bell pepper. Pour mixture into prepared pan. Bake for 30-40 minutes or until it is lightly browned and toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: baked eggs ; ingredients: eggs, milk, ham, chives, ortega chiles, sour cream, cheddar cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: nassau grits ; ingredients: bacon, ham, onions, green bell peppers, grits, fresh tomatoes ; preparation:Fry bacon, drain and set aside. Saute ham in bacon grease about ten minutes. Add onions and peppers to ham, and saut ten more minutes. Cook grits according to package directions. Stir ham, onions and peppers into grits. Toss tomatoes with grits mixture. Crumble bacon over top and serve immediately. Serve hot. Do not add bacon and tomatoes until time to serve the grits. ; name: hot tomato grits ; ingredients: bacon, chicken broth, salt, quick-cooking grits, canned diced green chiles, cheddar cheese, tomatoes ; preparation:Cook chopped bacon in large heavy saucepan until crisp. Gradually add chicken broth and salt, bring to a boil. Stir in grits, tomatoes and chilies and return to a boil stirring often. Reduce heat and simmer 15 - 20 minutes. Stir in cheese, cover and let stand 5 minutes or until cheese melts. ; name: bacon and rice creole ; ingredients: bacon, green bell pepper, onions, salt, canned tomatoes, brown rice ; preparation:Simmer vegetables and spices in a saucepan. At the same time, fry the bacon. When bacon is done, remove from pan and crumble into small pieces. Drain off all fat. Let rice brown lightly. Add the vegetables and bacon. Let simmer over very low heat for 30 minutes. Check after 20 minutes to see if it is drying out. If so, add more tomatoes, or some water, or a combination of both. ; name: creamy stone ground grits ; ingredients: butter, onions, chicken stock, half-and-half cream, grits, cream cheese, salt, white pepper, parmesan cheese, green onion ; preparation:Saut onion in butter. Add chicken stock and half and half. Bring to a boil. Whisk in the grits. Reduce heat and simmer for 15 minutes. Stir in cream cheese, salt, and pepper. Continue to simmer 1-2 minutes longer until grits are creamy. Stir in parmesan cheese and green onions. Serve immediately or cover and keep warm. ; name: steak creole ; ingredients: round steaks, celery, green pepper, worcestershire sauce, diced tomatoes, onion, sliced mushrooms, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Cut and trim steak into bite-sized pieces. Brown in skillet over medium heat in 2t oil. Add diced celery, green pepper, tomatoes, onion, mushrooms, worcestershire and tabasco. Simmer over low heat for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally, or until meat is tender. Serve over hot cooked rice or noodles. ; name: pan fried pork chops with onions ; ingredients: pork chops, creole seasoning, all-purpose flour, vegetable oil, onions, water ; preparation:Sprinkle pork chops with creole seasoning. Dredge pork chops in flour, shaking off excess. Cook pork chops in hot vegetable oil in a large skillet over med-high heat 1-2 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Remove from skillet and keep warm. Add in onions and water, stirring to loosen particles from the bottom of the skillet. Saute 10 minutes or until golden brown. Return pork chops to skillet. Lower heat to low. Cover and simmer 5 minutes. ; name: creole ; ingredients: kielbasa, oil, onion, red bell pepper, spanish rice mix, salsa, water, pepper ; preparation:Saute onion, bell pepper and sausage in oil in a large skillet. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stirring well. Cover and simmer until liquid is absorbed, and rice is tneder, about 10-12 minutes. Remove from heat, and let rest 5 minutes before serving. ; name: creole grits ; ingredients: grits, tomatoes, onion, bacon ; preparation:

name: jan s bar b q sauce ; ingredients: ketchup, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, yellow mustard, onion powder ; preparation:Mix in pan on stove top and bring slowly to a boil. If you like onions, you can chop some fine and sautee the, adding them instead of the onion powder. Spread on top of the chicken while on the grill when the chicken is completely cooked. Leave it on the grill for another 10 minutes. Eat it up. ; name: grammy s bbq sauce ; ingredients: ketchup, brown sugar, white vinegar, onions, garlic, dried mustard, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Toss all ingredients into a pot. Cook over medium heat and bring to slow boil then reduce heat to lower setting and continue cooking for about 15 to 30 min longer. Best if used on ribs or chicken. Can use this sauce if baking or bbq. Usually, depending on the qty i am cooking, i have to double or triple this recipe. ; name: chinese sweet and sour sauce ; ingredients: catsup, apple cider vinegar, orange juice, red wine vinegar, granulated sugar, dry mustard, hot sauce, cornstarch, water ; preparation:Combine cornstarch and water. Set aside. In saucepan heat all remaining ingredients until sugar is dissolved and liquid is hot. Slowly add the cornstarch and water mixture, stirring constantly until the mixture thickens, about 1 minute. Remove from heat. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: chinese bar b que chicken ; ingredients: chicken, salt, pepper, flour, water, red wine vinegar, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard, hot sauce ; preparation:Cut up whole chicken. Dust with flour, salt and pepper. Brown in skillet. Arrange in greased baking dish. Combine water, vinegar, brown sugar, worchestershire sauce, mustard and hot sauce in a saucepan and cook until simmering. Pour over chicken in baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 350 for 45 to 60 minutes. ; name: bar be que pork and beans ; ingredients: pork and beans, tomato sauce, onions, ground beef, mustard, brown sugar, garlic clove, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown ground beef in skillet over medium heat. Remove ground beef leaving the dripping in pan. Add to crock pot with tomato sauce and pork and beans. Stir well. Brown onion in drippings with minced garlic. Add to crock pot. Add the mustard, brown sugar, salt and pepper. Stir well. Let simmer for 2 hours in crock pot. ; name: carolina mustard barbecue sauce ; ingredients: prepared yellow mustard, honey, light brown sugar, distilled white vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Combine the mustard, honey, sugar and vinegar in a saucepan and whisk to mix. Bring to a simmer over low heat and cook gently, uncovered, until richly flaovred, about 5 minutes, whisking from time to time. Remove from heat and season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to a serving bowl and serve warm or at room temperature. The sauce will keep, tightly covered in the refrigerator, for several weeks. ; name: raisin sauce ; ingredients: mustard powder, flour, butter, water, brown sugar, cider vinegar, raisins ; preparation:Whisk mustard and flour together. Melt butter. Whisk in dry ingredients. Cook 1-2 min, until the raw taste is cooked out of the flour. Add water, sugar and vinegar. Simmer 45 minutes. Add raisins and simmer 10 minutes more. ; name: diabetic bar b q sauce ; ingredients: tomato sauce, lemon juice, brown sugar, apple cider vinegar, dijon mustard, fresh ground black pepper, red pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: chocolate butter tarts ; ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, unbaked tart shells, brown sugar, corn syrup, egg, butter, vanilla, vinegar, salt ; preparation:Chop each of three squares of chocolate into 16 pieces. Place 4 chunks into bottom of each tart shell. Whisk together brown sugar, corn syrup, egg, butter, vanilla, vinegar, and salt. Spoon into tart shells, filling three-quarters full. Bake at 450 degrees for 12-14 minutes, or until filling is puffed and bubbly and pastry is a light golden brown. Let cool on racks. Drizzle with melted chocolate. ; name: custard tart ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, cornflour, milk, vanilla essence, ground nutmeg, unbaked pastry shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Mix eggs and sugar till thick and creamy. Combine cornflour, milk and vanilla essence and slowly add to egg and sugar mix beating as you do so. Spoon mixture into pastry shell and sprinkle with ground nutmeg. Bake at 200 degree celsius for 10 minutes, reduce heat to 180 degree celsius and bake for a further 20 to 25 minutes. Skewer inserted at centre should come out clean. ; name: fresh cherry pie ; ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, sugar, flour, salt, almond extract, tart cherries, butter ; preparation:Combine sugar, flour and salt. Add almond extract to cherries and toss with sugar flour mixture to mix well. Pour into pastry lined 9 inch pie pan. Put on top crust. Bake at 400 for about 40 minutes. If edges brown too much cover it with aluminum foil. The syrup does bubble and may spill over a little so i set the pie on a cookie sheet then baked it. ; name: caramel tart filling ; ingredients: brown sugar, plain flour, butter, vanilla essence, egg yolks, milk, pastry shells ; preparation:Put brown sugar, plain flour, butter, vanilla essence and egg yolks into a medium saucepan and mix well together. Slowly add milk beating well. Put over a medium heat and stir continuously until it thickens and has a rich glossy brown colour, about 10 to 15 minutes. Let cool and pour into ready made cooked pie pastry shell. Optional extra. Beat 2 egg whites till soft peaks form, slowly add in 4 tablespoon sugar until glossy and have stiff peaks. Spoon meringue onto caramel, making sure it covers the pastry. Put into a hot oven and bake till golden - should only take a few minutes. Cut and serve with thick cream. ; name: apple cream cheese tart ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, lemon zest, eggs, granny smith apples, unbaked pie crust ; preparation:Preheat 375 f. Roll store bought or homemade pie crust into a tart shell. Cream the cream cheese with sugar with paddle attachment until fluffy. Add zest. Add eggs one at a time until fully incorporated. Pour into tart shells. Mix cinnamon sugar with apples. Place in a symmetrical pattern on top of filling. Place in oven until golden brown and set. ; name: sand tarts ; ingredients: butter, sugar, pecans, all-purpose flour, powdered sugar ; preparation:Cream butter until soft. Add sugar, pecans, and flour, mixing well. Shape into balls and bake at 300 degrees on ungreased cookie sheet for 45 minutes. While hot, roll balls in powdered sugar. Roll in sugar again after all have been rolled once. ; name: crustless milk tart ; ingredients: milk, butter, flour, salt, baking powder, eggs, sugar, vanilla essence ; preparation:Melt the butter, add the egg yolks and sugar. Beat with a fork. Add the dry ingredients and milk to the egg mixture. Stifly beat the egg whites, fold into the mix and blend well. Pour into an oven dish about 35x20cm- the mixture should be about 3cm deep. Bake at 160c for 45-60mins. It is lovely with cinnamon sprinkled on top before cooking. ; name: scottish border tart ; ingredients: shortcrust pastry, mixed dried fruit, butter, dark brown sugar, walnuts, glace cherries, egg, icing sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: baked potato packets ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, onion, fresh mushrooms, garlic salt, thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: spicy potato wedges ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, salt, garlic powder, red pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine potatoes and oil in a large bowl or plastic bag, tossing well to coat. Combine salt, garlic powder, and red pepper in a small bowl. Sprinkle salt mixture over potatoes, tossing well to coat. Arrange potatoes in a single layer on 2 baking sheets coated with cooking spray. Bake at 425 degrees for 25 minutes. Turn potato wedges over, and rotate pans. Baking an additional 20 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: skillet italian herbed country potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, butter, olive oil, garlic clove, rosemary, sage, thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a large non-stick skillet over medium heat, melt butter and olive oil together. Add the remaining ingredients to the skillet. Stir until potatoes are evenly coated with spice mixture and onion slices are evenly distributed. Cook covered on medium heat for 15 minutes, tossing and turning the potatoes every few minutes. Potatoes will be done when slightly browned and fork-tender. ; name: creamed potatoes as taught to me by my uncle ; ingredients: white potatoes, butter, milk, salt ; preparation:In large pot, boil peeled, and rinsed potatoes, diced with salt added to water. 15 to 20 minutes later, drain well and place in same pot. Beat on medium speed mixer until all lumps are gone from potatoes. Add butter and mix for a minute. Finally, add warmed milk slowly, over low fire, adding a little at a time until right consistency. Stir well over low fire just until hot once more. ; name: dustin s rosemary baked potatoes ; ingredients: baby red potatoes, olive oil, dried rosemary, dried thyme, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees. Cover a baking sheet with parchment paper. Wash and cut potatoes into somewhat uniform chunks. Pat dry. Crush and break rosemary and thyme leaves by hand. Put potatoes, olive oil, rosemary and thyme into a container with a lid and shake well to coat the potatoes. Spread potatoes on baking sheet in a single layer. Salt and pepper to taste. Bake 45 - 60 minutes or until nicely brown, stirring and turning occasionally. ; name: skewered grilled red potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, water, miracle whip, chicken broth, dried oregano, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:Place potatoes and water in 2 quart casserole dish, cover, and microwave on high 12-15 minutes, or until tender, stirring halfway through. Drain. Mix remaining ingredients, stir in potatoes gently. Cover, refrigerate 1 hour. Drain, reserving salad dressing mixture. Arrange potatoes on skewers. Place on grill over hot coals. Grill, covered for 4 minutes. Turn skewers, brush with reserved mixture, grill 4 minutes longer uncovered to crisp outside, covered if soft outside is preferred. ; name: potatoes gourmet ; ingredients: potatoes, cheese, butter, sour cream, green onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes. ; name: herbed potato slices ; ingredients: white potatoes, dried thyme, cumin powder, ground sumac, salt, all-purpose flour, cooking spray, butter ; preparation:

name: doritos taco dip ; ingredients: hamburger, taco seasoning, taco sauce, catalina dressing, mexican cheese, doritos, iceberg lettuce, tomatoes, tortilla chips ; preparation:Brown hamburg. Add taco seasoning according to package. Chill for 2 hours. Add taco sauce, catalina dressing, cheese and bag of crushed doritos. Mix well. Add lettuce and tomatoes. Mix together. Serve cold with your favorite tortilla chips. ; name: beef taco skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato soup, salsa, water, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cook beef in a large skillet until brown. Drain off extra fat. Stir in soup, salsa, water, tortillas and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low and cook for 5 minutes stirring frequently. Top with cheese. ; name: couscous tacos ; ingredients: mexican-style stewed tomatoes, water, onion, taco seasoning mix, couscous, firm tofu, taco shells, lettuce, cheddar cheese, salsa ; preparation:In a medium saucepan combine undrained stewed tomatoes, water, onion, and taco seasoning mix. Bring to a boil. Stir in couscous and tofu. Cover. Remove from heat- let stand for 5 minutes. Spoon couscous mixture into taco shells. Top with lettuce and cheese- serve with salsa. ; name: mexican casserole dinner ; ingredients: ground beef, cooked long-grain rice, tomato soup, green chilies, taco seasoning mix, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, corn chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Cook ground beef, stirring occasionally until brown. Drain off fat. Stir in rice, soup, chilies, and taco seasoning mix. Spoon into 12 x 8-inch baking pan. Top with tomatoes cheese and corn chips. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until heated through. ; name: mexican grilled cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, jalapeno jack cheese, taco seasoning mix, salsa, butter ; preparation:Heat a griddle, sandwich maker, or a skillet over medium heat. In small bowl, mix butter and taco seasoning mix. Spread half of mixture on one side of each piece of bread. Put cheese slices onto bread and top with remaining bread slices. Place the sandwiches, buttered sides down, on hot griddle. Spread top sides with remaining butter mixture. Cook until golden brown on both sides and cheese is melted. Serve with salsa as a dip. ; name: quick taco bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, taco seasoning mix, tomato sauce, whole kernel corn, cheddar cheese, bisquick baking mix, milk, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Cook beef and onion until beef is brown, drain. Spoon into ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking dish. Stir in taco mix, dry, tomato sauce and corn. Sprinkle with cheese. Stir remaining ingredients until blended, pour over beef mixture. Bake 35 minute or until light golden brown. Serve with sour cream, chopped tomato and shredded cheese, if desired. ; name: easy taco casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, salsa, taco seasoning, salad dressing, nacho cheese flavored tortilla chips, colby-monterey jack cheese, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Brown ground beef. Drain. Mix ground beef with salsa, taco seasoning, and salad dressing. Mix well. In a 2-quart baking dish, layer half of the meat mixture, 1 cup of cheese and 1 cup of the tortilla chips. Repeat the layers. Bake, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until heated through and bubbly. Take off cover the last 10 minutes of baking. Top with lettuce and tomato before serving. ; name: mexican hot dish ; ingredients: hamburger, onion, taco seasoning mix, water, tomato paste, cheddar cheese, taco chips ; preparation:

name: carrot potato and onion gratin ; ingredients: butter, russet potatoes, onions, carrot, salt, fresh ground black pepper, chicken stock, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f generously butter a medium-size gratin dish. Make a layer of one-third of the potato slices in the bottom of the prepared gratin dish. Add a layer of half the onions and then half the carrots. Dot with 2 tablespoons of the butter and season well with salt and pepper. Repeat the layers and finish with the remaining one-third of the potato slices. Dot with the remaining 2 tablespoons of butter and season with salt and pepper. Pour in the stock. Cover with aluminum foil and bake until the vegetables are tender, about 45 minutes. Uncover and sprinkle with the cheese. Bake 10 minutes longer, until the cheese is golden brown. Serve very hot. Makes 6 to 8 servings. ; name: green tomatoes veggies ; ingredients: zucchini, green tomatoes, onion, eggplant, sweet red peppers, garlic, olive oil, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare the vegetables. Remove the skin from the head of garlic but do not crush the cloves or chop them. Leave the garlic cloves whole. Heat about 2 to 3 tbsps. Of olive oil on high in a heavy skillet. Add the sweet pepper and onion and garlic and saute for about 3 minutes. Add the remaining vegetables and continue cooking until they are done to your taste. Grind some fresh black pepper over all and stir well. Place in serving platter and sprinkle a small amount of grated parmesan cheese over all. ; name: tomatoe rice ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, vegetable stock, long grain rice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil and butter in saucepan until butter melets in a medium saucepan add the onion and garlic and saut for about 5 minutes or until onion is softened. Add the tomatoes, mix well, cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the stock, rice, salt and pepper, mix well and bring to the boil. Cover and simmer very gently for about 20 minutes. Serve hot or cold. ; name: shrimp tomato coleslaw ; ingredients: baby shrimp, mayonnaise, sherry wine vinegar, onion, celery seed, salt, pepper, coleslaw, grape tomatoes ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk mayonnaise, vinegar, onion, celery seed, salt and pepper until smooth. Add the cabbage, tomatoes and shrimp. Toss well until combined. Cover and refrigeratoe until well chilled. Serve chilled. ; name: scrambled egg and tomato ; ingredients: plum tomato, fresh basil, eggs, water, garlic, olive oil, paprika, pepper, seasoning ; preparation:Combine the tomato and basil and set aside. Beat the egg, water and garlic together. Heat oil, add the egg mixture. Cook and stir gently until the egg is nearly set. Sprinkle with paprika. Add the tomato mixture and the pepper. Cook and stir until the egg is completely set and the tomatoes are heated through. Serve with toast or english muffin. ; name: broccoli saute ; ingredients: broccoli, yellow bell pepper, cherry tomatoes, garlic, olive oil, southwest seasoning ; preparation:In a saucepot, bring 2 inches of water to a boil. Add broccoli. Cover. Cook for 5 minutes, or until broccoli is tender. Place peppers and tomatoes in colander, pour in cooked broccoli and hot water to drain. In skillet over high heat, cook garlic in olive oil 1 minute. Add vegetables and seasoning blend. Cook 2 minutes. Arrange on serving platter. ; name: tomato sauce ii ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, tomatoes, salt & pepper, herbs, sugar, garlic clove ; preparation:Heat some olive oil on medium-low heat. Add finely chopped onions until soft but not golden. Then add one can of tomatoes, or 4 or 5 peeled fresh tomatoes, diced. Season with salt, pepper, and herbs. Add one teaspoonful of sugar and add one or two cloves of garlic, finely chopped. Let it simmer for 5 to 10 minutes, covered, then blend it thoroughly, and let it simmer for at least 30 more minutes. ; name: pearl s tomato gravy ; ingredients: flour, salt & pepper, water, tomatoes, onion, bell pepper, minced fresh garlic cloves ; preparation:

name: rhubarb cream dessert ; ingredients: rhubarb, water, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, sugar, frozen strawberries, vanilla ice cream, whipped cream ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, combine rhubarb and water. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer over medium heat until rhubarb is tender, about 15 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in gelatin and sugar until dissolved. Add frozen strawberries and ice cream. Alow to thaw, stirring occasionally. Pour into indivitual servind dishes. Refrigerate several hours or until firm. Serve with a garnish of whipped cream on top. ; name: strawberry rhubarb white chocolate crisp ; ingredients: rhubarb, sugar-free strawberry gelatin, brown sugar, flour, butter, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place chopped rhubarb in a 13 x 9 cake pan and sprinkle with gelatin. Bake for 20 minutes. While apples are baking, mix the rest of the ingredients. Crumble mixture on top of cooked rhubarb and bake 40 minutes longer. ; name: rhubarb dessert ; ingredients: white cake mix, rhubarb, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert ; preparation:Mix cake mix according to package directions. Put into a greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix the rhubarb, sugar, & jello together. Spoon onto cake mix. Bake according package directions. ; name: rhubarb jam with fruit ; ingredients: rhubarb, granulated sugar, crushed pineapple, maraschino cherry, strawberry gelatin ; preparation:In a large bowl, add the rhubarb and sugar. Stir to coat evenly. Cover the bowl, and place it in the refrigerator overnight. The next morning, place the rhubarb mixture in a large kettle, and bring the mixture to a boil over medium heat. Lower the heat just abit, and gently boil for 15 minutes. Add the crushed pineapple, the chopped maraschino cherries. Cook for an additional 5 minutes. Turn off stove, then add the dry gelatin powder to the kettle. Mix well. Transfer the jam to the sterilized glass jars, and cover with the lids. Cool the jam to room temperature, before storing it in the refrigerator or freezer. ; name: finnish rhubarb berry pudding ; ingredients: rhubarb, white sugar, water, mixed berry, cornstarch ; preparation:In a saucepan over low heat, bring the rhubarb, sugar, and 2 cups of water to a boil. Simmer until rhubarb is soft. Mash the berries and add to the rhubarb. Add the rest of the water. Bring to a boil again and remove from heat. Mix the cornstarch and a bit of water separately. Add to the saucepan and let simmer for a few minutes. Remove from heat and let cool. Serve with a bit of granulated sugar sprinkled on top. ; name: rhubarb chicken ; ingredients: rhubarb, sugar, cornflour, water, lemon juice, chicken quarters, butter, salt, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375 degrees f. Place the cornflour, sugar, rhubarb and water in a saucepan. Mix well then bring to the boil, stirring, over medium heat. Continue to cook for about 2 minutes, until clear and thickened. Remove from the heat, add lemon juice, mix well then set aside to cool. Place chicken in a shallow baking dish. Brush with butter and season with salt. Bake, uncovered for 30 minutes. Remove the chicken from the oven and spoon the rhubarb sauce over the top. Sprinkle with cinnamon and nutmeg, return to oven and continue to cook for a further 20 minutes, basting once or twice during the cooking time. ; name: strawberry rhubarb custard pie ; ingredients: rhubarb, strawberries, white sugar, butter, egg, flour, pie shell, brown sugar ; preparation:Place rhubarb in a bowl and cover with boiling water for about 5 minutes. Meanwhile, with a mixer, mix sugar, egg, butter and flour until smooth. Strain rhubarb well. With wooden spoon, add strawberries and rhubarb to batter and mix. Pour into uncooked pie shell. Mix topping ingredients with a fork, and sprinkle over uncooked pie. Bake at 375 for 50 minutes or until set. Top with whipped cream if desired. ; name: rhubarb fool ; ingredients: rhubarb, water, sugar, sugar-free raspberry gelatin, lite evaporated milk ; preparation:

name: dump macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, butter, eggs, evaporated milk, salt and pepper, dry mustard, paprika ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Mix cooked pasta and all ingredients in a sprayed casserole dish. Sprinkle paprika on top for color if desired. Bake in 350 degree fahrenheit oven for 30 to 45 minutes until done. Serve hot. ; name: old school mac n cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, eggs, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, italian cheese blend, american cheese, milk ; preparation:Boil pasta till half cooked. Drain and pou into lasagna glass casserole dish. Whisk eggs and stir into pasta, also mix in butter. Add in all cheeses and pour in milk stir around good. Cook for 1 hour in 350 degree oven until it looks like it getting crispy on top. ; name: kfc macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, velveeta cheese, cheddar cheese, whole milk, salt ; preparation:In a pot bring water to a boil with salt to taste, once the water comes to a boil add the macaroni and cook for 12 to 15 minutes. When the noodles are cooked drain but do not rinse. To make the cheese sauce in a pan over low heat combine the velveeta cheese, shredded cheddar and the milk. Cook the cheeses till they are melted and then add the salt. Add the noodles and mix through. Place in a casserole dish and bake at 400 degrees for 10 to 15 minutes. You may want to broil the top to make a brown top. ; name: macaroni n cheese soup ; ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, broccoli, onion, water, milk, condensed cheddar cheese soup, cooked ham, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook macaroni according to package directions, drain and set aside. Combine broccoli, onion, and water in saucepan. Bring to a boil, cook 2 minutes. Do not drain. Stir in cooked macaroni, packet of cheese sauce,, milk, cheese soup, ham, salt, and pepper. Return to a boil, stirring occasionally. Ladle soup into 6 bowls. ; name: buttermilk mac n cheese ; ingredients: eggs, cheddar cheese, buttermilk, butter, salt, elbow macaroni ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat the eggs. Stir in the cheese, buttermilk, butter and salt. Add the cooked macaroni and mix well. Pour into a greased 13 inches x 9 inch x 2 inch baking dish. Bake uncovered, at 350 degrees, for 45-50 minutes or until a thermoneter reads 160 degrees. ; name: four cheese macaroni ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, milk, butter, white pepper, salt, american cheese, sharp cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, ricotta cheese, crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree f. In a large pot cook macaroni according to package directions. Drain. Return to pot. Add milk, melted butter, pepper, and salt. Stir in cheeses. Transfer to a greased 2-quart casserole. Bake, uncovered, for 15 minutes. Carefully stir mixture. Sprinkle with crushed crackers. Bake 5 minutes more or until crackers are browned and mixture is just heated through. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. ; name: super creamy and cheesy mac and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, milk, flour, salt and pepper, butter, cheese ; preparation:Cook the macaroni and set aside. In a pot, melt the butter and mix in salt and pepper. Slowly add in the flour, stirring continuously. Gradually add the milk and stir the mixture until smooth. Add the cheese on a low heat and melt into the mixture. Once the mixture is at your desired consistency, mix in the drained macaroni. ; name: slow cooked macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, butter, eggs, evaporated milk, condensed cheddar cheese soup, milk, cheddar cheese, paprika ; preparation:

name: spinach cucumber salad with yogurt dressing ; ingredients: lemon juice, honey, yogurt, olive oil, of fresh mint, salt and pepper, baby spinach leaves, cucumbers, red onion ; preparation:Whisk the lemon juice and honey in a bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk the yogurt and olive oil together. Whisk while adding the yogurt to the lemon juice in a thin stream. Add the mint, then add the salt and pepper to taste. Cover and chill the dressing for up to 24 hours. Combine the spinach, cucumbers and onion in a large bowl. Season with a little salt and pepper. Add just enough dressing to moisten the salad. Toss to coat, and serve with extra dressing on the side. ; name: oriental cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, salt, chili, rice vinegar, sesame oil, soy sauce, sugar ; preparation:Place cucumbers in bowl. Add salt, toss and chill 1 hour. Drain cucumbers and return to bowl. Combine remaining ingredients in another bowl. Pour over cucumbers and toss to coat. Can be prepared 1 day ahead and refrigerated. ; name: cucumber raita ; ingredients: cucumber, plain yogurt, ground cumin, cayenne, ground pepper ; preparation:Shred the cucumber with a hand grater. Squeeze out extra water with your hands. Mix all ingredients together, and refrigerate at least 8 hours to bring out the flavors. Mix again before serving. You can use fresh cilantro or parsley as a garnish. ; name: yogurt apple salad ; ingredients: red delicious apple, golden delicious apples, seedless raisin, celery, cheddar cheese, macadamia nuts, orange, juice of, vanilla yogurt, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine apples, raisins, celery, cheddar cheese, and nuts. In a small bowl, blend orange juice into yogurt. Pour over salad and toss well. Sprinkle cinnamon on top. May eat salad then or chill for an hour. ; name: funky fruit salad ; ingredients: plain yogurt, vanilla bean, sugar, cantaloupe, fresh strawberries, dates, bittersweet chocolate ; preparation:Drain yogurt in cheesecloth lined colander for 2 hours. When drained, combine in a medium bowl with vanilla seeds & sugar. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to blend. Combine fruit in a large bowl. To serve, spoon yogurt over individual servings of fruit & grate chocolate over the top. ; name: mexican layered fruit salad ; ingredients: sweet apple, papaya, banana, pineapple, nonfat vanilla yogurt, unsweetened coconut, walnuts, honey ; preparation:Chill all fruit before preparing the salad. Cut the fruit and assemble the salad just before serving. Layer the fruits in the order listed. Spread the yogurt over the top of the salad. Sprinkle evenly with coconut and nuts. Drizzle with honey. Serve right away. ; name: cucumber salad swedish style ; ingredients: cucumbers, salt, sugar, white vinegar ; preparation:Wash cucumbers, dry off and remove the ends. Score the skins with the tines if a fork, dragging it the length of the cuke. Repeat all the way around. Slice cucumbers very, very thin. Place in a bowl. Sprinkle with salt and sugar. Add vinegar and press slightly with back of a spoon. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Keeps well in a covered jar. The end result is similar to an uncooked pickle. ; name: yogurt salad ; ingredients: nonfat plain yogurt, cucumber, mint, salt, cumin, paprika, sugar, cayenne ; preparation:

name: cheesy broccoli noodle soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chicken broth, fine egg noodles, frozen chopped broccoli, salt, garlic powder, fresh ground pepper, milk, american cheese ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large saucepan. Add onion and saute over medium heat till onions are golden. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add salt and noodles. Cook uncovered for about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in broccoli and garlic powder and cook for another 4 minutes. Add milk, cheese and pepper stirring constantly until the cheese is melted. ; name: healthy cheesy broccoli casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, flour, low-fat milk, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, mustard, dried onion flakes, reduced-fat cheese, broccoli, corn flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Stir the flour, milk, chicken broth, mustard, and onion flakes in a glass baking dish. Microwave on high for 4-6 minutes, stirring well every 2 minutes until the cream sauce is thick and bubbly. While cooking the cream sauce, steam the broccoli for about 4 minutes.
