Mix the cheese into the cream sauce. Put the broccoli and diced chicken in a 9 x 13 pan. Pour the cheese sauce over the top. Mix the cornflakes and parmesan together, and pour over the top. Broil until golden brown. ; name: cheesy chicken and rice bake ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, water, white rice, onion powder, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cheddar cheese, salt & pepper ; preparation:Mix soup, water, rice, onion powder and black pepper in 2-qt shallow baking dish. Top with chicken. Sprinkle chicken with additional pepper & salt. Cover and bake at 375 for 45 min or until chicken is no longer pink and rice is done. Uncover and sprinkle cheese over chicken. ; name: cheesy rice and broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli florets, chicken broth, minute white rice, cheese ; preparation:Place broccoli and broth in medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in rice, cover. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Stir in cheese, cover. Let stand 5 minutes. Stir until cheese is melted. ; name: chicken breasts with broccoli cheese ; ingredients: unsalted butter, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, broccoli cheese soup, water, ground pepper, broccoli florets ; preparation:In a skillet, over medium heat, melt the butter, then add the chicken breasts & cook 10 minutes, browning the meat on both sides. Spoon off any fat. In a medium bowl, combine the soup, water & pepper & pour this soup mixture into the skillet with the breasts. Heat to boiling, then add the broccoli & reduce the heat to low. Cover & simmer, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until chicken is fork-tender & the broccoli is done. ; name: easy cheesy broccoli soup ; ingredients: frozen cut broccoli in cheese sauce, margarine, onion, flour, parsley flakes, instant chicken bouillon, garlic powder, water, milk ; preparation:Place unopened broccoli pouch in vigorously boiling water in saucepan. Do not cover. Bring water to a second vigorous boil and heat for 16 minutes. Meanwhile, in medium saucepan, melt margarine. Saute onion in margarine until tender. Stir in flour, parsley flakes, bouillon and garlic powder until well blended. Add water and milk. Cook until thickened, stirring constantly. Stir in broccoli. ; name: chicken broccoli cheese casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, french fried onion rings ; preparation:Cut up chicken into small pieces and cook throughly. You may want to spice up the chicken with the spices of your choice in a bowl, mix the cream of celery, cream of mushroom and mayo together. Empty the bag of broccoli into a rectangular casserole dish. Spread the cooked chicken evenly over the broccoli. Spread the cream of celery, mushroom and mayo mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese evenly over the entire casserole. Cook at 350 for 30-35 minutes. Sprinkle the french onion toppings over the cheese and cook for another 5 mins. ; name: cheesy chicken and broccoli ; ingredients: oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, water, milk, dijonnaise mustard, leek soup mix, frozen broccoli florets, cheddar cheese, roasted red pepper, cooked rice ; preparation:

name: mediterranean cod ; ingredients: cod, olive oil, red onion, plum tomatoes, black olives, dried thyme, dried basil ; preparation:Rinse fish, pat dry with paper towels. Season fish with salt and pepper to taste. In a large skillet heat 4 tsp of the oil over medium high heat. Add fish and onion. Cook 1 minute, turning once. Top fish with tomatoes, olives and thyme. Reduce heat. Cover and cook 2 minutes. Drizzle with remaining 4tsp oil, sprinkle with basil. Cover and cook 2-3 minutes more or until fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: roasted cod with prosciutto cherry tomatoes and olives ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, pitted black olives, capers, lemon, juice and rind of, thyme, extra virgin olive oil, cod fish fillets, prosciutto, salt and pepper, basil leaves ; preparation:Combine the tomatoes, olives, capers, lemon rind, thyme and oil in a roasting pan and season with salt and pepper. Fit the cod fillets into the pan, spooning some of the tomato mixture over the fish. Scatter the ham over the top and roast in a preheated oven, 425 degrees f, for 15 minutes. Remove the pan from the oven, drizzle over the lemon juice, cover with foil and let rest for 5 minutes. Garnish the cod with basil leaves and serve with new potatoes and a green salad. ; name: roasted cod with potatoes and olives ; ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, olive oil, salt and pepper, cod fish fillets, cherry tomatoes, kalamata olive ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450f. On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes with the garlic, rosemary, and 1 tbs oil. Season generously with salt and pepper. Arrange potatoes in a single layer, cut side down. Bake, tossing potatoes once, until beginning to brown, about 20 minute. Meanwhile, rub fillets with remaining tsp oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Remove baking sheet from the oven. Add the tomatoes and olives to the potatoes. Stir to combine. Push the vegetable mixture to one side of the baking sheet and place the fillets flat on the baking sheet next to the vegetables. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast until the fish is cooked through and potatoes are brown and tender, about 15-20 minute. Transfer the fish and vegetables to a serving platter and serve immediately. ; name: easy oven baked cod ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, lemon, zest of, coarse salt, cod fish fillets, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f line your pan with aluminum foil and lightly brush with olive oil, or use a bit of cooking spray. Combine parsley, garlic, lemon zest, and coarse salt on the cutting board. Finely chop, then combine with the breadcrumbs in a shallow plate. Brush top of each fillet with olive oil. Press fillet into the crumb mixture. Place fillets in baking dish, crust-side up. Bake until firm, about 12-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of the fish. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: cod portuguese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, chopped tomatoes, paprika, orange, juice of, cod fish fillets, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy fry pan and saute the onion, garlic and pepper for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, paprika and orange juice. Season, stir well and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Lay the fish fillets on top, cutting them to fit the pan if necessary. Season lightly, cover and simmer gently for 12-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked but still firm. Transfer to serving dishes and sprinkle with parsley. Serve. ; name: cod with miso glaze ; ingredients: yellow miso, rice vinegar, sugar, soy sauce, cayenne pepper, vegetable oil, cod fish fillets ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Blend miso, vinegar, sugar, soy sauce and cayenne pepper in food processor. With machine running, gradually pour in oil and blend until smooth. Place cod in a large bowl and pour half of miso mixture over fish, toss to coat and transfer to a rimmed baking sheet. Broil cod about 8 inches from heat until beginning to brown, about 3 minutes, reduce heat to 450 degrees and finish baking, about 5 minutes more. When fish is opaque, remove from oven and serve drizzled with remaining half of miso mixture. ; name: spicy cod with tomatoes and spinach ; ingredients: cod, frozen chopped spinach, chopped tomatoes, tomatoes and green chilies, onion, shallots, garlic, tomato paste, cumin, olive oil ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium high heat. Add the onions, shallots, and garlic. Cook until the onion is translucent. Add all the tomatoes, the tomato paste, and the cumin. Stir and let it simmer 3-5 minutes or until it starts to thicken slightly. Add the spinach and stir until it is combined. Let it cook 2-3 minutes. Meanwhile chop the cod into small even pieces. Add it to the tomato sauce, stirring to make sure it is all covered with sauce. Let it simmer 5-8 minutes or until the fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. ; name: baked cod with tomato olive tapenade ; ingredients: cod fish fillet, extra virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, shallot, cherry tomatoes, black olives, capers, fresh oregano, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: chicken with spiced yogurt ; ingredients: yogurt, ground cardamom, fresh ginger, onion, olive oil, chicken, salt and pepper, blanched almond ; preparation:Mix the yogurt, cardamon and ginger together in a bowl, and set aside whilst you cook the chicken. Heat the oil in a large skillet, fry the onion until soft. Add the chicken pieces and saute until the onions are golden and the chicken pieces lightly browned. Add the salt, pepper and a cup of water and cook over a low heat-20 minutes for the quarters, less for breasts. The chicken should be tender and the sauce reduced. Keep turning the chicken pieces, and add a little water if the sauce reduces too much. Remove from the heat, stir in the yoghurt mix, and serve sprinkled with the almonds. ; name: english muffin chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, plain yogurt, dijon mustard, english muffins, parmesan cheese, parsley, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Season chicken with salt and pepper. Combine yogurt and mustard. Marinate chicken in mixture for about 20 minutes. Combine crushed muffins, cheese, parsley and pepper. Remove chicken from yogurt mixture shaking off excess. Dredge chicken in english muffin crumbs. Place breaded chicken on cookie sheet and bake at 450 degrees for about 25 minutes. Chicken will be golden brown. ; name: chicken with ginger ; ingredients: fresh ginger, canola oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, onion, garlic cloves, soy sauce, white vinegar, sugar, scallion ; preparation:Soak ginger in cold water 10 minutes. Drain. Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Brown chicken in two batches, 6 to 8 minutes. Set aside. In same skillet over medium heat, cook ginger, onion, and garlic, stirring until browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add soy sauce, vinegar, and sugar. Cook over high heat until thick, 3 to 4 minutes. Add chicken. Stir to warm. Remove from heat. Stir in scallions. ; name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: chicken with veggies in sour cream sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, boneless chicken breasts, garlic, cashews, red bell pepper, snow peas, chicken broth, sour cream, dijon mustard, honey ; preparation:In a large cast iron skillet or wok, heat oil over medium-high. Add chicken and garlic - cook for about 4 minutes. Add cashews, bell pepper and snow peas - cook until tender, about 2 minutes. Add chicken broth, reduce heat and simmer for 8-10 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Move chicken and vegetables to a bowl and keep warm. Whisk in sour cream, dijon and honey to juices in skillet and heat only until warmed through. Pour sauce over chicken mixture and toss to combine. Serve over rice, noodles or mashed potatoes. ; name: baked chicken and rice with honey mustard sauce ; ingredients: long-grain white rice, whole chickens, hot chicken broth, plain nonfat yogurt, honey, dijon mustard, soy sauce, ground ginger, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spread rice in a lightly sprayed or oiled 13x9 inch glass baking dish. Arrange chicken on top. Pour broth over. Cover tightly with foil. Bake 45 minutes. In a bowl, whisk together the yogurt, honey, mustard, soy sauce, ginger, salt, and pepper. Uncover baking dish. Spread yogurt mixture over chicken. Bake, uncovered, until rice is tender and chicken is no longer pink in the center, about 15 minutes longer. ; name: yogurt mint marinated chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, coarse salt, fresh lemon juice, plain low-fat yogurt, of fresh mint, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, garam masala, chili powder ; preparation:Rinse chicken under cold water. Place in a large bowl and rub with salt and lemon juice. Set aside. Blend remaining ingredients. Toss well to mix and then coat chicken. Seal bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 24 hours. Preheat oven to 400 f. Place chicken on a foil-lined baking sheet and bake for 35 minutes. ; name: yogurt baked chicken ; ingredients: plain yogurt, dijon mustard, garlic, ground ginger, salt and pepper, boneless chicken breasts ; preparation:

name: sweet potatoes with mushrooms onion and thyme ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, sweet onion, white button mushrooms, extra virgin olive oil, fresh thyme leaves, salt & fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Heat the oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange the sweet potatoes, onion, and mushrooms in a large roasting pan or baking dish, about 13 x 9. Drizzle evenly with olive oil, sprinkle with thyme, salt and pepper, and stir to coat vegetables. Roast vegetables until golden and tender, turning occasionally with a spatula, about 45 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: chili roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, sugar, chili powder, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: sweet potato mash with caramelised onions ; ingredients: onions, oil, sweet potato, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Peel onions, cut in half and finely slice so you have half moon shaped circles. Put into a medium frypan and drizzle with oil and massage the oil in to break up the half rings. Cover frypan and cook over a low to moderate heat giving a stir occasionally until a nice golden colour, the longer you take the sweeter the onion will be. Put sweet potatoes in a pot of cold water and season with a little salt and bring to the boil and cook till tender. When potatoes are cook, drain and give a good shake, put in butter and mash till you get the consistency you like. Add your caramelised onions and mix in well and season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes potatoes and carrots ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, potatoes, baby carrots, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, oregano, rosemary, bulb of garlic, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and cut in bite size pieces all the vegetable. Peel and squash the garlic but do not cut it. Mix the vegetables, garlic and all remaining. Ingredients. Spread on a parchemin lined pan. Broil until nice and golden about half an hour. ; name: roasted caraway potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, onions, olive oil, caraway seed, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine first 2 ingredients in a large heavy duty zip-top plastic bag. Mix together remaining ingredients and pour into plastic bag. Shake well to coat. Place potato mixture in an ungreased 13x9 inch pan. Bake at 400 degrees for 1 hour or until potatoes are tender, stirring occasionally. ; name: sweet potato gravy ; ingredients: flour, onions, garlic, pecan pieces, water, salt, cayenne pepper, sweet potato ; preparation:Make a dark brown roux, about 3 minutes. Add the onions and saute for 5 minutes, or until wilted. Stir in the garlic, pecans and water. Season with salt and cayenne. Bring the liquid to a boil. Add the sweet potatoes and blend to make the sauce smooth. Stir in the cane syrup and green onions. ; name: roasted potatoes peppers and onions with rosemary ; ingredients: baking potatoes, sweet red pepper, sweet green pepper, onions, garlic, olive oil, fresh rosemary, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Arrange the potatoes and the red and green peppers alternately in a spoke pattern in a shallow, 12-inch round baking dish. Pile the onions in the center. Scatter the garlic over the top. Drizzle with oil, and sprinkle with rosemary, salt and black pepper. Bake in the preheated oven until the vegetables are lightly golden and tender, or about 45 minutes. Garnish with fresh rosemary sprigs. ; name: sweet potatoes with caramelized onion ; ingredients: olive oil, spanish onion, fresh thyme leaves, sweet potatoes, butter, low-fat sour cream, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:

name: baked seafood dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, green onion, white wine, seafood, swiss cheese, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place cream cheese in a medium sized mixing bowl. Saute onions in butter until softened. Add onions, seafood, wine and swiss cheese to cream cheese. Stir until combined. Spread into a greased 2 quart baking dish and top with cheddar cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes until bubbly and golden brown. ; name: buffalo chicken cheese dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, ranch salad dressing, buffalo wing sauce, shredded cheddar cheese, cooked chicken ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f place cream cheese into deep dish plate and microwave 1 minute to soften. Whisk in salad dressing, wing sauce, and cheese into softened cream cheese until smooth. Stir in cooked chicken. Bake 20 mins or until mixture is heated through. Stir. Serve with crackers or veggies or whatever you like. ; name: red pepper cheddar dip ; ingredients: sharp white cheddar cheese, cream cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise, roasted red pepper, tabasco sauce, bacon, scallion, salt and pepper ; preparation:Blend all ingredients, excepts the bacon and scallions in a food processor until fairly smooth. Saute the bacon until crispy and drain. Reserve some of the bacon to use as a garnish, the stir the rest into the the cheese mixture. Chill for at least 1 hour. Just before serving, garnish with remaining bacon and scallions. Serve with favorite bread sticks, veggies, toasted baguettes, etc. ; name: creamy chicken dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, worcestershire sauce, parmesan cheese, chicken ; preparation:In a mixing bowl beat cream cheese, sour cream, and worcestershire sauce until creamy. Fold in parmesan cheese and chicken. Pour into pie plate sprayed with pam. Liberally sprinkle more parmesan on top. Bake at 375 degrees for 30 minutes. Serve hot with crackers. ; name: party chicken dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, white chicken meat, seasoning salt, onion, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together except for the parmesan cheese. Spread mixture in a shallo, medium-sized, ovenproof dish. Sprinkle the parmesan cheese on top. Bake, uncovered, at 375 degrees for about 30 minutes. Serve warm with crackers along side. ; name: hot faux crab dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, albacore tuna in water, mayonnaise, old bay seasoning, garlic, onion ; preparation:Mix all. Pour into a heatproof dish and top with breadcrumbs or cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 15 to 20 minutes or until bubbly. Serve with crackers or thin slices of french bread. ; name: chive egg dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, hard-boiled eggs, chives, sweet peppers ; preparation:In a small bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth. Gradually beat in milk and mayonnaise until blended. Add the mustard, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper. Stir in eggs and chives. Mix well. Serve with peppers or crackers. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: cream cheese tuna dip ; ingredients: milk, cream cheese, mayonnaise, green onion, prepared horseradish, red pepper sauce, worcestershire sauce, tuna, paprika ; preparation:

name: peach and raspberry cobbler ; ingredients: frozen peaches, frozen raspberries, flour, sugar, baking powder, cinnamon, eggs, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix peaches and raspberries, and place in bottom of 3 qt casserole dish. Using fork, stir together flour, sugar, baking powder and cinnamon. Stir in eggs using fork. Batter will be quite dry. Pour over top of fruit. Pour melted butter of top. Place in oven and cook for 1 hour. ; name: peach crumb cobbler ; ingredients: fresh peaches, sugar, lemon juice, of fresh mint, cornstarch, orange juice, all-purpose flour, light brown sugar, cinnamon, soy margarine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Spray 9-inch square deep-dish pie plate with non-stick oil. In a mixing bowl, combine peaches, sugar, lemon juice, and mint. Mix cornstarch and orange juice. Let rest 15 minutes, then mix into peaches. Pour peach mixture into prepared pie plate. Mix flour with brown sugar and cinnamon. Use a pastry cutter to cut margarine into flour until mixture resembles course crumbs. Sprinkle over peaches. Bake 45 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: nobody will guess peach cobbler ; ingredients: fresh peaches, sugar, flour, egg, butter, white bread ; preparation:Place the fruit in a buttered 8 x 8 inch baking dish. Cut each slice of bread into five stripe. Place the strips onto the fruit. In a separate bowl, mix the sugar, flour, egg, and melted butter. Pour this mixture evenly over the bread and fruit. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: easy peach cobbler crisp ; ingredients: peaches, all-purpose flour, white sugar, brown sugar, salt, nutmeg, cinnamon, butter, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Butter a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Spread both cans drained peaches into the baking pan. Mix together flour, white and brown sugar, salt, nutmeg and cinnamon in a large bowl until well combined. Add in cold butter pieces and mix until the consistancy of peas. Sprinkle the crumbs over the peaches in the baking dish. Bake for about 25-30 minutes or until golden brown. Cool slightly then serve warm with ice cream. ; name: lea s peach pie cobbler ; ingredients: peaches, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, dry tapioca, butter, cinnamon sugar ; preparation:Drain peaches, reserving 1 cup of syrup for recipe. Combine peaches, syrup, cinnamon, nutmeg & tapioca in large sauce pan. Bring mixture to a boil, and boil for one minute. Remove from heat and cool. Prepare 9x13 pan lined with pie crust. Prepare lattice topping for cobbler. Place peach mixture in crust lined pan. Dot mixture with butter portions, spaced evenly. Arrange lattice topping, crimping into top edge of crust. Sprinkle crust with cinnamon-sugar mixture for color. Place, uncovered, in 450f oven for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 400f and bake 60 minutes, or until golden brown. ; name: blueberry peach cobblers for 2 ; ingredients: phyllo dough, peach, blueberries, splenda sugar substitute, cinnamon, sugar, margarine, non-fat vanilla yogurt ; preparation:Preheat toaster oven or conventional oven to 350f. Spray small casserole dish or two ramekins with nonstick spray. Place sliced peaches and berries in bottom, then top with 1 teaspoon of splenda. Top each dish with a quarter of phyllo dough, spritz briefly with margarine. Top with remaining dough. Spritz with spray again, then sprinkle sugar and cinnamon over the top. Bake 20 minutes, until phyllo dough is crispy and slightly browned. Top with yogurt if desired. ; name: hardee s peach cobbler copycat ; ingredients: peach pie filling, frozen pie crust, butter, cinnamon, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Spread the pie filling into a square baking pan. Put the slices of butter on top of the pie filling, placing them as evenly as possible. Carefully remove the pie crust from the pan it is in, and place it carefully on top of the pie filling and butter. You will need to cut off the edges that hang over and make them fit on the square pan. Sprinkle liberally with cinnamon and sugar. Bake for about 20 to 25 minutes, until pie crust is lightly browned. Serve with a scoop of vanilla ice cream. ; name: peach pineapple blackberry cobbler ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, frozen blackberrie, peach slices, yellow cake mix, pecans, sugar, butter ; preparation:

name: wannabe eggs benedict ; ingredients: egg, laughing cow light swiss cheese, english muffin, canadian bacon ; preparation:Lightly fry egg on both sides, about 2-3 minutes each side, in a nonstick skillet. The yolk should be somewhat runny, or to your taste. Warm canadian bacon in microwave about 5 seconds on each side. Toast the english muffin. Spread the cheese on the english muffin. Top with canadian bacon and egg. Season with salt, if desired. ; name: greek eggs benedict open faced egg sandwich ; ingredients: english muffins, cheddar cheese, eggs, black pepper, feta cheese ; preparation:Halve your english muffins so there are four slices. Break up the 2 deli slices cheddar cheese and divide them among the four slices. Broil the english muffins with cheese until cheese is melted and the top of the bread is slightly brown, remove when done. In the meantime, cook eggs over easy so the whites are cooked, but the yolks are still runny. Place the over easy eggs on the english muffins with cheese, add a turn or two of freshly ground black pepper and feta cheese to taste. Serve with fork and knife. The runny eggs serve as kind of a sauce and the pepper and feta add a nice flavor to this quick breakfast. ; name: egg muffin sandwich ; ingredients: english muffin, egg, light cheese, bacon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Toast the english muffin. In a microwaveable cup roughly the same diameter of the muffin, add the egg, a tablespoon of water. Beat the egg, add the bacon. Microwave on high for 1 to 2 minutes while muffin is toasting. Assemble the muffin and let stand for a few minutes to melt the cheese. ; name: individual cheesy bacon wrapped eggs ; ingredients: bacon, butter, cheddar cheese, eggs, black pepper, salt, english muffins, salsa ; preparation:Set oven to 350 degrees. Set oven rack to second-lowest position. Spray inside of each muffin tin with cooking spray. In a skillet cook the bacon slices over medium heat until brown but still flexible. Wrap 1 slice of bacon around the inside of each muffin cup. Drizzle about 2 teaspoons melted butter into the inside of each cup. Sprinkle about 1 tablespoons grated cheese over the melted butter, then crack 1 egg over the cheese. Season the egg with black pepper and a little salt. Bake for about 10-15 minutes. Remove then top with another tablespoon of grated cheese on top of the egg. Return to oven until the cheese has melted and the egg is cooked. ; name: egg salad on english muffin ; ingredients: eggs, onion, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, salt, chives, english muffins, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, salad leaves ; preparation:Finely chop boiled eggs. Mix in chopped onion, dijon mustard, mayonnaise, chive, salt pepper to taste. If you like more runny texture you can add 1tbsp. Water. Spoon egg salad on lightly toasted english muffin. Top with cherry tomatoes, cucumber and salad leaves. ; name: mayonnaise muffins ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, mayonnaise, milk ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a small mixing bowl. Add mayonnaise and milk, stirring with a fork until dry ingredients are moistened. Spoon into lightly greased muffin pans, filling three-fourths full. Bake at 450 for 10 to 12 minutes, or till golden brown. Serve warm with butter. ; name: scrambled egg and bacon sandwich ; ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, egg, water, salt and pepper, bacon ; preparation:Slice the 2 slices bacon in half and cook to a crisp. Drain on paper towel, and pour drippings out of pan. Whip egg with water, add salt and pepper and scramble eggs in same pan in which the bacon was cooked. Remove egg to cool. After bread has toasted, spread with mayo and layer on eggs and bacon. Slice and serve with favorite breakfast beverage. ; name: eggs benedict sort of for 2 ; ingredients: english muffins, canadian bacon, swiss cheese, eggs, milk, black pepper, cayenne pepper, hollandaise sauce ; preparation:

name: roasted potatoes with sage and garlic ; ingredients: small potatoes, flour, oil, garlic cloves, sage leaf, unsalted butter, kosher salt, fresh pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f and place a large, heavy skillet or roasting pan in the oven to heat. Place the potatoes in a large saucepan and cover with cold salted water. Put on high heat to boil. Once boiling, lower heat and simmer for 5 minutes. Drain the potatoes well, and place on paper towels. Put the flour on a plate. When the potatoes are dry, roll them in the flour to coat. Remove the hot skillet from the oven and add the oil and potatoes. Roast, shaking the pan occasionally until the potatoes are golden brown all over, about 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and add the garlic, sage and butter. Return to the oven for one minute. Season generously with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: chicken rosemary ; ingredients: sweet white wine, dried rosemary, vegetable oil, fresh mushrooms, salt and pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:In small bowl, combine wine and rosemary. Let stand at room temperture for 2 hours. Heat oil in lg skillet. Saute mushrooms until lightly browned. Remove from skillet. Salt and pepper the chicken. Cook chicken until browned on both sides. Add a little more oil if necessary. Return mushrooms to skillet. Add wine and rosemary mixture. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. ; name: rosemary roasted chicken with potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, paprika, rosemary, garlic, black pepper, salt, chicken breast halves, small red potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Line 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil and spray with no-stick cooking spray. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: pan roasted chicken and veggies ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt, black pepper, dried rosemary, boneless skinless chicken thighs, fresh spinach ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475f. In large roasting pan, combine potatoes, onion, garlic, oil, salt, pepper and rosemary and toss to coat. Roast veggies 25 minutes, stirring once. Lightly salt and pepper chicken and add, tossing to coat and roast 15 minutes longer or until chicken is done. Place spinach over chicken mixture and roast for 5 minutes longer or until spinach wilts. Toss before serving. ; name: baked chicken with onions garlic rosemary ; ingredients: chicken parts, salt, pepper, onions, garlic, olive oil, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Position oven rack in center of oven. Preheat to 400f degrees. Rinse chicken parts& pat dry. Season liberally with salt& pepper. In a large bowl, toss together onion rings, garlic, oil& rosemary. Spread half of the onion mixture in a shallow baking dish or roasting pan just large enough to hold the chicken pieces in a single layer. Arrange the chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Drizzle with an additional 2 tbsp olive oil. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes. ; name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: garlic broiled chicken ; ingredients: garlic, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:Combine all of the ingredients for the sauce in a small bowl. Brush over the chicken. Broil the chicken for 10 minutes each side, 2 inches or so from the heat. Brush frequently with the sauce. Serves 1-2 people. ; name: garlic and sage chicken and potato saute ; ingredients: oil, butter, fresh sage leaves, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, small red potato, salt and pepper, chicken broth, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: steakhouse au gratin potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, unsalted butter, gruyere, half-and-half, kosher salt, cracked black pepper, thyme, nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375 degrees. Peel and dice the potatoes. I have a vegetable chopper from williams-sonoma and this step only takes 5 minutes. Parboil the potatoes 5 minutes in salty water. Either spray a large baking dish with oil or rub it lightly with butter. Drain and then toss the potatoes in the baking dish with the butter, thyme, nutmeg, more salt and pepper. Mix almost all the cheese throughout the potatoes and pour the half & half evenly over all. Top the dish with the reserved cheese. Bake for one hour or until the cheese is nicely melted, bubbling and turning a caramel color. ; name: awesome au gratin potatoes ; ingredients: condensed cheddar cheese soup, cheddar cheese, milk, ground black pepper, garlic clove, baking potatoes, fresh parmesan cheese, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Lightly spray baking dish with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine soup, cheddar cheese, milk and black pepper. Add garlic and potatoes to soup mixture. Mix well. Spoon potatoes into baking dish. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and paprika. Cover with foil. Bake 1 hour. Remove foil. Bake and additional 15-20 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: new potato gratin ; ingredients: new potatoes, dried cilantro, dry mustard, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Layer half of potatoes in a buttered shallow casserole. Combine cilantro, ground mustard, salt and pepper. Sprinkle half of spice mixture over potatoes. Layer remaining potatoes on top and sprinkle with rest of spice mix. Top with cheese and slowly pour cream over potatoes. Bake for 45 to 50 minutes or until potatoes are soft and top is golden brown. ; name: potato au gratin bordeaux region ; ingredients: potatoes, cream, milk, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, butter ; preparation:Peel and slice the potatoes about 3-5mm thick. Add to a saucepan and cover with water, bring to the boil and reduce to a simmer for 7- 10minutes, they should be just cooked. Grease a 25x25 cm square baking dish with butter. Well drain the potatoes and pour into the dish, let cool for 20 minutes. In a bowl, mix the other ingredients in and pour over the almost cold potatoes. More butter can be dotted over the top if desired. Bake at 180oc for 25 minutes. ; name: gruyere potato gratin ; ingredients: potatoes, gruyere, onions, garlic, butter, heavy cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Boil whole potatoes for 10 minutes. Remove from heat and allow to cool to room temperature. In the meantime, saut onions and garlic in butter until they are soft and translucent. Layer potato slices and onions in a 9 x 9 baking dish. Pour cream over the potatoes. Season to taste and sprinkle gruyere over the whole shebang. Bake 4050 minutes or until golden. ; name: vegetables au gratin ; ingredients: potatoes, courgette, aubergine, tomatoes, single cream, vegetable stock cube, salt and pepper, chives, jarlsberg cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c and grease an oven proof dish. Bring the cream to the boil, add the stock cube and stir to dissolve. Add salt, pepper and chives. Blend in half the grated jarlsberg until it melts and the sauce is smooth. Layer all the vegetables in the dish and pour in the sauce. Sprinkle the remaining grated cheese on top. Bake in mid oven for 30 - 45 minutes. ; name: duchess potatoes au gratin ; ingredients: potatoes, water, margarine, eggs, salt, onion powder, fresh ground black pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, half-and-half cream, cooking spray ; preparation:Cook potatoes in water in a large sauce pan until tender. Drain and mash. Mix remaining ingredients, in a large bowl. Add to potatoes. Whip smooth with a hand mixer. Pipe onto a greased baking sheet using a large star. Spray with cooking spray for a crispier crust if desired. Bake in 425 f oven for about 20 minutes until. ; name: bill knapp s au gratin potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, flour, milk, salt, pepper, paprika, instant chicken bouillon granules, velveeta cheese ; preparation:

name: special green bean casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, sugar, pepper, onion, sour cream, french style green beans, swiss cheese, corn flakes ; preparation:Saute onion in butter. Add flour, salt, sugar and pepper. Mix in sour cream, beans and cheese. Pour into 9x13 baking dish. Top with cornflakes. Bake at 400 degrees for 20 minutes. ; name: another green bean casserole ; ingredients: green beans, onion, cream of mushroom soup, velveeta cheese, french-fried onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place the green beans and onion in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil then lower temperature and simmer until about half of the liquid has evaporated. To the saucepan with the beans and liquid add the mushroom soup, cheese, salt and pepper. Continue to simmer on low until the cheese melts. After the cheese melts taste to see if it needs more cheese if so add now, if not pour the mixture into a greased baking dish and cover and bake on 350 for 30 minutes or until bubbly. Uncover and sprinkle french fried onions on top and place back in oven and bake until browned. Let stand about 3 minutes before serving. ; name: green bean casserole with onions ; ingredients: cut green beans, skim milk, white onions, cream of mushroom soup, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a medium casserole dish mix together green beans, milk, cream of mushroom soup, and onions. Sprinkle with black pepper and stir. Bake for 25 minutes in the oven until heated through and bubbly. Sprinkle with french fried onions over the tops and return to oven for 5 minutes. ; name: beefy green bean casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, bread, milk, celery, onion, low-sodium worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, green beans, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:Soak bread in milk, then add to ground beef along with celery, onion, worcestershire sauce, salt, and pepper. Shape into small balls. Bake in a 325-degree fahrenheit oven until brown. Drain grease from meatballs. Combine meatballs and green beans in casserole dish and pour soup on top. Return to oven and bake at 300 degrees for 1 to 1 hours. ; name: hamburger casserole ; ingredients: hamburger, green beans, onion, sharp cheddar cheese, egg, tomato soup, potatoes ; preparation:Cook and mash potatoes, add egg to potatoes while mashing. Set aside. Brown hamburger and onion, drain. Add beans and soup, stir well. Place in a greased casserole dish. Put mashed potatoes on top of meat mixture. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 350 for 35-40 minutes. ; name: green bean casserole ii ; ingredients: adzuki beans, shoe peg corn, sour cream, sharp cheddar cheese, onion, cream of celery soup, ritz cracker, margarine ; preparation:Drain beans, put in 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Drain corn, pour over beans. Mix onions, celery soup, sour cream and cheese. Pour over beans and corn. Crush crackers, melt butter and mix with crackers. Spread over top and bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. ; name: company green peas casserole ; ingredients: frozen peas, bacon, onion, sliced mushrooms, flour, light cream ; preparation:Cook peas according to package directions. In a skillet, cook bacon until crisp, then remove from pan and drain on paper towels. Add onion and mushrooms to skillet and saute until almost done. Add flour, stir and cook for 1 to 2 minutes. Add cream, cook and stir to consistency of a medium white sauce. Add all of mixture to peas and stir in bacon. ; name: swiss green bean casserole ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, pepper, sugar, onion, sour cream, string beans, swiss cheese, corn flakes ; preparation:

name: wisconsin monte cristo sandwich ; ingredients: egg, plain yogurt, salt, butter, white bread, ham, swiss cheese, cheddar cheese, powdered sugar ; preparation:In a wide shallow dish, whisk the egg, yogurt and salt. Brush one side of bread slices with melted butter. Layer the ham, swiss and cheddar on the buttered side of 2 slices of the bread. Top with remaining bread, buttered side inward. Melt 2 tablespoons of butter in a cast iron skillet over medium-low heat. Carefully dip both sides of the sandwich into the egg mixture, holding sides of sandwich together. Cover and cook in skillet until golden, then turn and cook other side until cheese is melted. Add additional butter to skillet as needed. Dust with powdered sugar and serve immediately. ; name: monte cristo grinder ; ingredients: ham, turkey, green bell pepper, minced garlic clove, olive oil, maui onion, tomatoes, french bread, swiss cheese, dried oregano leaves ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. In skillet, over medium-high heat, saute bell peppers and onions and garlic in oil until bell pepper is crisp-tender. Remove bell pepper and onion from skillet, reserving oil mixture. Layer the ham, smoked turkey, tomato, bell pepper and onion on the bottom half of french bread. Drizzle the oil mixture over the top. Sprinkle with oregano. Top with cheese and remaining half of bread. Wrap loaf in foil. Bake 25 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: southwestern mushroom casserole ; ingredients: mushrooms, beef broth, flour, heavy cream, cayenne pepper, salt, fresh breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place the mushrooms in a 2-quart pie pan. In a medium bowl, combine the beef broth and flour. Microwave at low power until slightly thickened, 2-3 minutes. Stir in the heavy cream and cayenne. Season with salt. Immediately pour the sauce over the mushrooms. In a medium bowl, mix together the breadcrumbs and parmesan. Sprinkle on top of the mushrooms. Top with the butter and bake until browned, about 45 minutes. ; name: southwestern shells with chicken and corn ; ingredients: shell pasta, olive oil, boneless skinless chicken breast, flour, milk, monterey jack cheese, frozen corn, thick & chunky salsa, green chilies ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cook and drain pasta according to package directions. Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Cook chicken until lightly browned. Sprinkle with flour and stir while cooking for 1 more minute. Reduce heat, slowly add the milk and cook for about 5 minutes or until milk is slightly thickened. Remove from heat, add one cup cheese, corn, salsa and green chilies. Add in hot pasta and mix well. Place in lightly greased baking dish. Sprinkle the remaining cheese on top and bake 20-25 minutes. ; name: southwestern tortilla wedges ; ingredients: salsa, sour cream, red bell pepper, cooked chicken, flour tortillas, guacamole, refried beans, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Mix salsa and sour cream. Reserve half of the salsa mixture. Mix half of the salsa mixture, half of the bell pepper and the chicken. Place 2 tortillas on ungreased cookie sheet and spread with chicken mixture. Top each with another tortilla and then top with guacamole. Top each with another tortilla and spread with refried beans. Top each stack with remaining salsa mixture, another tortilla, bell pepper and then cheese. Bake about 15 minutes or until cheese is melted and filling is hot. Cut each stack into 8 wedges. ; name: crock pot southwestern chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, corn, black beans, mexican-style corn, chunky salsa, flour tortilla, cheddar cheese, cooked rice ; preparation:Combine the corn, beans, and half of the salsa in a lightly greased crock pot. Top with the chicken. Pour remaining salsa over chicken. Cover and cook first hour on high, then three more hours on high or 6 hours on low. Serve with warm tortillas and cheese or over rice. ; name: southern living mexican casserole ; ingredients: ground chuck, onions, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes and green chilies, ranch style beans, corn tortillas, processed cheese ; preparation:Cook gound chuck and diced onion in a dutch oven, stirring until meat crumbles and is no longer pink. Drain meat mixture, and return to dutch oven. Stir in chicken soup, diced tomato and green chiles, and beans. Layer half of the tortillas evenly into 2 lightly greased 13 x 9 inch baking dishes. Top each with one-fourth of meat mixture and one-fourth of cheese cubes. Repeat layers with remaining tortillas, meat mixture, and cheese. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: southwestern monte cristos ; ingredients: white bread, hot pepper jelly, honey-baked ham, monterey jack pepper cheese, smoked turkey, eggs, milk, hot sauce, unsalted butter ; preparation:

name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: apple country chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, mayonnaise, orange juice, apple jelly, lemon juice, celery, apples, walnuts ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix mayonnaise, orange juice, apple jelly and lemon juice. Add cut chicken, celery and apples. Toss to coat all pieces. Season with salt and chill until ready to serve. Sprinkle with chopped walunts to garnish and add crunch. ; name: yummy chicken salad for sandwiches ; ingredients: chicken breasts, olive oil flavored cooking spray, salt and pepper, sliced almonds, celery ribs, red onion, whole grain mustard, mayonnaise ; preparation:Preheat oven broiler. Spray the chicken breasts with olive oil spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Broil the chicken breasts for 7 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Chop chicken breasts and put in refrigerator to cool. While oven is still hot, spread your almond flakes on a cookie sheet and toast on the broiling rack. Please keep an eye on them because they toast quickly, and you dont want burnt almonds. Once the chicken is cooled, mix in the almonds, celery, onion, mustard and mayo. You can either put the salad straight onto your choice of bread and add whatever you like on your sandwiches or can be eaten out of iceburg lettuce leaves for a no carb version. ; name: chutney chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, bell pepper, raisins, celery, green onion, miracle whip light, mango chutney, romaine lettuce ; preparation:Toss chicken, bell pepper, raisins, celery and onions in large bowl. Stir mayonnaise and chutney in small bowl until blended. Add to salad. Toss to evenly coat. Serve at room temperature or chilled. Line 4 individual plates with lettuce leaves. Top with salad. ; name: yellow chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, granny smith apple, raisins, light mayonnaise, curry powder, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Cut the apple into bite sized pieces. Put shredded chicken into a bowl with the apple and add raisins. Add mayonnaise. Add curry to taste. Top with a bit of black pepper. ; name: curried chicken rice salad ; ingredients: raw rice, cooked chicken, canned pineapple, celery, green pepper, mayonnaise, peach preserves, curry powder, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Combine cool rice, chicken, pineapple, celery and green pepper in biggish bowl. Combine peach preserves, mayonnaise and curry powder. Stir into the chicken mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Chill for at least 2-3 hours. Serve topped with grated cheese, or not --. ; name: chicken salad oriental ; ingredients: cooked chicken, pineapple tidbits, green onions, water chestnuts, sour cream, ground ginger, salt, pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:Combine and chill first four ingredients. Blend sour cream, ground ginger, salt, and pepper. Add to chicken mixture. Toss lightly. Serve on bed of greens. Sprinkle with toasted almonds. ; name: apple annie s tea room s chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, red bell peppers, dried dill weed, dry ranch dressing mix, mayonnaise ; preparation:

name: appetizer sausage stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: pork sausage, italian breadcrumbs, mozzarella cheese, button mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Break out the stem from the mushrooms and place on cookie sheet. In frying pan, cook sausage over medium heat until brown. Then drain grease. Add breadcrumbs and mozzarella cheese and stir to mix. Stuff into mushroom caps. Bake 10-15 minutes until cheese starts to brown on top and the mushrooms are sizzling. ; name: cheese stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: mushrooms, green onion, garlic cloves, butter, dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, basil, pepper ; preparation:Remove mushroom stems and chop finely. In a small pan, cook stems, green onions, garlic and butter over medium heat til tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add all remaining ingredients except caps. Fill caps with mixture, place in baking dish. Bake 350f for 15 minutes. ; name: cream cheese and bacon stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: bacon, cream cheese, onion, worcestershire sauce, fresh white mushroom ; preparation:Dice bacon and fry until very crisp. Drain on paper towel. Mix onion and worcestershire sauce with softened cream cheese. Add bacon. Mix well. Clean and remove stems from mushrooms. Fill mushroom caps with cream cheese mixture. Mushrooms can be refrigerated at this point, if made in advance. Bake in preheated oven, 375f for 13 to 15 minutes, or until tops are lightly golden. Watch carefully the last few minutes. ; name: bacon stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, onion, butter, breadcrumbs, cheddar cheese, bacon ; preparation:Clean mushrooms with cool water. Remove stems from mushrooms and chop. Cook onions and chopped mushroom stems in butter until tender. Add bread crumbs. Remove from heat. Stir in bacon and cheese. Mound filling into mushroom caps. Place in shallow baking pan. Bake at 400 degrees for 15 minutes, until cheese is melted. Serve warm. ; name: garlic and mushroom burgers ; ingredients: field mushrooms, sunflower oil, gruyere, garlic clove, butter, hamburger buns, lettuce ; preparation:Heat grill to high, rub mushrooms with oil. Grill for 3 minutes each side or till cooked but still firm. Mix cheese, garlic, butter, salt and pepper together in a bowl. Spoon mixture into mushrooms. Grill until cheese melts. Place in toasted buns with salad. This could also be done in the oven. ; name: hot sausage and noodle bake ; ingredients: egg noodles, onion, hot italian sausage, frozen chopped spinach, cream of mushroom soup, garlic clove, dried tarragon, dried marjoram, egg, low-fat ricotta cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cook noodles for 5-7 minutes. Drain noodles. Cut sausages into bite-size pieces. Sautee onion and sausage in skillet until brown. Remove sausage and onion and get rid of drippings. Stir together noodles, onion, sausage, spinach, mushroom soup, garlic, tarragon, and marjoram. Transfer to buttered casserole dish and spread evenly. Combine egg and ricotta in bowl and mix with noodle mixture. Bake for 25-30 minutes. ; name: awesome stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: whole mushroom, butter, breadcrumbs, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, bacon ; preparation:Clean and remove stems from mushrooms. Saute bread crumbs in butter in a skillet until crispy. In a bowl combine cream cheese, bacon, half of the parmesan and the sauteed bread crumbs. Mix well, and fill mushroom caps. Sprinkle with remaining parmesan and drizzle with butter. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes and then broil until bubbly and done. ; name: sausage stuffed mushroom caps ; ingredients: mushrooms, spicy bulk sausage, garlic clove, scallion, egg, white breadcrumb, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: peanut butter cream fudge ; ingredients: sugar, sour cream, salt, peanut butter, vanilla extract ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, combine the sugar, sour cream and salt. Bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium heat until a candy thermometer reads 238. Remove from the heat. Stir in peanut butter and vanilla. With a wooden spoon, beat until thick and creamy, about 5 minutes. Transfer to a buttered 8-inch square dish. Cool and cut into squares. Store in the refrigerator. ; name: peanut butter pudding ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, salt, milk, half-and-half, creamy peanut butter, vanilla extract, whipped cream, chocolate curls ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in a medium-size heavy saucepan. Gradually whisk in milk and half-and-half. Bring to a boil over medium heat, whisking constantly. Boil, whisking constantly, 1 minute. Remove from heat. Add peanut butter and vanilla, whisking until smooth. Pour into a bowl. Place plastic wrap directly over warm pudding. Chill 2 hours. Garnish, if desired. ; name: peanut butter no bakes ; ingredients: sugar, light corn syrup, creamy peanut butter, vanilla, crisp rice cereal ; preparation:In a large saucepan, bring sugar and corn syrup to boil. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter and vanilla. Mix in cereal. Drop by large spoonful onto wax paper. Let cool before removing from wax paper. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: peanut butter fudge ; ingredients: sugar, evaporated milk, butter, peanut butter, vanilla extract, marshmallow creme ; preparation:Butter a 9 x 13 inch pan. Mix sugar, evaporated milk and butter in large saucepan. Stir constantly over medium heat and bring to a full boil. Stir 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in peanut butter, vanilla and marshallow. Spread in pan. Cool completely and cut into squares. ; name: peanut butter and banana cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, banana, light brown sugar, butter, peanut butter, egg, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Grease cookie sheets. Combine flour and baking soda in a small bowl. In a medium mixing bowl, beat together banana, brown sugar, butter, and peanut butter until light and fluffy, using a mixer on medium speed. Beat in egg and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture until a dough forms. Shape dough into one inch balls and place them two inches apart on cookie sheets. Using the tines of a fork dipped in flour, press a criss-cross pattern onto each cookie. Bake cookies until edges are set, about 10 minutes. Place cookie sheets on wire racks and cool for about 5 minutes. Then take cookies off the sheets and cool them completely on the wire racks. ; name: peanut butter balls ; ingredients: margarine, sugar substitute, vanilla extract, water, flour, egg white, peanuts ; preparation:Beat margarine with sugar replacement until creamy. Add vanilla, water and flour, mixing well. Refrigerate 1 hour. Form into 1-in ball, dip into beaten egg whites and roll in chopped peanuts. Place on ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 350f for 10-12 minutes. ; name: peanut butter sundaes ; ingredients: sugar, water, creamy peanut butter, vanilla ice cream, salted peanuts ; preparation:

name: yummy sweet potato casserole ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk, vanilla extract, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. Put sweet potatoes in a medium saucepan with water to cover. Cook over medium high heat until tender. Drain and mash. In a large bowl, mix together the sweet potatoes, white sugar, eggs, salt, butter, milk and vanilla extract. Mix until smooth. Transfer to a 9 x 13 inch baking dish. In a medium bowl, mix the brown sugar and flour. Cut in the butter until the mixture is coarse. Stir in the pecans. Sprinkle the mixture over the sweet pototato mixture. Bake in the preheated oven 30 minutes, or until the topping is lightly brown. ; name: caramelized sweet potato casserole ; ingredients: brown sugar, flour, pecans, butter, mashed sweet potatoes, sugar, salt, vanilla, eggs ; preparation:Boil sweet potatos for 15 mins, let it sit for 15 mins, boil another 15 mins, let it sit another 15-30 minutes. Mash potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Combine crust mixture brown sugar, flour, nuts and butter in mixing bowl. Set aside. Combine sweet potatoes, sugar, salt, vanilla, eggs and butter in a mixing bowl in the order listed. Mix well. Pour mixture into greased baking dish. Sprinkle the surface of the sweet potato mixture evenly with the crust mixture. Bake for 30 minutes. Allow to set at least about 15-30 minutes before serving for the crust to harden. ; name: banana sweet potato puff casserole ; ingredients: mashed sweet potatoes, banana, curry powder, sour cream, salt, egg ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine all ingredients. Beat with electric mixer until light and very fluffy. Turn into 1 quart casserole dish. Bake at 350 degrees f. In the oven for 20 minutes or until puffed and lightly browned. ; name: boston market sweet potato casserole ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, sugar, eggs, butter, vanilla extract, flour, brown sugar, pecans, cinnamon ; preparation:Boil potatoes til tender. Take skin off when cooled and able to handle. Put in a large bowl and whip them til fluffy adding all other ingredients. Pour into a buttered casserole and top with the crunch topping. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: sweet potato casserole iii ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, milk, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, pecans ; preparation:Combine sweet potatoes, sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla and milk. Mix well. Spoon into a 2 quart casserole. Combine topping ingredients and sprinkle over sweet potatoes. Casserole can be refrigerated at this point for up to 2 days. Bake at 350 degrees for 20 minutes or until heated through. Makes 8 sinful servings. ; name: not so sweet sweet potato casserole ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, apple cider, salt, ground black pepper, gruyere cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Bake potatoes whole, in their skins on a foil lined jelly roll pan until they are soft when pierced with a fork. Remove from oven and let cool until you can handle them, then peel off the skins. Mash the potatoes along with butter, cider, salt and pepper, until smooth enough to your liking. Grease an oval baking dish and spoon the mashed potatoes into the dish. Sprinkle with the shredded cheese and bake at 375f for about 30 minutes, uncovered, or until heated through and the cheese is melted. Sprinkle parsley over the top and serve. Make ahead. When ready to serve them, thaw completely, place into the baking dish as described above, top with cheese, and bake at 350f for about 40 minutes, then sprinkle with parsley before serving. ; name: baked sweet savory mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, sweet potatoes in syrup, cream cheese, bacon, sour cream, chicken broth, pepper ; preparation:Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil. Cook 30 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add sweet potatoes and cream cheese. Mush until smooth with potato masher. Stir in bacon, next 3 ingredients, remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Spoon mixture into lightly greased 11x7-inch baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350f for 20 minutes. Garnish with the rest of the bacon. ; name: holiday sweet potato coconut casserole ; ingredients: mashed sweet potatoes, sugar, evaporated milk, eggs, vanilla, butter, coconut, nuts, brown sugar, flour ; preparation:

name: banana cream rum pudding ; ingredients: sugar-free banana cream pudding mix, low-fat milk, rum extract, banana, seedless raisin, graham wafers, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Prepare pudding mix per instructions using milk and rum extaract. Stir in banana slices. Spoon into cups. Garnish with graham wafer pieces. Sprinkle with cinnamon. ; name: sweet bread bread pudding ; ingredients: sweet bread, raisins, butter, milk, sugar, eggs, apple pie filling, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:Grease a 9x12 pan. Scald milk. Add sugar and butter. Mix until butter is melted. Cool. Break sweet bread into pieces. Spread apple pie filling on top of the sweet bread. Sprinkle raisins over the filling. Combine cooled milk mixture with beaten eggs. Pour liquid over the bread. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes. ; name: pudding au chomeur ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, light brown sugar, boiling water, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the milk. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: fruity bread pudding for two ; ingredients: stale bread, apple, dried cranberries, egg, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, milk, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a lightly greased 2 cup baking dish, toss together the bread cubes, apple and dried fruit. In a small bowl, whisk together the egg, sugar and vanilla. In a small saucepan, heat the milk with the butter just until steaming. Gradually whisk into the egg mixture in a slow, steady stream. Pour over the bread mixture. Let stand for 5 minutes. Press gently to moisten the bread evenly. Sprinkle with cinnamon to taste. Bake at 350 degrees f for about 30 minutes or just until puffed and a knife inserted in the centre comes out clean. Broil for about 2 minutes or until golden and crusty. ; name: cinnamon bread pudding ; ingredients: rolls, milk, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, nutmeg, pecans ; preparation:Place cubed bread or rolls in slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. In a mixixng bowl, combine milk, eggs, both sugars, butter, vanilla, and nutmeg and beat until smooth. Stir in pecans. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. Seerve with lemon sauce or whipped topping. ; name: easy bread pudding ; ingredients: eggs, egg whites, skim milk, honey, vanilla, cinnamon raisin bread ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees f. In a large mixing bowl, beat eggs and egg whites. Beat in milk, honey and vanilla. Stir in bread cubes. Pour into 8 inch baking dish, sprayed with a non-stick spray. Bake for 35 to 40 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out clean. Serve hot. ; name: french pudding ; ingredients: vanilla wafers, margarine, powdered sugar, eggs, crushed pineapple, whipping cream, granulated sugar, pecans ; preparation:Line a 9x13-inch glass dish with vanilla wafers. Melt margarine in a saucepan. Add powdered sugar. Beat eggs into margarine mixture gradually. Pour over wafers. Spread pineapple over sauce. Whip cream and sweeten with granulated sugar to taste. Spread over pineapple layer. Sprinkle with pecans. Chill for several hours. ; name: couscous dried fruit and honey pudding ; ingredients: couscous, mixed fruit, nuts, milk, honey, vanilla extract, sugar, ground cinnamon, heavy cream ; preparation:

name: pasta with lemon pepper and parmigiano ; ingredients: egg noodles, olive oil, chicken stock, lemon, juice of, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, black pepper, salt, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a big casserole, cook pasta in boiling salted water until al dente. Drain. Put pasta in a bowl. Add olive oil, chicken stock, lemon juice, parmigiano and pepper. Add salt if needed. Mix well. Serve immediately and sprinkle with parsley. Delicious with veal. ; name: eggs with cheese and olive oil ; ingredients: olive oil, eggs, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat a large skillet over medium heat. When hot, add 4 teaspoons of oil to pan and swirl to coat. Place eggs in carefully and cook until the white has become solid, about 1 to 2 minutes. Sprinkle the eggs with salt, pepper, and about a tablespoon of cheese for each egg. Swirl the remaining olive oil on the top of the cheese. Carefully turn eggs and cook until yolk is of desired doneness, about 1 minute. Serve immediately. ; name: stracciatella ; ingredients: chicken stock, eggs, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, fresh nutmeg, fresh parsley, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Bring 3 cups of the stock to a boil in a 6-8 cup saucepan over med-high heat. Beat the remaining stock with the eggs, cheese, nutmeg, and parsley until well blended. When the stock is boiling, adjust the heat so that it bubbles frequently but not furiously. Add the egg mixture in a steady stream, stirring all the while. Stir occasionally until the eggs gather together in small curds, 2-3 minutes. Taste and add salt and pepper to taste, then serve. Garnish with a little more cheese if you like. ; name: easy authentic tasting chicken parmesan parmigiana ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, salt and pepper, eggs, milk, italian style breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, provolone cheese, spaghetti sauce, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper in a shallow bowl or pie plate. Combine bread crumbs and parmesan cheese in a shallow bowl, plate or pie plate. Dip each chicken cutlet in egg mixture and then coat completely with bread crumb mixture. Heat half inch of oil in a pan over med-high heat. Fry each cutlet and turn over when golden brown. Heat oven to 400 degrees. When cutlets are crispy and golden on both side and juices run clear, place them on a baking sheet. Place a slice of provolone cheese on top of each cutlet and place in the oven. In the meantime, heat sauce in the microwave or on the stove top. When cheese is melted, remove cutlets from oven and spoon some sauce nicely over each one. Sprinkle with grated parmesan cheese. Serve with your favorite pasta and remaining sauce. ; name: risotto alla parmigiana ; ingredients: butter, onion, arborio rice, chicken stock, parmesan cheese, salt ; preparation:Heat the butter and sweat the onions. Add rice and stir until rice appears shiny. Using a 6 oz ladle, add 2 scoops of stock to the rice. Stir the rice over medium heat until almost dry. Repeat from step 3 until all stock has been used up. Stop cooking when rice is moist and creamy. Remove from heat and stir in remaining butter and parmesan cheese. ; name: four cheese pasta ; ingredients: butter, flour, half-and-half, mozzarella cheese, fontina, provolone cheese, parmesan cheese, pepper, parsley, fresh fettuccine ; preparation:In 3 quart saucepan, melt butter, stir in flour until blended. Cook 30 seconds. Gradually stir in half and half- cook, stirring, until mixture boils and slightly thickens. Stir in all cheeses, salt and pepper. Boil fettuccine till al dente. Drain and pour into large bowl or round casserole dish. Mix in cheese sauce along with parsley, until well blended. Serve immediately. ; name: cavatappi with prosciutto and parmesan ; ingredients: cavatappi pasta, cooking spray, garlic clove, fresh parsley, extra virgin olive oil, salt, fresh ground black pepper, italian seasoning, prosciutto, parmigiano-reggiano cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to the package directions, omitting salt and fat. Drain in a colander over a bowl, reserving 3 tablespoons cooking liquid. Heat pan over medium heat. Coat pan with cooking spray. Add garlic to pan, and saut 1 minute. Remove from heat. Add reserved 3 tablespoons cooking liquid and pasta to pan. Let stand 2 minutes. Stir in parsley, oil, salt, pepper, italian seasoning and prosciutto. Sprinkle with cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: pastina with milk and eggs ; ingredients: milk, italian pastina, eggs, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: savory gingered sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, dried red chili pepper, garlic cloves, fresh gingerroot, salt, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees place scrubbed whole sweet potatoes in a baking dish and cook until tender. In a saucepan, heat oil and pepper over medium high heat until browned on all sides. Discard pepper, add garlic and ginger and cook until barely tender. Stir in salt and balsamic vinegar to taste and simmer over low heat until ready to serve. When tender, split each potato, drizzle with ginger sauce and serve hot. ; name: chili roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, sugar, chili powder, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: orange honey sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, half-and-half, orange juice, golden brown sugar, unsalted butter, orange zest, ground coriander, salt, ground ginger, honey ; preparation:Roast the sweet potatoes at 400 degrees f for about one hour depending on the size of the potatoes. Place the rest of the ingredients in a saucepan, stirring to blend and heat thoroughly. Spoon out the sweet potato from the skins into a large bowl. Add the hot liquid to the potatoes and whip together. Serve immediately, or place in a casserole to be reheated and served later. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes with orange marmalade and balsamic glaze ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, honey, ground ginger, balsamic vinegar, orange marmalade, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat oven to 375. Lay the sweet potatoes out in a single layer on a roasting tray. Drizzle the oil, salt and pepper over the potatoes. Roast for 25 to 30 minutes in oven or until tender. In a saucepan reduce the vinegar by half, then add honey, marmelade and ginger. Stir to combine. When potatoes are roasted, remove and toss to coat with marmelade mixture. ; name: roasted whole sweet potatoes with maple ginger topping ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, sour cream, real maple syrup, salt, cinnamon, pecans, butter, brown sugar ; preparation:Poke each potato several times with a fork to pierce the skin. Set onto a foil lined baking sheet. Bake in a preheated oven at 375 f for 1 hour or until potatoes are very tender. Meanwhile, mix together the sour cream, syrup, salt, & cinnamon. When potatoes are ready, slice them open, fluff the middles with a fork a bit, and top with a pat of butter, a dollop of the topping, a sprinkling of the nuts, and if desired, a light sprinkling of brown sugar. ; name: honey roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, honey, fresh lemon juice, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a small micorwave safe bowl combine butter, honey and lemon juice. Microwave until butter melts, add cinnamon. Place cubed potatoes in a large bowl and pour honey mixture over potatoes, toss to coat. Place in a roasting pan, salt and bake for about 50 minutes, or until tender, stirring occasionally. ; name: salmon with sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, yellow onion, gingerroot, pineapple juice, olive oil, salt, salmon fillets, fresh ground black pepper, slivered almonds, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine sweet potatoes, onion, ginger, juice, oil and salt. Place in a 9-by-13-inch casserole dish, sprayed with cooking spray. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Remove from oven. Top with salmon. Grind on pepper. Return to oven uncovered and bake 10 to 12 minutes, until fish is done to your liking. Garnish with almonds and parsley. ; name: sweet ginger steak sweet potatoes ; ingredients: topside steak, fresh ginger, extra virgin olive oil, fresh ground black pepper, sweet potatoes, oil, sweet chili sauce, lemon, juice of ; preparation:

name: grilled ham n jack cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: butter, texas toast thick bread, sharp cheddar cheese, deli ham, red onions, ranch dressing, monterey jack pepper cheese ; preparation:Butter one side of each slice of texas toast. On the unbuttered sides of four slices, layer cheddar cheese, half of the ham, onion if desired and remaining ham. Spread with ranch dressing. Top with pepper jack cheese and remaining toast, buttered side up. On a hot griddle, cook sandwiches for 3 - 4 minutes or until bottoms of sandwiches are browned. Carefully turn. Cook 2 minutes longer or until cheese is melted. ; name: toasted ham and cheese supreme ; ingredients: white bread, mayonnaise, deli ham, cheddar cheese, red onions, horseradish sauce, butter ; preparation:Spread four slices of bread with mayonnaise. Layer each with the ham, cheese and onion. Spread horseradish sauce on remaining bread. Place bread with horseradish side down over onion. Spread butter on the outside of each sandwich. In a large skillet over medium heat, toast sandwiches for 4 - 5 minutes on each side or until bread is lightly browned and cheese is melted. ; name: club sandwich ; ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, american cheese, ham, tomatoes, lettuce, crisp bacon, monterey jack cheese, deli turkey ; preparation:Spread mayonnaise on one side of a piece of toast. Add layer of american cheese, ham, two slices of tomato, two leaves of lettuce, and two pieces of bacon. Spread mayonnaise on second piece of toast and place on top, mayo side down. Spread mayonnaise on top of that second piece of toast. Layer monterey jack cheese, the rest of the tomatoes, lettuce, turkey and bacon on top. Spread mayonnaise on third piece of toast and place on the stack mayo side down. Slice the sandwich in quarters diagonally. Skewers or long toothpicks may be used to hold all the layers together. ; name: toasted ham and gouda sandwiches ; ingredients: pumpernickel bread, mustard-mayonnaise blend, fresh chives, cooked ham, tomatoes, gouda cheese, butter ; preparation:Arrange the bread slices on a cutting board or counter top. Spread all slices with mustard-mayo sauce. Sprinkle 4 of the slices with the fresh chives. Add ham, tomato and cheese. Cover these four slices with the remaining bread slices, putting the sauce side down. Using one of the tablespoons of butter, spread it over the tops of the sandwiches. Heat a large skillet over low heat and melt the remaining two tablespoons of butter. Place the sandwiches, butter side up, into the skillet and cook for 3 to 4 minutes or until toasted. Turn the sandwiches over. Cook until toasted and the cheese is melted. ; name: baked cheese sandwiches ; ingredients: bread, butter, mustard, velveeta cheese, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Butter both sides of bread. Lay 8 slices in a 9x13 inch pan. Spread mustard on top. Cover each slice with velveeta cheese. Cover with remaining bread slices. In seperate bowl mix together eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Mix well. Pour over bread and place in refrigerator overnight, or for at least 6 hours. Bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Cut into serving size pieces and serve hot. ; name: ham cheese and mayo sandwich ; ingredients: white bread, cheese, ham, mayonnaise ; preparation:Spread mayonnaise evenly on two pieces of the bread. Place a piece of cheese on the bread. Place a slice of ham on top of the cheese. Place the other slice of bread on top. Cut in half. Enjoy. ; name: tangy barbecue ham sandwiches ; ingredients: italian tomato soup, crushed pineapple, root beer, onion, brown sugar, ham, hamburger buns ; preparation:In 2-qt saucepan, combine soup, pineapple, root beer, onion, and brown sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring often, for about 10 minutes. Add ham and toss gently to distribute. Continue cooking over medium heat for additional 5 minutes. Spoon ham onto buns or rolls and serve. ; name: tailgate sandwiches ; ingredients: rolls, black forest ham, gruyere, chive & onion cream cheese, butter, parmesan cheese, worcestershire sauce, dried onion flakes ; preparation:

name: pizza biscuit ; ingredients: pillsbury grands refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, cheddar cheese, pepperoni, pizza sauce ; preparation:Roll the dough out as thin as it will go without it breaking. Put pizza sauce on half of the rolled out dough. Sprinkle cheese on that half only. Put whatever toppings you like on top of that. Fold over the other half of the biscuit. Cook at 375 for about 10-15 minutes. ; name: creamy chicken pies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, vegetable soup, milk, pepper, cooked chicken, cream cheese, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits ; preparation:In a medium saucepan stir flour into soup. Stir in milk and pepper. Cook and stir over medium heat till mixture is thickened and bubbly. Cook for 1 minute more. Stir in chicken and cream cheese. Heat through, stirring to melt cream cheese. Pour hot chicken mixture into three 10-ounce. Custard cups. Separate the biscuits and arrange 2 biscuits atop each custard cup. Bake in a 375 degree oven for 12 to 15 minutes or till biscuits are golden brown. ; name: bacon egg and cheese biscuit casserole ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, butter, milk, eggs, bacon, shredded cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425. Start frying bacon or sausage. Combine first 5 ingredients, then cut in butter. Make a well in the center and pour in milk. Stir until well combined and moist. Turn dough out onto floured surface and knead until dough holds together well and is pliable. Press into bottom of a greased 9 x 13 pan. Beat the eggs with a splash of milk and pour over biscuit crust. Sprinkle crumbled bacon or sausage over the egg mixture and top with cheese. Bake for 16 - 20 minutes, or until egg is cooked through. ; name: pepperoni breadtwists ; ingredients: bisquick baking mix, water, pepperoni, butter, parmesan cheese, pizza sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix baking mix, cold water and pepperoni until dough forms. Beat 20 strokes. Turn dough onto a lightly floured surface and knead 5 times. Roll dough into a 10 inch square and cut in half. Cut each half crosswise into 14 strips. Twist ends of strips in opposite directions until pieces are twirled. Place on ungreased cookie sheet, pressing ends to sheet to fasten securely. Brush with melted butter and sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes or until light golden brown. Heat pizza sauce and serve with breadtwists for dipping. ; name: mini snack pizzas ; ingredients: refrigerated dinner rolls, pizza sauce, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Place rolls on ungreased baking sheet try to flatten rolls so they resemble flat circles. Take a spoonful of sauce and spread ontop of each rolls. Then cut up cheese into small bits and garnish. Add meat ontop of cheese and then place remaining cheese ontop of meat.
