Serve immediately, or chill to serve as a salad. ; name: unstuffed bell pepper skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, crushed tomatoes, green bell peppers, salt, pepper, garlic powder, dried italian seasoning, cooked rice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Brown ground meat and onion. Drain. Season with salt, pepper, garlic and italian seasoning. Add crushed tomatoes and green pepper. Cover and simmer until peppers are tender crisp. Serve over cooked rice. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: onion and pepper confit ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, red bell peppers, garlic cloves, fresh ground white pepper, kosher salt ; preparation:Warm the olive oil in a large saut pan over high heat. Add the onions, bell peppers, and garlic. Saut until they are soft and golden, about 10 minutes. Cover and reduce the heat to medium. Cook, stirring occasionally, until very soft, about 45 minutes. Drain and season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: roasted sausages peppers potatoes and onions ; ingredients: potato, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, onion, olive oil, salt and pepper, italian pork sausage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Spread the vegetables in a single layer in one or more large shallow roasting pans. Do not crowd them or they will not brown. Drizzle with the oil and sprinkle with salt and pepper to taste. Stir well. Roast the vegetables, stirring once or twice, for 45 minutes. Pierce each sausage in two or three places with a fork. Place the sausages on top of the vegetables. Bake for 15 to 30 minutes, or until the sausages and vegetables are cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: chili jam ; ingredients: garlic, onions, birds eye chiles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, white sugar, peanut oil ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add garlic and onion and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge. ; name: bell pepper relish ; ingredients: red bell peppers, green bell peppers, onions, sugar, white vinegar, celery seeds, salt ; preparation:Grind or otherwise process peppers and onions into finely chopped, even mushy, consistency. Cover with boiling water and let stand 10 minutes. Drain well. Save juice to add to vinegar mixture if needed to cover vegetables. Add sugar, vinegar, celery seed and salt. Boil 15 minutes. Pour into sterilized canning jars and seal. ; name: bratwurst skillet ; ingredients: bratwurst, green bell peppers, red bell peppers, onions, paprika, caraway seed ; preparation:

name: soup with mixed pastas ; ingredients: reduced-sodium chicken broth, water, bay leaves, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, boneless chicken breast, olive oil, pasta ; preparation:In a large saucepan bring chicken broth and water to a boil. Add bay leaves, onions, carrot and garlic. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered 10 minutes. In a skillet cook and stir chicken in hot oil for 3 minutes or until cooked through. Add chicken, pastas, and sage to soup. Simmer, uncovered for 8 to 10 minutes or until larger pieces of pasta are tender but slightly firm. Remove the bay leaves. ; name: cabbage and tomato chicken soup ; ingredients: chicken, cabbage, onion, tomatoes, carrots, garlic cloves, fresh chives, fresh basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve. ; name: chicken noodle soup ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, carrot, onion, garlic cloves, bay leaf, water, egg noodles, monterey jack cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken, onions, garlic and bay leaf in broth or water until chicken can be pulled away from the bones. I prefer broth for a richer taste. Remove chicken and cool until you can handle it. Add the celery and carrots to the broth. Cut cooled chicken into bite size pieces. Return chicken to the broth. Simmer until veggies are almost tender. Add pasta to the chicken and veggies. Simmer until pasta and veggies are cooked. Add salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle cheese on top if desired and stir. ; name: chicken garlic soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, celery, yellow onion, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, garlic, butter, flour ; preparation:Make the chicken broth by simmering chicken, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, parsley, salt and pepper in enough water to cover. When the chicken is thoroughly cooked, remove it and skim the fat from broth. Simmer broth, reducing it until it is very rich. Add the flour and butter to a small amount of broth and mix with a wire whisk until velvety. Pour this mixture into the remaining broth. Tear chicken into bite-sized pieces and add to the soup. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve. ; name: chickpea spinach and pasta soup ; ingredients: marjoram, garlic clove, chickpeas, vegetable broth, diced tomatoes, ditalini, baby spinach ; preparation:Combine all but pasta and spinach. Bring to a boil and then simmer for about 20 minutes. Use an immersion blender to puree about half of the soup. Add cooked pasta and spinach. Simmer for a few minutes until spinach is wilted. ; name: basil chicken soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic clove, all-purpose flour, chicken broth, potato, carrots, cooked chicken, fresh basil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a 2 to 3 quart pan, combine butter, onion, and garlic. Stir occasionally over medium heat until onion is limp and slightly tinged with brown, about 10 minutes. Stir in flour to coat onion. Gradually stir in broth, and bring to a boil on high heat. Add potato and carrots. Cover and simmer over low heat until potato is tender when pierced, 15 to 20 minutes. Add chicken. Cover and simmer just until chicken is hot, 1 to 2 minutes. Stir in basil. Ladle into bowl and offer cheese to add to taste. ; name: easy italian chicken soup ; ingredients: chicken breasts, olive oil, chicken broth, water, penne pasta, great northern beans, diced tomatoes with garlic and olive oil, corn, italian seasoning ; preparation:Heat broth and water to boiling. Add pasta as soon as boiling begins. Meanwhile, heat olive oil in skillet and add chicken breasts, cook until browned. Add can of tomatoes to chicken and simmer for 5 minutes. Lower pasta and broth temp to medium. Add canned ingredients, italian seasoning and chicken to broth. Simmer on medium for about 15-20 minutes or until pasta is the way you like it. ; name: chicken vegetables and pasta soup ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, olive oil, onion, carrots, cauliflower florets, low-sodium low-fat chicken broth, dried herbs, pasta, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: lentils couscous recipe ; ingredients: lentils, couscous, onions, olive oil, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, cayenne ; preparation:Saute onions with olive oil until golden brown. Reserve 4 tablespoons of browned onions for garnish. Meanwhile place lentils, water salt, and black pepper in a different saucepan and cook for around 20 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add couscous, browned onions, cumin, and dash of cayenne to the lentils, stir, cover and simmer for about 5-10 minutes or until water is absorbed. Place lentils and couscous in serving dish and garnish with 4 tablespoons of reserved browned onions. This recipe is best when served with tomatoe salad. See my recipe for tomatoe salad. ; name: steamed lentils with saffron ; ingredients: brown lentils, olive oil, onion, prosciutto, dry white wine, saffron thread, vegetable stock, salt ; preparation:Rinse the lentils well. Heat the vegetable stock in a small pot. Meanwhile, in a different medium pot heat the olive oil. Add the onion and cook until translucent, 5 to 8 minutes, then add the prosciutto and cook for a few more minutes. Add the lentils, cook for another 2-3 minutes, and pour the white wine. Add the saffron and cook until the alcohol has evaporated, 4-5 minutes. Add the stock, salt to taste, and cook over low heat for 50 minutes to 1 hour, covered. Add water or more stock if necessary. ; name: tomato lentil stew ; ingredients: lentils, onions, oil, chopped tomatoes, water, oregano, basil, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook lentils in the water. Meanwhile, chop the onions. Saut onions in a little oil. Add the tomatoes when the onions are translucent. Cook 5-10 min then add the lentils. Cook 5 more minutes. ; name: lentils with spinach and sausage ; ingredients: garlic cloves, ground coriander, olive oil, chicken broth, bay leaves, lentils, potatoes, mild italian sausage, baby spinach ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large pot over medium heat. Add garlic and coriander and cook until fragrant. Add sausage and cook until there is no more pink. Add lentils, chicken broth, and bay leaves. Cover and bring to a boil, turn down heat and simmer for 10 minutes. Add potatoes and cook for 15-20 minutes. When potatoes are soft add spinach and stir until completely wilted. ; name: brown lentil and vegetable soup ; ingredients: olive oil, carrots, zucchini, celery, brown onion, diced tomatoes, vegetable stock, brown lentils, flat leaf parsley, lemon ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add carrots, celery and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until vegetables begin to soften. Add tomatoes, zucchini and stock to pan. Cover and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add lentils to soup. Cook for 5 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and squeeze lemon juice. Season with freshly ground black pepper. ; name: warm chorizo and thyme lentils ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chorizo sausages, celery, garlic cloves, thyme, green lentils, chicken stock, salt and pepper, red wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat oil in deep frypan. Add onion and chorizo, cook about 8 minutes till browned. Add celery, garlic and thyme, cook further 5 minutes. Add lentils, stock, salt and pepper, cook 25 minutes till lentils are tender. Remove from the heat, stir through vinegar. ; name: green lentils with garlic onion madhur jaffrey ; ingredients: vegetable oil, whole cumin seed, garlic cloves, onion, green lentil, water, salt, cayenne ; preparation:

name: macaroni ham salad ; ingredients: cooked macaroni, cheddar cheese, salad oil, vinegar, onion, cooked ham, frozen green pea, celery, pepper, mayonnaise ; preparation:After the macaroni is cooked, while it is still hot, and has been drained, drizzle with oil and vinegar. Add onion pepper, and cheese. Toss with peas, ham and celery. Stir in mayo. Serve on lettuce if you prefer. ; name: apple walnut salad ; ingredients: apples, walnut halves, lemon, juice of, fresh lemon zest, mayonnaise, mint leaf, honey ; preparation:Mix together apples, lemon juice, mint leaves and walnuts. In a separate bowl, mix mayonnaise and honey, then pour over apple mixture and toss. Refrigerate for 1 hour, then remove. Serve cold or at room temperature. Garnish with mint sprigs. ; name: ham and hot fruit salad ; ingredients: ham steaks, pineapple, apricot halves, pear halves in natural juice, peach halves in syrup, butter, curry powder, brown sugar, cornstarch ; preparation:Place ham steaks in a casserole dish. Combine all the drained fruits and pour over the ham steaks. Melt the butter and curry powder together until bubbly and add the brown sugar and corn starch. Drizzle this evenly over the ham and fruit. Cover with foil and bake at 350f for 1 hour. The ham steaks can be omitted and the fruit used as a hot fruit salad on its own. ; name: apple cheese salad ; ingredients: red apples, fresh lemon juice, celery, swiss cheese, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, salt and pepper, lettuce leaf, filberts ; preparation:Put apples in a serving dish. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Add celery and cheese. Mix mayonnaise and mustard. Season with salt and pepper. Add to apple mixture. Refrigerate 1 hour to blend flavors. Serve in lettuce cups sprinkled with nuts. ; name: apple cottage cheese salad ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, apples, raisins, lemon juice, honey, sunflower seeds ; preparation:In a bowl, combine cottage cheese, apples, raisins. Combine lemon juice and honey. Add to apple mixture. Chill. Just before serving, stir in sunflower kernels if desired. ; name: yogurt apple salad ; ingredients: red delicious apple, golden delicious apples, seedless raisin, celery, cheddar cheese, macadamia nuts, orange, juice of, vanilla yogurt, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In medium bowl, combine apples, raisins, celery, cheddar cheese, and nuts. In a small bowl, blend orange juice into yogurt. Pour over salad and toss well. Sprinkle cinnamon on top. May eat salad then or chill for an hour. ; name: waldorf salad ; ingredients: red apples, brown sugar, lemon juice, celery, pecans, mayonnaise ; preparation:Wash, core and dice unpeeled apples. Sprinkle lemon juice over them and toss together gently to coat, then sprinkle brown sugar over the apples and toss again. Chill for at least 20 minutes. Add celery and nuts then stir in mayonnaise, adding only enough for desired consistency. Serve on a bed of greens. ; name: honeydew ham salad ; ingredients: macaroni, ham, celery, red onion, mayonnaise, lime juice, honey, fresh cilantro, honeydew melon ; preparation:

name: ham and spinach rolls ; ingredients: frozen spinach, cornbread stuffing mix, sour cream, boiled ham, butter, flour, milk, sharp cheddar cheese, parmesan cheese, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine spinach, very well drained, stuffing, sour cream. Spread mixture on ham slices and roll up with seam side down in baking dish. Melt butter in saucepan. Add flour and blend well. Add milk and continue to stir over medium heat until thick. Add cheddar cheese and remove from heat. Stir until cheese is melted. Pour sauce over ham rolls and sprinkle with parmesan cheese and paprika, if desired. Cover with foil. Bake 20 minutes covered and 20 minutes uncovered. ; name: chicken breasts stuffed with spinach sun dried tomatoes ; ingredients: fresh spinach, sun-dried tomatoes with italian herbs, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dried italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Coat a large nonstick skillet with nonstick cooking spray. Add the spinach, and cook over medium-high heat, 2 minutes, or until the spinach is wilted. Remove from heat, and toss in the sun-dried tomatoes, mozzarella and parmesan. Set aside. Cut a deep pocket into the thickest side of each piece of chicken, and stuff a quarter of the spinach mixture into each pocket. Close by pressing flesh together and securing with a wooden toothpick, if necessary. Combine the italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper, and sprinkles both sides of the chicken pieces with some of the mixture. Wipe out the skillet, add the olive oil, and preheat over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, and cook for 2 minutes on each side, or until nicely browned. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook for about 8 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: mediterranean vegetable and chicken sandwich wrap ; ingredients: tortilla, hummus, deli chicken, baby spinach, marinated artichoke hearts, roasted sweet red peppers ; preparation:Spread hummus over the tortilla. Place the slices of chicken down the middle of the tortilla so that the ends of each slice overlap. Arrange the spinach leaves over the chicken. Top with the artichokes and red peppers. Fold over the sides of the tortilla and roll up as you would any other wrap. Cut in half and serve. ; name: spinach and cheese stuffed chicken breast ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, fresh spinach, sour cream, cream cheese, parmesan cheese, garlic powder, onion, whole wheat bread crumbs, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Prepare chicken breasts by cutting a slit or flap in the largest part of the breast. Mix all filling ingredients and spoon into chicken breast. Place stuffed chicken breasts into a glass 9x13 inch pan. Sprinkle with bread crumb mixture and parmesan cheese. Bake at 400 degrees for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: vegetarian spinach cheese and sausage casserole ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, frozen spinach, mozzarella cheese, soy sausage, green onion, eggs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Thoroughly mix all ingredients. Pour mixture into a greased 9 inch pie plate. Bake at 350 for about 40 minutes or until center is set. Once out of the oven, i usually let it sit for 5 or 10 minutes. To serve, either cut into wedges, or squares, depending on what type of dish you used. ; name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: spinach feta rice and ham ; ingredients: rice, chicken broth, water, onion, garlic cloves, lemon juice, oregano, frozen chopped spinach, feta cheese, cooked ham ; preparation:Combine rice, broth and water in saucepan. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer 15 minutes or until tender. Saute onion and garlic in another pan. Add to rice along with remaining ingredients. Heat until heated through. ; name: chicken rollatini with cheese ham spinach ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, deli ham, baby spinach leaves, goat cheese, dijon mustard, seasoned bread crumbs, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: easy elegant chicken and sherry ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, sliced mushrooms, sherry wine, paprika ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in casserole dish. Mix together soup, sour cream, mushrooms and sherry. Pour over chicken. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake 1 hour and 10 minutes at 350 degrees. Serve with rice. ; name: french chicken with sherry nutmeg sauce ; ingredients: skinless chicken thighs, onion, chicken broth, dry sherry, nutmeg, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, parsley, skim milk, flour ; preparation:Put the chicken in a non-stick frying pan. Cook slowly over moderate heat with no fat added until well browned. Drain off melted fat. Add the onion, broth and sherry. Sprinkle with seasonings. Cover and simmer over very low heat until nearly tender, 40 to 50 minutes. Uncover. Continue to simmer uncovered until the liquid is reduced by half. Whisk milk and flour together and stir into the pan. Cook and stir until sauce is bubbling and thick. ; name: chicken ala booze ; ingredients: chicken parts, sauterne white wine, onions, parsley, butter, pepper, salt, mushrooms, paprika ; preparation:Marinate chicken in wine for 2 hours. Pour wine from chicken. Add onion, parsley & butter to wine. Pepper chicken & sprinkle with paprika. Place skin down in casserole dish. Pour wine mixture over chicken. Bake 25 minutes at 450f. Turn chicken. Add mushrooms & bake for 25 minutes or until tender. ; name: maple and orange glazed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, plain flour, salt and pepper, olive oil, maple syrup, whole grain mustard, orange, zest of, orange, juice of, soy sauce ; preparation:Pick any visible fat from off the chicken and wash and dry. Dredge the pieces of chicken in the seasoned flour, patting to remove excess flour. Heat the olive oil in a large skillet. Pan fry the chicken, presentation side first, in the hot olive oil until nicely browned on both sides. While the chicken is browning, combine the remaining ingredients in a measuring cup. Remove the browned chicken from the pan and place in a shallow casserole dish. Add the sauce ingredients, scraping to deglaze the pan, then pour over the chicken in the dish. Bake in a 350f oven for 20 minutes until nicely glazed and the chicken is cooked through. ; name: mom s dinner party chicken ; ingredients: chicken, margarine, cream of mushroom soup, milk, sherry wine, bread, slivered almonds ; preparation:Brown chicken in margarine in large frying pan, a few pieces at a time. Line a large baking dish big enough to hold chicken with aluminum foil, shiney side up. Place browned chicken in pan. Cover each chicken piece generously with margarine. Mix the 2 tins of cream of mushroom soup and the tin of milk together and wisk until smooth. Pour over chicken and bake, uncovered, at 350 for 1 hour. Meanwhile, cube the 4 slices of bread and toast in margarine in frying pan with almonds until bread and almonds are nicely browned. Remove chicken from oven. Sprinkle sherry over chicken. Sprinkle almonds and toasted bread cubes evenly over all. Return to oven, and cook for another 30- 45 minutes longer or until done. ; name: mexican fun chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, avocado, cheddar cheese, salsa, taco seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray baking dish with cooking spray. Season breasts with taco seasoning. Bake breasts uncovered for 20 minutes. Remove from oven, spoon salsa over each piece, taking care not to drench them. Bake uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top breasts with more salsa, sliced avocado and cheese. Bake uncovered 5 minutes. The ones i used were very thick. ; name: chicken with lime and capers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, butter, olive oil, salt, garlic cloves, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, fresh lime juice, capers, cooked rice ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a skillet. Add chicken. Sprinkle salt over chicken as it cooks. When the chicken is almost completely cooked, add the garlic. While the chicken is cooking, dissolve the bouillon cube in water. Add the lime juice, capers and caper juice to the chicken. Stir in the chicken bouillon. Cover and simmer while you cook the rice. Serve hot over the rice. ; name: tapas chicken with sherry pechuga de pollo con jerez ; ingredients: flour, chicken breast, olive oil, salt and pepper, fresh thyme, green olives, sherry wine ; preparation:

name: baked gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, olive oil, garlic cloves, frozen spinach, diced tomatoes, italian seasoning, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese, mozzarella cheese, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 grease lagrge casserole dish. Cook gnocchi according to directions. Drain. Heat oil in large skillet. Add garlic, cook 30 sec. Add tomatoes and seasoning. Cook and stir 5 minutes. Add gnocchi to spinach mixture in skillet, stir gently. Transfer gnocchi mixture to prepared casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheeses. Bake 20-30 minutes or until bubbly and sheese is melted. Enjoy. ; name: gnocchi ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, flour, olive oil, salt, pepper, italian seasoning, garlic powder, onion salt ; preparation:In large bowl, combine all ingredients and mix into a soft dough. Turn dough out onto a floured surface and knead 20 times. Divide dough into fourths and roll each quarter into a 12 inch long rope. Cut each rope into inch pieces, and set on a floured surface. Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Roll each piece of dough across the tines of a fork to get groves on it and drop it into the pot of water. Cook gnocchi until it floats to the top. Drain and serve. ; name: a very special gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, bacon, leeks, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, skim milk, parmesan cheese, cheddar cheese, cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, baby spinach leaves ; preparation:Cook gnocchi according to package directions. Set aside. Saut bacon until crisp. Set aside. Saut leeks in bacon fat. In medium saucepan, melt butter. Over medium heat, whisk in flour. Whisk in milk, stirring constantly until boiling. Add cheeses & stir until melted. In large bowl, combine all components & stir well, adding spinach last. ; name: zucchini italiano ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic clove, onion, zucchini, no-salt-added tomato sauce, italian seasoning, reduced-fat monterey jack cheese, lowfat swiss cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Place oil and garlic in a skillet over medium-high heat. Saute until garlic is browned. Add onion and zucchini. Toss well with garlic oil, gently stirring. Stir in tomato sauce and seasonings. Turn into a 2-quart baking dish. Cover and bake for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle on cheeses. Cover casserole and let sit for 2 minutes or until cheese melts- serve immediately. ; name: pasta with zucchini sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, zucchini, walnuts, ricotta cheese, hot pepper flakes, tomatoes, pasta ; preparation:Saut garlic in oil until golden, about 3 minutes. Add zucchini and saut until tender crisp, about 8 minutes. Add nuts, cheese, pepper flakes and tomato. Stir and cook until heated through, about 5 minutes. Serve over hot pasta. ; name: basil zucchini boats ; ingredients: zucchini, butter, fresh basil, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Wash and dry the zucchini. Trim off the ends and slice in half lengthwise. Scoop out some of the seeds in the middle of each piece. You may leave some seeds in because you only need to scoop out enough to allow the butter to melt and stay inside. Put all zucchini boats on a baking sheet. Divide the butter between the zucchini boats, spreading all over cut side. Salt and pepper each piece and then divide the basil and parmesan between the boats. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 25 minutes or until desired tenderness. ; name: zucchini and carrots with garlic and herbs ; ingredients: olive oil, carrot, zucchini, garlic, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, fresh basil leaf, fresh oregano ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over moderate heat. Add carrots, zucchini and garlic. Cook, stirring occasionally, for about 5 minutes or until just barely tender. Season with salt and pepper. Stir in fresh herbs. Serve immediately. ; name: gnocchi with cheese prosciutto and basil ; ingredients: gnocchi, garlic, fresh basil, fontina cheese, parmesan cheese, prosciutto, olive oil, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: baked pork chops with apples ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, apples, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, butter, salt, pepper, cranberry juice ; preparation:Sear pork chops, 2 minutes per side. Reserve. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Arrange apple slices in the bottom of a prepared 9x12 baking dish. Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon. Dot with butter. Top apples with seared pork chops. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Pour cranberry juice over all and cover. Bake for 1 hour. Make sure pork reaches an internal temperature of 160 degrees f. ; name: cinnamon baked apples ; ingredients: cooking apples, raisins, honey, ground cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Core the apples and pare a 1-inch strip of skin from around the middle of each to prevent splitting. Place the apples in two 10-oz custard cups. Pack the raisins into the apples. Mix the honey and cinnamon, pour over the raisins and into the apples. Top with butter. Cover tightly and microwave on high until tender when pierced with a fork, 3 to 4 minutes. If you prefer, they can also be baked at 375f for 30 minutes. Serve warm with cream, if desired. ; name: glazed pork chops and apple bake ; ingredients: pork steaks, salt & pepper, apples, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Spray a pan large enough to hold the chops in a single layer with non-stick spray. Season the pork steaks or chops with salt& pepper. Arrange them in single layer in the prepared pan. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the chops from the pan and pour off the fat. Place the apples in the pan and top with the baked chops. Combine the water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce and lemon juice, and pour over the pork and apples. Bake uncovered, basting occasionally, for 45 minutes or until pork is tender. ; name: iowa stuffed pork chops with sweet apple dressing ; ingredients: pork chops, butter, water, apples, white bread, sugar, cinnamon, salt, raisins ; preparation:Cut 2 inch pockets into chops from bone side so dressing stays in. In bowl combine apples, bread, sugar, cinnamon and salt. Mix well. Stuff into pockets of pork chops. Place chops in a 9x13 baking dish. Pour melted butter or marg. Over chops and bake at 350. When chops have browned, add 1 cup of water and cover with foil. Bake for 2 hours. ; name: pork chop and apple rice skillet ; ingredients: butter, pork chops, water, applesauce, red apple, cinnamon, minute rice ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet on medium heat. Add pork chops. Cook 5 minutes on each side or until cooked. Remove pork chop from skillet. Add watr, applesauce, apple, cinnamon to skillet. Stir. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Top with chops. Cover and cook on low heat for 5 minutes. Let stand 5 minutes. ; name: hogback pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, apple juice, light raisins, salt, brown sugar, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, red apples, water ; preparation:Brown chops in a greased skillet over medium heat. Arrange chops in a shallow 2 quart baking dish. Pour apple juice over chops and sprinkle with raisins and salt. Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 45 minutes. Turn chops. Combine brown sugar, nutmeg and cinnamon and coat apple wedges with this mixture. Arrange apples around chops. Sprinkle apples with the remaining sugar mixture and pour water over all. Cover and bake an additional 15 minutes. ; name: grilled pork chops with vanilla scented apples ; ingredients: pork chops, sweet apples, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, apple juice, licor 43, pure vanilla extract, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grill pork chops until barely done. Place on a platter in a warm oven. Add butter, brown sugar and cinnamon to pan over medium heat. Stir to blend well and to allow to caramelize slightly. Add apple juice, licor 43 and apple slices. Cook apples just until done, then remove with a slotted spoon and set apples aside. Reduce the pan juices to two to three tablespoons. Remove from heat and add vanilla, salt and pepper. Add apple slices and return to heat until the apples are hot. Pour over the pork chops. Serve with rice or potatoes. ; name: apples and cinnamon pork chop bake ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, cinnamon, margarine, apples, brown sugar ; preparation:

name: two chile green rice ; ingredients: long-grain rice, olive oil, green onions, serrano pepper, lime, juice of, chili powder, oregano, cilantro, water, salt ; preparation:Saute green onions and serrano peppers 2 minutes in olive oil. Add the rice and saute another 2 to 3 minutes. Add lime juice, chile powder and oregano and continue sauteeing another minute or so. Pour in water, add cilantro, bring to a boil then reduce heat, cover and simmer on very low heat for 15 minutes or until rice is done. Salt to taste. ; name: rice herbs ; ingredients: oil, long grain rice, onion, green pepper, chicken broth, salt, dried oregano, bay leaf, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place oil in a large saucepan coated with cooking spray. Place pan over med-high heat until pan is hot. Add rice and saut until golden brown. Add onion and pepper. Saut till tender. Add chicken broth, salt, oregano and bay leaf. Bring to boil and then reduce heat. Simmer 20 minutes. Remove from stove and let sit for about 5 minutes, or till liquid is absorbed. Remove bay leaf and stir in parsley. ; name: quick brown rice with onions and mushrooms ; ingredients: instant brown rice, onion, mushrooms, water, olive oil, butter, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Drain the liquid from the can of mushrooms into a measuring cup and add enough additional water to make one cup. Bring the liquid to a boil in a covered sauce pan, add the instant brown rice, cover, reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes. At the end of the 5 minute cooking period, remove from the heat, but do not peek. Set aside for at least 5 more minutes to rest. While the rice is resting, saute the onions and mushrooms in the olive oil and butter. When the onions are transparent, remove from the heat, add the finished rice to the saute pan, add salt and pepper and stir. ; name: brown rice and vegetable saute ; ingredients: quick-cooking brown rice, vegetable broth, olive oil, onion, broccoli florets, baby portabella mushrooms, garlic clove, thyme, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:Prepare rice as directed on box using broth of your choice. Meanwhile over medium-high heat, heat olive oil and add onion. Saute for 3 minutes, stirring often. Add broccoli and cover for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add mushrooms and remaining ingredients to pan and saute until mushrooms release their juices, approximately 5 minutes. Serve over brown rice. ; name: green onion rice ; ingredients: cooked rice, cooked shrimp, green onions, hot chili pepper, water, stir-fry sauce ; preparation:In a high-sided nonstick pot or wok, combine the cooked rice, cooked shrimp or shrimp meat, green onions, chili peppers and water. Cook over high heat, stirring often to mix well and prevent sticking, until all ingredients are thoroughly heated and most of the water is gone, about 8 minutes. Turn the heat to high and stir for 1 more minute as the pot gets hotter. Add the nuoc cham and stir rapidly to mix thoroughly. Continue to cook over high heat, stirring constantly, until most of the liquid has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and serve. ; name: egg fried rice ; ingredients: frozen peas, eggs, sesame oil, peanut oil, cooked rice, salt, pepper, spring onions, fresh bean sprouts ; preparation:Thaw frozen peas. Drain in colander. Combine eggs and sesame oil in a small bowl and set aside. Heat a wok over high heat until hot. Add the oil and when it is hot and slightly smoking, turn the heat to medium and add the eggs. Stir fry the eggs for 2 minutes, then add the cooked rice and stir fry for 3 minutes, mixing well. Then add the peas, salt and pepper. Stir fry 5 minutes over high heat. Add spring onions and bean sprouts and stir fry for 2 minutes. Turn onto a platter and serve at once. ; name: brown rice split pea laf ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, brown rice, vegetable broth, lemon juice, split peas, ground cinnamon, ground cumin, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over medium heat, heat the oil and saute the onion until golden, about 5 minutes. Add the garlic ands rice and stir until coated with oil. Stir in the broth, lemon juice, split peas, cinnamon, cumin, salt and pepper. Bring to a boil, then turn the heat down to a simmer. Cover and cook 45-50 minutes, or until all the liquid is absorbed and the rice and peas are tender. Let stand, covered 10 minutes, then serve hot. ; name: quick green rice ww ; ingredients: canola oil, fresh snow peas, garlic clove, cooked brown rice, fresh cilantro ; preparation:

name: chocolatey hot cocoa for one ; ingredients: unsweetened cocoa, sugar, milk, vanilla extract, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, marshmallows, whipped cream ; preparation:In a small, heavy saucepan, stir together the cocoa and sugar, crushing any lumps. First by approximately tablespoons, and then in a slow steady stream, stir in the milk. Heat over medium heat, stirring constantly and scraping the bottom of the pan, just until bubbles appear at the sides. Remove from the heat and stir in the vanilla or liqueur. Top with ground nutmeg or cinnamon, whipped cream or marshmallows. ; name: country living hot chocolate mix ; ingredients: unsweetened cocoa, semisweet chocolate, sugar, cinnamon, pure vanilla extract, ground nutmeg, ground cloves, milk ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a food processor fitted with a metal blade and process just until mixture is powdery -- about 30 seconds. Be careful not to overprocess. Store in an airtight container for up to 6 months. To make hot chocolate, combine 1 cup of milk and 2 tablespoons of the mix in a small saucepan and bring to a simmer over medium-low heat, stirring constantly until chocolate is incorporated and mixture is warmed through. Serve immediately. ; name: katrina s hot cocoa ; ingredients: hot chocolate powder, brown sugar, cinnamon, milk, boiling water, chocolate syrup ; preparation:Boil the water in a kettle. Put the other ingredients in a cup. Then pour the water into the cup. Then carefully add a decent amount of chocolate syrup. Stir thoroughly. ; name: chocolate frosting ; ingredients: butter, cocoa powder, cream cheese, powdered sugar, buttermilk, vanilla ; preparation:In the bowl of an electric mixer combine the butter, cocoa powder and cream cheese over low speed and mix until thoroughly combined. Increase speed to high and cream ingredients until light and fluffy. Reduce speed to low and slowly add the powdered sugar, buttermilk, and vanilla. Beat until mixture is smooth and thoroughly combined. Frost cake as usual. ; name: oma s chocolate pudding ; ingredients: milk, eggs, sugar, cocoa, custard powder ; preparation:Scald the milk. In a bowl, beat the eggs. Add the sugar, the cocoa and the custard powder. When milk is scalded, add one cup of it to the egg mixture slowly. Then add the egg mixture back into the scalded milk slowly. Cook until boiling. Stir constantly. ; name: cinnamon chocolate sherbet ; ingredients: cocoa powder, sugar, ground cinnamon, nutmeg, water, evaporated milk, vanilla extract ; preparation:In saucepan, mix cocoa, sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg. Whisk in the water. Bring to a boil. Continue whisking to break up lumps and prevent burning. Reduce heat and simmer 2-3 minutes, until sugar is completely dissolved. Remove from heat add the milk and vanilla. Let cool. When the mixture reaches room temperature, pour in ice-cream maker. Freeze according to directions. ; name: guiltless hot chocolate ; ingredients: dutch-processed cocoa powder, granulated sugar, hot water, salt, fat-free half-and-half, vanilla extract, almond extract ; preparation:Combine cocoa powder, sugar, salt, and hot water in a medium saucepan. Stirring frequently, cook over medium heat until mixture boils. Stir in the half and half and heat through, but do not boil. Remove from heat and add vanilla and almond extracts. Blend well. ; name: mom s chocolate gravy ; ingredients: granulated sugar, butter, milk, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder ; preparation:

name: raspberry granita ; ingredients: fresh raspberry, lemon, sugar, water, mint leaf ; preparation:Combine sugar and water and bring to the boil. Simmer 5 minutes to make a syrup. Allow to cool. Combine berry puree with lemon juice and syrup. Place in a metal bowl or tray. Freeze till set. ; name: apple mint granita ; ingredients: unsweetened apple juice, mint leaves, unsweetened applesauce, sugar, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Mix apple juice and mint leaves and allow to combine overnight in refrigerator. Strain mint leaves out of apple juice. Place a shallow metal pan in freezer. In a nonreactive saucepan, combine applesauce, mint flavored apple juice, sugar, lemon juice and salt. Bring to a boil, then simmer uncovered about 20 minutes. Cool to room temperature. Pour apple mixture into chilled pan. Return to freezer. Stir every 20 minutes until it thickens into coarse crystals, about 1 hour. Stir granita and mound into small cups. Serve immediately. ; name: 1 2 3 granola ; ingredients: rolled oats, wheat germ, sunflower seeds, walnuts, honey, oil, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, combine the first 4 ingredients. In a 2-quart saucepan, heat the honey, oil and vanilla until syrupy. Add to the dry ingredients and mix well. Spread on a jellyroll pan. Bake for 20 minutes, stirring every 5 minutes. Store in a covered container. ; name: granola yogurt berry parfait ; ingredients: plain yogurt, granola cereal, berries, bananas, honey ; preparation:Line up 4 parfait, white wine or other tall glasses. Spoon 2 tablespoons of yogurt, into each glass and smooth surface. Spoon 2 tablespoons of granola overtop and smooth surface. Spoon 2 tablespoons of fruit overtop and smooth surface. Repeat the process, adding a bit of honey here and there, to taste. ; name: simple granola bars ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, oatmeal, crispy rice cereal, mini chocolate chip, skor english toffee bit ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Melt butter or margarine. Stir in brown sugar until dissolved. Stir oatmeal and cereal into butter and sugar. Stir in chocolate chips and skor bits, or any other tasty fillers you would like. Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper. Pack oatmeal mix into cookie sheet. Bake in oven for 10 minutes. Cool, and cut into 24 pieces. ; name: wheat walnut granola ; ingredients: nonstick cooking spray, bite size shredded whole wheat cereal, walnuts, salt, honey, raisins, dried cranberries, vanilla, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Spray a large, shallow baking pan with no-stick cooking spray. In a large bowl toss together shredded wheat and walnuts. Set aside. In a small bowl stir together honey, vanilla, cinnamon, and salt, if using. Pour over the dry ingredients and toss thoroughly to combine. Spread evenly in the prepared baking pan and bake for 25-30 minutes, stirring two or three times, until the mixture is lightly toasted. If it seems damp, it will crisp as it cools. Cool completely, then add the dried fruit. Store in an airtight container. ; name: honey maple granola ; ingredients: old fashioned oats, shredded coconut, nuts, cinnamon, salt, vegetable oil, honey, maple syrup, dried fruit ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300 degrees. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper. Combine rolled oats, coconut, nuts, cinnamon, and salt. In a separate bowl stir together oil, maple syrup and honey. Pour liquid mixture over the dry ingredients and stir together. Spread onto the prepared baking sheet and bake for approx 20-25 minutes. The longer you bake it the crunchier the granola will be. It may still be sticky when it comes out of the oven, but it will become crisp and dry as it cools. Place baking sheet on a wire cooling rack. Once cooled, mix in the dried fruit and store in an airtight container or plastic bag in the refrigerator. It will keep for several weeks. ; name: summertime soy granita ; ingredients: sugar, water, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, vanilla-flavored soymilk, slivered almonds, mint sprig ; preparation:

name: cornbread ww core ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, splenda granular, fat free sugar free yogurt, nonfat sour cream, egg ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients in a medium bowl. Mix liquid ingredients in a small bowl. Gently fold the wet into the dry. Pour into a round cake pan, sprayed with pam. Bake at 375 degrees for 15-20 minutes or until the edges are a golden brown and a toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cut into 6 wedges. ; name: good eats creamed corn cornbread alton brown ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, kosher salt, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, buttermilk, eggs, creamed corn, canola oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f place a 10-inch cast iron skillet into the oven. In a bowl, combine the cornmeal, salt, sugar, baking powder, and baking soda. Whisk together to combine well. In a large bowl, combine the buttermilk, eggs, and creamed corn, whisking together to combine thoroughly. Add the dry ingredients to the buttermilk mixture and stir to combine. If the batter will not pour, add more buttermilk to the batter. Add 2 tablespoons canola oil to the cast iron skillet. Pour the batter into the skillet. Bake until the cornbread is golden brown and springs back upon the touch, about 20 minutes. ; name: rustic oatmeal cornbread ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, oatmeal, baking powder, salt, eggs, margarine, milk, sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Mix together dry ingredients. Stir in beaten eggs, butter, & milk. Add enough additional butter or oil to cover the bottom of a 9 or 10 inch cast iron skillet and place pan in hot oven. When the pan is very hot, remove from the oven & pour the cornbread batter into the skillet. Return to oven & bake approximately 15 minutes until browned. Cut into wedges to serve. ; name: world s greatest cornbread ; ingredients: cornmeal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, creamed corn, canola oil, sour cream ; preparation:Heat oven 400. Combine dry ingredients. Combine wet ingredients. Combine. Pour into a sprayed 9x9. Bake 20-25 minutes. ; name: moist cornbread ; ingredients: white flour, cornmeal, salt, baking powder, white sugar, milk, oil, creamed corn, eggs ; preparation:Turn oven on to 300 degrees. In large bowl mix together dry ingredients, first 5 ingredients. In smaller bowl mix together wet ingredients, last 4 ingredients. Add wet ingredients to larger bowl of dry ingredients. Mix well. Grease an 8-9 inch cast iron pan with pam. Pour batter into pan and bake for 1 hour. ; name: sunny cornbread muffins ; ingredients: flour, yellow cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, buttermilk, canola oil, whole kernel corn ; preparation:In large bowl, combine the flour, cornmeal, sugar, baking powder, and salt. In a small bowl, whisk the egg, buttermilk and oil. Stir into dry ingredients just until moistened. Fold in corn. Fill greased muffin cups three-fourths full. Bake at 400 for 18-22 minutes or until a toothpick comes out clean. Cool for 5 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack. Serve warm. ; name: whole wheat flatbread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, salt, warm water, vegetable oil ; preparation:Mix flours together. Mix salt into water to dissolve. Add water and oil to flour, mix well. Knead briefly on floured surface, let rest 10-15 minutes. Cut into 12 equal parts. Roll each flat, do not stack them. Cook on ungreased griddle, a few minutes on each side until golden brown. Optional - brush with melted butter or olive oil immediately after removing from griddle. ; name: iron chef cornbread ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, baking powder, salt, baking soda, eggs, creamed corn, canola oil, plain fat-free yogurt ; preparation:

name: bunches of bananas bread ; ingredients: bananas, sugar substitute, vanilla, all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon ; preparation:In one bowl, mash the bananas until smooth and add the sugar and vanilla, blending until incorporated. In another bowl, mix the dry ingredients until well blended and add to the bananas. Mix these thoroughly. Pour this into a 9x13 glass baking dish or a regular loaf pan. Bake at 350 for an hour. ; name: banana banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, butter, brown sugar, eggs, bananas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Lightly grease 9 x 5 loaf pan. In large bowl, combine flour, soda and salt. In separate bowl, cream together butter and brown sugar. Stir in eggs and mashed bananas until well blended. Stir banana mixture into flour mixture. Stir just to moisten. Pour batter into prepared loaf pan. Bake in preheated oven for 60-65 minutes until a toothpick inserted into center of loaf comes out clean. Let bread cool in pan for 10 minutes, then turn out onto a wire rack. ; name: naturally sweetened banana bread ; ingredients: bananas, unsweetened applesauce, eggs, water, vanilla extract, whole wheat flour, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 f. Mash the bananas until they are mostly lump-free. With a hand mixer, beat together the banana, applesauce, eggs, vanilla, and water until creamy. In a separate bowl, sift the flour, baking soda, baking powder, and spices. Gradually add the dry mixture to the wet ingredients, beating well. Pour the batter into a gently oiled and floured 95 inches loaf pan and spread evenly. Bake for 45 minutes or until a toothpick is inserted and comes out clean. Cool completely on wire rack before slicing. ; name: wonderful banana bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, wheat bran, baking soda, salt, butter, applesauce, splenda brown sugar blend, eggs, mashed bananas, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 loaf pan. In a large bowl, combine the flour, baking soda and salt. In a separate bowl, cream together the butter and brown sugar. Stir the eggs, applesauce and mashed bananas into the butter mixture until well blended. Stir the banana mixture into flour mixture just to moisten. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan. Bake in a preheated oven for 60-65 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of loaf comes out clean. Let the bread cool in the pan for 10 minutes and then turn out onto a wire rack to cool. ; name: big moist banana bread ; ingredients: sugar, shortening, eggs, milk, banana, flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, walnuts ; preparation:Mix together sugar, shortenign and eggs. Stir in milk and bananas. Sift together and stir in flour, baking powder, soda and salt. Blend in chopped nuts. Pour into well greased 9 x 5 x3 inch pan. Let stand for 20 minutes before baking. Bake at 350 degrees until it tests done. ; name: our favorite banana bread ; ingredients: butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, eggs, bananas, sour cream, walnuts ; preparation:Cream butter. Gradually add sugar, beating with a mixer at medium speed. Combine flour with baking powder, baking soda, and salt, stirring well. Combine eggs, banana, and sour cream. Stir well. Add flour to creamed mixture, alternately with banana mixture, beginning and ending with flour mixture. Mix until blended after each addition. Stir in walnuts. Pour batter into greased and floured 9 x 5 x 3-inch loaf pan. Bake at 350 degrees for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until a wooden pck inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool completely on a wire rack. Yield 1 loaf. ; name: moist banana nut bread ; ingredients: sugar, eggs, butter, flour, baking soda, baking powder, bananas, nuts, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cream sugar, eggs and butter. Add dry ingredients. Add mashed bananas, nuts, cinnamon and vanilla. Cook in greased loaf pan for about an hour. For small-medium muffins. 20-30 minutes. ; name: banana bread ii ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, applesauce, granulated sugar, egg whites, bananas, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: chocolate chewy cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsifted flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: chocolate chunked cookies ; ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, eggs, granulated sugar, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Melt chocolate and butter, and let cool slightly. In a bowl, whisk flour, cocoa powder and salt. In large mixer bowl, beat eggs, sugar and vanilla until pale yellow and slightly thickened, about 5 minutes with mixer on medium. Turn mixer to low, beat in cooled chocolate mixture, then flour mixture until blended. Stir in chips. Drop cookies onto nonstick baking sheet, about 2 leveled tablespoons per cookie, about 2-inches apart. Bake 14 minutes or until tops are slightly cracked, centers will still be soft. ; name: brown sugar chews ; ingredients: egg, light brown sugar, vanilla flavoring, flour, salt, baking soda, nuts ; preparation:Beat egg. Add sugar and vanilla. Blend in dry ingredients. Add nuts. Pour into well greased 8 inch square pan. Bake in 350 degrees f oven for 20-25 minutes. Allow to cool completely before cutting. This will be slightly soft when removed from oven. ; name: our favorite chocolate cookies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate bits, butter, condensed milk, all-purpose flour, nuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: fat free chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, baking soda, salt, karo syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg white until blended. Drop by rounded teaspoon onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, light corn syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Spray cookie sheet with cooking spray. In a large bowl combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg whites until throughly blended. Drop dough by rounded teaspoonfuls, about 1 inch apart onto prepared sheets. Bake 7 to 9 minutes, or until set. Remove cookies to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: chocolate chews ; ingredients: baking chocolate, butter, eggs, sugar, vanilla, cake flour, nuts ; preparation:

name: crock pot chops ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, minced garlic clove, soy sauce, chicken broth, brown sugar, cornstarch, water, rice ; preparation:Brown pork chops in oil if desired. I never do this step. Place chops in crock pot. Add to crock pot- garlic, soy sauce, broth, brown sugar. Cook in crock pot on low for 6 hours. Remove the chops carefully as they will fall apart quite easily. Combine cornstarch and cold water. Gradually stir cornstarch into the sauce in crock pot. Put the chops back into the crock pot and cook 20 to 30 minutes longer until sauce thickens. Serve over rice, if desired. ; name: super saucy pork chops and rice ; ingredients: pork chops, crushed tomatoes, brown sugar, vinegar, garlic powder, sweet onion, molasses, chili powder, cooked rice ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except pork chops and rice in a slow cooker. Stir until well blended. Add pork chops. Cook for 6 hours. Serve over rice, or add cooked rice to mixture during the last half hour of cooking. ; name: pork sauteed with sauerkraut ; ingredients: bacon, boneless pork chop, yellow onion, garlic, sauerkraut, paprika, sugar, lager beer, salt and pepper ; preparation:Render the fat out of the bacon, then cook until crisp. Removed the bacon from the pan, without draining oil. Saute the onion in the bacon fat until nicely caramelized. Add the pork strips and brown on all sides. Add salt and pepper to taste. Add garlic about 1 minute before the pork is done. Add the sauerkraut and saute about 10 minutes, until the sauerkraut starts to brown and wilt a bit. Sprinkle the sugar over the sauerkraut and mix in. Mix the paprika into the beer, and add to the pan. Cook until most of the beer has evaporated. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with reserved bacon crumbled on top. ; name: crock pot sauerkraut and sausage ; ingredients: baby carrots, red potatoes, polish sausage, sauerkraut, onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, pepper, caraway seed ; preparation:Layer carrots and potatoes in crock pot, set aside. In a skillet, brown sausage on all sides and transfer to cooker. Reserving drippings from sausage, saut onion and garlic till translucent and add broth. Bring to a boil and stir in pepper and caraway. Pour over sausage in cooker. Place sauerkraut over all. Cover and cook on low till veggies are tender, about 8 hours. ; name: savory pork ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, olive oil, butter, fresh mushrooms, fresh green beans, garlic cloves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops. ; name: crock pot rathskeller pork ; ingredients: pork steaks, olive oil, condensed cream of asparagus soup, green onion, seasoning salt, black pepper, water, potatoes, cabbage, light cream ; preparation:In large skillet, brown chops in oil on both sides. Drain off excess fat. Combine undiluted soup with onions, seasoned salt, pepper, and water. Arrange alternate layers of meat, potatoes, and cabbage in crock pot. Pour soup mixture over. Cover and cook 4 to 6 hours on low. Turn to high. Add cream. Cover and cook on high for 20 to 30 minutes. ; name: saucy vegetables ; ingredients: potatoes, carrots, cream of mushroom soup, cheese, milk, corn, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat stove to high heat. Half fill medium saucepan with water and heat to boiling. Add potatoes and carrot and cook until just tender. Drain and set aside. While potatoes are cooking, turn on another burner to medium-low heat. Combine soup, cheese and milk in a small saucepan. Cook and stir until sauce is hot. Add potatoes, carrots and corn to sauce. Cook and stir until all vegetables are hot. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: simplified choucroute garni for crock pot pork chops sauerk ; ingredients: dried italian seasoning, salt, pepper, potatoes, boneless pork chops, tart apples, sauerkraut, kielbasa, sweet white wine, frozen peas ; preparation:

name: chocolate toffee cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, butter, vanilla, powdered sugar, brown sugar, mini chocolate chip, english toffee bits, pecans ; preparation:Mix cream cheese, butter and vanilla. Stir in sugars and fold in chips and toffee bits. Refrigerate 2 to 3 hours. Form into a ball and roll in copped pecans. Serve with graham crackers or apple slices. ; name: cream cheese candy ; ingredients: pecans, butter, cream cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Put pecans & butter in oven and toast about 15 minutes at 300f. Melt cream cheese over low heat until creamy. Add powdered sugar, vanilla and nuts. Mix very well. Put in fridge until set. ; name: pineapple cream cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, bell pepper, onions, seasoning salt, pecans, crushed pineapple ; preparation:Combine all ingredients, savings some pecans to roll cheese ball in. Pack mixture into a bowl or mold. Chill until firm. Remove and roll in pecans to coat exterior. Serve with crackers. ; name: apple cinnamon cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, cinnamon, dried apple, nuts, cinnamon stick, bay leaf ; preparation:In medium to large bowl, combine cream cheese, cheddar cheese, and cinnamon. Beat until well blended. Stir in apples until evenly distributed. Shape mixture into a ball by rolling it around inside the bowl. Once ball is formed, pour crushed nuts into a second bowl, and roll cheese ball in the crushed nuts until the outside is covered. Presenting the cheese ball on a plate, place cinnamon stick and bay leaf in the top of the ball to make it look like an apple. ; name: cream cheese chicken ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, dry ranch dressing mix, chicken meat, cheddar cheese, pecans ; preparation:Combine cream cheese and ranch dressing mix. Add chicken and cheddar cheese. Mix well. You can shape this into a ball and roll it in chopped pecans or just serve as a spread. Can be served immediately or can be refrigerated until ready to serve. Serve with crackers. ; name: old school cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, kraft old english cheese spread, kraft roka blue spread, garlic powder, worcestershire sauce, pecans ; preparation:Let all three cheeses get to room temperature. With a blender, mix together all ingredients except the nuts. Shape into 1 or 2 balls. Roll each cheese ball in nuts, place on a piece of waxed paper and put in the fridge to set up. Serve with buttery crackers on the side. ; name: nutty cheese ball ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, swiss cheese, light cream cheese, fresh chives, worcestershire sauce, paprika, garlic powder, pecans, crackers ; preparation:Place all ingredients except pecans and crackers in mixer bowl. Attach bowl and flat beater to mixer. Turn to speed 4 and beat about 1 minute, or until well blended. On waxed paper, shape mixture into a ball. Roll ball in chopped pecans. Wrap in waxed paper. Refrigerate until serving time. ; name: sweet cream cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, mini chocolate chip, vanilla, pecans, graham cracker sticks ; preparation:

name: roasted glazed sweet potatoes with apples ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apples, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, butter, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. On a baking sheet with sides, toss sweet potatoes and apples with oil, salt and pepper. Spread out into single layer. Roast 30 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, stir together butter, brown sugar and pumpkin pie spices. Spoon over potato mixture and toss to coat. Continue baking for 10 minutes or until sugar has melted. ; name: crock pot orange spiced sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, dark brown sugar, butter, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, orange, juice of, salt, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Place sweet potatoes in bottom of slow cooker. Mix spices and orange juice together. Stir into sweet potatoes. Cook on high for 2 hours or on low for 4 hours. Check for doneness because each crock pot cooks at a different heat setting. Before serving, stir in toasted pecans. ; name: spiced sweet potatoes in peaches ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, lemon juice, brown sugar, ground cloves, canned peach halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine potatoes, lemon juice, brown sugar and cloves. Drain peach halves and arrange in baking dish. Fill centers with sweet potatoes. Bake for 20 minutes. ; name: peanut butter sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, creamy peanut butter, pecans ; preparation:Slice the sweet potatoes and put them into a 2 quart buttered casserole dish. In a large saucepan, melt the butter. Add the brown sugar, cinnamon and pecans and mix well. Cook until the sugar is dissolved. Add the peanut butter and stir until it is well blended and the peanut butter blends inches. Once it is well blended, add the pecans and stir well. Pour this mixture over the potatoes. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes. ; name: cranberry apple sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple pie filling, cranberry sauce, apricot preserves, orange marmalade ; preparation:Cut fresh potatoes into bite size pieces. In a large saucepan cook potatoes, covered in enough boiling water to cover, about 15 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside. Spread pie filling in an 8x8 inch baking dish. Arrange cooked fresh or canned sweet potatoes on top. In a small mixing bowl, stir together cranberry sauce, apricot preserves, and orange marmalade. Spoon over sweet potatoes. Bake uncovered in a 350f oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until heated through. ; name: candied sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, brown sugar, orange zest, vanilla, cinnamon, salt, nutmeg ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Place potatoes in 13x9 baking pan. In lg saucepan combine remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Boil for 2 minutes. Pour over potatoes. Cover and bake for 45 minutes. ; name: sweet potatoes with pecan praline streusel ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, cinnamon, brown sugar, mini marshmallows, flour, pecans ; preparation:Wash and skin potatoes, chop into large chunks. Boil potatoes until tender and mash. Stir in butter, cinnamon, brown sugar and mini marshmallows to taste. Mix in a separate bowl, flour, sugar, cinnamon, and pecans, drizzle melted butter over mixture and stir to moisten, mixture should resemble chunky crumbs. Pour potatoes mixture into casserole dish and cover with a thin layer of mini-marshmallows. Top with pecan mixture. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes or until brown and bubbly. ; name: apple spiced sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple pie filling, golden raisin, butter, apple pie spice, pecans, sugar ; preparation:

name: salsa pronto ; ingredients: mexican-style stewed tomatoes, onion, fresh cilantro, lemon juice, garlic clove, hot pepper sauce, fresh jalapeno pepper ; preparation:Place tomatoes in a blender or food processor. Cover and blend on lowest speed 2 seconds to chop tomatoes. Combine tomatoes with onion, cilantro, lemon juice, garlic, hot pepper sauce, and jalapeno. Taste and adjust seasonings, if desired. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: tropical salsa ; ingredients: strawberry, kiwi, green onion, yellow sweet peppers, lemon juice, fresh cilantro, sugar, ground red pepper ; preparation:In a medium bowl stir together the strawberries. Kiwi fruit. Green onion. Sweet pepper. Lime or lemon juice. Cilantro, parsley, or basil. Sugar. And pepper. Cover and chill salsa for 6 hours. ; name: citrus salsa ; ingredients: grapefruit, orange, tomatoes, green bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, red onions, cilantro, sugar, salt ; preparation:Peel, section and chop the grapefruit and orange. Place in a medium bowl. Seed and dice the tomato, green pepper and jalapeno. Add to the fruit. Dice the red onion and cilantro. Add to the bowl. Add the sugar and salt to the the salsa ingredients. Stir to combine. Drain juice before serving. Serve with tortilla chips. Also good as a condiment with grilled chicken or pork. ; name: chile morita salsa ; ingredients: chilies, tomatillo, garlic clove, salt ; preparation:Take the moritas and cook them in a hot dry cast-iron skillet until they inflate and start to pop a little. Into the cast-iron skillet, pour water over the chiles, turn off the heat, and allow them to soften and become plumper, which will take about half an hour. Meanwhile, stir the whole tomatillos in another skillet until they blister and black spots appear. Immediately transfer them to a blender. Place the garlic, moritas and a pinch of salt in the blender, and puree until smooth. It will be a deep red color with lots of seeds. ; name: fresh tomatillo salsa verde ; ingredients: tomatillo, jalapeno, garlic cloves, fresh cilantro, lime juice, sugar, salt, olive oil ; preparation:Husk and wash tomatillos. Chop the tomatillos into very course chunks. Set aside. Depending on how hot you like your salsa, either remove the seeds and veins from the jalapenos or leave them intact. Chop the jalapeno into small chunks and put into blender or food processor. Peel the garlic, put into blender. Take the cilantro, remove the leaves from the stems and put into blender. Put lime juice, salt, sugar and olive oil into the blender. Last, put the tomatillos into blender and blend until smooth. Serve chilled. Be sure to experiment with different amounts of jalapeno, lime juice, salt, etc. ; name: ultimate warm salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, jalapenos, serrano pepper, onion, fresh cilantro, olive oil, garlic, comino, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Using a food processor, process the tomatoes to a chunky puree, do not liquify. In a large skillet or frying pan, heat the oil and add the peppers and onions. Saute until the onion softens and is clear 5-10 minutes. Add the tomato puree and spices. Simmer for 20-30 minutes or until desired consistency. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: cranberry jalapeno salsa ; ingredients: cranberries, green onion, fresh orange juice, honey, water, green bell pepper, fresh cilantro, sugar, jalapeno pepper, salt ; preparation:Place the cranberries in a food processor. Pulse 3-4 times until chopped. Transfer to a bowl. Add in all the remaining ingredients except the salt. Mix well to combine. Season with salt to taste and more sugar if needed. Cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 3 hours before using. ; name: chilean cilantro salsa pebre ; ingredients: garlic clove, salt, fresh ground pepper, olive oil, sherry wine vinegar, green onions, jalapenos, fresh cilantro leaves, water ; preparation:

name: fried corn nuggets ; ingredients: corn, eggs, all-purpose flour, sugar, salt, pepper, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine corn, lightly beaten egg yolks, flour, sugar, salt and pepper in a large bowl. Beat egg whites with an electric mixer set at high speed until stiff peaks form, about 2 minutes. Stir egg whites into corn mixture. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Drop heaping tablespoonfuls of corn batter into skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook until nuggets are browned, about 3 minutes per side. ; name: corn and rice ; ingredients: rice-a-roni, whole kernel corn, sweet creamy butter, salt, pepper, paprika, red cayenne pepper ; preparation:Pepare either the rice a roni or the rice as directed by the instructions on the box or bag. Once the rice, or rice a roni, is fully cooked drain the corn and add it to the rice. Add the butter next. Then add the salt, pepper, and paprika. Add red pepper to taste, the more pepper the spicier the dish will be. Stir it all together and then let sit for 5 more minutes on low heat. Serve at once or place in fridge for a later meal. It will keep for about 4 days in the fridge. ; name: chicken fried corn on the cob ; ingredients: milk, egg, flour, seasoning salt, pepper, corn, oil ; preparation:Combine milk and egg in shallow dish and mix well. Combine flour, seasoned salt and pepper in shallow dish and mix well. Dip each ear of corn into milk and egg mixture, then roll in seasoned flour. Knock off excess flour. In a large skillet, heat oil to 350 degrees. Add corn and fry for 5 minutes or until golden brown. Drain on paper towels. ; name: corn spoon bread ; ingredients: whole milk, fresh corn kernels, cornmeal, butter, fresh thyme leave, kosher salt, black pepper, eggs ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 f. In a large saucepan, over medium heat, bring 2 cups of the milk and the corn to a boil. In a small bowl, whisk together the remaining milk and the cornmeal. Whisking constantly, slowly add the mixture to the boiling milk. Reduce heat and simmer gently, stirring frequently, for 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in the butter, thyme, salt, pepper and eggs. Transfer to a buttered casserole or cast-iron skillet. Bake until golden and set, about 30 minutes. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: jalapeno corn grits ; ingredients: butter, jalapeno, fresh corn kernels, onion, grits, water, fresh thyme, kosher salt, cracked black pepper ; preparation:Melt the butter in a medium saucepan. Add the jalapeno, corn and onion. Saute until the vegetables are tender. Stir in the grits. Add the water gradually, stirring constantly. Cook over medium heat until the grits have absorbed all the water, stirring constantly. Stir in the thyme and season with salt and pepper. ; name: tasty triple corn fritters ; ingredients: flour, yellow cornmeal, baking powder, sugar, salt, eggs, milk, oil, cream-style corn, whole kernel corn ; preparation:Lightly spoon flour into measuring cup. Combine flour, cornmeal, baking powder, sugar and salt in a medium bowl. Combine eggs, milk, oil and cream style corn in a large bowl. Blend in dry ingredients, stirring just until moistened. Stir in whole kernel corn. In deep fryer or heavy saucepan drop batter by tablespoonfuls and fry in 2-3 inches of hot oil or fat for 2-3 minutes on each side until golden brown. Drain on paper towles. ; name: asian popcorn ; ingredients: popped popcorn, rice crackers, butter, soy sauce, ground ginger, sesame oil ; preparation:Mix popcorn and asian snack mix together in a large bowl. In a small microwave-safe bowl, microwave butter on high until melted, about 20 seconds. Stir in soy sauce, ginger and oil. Drizzle over popcorn mixture. Toss. Spread mixture on a baking sheet and bake in a 300 f oven for 20 minutes, stirring once. Allow to cool, serve or store in airtight container. ; name: indonesian corn patties ; ingredients: corn kernels, fish sauce, fresh cracked pepper, crushed red pepper flakes, shallots, egg, cornflour, oil ; preparation:

name: savoury noodle goulash ; ingredients: fat, ground beef, onions, celery, noodles, tomatoes, cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown meat in fat. Add onions and celery and cook 10 minutes. Gently mix in remaining ingredients. Simmer or place in a buttered 2 qt casserole. Simmer 30 minutes, or bake at 350f for 45. ; name: jody s goulash ; ingredients: pasta shells, ground beef, salt, onion, whole kernel corn, stewed tomatoes, tomato paste ; preparation:Boil noodles and drain. In large skillet, add ground beef, onions and salt. Cook until beef is browned. Add the cooked noodles and the rest of the ingredients. Cover and cook on low heat for 30 minutes. ; name: emaw s goulash ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green bell pepper, garlic cloves, tomatoes, whole kernel corn, tomato sauce, elbow macaroni, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Prepare elbow macaroni according to directions on package till al dente. Save a little of the pasta water in case you need it later to loosen the sauce. Brown meat in a large skillet, drain the fat and add the onion and bell pepper half way through cooking. Drain any ramaining fat when onion and pepper is done and add garlic, stir it about. Add the meat mixture to the cooked macaroni, add the canned tomatoes, corn and sauce. Mix all this together and add seasoning to taste. You may need to add some of the pasta water to loosen the sauce if it is too dry. This is really good the next day too. ; name: goulash heart healthy version ; ingredients: ground turkey, whole wheat elbow macaroni, onion, light cheese whiz, garlic powder, diced tomatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook macaroni until al dente, drain and reserve. Brown ground turkey. Add onion and garlic powder, cook until onion is translucent. Add tin of tomatoes, with their juices. Return cooked macaroni to pot, heat through. Add cheez whiz, stir until melted. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. ; name: picky mike s goulash ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, mixed vegetables, diced tomatoes, tomato sauce, small elbow macaroni, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a stew or dutch-oven pot, saute meat and chopped onions until brown. Pour off any grease. Add to browned meat& onions all of the remaining ingredients. Stir and bring to boil, then turn down to medium-low or simmer and put lid on pot. Simmer 20 minutes or until noodles are done. Stir occasionally to keep from sticking to bottom of pot. ; name: crock pot mexican goulash ; ingredients: fat-free chili, fat-free refried beans, whole kernel corn, salsa, fat free cheese, flour tortillas, sour cream ; preparation:Spray crock pot with cooking spray. In a large bowl stir together the chili, beans, corn, and salsa until well mixed. Lay one tortilla flat on the bottom of the crock pot. Pour one-fifth of mixture on top. Continue layering the tortillas and the remaining four-fifths of the mixture until all the ingredients are used up. Cover and cook on low for 7hrs. Using a sharp knife cut through all the layers, making a checkerboard design on top. Each cut out should be about 1 inch apart. With a large spoon stir the entire dish to mix up the cut up tortilla pieces. Or scoop out of crock pot without stirring up for a more formed meal. Serve in bowls, sprinkled cheese, and top with sour cream if desired. ; name: okra goulash ; ingredients: ground beef, whole tomatoes, water, okra, onions, worcestershire sauce, creole seasoning, pepper, cooked rice ; preparation:Cook ground beef in a large dutch oven until the meat is browned, stirring to crumble the meat. Drain well. Add the tomatoes and the next 6 ingredients. Stir well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer, uncovered, 3 hours or until thickened. Serve over rice, if desired. ; name: easy for sheezy goulash ; ingredients: ground turkey, olive oil, garlic, spaghetti sauce, sweet corn, onion, italian seasoning, elbow macaroni ; preparation:

name: hot mulled crock pot punch ; ingredients: cranberry juice, apple juice, brown sugar, salt, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves ; preparation:Pour cranberry and apple juices into crock pot. Add brown sugar and salt. Stir until dissolved. Tie cinnamon sticks and cloves in cheesecloth or put them in a tea ball and add to crock pot. Heat on low for 2 hours. Remove cinnamon and cloves. Serve hot. ; name: hot spiced holiday punch ; ingredients: apple cider, cranberry-raspberry juice, fresh raspberries, brandy, brown sugar, cinnamon sticks, fresh ginger, whole cloves, whole allspice, cooking apples ; preparation:Combine apple cider, cranberry-raspberry juice, raspberries, brandy, brown sugar, cinnamon, ginger, cloves and allspice in a 4- to 5-quart dutch oven. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer 15 minutes. Strain punch through a sieve lined with cheesecloth. To serve, return punch to dutch oven. Add apple wedges. Cover and heat until boiling. Pour hot punch into a heatproof bowl or transfer to crockpot. Serve in heatproof cups, floating an apple wedge in each serving. ; name: hot apple tea ; ingredients: apple cider, sugar, cinnamon sticks, fresh ginger, tea bags ; preparation:Bring cider, sugar, cinnamon and ginger to boil in a medium saucepan.
