Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Add tea bags, cover and let steep 5 minutes. Strain. Serve hot. ; name: hot christmas tea ; ingredients: water, black tea bags, cinnamon stick, cloves, sugar, cranberry juice cocktail, burgundy wine, orange slices, clove ; preparation:In saucepan, bring water to boil. Add tea and spices, cover, and let stand 5 minutes. Remove tea bags. Stir in sugar, cranberry juice, and wine. Return to medium heat and stir until sugar is dissolved and mixture is heated through. Serve in cups with fruit slices as garnish. ; name: slow cooker cranberry tea ; ingredients: sugar, water, cinnamon sticks, cranberry juice, frozen orange juice, fresh lemon juice, orange slice ; preparation:In saucepan, combine sugar, 8 cups water and cinnamon sticks. Mix well and bring to a boil. Pour mixture into slow cooker with remaining ingredients. Cover and cook on high-heat setting for 1 hour. Reduce heat to low and serve slow cooker cranberry tea warm. ; name: southern tea punch ; ingredients: orange juice, tea bags, of fresh mint, water, sugar, lemon juice ; preparation:Boil water. Add to large teapot with 5-6 teabags and fresh mint. Steep until cool. Add to orange juice. Add sugar to taste. Add squeeze of lemon juice. ; name: chilled cranberry soup ; ingredients: water, granulated sugar, cinnamon sticks, ground cloves, fresh cranberries, fresh lemon juice, orange zest, sour cream ; preparation:In a r4-quart sucepan, mix water, sugar, cinnamon sticks & cloves. Bring to boil over high heat, then add cranberries & return to a boil. Reduce heat & cook until cranberries pop, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat & stir in lemon juice & orange zest. Cool to room temperature, then chill about 4 hours in the refrigerator. When ready to serve, top each bowl of soup with a dollop of sour cream. Refrigerate any leftovers. ; name: cranberry tea hot punch ; ingredients: tea bags, boiling water, unsweetened cranberry juice, apple cider, brown sugar, cinnamon stick, ginger, cloves, cinnamon sticks, orange slices ; preparation:

name: grilled sweet potato packets with pecan butter ; ingredients: sweet potato, sweet onions, vegetable oil, butter, light brown sugar, salt, ground cinnamon, pecans ; preparation:Prepare barbecue grill for direct cooking. Alternately place potato slices and onion rings on four 1412-inch sheets of heavy-duty foil. Brush tops and sides with oil to prevent drying. Double fold sides and ends of foil to seal packets. Place foil packets on grid. Grill packets, on covered grill, over medium coals 25 to 30 minutes or until potatoes are fork-tender. Meanwhile, to prepare pecan butter, combine butter, sugar, salt and cinnamon in small bowl. Mix well. Stir in pecans. Carefully open packets. Top each with dollop of pecan butter. ; name: maple roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, pure maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Arrange sweet potatoes in an even layer in a 9-by-13-inch glass baking dish. Combine maple syrup, butter, lemon juice, salt and pepper in a small bowl. Pour the mixture over the sweet potatoes. Toss to coat. Cover and bake the sweet potatoes for 15 minutes. Uncover, stir and cook, stirring every 15 minutes, until tender and starting to turn brown, 45 to 50 minutes more. ; name: peanut butter sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, creamy peanut butter, pecans ; preparation:Slice the sweet potatoes and put them into a 2 quart buttered casserole dish. In a large saucepan, melt the butter. Add the brown sugar, cinnamon and pecans and mix well. Cook until the sugar is dissolved. Add the peanut butter and stir until it is well blended and the peanut butter blends inches. Once it is well blended, add the pecans and stir well. Pour this mixture over the potatoes. Bake at 350 degrees for 25-30 minutes. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes potatoes and carrots ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, potatoes, baby carrots, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, salt, oregano, rosemary, bulb of garlic, black pepper ; preparation:Peel and cut in bite size pieces all the vegetable. Peel and squash the garlic but do not cut it. Mix the vegetables, garlic and all remaining. Ingredients. Spread on a parchemin lined pan. Broil until nice and golden about half an hour. ; name: sweet potatoes with pecan praline streusel ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, cinnamon, brown sugar, mini marshmallows, flour, pecans ; preparation:Wash and skin potatoes, chop into large chunks. Boil potatoes until tender and mash. Stir in butter, cinnamon, brown sugar and mini marshmallows to taste. Mix in a separate bowl, flour, sugar, cinnamon, and pecans, drizzle melted butter over mixture and stir to moisten, mixture should resemble chunky crumbs. Pour potatoes mixture into casserole dish and cover with a thin layer of mini-marshmallows. Top with pecan mixture. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes or until brown and bubbly. ; name: chili roasted sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, sugar, chili powder, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Cut each potato lengthwise into 8 wedges. Line a large rimmed baking sheet with parchment paper. Toss potatoes with oil, sugar, chili powder, salt, and ground pepper, until coated. Place sweet potatoes, cut sides down, on baking sheet. Roast potatoes until browned and tender, 15 to 20 minutes. Season with additional salt, if desired, before serving. ; name: roasted glazed sweet potatoes with apples ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apples, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, butter, brown sugar, pumpkin pie spice ; preparation:Heat oven to 375 degrees f. On a baking sheet with sides, toss sweet potatoes and apples with oil, salt and pepper. Spread out into single layer. Roast 30 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Meanwhile, stir together butter, brown sugar and pumpkin pie spices. Spoon over potato mixture and toss to coat. Continue baking for 10 minutes or until sugar has melted. ; name: roasted sweet potatoes with pineapple and pecans ; ingredients: vegetable oil, sweet potatoes, fresh pineapple, salt, pecans, pure maple syrup, orange marmalade, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: chicken wild rice soup mmmmmmmmm ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, cream cheese, wild rice mix, carrot, frozen chopped broccoli, slivered almonds ; preparation:Bring rice to boil, then reduce heat& simmer 10 minutes. Add broccoli& carrots. Simmer 5 minutes. Add soup& cream cheese. Stir until melted. Just before serving, top each serving with slivered almonds, if desired. ; name: comforting chicken and rice ; ingredients: medium grain rice, cream of mushroom soup, water, dry onion soup mix, chicken pieces, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease 9 x 13 baking dish. Place rice in dish. Combine soup, water and soup mix and pour over rice. Stir to loosely combine. Place chicken on top and gently press down into liquid. Season with black pepper. Cover and bake at 350 for about 1 hour, or until rice is tender and liquid absorbed. It can also be made with pork chops. Decrease the water by 1 can if using long grain rice. ; name: chicken garlic soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, celery, yellow onion, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, garlic, butter, flour ; preparation:Make the chicken broth by simmering chicken, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, parsley, salt and pepper in enough water to cover. When the chicken is thoroughly cooked, remove it and skim the fat from broth. Simmer broth, reducing it until it is very rich. Add the flour and butter to a small amount of broth and mix with a wire whisk until velvety. Pour this mixture into the remaining broth. Tear chicken into bite-sized pieces and add to the soup. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve. ; name: chicken and stars soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, onion, celery, garlic cloves, pasta, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a stock pot, place chicken, carrots, garlic, onion and celery. Cover with water. Boil for thirty to forty minutes, remove chicken from pot. Allow chicken to cool remove skin and bones, then chop chicken into bite-size pieces. Add chicken back to soup, add parsley, pasta, salt and pepper. Allow to simmer until noodles are cooked. You may need to add water to keep soup soupy after pasta has cooked. Use your own judgment. ; name: creamy chicken rice soup ; ingredients: olive oil, chicken breasts, potatoes, celery, lipton recipe secrets savory herb with garlic soup mix, frozen peas and carrot, cream of mushroom soup, chicken broth, garlic and herb rice mix, cream ; preparation:Saute chicken, potatoes, and celery until potatoes become translucent. Sprinkle soup mix and toss until everything is coated. Add frozen vegetables, mushroom soup, broth and rice mix, including seasoning packet. Simmer over medium low heat until rice is tender. Add cream or half and half and heat through. Do not allow to boil. ; name: cabbage and tomato chicken soup ; ingredients: chicken, cabbage, onion, tomatoes, carrots, garlic cloves, fresh chives, fresh basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve. ; name: pumpkin wild rice soup ; ingredients: onion, butter, chicken broth, pumpkin, wild rice, white pepper, heavy cream, fresh chives ; preparation:Saut the onion in the butter in a large saucepan for 5 minutes. Stir in the broth and pumpkin, heat, stirring occasionally, over low heat for 10-15 minutes. Stir in the wild rice and pepper. Continue to heat for another 10 minutes. Stir in the cream and heat through. Do not boil. Garnish with chives or parsley and serve. ; name: mark bittman s chicken and rice soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, long grain white rice, carrot, celery, chicken, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: honey garlic pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, honey, lemon juice, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove ; preparation:In lg. Skillet, coated with nonstick spray, brown chops on both sides. Cook over medium heat till juices run clear. In a bowl, combine the honey, lemon juice, soy sauce, and garlic. Remove chops and keep warm. Add honey mixture to the skillet. Cook over medium heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour over chops. ; name: grilled honey garlic pork chops ; ingredients: ketchup, honey, soy sauce, garlic, boneless pork chops, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine ketchup, honey, soy sauce and garlic. Set aside. Lightly season pork with salt and pepper. Brush each chop with sauce to coat. Cook chops on greased grill 4 to 6 inches from medium-hot coals or on medium setting, basting with sauce often, for about 5 minutes on each side or until meat is cooked through. ; name: pork chops in peach and ginger sauce ; ingredients: pork chops, salt and pepper, peach jam, fresh ginger, red wine vinegar, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Grease a shallow baking dish large enough to hold the chops. Season the chops with salt and pepper. In a bowl stir together the jam, ginger, wine vinegar, and worcestershire sauce. Pour this mixture over the chops and let them marinate for 1 hour. During this time, turn them once and spoon the sauce over the top. Cover the baking dish and bake the chops, in marinade for 25 minutes. ; name: brown sugar glazed pork chops ; ingredients: brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ground ginger, salt and pepper, cornstarch, water, boneless pork loin chops ; preparation:Preheat grill on high for 10 minutes. Meanwhile, in a small saucepan, over medium heat, combine brown sugar, apple juice, canola oil, soy sauce, ginger, salt and pepper to taste, bring to a boil. In a measuring cup or small bowl, whisk cornstarch into the water and mix into brown sugar mixture. Cook, stirring constantly until bubbling and thickened. Reduce grill to medium-high heat. Grill chops on oiled grill, brushing often with brown sugar glaze, about 6-8 minutes per side, or until digital thermometer inserted sideways into the center of each chop reads 160f do not over cook. ; name: grilled fusion pork chops ; ingredients: soy sauce, lime juice, garlic paste, ginger paste, pork chops, garam masala ; preparation:In a bowl, stir together soy sauce, lime juice, garlic, and ginger. Place pork chops in a large ziplock bag. Pour mixture over chops. Seal and refrigerate 2 to 3 hours. Preheat an outdoor grill for direct heat and lightly oil grate. Place chops on the grill. As they cook, sprinkle with a little more of the garam masala. For thick chops, cook about 10 minutes on each side. ; name: south pacific pork chops ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, salt, pepper, sherry wine, soy sauce, vegetable oil, garlic clove, ground ginger, oregano, maple syrup ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Slightly salt and pepper pork. Brown pork chops in cast iron skillet. Place chops in a baking dish. Put all other ingredients into a blender, cover & process until smooth. Pour over chops, cover & bake 1 hour or until tender. Turn once during baking to give both sides added browning. ; name: vietnamese spiced pork chops ; ingredients: boneless center cut pork chops, cooking spray, green onion, brown sugar, paprika, ground coriander, salt, crushed red pepper flakes, minced ginger, garlic ; preparation:Lightly score a diamond pattern on both sides of pork. Combine the ingredients for the rub and rub evenly over pork. Let rest at least 5 minutes. Heat a large nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add pork. Cook 4 minutes on each side or until done. Garnish with sliced green onions, if desired. ; name: ginger honey glazed barbecued pork chops ; ingredients: honey, low sodium soy sauce, rice vinegar, garlic cloves, gingerroot, pork loin chops ; preparation:

name: lime salad ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, boiling water, cream cheese, vanilla extract, mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, pecans, cool whip ; preparation:Dissolve jello in water. In a mixing bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Add jello mixture. Beat until smooth. Stir in vanilla, fruit, soda, and pecans. Chill until mixture mounds slightly when dropped from a spoon. Fold in three-fourths of the cool whip. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan. Chill for 4 hours or until firm. Cut into squares. Garnish with remaining cool whip. ; name: pineapple rice cream salad ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, boiling water, crushed pineapple, pineapple juice, cooked rice, sweetened condensed milk ; preparation:Dissolve jello gelatin in boiling water. Add pineapple juice and refrigerate 1 hour to cool. Also chill the condensed milk for 1 hour. Beat the condensed milk till thick. Beat jello till light and fluffy, then add condensed milk. Fold in rice and well drained pineapple. Chill at least 1 hour. ; name: cranberry pineapple salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, jellied cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple, orange juice, lemon juice, walnuts, lettuce leaf, cool whip ; preparation:In a bowl, dissolve jello in boiling water. Break up and stir in cranberry sauce. Add pineapple, orange juice, and lemon juice. Chill until partially set. Stir in nuts. Pour into a 11x7 inch dish. Chill until firm. Cut into squares. Serve on a lettuce leaf. Top with a dollop of cool whip. ; name: orange pineapple jello salad ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, sugar, orange jell-o, cool whip, cream cheese, milk ; preparation:Drain pineapple juice and reserve. Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate. ; name: strawberry pineapple jello ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, pecans, sour cream, sugar, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, boiling water, ice cubes, strawberries ; preparation:Combine pineapple, pecans, sour cream and sugar, set aside. Dissolve gelatin in boiling water. Add ice cubes and stir until gelatin thickens. Fold in strawberries. Spoon half the mixture into 6-8 parfait glasses. Chill until set. Add pineapple mixture and top with remaining gelatin. Chill until set. Garnish with additional strawberries. ; name: strawberry banana salad ; ingredients: strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, boiling water, frozen strawberries, bananas, crushed pineapple, pecans, sour cream ; preparation:Put jello in a pyrex. Pour boiling water over and stir until completely dissolved. Fold in all fruit and 1 cup nuts. Put in fridge to congeal. When jello is totally set, spread sour cream over top. Sprinkle with rest of pecans. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Prep time doe not include refrigerator time. ; name: cranberry salad ; ingredients: cranberries, oranges, gala apples, crushed pineapple, jello gelatin, raspberry jell-o gelatin, pecans, sugar ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set. ; name: lime jello and pineapple salad ; ingredients: lime jell-o gelatin, sour cream, pineapple ring, carrot, celery, pecans, boiling water ; preparation:

name: two chile green rice ; ingredients: long-grain rice, olive oil, green onions, serrano pepper, lime, juice of, chili powder, oregano, cilantro, water, salt ; preparation:Saute green onions and serrano peppers 2 minutes in olive oil. Add the rice and saute another 2 to 3 minutes. Add lime juice, chile powder and oregano and continue sauteeing another minute or so. Pour in water, add cilantro, bring to a boil then reduce heat, cover and simmer on very low heat for 15 minutes or until rice is done. Salt to taste. ; name: prize winning chile cheese appetizers ; ingredients: butter, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, green chilies, cottage cheese, monterey jack cheese, salsa ; preparation:In a 13 x 9 pan, melt butter. Beat eggs lightly in a large bowl. Add flour and baking powder. Combine. In another bowl, combine remaining ingredients, except salsa. Combine cheese mixture to the flour. Blend well. Pour batter into pan and bake at 400f for 14 minutes. Reduce heat to 350f and bake 35-40 minutes longer. Cut into appetizer size squares and serve warm with salsa. ; name: green chili snackers ; ingredients: green chilies, eggs, garlic powder, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spread chilis on bottom of 8x8 baking dish. Mix eggs with garlic powder and pepper. Pour over chilis. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 25 minutes. Cool for 10 minutes, cut into squares. Serve on crackers. ; name: vickie s green chili souffle ; ingredients: green chilies, sharp cheddar cheese, dry breadcrumbs, eggs, parsley flakes, ground cumin, salt, oregano, light cream, milk ; preparation:Grease a 9 x 13 glass pan. Cover the bottom with the chilies. Sprinkle the cheese over the chilies. Spread bread crumbs over the cheese. In a bowl, beat eggs until light and fluffy. Add remaining ingredients to the eggs, beat again. Pour mixture over cheese. Bake at 375 for 40 minutes. ; name: vegetarian green chili ; ingredients: butter, garlic, onion flakes, flour, diced tomatoes, green chili pepper, salt, cilantro, water ; preparation:In a large sauce pan, melt butter or margarine. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is re-hydtrated. Add flour and stir to make a roux. Add tomatoes, green chili, salt and cilantro. Add water. Simmer for 30 minutes. This can also be made in a crock pot. ; name: arizona green chile cornbread green chili cornbread ; ingredients: creamed corn, egg, cornmeal, garlic salt, salad oil, baking powder, diced green chilies, longhorn cheese ; preparation:Mix all ingredients together, except for 2 handfuls of cheese. Pour into a greased casserole dish. Sprinkle remaining cheese on top. Bake at 350 for 40 minutes or so. Recipe can easily be doubled, tripled, etc., but, if using a deep dish, allow extra baking time. ; name: chili noodle casserole ; ingredients: egg noodles, cream cheese, sour cream, kosher salt, black pepper, chili, cheddar cheese, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f begin cooking noodles according to package directions. Have cream cheese and sour cream ready. Remove noodles from heat, drain in collander, and return directly to pot. Add cream cheese, sour cream, salt, and black pepper. Stirr thoroughly, mixing well. Lightly grease a 9x9 pan with butter or spray butter. Spread half the noodle mixture into pan. Spread chili over top, then spread remaining noodles. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and cayenne pepper. Bake for 30-45 minutes or until heated through. ; name: green chile scones ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, salt, baking powder, green chili pepper, garlic, whipping cream, cayenne ; preparation:

name: baked seasoned beet crisps ; ingredients: beets, balsamic vinegar, sugar, allspice, parsley, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Peel beets and slice into very thin slices. Mix the remaining ingredients together in a small bowl. In a large ziploc bag place the beets and contents of bowl. Shake well to make sure beets are completely coated with liquid. Place beets on a baking sheet coated with nonstick cooking spray and bake for 45 minutes to an hour turning beets halfway through. Keep an eye on them to make sure they dont burn. ; name: beets leeks and onions ; ingredients: beet, onions, baby leeks, garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh rosemary, bay leaves, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat the oven to 425 degrees f. Heat a heavy-based oven roasting pan on top of the stove and toss the vegetables and garlic. Sprinkle with the oil. Stir until they start to brown. Add the herbs, sprinkle over the vinegar and season well. Put the pan in the oven and roast for about 15 minutes, then reduce the heat to 375 degrees f and continue cooking for another 30 minutes or so, stirring 2 or 3 times until the beets are tender. If the vegetables start to burn, add a little more oil and vinegar to the pan. ; name: beet greens with bacon and balsamic vinegar ; ingredients: beet leaf, beets, bacon, olive oil, onion, water, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium high heat, cook bacon in olive oil until starting to lightly brown, about 5-7 minutes. Add chopped onion and continue to cook until onion is translucent and starts to brown lightly, another 3- 4 minutes. Add beet greens and roasted beets, water and a pinch of salt and pepper. Cover and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until greens start to wilt. Add balsamic vinegar and continue to cook until greens have wilted, about another 3-4 minutes and liquid has evaporated slightly. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Transfer to serving bowl and offer additional balsamic at the table, if desired. ; name: happy beets ; ingredients: beet, cornstarch, salt, cider vinegar, vodka, sugar ; preparation:Bring saved liquid to a boil. Add cornstarch, salt, vinegar, and sugar. Simmer until thickened and bubbles. Add sliced beets to sauce. Heat for three minutes. ; name: beets with onion cumin ; ingredients: canola oil, onion, garlic, cumin seeds, all-purpose flour, beets, tomatoes, water, salt ; preparation:Heat a medium saucepan over medium-high heat. Pour in oil and saute onion and garlic until translucent. Mix in cumin seed and saute an additional 2 minutes. Sprinkle in flour and saute 1 minute more. Stir in beets, tomatoes, water, and salt. Reduce heat to low, cover pan with lid, and allow to simmer 30 to 45 minutes, until beets are tender. ; name: beet and raisin salad ; ingredients: beets, raisins, brown sugar, oil, lemon juice, lettuce leaf, parsley ; preparation:Peel and grate the beets. Chop the raisins coarsely and mix with the beets and the brown sugar. Mix together the oil and lemon juice. Pour over the beets and raisins and mix well. Serve on crisp lettuce leaves sprinkled with chopped parsley. ; name: beet salad with raspberry vinaigrette ; ingredients: beets, sweet onion, olive oil, raspberry vinegar, balsamic vinegar, garlic, salt & fresh ground pepper, fresh chives ; preparation:Place beets and onion in a large bowl. In a cup, combine oil, raspberry vinegar, balsamic vinegar, and garlic. Season with the salt and pepper. Whisk to combine. Pour over the beet mixture and toss well. Sprinkle with the chives. Cover and refrigerate for at least 15 minutes or up to 3 days. ; name: beets with onions ; ingredients: beets, butter, onions, sugar, balsamic vinegar, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: tomato lentil stew ; ingredients: lentils, onions, oil, chopped tomatoes, water, oregano, basil, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook lentils in the water. Meanwhile, chop the onions. Saut onions in a little oil. Add the tomatoes when the onions are translucent. Cook 5-10 min then add the lentils. Cook 5 more minutes. ; name: delicious and easy lentils ; ingredients: canadian bacon, butter, carrot, onion, water, lentils, salt, marjoram, dried parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Lightly brown the canadian bacon over med heat. Add butter, onion, and carrots and saute for 5 minutes. Add water, lentils, salt and herbs. Cover and simmer on low for 20 minutes. Uncover and simmer for 5 more minutes. Add the parmesan cheese and serve. ; name: brown lentil and vegetable soup ; ingredients: olive oil, carrots, zucchini, celery, brown onion, diced tomatoes, vegetable stock, brown lentils, flat leaf parsley, lemon ; preparation:Heat oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add carrots, celery and onion. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 10 minutes or until vegetables begin to soften. Add tomatoes, zucchini and stock to pan. Cover and bring to the boil. Reduce heat to medium-low. Simmer, partially covered, for 15 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Add lentils to soup. Cook for 5 minutes or until heated through. Sprinkle with parsley and squeeze lemon juice. Season with freshly ground black pepper. ; name: rustic red lentil soup only 4 ingredients ; ingredients: onion, red lentil, chicken bouillon cubes, tomato paste, water ; preparation:Cook onions until very soft, in a medium size pot, with a little extra virgin olive oil. Add chicken cubes, lentils, and tomato paste. Turn the heat on high and add 8 cups of water and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for 30 minutes and soup has reduced significantly. Serve warm with italian crusty bread or flatbreads. ; name: lentil burgers vegetarian ; ingredients: red lentil, celery, carrots, water, curry powder, all-purpose flour, egg whites, dried breadcrumbs, vegetable oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine lentils, celery, carrot, water, curry powder in a pan and bring to the boil. Reduce heat and simmer, covered for approx 20 minutes or until the mixture has thickened. Remove from heat and cool. Stir in 2 cups of breadcrumbs. Shape the mixture into 8 burger patties. Toss them in the flour, dip in the egg white and cover with the remaining breadcrumbs. Heat the oil in a non-stick pan. Add the burgers and cook until well browned on both sides. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve on a bun as a burger or as a meal with a salad on the side. ; name: lentil chili soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, fresh garlic, onions, frozen carrots, dry lentils, low-sodium v8 juice, water, chili powder, ground cumin, dried oregano ; preparation:Pour the vegetable oil into a large cooking pot or dutch oven. Over medium-high heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden, about 2-3 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and stir. Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to a simmer. Cook uncovered until the lentils are tender, about 45 minutes. Serve. ; name: healthy lentil dip for cheapo cooks on a budget ; ingredients: brown lentils, vegetable broth, diced onion, red bell peppers, monterey jack cheese, red pepper flakes, salt ; preparation:

name: christie s baked onion casserole ; ingredients: butter, sweet onions, potato chips, cheddar cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Butter a 2 quart casserole dish. In a large pot, cover onions with water. Bring to a boil and cook until onions are just crisp tender, about 8-10 minutes. Remove from heat and drain well. Layer onion pieces, potato chips and cheese in prepared dish, beginning with onions & ending with cheese. Mix soup and milk together. Stir in cayenne pepper. Pour soup mixture over the top of the cheese. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes or until onions are completely tender. ; name: fabulous frito lay pie ; ingredients: frito scoops, cheese, canned chili, onion, jalapeno ; preparation:Cover bottom of casserole dish with frito scoops. Cover fritos with shredded cheddar cheese. Pour chili over fritos and cheese. Top with more cheese. Sprinkle with diced onions, and sliced jalapeos. Bake in 350f over until cheese is melted and pie is well heated through. ; name: fresh corn pie ; ingredients: deep dish pie shells, eggs, whipping cream, salt, yellow onion, fresh corn kernels, extra-sharp cheddar cheese, paprika, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Prick crust well on bottom and sides with fork, par-bake pastry crust with parchment paper and pie weight beans for 5-7 minutes until firm but not brown. Stir together rest of ingredients except paprika and parsley. Pour carefully into pie shell. Sprinkle with a little paprika. Bake 10 minutes, reduce heat to 350 and bake 30 minutes longer or until center is almost firm. Cool about 10 minutes. Garnish with fresh chopped parsley if desired. ; name: spinach pie with muenster crust ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, muenster cheese, onion, low fat cottage cheese, eggs, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, pimiento strips ; preparation:Drain spinach well, pressing between layers of paper towels and set aside. Cut 2-3 cheese slices into small triangles, and reserve for garnish. Cover bottom and sides of a lightly greased 9 or10-inch pieplate with remaining muenster slices, overlapping cheese as needed. Combine spinach, onion and next 5 ingredients. Spoon into cheese-lined pieplate. Bake 350 for 45 minutes or until set. Cool 10 minutes before serving. Garnish with reserved cheese triangles and pimiento strips, if desired. ; name: turkey and sausage veggie pot pie ; ingredients: butter, kielbasa, flour, milk, mixed vegetables, cooked turkey, salt, pepper, pie crust ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add sausage and saute 5 minutes. Stir in flour and cook 2-3 minutes. Whisk in milk and cook, stirring constantly, 5 minutes or until sauce thickens. Remove from heat and stir in canned veggies, diced turkey and salt and pepepr. Pour into a lightly buttered pie plate. Roll out pie curst to fit over pie plate. Place pie crust over pie plate, trimming to fit. Crimp edges and cut steam slits in top. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes or until crust is golden. ; name: veg all pot pie ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, cooked chicken, cream of mushroom soup, thyme, pie crust ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In medium bowl, combine vegetables, chicken, soup, and seasoning. Fit one pie crust into 9-inch pie pan. Pour vegetable mixture into pie crust. Top with remaining crust, crimp edges to seal and pick top with fork. Bake at 350f for 60 minutes or until crust is golden brown and filling is hot. Allow pie to cool slightly before cutting into wedges to serve. ; name: breakfast crab pie ; ingredients: scallion, red pepper, backfin crab meat, swiss cheese, cheddar cheese, eggs, half-and-half, salt, pepper, fresh breadcrumb ; preparation:Butter a 10-inch quiche pan. Beat the eggs. Mix all of the remaining ingredients together and add to the eggs. Pour into the pan and bake at 350f for about 45-50 minutes until set. Cut into pie-shaped pieces and serve hot. ; name: andreas viestad onion pie with jarlsberg and thyme ; ingredients: unsalted butter, red onions, garlic cloves, bay leaf, black peppercorns, whole cloves, sea salt, puff pastry, jarlsberg cheese, fresh thyme ; preparation:

name: chicken and stuffing bake ; ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, cream of mushroom soup, milk, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare stuffing according to package directions, but do not let stand. Spoon stuffing across the center of a 2 quart shallow baking dish. Arrange 3 chicken breast halves on each side of the stuffing, overlapping if necessary. Combine soup, milk and parsley. Pour over chicken. Cover with foil and bake for 15 minutes. Uncover and bake 10 minutes longer or until the chicken is no longer pink. You may need to lift some pieces of chicken so that you can check all of it. Stir sauce before serving. ; name: onion chicken stuffing bake ; ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, cooked chicken, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, dry onion soup mix, mushroom stems and pieces, sliced water chestnuts, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix according to package directions. Set aside. Place chicken in a greased 2-qt. Baking dish. Combine the soup, sour cream and dry soup mix. Spread over chicken. Sprinkle with mushrooms and water chestnuts. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30 to 35 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: stove top easy chicken bake ; ingredients: chicken stove top stuffing mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, frozen mixed vegetables ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Prepare stuffing mix as directed on package. Set aside. Mix chicken, soup, sour cream and vegetables in a 13x9-inch baking dish. Top with the stuffing. Bake 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. ; name: stuffed chicken ; ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Continue stuffing breasts until all breasts are used. If you have left over stuffing go back and open breasts and continue stuffing until all stuffing is used. Combine soup and sour cream. Spread over chicken breasts. Cover and bake for 45 minutes to an hour until chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: chicken and stuffing casserole ; ingredients: chicken, cream of chicken soup, seasoned stuffing mix, corn, peas ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Spray 9x12 casserole dish with non-stick cooking spray. Prepare stuffing as directed. Let sit. Cut chicken into bite-sized pieces. Combine soup, veggies and chicken into 9x13 casserole dish. Stir until everything is mixed thoroughly. Add stuffing on top of casserole. Bake for 30 minutes, or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: stove top and chicken ; ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, boneless skinless chicken breast ; preparation:Prepare stove top with 1 cup water. In small mixing bowl mix soup and sour cream. Place chicken breast on bottom of 9x13 baking pan. Pour soup mix over top. Spoon stuffing on top. Bake covered for 30 minutes. Uncover bake an additional 5 to 10 minutes. ; name: baked summer squash casserole ; ingredients: summer squash, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, onion, carrot, margarine, chicken stove top stuffing mix ; preparation:Boil squash in small amount of water,. Season to taste, with salt and pepper. Add butter and all the other ingredients. Do not dilute the soup. Pour into a greased casserole dish and bake about 30 minutes at 350. ; name: classic one dish chicken stuffing bake with vegetables ; ingredients: hot water, chicken flavor stuffing mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mozzarella cheese, frozen peas and carrots ; preparation:

name: hiyashi soba cold noodles ; ingredients: soba noodles, water, japanese soy sauce, mirin, ginger, leeks, nori, wasabi ; preparation:Boil water, soy sauce and mirin. Allow to cool and place in the refrigerator. Cook soba according to package instruction. Wash soba in cool running water. Place soba in bowl and garnish with ginger, leeks and nori. Pour cold broth over the noodles. Add wasabi according to taste. ; name: thai noodles ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, soy sauce, peanut butter, sugar, vegetable oil, dark sesame oil, garlic, dry crushed red pepper, red chili oil, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Cook pasta according to the package directions. Drain well. Set aside, and keep warm. Combine soy sauce and the next seven ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well with a wire whisk. Pour over the pasta. Toss gently. Add toppings, if desired. ; name: soba and shrimp salad ; ingredients: soba noodles, wasabi powder, soy sauce, lemon juice, spinach, green onions, baby shrimp, pickled ginger ; preparation:Boil soba in boiling water for 5-8 minutes. Drain and rinse with cold water and then drain again. While noodles are cooking, mix together wasabi and 1 tablespoon cold water in a small bowl or cup. Let stand 5 minutes and then add the soy sauce and lemon juice and set aside. In a large salad bowl toss together the spinach, noodles, green onions, shrimp, ginger and dressing. ; name: thai chicken and noodles ; ingredients: rice noodles, sweet chili sauce, chicken fillets, chicken stock, red capsicum, brown sugar, fish sauce, coriander ; preparation:Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through. ; name: simple chinese noodles ; ingredients: fried chinese noodles, ginger, green onions, oil, oyster sauce, soya sauce, sesame oil ; preparation:Put noodles in 4 cups of salted boiling water. Cook 1-2 minutes. Stir occasionally. Drain and dry. Heat oil in wok or frypan until smoking hot. Add ginger and onion stir for 30 seconds. Add noodles and fry for 5 minutes over med heat. Add sauce, and stir until coated. Serve hot or cold. Sometimes i add some julienned carrots or broccoli to this. ; name: szechuan noodles ; ingredients: noodles, green onions, garlic cloves, peanut butter, thai sweet chili sauce, reduced sodium soy sauce, dry sherry, sesame oil ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on the package. Drain. Mix all remaining ingredients together until well mixed. It may help to heat for a minute in the microwave. Mix noodles and sauce. Serve warm, but these also taste great cold. ; name: asian carrot and cabbage noodles ; ingredients: rice noodles, peanut oil, garlic, red onion, brown sugar, green cabbage, carrot, chili sauce, soy sauce ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions. Heat oil in a large skillet or wok on medium high heat. Add garlic. Stir fry 30 seconds or until fragrant. Add onion and sugar. Stir fry 2 minutes or until onion softens. Add cabbage, carrot, chili sauce and soy sauce. Stir fry 5 minutes or until cabbage is tender crisp. Add noodles, stir fry 3 to 4 minutes. ; name: spicy cold soba noodles ; ingredients: soy sauce, molasses, sesame oil, tahini, brown sugar, chili oil, balsamic vinegar, green onion, salt, soba noodles ; preparation:

name: spinach cucumber salad with yogurt dressing ; ingredients: lemon juice, honey, yogurt, olive oil, of fresh mint, salt and pepper, baby spinach leaves, cucumbers, red onion ; preparation:Whisk the lemon juice and honey in a bowl. In a separate bowl, whisk the yogurt and olive oil together. Whisk while adding the yogurt to the lemon juice in a thin stream. Add the mint, then add the salt and pepper to taste. Cover and chill the dressing for up to 24 hours. Combine the spinach, cucumbers and onion in a large bowl. Season with a little salt and pepper. Add just enough dressing to moisten the salad. Toss to coat, and serve with extra dressing on the side. ; name: cucumber tomato salad ; ingredients: tomatoes, cucumber, green onion, italian salad dressing, vinegar, fresh basil, salt, pepper, garlic salt ; preparation:In a serving bowl, layer half of the tomatoes, all of the cucumber, then remaining tomatoes. Sprinkle with onion. Combine remaining ingredients in a jar with a tight fitting lid and shake well. Pour over salad. Cover and chill for 25 to 30 minutes or until ready to serve. ; name: cucumber salad swedish style ; ingredients: cucumbers, salt, sugar, white vinegar ; preparation:Wash cucumbers, dry off and remove the ends. Score the skins with the tines if a fork, dragging it the length of the cuke. Repeat all the way around. Slice cucumbers very, very thin. Place in a bowl. Sprinkle with salt and sugar. Add vinegar and press slightly with back of a spoon. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Keeps well in a covered jar. The end result is similar to an uncooked pickle. ; name: cucumber dill dressing ; ingredients: english cucumber, balkan style yogurt, milk, mayonnaise, cider vinegar, green onion, garlic clove, fresh dill, pepper ; preparation:Peel, seed and shred cucumber. Gently squeeze out liquid. Set aside. In a small bowl, whisk together yogurt, milk, mayonnaise and vinegar. Stir in cucumber, green onion, garlic, dill and pepper. ; name: tomato cucumber and green pepper chopped salad ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, garlic clove, olive oil, romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green bell pepper, green onions, mint leaves ; preparation:Mix lemon juice and garlic in large bowl. Whisk in oil. Add remaining ingredients. Toss. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: dutch cucumber salad ; ingredients: cucumbers, white vinegar, sugar, onion ; preparation:Wash and peel cucumbers. Slice or cut in rounds as thin as possible cukes & onions. Place in bowl and cover with vinegar. Add 3-5 heaping tablespoons of sugar, mix well. Chill and serve. This is better if you let it sit in the fridge covered overnight. Actually. If allowed to mellow for 2 or 3 days -- in a tightly sealed jar in the refrigerator -- jar turned upside down 1 day & turned right side up the next. ; name: scandinavian cucumber salad recipe ; ingredients: sour cream, parsley flakes, tarragon vinegar, sugar, chives, cucumbers ; preparation:Thinly slice unpeeled cucumbers - use can use a mandolin or slicer for nice paper thin slices. Should be about 3 cups. Whisk sour cream, parsley, vinegar, sugar, and chives in a small bowl. Fold in sliced cucumbers. Cover and chill for at least two hours. ; name: threadgill s cottage cheese cucumber salad ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, cucumber, fresh dill, green onion, pepper, tabasco sauce ; preparation:

name: banana cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg, baking powder, flour, banana, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream together margrine and brown sugar. Add egg and beat. Then add baking powder and flour. Mash banana and add chocolate chips if using. Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes ot until browned. ; name: chocolate chewy cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsifted flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: soft chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: not your typical chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: vegetable oil, banana, sugar, salt, ground cardamom, whole wheat pastry flour, all-purpose flour, baking soda, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Combine the oil, bananas, sugar, salt and cardamom in a medium saucepan. Heat over low heat for about 2 minutes, whisking to blend everything. Sift together the flours and baking soda into a large bowl. Mix in the banana mixture until well combined. Fold in the chocolate chips and walnuts. Drop onto a parchment-lined or lightly oiled baking sheet. Bake for 14-16 minutes, until they look slightly underdone. Let rest on cookie sheet for about 5 minutes, then transfer to a cooling rack. ; name: peanut butter chip chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Cream butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Mix well. Stir in peanut butter chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes. ; name: very good and yummy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, splenda granular, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla flavoring, almond flour, baking soda, salt, mini chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease cookie sheets. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, splenda and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Add the eggs one at a time, beating well with each addition, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt. Gradually stir into the creamed mixture. Finally, fold in the chocolate chips. Drop by rounded spoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until light brown. Allow cookies to cool on baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: cocoa chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: salted butter, dark brown sugar, cocoa, vanilla extract, cake flour, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Place butter in a microwave safe bowl and microwave on high for 15-30 seconds, or until just melted. Stir in brown sugar, cocoa and vanilla. Mix well. Stir in cake flour. Stir in chocolate chips. Cover with plastic wrap and chill 1 hour, or until firm. Preheat oven to 350f. Break off small pieces of dough and form into balls. Place on ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until firm but not browned. Cool on baking sheets 5 minutes, then remove to rack to cool completely. ; name: banana chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, unsweetened applesauce, raw sugar, bananas, eggs, pure vanilla extract, unbleached all-purpose flour, baking soda, quick-cooking oats, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: halibut baked with scallion and worcestershire ; ingredients: halibut steaks, salt, pepper, butter, worcestershire sauce, scallions, parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Wash and dry fish steaks. Salt and pepper both sides of the fish to taste and put in a greased shallow baking pan. In a small saucepan, melt the butter and worcestershire sauce together and then pour over the fish. Arrange chopped scallions on top. Sprinkle with parsley and bake for 25 minutes. ; name: parmesan baked halibut ; ingredients: halibut steaks, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, egg, oil, flour, paprika, milk ; preparation:Coat baking dish with oil. Rinse and dry fish. Combine parmesan cheese, flour, salt, pepper and paprika in a bowl. In a seperate bowl, beat egg and milk together. Dip halibut into egg mixture, then coat with parmesan cheese mixture. Bake at 500 degrees until halibut is opaque. Be careful not to overbake. ; name: grilled halibut with thyme ; ingredients: halibut steaks, olive oil, chicken broth, scallions, garlic cloves, dried thyme, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Place fish in a shallow dish. In a small mixing bowl, combine the rest of the ingredients and mix well. Pour the mixture over the fish and marinate about 30 minutes at room temperature, or refrigerate, covered, 1-2 hours. Remove fish from the marinade, reserving marinade. Put marinade in a saucepan and heat to boiling. Reduce heat and let simmer until needed. Place fish on a gas grill over medium heat or on charcoal grill for 4-6 inches from medium coals. Cook, turning once and basting with heated marinade, 8-12 minutes or until fish flakes easily when tested with a fork. Serve immediately and discard remaining marinade. ; name: halibut with bright lemon cream sauce ; ingredients: halibut steaks, flour, salt, black pepper, butter, capers, lemon, juice of, lemon zest, fresh chives ; preparation:Mix flour, salt, and pepper on a large plate and then dredge each cut of halibut. Shake off any excess flour. Melt 4 tablespoons butter in a large saute pan, wait for foam to reduce and add fish to the pan. Saute, turning once, until the fish is cooked all the way through, flakes easily, and is golden brown all over. Transfer fish to a serving platter. Melt remaining 2 tablespoons of butter, and add the capers. Saute 1 minute, then add lemon juice and whisk lightly. Pour over the fish on the serving dish and serve immediately, sprinkling with zest and chives. ; name: easy baked halibut ; ingredients: halibut fillets, butter, seasoning salt, black pepper, garlic powder, ritz crackers ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Cut filets into 3 - 4 oz portions. Melt butter. Crush ritz crackers into crumb size pieces. Mix together dry ingredients. Dip halibut into melted butter then into cracker mixture. Place on baking sheet. Pour remaining melted butter over halibut. Bake at 400 degrees for 12 - 15 minutes or until flaky when touched with a fork. ; name: steak supper special ; ingredients: flour, salt, cube steaks, oil, french bread, chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice, prepared mustard ; preparation:Mix flour and salt. Coat steaks. In skillet, heat oil and cook steaks until browned on both sides. Place each steak onto a piece of bread and keep warm. Into drippings in pan, stir in chili sauce, water, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice and mustard. Stir to mix well and heat to boiling. Spoon sauce over steaks. ; name: pacific pesto grilled halibut ; ingredients: fresh cilantro, garlic clove, lime zest, fresh lime juice, jalapeno, soy sauce, vegetable oil, halibut steaks, new potatoes ; preparation:Preheat broiler. In a food processor or blender, combine the cilantro, garlic, lime zest and juice, jalapeo, and soy sauce. Blend until mixed. With processor or blender running, gradually pour in the oil and process until thickened. Place the fish steaks on a greased broiler pan. Brush top of each steak with the sauce. Coat the potatoes with remaining sauce. Place in broiler pan with the fish. Broil about 10 minutes, or until fish flakes with a fork. ; name: baked halibut steaks ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, fresh parsley, garlic, tomato sauce, halibut steaks, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: bow tie pasta with broccoli and tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, minced garlic cloves, bow tie pasta, fresh broccoli florets, cherry tomatoes, fresh parmesan cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Prepare pasta according to package directions and drain completely. Steam broccoli until fork tender, drain completely. Cut tomatoes in half. In skillet over medium heat melt butter in olive oil. Add garlic and cook for 2-3 minutes. Put the prepared pasta in skillet and toss to coat. Add the tomatoes and toss for 2-3 minutes. Add the broccoli and toss 1-2 minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle with grated parmensa cheese. ; name: parmesan bow ties ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, italian salad dressing, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. Transfer to a serving bowl. Add the remaining ingredients. Toss to coat. ; name: bow ties with sausage and peppers ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, hot italian sausage, sweet pepper, vegetable broth, coarse black pepper ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Meanwhile, cut sausage into bite-size pieces. In a large skillet cook sausage and peppers over med-high heat until sausage is brown. Drain off fat. Add broth & pepper to skillet. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer uncovered for 5 minutes. Remove from heat. Drain pasta and toss with sausage mixture. ; name: italian bow tie bake ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, spaghetti sauce, italian salad dressing mix, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Prepare pasta according to the package directions. Drain and set aside. In a mixing bowl, add the spaghetti sauce and italian dressing mix. Stir to combine. Add the pasta, tossing to coat well. Pour mixture into a greased 2-quart baking dish. Sprinkle cheese evenly over the pasta. Bake at 400 degrees, uncovered, for 15-20 minutes or until well heated. ; name: bow tie pasta with sun dried tomatoes and kalamata olives ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, chili-flavored olive oil, pesto sauce, fresh rosemary, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, kalamata olive, parmesan cheese, garlic salt ; preparation:Cook pasta according to directions on package. Be sure to just cook to al dente stage. Drain and return to pot. Place pot on burner but turn off burner. Stir in oil. Stir in remaining ingredients and mix well. I have also added broccoli to pasta water while cooking pasta and this is very good too. ; name: broccoli cheese soup ; ingredients: onion, margarine, flour, salt, white pepper, chicken broth, milk, broccoli, cheddar cheese, celery ; preparation:Saute onion and celery in butter in saucepan over medium heat until tender. Add flour, and salt and pepper, cooking and stirring until mixture is smooth and bubbly. Add broth and milk, stirring constantly until mixture comes to a boil and begins to thicken. Add cooked broccoli, stirring until all is heated through. Remove from heat and stir in cheese until melted and smooth. ; name: bow tie bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, sliced mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper, bow tie pasta, condensed tomato soup, mozzarella cheese, cream of mushroom soup ; preparation:In a skillet, cook beef, onion, mushrooms, green pepper, salt and pepper over medium heat until the meat is no longer pink. Drain. In a greased 3-quart baking dish, layer half of the pasta, half of the meat mixture, all of the tomato soup and 1 cup of cheese. Top with the remaining pasta and meat mixture. Spread evenly with mushroom soup. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 30-45 minutes or until heated thoroughly. ; name: broccoli and cheddar bow ties ; ingredients: bow tie pasta, broccoli, all-purpose flour, salt, pepper, milk, dijon mustard, old cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: pineapple fried rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic clove, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, cooked rice, light soy sauce, crushed pineapple in syrup, green onion ; preparation:In large nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium-low heat until hot. Add garlic, ginger and red pepper, cook and stir 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium-high. Add rice and soy sauce. Cook 2 minutes, stirring frequently. Add pineapple, tossing to combine. Heat rice through. Sprinkle with green onions before serving. ; name: sweet and spicy pineapple fried rice ; ingredients: oil, garlic, fresh ginger, crushed red pepper flakes, cooked rice, soy sauce, crushed pineapple, green onion ; preparation:Heat oil over medium low heat, add garlic, ginger and red pepper. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Increase heat to medium high and add rice and soy sauce. Cook for 2 minutes, stirring often. Add pineapple, stir and heat through. Garnish with sliced green onions over the top and serve. ; name: shrimp and pineapple stir fry ; ingredients: quick-cooking brown rice, vegetable oil, vegetables, stir-fry sauce, cornstarch, large shrimp, pineapple chunks in juice ; preparation:Prepare rice as label directs. Meanwhile, in nonstick 12-inch skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat until hot. Add vegetables and cook, stirring constantly, until evenly coated with oil. Cover skillet and cook 3 to 4 minutes longer or until vegetables are tender-crisp, stirring occasionally. In 1-cup liquid measure, combine stir-fry sauce and cornstarch until well mixed. Add shrimp, pineapple with its juice, and stir-fry sauce mixture to vegetables in skillet and cook 4 to 5 minutes or just until shrimp turn opaque throughout, stirring occasionally. To serve, spoon rice onto plates and top with shrimp mixture. ; name: curried shrimp with brown rice ; ingredients: shrimp, onion, garlic, frozen green pea, chicken broth, curry paste, cooked brown rice, sesame oil ; preparation:Coat a large, nonstick skillet with cooking spray and preheat over medium heat. Add the shrimp, onion and garlic and cook, stirring frequently, for about 4 minutes or until shrimp turn pink and are thoroughly cooked. Add the peas, broth and curry paste, reduce heat to medium. Cover and cook for a minute or two or just until the peas are thawed and heated through. Add the rice and sesame oil. Toss the mixture gently over medium heat for a minute or two or until heated through. Add more broth if mixture seems too dry. Serve hot. ; name: burmese fried shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, salt, ground turmeric, chili powder, sesame oil, peanut oil, bamboo skewer ; preparation:Dust the shrimps with mixed salt, turmeric and chili powder. Bend shrimps into a half circle and thread on skewer through top and tail to keep this shape. Put four shrimps on each skewer. Shallow fry skewered shrimps until golden. Serve immediately. ; name: shrimp with rice stick noodles and vegetables ww ; ingredients: rice vinegar, soy sauce, honey, sesame seed oil, rice sticks, large shrimp, red bell pepper, snow peas, cucumber, cilantro ; preparation:In a small cup combine dressing ingredients, whisking until smooth. In a large pot of boiling water cook noodles according to package directions, with a slotted spoon transfer noodles to a colander and drain. Rinse under cold running water. Drain well. Transfer to a large bowl. Return cooking water to a boil. Add shrimp and cook until opaque. Rinse under cold water. Drain. Combine shrimp, dressing and the remaining ingredients with the noodles. Toss to combine. This can be made ahead and refrigerated for up to 2 days. ; name: green onion rice ; ingredients: cooked rice, cooked shrimp, green onions, hot chili pepper, water, stir-fry sauce ; preparation:In a high-sided nonstick pot or wok, combine the cooked rice, cooked shrimp or shrimp meat, green onions, chili peppers and water. Cook over high heat, stirring often to mix well and prevent sticking, until all ingredients are thoroughly heated and most of the water is gone, about 8 minutes. Turn the heat to high and stir for 1 more minute as the pot gets hotter. Add the nuoc cham and stir rapidly to mix thoroughly. Continue to cook over high heat, stirring constantly, until most of the liquid has evaporated, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat and serve. ; name: thai shrimp fried rice with pineapple ; ingredients: jasmine rice, vegetable oil, garlic, onion, medium shrimp, fish sauce, sugar, crushed pineapple, green onions ; preparation:

name: spicy bbq chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, reduced-sodium tomato paste, water, cider vinegar, chili powder, garlic, cayenne pepper, cumin, canola oil, honey ; preparation:Mix water and tomato paste, simmer for 2 minutes. Add vinegar, chilli, garlic, cayenne pepper, cumin, oil and honey. Simmer 15 minutes. Place wings in a non-stick oven dish. Pour simmer sauce over chicken, cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours. Bake wings at 190c for 30 minutes. ; name: spicy maple chicken wings ; ingredients: maple syrup, chili sauce, onion, cider vinegar, grainy mustard, worcestershire sauce, chicken wings ; preparation:Combine the maple syrup, chili sauce, onion, cider vinegar, mustard and worcestershire sauce. Pour over chicken wings and allow to marinate for 2 hours, turning occasionally to keep coated. Preheat oven to 400f transfer wings and their marinade into roasting tin. Cook for 45 minutes, basting occasionally until sticky. Serve hot or cold with salad. ; name: spicy wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, corn syrup, catsup, cider vinegar, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard, onion, garlic, chili powder ; preparation:Cut wings into 3 sections, discard. Place sections on well greased baking pan. Bake at 375 for 45 minutes, or until done. In large pan, mix all remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, simmer for 20 minutes. When wings are done, add to the sauce and mix well to coat all the wings. ; name: peppered chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, salt, garlic, black peppercorns, honey, light soya sauce, dark soya sauce ; preparation:Clean chicken wings and pat dry with paper towels. Rub all the marinade ingredients over the wings and keep in covered container. Store in refrigerator for several hours. Arrange chicken on a tray and grill until browned. Serve warm. You can also grill the wings but remember to flip over the wings more often as honey tends to get burnt easily. ; name: chicken wings in honey bbq sauce ; ingredients: chicken wings, salt and black pepper, honey, soy sauce, barbecue sauce, oil, garlic cloves ; preparation:Cut off and discard wing. Cut each wing at joint to make two sections. Season wings with salt and pepper, to taste. Place wings on broiler pan and broil about 6 inches from heat for 10 minutes on each side or until brown. Transfer wings to slow cooker. Combine remaining ingredients in a bowl. Pour over chicken wings. Cover and place slow cooker on high for 2 hour or low for 4 hours. ; name: brenda s hidden valley ranch chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, louisiana hot sauce, vinegar, hidden valley ranch dressing mix ; preparation:Put wings, hot sauce and vinegar in a large bowl. Toss together. Marinate for at least 30 minutes. While marinating heat oven to 400f. Line jelly roll pan with parchment paper or foil. Lay marinated wings, skin side up on shallow pan. Sprinkle with the dressing mix. Bake for 40 minutes or until done. The more crowded the wings are, the juicier they are. The more separated the wings are, the crispier they are. Drain wings on paper towels, then place in serving dish. Either keep warm or place in fridge and heat at a later time. ; name: lacquered chinese chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, soy sauce, honey, dark sesame oil, fresh lemon juice, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, five-spice powder, white pepper ; preparation:Mix marinade ingredients together. Pour over wings. Refrigerate for 24 hours, turning container or bag several times to distribute the marinade evenly. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a baking sheet with heavy-duty foil and fold up a rim around the edges. Place marinaded wings on foil close together, but not touching. Bake for 1 hour and 15 minutes. Remove wings with tongs to paper towel lined plate, drain. Serve at room temperate or cold. ; name: spicy ranch chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, hot pepper sauce, butter, cider vinegar, ranch dressing mix, paprika ; preparation:

name: cran raspberry jello salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, frozen raspberries, whole berry cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple in juice ; preparation:Be sure that raspberries and pineapple are well drained. If too much liquid is left in them, the jello will not set up. Mix the jello according to package directions, using the juices from the drained fruits as part of the cold liquid. Stir in the remaining ingredients, breaking up the cranberry sauce well. Put into a 9x13 pan and chill until set. ; name: cranberry pineapple salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, jellied cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple, orange juice, lemon juice, walnuts, lettuce leaf, cool whip ; preparation:In a bowl, dissolve jello in boiling water. Break up and stir in cranberry sauce. Add pineapple, orange juice, and lemon juice. Chill until partially set. Stir in nuts. Pour into a 11x7 inch dish. Chill until firm. Cut into squares. Serve on a lettuce leaf. Top with a dollop of cool whip. ; name: freds pretzel salad ; ingredients: pretzels, butter, sugar, cream cheese, cool whip, strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, boiling water, frozen strawberries ; preparation:Mix together the first three ingredients and spread into a 9x13 inch dish. Bake at 400 degrees for 10 minutes and cool. Beat together cream cheese and one cup of sugar. Stir in cool whip and spread on cooled pretzel crust. Dissolve jell-o in boiling water. Stir in strawberries and let set for ten minutes. Pour on top of cheese mixture and chill to the jell-o is set. ; name: raspberry jello fruit fluff ; ingredients: raspberry gelatin powder, boiling water, raspberry sauce, cold water, frozen whipped topping, fresh raspberries ; preparation:Completely dissolve the raspberry gelatin in the boiling water. Add cold water. Stir in the raspberry sauce. Cool until thickened but not firm. Whip the gelatin until frothy and lighter in color. Fold the whipped topping into the whipped gelatin until there are no white streaks. Gently fold the raspberries into the mixture. Use a few berries for decoration. Refrigerate until firm, about three hours. ; name: orange pineapple jello salad ; ingredients: crushed pineapple, sugar, orange jell-o, cool whip, cream cheese, milk ; preparation:Drain pineapple juice and reserve. Combine pineapple juice with sugar and bring to a boil in the microwave. Add orange jello to boiling liquid and let cool. After mixture has cooled, stir in cool whip. In a separate bowl, soften cream cheese with milk. Stir into jello mixture. Add crushed pineapple and blend all together. Put in mold and refrigerate. ; name: applesauce jello salad ; ingredients: unsweetened applesauce, sugar-free raspberry gelatin, unsweetened orange juice, diet 7-up ; preparation:Heat applesauce. Stir in the jello till dissolved. Stir in the orange juice. Carefully pour in the 7-up. Chill until slightly gelled. Pour into a mold or an 8-inch by 8-inch pan. Refrigerate until set. ; name: red hot jello salad ; ingredients: water, red cinnamon candies, cherry jell-o, applesauce ; preparation:In a medium saucepan bring the water to a boil. Stir red-hots in simmering water until dissolved. Remove from heat. Add jello mix and stir until dissolved. Stir in cold applesauce. Pour mixture into a serving dish and chill until set. ; name: raspberry jello salad ; ingredients: pretzel sticks, white sugar, margarine, cool whip, cream cheese, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, frozen raspberries ; preparation:

name: cran raspberry jello salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, frozen raspberries, whole berry cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple in juice ; preparation:Be sure that raspberries and pineapple are well drained. If too much liquid is left in them, the jello will not set up. Mix the jello according to package directions, using the juices from the drained fruits as part of the cold liquid. Stir in the remaining ingredients, breaking up the cranberry sauce well. Put into a 9x13 pan and chill until set. ; name: cranberry pineapple salad ; ingredients: raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, jellied cranberry sauce, crushed pineapple, orange juice, lemon juice, walnuts, lettuce leaf, cool whip ; preparation:In a bowl, dissolve jello in boiling water. Break up and stir in cranberry sauce. Add pineapple, orange juice, and lemon juice. Chill until partially set. Stir in nuts. Pour into a 11x7 inch dish. Chill until firm. Cut into squares. Serve on a lettuce leaf. Top with a dollop of cool whip. ; name: cranberry salad ; ingredients: cranberries, oranges, gala apples, crushed pineapple, jello gelatin, raspberry jell-o gelatin, pecans, sugar ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set. ; name: southern cranberry salad ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, boiling water, whole berry cranberry sauce, mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, pecans, cool whip ; preparation:Mix jello with boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, oranges, pineapple, and pecans. Lightly spray a 4 cup ring mold or pretty glass dish that it will be served. Add salad. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 3 hours or till firm. Serve with dollop of cool whip. ; name: cran raspberry waldorf salad ; ingredients: whole berry cranberry sauce, raspberry jell-o gelatin, boiling water, celery rib, apples, walnuts ; preparation:In a medium mixing bowl place jello and pour boiling water over. Stir till dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, stirring with a fork if necessary to break up. Stir till combined. Add in celery, apples and nuts. Stir to mix in fairly evenly. Pour into a 6-cup mold or 8-inch square pan. Chill till set, 2-3 hours. ; name: doris cranberry salad ; ingredients: crushed pineapple with juice, water, black cherry gelatin, whole berry cranberry sauce, apple, celery, walnuts, lemon juice ; preparation:Prepare the apples, celery, and walnuts. Combine pineapple& water in a saucepan. Heat just to boiling& add gelatin. Stir until gelatin is dissolved. Add other ingredients, stir well, and turn off burner. Pour into bowl. Chill until firm. ; name: cranberry apple waldorf gelatin salad ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, sugar, boiling water, cranberry juice cocktail, apple, fresh cranberries, celery, walnuts ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix gelatin and sugar. Add boiling water and stir until gelatin is completely dissolved. Add juice. Chill in refrigerator until mixture has consistency of unbeaten egg whites. Fold in apple, cranberries, celery, and walnuts. Pour into a 8-inch square pan. Cover with plastic wrap and chill in refrigerator until firm. To serve, cut into squares. ; name: cranberry raspberry salad ; ingredients: jello gelatin, boiling water, cranberry sauce, lemon juice, red raspberries ; preparation:

name: greek style ravioli ; ingredients: frozen cheese ravioli, lean ground beef, diced tomatoes with basil oregano and garlic, baby spinach, sliced ripe olives, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook ravioli according to package directions. Meanwhile, in a small skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in tomatoes. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Simmer, uncovered, for 10 minutes. Drain ravioli. Add the ravioli, spinach and olives to the beef mixture. Heat through. Sprinkle with feta cheese. ; name: weeknight ravioli bake ; ingredients: spaghetti sauce, diced tomatoes, water, frozen cheese ravioli, cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Mix spaghetti sauce, tomatoes and water. Spoon 1 cup onto bottom of 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Layer half the ravioli and 1 cup shredded cheese over sauce mixture. Top with remaining ravioli and sauce mixture. Sprinkle with remaining shredded cheese. Cover. Bake 30 minutes. Uncover. Bake 15 minutes or until ravioli is tender and heated through. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Let stand 10 minutes. ; name: ravioli with garbanzos and spinach ; ingredients: cheese ravioli, olive oil, garlic cloves, garbanzo beans, summer squash, roma tomatoes, fresh thyme, black pepper, fresh spinach ; preparation:Cook ravioli, drain, cover and keep warm. Meanwhile, in a large skillet heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and cook, stirring constantly, for 15 seconds. Add garbanzos, squash, tomatoes, thyme and pepper. Sstir 4-5 minutes, until squash is tender. Add the cooked ravioli to bean mixture and toss gently to combine. Arrange spinach on plate and top with ravioli. Fresh ravioli may be used in place of dry, but you would want more by weight to feed the same number of people. ; name: zesty cheese ravioli ; ingredients: water, diced tomatoes, garlic clove, cheese ravioli, fresh spinach, sugar, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Mince the garlic. Finely chop the spinach. Combine the water, tomatoes and their juice, and garlic in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Add the ravioli, cover, reduce heat, and simmer 5 minutes. Uncover and cook 5 more minutes or until done. Stir in the spinach, sugar, salt, and pepper. Cover and cook 2 minutes. Remove from heat and let stand 5 minutes. Sprinkle with parmesan. Serve sprinkled with additional parmesan and pepper, if desired. ; name: cheese ravioli with grape tomatoes ; ingredients: cheese ravioli, olive oil, spinach, grape tomatoes, onion powder, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Add ravioli to a pot of boiling water. Cook 3-5 minutes or until ravioli floats to the surface. Remove from heat, drain and set aside. Heat oil in a oversized skillet on medium heat, add spinach, tomatoes, onion powder, salt and pepper, and saute for about 7 minutes or until spinach and tomatoes wilt. Add ravioli to skillet and cook for 3 more minutes. Serve hot and sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: swiss steak mozzarella ; ingredients: beef round steak, flour, margarine, tomatoes, salt, cream of mushroom soup, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cut meat into serving size pieces. Coat with flour. Melt margarine in skillet. Brown meat slowly on both sides. Put into a 9x13 inch baking dish. Combine tomatoes, soup and salt. Pour over meat. Bake covered at 350 degrees 1 hour, or until meat is tender. Remove cover and sprinkle with cheese. Bake an additional 5 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: chili with ravioli ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, lean ground beef, dried oregano, chili powder, salt, chili beans, crushed tomatoes, cheese ravioli, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat vegetable oil in a wide deep skillet or dutch oven. Add onion, and cook over medium-high heat for 5 mins until onion is translucent. Add ground beef and, using a large spoon or fork to break up, cook until the meat is browned. Add next 5 ingredients, rinsing out each can with a few tablespoons of water and adding the water to the pot. Cook for 15-20 minutes to let the flavors blend. Salt to taste. As the chili simmers, bring a large pot of water to boil and salt the water. When the water boils, add the frozen ravioli, and when the water returns to a boil, lower heat to simmer. Cook 4 or 5 mins until ravioli is cooked through. Place in serving bowls with chili over the top, sprinkled with grated cheese. ; name: baked beef and ravioli ; ingredients: cheese ravioli, ground beef, spaghetti sauce, frozen spinach, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: original tuna melts ; ingredients: hot dog buns, solid white tuna packed in water, pickle, onions, cheese, mayonnaise ; preparation:Drain and flake tuna in a medium bowl. Add pickles, onion and cheese and mix well. Add mayonnaise and mix well. Fill hot dog rolls and wrap each in tin foil, twisting both ends to close. Place on cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Serve in corn-on-the-cob dishes with french fries and a salad. These can also be cooked on a grill, making them suitable for camping. ; name: toasted buttery tuna melt ; ingredients: starkist tuna, egg, onion, green bell pepper, salad dressing, cheese, bread ; preparation:Or none at all. Mix tuna, egg, onion, bell pepper and salad dressing together. Place between 2 slices of bread with cheese. Toast in a buttered skillet until nice and golden brown. Repeat steps if desired. The cheese should be nice and melty when finished. ; name: terrific n tasty tuna nuggets ; ingredients: tuna in water, frozen chopped spinach, breadcrumbs, monterey jack cheese, parmesan cheese, eggs, onion, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f spray a baking sheet with veg. Cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine tuna, spinach, bread crumbs, monterey jack, parmesan, eggs, onion and salt. Mix well. Drop generous tablespoonfuls of mixture, about 1 inch apart, onto the prepared baking sheet. Bake 15 minutes. Turn nuggets over and bake 10 minutes longer. Serve immediately. ; name: open face tuna melt sandwich ; ingredients: bread, tuna in water, mayonnaise, onion, lemon juice, old bay seasoning, salt and pepper, tomatoes, provolone cheese ; preparation:Mix the tuna, mayo, onion, lemon juice, old bay seasoning, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place enough tuna on a toasted slice of bread and spread to cover slice. Top with slice of tomato and then top with a slice of cheese. Place sandwich slices on a cookie sheet. Placing rack not too close to the broiler, broil sandwiches until the cheese is golden brown. ; name: hot tuna sandwich cups ; ingredients: refrigerated biscuits, celery, onion, butter, mayonnaise, dry mustard, dill weed, tuna, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Separate biscuits, and pinching a small section off each, form 12 instead of 10. Flatten, and spread over the bottom of muffin cups. Place dough side up on a baking sheet and bake at 400 degrees for 5-7 minutes or until lightly browned. Meanwhile, saute celery and onion in butter until tender. Stir in mayonnaise, mustard, and dillweed. Stir in tuna and half the cheese. Spoon evenly into biscuit cups. Bake 5-7 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese, and bake 2-3 minutes more until cheese melts. ; name: tuna pita ; ingredients: tuna in water, celery ribs, green onions, fresh dill, plain nonfat yogurt, dry mustard, celery salt, whole wheat pita bread, tomatoes, lettuce ; preparation:Drain and flake tuna with a fork. Combine with celery, green onion and dill. Blend together yogurt, mustard, and celery salt, then mix with tuna. Cut pita bread in half and line with lettuce and tomato slices. Add tuna and serve. ; name: the world s best tuna burgers ; ingredients: solid white tuna, egg, cheese, ranch dressing, onion, seasoned dry bread crumb, breadcrumbs, pam cooking spray ; preparation:In a medium bowl mix all ingredients together thoroughly.
