I noticed it is a better consistency if you mix with your hands. Place the extra breadcrumbs for coating on a shallow dish. Preheat pan on medium with pam. Form a patty with your hands and coat both sides of it with breadcrumbs. Place the patty in a preheated fry pan. Repeat steps until mix is finished, usually around 6 patties. Cook until each side has browned and has a slight crispiness. I like to serve them on toasted bread with mayo, lettuce, and tomato if you like. ; name: terrific tuna melt ; ingredients: solid white tuna packed in water, chive & onion cream cheese, pita bread, mild cheddar cheese, assorted fresh vegetable ; preparation:

name: sauteed spinach with sesame korean ; ingredients: dark sesame oil, garlic, spinach, sugar, soy sauce, toasted sesame seeds ; preparation:Put 2 t. Of the oil in a large skillet over medium heat for one minute. Add garlic. The instant it begins to sizzle, add spinach and cook, stirring occasionally, until it is completely wilted. Turn heat to low. Stir in sugar and soy sauce. Cook for a few more moments. Turn off heat. Taste to see if you need additional salt or soy sauce. Serve hot, warm, room temp or cold. Before serving, drizzle with remaining sesame oil and spinkle with sesame seeds. ; name: korean seasoned spinach ; ingredients: spinach, soy sauce, sugar, sesame seeds, sesame oil, green onion, salt ; preparation:Remove roots from spinach and wash well. I soak in a solution of vinegar and water and then rinse. In bowl, combine soy sauce, sugar, sesame seeds, sesame oil, and green onions. In a large pot bring water to boil. Add spinach and immerse only until leaves turn bright green. Do not over boil. Spinach will not taste right. Drain and rinse with cold water. Squeeze out as much water as possible. Add the spinach to the sauce and mix well. This can be served warm or even refrigerated for another time. ; name: sesame tofu with spinach ; ingredients: firm tofu, sesame seeds, dark sesame oil, soy sauce, hot pepper sauce, olive oil, garlic cloves, baby spinach, salt, pepper ; preparation:Slice the tofu lengthwise into 4 rectangular slabs, than half each piece to get squares. Spread the sesame seeds on a plate. Press all surfaces of each tofu square into the seeds to coat. Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet on medium heat. Arrange the tofu in a single layer and cook about 5 minutes carefully turn and cook 5 minutes on other side. Add soy sauce and tabasco, turn the squares over, and cook another minute. Transfer squares to a plate. Add the oil and garlic to the pan and saut for about 30 seconds, until golden. Add the still damp rinsed spinach and cook for 1-2 more minutes, stirring constantly. Cook until wilted but still bright green. Season to taste with salt & pepper. Serve the tofu on top of the spinach. ; name: spinach with rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, cooked rice, fresh spinach, carrot, garlic clove, italian dressing, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Generously spray a wok or non stick deep frypan with veggie spray. Heat to medium. Add cooked rice and grated carrot into wok and mix. Add minced garlic. Stir fry to heat through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Add spinach. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Turn over with a spatula several times to mix the spinach evenly with the rice mixture, heat and turn until the spinach is starting to wilt, about 3 minutes. Pour the italian dressing evenly over and turn several times to mix. Cook about 3 minutes or until the spinach is well wilted and the dressing is heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: seasoned spinach ; ingredients: fresh spinach, green onion, sesame seeds, low sodium soy sauce, dark sesame oil, kosher salt, garlic cloves ; preparation:Steam half of spinach, covered, for 5 minutes or until the spinach wilts. Place steamed spinach in a colander. Repeat proceduce with remaining spinach. Cool slightly, and squeeze dry. Place spinach in a bowl. Add onions and remaining ingredients. Toss mixture well to combine. Serve chilled or at room temperature. ; name: spinach fried rice ; ingredients: spinach, garlic, dark sesame oil, white wine, celery, mushroom, long grain brown rice, scallion, low sodium soy sauce ; preparation:In a wok or large frying pan over medium high heat, saute the spinach and garlic in the oil for 2 minutes, stirring constantly. Transfer to a platter in the same pan, heat the wine and saute the celery or bok choy and mushrooms, stirring constantly, for 3 minutes. Add the rice, scallions and spinach. Heat through. Season with soy sauce or tamari. ; name: spanakorizo spinach with rice ; ingredients: spinach, spring onions, dill, rice, oil, water, salt and pepper, lemon ; preparation:Wash the spinach well and cut as finely as possible. Clean onions and cut into fine strips. Put onions into a saucepan with the oil and cook til softened. Add dill and cook a bit longer. Add the spinach, salt and pepper, add 3 c water and allow to boil. Just before spinach is fully cooked, add in 3 more cups water and the rice. Cover the saucepan and allow the ingredients to cook, stirring occassionally. When the water is absorbed, serve with freshly ground pepper and lemon juice. Enjoy. ; name: spinach with sesame dressing from japanese home cooking ; ingredients: spinach, sesame seeds, dashi, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: turkey and sausage veggie pot pie ; ingredients: butter, kielbasa, flour, milk, mixed vegetables, cooked turkey, salt, pepper, pie crust ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add sausage and saute 5 minutes. Stir in flour and cook 2-3 minutes. Whisk in milk and cook, stirring constantly, 5 minutes or until sauce thickens. Remove from heat and stir in canned veggies, diced turkey and salt and pepepr. Pour into a lightly buttered pie plate. Roll out pie curst to fit over pie plate. Place pie crust over pie plate, trimming to fit. Crimp edges and cut steam slits in top. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes or until crust is golden. ; name: turkey apple and cheddar hand pies ; ingredients: cooked turkey, tart apple, sharp cheddar cheese, green onion, parsley, frozen tart shells, egg, coarse salt ; preparation:In bowl, combine turkey, apple, cheddar, green onion and parsley. Divide the mixture over four of the tart shells. Brush edges of tarts with egg and top with remaining shells. Brush with egg and sprinkle each with coarse salt. Using the. Bake at 400f until pastry is golden and filling is hot and bubbling, about 35 minutes. Let cool for 5 minutes before serving. ; name: turkey shepard s pie shepherd s ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrots, ground turkey, thyme, ground pepper, flour, chicken broth, tomato paste, mashed potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Combine oil, onion and carrots. Cook 7 minutes. Then add turkey, thyme and salt. Cook until turkey is browned. Sprinkle in flour and cook until absorbed. Stir in tomato paste and broth, bring to boil. Reduce and simmer until thickened. Transfer to a 2 quart baking dish and top with favorite prepared mashed potatoes. Bake 15 minutes in oven. ; name: pizza turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, egg, onion, mushroom, garlic powder, oregano, black pepper, pizza sauce, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce. ; name: beefy turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, beef bouillon cubes, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, lemon juice, pepper, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a bowl. Add more bouillon if you like a stronger beef flavor. Let it sit for about 15 minutes to soak all the flavor. Take wax paper, parchment paper or foil and cut 12 square shaped pieces. Lay the wax paper down on the counter, and make a patty from the meat and place on top, layer another sheet and patty up to 2 patties. I made 12 patties, but you can make bigger ones than i did. Place remaining patties and wax paper in a gallon sized freezer bag. Freeze nicely for up to a month. Pull them out as needed. Great grilled or even just placed in the broiler. Cooking time is about 10-15 minutes. ; name: quick turkey pot pie ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, cooked turkey, cream soup, bisquick, egg, milk ; preparation:Place turkey and vegetables in a 8 inch pie pan. Cover with soup. Mix egg, milk and bisquick. Pour over top. Bake at 400f 30-35 minutes or until golden. Serve with favorite salad. ; name: turkey and cabbage casserole ; ingredients: ground turkey, onion, rice, tomato soup, water, stewed tomatoes, cabbage, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grease covered casserole dish. Cut cabbage into large pieces and place in casserole dish. Brown turkey and onion. Add rice to turkey and stir. Salt and pepper to taste. Put turkey mixture over cabbage. Add tomato soup, water, and stewed tomatoes. Bake for 30 to 45 minutes until rice and cabbage are tender. ; name: turkey and hash browns pie ; ingredients: ground turkey, carrots, egg, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, worcestershire sauce, garlic powder, frozen hash browns, butter, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: butter walnut cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, salt, unbleached all-purpose flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, and salt until light and fluffy. In another bowl combine flour and finely ground walnuts. Little by little add flour mixture to butter mixture. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover your dough and refrigerate it for at least 1 hour. Take a quarter of your dough at a time out of your refrigerator, and roll it out to a quarter inch thickness. With a lightly floured glass rim, or any other desired shape you wish to use, and cut your cookies out and place on an parchment lined cookie sheet and bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until they are just lightly browned. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: cream cheese walnut drop cookies ; ingredients: butter, cream cheese, milk, sugar, vanilla, flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. In a mixing bowl, beat together butter, cream cheese and milk. Beat in sugar and vanilla. Gradually mix in flour. Stir in walnuts. Drop by tablespoonful 2-inches apart on to ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 10 minutes or until edges begin to slightly brown. ; name: walnut and raisin oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: shortening, eggs, oatmeal, baking soda, vanilla, sugar, raisins, flour, salt, english walnuts ; preparation:Cream sugar and shortening thoroughly. Add eggs and mix well. Add ground raisins and nuts. Mix well. Sift together dry ingredients and add to shortening mixture. Add vanilla and mix all together. Roll in 1-inch balls. Place on greased cookie sheet 2 inches apart and flatten with a fork. Bake at 350 for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: sugared walnuts ; ingredients: walnut halves, sugar, water, cinnamon, salt, vanilla ; preparation:Spread the walnuts out on a large cookie sheet. Bake at 275 for about 15 minutes, stirring frequently. Remove from oven and set aside. Combine the sugar, water, cinnamon and salt in a 3 quart saucepan and cook to 236, soft-ball stage, without stirring. You get much better results. Remove from heat and stir in the vanilla and the nuts. Stir gently until the nuts are well coated and mixture has begun to cool down. Turn out onto a greased cookie sheet, separating any pieces that have clumped together. Cool completely. ; name: hedgehog cookies ; ingredients: walnuts, dates, brown sugar, flaked coconut, egg ; preparation:Combine the walnuts, dates and brown sugar in a large bowl. Add egg and half of the coconut, mix well. Shape into balls, roll in remaining coconut. Bake at 350 degrees for 12 to 14 minutes or until lightly browned. Remove to rack to cool. ; name: old fashioned walnut bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, shortening, milk, vanilla, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Sift flour, sugar, baking powder and salt into large bowl. Add egg, shortning, milk and vanilla. Stir until all is moistened. Stir in the walnuts. Bake in a 9x5 loaf pan for 1 hour, 20 minutes, or until toothpick comes out clean. ; name: apple nut cookies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, shortening, egg, flour, salt, nutmeg, apple, walnuts ; preparation:Cream together sugar and shortening. Beat in egg. Sift together dry ingredients, and add to mixture. Beat until well blended. Stir in apples and nuts. Drop in the shape of a ball on a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375, for 12-15 minutes. ; name: delicious no flour walnut cookies ; ingredients: extra-large egg yolks, sugar, vanilla extract, walnuts, lemon rind ; preparation:

name: curried turkey strips ; ingredients: turkey breast, flour, curry powder, turmeric, chili powder, salt, black pepper, egg, olive oil ; preparation:Slice turkey breast into strips. In a medium bowl combine all dry ingredients. In a separate bowl beat egg. Using one hand for the wet and the other for the dry, dredge the turkey in the egg followed by the flour mixture. Repeat until all strips are coated. Drizzle about a tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Place turkey strips in skillet, cook for 3-4 minutes. Flip strips, cook an additional 3-4 minutes until cooked through, taking care to not overcook or the turkey will become incredibly dry. ; name: leftover turkey ; ingredients: butter, celery, onion, turkey, water, turkey gravy mix, milk, flour, salt ; preparation:In a saucepan, melt butter over medium heat. Add celery and onion and cook for 5 minutes or til tender, stirring occasionally. Add turkey. Blend water, gravy, flour, and salt. Pour over turkey. Stir. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer 5 minutes serve over rice. ; name: mini turkey loaves ; ingredients: ground turkey, apple, onion, old fashioned oats, dijon-style mustard, dried rosemary, poultry seasoning, salt, cranberry sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Grease 12 muffin cups. Combine turkey, apple, onion, oats, mustard, rosemary, poultry seasoning and salt in large bowl. Press into prepared muffin cups and bake 20 minutes or until lightly browned and no longer pink in center. Top with cranberry sauce. ; name: italian turkey meatballs ; ingredients: ground turkey, cracker crumb, italian seasoning, seasoning, egg, vegetable oil, instant minced onion, italian breadcrumbs ; preparation:In large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients except the italian bread crumbs. Vegetable oil. Form into 2 inch meat balls. For more intense italian flavor, roll each meatball in the italian bread crumbs. This is optional. If you are going to put the meatballs in sauce or soup do not roll in the crumbs. Place on a baking pan that is non-stick. Preheat oven 375. Cook on the middle rack for 30 - 35 minutes. Makes 25 to 30 meatballs. ; name: checkerboard turkey sandwiches ; ingredients: whole wheat bread, cream cheese spread, deli turkey, tomatoes, white bread ; preparation:Spread wheat bread with cream cheese spread. Top with turkey, tomatoes and white bread. Cut sandwich into 3 horizontal strips, then 3 vertical strips to make 9 squares. Turn 4 or 5 of the squares upside down. Arrange squares on plate, alternating colors as needed to resemble a checkerboard. ; name: turkey dinner casserole ; ingredients: turkey gravy, mixed vegetables, prepared stuffing, cooked turkey, mashed potatoes, sharp cheddar cheese, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. Layer the first 4 ingredients in a large casserole. Lightly mix. Spread mashed potatoes evenly over the top. Sprinkle the cheese evenly over and sprinkle the pepper over the cheese. Bake on middle oven rack for approximately 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. Alternately place in 4 to 6 small single serving casseroles. Either way these casseroles freeze well. ; name: turkey fiesta ; ingredients: margarine, flour, salt, milk, cooked turkey, frozen peas, chopped pimiento ; preparation:Melt butter in pan. Add flour and salt. Slowly add milk, stirring with a fork or whisk to keep mixture smooth. Heat until thickened. Stir in turkey, peas, and pimentos. Cook until thoroughly heated. Serve over puff pastry shells or toast. ; name: russian style turkey cutlets ; ingredients: white bread, half-and-half, ground turkey, egg, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dried dill, butter, dry breadcrumbs, cooking oil ; preparation:

name: cherry chicken salad sandwich ; ingredients: cooked chicken, dried cherries, pecans, green onions, mayonnaise, plain yogurt, lemon juice, fresh ground black pepper, lettuce leaf, plain croissants ; preparation:Combine chicken, cherries, pecans, and onion in a bowl. Mix mayo, yogurt, and lemon juice. Pour over chicken mixture. Toss to mix. Refrigerate salad for 1-2 hours. Split croissants and divide chicken evenly. Sprinkle with black pepper before serving. ; name: yummy chicken salad for sandwiches ; ingredients: chicken breasts, olive oil flavored cooking spray, salt and pepper, sliced almonds, celery ribs, red onion, whole grain mustard, mayonnaise ; preparation:Preheat oven broiler. Spray the chicken breasts with olive oil spray and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Broil the chicken breasts for 7 minutes on each side or until cooked through. Chop chicken breasts and put in refrigerator to cool. While oven is still hot, spread your almond flakes on a cookie sheet and toast on the broiling rack. Please keep an eye on them because they toast quickly, and you dont want burnt almonds. Once the chicken is cooled, mix in the almonds, celery, onion, mustard and mayo. You can either put the salad straight onto your choice of bread and add whatever you like on your sandwiches or can be eaten out of iceburg lettuce leaves for a no carb version. ; name: pampered chef chicken salad tea sandwiches ; ingredients: white chicken meat, mayonnaise, apricot jam, raisins, onion, white bread ; preparation:Combine chicken, mayo, jam, raisins and onion in small bowl. Place 1 scoop chicken mixture in center of 8 slices of bread, spreading slightly. Top with remaining bread slices. Center cut-n-seal over bread. Cut and seal. ; name: hot chicken salad sandwiches ; ingredients: white bread, butter, chicken breasts, hard-boiled eggs, green olives, celery, onions, mayonnaise, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Trim crust from bread. Mix butter and cheese together and spread on the bread slices. Mix together chicken, eggs, olives, onions, and mayonnaise. Spread mixture on 6 slices of bread. Place remaining bread slices, cheese side up, over the chicken filling. Place sandwiches in single layer on large baking sheet. Torefrigerate for later baking, cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate now. Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Heat sandwiches, uncovered, for about 20 minutes or until hot and cheese topping melts and bread is toasted. ; name: caesar salad sandwiches with chicken ; ingredients: hard rolls, romaine lettuce, fat-free caesar salad dressing, parmesan cheese, chicken breasts, olive oil ; preparation:Set the oven on broil. Cut each roll in half and scoop out the dough to form a pocket in one side of the bread. Combine the lettuce, dressing and cheese in a bowl. Place the chicken strips on a broiler pan and brush with the olive oil. Broil the strips of chicken for a total of about 7 minutes, turning once. Add the chicken to the salad and pile the mixture into the bread pocket. Top with the other half of bread and serve. ; name: salad dressing chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, light honey dijon salad dressing, fresh rosemary, dried breadcrumbs, seasoning salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: chicken salad sandwiches with poppy seed dressing ; ingredients: mayonnaise, honey, rice wine vinegar, poppy seeds, fuji apples, cooked chicken, dried cranberries ; preparation:

name: italian butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, walnuts, flour, vanilla ; preparation:Whip butter with mixer. Continue mixing at low speed and add 1 cup powdered sugar, walnuts, then the flour, a few tablespoons at a time. Add vanilla. Drop cookie batter, by teaspoonfull quantities, on ungreased cookie sheet. The dough is fairly stiff so just roll the batter in little balls and then press down with a glass to shape. Bake 15-20 minutes at 350. Remove from pan. Sprinkle with a little powdered sugar. ; name: walnut and raisin oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: shortening, eggs, oatmeal, baking soda, vanilla, sugar, raisins, flour, salt, english walnuts ; preparation:Cream sugar and shortening thoroughly. Add eggs and mix well. Add ground raisins and nuts. Mix well. Sift together dry ingredients and add to shortening mixture. Add vanilla and mix all together. Roll in 1-inch balls. Place on greased cookie sheet 2 inches apart and flatten with a fork. Bake at 350 for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: butter walnut cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, salt, unbleached all-purpose flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a mixing bowl, beat your butter, sugar, egg, vanilla, and salt until light and fluffy. In another bowl combine flour and finely ground walnuts. Little by little add flour mixture to butter mixture. Mix until thoroughly combined. Cover your dough and refrigerate it for at least 1 hour. Take a quarter of your dough at a time out of your refrigerator, and roll it out to a quarter inch thickness. With a lightly floured glass rim, or any other desired shape you wish to use, and cut your cookies out and place on an parchment lined cookie sheet and bake in preheated oven for 8-10 minutes until they are just lightly browned. Remove the tray from the oven and immediately remove the cookies to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: fried bread cookies ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, salt, sugar, walnuts ; preparation:Cut crusts off of the bread and cut into 1 inch wide strips. Beat egg. Add egg to milk, salt, and sugar. Dip the bread strips into batter. Roll in chopped nuts. Deep fry until brown or bake in oven 15 minutes. ; name: brown swedish cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, honey, flour, baking soda ; preparation:Cream together butter, sugar and honey. Then add flour and baking soda to make dough. Roll the dough into small balls and place on a baking sheet. Use a cookie press or the bottom of a drinking glass dipped in sugar to flatten the dough balls. Pre-heat an oven to 300f. Bake cookies for about 10 minutes. When cookies are light brown, remove from oven and place on a wire rack to cool. ; name: our favorite chocolate cookies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate bits, butter, condensed milk, all-purpose flour, nuts, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Spray 2 large cookie sheets with cooking spray. Melt chocolate morsels and butter. Cool slightly. In large bowl add condensed milk, flour, nuts and vanilla extract. Stir until well mixed. Drop by rounded teaspoons onto cookie sheets. Bake 12-15 minutes. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: oatmeal cookies no flour ; ingredients: butter, oatmeal, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, eggs, cinnamon, dried craisin, chocolate-covered raisins ; preparation:Place the first 7 ingredients in a mixer, mixing till blended. Stir in the remaing ingredients. Spoon on to a parchment lined cookie sheet pan. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven for 15-20 minutes. Remove and let set for 5 minutes. ; name: hungarian nut nuggets cookies ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, walnuts, vanilla extract, flour ; preparation:

name: italian barbecued steak ; ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, balsamic vinegar, garlic, onion, fresh rosemary, salt and black pepper, sirloin steaks ; preparation:Mix together all ingredients in a plastic bag and add steak. Refrigerate and marinate for 4 to 8 hours, flipping the steaks occasionally. Remove steaks from refrigerator 30 minutes before grilling. Drain and discard marinade from steaks. Grill over medium heat until steaks reach your desired doneness. Remove from grill and let rest for 10 minutes before slicing and serving. ; name: marinated top sirloin steaks ; ingredients: top sirloin steaks, garlic, olive oil, worcestershire sauce, cider vinegar, sherry wine, brown sugar, fresh thyme, pepper, salt ; preparation:Place steaks in a plastic ziplock bag, or plastic container. In a small bowl, whisk together all the remaining ingredients. Pour over steaks. Turn to coat evenly. Chill for at least 6 hours. Turning occasionally to redistribute marinade. After marinating, heat grill on med-high. Remove steaks from marinade and place on hot grill. Grill for about 4 minutes on each side or to desired doneness. ; name: spicy grilled steak ; ingredients: dry red wine, onion, chili powder, prepared horseradish, ground red pepper, poblano chile, garlic, top sirloin steaks ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except steak in a large resealable plastic bag, mix well. Add steak, turn to coat. Seal bag and refrigerate for 8 hours or overnight. When ready to grill, remove steak from marinade, reserving the marinade. Grill steak to desired doneness. Meanwhile, in medium saucepan bring reserved marinade to a boil. Reduce heat and cook 5 to 8 minutes or until slightly thickened. Serve grilled steak with hot marinade. ; name: broiled steak with shallot butter ; ingredients: steaks, oil, butter, white wine vinegar, worcestershire sauce, shallots, salt, fresh ground pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Rub the steaks on both sides with oil. Heat the broiler until it is glowing. Broil the steaks until just cooked to the point that you prefer, turning 2-3 times. Melt the butter in a small frying pan, add the vinegar and worcestershire sauce, the shallots, salt and pepper. Heat through, without cooking the shallots, mix in the parsley and keep on one side. Put the steaks onto a heated dish and pour some of the shallot butter over each, when it will mingle with the juices. Serve at once with your favourite side dishes. ; name: steak diane from a treasury of great recipes by vincent price ; ingredients: sirloin steaks, shallots, worcestershire sauce, unsalted butter, parsley, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Heat in small sauce pan 2 tablespoons of butter over medium-high heat. Add 4 tablespoons finely chopped shallots and cook until lightly browned. Add 2 tablespoons worcestershire and heat to bubbling, keeping the sauce hot. Heat 12 in skillet 6 tablespoons butter, when it begins to brown, add pounded steaks and cook for 3 minutes. Turn and cook 2 to 3 more minutes longer, or until done to taste. Transfer to a serving dish and sprinkle with salt and a generous amount of fresh ground pepper. Spread the shallot sauce over the steaks and sprinkle with fresh chopped parsley. ; name: steak and potato casserole ; ingredients: top round beef, garlic powder, pepper, meat tenderizer, potatoes, red onion, green pepper, fresh mushrooms, red wine and vinegar salad dressing ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree season meat with seasonings. In large skillet over medium high heat, saute the meat until well browned on all sides. Next, place the potatoes, onions, green peppers and mushrooms over the meat. Top with salad dressing, and cover with foil. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour, or until potatoes are done and meat is tender. ; name: steaks with balsamic mustard sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, steaks, coarse salt, ground black pepper, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over high heat. Season steaks generously on both side with salt and pepper. Place steaks in skillet. Cook, turning once, until browned, 2-3 minutes per side for medium rare. Transfer to a warmed plate, cover with foil. Add vinegar to skillet. Boil until syrupy, scraping to loosen browned bits from skillet. Whisk in mustard and any accumulated juices from steak. Serve steaks with sauce. ; name: steak with caramelized onions ; ingredients: butter, onions, garlic, brown sugar, salt, boneless beef top sirloin steak, pepper, balsamic vinegar, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: old style sunday meatballs ; ingredients: ground meat, eggs, minced garlic cloves, dried parsley, dried oregano, dried basil, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, italian breadcrumbs ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, mix all ingredients except cheese and breadcrumbs. Once mixed, add cheese and breadcrumbs, mix until even. Coat a roasting pan or high sided pan with extra virgin olive oil. Roll meat mixture into balls about the size of a golfball and line oiled pan with them. Bake at 350 degrees for about 20 minutes or until done. ; name: easy pleasing meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, garlic cloves, breadcrumbs, italian seasoning, egg, milk ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Line a large glass baking dish with foil,. Put the ground beef in a large bowl and add the onion and garlic, knead together, add bread crumbs and italian seasoning -- mix all together. Add the egg and milk -- knead together well with hands --. Form pieces of meat into 1 inch balls, place in baking dish -- bake for about 20-30 minutes --. I usually put them in a large pan on the stove and cover with spaghetti sauce for a few minutes at medium heat, but thats optional. ; name: magnificent meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, tomatoes with juice, fine breadcrumbs, eggs, salt, ground black pepper, oregano, onion, bacon, sour cream ; preparation:Mix together the beef and 2 cups of tomatoes, bread crumbs, eggs, salt, pepper, oregano, and onion. Form into 24 good size meatballs. Wrap each meatball with a bacon slice overlapping bacon carefully. Place the meatballs in a large flat baking dish so that the over lapping bacon is on bottom. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes, or until the bacon is crisp. Remove from oven and pour off the fat. Combine the sour cream and the remaining 2 cups of tomatoes. Pour over the meatballs and return to the oven. Turn off the heat. Serve with rice once the sauce is hot. ; name: meatballs with tomato with juice gravy ; ingredients: ground beef, ground sausage, salt, pepper, chili powder, onion, saltine crackers, egg, cornstarch, tomato juice ; preparation:Mix the ground beef, sasuage, salt, pepper, chili powder, onion, crackers, 1 beaten egg and 1 cup tomato juice. Shape into balls about the size of walnuts and bake at 350 about 30 minutes, turn and bake about 20 more minutes. You can drain the drippings off or leave them, sometimes i leave them if there is not too much grease. Mix remaining juice, cornstarch, a little chile powder and some of the dripping from the pan, i warm the sauce up in the microwave just a little before putting in the hot pan. Put back in the oven till juice thickens or is good and bubbly. ; name: meatballs that make their own sauce ; ingredients: whole wheat bread, water, lean ground beef, parsley, onions, egg, dried oregano, garlic, salt and pepper, tomato juice ; preparation:Moisten bread with water. Mix throughly with remaining meatball ingredients. Shape into 8 medium or 16 small meatballs. Brown meatballs on all sides. Combine sauce ingredients in large saucepan. Heat to boiling. Add meatballs. Simmer uncovered until tomato juice has reduced to a fairly-thick sauce-about one hour. Skim any fat. Serve with crusty italian bread, or with pasta. ; name: cocktail meatballs in garlic butter sauce ; ingredients: ground beef, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, italian seasoning, kosher salt, extra large egg, butter, minced garlic clove, flour, chicken broth ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Mix first six ingredients and form into cocktail size meatballs. Place on jelly roll style pan with lip. Bake meatballs in oven for 15-20 minutes until done. Melt butter in saucepan. Add garlic and saut for 1-2 minutes. Stir in flour. Stir in chicken broth and cook until thickened. Combine meatballs and sauce. Keep warm in crockpot if serving for party. ; name: buffalo meatballs gravy ; ingredients: ground buffalo meat, egg, ritz cracker, onion, garlic powder, pepper, beefy mushroom soup, flour ; preparation:Combine the first 6 ingredients. Mix well. Using a large scoop,. Scoop into balls and place on large jellyroll pan. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes. In a large skillet, combine the soup and flour. Cook over medium heat until thickened. Add cooked meatballs, and simmer 10 minutes. Serve over mashed potatoes, or egg noodles. ; name: weeknight meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, white bread, egg, garlic powder, onion powder, ground pepper, tomato paste, hunts tomato sauce, sugar, salt ; preparation:

name: farmhouse cheddar cheese and cranberry croque monsieur toasties ; ingredients: white bread, lightly-salted butter, cheddar cheese, cranberry jelly ; preparation:Spread bread with half the butter in the normal way. Top 4 slices with the grated cheese and spoon on cranberry jelly. Top with the remaining bread to make 4 sandwiches. Gently fry the bread in the remaining butter until crisp and golden on both sides. Cut into triangles and serve whilst warm with fresh seasonal salad leaves. ; name: crme de brie mango cranberry crostini ; ingredients: french baguettes, olive oil, brie cheese, mango chutney, dried sweetened cranberries, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. Arrange baguette slices on large ungreased cookie sheet. Brush with olive oil. Bake 5 to 7 minutes or until lightly toasted and crisp. Place on 2 serving plates and cool 1 minute. Spread each with about tablespoon alouette crme de brie. In small bowl, combine chutney, and cranberries. Spoon small dollops over cheese. Garnish sparingly with mint. ; name: easy 4 ingredient cranberry crisp ; ingredients: sugar, flour, butter, whole berry cranberry sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease an 8x8 inch baking dish. Combine the sugar, flour and butter, using a pastry blender. Pour cranberry sauce into prepared dish and cover with the flour mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes. Cut into 9 pieces and serve warm or cold. ; name: apple and brie toasts ; ingredients: baguette, brown sugar, walnuts, butter, brie cheese, granny smith apples ; preparation:Arrange bread slices on an ungreased baking sheet. Bake at 350 f until lightly toasted. Set aside. Mix together sugar, walnuts, and butter. Top each slice of bread with a cheese slice, an apple slice, and one teaspoon of the walnut mixture. Bake until cheese melts. ; name: grilled brie sandwiches with greens and garlic ; ingredients: garlic cloves, olive oil, fresh spinach, brie cheese, whole wheat bread, margarine ; preparation:In a large skillet cook garlic in hot oil for 30 seconds. Add spinach. Cook over medium heat, tossing till spinach begins to wilt. Remove from heat and set aside. Divide the cheese among 4 slices of the bread. Top with spinach-garlic mixture. Cover with remaining bread slices. Lightly butter the outside of each sandwich. In a large skillet cook half of the sandwiches over medium-low heat for 5 to 7 minutes or till golden brown. Turn sandwich and cook for 2 minutes more or till golden brown and cheese melts. Transfer to a warm oven. Repeat with remaining sandwiches. ; name: brie and cranberry pizza ; ingredients: refrigerated crescent dinner rolls, brie cheese, whole berry cranberry sauce, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Lightly grease a 9x13 inch baking dish. Unroll the crescent rolls and press into baking dish pinching seams together. Bake 5 minutes, or until lightly brown. Remove from the oven and sprinkle with pieces of brie cheese. Spoon the cranberry sauce over the cheese. Top with pecans. Bake an additional 8 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and the crust is golden brown. Cool 5 minutes and cut into squares. ; name: warm brie berry dip ; ingredients: sourdough bread rounds, brie cheese, brown sugar, pecans, pine nuts, blueberries, raspberries ; preparation:Slice the top off a round loaf of sourdough bread. Save the top, but hollow out the inside of the loaf. Discard insides or use for breadcrumbs later. Combine brie, sugar, nuts and berries. Place into the hollowed-out loaf and cover with bread top for a lid. Wrap in foil and bake for 40 minutes at 350 degrees. Serve warm with a tray of sliced baguettes. Bread lid can be cut into pieces and also used for dipping. ; name: easy honey cranberry french toast with brie ; ingredients: butter, cranberries, honey, eggs, sugar, milk, vanilla, whole grain bread, brie cheese ; preparation:

name: spinach pie with muenster crust ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, muenster cheese, onion, low fat cottage cheese, eggs, parmesan cheese, salt, pepper, pimiento strips ; preparation:Drain spinach well, pressing between layers of paper towels and set aside. Cut 2-3 cheese slices into small triangles, and reserve for garnish. Cover bottom and sides of a lightly greased 9 or10-inch pieplate with remaining muenster slices, overlapping cheese as needed. Combine spinach, onion and next 5 ingredients. Spoon into cheese-lined pieplate. Bake 350 for 45 minutes or until set. Cool 10 minutes before serving. Garnish with reserved cheese triangles and pimiento strips, if desired. ; name: easiest creamed spinach ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, cream cheese, garlic, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Thaw and cook spinach til most water is gone. Add cream cheese. Add garlic to taste. Stir over medium heat until cream cheese is melted. Put parmesan over the top. Cover and set off the heat until cheese melts. Serve. ; name: spinach and feta pie ; ingredients: phyllo pastry, spinach, olive oil, onion, fresh dill, eggs, feta cheese, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Cut the pastry to fit the size or your baking dish,, then keep it covered with a damp cloth. Prepare the spinach. Heat the oil and saute the onion for 5 minutes until soft. Add the spinach and stir for 5 minutes over a medium heat then increase the heat to evaporate any moisture. Leave to cool then mix in the dill, eggs, cheese, salt and pepper. Brush the baking dish with melted butter. Brush 8 layers of pastry with butter and lay them in the bottom of the dish. Spread with the filling, then cover with the remaining pastry, brushing each one with melted butter and scoring the top into diamond shapes. Sprinkle with water and bake in a preheated oven at 325f for 40 minutes until crisp and golden. Leave to stand for 10 minutes, then cut into wedges and serve with crisp lettuce leaves. ; name: spinach pie with sun dried tomatoes ; ingredients: double crust pie crusts, eggs, ricotta cheese, asiago cheese, parmesan cheese, black pepper, dried basil, frozen chopped spinach, seasoned dry bread crumb, sun-dried tomato packed in oil ; preparation:Line a 9-inch pie plate with one crust round. Beat one of the eggs with a fork and use a pastry brush to lightly brush egg over the pie crust. Beat remaining eggs in a large bowl, using a whisk. Add cheese, pepper, and basil and stir to combine. Add spinach, as well as the bread crumbs and tomatoes. Pour filling into crust and top with the second crust round. Fold edges under to seal and crimp or flute edges as desired. Brush with remaining egg wash. Cut a few slits in the top crust and bake in a preheated 375 f oven for 25 minutes. Cover edges with a ring of foil or a pie sheild, then continue baking another 20 minutes. Cool on wire rack at least 15 minutes before attempting to slice. ; name: creamed spinach like boston market ; ingredients: butter, all-purpose flour, salt, half-and-half cream, cream cheese, onions, garlic, frozen chopped spinach, water, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium low heat, melt 3 tbls butter. Stir flour and salt into pan until creamed together. Slowly stir in cream, then stir in cream cheese, increase heat to medium. Constantly whisk until mixture becomes thick and smooth, remove from heat and set aside. In a saucepan over medium-high heat, saute onions and garlic in remaining butter until transparent. Add spinach and water to pan, reduce heat to low, cover. Cook, stirring occasionally for 8 minutes. Stir prepared sauce and parmesan cheese into pan, stir until completely blended. ; name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: simple spinach side dish ; ingredients: frozen spinach, sour cream, dehydrated onion, cheese, fresh breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Thaw and drain the spinach. Mix spinach, onion and sour cream. Place in greased casserole dish. Cover with grated cheese, fresh bread crumbs, and parm. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: the best spinach pie and so easy ; ingredients: pie crust, butter, mushrooms, jarlsberg cheese, spinach souffle ; preparation:

name: coarse ground mustard ; ingredients: white mustard seeds, red wine vinegar, dry red wine, dry english-style mustard, salt, ground allspice, water ; preparation:Place mustard seed, wine vinegar and wine in a small bowl and let stand for 3 hours. Process in a blender on pulse until seeds are bruised and broken. Add dry mustard, salt, allspice, and water, mix well. Cover loosely, and allow to stand overnight. Refrigerate unused portions. ; name: sweet hot mustard ; ingredients: dry mustard, sugar, vinegar, salt, egg, miracle whip ; preparation:Mix dry mustard and vinegar and let stand overnight in a closed container. I use a glass mason jar and lid. The next day, in a glass saucepan beat egg. Mix in sugar, salt and mustard mixture. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly with wire whisk, until mixture thickens and just begins to bubble. Take off heat. Let cool approximately 30 minutes. Then stir in miracle whip. Keep in a sealed container in the refrigerator. Will keep in the refrigerator for up to two months. Great sandwich spread. It also works well as a dip for sausage or pepperoni sticks at a party. ; name: bourbon mustard glazed pork chops ; ingredients: olive oil, pork chops, salt and pepper, grainy mustard, stock, honey, butter, bourbon ; preparation:Preheat oven 400. Place large oven skillet over medium high heat with 2 tablespoons of olive oil. Season the chops and sear until deep golden brown. When chops are seared, add 1 tablespoon olive oil along with the mustard, stock, honey and butter. When liquids come up to a bubble, pour bourbon into the skillet, remove from heat and carefully flame with a lighter. Or just continue boiling the sauce and the alcohol will cook away. Season the sauce with salt and pepper, and continue cooking until it starts to thicken, 2-3 minutes. Flip the chops over and transfer the entire pan to the oven to finish cooking, about 5 minutes. ; name: not french dressing ; ingredients: onion powder, dry mustard, sugar, salt, paprika, white wine vinegar, olive oil, sunflower oil ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients and vinegar in a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Cover and shake well until sugar is dissolved. Add oil. Cover and shake well. Let stand at least half an hour before using. Shake well just before pouring onto salad greens. Refrigerate unused portion. ; name: homemade english ale mustard with garlic ; ingredients: yellow mustard seeds, garlic cloves, plain flour, fine sea salt, ale ; preparation:Grind the mustard seeds to a smooth powder using either an electric spice grinder or a coffee grinder. Transfer the ground seeds to a bowl and add the flour, crushed garlic and salt. Gradually whisk in the ale until it takes on a smooth, creamy consistency. Spoon the mustard into sterilised jam jars and secure with well-fitting lids. Leave to mature for at least 2 weeks in a cool place before tasting. ; name: mustard rub for pork ; ingredients: brown mustard seeds, fennel seed, coriander seeds, cumin seed, whole black peppercorn, dried thyme, dry mustard, ground ginger, coarse salt, sugar ; preparation:Place the first 5 ingrediants in a dry skillant. Place over medium heat, moving the skillet to keep seeds from burning, until aromatic, about 2 minutes. Mustard seeds will begin to pop. Transfer seeds to a spice grinder, cool slightly, and pulse until finely chopped but not powdery. Transfer to a small bowl and stir in rest of the ingrediants. ; name: mustard ham sauce ; ingredients: sugar, flour, eggs, prepared mustard, vinegar, beef bouillon, butter ; preparation:Stir flour and sugar together. Add eggs and mix well. Add remaining ingredients. Cook over low heat, stirring constantly until thick. Serve hot over ham. Refrigerate leftover sauce to use for sandwiches. ; name: grainy french style mustard ; ingredients: brown mustard seeds, rice vinegar, mustard powder, salt, beer ; preparation:

name: brownies weight watchers 2 points ; ingredients: low-fat brownie mix, all-bran cereal, water, baking powder ; preparation:Put the all bran into a large bowl and add the water. Soak for 5 minutes. Add the brownie mix along with the baking powder to the all bran and mix well by hand. Pour into a greased 9x13 pan and bake according to directions on box. When cool, cut into 20 squares. One square will equal 2 points. ; name: weight watchers chocolate chip blondies 3 points ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, table salt, brown sugar, light butter, egg whites, vanilla extract, mini chocolate chip, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f in a small bowl, combine flour, baking powder and salt. In a large bowl, beat brown sugar and butter until fluffy. Add egg whites and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture alternating with water. Stir in chips. Spread into a foil-lined 9- x 13-inch baking pan. Bake until golden, about 20 to 25 minutes. Cool on wire rack. Remove foil and cut into 24 two-inch squares. ; name: ww 1 pt chocolate brownie cups ; ingredients: unsweetened applesauce, vanilla, egg whites, sugar, flour, baking powder, unsweetened cocoa powder, instant espresso powder, salt, miniature semisweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Thoroughly mist two 12 cup nonstick mini-muffin tins with cooking spray or use paper liners. Mix the applesauce, vanilla, eggwhites, and sugar until well combined in a large mixing bowl. Add the flour, baking powder, cocoa, espresso powder and salt. Stir until just combined and smooth. Using half the batter, fill each m uffin cup until just barely full. Sprinkle half of the chips evenly over the top. Bake 10-12 minutes. Transfer the pans to a rack to cool for 5 minutes. Using a knife, gently remove the bronwies from the muffin tins. Let cool another 10 minutes. Repeat with the 2nd half of the batter and remaining chips. ; name: weight watchers apple swirl coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, yellow cake mix, applesauce, egg beaters egg substitute ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Blend sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl, set aside. Spray 10 inch tube or bunt pan with non stick spray. Dust pan with the sugar, cinnamon mixture. Blend cake mix, applesauce and egg beaters, and pour into pan. Bake. ; name: chocolate brownie waffles ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, eggs, milk, cooking oil, semi-sweet chocolate chips, unsweetened cocoa, walnuts ; preparation:Grease and preheat waffle iron. Combine flour, baking powder, salt, sugar, chocolate chips, cocoa, and walnuts in a large mixing bowl. In a small mixing bowl, combine egg yolks, milk, and cooking oil. Add the liquid mixture to the dry mixture. Stir until combined, but still lumpy. In a small bowl, beat the egg whites until stiff peaks form. Gently, fold the egg whites into the lumpy batter. Pour the batter onto the iron and bake until done. For an even more sinful treat, top with whipped cream, fresh strawberries or raspberries, chocolate sauce and chopped nuts. ; name: hubby s chewy brownies ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, flour, baking powder, salt, butter, eggs, water, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f grease a 9x13-inch baking pan. Combine dry ingredients in a medium bowl. Add remaining ingredients, stir well. Pour into prepared dish. Bake for 27-35 minutes or until a toothpick comes out slightly sticky. Cool pan on a wire rack. ; name: weight watchers chocolate marshmallow fudge ; ingredients: sugar, fat-free evaporated milk, reduced-calorie margarine, semisweet chocolate, marshmallows ; preparation:Coat an 8x8-inch pan with cooking spray. Stir together sugar, evaporated milk and margarine. Bring to a boil in sauce pan, reduce heat to medium-low and cook 3 minutes, stirring constantly. Stir in chocolate and marshmallows. Remove from heat and stir until smooth. Pour into pan and refrigerate until firm, about two hours. Cut into 36 squares and serve. If you are following weight watchers, this has 3 points per serving. ; name: weight watchers brownie cupcake bites ; ingredients: brownie mix, water, unsweetened applesauce, egg whites, light whipped topping, candy corn ; preparation:

name: almond sponge cake ; ingredients: egg whites, baking soda, salt, sugar, cornstarch, almond meal ; preparation:Whip the egg whites till very stiff with salt and baking soda. Add the sugar a little at a time while continuously beating. Mix cornstarch and almonds. Fold into meringue. Spread batter into two circles, roughly 21 cm in diameter, on baking paper. Bake in the middle of the oven at 150 degrees celcious for about an hour. Let cool on a grill. ; name: grandma chin s sponge cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, vanilla, butter, milk, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Beat eggs until light. Beat in sugar, salt and vanilla. Beat in milk and butter. Add dry ingredients very quickly and pour into a greased 9x13 pan. Bake 25 to 35 minutes or until toothpick placed in middle comes out clean. Serve with strawberries and whipped cream. ; name: gluten free fairy cakes ; ingredients: margarine, caster sugar, eggs, vanilla essence, gluten-free flour, milk, baking powder ; preparation:Make sure you have 12 paper cases handy. Preheat oven to 200 degrees. Cream together margarine and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla, followed by the sifted baking powder, sifted flour and milk. Half fill paper cases standing on baking tray. Bake for 10-12 minutes. When cold, decorate the top with jam or icing or just icing sugar, if desired. ; name: sweet low fat cornmeal cake ; ingredients: cornmeal, flour, brown sugar, baking powder, salt, non-fat vanilla yogurt, whole fruit jam, canola oil, egg substitute, skim milk ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl mix the cormeal, flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. In a smaller bowl mix the yogurt, oil, jam, egg, and milk. Mix well to break up the jam. Mix it until it is frothy. Combine the 2 mixtures carefully, just until combined. Spray a 9 inch round cake pan, or i use a 9 inch tart pan with a pretty edge. Pour the mixture into the pan and bake for 30-40 minutes. It puffs up in the middle a bit and should be brown on the top. A toothpick or knife inserted in the middle should come out clean. ; name: patty cakes egg dairy gluten nut and soy free ; ingredients: dairy-free margarine, caster sugar, eggs, gluten-free self-raising flour, rice flour, gluten free baking powder, rice milk, icing sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Line 12 hole muffin trays or patty pans with paper cases. Beat the margarine and sugar together using an electric mixer until light and fluffy. Add the eggs or the eg replacer. Beat well. Sift the dry ingredients into a seerate large bowl. Fold the dry ingredients into the margarine alternately with the rice or soy milk. Spoon the mixture evenly into the patty cases and bake for 15-20 minutes, or until just cooked. Allow to cool in trays 10 minutes before moving to a wire rack to cool. Dust with the icing sugar or ice with a suitable icing or frosting. ; name: vegan sponge cake ; ingredients: spelt flour, unbleached cane sugar, baking powder, ener-g egg substitute, pure vanilla extract, light oil, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Mix the first 4 ingredients together in a mixing bowl. Add the vanilla and oil until all dry ingredients are moistened. Add the water and mix well. Pour into a greased 9 inch pan and bake for 30 minutes or until a toothpick comes out of the center clean. ; name: basic cake or muffin mix wheat and egg free ; ingredients: gluten-free flour, salt, baking powder, caster sugar, butter, puree, white vinegar, milk ; preparation:Rub the dry ingredients in with the butter. Add the wet ingredients, adding a little milk at a time to get a soft dropping consistancy. Beat the mixture well to combine. Add paper liners to the muffin tin and fill with the mixture. Sprinkle a little sugar on the tops of the muffins. Bake at about 190 degrees celsius for about 20 - 25 minutes for muffins and about 50 minutes for a loaf tin. Makes about 12 muffins. ; name: gluten free sponge cake ; ingredients: cornflour, baking powder, eggs, salt, sugar ; preparation:

name: orange soak cake ; ingredients: orange cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, powdered sugar, orange juice, butter ; preparation:Just add 1 tbs of orange extract and 1 tbs grated orange peel to the batter before mixing preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease and flour a 13x9-inch pan. Prepare and bake cake mix according to package directions. While cake is baking, combine powdered sugar, orange juice, melted butter, and water in a medium bowl. When cake is done, remove from oven and immediately poke holes in top with a fork or toothpick. Pour glaze slowly over top of hot cake, allowing it to soak in. Cool completely on a wire rack. ; name: low fat choc orange cake ; ingredients: self-raising flour, egg whites, sugar, applesauce, baking soda, chocolate chips, unsweetened orange juice, oranges, rind of ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180deg c. Beat egg whites and sugar together for 1 minute. Stir baking soda into apple sauce and then add to bowl. Gently fold in flour, rind and choc chips alternately with orange juice. Pour into prepared loaf tin. Bake 30- 35 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. ; name: mandarin orange coffee cake ; ingredients: orange cake mix, instant vanilla pudding, eggs, vegetable oil, mandarin oranges ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Grease and flour 10-inch bundt pan. Combine cake mix, pudding mix, eggs, oil, and one-cup juice. Beat at medium speed with electric mixer for 2 minutes. Add mandarin oranges in the last 30 seconds. Pour in pan. Bake 38 to 43 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean. Cool in pan 10 minutes. Invert onto plate. Dust with powdered sugar when completely cooled. ; name: peach sunshine tea cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, vanilla, egg, flour, baking powder, peaches, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 grease a 9 inch springform pan in small bowl, blend butter and sugar, then add vanilla and egg. Beat well add flour, baking powder, and salt to butter mixture. Blend well. Spread dough over bottom and 1 inch up sides of pan. Over dough, arrange 5-6 peach slices in center to create a circular shape place rest of slices around center circle to create the effect of sunrays. Sprinkle with sugar and cinnamon. Bake 35-45 minutes cool 10 minutes then remove the sides of pan. ; name: easy peasy quick chocolate orange cake ; ingredients: caster sugar, margarine, flour, egg, baking powder, cocoa powder, vanilla essence, orange, juice and zest of ; preparation:Cream the butter and sugar together. Add the egg and the flour and baking powder. Add the orange rind and juice coco powder and vanilla essence. Mix well and pour into microwavable dish. Zap for five minutes in the microwave on medium. Serve with custard. ; name: orange coconut pound cake ; ingredients: margarine, butter flavor shortening, sugar, eggs, almond extract, orange, zest of, orange juice, flour, milk, flaked coconut ; preparation:Grease and flour 10-inch tube pan. Preheat oven 350. Cream margarine, shortening, and sugar till light and fluffy, about 10 minutes. Beat in eggs 1 at a time, beating well after each one. Add extract, zest and juice. Combine well. Alternately add flour and milk, beating well after each addition. Add coconut and beat 1 minute. Pour into prepared pan. Bake 1 hour and 15 minutes till test done. Cool 15 minutes remove to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: orange almond cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, light olive oil, eggs, orange juice, orange zest, sliced almonds ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients with mixer for 3 minutes. Pour batter into greased cake pan. I use a 10 inch diameter silicone cake pan and make it in one layer. Sprinkle top of batter with sliced almonds. Bake at 350 degrees until done, about 40 minutes. ; name: orange sunshine cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, self rising flour, salt, orange, juice and rind of, butter ; preparation:

name: cauliflower vanilla soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, low sodium vegetable broth, red onion, garlic clove, vanilla pod, heavy cream, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Break the cauliflower into small florets. In a large saucepan over medium heat, add the stock and bring it to a simmer. Add the cauliflower, sliced onion, and garlic. Split the vanilla pod and scrape out the seeds, adding them to the contents of the saucepan. Simmer the soup for 15 minutes or until cauliflower is tender. Remove from heat and stir in the heavy cream, then add salt and pepper to taste. Pour the mixture into a blender, in batches if necessary, and whir until smooth or to desired texture. Serve immediately with good crusty bread. Also good garnished with a shaving of parmesan or asiago. ; name: creamy curry cauliflower soup ; ingredients: cauliflower, onion, garlic cloves, celery ribs, diced tomatoes, red curry paste, vegetable broth, coconut milk, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Put cauli, onion, garlic, celery, tomatoes, water and curry paste in a large pot. Bring to a boil and simmer until all ingredients are well cooked. Using an immersion blender, puree all ingredients to desired smoothness and return to heat. Lower temperature and add milk and coconut milk. Heat through and serve. ; name: creamy cauliflower soup ww friendly ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, celery, chicken broth, cauliflower, half-and-half, nutmeg, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Clean and chop the leeks and celery. Heat oil in a large nonstick sauce pan, over medium heat. Add the leeks and celery, stir frequently, cook until softened, not browned, about 4 minutes. Add the broth and cauliflower, bring to boil. Cover and simmer until the cauliflower is tender, about 10-15 minutes. Remove from heat. In batches or with a blender stick, puree to desired texture. You may want to spoon out and reserve some cauliflower pieces for added texture. Stir in half & half and nutmeg and blend. Top with grated cheddar cheese. ; name: indian spiced cauliflower soup ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, onion, garlic, curry paste, cauliflower, chicken stock, natural yoghurt, cream, pappadams ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a large saucepan. Add onion and cook over low heat until soft. Add garlic and cook for a further 30 seconds. Add curry paste cook for 30 seconds. Add cauliflower and stir to coat with the curry paste. Add stock. Simmer for 15 minutes. Cool slightly before pureeing. Return to the heat and stir in the yoghurt. Serve drizzled with cream and with pappadums. ; name: cauliflower white cheddar soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chicken stock, cauliflower, evaporated skim milk, nutmeg, white cheddar cheese, fresh ground pepper, salt ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large saucepan over medium-high heat. Add the onion and cook, stirring occasionally, until tender, 5-8 minutes. Add the cauliflower and cook, stirring occasionally, until light golden brown, about 5 minutes. Add the stock, milk, nutmeg, and pepper and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low and simmer until the cauliflower is easily pierced with a fork, about 10 minutes. Remove 1 cup of cauliflower florets and set aside., puree soup in blender or food processor until smooth. Return soup to pot and stir in the cheese and remaining cauliflower florets and adjust seasonings to taste. ; name: chamomile cauliflower soup ; ingredients: chamomile tea bags, water, head cauliflower, onion, celery ribs, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Boil water and tea bags in large saucepan for 5 minutes. Remove tea bags. Squeezing the excess liquid into the pan. Add the cauliflower to the tea, cover and simmer for 15 minutes or until tender. Drain, reserving 1 cup of the liquid. In small pan, saute the onions and celery in the butter until the onions are clear. Put in a blender with the cauliflower, salt and pepper, and the reserved cooking liquid. Blend until smooth and serve. For thinner soup, reserve and add more liquid. For thicker soup reserve and and add less. ; name: cream of cauliflower and cheddar soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, cauliflower, condensed chicken broth, all-purpose flour, milk, cheddar cheese, pepper, parsley, crouton ; preparation:Melt butter in large saucepan, saute onion until tender. Stir in cauliflower and chicken broth. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 1215 minutes or until cauliflower is tender. Combine flour and milk. Add to saucepan. Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture boils and thickens. Remove from heat. Add cheese and stir until melted. Add pepper and parsley to taste. Serve with croutons. ; name: comforting cauliflower soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic, potatoes, cauliflower, low sodium chicken broth, water, salt and pepper, chives ; preparation:

name: cabbage and tomato chicken soup ; ingredients: chicken, cabbage, onion, tomatoes, carrots, garlic cloves, fresh chives, fresh basil, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cover chicken with water in a large pot. Cook 1 hour and remove chicken. Meanwhile, prepare remaining ingredients, and add to pot after removing chicken, and cook for 1 hour. Meanwhile, place chicken in baking dish and roast it in a 350 f oven for 30 minutes. After roasting, let chicken cool for 10 minutes before removing meat from the carcass and adding the meat to the soup pot. Simmer until the meat is heated through, and serve. ; name: chicken garlic soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, celery, yellow onion, fresh parsley, salt and pepper, garlic, butter, flour ; preparation:Make the chicken broth by simmering chicken, carrots, celery, onion, garlic, parsley, salt and pepper in enough water to cover. When the chicken is thoroughly cooked, remove it and skim the fat from broth. Simmer broth, reducing it until it is very rich. Add the flour and butter to a small amount of broth and mix with a wire whisk until velvety. Pour this mixture into the remaining broth. Tear chicken into bite-sized pieces and add to the soup. Sprinkle with fresh parsley and serve. ; name: super simple and speedy chicken soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, chicken, carrots, frozen peas, scallions, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan over high heat, bring the broth to a boil. Add the chicken, carrots, peas and scallions. Reduce the heat and simmer for 5 minutes, or until the carrots are tender. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. Serve, or freeze for later. ; name: easy creamy vegetable soup ; ingredients: onion, carrot, celery, water, vegetables, salt, pepper, chicken broth, half-and-half ; preparation:Simmer onion, carrot and celery in water for 10 minutes or until vegetables are tender. In a blender or food processor. Puree all vegetables. Add salt, pepper, chicken broth and cream. Heat before serving, but do not boil. ; name: super simple chicken soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, carrot, celery, shallot, garlic, chunk chicken, hot water, chicken base, cold water, cornstarch ; preparation:Place first 5 ingredients in a soup pot and saute for 5 minutes. Add chicken, stir. Combine hot water and base then add to your pot. Cook for 15 minutes or until carrots are done enough for you. Combine cold water and corn starch then add to your pot while stirring. Your soup will thicken and be ready to serve. You can add more cornstarch mixture if you would like it thicker. I like mine somewhere between a soup and a stew consistency. ; name: chicken and stars soup ; ingredients: chicken, carrots, onion, celery, garlic cloves, pasta, parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a stock pot, place chicken, carrots, garlic, onion and celery. Cover with water. Boil for thirty to forty minutes, remove chicken from pot. Allow chicken to cool remove skin and bones, then chop chicken into bite-size pieces. Add chicken back to soup, add parsley, pasta, salt and pepper. Allow to simmer until noodles are cooked. You may need to add water to keep soup soupy after pasta has cooked. Use your own judgment. ; name: chicken noodle soup ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, carrot, onion, garlic cloves, bay leaf, water, egg noodles, monterey jack cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken, onions, garlic and bay leaf in broth or water until chicken can be pulled away from the bones. I prefer broth for a richer taste. Remove chicken and cool until you can handle it. Add the celery and carrots to the broth. Cut cooled chicken into bite size pieces. Return chicken to the broth. Simmer until veggies are almost tender. Add pasta to the chicken and veggies. Simmer until pasta and veggies are cooked. Add salt and pepper to taste. Sprinkle cheese on top if desired and stir. ; name: chicken vegetable soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, frozen corn, celery rib, carrot, onion, cooked chicken, diced tomato, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: quick beef and broccoli ; ingredients: beef, water, soy sauce, sliced water chestnuts, broccoli floret, maggi seasoning, onion, canola oil ; preparation:Brown beef in skillet. Remove. Whisk together water, soy sauce and seasoning mix. Set aside. Saute all veggies in oil for 3 minutes. Add beef and liquid to pan. Stir frequently-cook until liquid thickens up to desired consistency. Serve over rice. ; name: beef bean chile verde ; ingredients: ground beef, red bell pepper, onion, garlic cloves, chili powder, ground cumin, cayenne pepper, green chili salsa, water, pinto beans ; preparation:Cook beef, bell pepper and onion in a large saucepan over medium heat, crumbling the meat with a wooden spoon, until the meat is browned, 8 to 10 minutes. Add garlic, chili powder, cumin and cayenne. Cook until fragrant, about 15 seconds. Stir in salsa and water. Bring to a simmer. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook, stirring occasionally, until the vegetables are tender, 10 to 15 minutes. Stir in beans and cook until heated through, about 1 minute. ; name: beef n gravy on potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, water, ground beef, garlic powder, onion powder, brown gravy mix, milk, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes and water in a microwave-safe dish. Cover and microwave on high for 8-10 minutes or until tender. Meanwhile, in a large skillet, cook beef over medium heat until no longer pink. Drain. Stir in garlic powder and onion powder. Prepare gravy according to package directions. Place the potatoes in a mixing bowl. Add milk, butter, salt and pepper. Beat on medium speed until smooth. Serve beef and gravy over mashed potatoes. ; name: beef and bean burritos ; ingredients: beef round steak, garlic, pinto beans, diced green chilies, cilantro, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Fold bottom up, fold sides over. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: beef and black bean sauce ; ingredients: oil, onion, round steaks, green beans, mushrooms, black bean garlic sauce, beef stock, bean sprouts, hokkien noodles ; preparation:Heat oil in wok or large frying pan. Stir-fry onion until tender. Add steak and stir-fry 3-4 minute. Stir in beans and mushrooms, stir-fry 2 minutes. Add black bean sauce and stock, stirring. When sauce boils add sprouts. Serve immediately with cooked noodles or rice. ; name: crisp beef ; ingredients: lean beef chuck, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, dark brown sugar, molasses, lime juice, ground coriander, water, peanut oil ; preparation:Cut the meat in thin slices along the grain, not across it. Pound the slices until they almost fall apart. Put the meat and all the other ingredients except the oil in a heavy saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat, then reduce the heat to medium low and cook, stirring now and then, until the liquid has evaporated. Remove the meat and tear it into fine strips using two forks. Scrape the bottom of the pan to gather the residue, add the oil and set it over medium heat. When the oil is hot add the meat shreds and fry, stirring, until they are crisp and dark brown. Drain on paper towels before serving. ; name: no beans no tomato chili ; ingredients: ground beef, water, chili seasoning mix, pepper, accent seasoning, chili powder, garlic powder, cumin, onion powder, salt ; preparation:In the 3 cups of water, simmer the meat for 30 minutes. Crumble the meat up as you add it to the water. There should not be any large pieces. After 30 minutes add the remaining ingredients. Simmer for 2 hours, stirring occasionally. Serve this up with some cheese and extra onions if you want. ; name: beef with snow peas ; ingredients: soy sauce, rice wine, brown sugar, cornstarch, vegetable oil, fresh gingerroot, garlic, beef round steak, snow peas ; preparation:

name: curried beef and onions ; ingredients: flank steaks, oil, salt and pepper, ginger, garlic, onions, curry powder, coriander, diced tomatoes, plain yogurt ; preparation:Slice steak on diagonal. Heat oil in skillet or wok, add garlic, ginger, steak, salt& pepper, cook 3 minutes. Add curry coriander and onion, saute 3 minutes. Add tomatoes, simmer until liquid evaporates. Remove from heat. Add yogurt. Adjust seasonings to taste. ; name: laurie s potato curry ; ingredients: onions, curry paste, potatoes, fish sauce, coconut milk, chicken, brown sugar ; preparation:Saute onions in oil until soft. Add curry paste. Peel and cut potatoes. Put onions and potatoes in crock pot with fish sauce, coconut milk and meat. Add brown sugar, stir and cook on low for 5 hours. Serve over rice with a dollop of sour cream. ; name: summer delight curry chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken, scallion, currants, slivered almonds, mayonnaise, curry powder, major grey chutney, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine mayo, curry powder, and chutney. Stir until smooth. Mix dressing with chicken, scallions, currents and almonds. Season to taste. Chill for 1 hour. Serve cold over a bed of lettuce. ; name: curried chicken rice salad ; ingredients: raw rice, cooked chicken, canned pineapple, celery, green pepper, mayonnaise, peach preserves, curry powder, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Combine cool rice, chicken, pineapple, celery and green pepper in biggish bowl. Combine peach preserves, mayonnaise and curry powder. Stir into the chicken mixture. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Chill for at least 2-3 hours. Serve topped with grated cheese, or not --. ; name: crock pot curried chicken rice ; ingredients: curry powder, green onion, garlic cloves, fresh ginger, olive oil, cayenne pepper, chicken, minute rice, chicken broth ; preparation:Combine curry, onion, ginger, oil and cayenne in a medium mixing bowl. Stir in meat, working spice mixture into meat with fingers. Place in ziploc and refrigerate 1 24 hours. Brown meat mixture and place in crock pot. Add rice and broth to crock pot and mix well. Cook on low 3-4 hours or until chicken is cooked through and all liquid is absorbed. ; name: simple curry sauce ; ingredients: butter, flour, curry powder, salt, chicken stock, egg yolk, heavy cream ; preparation:Melt butter. Blend in flour, curry powder, and salt. Slowly add hot stock and bring to boiling. Boil 2 minutes. Remove from heat. Add egg yolk lightly beaten with cream. ; name: curried turkey strips ; ingredients: turkey breast, flour, curry powder, turmeric, chili powder, salt, black pepper, egg, olive oil ; preparation:Slice turkey breast into strips. In a medium bowl combine all dry ingredients. In a separate bowl beat egg. Using one hand for the wet and the other for the dry, dredge the turkey in the egg followed by the flour mixture. Repeat until all strips are coated. Drizzle about a tablespoon of olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Place turkey strips in skillet, cook for 3-4 minutes. Flip strips, cook an additional 3-4 minutes until cooked through, taking care to not overcook or the turkey will become incredibly dry. ; name: kerrieschotel meat and rice dish flavored with curry ; ingredients: onions, butter, curry powder, chicken broth, aroma seasoning, cooked chicken, long grain rice, corn flake crumbs ; preparation:

name: meat lovers pizza casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, pizza sauce, elbow macaroni, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni slices, salt ; preparation:In a large skillet cook the beef and onion over medium heat until meat is no longer pink. Drain. Stir in remaining ingredients. Transfer to a greased 2 quart baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350 for 40-45 minutes or until heated through. ; name: casserole italiano ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, oregano, salt, black pepper, tomato soup, cooked elbow macaroni, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Brown ground beef with onions and seasonings. Drain fat. Combine beef mixture, soup, and cooked noodles in a 1. 5 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle cheese over top of casserole. Bake 30 minutes at 350 degrees. ; name: macaroni and beef casserole ; ingredients: macaroni & cheese dinner mix, lean ground beef, italian-style stewed tomatoes, dried oregano leaves, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Prepare macaroni dinner as directed on package, omitting the butter. Meanwhile, brown meat in a large nonstick skillet at medium-high heat. Then drain. Add tomatoes and oregano. Mix well. Bring to a boil. Add meat mixture to the prepared macaroni dinner. Spoon into 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and the casserole is heated through. ; name: macaroni pizza ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, salt, pepper, tomato soup, macaroni, milk, egg, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Boil macaroni as per package directions. Drain and set aside. Brown together meat, onion, and seasoning. Stir in soup and heat for 15 minutes. In separate bowl combine pasta with milk and egg. Grease a jelly roll pan and pour pasta mixture in. Spread out to fill pan. Gently spread beef mixture on top to cover. Sprinkle with the cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 20 minutes. Cool 5 minutes before cutting into squares. ; name: layered spaghetti casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, spaghetti sauce, spaghetti, eggs, parmesan cheese, part-skim ricotta cheese, fresh parsley, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Cook ground beef in 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat, stirring occasionally, until brown. Drain. Stir in spaghetti sauce. Remove from heat. Mix spaghetti, eggs and parmesan cheese. Spread in ungreased rectangler baking dish, 13x9x2-inches. Mix ricotta cheese and parsley. Spread evenly over spaghetti mixture. Pour sauce mixture over ricotta cheese mixture. Sprinkle with mozzarella cheese. Bake uncovered about 20 minutes or until mixture is hot and cheese is melted. ; name: yummy chili casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, celery, chili, diced tomatoes with juice, taco sauce, corn, egg noodles, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large skillet over medium high heat, saute the beef and onion for 5 to 10 minutes, or until meat is browned and onion is tender. Drain fat. Add the celery, chili, tomatoes, taco sauce and corn. Heat thoroughly, reduce heat to low and allow to simmer. Meanwhile, prepare the noodles according to package directions. When cooked, place them in a 9x13 inch baking dish. Pour the meat mixture over the noodles, stirring well. Top with the cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f for 25 minutes, or until cheese is completely melted and bubbly. ; name: elegant tomato beef casserole ; ingredients: wide egg noodles, butter, onion, green pepper, lean ground sirloin, cream cheese, sour cream, cottage cheese, tomato sauce, tomato paste ; preparation:Cook egg noodles according to package directions, drain. Saute onion and green pepper in butter, set aside. Brown ground beef, drain if nesessary. Add onion and green pepper mix to beef, set aside. Cream together cream cheese and sour cream, add cottage cheese, mix well. Mix cheese mix into noodles, mix well. Mix tomato sauce and tomato paste, set aside. Butter a 4-quart casserole. Pour noodle mix into casserole. Spread beef mix over noodles. Spread tomato mix over beef mix. Bake at 350 degree for 1 hour. ; name: pepperoni casserole ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, spaghetti sauce, tomato sauce, elbow macaroni, pepperoni slices, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: rigatoni with chicken ragout ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, chicken breasts, mixed herbs, heavy cream, onion, parmesan cheese, white wine, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:In a saucepan with the butter, fry the onion. Add the chicken breasts, salt, pepper and brown. Pour the white wine, let evaporate and pour the cream, then continue cooking for 5 minutes. Add chopped herbs and mix. Cook the rigatoroni in salted water acording to package directions. When al dente drain and mix with the sauce and parmesan cheese. ; name: easy creamy parmesan rigatoni rigatoni alla panna ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, whipping cream, butter, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook the pasta in a large pot of boiling salted water until al dente. Drain and return to the pot add in the butter, toss to combine. Meanwhile warm the cream in a small saucepan over low heat. Then add to the cooked pasta along with the grated cheese. Toss to combine. Season with salt and pepper.
