Place the salmon on a broiler pan and baste with the sauce. Let sit for 15 minutes. Broil them until cooked through, about 8 minutes, basting again with the glaze. Remove the salmon from the heat and baste once more with the glaze before serving. ; name: chicken green curry with basil ; ingredients: coconut milk, green curry paste, chicken stock, fish sauce, brown sugar, fresh basil, bamboo shoot, chicken, snow peas ; preparation:Bring 4 ounces of coconut milk to a boil with the curry paste, sugar, stock and fish sauce. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add the remaining cocnut milk, basil, bamboo, and chicken and simmer another 10 minutes. Just before serving, stir in the snow peas. Serve over rice. This recipe also works well with fish or shrimp. ; name: thai green curry shrimp soup ; ingredients: large shrimp, green curry paste, straw mushrooms, carrot, green beans, chinese cabbage, tamarind paste, brown sugar, fish sauce ; preparation:In a large saucepan, simmer shrimp in enough water to cover, until cooked or orange-pink in color, about 1-2 minutes. Cool shrimp in the stock and then peel. Reserve 4 cups of the stock. Set aside. Heat the reserved 4 cups of stock in a saucepan over high heat. Stir in the green curry paste. Add the mushrooms, carrot, green beans, and cabbage. Bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer until vegetables are just tender. Stir in tamarind paste, sugar, and fish sauce. Place some shrimp in a bowl and ladle in the soup. ; name: salmon rice bake ; ingredients: water, carrots, onion, chicken bouillon powder, broccoli floret, instant rice, condensed cream of mushroom soup, canned pink salmon, paprika ; preparation:Combine water, carrot, onion and bouillon powder in a large saucepan. Cover and cook until onion is almost tender. Add broccoli. Cook for 4 minutes. Do not drain. Stir in rice. Cover and let stand for 5 minutes. Add soup and salmon. Stir to mix well. Turn into greased 2 qt casserole dish. Sprinkle with paprika if desired. Cover and bake at 350f for 30 minutes. ; name: thai green curry salmon ; ingredients: skinless salmon fillet, unsweetened coconut milk, green curry paste, brown sugar, fish sauce, fresh lime juice, red bell pepper, mushroom, fresh basil, jasmine rice ; preparation:

name: smoked salmon and chopped egg sandwiches ; ingredients: eggs, mayonnaise, horseradish, rye bread, radishes, mixed sprouts, scallions, smoked salmon, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a small saucepan, cover the eggs with cold water and bring to a rolling boil. Cover, remove from the heat and let stand for 8 minutes. Drain the eggs and cool under running water, shaking the pan to crack the shells. Drain again and pat dry, then peel and coarsely chop. Meanwhile, in a small bowl, mix the mayonnaise and horseradish and spread on the bread. Arrange the radishes on 4 of the slices and top with the sprouts, scallions and salmon. Spoon the eggs on top, season with salt and pepper and close the sandwiches. Press gently, cut the sandwiches in half and serve. ; name: smoked salmon and cream cheese open sandwich for one ; ingredients: cream cheese, lemon juice, dill, capers, bagels, smoked salmon, red onion ; preparation:In a food processor, add cream cheese, lemon juice, dill and capers. Combine for a few minutes. Toast chosen bread. Once the bread has been toasted spread cream cheese mix thickly onto both pieces of bread. Top with the smoked salmon and red onions. ; name: norwegian scrambled eggs with smoked salmon and potatoes ; ingredients: eggs, potatoes, onion, white pepper, butter, smoked salmon, fresh dill, milk, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place 1 tbsp butter into skillet to melt. Add potatoes and pepper. After 5 minutes, add onion. Brown potatoes. Onion should be limp, but not browned. In separate bowl, beat eggs, then add milk, salmon and dill. Add 2 tbsp butter to skillet to melt. Pour in egg mixture over potatoes. Scramble until almost done. Remove from heat. Eggs should still be a little moist. Sprinkle parsley on top as garnish. ; name: scrambled egg with smoked salmon ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, basil leaves, smoked salmon, salt, black pepper, butter ; preparation:Warm a pan and add the butter to coat it. Mix the egg and milk and pour into pan. Cooking on a warm to medium heat gently stir the eggs until almost ready for serving. When the mixture is still a little runny add the salmon and chopped basil. Cook for another minute so the salmon just starts to change colour. Serve on freshly toasted bread. Spinkle a little extra basil over. If you have any left also garnish with a twist of salmon. Eat at once. ; name: naked grilled salmon ; ingredients: salmon fillet, olive oil, garlic cloves, cracked black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:Rinse fillet and pat dry. Start grill. Heat to medium high to high. Rub with olive oil. If salmon is skinned, rub both sides. Rub one side with garlic, sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill for approximately 10 minutes, turning once, or until fish flakes. ; name: scrambled eggs with herbs and smoked salmon ; ingredients: eggs, cream, salt, cracked black pepper, butter, herbs, bagels, smoked salmon ; preparation:Whisk eggs, cream and salt and pepper in a bowl. Melt butter in a non-stick frying pan over medium high heat until foaming. Add egg mixture, sprinkle with herbs and cook for 3 minutes. Gently draw in edges with a fork to allow uncooked egg to run underneath and cook until eggs are just set. Remove from pan and keep warm. Meanwhile, place bagels in a toaster or oven grill and toast until golden brown. Spoon eggs onto bagels and top with flaked salmon. ; name: creamed salmon on toast ; ingredients: flour, margarine, milk, salmon, frozen peas, salt and pepper, bread ; preparation:1 thaw frozen peas in a collendar. 2 melt the margarine in a saucepan. 3 add the flour and blend. 4 add the milk, stirring constantly to prevent clumping and stir until creamy. 5 add the salmon, peas, salt and pepper and warm through. 6 as the salmon is warming, toast the bread. 7 after toasted, spoon salmon mixture over the toast. ; name: open face salmon and egg scandinavian sandwich ; ingredients: smoked salmon, eggs, salt, black pepper, fresh dill sprigs, butter, miniature party rye rounds ; preparation:

name: dreamsicle bars ; ingredients: instant tang orange drink, sugar, vanilla chips, all-purpose flour, baking soda, baking powder, butter, eggs, vanilla, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, cream the butter, eggs, vanilla, and water. Add the remaining dry ingredients and stir until the mixture is well blended. Spread batter into a lightly greased 9x12 pan. Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. Cool in pan. Cut into 2-inch squares. ; name: temptation bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, sweetened flaked coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips, sweetened condensed milk, unsalted peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spread melted butter evenly in bottom of 9 x 13 inch pan. Evenly layer crumbs, then coconut and finally chips. Pour condensed milk over all. Sprinkle with peanuts. Bake for 25 minutes or until edges are light brown. Cool on wire rack. Chill until set and cut into bars. ; name: cherry magic cookie bars ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, butter, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, maraschino cherries, flaked coconut ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In small bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and butter. Mix well. Press crumb mixture firmly on bottom of 13x9-inch baking pan. Pour eagle brand evenly over crumb mixture. Layer evenly with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly with fork. Bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool. Chill if desired. Cut into bars or diamonds. Store covered at room temperature. ; name: double delicious cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In 13x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars. ; name: coconut chocolate bars ; ingredients: graham crackers, sweetened condensed milk, flaked coconut, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat over to 350f grease 9-inch square baking pan. Combine all ingredients. Stir until well blended. Press mixture into pan. Bake for 30 minutes until set. Let cool before cutting into pieces. ; name: chocolate dream cookies ; ingredients: unsalted saltine crackers, unsalted butter, light brown sugar, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Place crackers in a single layer on a cookie sheet that has sides. Melt butter and sugar over medium to medium-high heat. Boil together for 3 minutes. Pour over the crackers to cover. Bake at 400f for 7 minutes. Remove from oven and immediately spread the chocolate chips on the top. Cool, then freeze for 2 hours or until hard. Break into pieces like peanut brittle. Store in a covered container in the refrigerator. ; name: butterscotch cashew bars ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, butter, butterscotch chips, sweetened condensed milk, salted cashew halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a medium bowl, combine graham cracker crumbs and sugar. Stir in melted butter. Press mixture firmly into bottom of a 13 x 9 pan. In a small bowl, combine 1 cup morsels with condensed milk. Microwave on high in 30 second intervals, stirring after each, until melted and smooth. Pour mixture over crumbs. Sprinkle remaining morsels and cashews on top. Bake 20 to 22 minutes, til lightly browned. Let them cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: omg raspberry dream bars ; ingredients: graham cracker crumbs, sugar, butter, sweetened condensed milk, seedless raspberry jam, flaked coconut, cashews, white chocolate chips ; preparation:

name: double delicious cookie bars ; ingredients: butter, graham cracker crumbs, sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In 13x9-inch baking pan, melt butter in oven. Sprinkle crumbs evenly over butter. Pour milk evenly over crumbs. Top with remaining ingredients. Press down firmly. Bake 25-30 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool completely, chill if desired, and cut into bars. ; name: chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cornstarch, salt, baking soda, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f degrees. In a large bowl, cream margarine and brown sugar together. Beat in eggs one at a time. Add vanilla. Sift dry ingredients together. Add to wet mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Do not overmix. Drop onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes. ; name: cracker cookies ; ingredients: dates, nuts, eagle brand condensed milk, cracker, butter, vanilla, powdered sugar, milk ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients together. Put in double boiler, cook till thick. Cool. Spread on townhouse crackers. Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 300 degrees for 10 minutes. Cool, then ice. ; name: soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, margarine, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. In large bowl, beat sugar, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. ; name: graham cracker cookies ; ingredients: graham crackers, oleo, brown sugar, nuts ; preparation:Lay graham crackers in a single layer on a cookie sheet. Boil oleo and brown sugar 4 minutes. Pour over graham crackers. Sprinkle top with nuts. Bake at 350 for 6-8 minutes. ; name: whole wheat graham cracker cookies ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, butter, honey ; preparation:Mix together flour, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda. In a seperate bowl combine honey and butter then pour into dry ingredients. Mix well then drop onto a greased baking sheet. Press out the mixture to the corners of the baking sheet. Bake at 400 for 10 minutes. Cut them quickly when they come out or use cookie cutter for fun shapes. ; name: goody cookies ; ingredients: graham crackers, butter, brown sugar, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Line a jelly roll pan with foil. Arrange graham crackers in the pan in a single layer to cover pan. Combine butter and sugar in a heavy medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Boil for 2 minutes until the consistency of carmel. Stir in vanilla and chopped nuts. Drizzle the hot mixture over crackers and spread evenly. Bake 10 minutes at 300. Remove at once from pan to flat surface to cool. When cool, break into smaller pieces. ; name: twix bar cookies ; ingredients: club crackers, margarine, milk, sugar, brown sugar, graham cracker, chocolate chips, crunchy peanut butter ; preparation:

name: savory slow cooker beef roast ; ingredients: boneless beef roast, onion, vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic cloves, pepper, thyme ; preparation:Place beef in slowcooker. Add sliced onions. Mix together the vegetable juice, brown gravy mix, garlic, pepper and thyme. Pour liquid mix over beef in slowcooker. Cover with the lid and cook on low for about 7-8 hours or until desired doneness. ; name: slow cooker pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, dry onion soup mix, water, red wine, garlic, soy sauce, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place pork tenderloin in a slow cooker with the contents of the soup packet. Pour water, wine, and soy sauce over the top, turning the pork to coat. Carefully spread garlic over the pork, leaving as much on top of the roast during cooking as possible. Sprinkle with pepper, cover, and cook on low setting for 4 hours. Serve with cooking liquid on the side as au jus. ; name: slow cooker german style pork roast ; ingredients: white potatoes, garlic, salt and pepper, boneless pork loin roast, sauerkraut, caraway seeds ; preparation:Place the potatoes, garlic, salt and pepper in a slow cooker. Stir to coat. Season the pork roast with salt and pepper. Lay atop the potatoes. Pour the sauerkraut over the roast, sprinkle with caraway seeds. Cook in slow cooker on low 8-10 hours. ; name: sunday pot roast ; ingredients: chuck roast, dry onion soup mix, condensed cream of mushroom soup, condensed cream of celery soup, worcestershire sauce, potato, carrot, mushrooms ; preparation:For slow cooker cooking put the vegetables on the bottom to infuse the flavors of the meat into the vegetables. Place the roast on the veggies. Put the worchester or 57 sauce on the roast. Open the condensed soups and add them over the top of the roast. You can use an extra can of the soup for more gravy for putting over rice or potatoes. Slow cook for 8-10 hours. Serve with yellow rice or whole grain rice and i promise it will be a feast for your family with almost no effort. It tastes much better and is much less expensive than going out to eat after church or work. ; name: new england crock pot roast ; ingredients: beef roast, red potatoes, carrots, onion, prepared horseradish, salt, black pepper, water, cornstarch ; preparation:Place potatoes, carrots, and onion into a 4-6 qt slow cooker. Place beef on top of vegetables. Mix horseradish, salt, pepper and 1 cup water. Pour over top of beef. Cover and cook on low for 8-10 hours or until beef and vegetables are tender. Remove 2 cups of juices from crock pot and put into small sauce pan. Mix corn starch with 2 t cold water and then add to juices. Bring to a boil while stirring constantly until thickened. Serve gravy over meat and vegetables. ; name: fruited pot roast ; ingredients: dried prune, dried apricot, ground ginger, light beer, chuck roast, oil, onion, brown sugar, cinnamon, honey ; preparation:In the crock pot, soak the dried fruits and ginger in the beer for 1 to 2 hours. Stir in brown sugar, cinnamon, and honey. Brown meat in oil over medium high heat. Place the meat on top of the fruit in the crock pot. Cook on low setting for 10 to 12 hours, or on high for 5 to 6 hours. ; name: roasted corn and red pepper chowder crock pot slow cooker ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh corn kernels, red bell pepper, green onions, chicken broth, baking potatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, evaporated milk, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:Heat olive oil in saute pan over medium heat. Add the corn, red pepper, and onions. Saute the vegetables until they are tender and lightly browned, about 7-8 minutes. Transfer sauted vegetables to slow cooker. Add the green onions, broth, potatoes, salt and pepper, and stir to combine. Cover and cook on low for 7-9 hours or on high for 4-5 hours. Thirty minutes prior to serving, add the milk and blend well. Garnish with parsley to serve. ; name: slow cooker guinness roast ; ingredients: chuck, carrot, red potatoes, frozen pearl onions, lipton beef and onion soup mix, guinness stout ; preparation:

name: spinach salad with egg vinaigrette ; ingredients: egg, fresh spinach, garlic clove, vegetable oil, cider vinegar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat egg and water to cover in small saucepan to boiling. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 10 minutes. Meanwhile, trim large stems from spinach. Rinse thoroughly and drain. Run cool water over egg, then peel. Rub salad bowl with garlic. Mash egg in bowl with fork. Add oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Beat with fork to blend. Add spinach to vinaigrette and toss to coat. ; name: spinach salad with orange vinaigrette ; ingredients: prosciutto, oranges, zest of, oranges, juice of, balsamic vinegar, honey, garlic clove, salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, spinach ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Place the prosciutto slices on a baking sheet and bake until just crisp, about 10 minutes. Let cool. Crumble the prosciutto slices into a container and store in the refrigerator. In a blender, combine the orange zest, orange juice, balsamic vinegar, honey, garlic, salt, and pepper. Blend until smooth. With the blender running, add the olive oil in a steady stream until combined. Transfer to a container and store in the refrigerator. To serve, put the spinach in a large bowl. Toss with enough of the vinaigrette to coat the spinach. Sprinkle with the crisp prosciutto crumbles, toss again, and serve. ; name: warm bean and spinach salad ; ingredients: fresh spinach, cannellini beans, italian dressing, bell peppers, garlic powder, pepper, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Remove tough stems from spinach and tear into bite-sized pieces. Place in a large bowl. Add beans and set aside. Heat dressing and bell pepper to boiling, then reduce heat. Cook uncovered, for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in garlic powder and pepper. Pour heated mixture over spinach and beans. Toss, then sprinkle with mozarella. Serve warm. ; name: strawberry melon spinach salad ; ingredients: fresh spinach leaves, fresh strawberries, cantaloupe balls, seedless raspberry jam, raspberry white wine vinegar, honey, olive oil, macadamia nuts ; preparation:In a large salad serving bowl, toss together the spinach, strawberries, and cantaloupe. In a smaller mixing bowl, mix together the jam, vinegar, honey, and oil. Drizzle dressing over salad. Toss. Sprinkle chopped nuts over the top. ; name: watermelon cantaloupe salad with mint basil vinaigrette ; ingredients: watermelon, cantaloupe, mint leaves, basil leaves, lemon, juice of, simple syrup, amaretto, basil ; preparation:Scoop 2 cups each from the watermelon and the cantaloupe using a melon baller. Carve the remainder of the watermelon out and reserve shell. Add to a blender the chopped mint, chopped basil, lemon juice, simple syrup and amaretto. Blend until smooth. Add the watermelon and cantaloupe balls to the carved out watermelon half. Add the vinaigrette to the balls and toss to combine. Garnish with the mint and basil sprigs and taste. ; name: warm spinach and basil salad ; ingredients: spinach leaves, fresh basil, olive oil, garlic, pine nuts, prosciutto, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine the spinach and basil in a large salad bowl. Heat the olive oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the garlic and pine nuts. Mix well. Saut until the pine nuts are brown. Add the prosciutto. Mix well. Cook just until heated through, stirring constantly. Pour over the spinach mixture, tossing to coat. Season with the salt and pepper. Sprinkle with the parmesan cheese. ; name: fruited spinach salad with honey mustard dressing ; ingredients: vinegar, honey, oil, poppy seed, dry mustard, fresh spinach, papayas, grapes ; preparation:In a screw top jar combine vinegar, oil, honey, poppy seed, and dry mustard cover. Shake well to mix. Combine spinach, papaya or pears, and grapes. Shake dressing again and pour over salad. Toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: cantaloupe spinach salad ; ingredients: cantaloupe, fresh spinach leaves, pistachios, raspberry vinaigrette dressing ; preparation:

name: mashed potato casserole perunasoselaatikko ; ingredients: potatoes, eggs, cream, salt, butter, fine dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Cook the potatoes. When done cooking, drain the water and mash them in the pot. Transfer them to a mixing bowl. Whip in the eggs, cream or milk, salt to taste, and 4 tablespoon butter. Beat until very fluffy. Turn into a buttered 1-quart casserole and sprinkle with the bread crumbs. Dot with remaining two tablespoons butter. Bake in a moderately hot oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until the top is nicely browned. Serve hot. ; name: something special mashed potatoes ; ingredients: idaho potatoes, whole milk, evaporated milk, salt, sugar, butter ; preparation:Peel and cut potatoes into small chunks. Boil in salted water until you cannot pick up a piece with a fork. Drain all the water from the potatoes and place all ingredients in a large mixing bowl. Beat until creamy smooth. Serve hot. ; name: amazing buttermilk garlic mashed potatoes ; ingredients: idaho potatoes, garlic cloves, salt, butter, buttermilk ; preparation:Add potatoes and garlic to a pot and cover with water. Add salt and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until fork tender. Drain and add back to the pot. Mash with the remaining ingredients. Add the buttermilk gradually in case you need less. ; name: baked sweet savory mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, salt, sweet potatoes in syrup, cream cheese, bacon, sour cream, chicken broth, pepper ; preparation:Bring potatoes, 1 teaspoon salt, and water to cover to a boil. Cook 30 minutes, or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add sweet potatoes and cream cheese. Mush until smooth with potato masher. Stir in bacon, next 3 ingredients, remaining 2 teaspoons of salt. Spoon mixture into lightly greased 11x7-inch baking dish. Bake uncovered at 350f for 20 minutes. Garnish with the rest of the bacon. ; name: irish mashed potatoes colcannon ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, onion, kale, milk, sour cream, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cook potatoes in water until tender. Drain. While potatoes are cooking. Melt butter in large skillet. Add chopped onion and cook for 5 minutes. Stir in kale and cook 5 more minutes. Remove from heat. Mash potatoes, milk, sour cream, salt and pepper with mixer. Stir in kale mixture. ; name: mashed potato spinach casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt, pepper, butter, milk, frozen spinach, cheddar cheese, dill seed, chives ; preparation:Peel, cook and mash potatoes. Add sour cream, salt, pepper. Mix in enough milk to bring it to your favorite mashed potato consistency. Add spinach. Place in casserole dish and top with grated cheddar cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 20-30 minutes. We like to serve this with corn, which usually ends up mixed in with all the rest. ; name: company mashed potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, butter, milk, salt, heavy cream, gruyere cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Peel and quarter potatoes, cover with water, bring to a boil and cook until tender, about 20 minutes. Drain and mash, add the butter and gradually add milk. Mash until smooth and stir in salt. Place mashed potatoes in a greased shallow casserole dish and cover to keep warm. Preheat oven to 450. Whip heavy cream until stiff, then fold in gruyere cheese and 3 tablespoons of the parmesan cheese. Spread cream mixture over top of potatoes and sprinkle remaining parmesan over it. Bake for 12 to 15 minutes or until top is well browned. Serve immediately. ; name: sandy s holiday mashed potato casserole ; ingredients: idaho potatoes, cream cheese, butter, sour cream, cream, eggs, salt, garlic salt ; preparation:

name: basic pancakes ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, milk, unsalted butter, egg, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder and salt, set aside. In a medium bowl, whisk together milk, butter and egg. Add dry ingredients to milk mixture, whisk until just moistened. Heat a large skillet or griddle over medium. Fold a sheet of paper towel in half and moisten with oil, carefully rub skillet with oiled paper towel. For each pancake, spoon 2 to 3 tablepoons of batter onto skillet, using the back of the spoon to spread batter into a round. Cook until surface of pancakes have some bubbles and a few have burst, 1 to 2 minutes. Flip carefully with a thin spatula and cook until browned on the underside, 1 to 2 minutes more. Serve warm, with desired toppings. ; name: corn and bacon pancakes ; ingredients: yellow cornmeal, all-purpose flour, sugar, double-acting baking powder, salt, fresh corn kernels, eggs, milk, unsalted butter, lean bacon ; preparation:In a bowl whisk together the cornmeal, the flour, the sugar, the baking powder, and the salt. In a blender pure coarse the corn. In another bowl whisk together the corn pure, the eggs, the milk, and 2 tablespoons of the melted butter, add the egg mixture to the cornmeal mixture, and stir the batter until it is just combined. Let the batter stand, covered, for 10 minutes and stir in the bacon, crumbled. Heat a griddle over moderate heat until it is hot and brush it lightly with some of the melted butter. Working in batches, pour the batter onto the griddle and cook the pancakes for 1 minute on each side, or until they are golden, transferring them as they are cooked to a heated platter and brushing the griddle with some of the additional melted butter as necessary. ; name: brown sugar oatmeal muffins ; ingredients: oatmeal, whole wheat flour, flour, baking powder, salt, eggs, dark brown sugar, milk, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 400 degrees f. Grease muffin cups or use paper liners. Mix oats, flours, baking powder and salt in a large bowl. Whisk eggs and brown sugar in another bowl. When smooth, whisk in milk, melted butter and vanilla. Pour over dry ingredients and fold in just until dry ingredients are moistened. Scoop into mufifn cups. Bake 15 to 25 minutes or until springy to the touch in the center. ; name: light and fluffy flax pancakes ; ingredients: whole wheat pastry flour, flax seed meal, baking powder, baking soda, salt, nonfat milk, sugar, egg, egg whites, butter ; preparation:Mix the dry items first. Beat the egg and egg white until nice and fluffy. Combine the eggs and melted butter to the milk and slowly stir in the flour. Let sit at least 5-6 minutes while heating the pan. These will be high, but light and fluffy. ; name: simple whole wheat muffins ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, canola oil, maple syrup, cinnamon, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Mix all dry ingredients in large bowl. Combine wet ingredients in a bowl. Mix dry and wet ingredients together. Pour into prepared muffin pans and bake at 375 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: oatmeal buttermilk muffins ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, quick-cooking oatmeal, buttermilk, flour, salt, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add egg. Add oatmeal. Add buttermilk. Then add flour. Salt baking powder and baking soda. Mix well. Bake in greased muffin tin 350 for 20 to 25 minutes. ; name: baked buttermilk pancakes ; ingredients: egg, butter, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking soda, baking powder, salt, buttermilk, powdered sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Spray an 8-inch pie plate with vegetable cooking spray. In a large bowl combine egg with melted butter. Whisk until well combined. Sift together flour, sugar, baking soda, baking powder and salt in a small bowl. Combine with egg mixture. Pour in buttermilk and stir until just combined. ; name: wheat n oat pancakes ; ingredients: quick-cooking rolled oats, skim milk, whole wheat flour, raw sugar, baking powder, salt, ground cinnamon, egg whites, canola oil, vanilla extract ; preparation:

name: balsamic chicken with baby spinach ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, baby spinach, balsamic vinegar, low sodium chicken broth, low-sodium tomatoes, whole wheat couscous ; preparation:Heat a large saute pan over medium-high heat. Add the olive oil and heat. Add the garlic and cook for 1 minute. Add the chicken and cook about 4 minutes per side, or until cooked through and juices run clear. Remove the chicken and set aside. To the same pan, add the spinach and cook just until wilted, about 1 to 2 minutes. Remove from the pan and set aside. Lower the heat to medium and add the balsamic vinegar and chicken broth to the pan and stir, scraping the bottom of the pan to remove any browned bits. Add the tomatoes, bring to a simmer and cook 3 to 5 minutes. Place the couscous in a serving bowl. Top with the spinach, chicken and balsamic-tomato sauce. ; name: baby food chicken ; ingredients: butter, unbleached flour, milk, chicken, potato, white cheddar cheese, vegetables, salt ; preparation:Grill or bake chicken, remove bones and shred. Bake or boil potato and chop into small cubes or mash. Melt butter in a saucepan. Add milk, flour, and cheese and make a sauce. Add chicken and potato to it. Add remaining ingredients. ; name: salad dressing chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, light honey dijon salad dressing, fresh rosemary, dried breadcrumbs, seasoning salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: mediterranean vegetable and chicken sandwich wrap ; ingredients: tortilla, hummus, deli chicken, baby spinach, marinated artichoke hearts, roasted sweet red peppers ; preparation:Spread hummus over the tortilla. Place the slices of chicken down the middle of the tortilla so that the ends of each slice overlap. Arrange the spinach leaves over the chicken. Top with the artichokes and red peppers. Fold over the sides of the tortilla and roll up as you would any other wrap. Cut in half and serve. ; name: bacon cheese stuffed chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, mozzarella cheese, bacon, egg, italian breadcrumbs, olive oil, ragu hearty robusto pasta sauce, chicken broth, linguine ; preparation:Evenly top each chicken breast half with cheese and bacon. Roll up and secure with wooden toothpicks. Dip chicken in egg, then bread crumbs. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil over medium heat and brown chicken, turning occasionally. Stir in ragu pasta sauce and broth. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer covered 10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink. To serve, arrange chicken and sauce over hot linguine or spaghetti. Garnish, if desired, with chopped fresh basil or parsley. ; name: chicken ranchero ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, onion, garlic, green chilies, chicken broth, green chili salsa, cheddar cheese, cooked rice ; preparation:Saute chicken over medium heat, in olive oil about 5 minutes. Add onions and continue cooking until chicken is done and onions are soft. Add garlic, green chiles and broth. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat and simmer, covered for 30 minutes. Stir in salsa. Bring to a boil. Remove from heat. Gently fold in cubed cheddar cheese. Serve immediately over beds of rice. ; name: chicken stuffed with bacon and cheese ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cheddar cheese, bacon, diced tomatoes, olive oil ; preparation:Cut a slit in each chicken breast. Stuff with cheese and crumbled bacon. Use a toothpick to secure the pocket closed. Brown stuffed chicken in olive oil in a fry pan until golden brown, then add diced tomatoes and cover, cooking until chicken is thoroughly done. Before serving, remove toothpicks. ; name: mother and child reunion ; ingredients: oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, ranch dressing, italian breadcrumbs, butter, eggs, bacon, american cheese, rolls ; preparation:

name: cheese and sour cream potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, butter, onions, salt, ground black pepper, corn flakes ; preparation:In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden. ; name: potatoes gourmet ; ingredients: potatoes, cheese, butter, sour cream, green onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes. ; name: baked potato packets ; ingredients: potatoes, butter, onion, fresh mushrooms, garlic salt, thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cut 4 pieces of tinfoil big enough to wrap everything up. Slice one potato into thin slices and place on a piece of tinfoil. Top with some sliced mushrooms and onions, to your taste. Sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt and thyme. Top with 1 tbs butter. Wrap tinfoil tightly around. Repeat with remaining potatoes. Place potato packets in oven. Bake 30-40 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: bacon potato bundles ; ingredients: baking potatoes, onions, green peppers, bacon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place the potatoes on four pieces of greased heavy duty aluminum foil. Place onion and green pepper between potatoes to quarters. Top with bacon. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Wrap in foil. Grill, covered. Over med-high heat for 40-50 minutes or until potatoes are tender, turning once. ; name: 1 potato 2 potato ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, garlic cloves, salt and black pepper, frozen potato wedges, bacon, green onions, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Spray a quiche dish with nonstick cooking spray. Mix mashed potatoes, sour cream, cheddar cheese, and garlic in a bowl. Season with salt and pepper. Stir to blend. Spread mashed potato mixture evenly into the quiche dish. Arrange the frozen potato wedges in a spoke wheel fashion on top of the mashed potatoes. For curly fries, make a random pattern, breaking in half any large fries. Sprinkle with bacon bits, green onion and parmesan cheese. Bake for 25-30 minutes. Cut into wedges and serve. ; name: potato egg bake ; ingredients: butter, onion, frozen hash browns, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, bacon ; preparation:Cook, drain and crumble bacon. Melt butter or margarine in a skillet. Add onions and hash browns. Cook and stir until potatoes are lightly browned. Grease a 9x13 inch pan and place hash browns in the bottom of the pan. Beat eggs, milk and salt and pepper 1- 2 minutes. Stir in grated cheese and bacon. Pour over potatoes. Bake at 350 degrees 45-50 minutes, until a knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: fried potato patties ; ingredients: potatoes, mozzarella cheese, egg, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, breadcrumbs, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine first 7 ingredients. Chill. Shape mixture into 6 patties. Dip each patty into lightly beaten egg then lightly coat with breadcrumbs. Heat vegetable oil and fry over medium heat until lightly browned, turning once. ; name: potato skins t g i friday s potato skins ; ingredients: baking potatoes, sour cream, fresh chives, butter, cheddar cheese, cooked bacon ; preparation:

name: virgin pomegranate sangria ; ingredients: pomegranate juice, papaya nectar, orange, strawberries, kiwi fruits, mangoes, sugar ; preparation:Mix juices and sugar until sugar dissolves. Wash orange and berries and slice into thin slices. Remove mango or papaya skin and cut fruit into chunks. Remove kiwi skin and cut into thick slices. Place all fruit into juice and let flavors meld in fridge for 2-3 hours or overnight before serving. Serve garnished with fruit slices. ; name: pomegranate banana salad ; ingredients: pomegranate seeds, banana, sugar, bell pepper, sweet onion, vinegar, olive oil, pomegranate molasses, salt ; preparation:Dice bananas, peppers and onions. Toss bananas, peppers, onions, pomegranate seeds and sugar together. In a separate bowl whisk together oil, vinegar, and pomegranate molasses. Drizzle over salad mixture and gently toss. Chill for 2 hours. ; name: pecan liqueur pralines ; ingredients: sugar, light brown sugar, salt, cream, pecans, praline liqueur ; preparation:Combine sugars, salt and milk. Cook to soft ball stage. Add pecans and liqueur. Beat until stiff. Drop quickly onto wax paper. ; name: cherry cream parfaits ; ingredients: whipping cream, sugar, salt, vanilla, sour cream, cherry pie filling, nuts ; preparation:Whip cream to soft peaks. Slowly add sugar, salt and vanilla. Beat to stiff peaks. Fold in sour cream. Spoon half the pie filling in parfait glasses. Top with the cream mix. Repeat the layers. Sprinkle with nuts. ; name: mulled pomegranate and red wine punch slow cooker ; ingredients: pomegranate juice, red wine, cinnamon sticks, cardamom pods, honey ; preparation:Stir together all ingredients in a 4 to 6 quart slow cooker. Cover. Cook until very hot, about 1 hour on high or 2 hours on low. Once hot keep warm on low heat up to 4 hours. A serving is 1 cup. ; name: chamomile pomegranate tea ; ingredients: chamomile tea bags, boiling water, pomegranate juice, splenda sugar substitute, mint sprig ; preparation:Place tea bags in a large heat-proof measuring cup or pitcher. Pour boiling water over tea bags. Steep 1 hour, or until cooled to room temperature. Remove and discard tea bags. Add pomegranate juice and splenda, stirring until it dissolves. Serve over ice. Garnish with mint sprigs. Makes 4, 1 cup servings. ; name: caramel custard pudim flan ; ingredients: soft brown sugar, sugar, eggs, milk, coffee extract ; preparation:Put a heaped teaspoon of brown sugar into 6 individual ramekins. In a large bowl, beat sugar and eggs together until yellow and frothy. Bring milk to boil, gradually add it to the egg mixture, beating constantly. Add coffee essence. Pour this mixture into ramekins, place in roasting pan. Add enough water to come half way up the sides of the ramekins. Bake in a moderate oven, 350 degrees until just set, about 45 minutes. To test, stick a skewer into the custard, if it comes out clean, the custard is done. Remove from oven and allow to cool. ; name: pomegranate tapioca ; ingredients: pomegranates, sugar, grenadine, water, tapioca, whipped cream ; preparation:

name: easy mix and match stir fry ; ingredients: italian dressing, soy sauce, garlic, boneless chicken breasts, olive oil, red bell pepper, yellow bell pepper, green onion ; preparation:In a small bowl combine italian dressing, soy sauce and minced garlic to make the sauce. In a plastic baggie add the meat of choice and 1 to 2 tbs. Of the sauce. Toss to coat and let stand 5 minutes. Heat oil in a large wok or skillet on medium -high heat. Add the meat mixture and stir fry 10 to 15 minutes or until no longer pink inside. Add the red and yellow bell pepper strips and green onions. Stir fry 4 minutes. Add remaining sauce to mixture and simmer 2 to 3 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: sauce for a stir fry ; ingredients: water, chicken bouillon cube, soya sauce, cornstarch, ginger, garlic powder ; preparation:Empty all ingredients in a mason jar and shake. If making just a veggie stirfry add sauce approximately 2 minutes before ready to serve. If adding meat or seafood, stir fry it first and then remove and set aside. When veggies are tender crisp, add sauce and meat or seafood and stir. Serve over rice. ; name: p90x beef and broccoli stir fry ; ingredients: soy sauce, red onion, garlic, top sirloin steaks, sesame oil, rice vinegar, ginger, broccoli florets ; preparation:Bring 2 quarts of water to a boil. Meanwhile, heat a small amount of soy sauce in a large saut pan, add the onions and garlic, and saut until opaque. Add beef and saut, turning often with tongs, for 7 to 10 minutes. Stir together the oil, vinegar, and ginger and add to the saut mixture. Blanch broccoli in the boiling water. Add to the meat mixture and keep warm. Prepare soba noodles according to package directions. Drain, toss with the beef and broccoli, and serve. ; name: quick asparagus stir fry ; ingredients: oil, asparagus, chicken broth, salt, pepper, soy sauce ; preparation:Heat oil in large nonstick skillet or wok. Add asparagus, saute 1 minute. Add broth. Cover. Lower heat. Cook until tender, 3 to 5 minutes. Drain. Season with salt, pepper and soy sauce. Serve immediately. ; name: stir fry chicken salad ; ingredients: oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts, vegetables, garlic cloves, broccoli floret, mixed baby greens, italian dressing, reduced sodium soy sauce ; preparation:Heat the oil in a wok over a medium heat for 1 minute. Add the chicken and stir-fry for 5 minutes or until golden. Stir in the vegetables and stir-fry for 5 minutes, or until tender-crisp. Transfer the contents of the wok to a large salad bowl, add the salad greens and mix well. Whisk together the dressing and the soy sauce in a small bowl, drizzle it over the salad-vegetable mixture and toss to combine. Serve with noodles or rice. ; name: sweet and sour stir fry ; ingredients: broccoli florets, yellow pepper, green onions, vegetable oil, pork tenderloin, stir-fry sauce, cooked rice, orange ; preparation:In a large nonstick skillet, cook broccoli, pepper, and onion in hot oil over medium high heat for 4 minutes or until tender crisp. Transfer from skillet to a medium bowl. Add pork to skillet and stir fry for 2-3 minutes or until done. Return the vegetables to skillet and add sauce. Stir to coat and heat through. Serve over rice garnished with orange sliced. ; name: veggie stir fry ; ingredients: broccoli florets, cauliflower florets, baby carrots, bamboo shoot, water chestnut, scallion, teriyaki marinade, garlic, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil, garlic, and scallions in saut pan for about 1 minute. Add broccoli, cauliflower, and carrots and saut on medium heat adding cup of water can help steam the vegetables. Cover pan for about 2 minutes. Add bamboo shoots, water chestnuts and 2 cups teriyaki marinade. Cover for 1 to 2 minutes. Then uncover and saut until done ideally 1 more minute to keep veggies crisp. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: reasonable beef stir fry ; ingredients: beef, olive oil, bell peppers, onions, seasoning, hoisin sauce, water ; preparation:

name: crunchy chicken bites ; ingredients: chicken breasts, corn flakes, paprika, salt, pepper, egg, butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees. Line a 15x10 inch pan with foil, spray with nonstick cooking spray. Cube the chicken into nugget size pieces or a little bigger. On a plate, mix the cornflakes, paprika, salt and pepper. On another plate, beat the egg until thoroughly mixed. Dip the chicken pieces into the egg, then the cornflake mixture. Place the chicken onto the pan and drizzle with the butter. Bake twenty minutes or until brown on top, turning once. Please check to make sure they are done, as different breasts are of different thicknesses. ; name: crunchy no fry chicken ; ingredients: corn flakes, garlic powder, black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, chicken broth ; preparation:Mix all the dry ingredients together. Dip chicken into broth. Coat with corn flakes. Place chicken on a baking sheet. Bake at 400f for about 25 minutes or till chicken is no longer pink. ; name: chicken with garlic bread crumbs ; ingredients: seasoned dry bread crumb, parsley, salt, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, egg, butter ; preparation:Mix bread crumbs, parsley, salt and garlic. Dip chicken strips into egg and then coat with bread crumbs. Melt butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Cook chicken for 5-6 minutes or until thoroughly cooked and no longer pink inside. Serve with your choice of sauces. ; name: crispy coated garlic chicken ; ingredients: chicken, olive oil, garlic, corn flake crumbs, garlic powder, salt, pepper, paprika ; preparation:Place chicken in a large, shallow container. Combine oil and garlic, pour over chicken, tossing to coat. Cover and marinate 8 hours or overnight. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Line a large, shallow roasting pan with foil, grease well with a thin layer of olive oil. Combine crumbs, garlic powder, salt, pepper and paprika in a shallow bowl. Dredge chicken in crumb mixture and place in prepared pan. Bake uncovered for 1 hours, or until done. ; name: mustard baked creme chicken ; ingredients: sour cream, chicken breasts, english mustard, corn flakes, fresh thyme, salt, pepper, cayenne pepper, butter ; preparation:Combine the soured cream and mustard in a small bowl. In a second bowl, mix the crumbed cornflakes, herbs and seasonings. Coat the chicken pieces with the mustard mixture. Roll the chicken in the crumb mixture. Place the chicken pieces in a single layer in a large, shallow baking dish and drizzle melted butter over each piece. Bake at 190c for one hour, or until the chicken is golden brown and juices run clear when tested with a skewer. ; name: crumb coated baked chicken ; ingredients: buttermilk, hot pepper sauce, seasoned bread crumbs, yellow cornmeal, salt, dried cilantro, chili powder, cayenne pepper, ground cumin, skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Line a 15x10 inch baking pan with foil. Coat the foil with nonstick cooking spray. Set aside. In a shallow bowl, combine buttermilk and hot pepper sauce. In another bowl, combine the bread crumbs, cornmeal and seasonings. Dip chicken in buttermilk mixture, then roll in crumb mixture. Place bone side down in prepared pan. Spritz chicken with nonstick cooking spray. Bake at 425 degrees fahrenheit for 15-20 minutes. Remove from oven. Spritz again with nonstick cooking spray. Bake 15 to 20 minutes longer or until a meat thermometer reads 170 degrees fahrenheit. ; name: baked cornflake chicken strips ; ingredients: corn flakes, all-purpose flour, seasoning salt, black pepper, poultry seasoning, eggs, water, boneless chicken breasts, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Finely crush cornflakes. Mix together cornflakes, flour, seasoning salt, pepper and poultry seasoning. Beat eggs with water. Dip chicken strips in egg mixture and then roll in cornflake mixture. Press mixture firmly onto chicken to coat well. Lay chicken strips on baking sheet lined with parchment paper. Drizzle with olive oil. Bake for 30 minutes or until chicken is tender and cooked throughly. Baking time varies depending on size of strips. Serve with your favorite dipping sauce. These can also be fried in oil for 6-8 minutes but i prefer baking to keep them healthier. ; name: honey corn flake crumb chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, honey, dijon mustard, salt, pepper, garlic powder, paprika, corn flakes ; preparation:

name: chunky rustic style home fries ; ingredients: unsalted butter, russet potatoes, salt & freshly ground black pepper, onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, chili powder, fresh chives ; preparation:Warm the butter in a 10- to 12-inch cast-iron skillet over medium-low heat. Stir in the potatoes, and when coated with a bit of butter, season them with salt and pepper and cover the skillet. Cook for 20 minutes, during which you should hear only a faint cooking sound. Uncover the potatoes and cook for 30 minutes longer, turning them at 10 minute intervals and patting them back down. When you turn them the first time, stir in the onion, bell peppers, and chili powder if desired. As the potatoes soften, pat them down more lightly, bringing as much of their surface in contact with the skillet as possible without mashing them. Cook the potatoes for about 20 minutes longer, turning them at 5-minute intervals. During the last 10 minutes, bring the heat up to medium and, if you wish, add more salt and pepper. The home fries are ready when the potato cubes are richly browned and clearly crisp with tender, melting centers. Plate them up immediately, scatter with chives if you wish, and serve. ; name: twice baked french fries ; ingredients: russet potatoes, butter, salt and pepper, garlic powder, onion powder, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Spread potatoes on lightly greased jelly roll pan and bake at 375 for 15 minutes. Drizzle melted butter over. Sprinkle liberally with salt and pepper, then add other seasonings as desired. Toss together to be sure all of potatoes are coated with butter and seasonings. Return to oven until potatoes are crisp and tender. ; name: tasty home fries ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, salt, pepper, paprika, vegetable oil ; preparation:Toss potatoes and onions with the seasonings. Heat oil in nonstick skillet. Add potatoes. Cover and cook on low heat for 15 minutes. Turn potatoes and cook another 15 minutes. ; name: potato fries with onion and chilli ; ingredients: potatoes, vegetable oil, onion, garlic, chili powder, salt, black pepper, lime ; preparation:Bring water to boil in pot and cook potatoes until they are just tender. Cool to handle and then cut each quarter into thick slices. Heat oil in large skillet and add potatoes and onion. Turn until the vegetables are pale gold. Add garlic and cook until the garlic turns golden. Add chilli powder, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring to coat the potatoes and lightly toast chilli powder. Sprinkle with lime juice before serving. ; name: oven steak fries ; ingredients: russet potatoes, extra virgin olive oil, dried thyme, dried oregano, steak seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to high. Cut potatoes and spread out on a cookie sheet. Coat potatoes with extra-virgin olive oil, dried herbs and steak seasoning or, salt and pepper. Spread potatoes to the corners of the cookie sheet. Cook potatoes in very hot oven 25 minutes. Turn potatoes once, half way in the cooking process. Serve fries hot from the oven. ; name: parmesan and garlic fries ; ingredients: russet potatoes, olive oil, garlic cloves, thyme, seasoning salt, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. In a large mixing bowl, place the cut potatoes and pour the olive oil over the top. Sprinkle on the garlic, thyme and seasoned salt. Mix well until the potatoes are evenly coated. Spread the potatoes on a baking sheet in a single layer. Do not throw away the oil that is left in the bowl. Bake 30 minutes, turning the fries over halfway through. After 30 minutes of baking, return the fries to the bowl with excess oil and sprinkle with the parmesan cheese and parsley. Toss to coat and return to baking sheet and bake for another 10 minutes. If desired, sprinkle fries again with a few shakes of parmesan and a few shakes of seasoned salt. ; name: zesty oven fries ; ingredients: baking potatoes, fresh parmesan cheese, olive oil, sea salt, garlic powder, paprika, fresh coarse ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f. Peel potatoes & cut into thick fries or wedges. Spray baking sheet with cooking spray or cover with rapid release foil. Combine salt, garlic powder, paprika, & pepper and place in large ziploc bacg. Drizzle olive oil over potatoes and coat evenly. Place potatoes in bag and shake to coat. Arrange potatoes in single layer on baking sheet. Bake 35 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: brit s cheesy onion home fries ; ingredients: russet potatoes, butter, salt, fresh ground black pepper, sharp cheddar cheese, onion, parsley ; preparation:

name: jamaican pepper shrimp ; ingredients: jumbo shrimp, lime, garlic cloves, scotch bonnet pepper, thyme, butter, salt, canola oil, scallion ; preparation:Squeeze of lime over shrimp and rinse. Heat canola oil in a large frying pan over medium heat. Add thyme and pepper, heat for 1 minute. Add garlic and shrimp, stir. Cook for 3 minutes then turn shrimp. Add butter and salt, cook for an additional 2 minute. Squeeze the other half of lime over the shrimp, remove from heat. Sprinkle with scallion to garnish. ; name: jamaican coleslaw ; ingredients: cabbage, carrot, walnuts, mayonnaise, sugar, cider vinegar, jamaican jerk spice ; preparation:Combine the cabbage, carrots, and nuts in a large bowl. Set aside. Mix togerther the remaining ingredients and spoon over the cabbage mixture. Toss well. Cover and chill before serving. ; name: balsamic baked onions and potatoes jamie oliver ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, butter, fresh rosemary, bulb of garlic, red onions, balsamic vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400 degrees f. Put the potatoes into a pan of boiling, salted water and cook for around 8 minutes, then drain and return to the pan. Chuff them up a bit by shaking the pan. Get a roasting pan, into which you can fit the potatoes in 1 layer, and heat it on the stove. When hot, pour a glug of olive oil into it and add the butter, rosemary and garlic. Add the potatoes and toss them in all the flavors. Add the onions and all the balsamic vinegar and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 5 minutes on the burner to reduce the balsamic vinegar a little. Place the pan on the top shelf and cook for around 50 minutes, until the potatoes and onions are dark, sticky and crispy - removing the pan to toss the onions and potatoes halfway through. ; name: creole ; ingredients: kielbasa, oil, onion, red bell pepper, spanish rice mix, salsa, water, pepper ; preparation:Saute onion, bell pepper and sausage in oil in a large skillet. Add remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil, stirring well. Cover and simmer until liquid is absorbed, and rice is tneder, about 10-12 minutes. Remove from heat, and let rest 5 minutes before serving. ; name: warm greens saute ; ingredients: olive oil, mixed greens, honey, balsamic vinegar, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in 10 inch skillet. Add greens. Cover and cook, stirring occasionally for 4 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in honey, vinegar, and salt. ; name: honey garlic pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, honey, lemon juice, low sodium soy sauce, garlic clove ; preparation:In lg. Skillet, coated with nonstick spray, brown chops on both sides. Cook over medium heat till juices run clear. In a bowl, combine the honey, lemon juice, soy sauce, and garlic. Remove chops and keep warm. Add honey mixture to the skillet. Cook over medium heat for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Pour over chops. ; name: chili jam ; ingredients: garlic, onions, birds eye chiles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, white sugar, peanut oil ; preparation:Heat the oil in a saucepan. Add garlic and onion and cook on a low slow heat until the onions are transparent. Add chillies to the garlic and onion mixture and cook until the chillies are soft. Again being careful not to brown or burn the garlic, onion and chilli mixture. Next, to the mixture in the saucepan, add the tamarind paste, fish sauce and the sugar. Simmer for ten minutes then turn off heat. Cool for a few minutes and then pour the mixture into a blender or food processor and blend until the mixture is the consistency of jam. Pour into sterilised jam jar and store in fridge. The chilli jam will last for a couple of weeks in the fridge. ; name: jamaican baste ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chili, ground allspice, ground cinnamon, lime, sugar ; preparation:

name: grandma s ginger snaps ; ingredients: flour, cinnamon, ginger, baking soda, salt, shortening, white sugar, egg, molasses ; preparation:Cream shortening, sugar together then egg. Add molasses, stir. Sift in dry ingredients. Roll into balls. Drop in sugar. Bake in 350 f oven for 10-12 minutes. ; name: molasses sugar cookies ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, molasses, egg, baking soda, flour, ground ginger, clove, cinnamon, salt ; preparation:Melt shortening in a 3 or 4 quart saucepan over low heat. Remove from heat and let cool. When cool, add sugar, molasses, and egg. Beat well. Sift together the flour, soda, cloves, ginger, cinnamon and salt. Add to first mixture. Mix well. Form into 1-inch balls, roll in granulated sugar and place on greased cookie sheet 2 inches apart. Bake at 375 degrees for 8 to 10 mminutes. ; name: favorite gingersnaps ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, molasses, egg, plain flour, baking soda, cinnamon, clove, ginger, salt ; preparation:Cream shortening and sugar. Add molasses and egg, beat well. Add sifted dry ingredients and mix. Roll into marble size balls and dip in sugar. Place 2 inches apart on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes. ; name: gingersnaps soft chewy ; ingredients: shortening, sugar, molasses, egg, flour, salt, baking soda, cinnamon, clove, ground ginger ; preparation:Cream shortening and sugar. Add molasses and egg. Stir in sifted, flour, salt and baking soda. Then cinnamon, cloves, and ginger. Dough will be soft and sticky. Roll, into walnut-sized balls and roll in granulated sugar. Place on greased cookie sheet and bake at 350f for 7 to 8 minutes. Cookie will flatten out while baking. ; name: gingersnap oatmeal ; ingredients: old-fashioned oatmeal, skim milk, water, molasses, ground ginger, ground cinnamon, ground cloves, vanilla extract, kosher salt ; preparation:In a small pot, heat oatmeal, skim milk, and water over medium heat. As oatmeal mixture is warming, add all the other ingredients. Stir thoroughly to combine. Let cook until most of the liquid is absorbed, and the oatmeal reaches yknow an oatmealy consistency. Serve warm. ; name: sugar coated molasses cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, molasses, eggs, flour, salt, baking soda, ground ginger, ground cloves, ground cinnamon ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the molasses and eggs. Separately, combine the dry ingredients, then slowly mix into the wet ingredients. When blended and smooth, roll the dough into small balls, about 1 inch around. Dip the tops in sugar and place on greased or non-stick baking sheets. Bake at 350f or 180c for 10-12 minutes. Cool on a wire rack, then store in a tightly covered container to keep the cookies soft. ; name: easy gingersnap cookies ; ingredients: molasses, butter, flour, ginger, baking soda, salt ; preparation:Pretheat oven to 425. Grease a baking sheet. Heat molasses in saucepan, until it boils. Put the butter into large mixing bowl, combine hot molasses. Sift together salt, baking soda and flour. Blend in ginger. Blend mixture well. Let mixture chill in refrigerator, just until cold. Take out, roll batter very thin. Cut with cookie cutter. Using the spatula, put on baking sheet. Bake for approximately 5 minutes, or until golden. ; name: a molasses ginger snaps ; ingredients: molasses, sugar, egg, crisco shortening, flour, salt, cinnamon, clove, ginger ; preparation:

name: crock pot yummy bbq pork sandwiches ; ingredients: pork shoulder, beef broth, barbecue sauce, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place pork in crock pot. Pour can of beef broth over pork. Cook for about 10 hours or until meat shreds easily. Remove meat and shred with two forks. Stir the meat with barbecue sauce in a hot skillet on the stove and serve on hamburger buns. ; name: bacon and mushroom chowder ; ingredients: bacon, chicken broth, mushrooms, potatoes, onions, cream of mushroom soup, milk ; preparation:In a soup pot, fry bacon- set aside. With bacon drippings, fry onions until clear, add mushrooms. Stir for about 5 minute add chicken stock and potatoes. Cook until potatoes are tender. Return bacon to pot. Just before serving add milk, salt and pepper, to taste, and mushroom soup. Stir well and serve. ; name: broccoli with bacon ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, bacon, walnuts, green onion ; preparation:Remove broccoli leaves, cut tough stalk ends off. Wash and cut into spears. Cook in boiling water for 6 to 8 minutes or until tender. Drain. Keep warm in serving dish. Cook 2 tb drippings in skillet. Crumble bacon and put aside. Cook walnuts, if desired, in drippings over medium-high heat, stirring constantly, 3 minutes. Add green onions, and cook for 2 minutes. Stir constantly. Spoon over broccoli. Sprinkle bacon on. ; name: tangy barbecue ham sandwiches ; ingredients: italian tomato soup, crushed pineapple, root beer, onion, brown sugar, ham, hamburger buns ; preparation:In 2-qt saucepan, combine soup, pineapple, root beer, onion, and brown sugar. Cook over medium heat, stirring often, for about 10 minutes. Add ham and toss gently to distribute. Continue cooking over medium heat for additional 5 minutes. Spoon ham onto buns or rolls and serve. ; name: broiled salmon with bacon ; ingredients: salmon fillet, salt, fresh ground pepper, bacon, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat broiler. Season salmon with salt and pepper. Place skin side down in a broiler pan or cookie sheet. Cover with bacon strips. Brush salmon and bacon with 1 t. Of the balsamic vinegar. Broil until cooked through and bacon is crisp, about 8 minutes, basting with remaining 1 t. Vinegar halfway through cooking. ; name: down south pork barbecue ; ingredients: pork roast, onions, cloves, water, barbecue sauce, onion ; preparation:Place half the sliced onion in the bottom of the crockpot. Add meat, cloves and water. Add remaining sliced onion. Cover and cook overnight or 8-10 hours on low. Remove bone and fat from meat. Discard onions, cloves and water. Shred the meat and put it back in the pot. Add chopped onion and the bbq sauce. Cook another 1-3 hours on high or 4-8 hours on low, stirring several times. Serve on large buns. If your bbq sauce has alot of sugar in it, stire more frequently to prevent burning. ; name: hot roast beef sandwiches ; ingredients: chuck roast, dry onion soup mix, beef bouillon cube, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Cook beef until tender. Pull apart into shreds, saving beef juice. Use no salt as this contains boullion. Mix all ingredients into beef mixture and reheat. Perfect in a crockput. Serve on fresh rolls. ; name: steamed clams with bacon and beer ; ingredients: bacon, onion, steamer clams, beer ; preparation:

name: legal seafoods crab dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, heavy cream, onion, prepared horseradish, old bay seasoning, white cheddar cheese, chives, canned crabmeat ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Combine cream cheese and cream, stirring until smooth. Stir in onion, horseradish, old bay, cheddar and chives. Add crabmeat with liquid and fold in gently. Place in a small baking dish, bake 8-10 minutes or until hot. ; name: another hot crab dip recipe ; ingredients: cream cheese, cheddar cheese, sour cream, worcestershire sauce, dijon mustard, backfin crab meat, green onion ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a medium bowl, beat the cream cheese, cheddar cheese, sour cream, dijon mustard and worcestershire sauce. Gently stir in the crabmeat and most of the green onions. Reserve some green onions for garnish. Spoon the mixture into a 1-quart buttered casserole dish. Bake for 20-30 minutes until top is set and mixture is hot. Garnish the top with remaining green onions. Serve dip with tortilla chips or crackers. ; name: hot faux crab dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, albacore tuna in water, mayonnaise, old bay seasoning, garlic, onion ; preparation:Mix all. Pour into a heatproof dish and top with breadcrumbs or cheese. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 15 to 20 minutes or until bubbly. Serve with crackers or thin slices of french bread. ; name: crabmeat dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, crabmeat, prepared horseradish, lemon juice ; preparation:Combine everything in a small bowl that can be put in the oven or toaster oven. Stir together until fairly smooth. Place in the oven at 350 degrees for 30 minutes until edges are brown. Let cool for 30 minutes and serve with triscuits. Best served warm. ; name: crab and shrimp dips ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce, onion, crabmeat, baby shrimp ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, using an electric mixer, beat cream cheese and mayonnaise until well blended. Add ketchup, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce and beat again until well incorporated. Add onions and mix well using a fork. Adjust tabasco sauce to taste. Divide mixture equally into 2 serving bowls. Add crab to one bowl and mix well using a fork. Add shrimp to the other bowl and mix well using a fork. Serve with potato chips or vegetable crackers. Refrigerate any unused portions. ; name: crab spread or dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, imitation crabmeat, celery, green bell pepper, garlic clove, cracker ; preparation:Microwave cream cheese on high for 30 seconds until softened. Add mayonnaise and whisk until smooth. Add crabmeat, green pepper and celery. Add pressed garlic and mix well. Cover and refrigerate 2 hours so that the flavors will blend together. Serve on crackers. ; name: habit forming shrimp dip ; ingredients: cream of shrimp soup, cream cheese, baby shrimp, garlic salt ; preparation:Mix softened cream cheese with soup. Pat excess water from thawed shrimp. Chop into small pieces. Add to cheese mixture, blend in garlic salt. Serve with veggies or crackers. ; name: hot crab and cheese dip ; ingredients: crabmeat, cream cheese, cheese, bottled hot pepper sauce, shrimp, garlic, old bay seasoning, onion powder, fresh parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: creamsicle jello shots ; ingredients: orange jell-o, boiling water, orange juice, water, triple sec, vodka ; preparation:Dissolve jello in boiling water. Stir for about 3 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and pour into shot containers. Chill for 4 hours and enjoy. If you have fresh squeezed oj that is the way to go. ; name: caribbean blue jello shots ; ingredients: jello gelatin, boiling water, cold water, light rum ; preparation:Bring water to a rolling boil, then remove from heat. Stir together boiling water and powdered gelatin in a mixing bowl. Stir constantly until gelatin is completely dissolved. Stir in cold water and alcohol. Pour mixture into, individual shot-size plastic or paper cups. To make the jello easier to consume, buy plastic cups that also have lids. Pour the mix into the cup, add the lid, then turn it upside down prior to refrigeration. Place shots on a tray in refrigerator. Chill until firm. Refrigerate until served. ; name: strawberry daiquiri jello shot ; ingredients: wild strawberry gelatin, boiling water, white rum, prepared sweet-and-sour mix ; preparation:Bring water to a rolling boil, then remove from heat. Stir together boiling water and powdered gelatin in a mixing bowl. Stir constantly until gelatin is completely dissolved. Stir in cold water and alcohol. Pour mixture into, individual shot-size plastic or paper cups. To make the jello easier to consume, buy plastic cups that also have lids. Pour the mix into the cup, add the lid, then turn it upside down prior to refrigeration. Place shots on a tray in refrigerator. Chill until firm. Refrigerate until served. ; name: jello fruit bars ; ingredients: gelatin, unflavored gelatin, boiling water, berries ; preparation:Mix first 2 ingredients in medium bowl. Add boiling water. Stir 2 minutes. Pour into a 13x9 inch pan sprayed with cooking spray. Stir in berries. Refrigerate 3 hours or until firm. Cut into bars. ; name: frozen jello pops ; ingredients: boiling water, gelatin, sugar, water ; preparation:Stir boiling water into gelatin and sugar in medium bowl at 2 minutes until completely dissolved. Stir in cold water. Pour into pops molds or plastic or paper cups. Freeze about 2 hours or until almost firm. Insert wooden spoon or stick or plastic spoon into each for handle. Freeze 8 hours or overnight until firm. Press firmly on bottom of mold to release pop. Store leftover pops in freezer. ; name: fruit cocktail dessert ; ingredients: lemon jell-o gelatin, fruit cocktail, cream cheese, dream whip ; preparation:Make lemon jello, use juice from fruit cocktail for part of liquid. Mash cream cheese and add to jello. Let set. When jello begins to set add fruit cocktail and dream whip. Pour into a shallow dish. Put in refrigerator. ; name: jelly jello slice bar ; ingredients: plain sweet biscuits, butter, sweetened condensed milk, lemons, unflavored gelatin, water, jello gelatin, boiling water, cold water ; preparation:Combine crushed biscuits and butter mixing well. Press into greased 30cm x 23cm pan and refrigerate. Combine condensed milk, lemon juice and gelatin mix. Mix well and pour over prepared base. Refrigerate 2 hours. Mix jelly powder and boiling water together, then add cold water. Refrigerate until consistency of unbeaten egg white, pour over lemon layer. Refrigerate, then cut into squares when set. I prefer a red jelly for this, but any flavour would be ok. ; name: cherry bomb jello shots ; ingredients: water, sugar-free black cherry gelatin, cherry vodka, red bull energy drink ; preparation:

name: tomato florentine ; ingredients: frozen chopped spinach, parmesan cheese, olive oil, japanese-style bread crumbs, onion, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, ground nutmeg, whole tomatoes ; preparation:Drain spinach well, pressing between paper towels. Combine parmesan cheese, 1 tablespoons olive oil, and 2 tablespoons breadcrumbs in a small bowl. Cook onion in remaining 1 tablespoons hot oil in a medium skillet over medium heat 5 minutes or until tender. Add garlic, and cook 1 more minute. Stir in spinach, and cook 2 minutes or until thoroughly heated. Remove from heat, and stir in salt, pepper, and nutmeg. Place tomatoes in a 9-inch square baking dish. Spoon spinach mixture evenly over tomatoes. Sprinkle with breadcrumb mixture. Bake at 400 for 25 minutes or until golden brown. Serve immediately. ; name: mozzarella and spinach crostini ; ingredients: french bread, garlic salt, fresh spinach, cream cheese, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Cut the french bread in half lengthwise. Place cut side up on a baking sheet and toase in a 350 degree oven until lightly browned. Sprinkle with garlic salt. Put the spinach and a small amount of water in a saucepan and cook until tender. Drain and squeeze out all moisture. Combine the spinach and the cream cheese and mix well. Spread over the cut sides of the bread. Lay mozzarella slices over the spinach. Broil until cheese melts. Slice into 1- or 2-inch pieces to serve. ; name: tomato and spinach frittata ; ingredients: baby spinach, onion, garlic cloves, chili flakes, fresh basil, cottage cheese, eggs, roma tomatoes, havarti cheese ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 375f. Lightly spray a baking dish with pam or other no oil spray. Place the cottage cheese in a strainer and drain for 5 minutes. Pack the spinach on the bottom of the dish. Add the sliced onion. Sprinkle on the adobe spice. Combine the eggs and cottage cheese in a food processor and puree until the mixture is very smooth. Pour over the spinach. Arrange the tomato slices on top. Sprinkle on the grated cheese. Bake in 375 oven until golden and the eggs are cooked apprx 25 minutes. ; name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: cheese and spinach fettuccine ; ingredients: fettuccine, frozen chopped spinach, milk, cornstarch, butter, salt, parmesan cheese, blue cheese, parsley ; preparation:Cook fettuccine as label directs. Adding spinach for the last 5 minutes of cooking. Drain. In saucepan, mix milk and cornstarch until smooth. Add butter and salt. Cook on med-hi heat, stirring, until mixture boils. Stir in parmesan and bleu cheese. Add to drained fettuccine. Toss to coat well. Sprinkle with parsley. ; name: scalloped spinach casserole ; ingredients: bacon, onion, eggs, spinach, flour, milk, salt and pepper, cracker crumb, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square, 3-inch deep baking pan or casserole. Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain off all but 1 tbls of the bacon grease. Add the onion to skillet and fry until tender but not browned, about 3 minutes. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, then add the spinach, flour and milk. Stir until well blended. Add the bacon-onion mixture and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared pan. Cover top with cracker crumbs and dot with butter. Bake until a knife inserted in center comes out clean, about 20 to 30 minutes. ; name: italian spinach saute ; ingredients: olive oil, frozen chopped spinach, garlic cloves, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add in spinach and chopped garlic. Saute stirring for about 10-12 minutes or until all the liquid from the spinach evaporates. Add in the breadcrumbs and parmesan cheese. Mix to combine and heat through. Season with salt and fresh ground pepper to taste. ; name: crepes florentine ; ingredients: crepes, frozen spinach, butter, flour, milk, salt, mozzarella cheese, onion, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: easy sugar cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit or 175 degrees celsius. Mix the flour, baking powder, and baking soda together in a bowl. Set the mixture aside. Cream the butter and sugar. Beat in the egg and vanilla extract. Once combined, slowly blend in the dry ingredients until evenly mixed. Searate dough into tablespoon-sized balls. Place onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Place on center rack and bake for 5 to 7 minutes. Let the cookies sit for 2 minutes before cooling on wire racks. ; name: cornmeal cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, pure vanilla extract, cornmeal, baking powder, salt, flour ; preparation:Mix softened butter and sugar until creamy. Add the egg and vanilla and beat well. In a separate mixing bowl, mix together the cornmeal, baking powder, salt and flour. Add to the creamed mixture. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake in a preheated 350 degree oven about 15 minutes or until lightly brown. ; name: easiest ever cookies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, butter, eagle brand condensed milk, flour, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Melt chocolate chips, butter and milk together in top of double boiler. Remove from heat and stir into same pan, flour, nuts and vanilla. Mix well. Drop by teaspoonful onto a greased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 minutes. Remove from cookie sheet onto wax paper to cool. These will still be a little soft and the wax paper will prevent sticking. ; name: softest chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, butter, brown sugar, white sugar, vanilla instant pudding mix, eggs, vanilla extract, chocolate chips, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat over to 350f. Sift together the flour and baking soda, set that aside. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, brown sugar, and white sugar. Beat in the instant pudding mix until blended. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Blend in the flour mixture. Finally, stir in the chocolate chips and nuts. Drop cookies by rounded spoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake for 10 to 12 minutes in the preheated oven. Edges should be golden brown. ; name: world s best cookies ; ingredients: margarine, vegetable oil, sugar, powdered sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, salt, baking soda, cream of tartar ; preparation:Cream the margarine, oil, sugars, eggs and vanilla. Sift flour. Mix into creamed mixture thoroughly. Chill until firm, at least one hour. Pinch off small balls and place on ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten with a fork. Bake at 350 degrees for 10-12 minute. ; name: cherry chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: italian butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, powdered sugar, walnuts, flour, vanilla ; preparation:Whip butter with mixer. Continue mixing at low speed and add 1 cup powdered sugar, walnuts, then the flour, a few tablespoons at a time. Add vanilla. Drop cookie batter, by teaspoonfull quantities, on ungreased cookie sheet. The dough is fairly stiff so just roll the batter in little balls and then press down with a glass to shape. Bake 15-20 minutes at 350. Remove from pan. Sprinkle with a little powdered sugar. ; name: gooiest butter cookies ; ingredients: butter, vanilla extract, egg, cream cheese, butter recipe cake mix, nonstick cooking spray, powdered sugar ; preparation:

name: broccoli potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, broccoli floret, low-fat sour cream, green onions, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f.
