Chill for 4 hours. ; name: tomato cucumber and green pepper chopped salad ; ingredients: fresh lemon juice, garlic clove, olive oil, romaine lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, green bell pepper, green onions, mint leaves ; preparation:Mix lemon juice and garlic in large bowl. Whisk in oil. Add remaining ingredients. Toss. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: sweet spicy cucumbers over tomatoes ; ingredients: pickling cucumbers, vidalia onions, cider vinegar, sugar, salt, mustard seeds, garlic, dried red chilies, fresh tomatoes, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: baked hoisin sauce chicken wings ; ingredients: chicken wings, honey, hoisin sauce, warm water, salt, black pepper, garlic cloves, scallion, fresh ginger ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Marinate chicken wings for 15 minutes in a mixture of honey, hoisin sauce, water, salt, pepper, garlic, scallion, and ginger. Place chicken wings on a baking pan line with alum foil and bake for 30 minutes, brushing occasionally with marinade. Turn oven to broil and broil chicken wings five more minutes. Turn wings every two minutes to avoid burning. To serve, transfer chicken wings to a serving platter and serve hot or at room temperature. ; name: make ahead marinated chicken breasts ; ingredients: buttermilk, dijon mustard, honey, fresh rosemary, dried thyme, dried sage, dried marjoram, pepper, salt, boneless chicken breasts ; preparation:Mix together buttermilk with mustard, honey and seasonings. Place chicken breasts in a freezer bag. Pour marinade over chicken breasts. Freeze. On serving day thaw chicken, discarding marinade. Grill over medium heat until chicken is tender and juices run clear. ; name: crock pot hoisin chicken ; ingredients: chicken pieces, hoisin sauce, plum sauce, soy sauce, fresh gingerroot, lime, juice of, cornstarch, salt and pepper, fresh garlic ; preparation:Mix all ingredients in a bowl. Add the chicken to the mixture. Coat well. Put all ingredients in the slow cooker. Cook for 5-6 hours, or until chicken is tender. Serve with rice. ; name: broiled chicken in spicy marinade ; ingredients: chicken breasts, red pepper flakes, fresh gingerroot, garlic, sea salt, ground cumin, ground coriander, saffron thread, plain yogurt, lime juice ; preparation:Place the red pepper flakes in a small bowl and cover with 1 tbs. Of boiling water. After 10 minutes mash the flakes with the back of a spoon. Mix this paste with the ginger, garlic, sea salt, cumin, coriander and saffron. Add it all to the yogurt and stir well, incorporating the lime juice last. Spoon about three-quarters of the marinade over the breats, moving them around until the are completely covered. Refrigerate until ready to cook. Thiscan be done 2 to 3 hours before cooking or overnight. Reserve the rest of the marinade in the refrigerator. Preheat the broiler and broil the breasts about 4 to 5 minutes on each side, until done. Serve with a dollop of the marinade with each breast as an accompaniment. ; name: marinated herbed grilled chicken ; ingredients: lemon juice, olive oil, herbs, garlic ; preparation:In a gallon sized ziploc baggie take all the above listed ingredients. And thrown in any desired chicken pieces. You can use a whole chicken or drunsticks or thighs or breasts. I used about 6-8 thighs and marinate at least 4 hours overnight is better turning every 4 hours or so. Heat a grill on one side on medium high heat making sure to place the chicken on the side of the grill that doesnt have fire underneath as the oil will cause it to flame and burn cook untill 165 degrees or juices run clear. Cooking times will vary depending on the grill you use my grill is a charcoal grill and took about 20-35 minutes depending on breast size you will need to adjust accordingly also i prefer to let my chicken set just a minute or 2 before servig i also served this with my quick and easy mederterainian rice recipe. ; name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: chicken rosemary ; ingredients: sweet white wine, dried rosemary, vegetable oil, fresh mushrooms, salt and pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:In small bowl, combine wine and rosemary. Let stand at room temperture for 2 hours. Heat oil in lg skillet. Saute mushrooms until lightly browned. Remove from skillet. Salt and pepper the chicken. Cook chicken until browned on both sides. Add a little more oil if necessary. Return mushrooms to skillet. Add wine and rosemary mixture. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. ; name: hoisin marinated chicken ; ingredients: hoisin sauce, sambal oelek, scallions, dry red wine, gingerroot, garlic, pepper, chicken breasts, chicken pieces ; preparation:

name: fresh ginger seafood sauce ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sour cream, seafood cocktail sauce, fresh ginger, sugar, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Grate fresh ginger with very fine grater. Mix all ingredients as shown. Refrigerate for an hour or so. Use your own taste to make more or less spicy as fresh ginger is very pungent. Delicious on shrimp or fried fish. ; name: fire and ice oysters with horseradish sauce ; ingredients: sour cream, prepared horseradish, fresh lemon juice, fresh chives, worcestershire sauce, tabasco sauce, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, oysters ; preparation:Prepare the sauce by whisking together all ingredients except for the oysters. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 30 minutes, or until ready to serve. Rinse and scrub the oysters with a stiff brush. To open them, on a folded kitchen towel, grip the oyster flat side up with another kitchen towel protecting your hand. Find the small opening between the shells near the hinge and pry open with an oyster knife. Try to keep the juices in the shell. Loosen the oyster from the shell by running the oyster knife carefully underneath the body. Discard the top, flatter shell, keeping the oyster in the bottom, deeper shell. Grill the oysters, shell side down, over direct high heat until the juices around the oysters boil and almost completely evaporate, 2-4 minutes. Using tongs, carefully remove the oysters from the grill. Spoon a small dollop of sauce on top of each oyster and serve with cocktail forks while oysters are hot. ; name: roasted shrimp and cocktail sauce ; ingredients: frozen shrimp, light olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, ketchup, prepared horseradish, lemon juice, tabasco sauce, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Thaw shrimp. Toss shrimp with oil, salt and pepper. Put shrimp in a single layer on a foil lined sheet pan and roast at 350f for 5-10 minutes or until shrimp just start to turn pink. Remove from pan. Mix ketchup, horseradish, worcestershire, tabasco and lemon juice together. Serve cocktail sauce chilled along with shrimp. ; name: oyster sauce beef ; ingredients: beef, egg white, oyster sauce, sherry wine, cornstarch, sugar, soy sauce, green onions, fresh ginger, oil ; preparation:Marinate beef in egg white, oyster sauce, sherry, cornstarch, soy sauce and sugar for 1 hour. Heat oil in frying pan until hot. Stir-fry green onions and ginger 1 minute. Add beef. Stir-fry 4 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: quick marinara sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic, crushed red pepper flakes, whole tomatoes, crushed tomatoes, fresh oregano, flat leaf parsley, fresh basil, salt and black pepper ; preparation:Heat deep skillet over medium-low to medium heat. Add oil and garlic and crushed pepper flakes. Let garlic begin to sizzle in oil. Add tomatoes and crushed tomatoes. Stir in herbs and spices and let sauce come to a boil. Reduce heat and let sauce simmer 10 minutes or until ready to serve. Serve over your favorite pasta. ; name: healthy marinara sauce ; ingredients: italian plum tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, tomato paste, oregano, salt, pepper, fresh parsley, cooking wine ; preparation:Puree tomatoes and tomato paste in a blender or food processor. In a medium saucepan, heat oil briefly, and add garlic. Saute 15 seconds, being careful not to let it brown. Add pureed tomatoes, oregano, salt, pepper, and wine. Bring sauce to a boil, reduce heat, and simmer for 20 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in parsley. Makes 13 servings. ; name: thai chilli swordfish ; ingredients: swordfish steaks, olive oil, of fresh mint, fresh coriander, chili sauce, nam pla, fresh ginger, sea salt ; preparation:Sprinkle a little sea salt over the fish. Heat the oil in a very hot skillet. Cook the fish in the skillet for about 4 minutes each side, or until cooked to your liking. Meanwhile, put remaining ingredients in a screw-top jar and shake vigorously. Serve the fish with a little of the sauce drizzled over. ; name: simply seafood sauce ; ingredients: chili sauce, horseradish sauce, fresh lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, salt, pepper, hot sauce ; preparation:

name: nam jim satay thai peanut sauce ; ingredients: roasted unsalted peanuts, garlic cloves, onion, red curry paste, fish sauce, coconut milk, lime juice, palm sugar, chicken stock ; preparation:If you wish use peanut butter rather than fresh peanuts. First grind or crush the peanuts to a fairly fine powder. Then combine them with the remaining ingredients, to form a smooth sauce. If the sauce is too thick, you can thin it with a little chicken stock. Now add the lime juice, tasting as you progress to check the balance of flavors is correct. If you are doing shrimp satay then use half the quantity of massaman paste. ; name: japanese style sesame chicken ; ingredients: chicken breast, sesame oil, ground ginger, onion powder, garlic powder, sesame seeds, soy sauce ; preparation:Use the sesame oil to coat a wok or nonstick pan. Add chicken and cook over low heat until almost cooked through. Mix the ginger, onion powder, garlic powder, and sesame seeds in a small bowl. Sprinkle over chicken and saute over medium-high heat. Turn heat to high and add soy sauce, sauting until fully incorporated and the chicken is slightly seared. Serve immediately. ; name: spicy peanut dipping sauce ; ingredients: smooth peanut butter, garlic, tamari, water, rice vinegar, chili paste, sugar, fresh cilantro leaves ; preparation:Combine peanut butter, garlic, tamari, water, vinegar, chili paste, and sugar in small bowl or food processor until well blended. Taste and adjust seasonings accordingly. Add more water to thin the sauce if necessary. Use immediately or cover and refrigerate until ready to use. Stir in cilantro just before serving. Stored properly, this sauce keeps for 4 to 5 days. ; name: ayam bali balinese chicken ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, hot red chili pepper, cashew nuts, lemon juice, soy sauce, palm sugar, fresh ginger, peanut oil, boneless skinless chicken thighs ; preparation:Combine the onion, garlic, chili peppers, cashew nuts, lemon juice, soy sauce, sugar, and ginger in an electric blender or food processor and blend until it forms a smooth paste. Heat the oil in a large skillet over high heat and saute the chicken until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Add the blended mixture and cook uncovered for 2 to 3 minutes, stirring constantly. Add the coconut milk, reduce the heat to low and simmer uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the chicken is tender and the sauce has thickened, about 10 to 15 minutes. Garnish with toasted cashews. ; name: chinese sesame limas ; ingredients: lima beans, peanut oil, salt, sugar, chicken broth, sesame oil ; preparation:Remove limas from package and let defrost a little and separate them with your fingers. Heat a skillet over high heat until hot. Add the peanut oil, swirl, heat for 30 seconds. Scatter in the beans. Stir-fry briskly for 30 seconds until the color turns icy green. Sprinkle in the salt and sugar and stir rapidly for another 30 seconds to season them evenly. Add the stock or water, even out the beans, turn heat to medium-low to maintain a strong simmer. Cover and simmer for about 5 minutes. Uncover, turn heat high and stir rapidly until the remaining liquid has evaporated. Add the sesame oil, stir to distribute evenly and pour into serving dish. ; name: vietnamese peanut sauce dipping sauce for fresh spring rolls ; ingredients: roasted peanuts, peanut oil, garlic cloves, chili paste, chicken broth, tomato paste, sugar, peanut butter, hoisin sauce ; preparation:Heat the oil and add the garlic, chili paste, and tomato paste. Fry until garlic is golden brown. Add the broth, sugar, peanut butter, and hoisin sauce, and whisk to dissolve the peanut butter. Bring to a boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 3 minutes. Garnish with the ground peanuts. ; name: kang kong stir fry ; ingredients: kangkong, sesame oil, onion, garlic, ginger, chili pepper, water, soy sauce, sesame seeds, basil leaves ; preparation:Wash, trim and dry kangkong. In a wok or skillet, heat oon sesame oil over medium-high heat. Add chopped onion, chopped garlic cloves and a peeled and minced ginger. Stir-fry for a minute or so until the onion begins to turn translucent. Add the kangkong, finely chopped bird chili pepper, water and soy sauce. Continue to stir-fry just until the kangkong wilts, about another minute. Plate with a garnish of toasted sesame seeds or ripped thai basil leaves. ; name: javanese peanut sauce ; ingredients: onion, peanut oil, cardamom, smooth peanut butter, brown sugar, soy sauce, lemon juice, liquid red pepper seasoning ; preparation:

name: weight watchers apple swirl coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, yellow cake mix, applesauce, egg beaters egg substitute ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Blend sugar and cinnamon in a small bowl, set aside. Spray 10 inch tube or bunt pan with non stick spray. Dust pan with the sugar, cinnamon mixture. Blend cake mix, applesauce and egg beaters, and pour into pan. Bake. ; name: basic cupcakes ; ingredients: eggs, vanilla, sugar, butter, flour, baking powder, salt, frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Place all ingredients in a bowl and beat together until mixture is smooth. Line muffin pan. Half fill each muffin paper with batter. Bake 18 to 20 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Frost as desired. ; name: mini doughnut cupcakes ; ingredients: sugar, ground cinnamon, yellow cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Grease and flour 24 minit muffin pan cups. Combine sugar and cinnamon in small bowl. Mix cake mix, water, oil and eggs according to package directions, stir nutmeg into batter. Fill prepared muffing cups two-thirds full. Bake about 12 minutes or until lightly browned and toothpick inserted into centers come out clean. Remove cupcakes from pans. Roll warm cupcakes in sugar mixture until completely coated. Save any remaining cinnamon-sugar mixture from this recipe to sprinkle on toast or pancakes. ; name: fall time pumpkin cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, sugar, canola oil, canned pumpkin, water, ground cinnamon, eggs, butter, whipping cream, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a standard size bundt pan, 9 x 13-inch baking pan, or two 9-inch cake pans. In a large bowl, mix together the yellow cake mix, sugar, oil, pumpkin, water, cinnamon and eggs. Beat until well blended. Transfer to the baking dish or cake pans. Bake for 45 minutes. For glaze, cook together the butter, whipping cream and brown sugar for 3 minutes, stirring. When slightly cooled, pour over cake. ; name: harvest pumpkin cake ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, splenda sugar substitute, pumpkin, baking soda, applesauce, cinnamon, pumpkin pie spice, egg whites, vanilla, fat-free whipped topping ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 375, grease a deep 8 inch pan. I find it best to use a wooden spoon instead of a mixer to mix this batter. Mix first 8 ingredients, mixture will be lumpy. Add egg whites, mixing well after each addition. Mix in vanilla, continue stiring for a minute or two, but mix should remain lumpy. Pour into greased pan, bake 25-35 minutes or until cake seems set and a warm orange brown color on top. Cake will remain soft but should hold together well. I like to serve warm with fat free whipped topping, or for truly sugar free just sprinkle some splenda on top. ; name: cherry cupcakes ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, eggs, water, vegetable oil, cherry pie filling, vanilla frosting ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare cake mix according to package directions, using the eggs, water, and oil. Spoon batter into 24 paper-lined muffin pan cups, filling two-thirds full. Remove 24 cherries from cherry pie filling and set aside. Spoon generous teaspoon of remaining cherry filling onto center of each cupcake. Bake in preheated 350 degree oven for 20-25 minutes. Cool in pans on wire racks for 10 minutes, then remove from pan and let cool completely. Frost cupcakes with vanilla frosting, and garnish each one with a reserved cherry. ; name: fat free pancake ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, milk ; preparation:Mix first four ingredients and enough milk to make a runny batter. Spray a pan with olive oil spray. Pour batter onto pan. Fry on each side at medium heat for about 45 seconds. Top with berries, honey, etc. ; name: weight watchers pumpkin cupcakes ; ingredients: spice cake mix, water, canned pumpkin, vanilla extract, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: whole wheat flat bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, water, extra virgin olive oil, flax seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices. ; name: whole wheat flatbread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, all-purpose flour, salt, warm water, vegetable oil ; preparation:Mix flours together. Mix salt into water to dissolve. Add water and oil to flour, mix well. Knead briefly on floured surface, let rest 10-15 minutes. Cut into 12 equal parts. Roll each flat, do not stack them. Cook on ungreased griddle, a few minutes on each side until golden brown. Optional - brush with melted butter or olive oil immediately after removing from griddle. ; name: 3 minute whole wheat bread ; ingredients: dry yeast, milk, whole wheat flour, unbleached flour, flax seed, salt, sugar, vinegar ; preparation:In a medium bowl dissolve the yeast in warm milk. Add the rest of the ingredients and stir well. Pour dough into a 5 x 9 loaf pan. Place into a cold oven and turn the heat to 400f. Do not let this dough rise before putting into oven and oven is cold. Bake for 10 minutes then cut a slit in the top of the dough. After 40 minutes of baking you can brush the top of the loaf with butter or an egg wash. After 60 minutes reduce the heat to 350f then bake another 50 minutes. Remove the bread from the pan and bake another 15-30 minutes. Bread is done when it sounds hollow. ; name: healthy household bread ; ingredients: plain flour, brown flour, lsa, honey, salt, oil, yeast, sunflower seeds, water ; preparation:Dissolve honey in water. Add yeast. Leave 10 - 15 minutes to bubble. Sift flours, adding husks left over from sifting into the sifted flour, and salt. Stir in the lsa and sunflower seeds. Add yeast mixture and oil. Knead until texture has developed. This takes about 4 - 5 minutes in the kenwood mixer, but would take longer if doing it by hand. Grease and flour a bread tin. Place dough into tin and leave to rise. Bake at 190 degrees c for about 30 - 32 minutes. ; name: mostly whole wheat fat free egg free raisin bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, white flour, baking soda, salt, raisins, fat-free buttermilk, molasses ; preparation:In a large bowl mix the flours, baking soda, salt and raisins. Stir in the buttermilk and molasses until well combined. Pour it into a bread pan sprayed with nonstick spray. Let sit for 1 hour. Preheat the oven to 325. Bake for 1 hour or until a tooth pick inserted in the middle comes out clean. Let it sit in the pan for about 10 minutes and then remove it from the pan to sit on a wire rack until it is cooled. ; name: whole wheat rolls ; ingredients: whole wheat bread flour, white bread flour, salt, sugar, non-fat powdered milk, yeast, vegetable oil, egg, warm water ; preparation:Combine ingredients in the order your bread maker calls for on dough cycle. Check on dough half way through needing adding a bit more flour or water as needed so dough is fairly tacky. Turn out onto greased cutting board and work with greased hands. Shape into 15 rolls and place in greased 9x13 pan making 5 rows of 3. Let rise 30-45 minutes or until doubled in size. Bake at 350 for 15-20 minutes. ; name: whole wheat beer bread ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt, brown sugar, beer, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Lightly grease a 9 x 5 inch loaf pan. In a large mixing bowl, combine all-purpose flour, whole wheat flour, baking powder, salt and brown sugar. Pour in beer, stir until a stiff batter is formed. It may be necessary to mix down with your hands. Scrape dough into prepared loaf pan. Pour melted butter over top of dough. Bake in preheated oven for 50-60 minutes, until a toothpick inserted into center of the loaf comes out clean. ; name: unleavened whole wheat bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, salt, honey, vegetable oil, egg yolk, milk ; preparation:

name: chicken rosemary ; ingredients: sweet white wine, dried rosemary, vegetable oil, fresh mushrooms, salt and pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:In small bowl, combine wine and rosemary. Let stand at room temperture for 2 hours. Heat oil in lg skillet. Saute mushrooms until lightly browned. Remove from skillet. Salt and pepper the chicken. Cook chicken until browned on both sides. Add a little more oil if necessary. Return mushrooms to skillet. Add wine and rosemary mixture. Cook and stir for 2 minutes. Cover and simmer for 10 minutes. ; name: rosemary grilled chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, lime peel, lime juice, fresh rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place each chicken breast between two pieces of wax paper and pound to an even thickness. Place in a resealable bag. Place bag in a small bowl. In a small bowl combine lime peel, lime juice, rosemary, olive oil, sugar, garlic, and salt. Seal bag, turning to coat chicken. Refrigerate for 1 to 4 hours, turning occasionally. Remove chicken from marinade. Discard marinade. Season chicken with black pepper. Grill over medium coals uncovered, turning once for 12 to 15 minutes or until tender and no longer pink. ; name: baked chicken with garlic and rosemary ; ingredients: chicken portions, olive oil, lemon, juice of, chicken stock powder, salt, pepper, lemon, garlic, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Wipe chicken with damp cloth and place in casserole dish. Mix oil, lemon juice, stock powder and seasoning together and drizzle over chicken. Add lemon slices, garlic cloves and rosemary. Roast in a preheated 200c oven for about 35 minutes. You will need to shake the pan from time to time during the cooking process to prevent sticking. ; name: baked chicken with onions garlic rosemary ; ingredients: chicken parts, salt, pepper, onions, garlic, olive oil, fresh rosemary ; preparation:Position oven rack in center of oven. Preheat to 400f degrees. Rinse chicken parts& pat dry. Season liberally with salt& pepper. In a large bowl, toss together onion rings, garlic, oil& rosemary. Spread half of the onion mixture in a shallow baking dish or roasting pan just large enough to hold the chicken pieces in a single layer. Arrange the chicken pieces on top of onion mixture, and cover with remaining onion mixture. Drizzle with an additional 2 tbsp olive oil. Bake until chicken is done, approximately 45-55 minutes. ; name: rosemary roasted chicken with potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, paprika, rosemary, garlic, black pepper, salt, chicken breast halves, small red potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Mix oil, and seasonings in a large bowl. Add chicken and potatoes. Toss to coat. Line 15x10x1-inch baking pan with foil and spray with no-stick cooking spray. Arrange chicken and potatoes in single layer in pan. Roast in oven for 30 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and potatoes are tender, turning potatoes occasionally. ; name: apricot rosemary chicken ; ingredients: dried rosemary, dried oregano, dried basil, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, fat free chicken broth, apricot preserves, honey mustard ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f line a 9x13-inch baking pan with foil, spray with olive oil. In a small bowl, mix the spices and rub over both sides of chicken breasts. Place in the prepared pan. Pour broth over chicken. Bake for 20 minute. In a small bowl, mix preserves and mustard, brush or spoon over chicken and bake an additional 10-15 minute or until done. ; name: grilled or broiled rosemary chicken ; ingredients: whole chickens, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, dijon mustard, fresh lemon juice, fresh rosemary, ground black pepper, salt ; preparation:Mix together the garlic, oil, mustard and lemon juice in a blender and porcess until smooth. Add rosemary and pepper. Brush over chicken pieces, cover, and chill 6 hours or overnight. Discard any excess marinade. Prepare grill by brushing grates lightly with oil andheating to medium heat. Grill chicken 12 minutes, flip over and cook another 20-25 minutes or until fully cooked. Or, if broiling, preheat broiler to the broil setting and place chicken on an oiled broiling pan. Broil about 7 inches from the heat source for about 25 minutes, flip over and broil another 20 minutes or until fully cooked. ; name: rosemary chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, rosemary, salt, coarse black pepper, garlic cloves ; preparation:

name: pepper jack potatoes ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, monterey jack pepper cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onion, diced pimentos, salt, fresh breadcrumb, margarine, french-fried onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In large bowl, combine all ingredients except breadcrumbs, butter and french fried onions. Mix well. Spread into ungreased 2-quart casserole dish. Toss bread crumbs with butter. Sprinkle over casserole. Bake at 350f for 30-45 minutes or until bread crumbs are golden and mixture is bubbly. Sprinkle french fried onions over casserole. Bake 5 minutes longer or until onions are golden. Will keep in a warm oven, covered. ; name: skewered grilled red potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, water, miracle whip, chicken broth, dried oregano, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:Place potatoes and water in 2 quart casserole dish, cover, and microwave on high 12-15 minutes, or until tender, stirring halfway through. Drain. Mix remaining ingredients, stir in potatoes gently. Cover, refrigerate 1 hour. Drain, reserving salad dressing mixture. Arrange potatoes on skewers. Place on grill over hot coals. Grill, covered for 4 minutes. Turn skewers, brush with reserved mixture, grill 4 minutes longer uncovered to crisp outside, covered if soft outside is preferred. ; name: fried potato patties ; ingredients: potatoes, mozzarella cheese, egg, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, black pepper, breadcrumbs, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine first 7 ingredients. Chill. Shape mixture into 6 patties. Dip each patty into lightly beaten egg then lightly coat with breadcrumbs. Heat vegetable oil and fry over medium heat until lightly browned, turning once. ; name: potatoes on the half shell ; ingredients: baking potatoes, milk, butter, egg, salt, pepper, green onion, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f degrees. Scrub the potatoes and place them in the oven until done, about 1 hour. Cut each potato in half, lengthwise. Carefully, scoop out the potato and place in a bowl. Set the potato shells aside to use later. While still hot, mash the potatoes with the milk, beaten egg, and butter. Beat until fluffy. Season with salt and pepper, to taste. Add in the onion. Spread the potato shells with butter and fill each shell with the potato mixture. Sprinkle the tops with parmesan cheese. Bake until tops are browned. ; name: potato egg pie ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, fresh pepper, milk, mashed potatoes, hardboiled egg, crisp bacon, parsley, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Over medium heat melt butter then blend in flour, salt and pepper. Slowly mix in milk, stirring continually until mixture is thick and bubbly. Remove from heat- set aside. Line bottom and sides of a greased 9 inch pie plate with half the potatoes. Into the shell layer eggs, bacon, parsley, cheese and white sauce. Cover with remaining potatoes. Brush the top of the pie with 2 tablespoons of milk. Bake for 20 minutes or until top is browned. ; name: toasted onion and garlic potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, milk, butter, onion, garlic, salt and pepper ; preparation:Leave skins on potatoes, cut into quarters. Boil till tender. While potatoes are boiling, saut garlic and onion in butter till browned. Drain potatoes and place in large bowl. Mix all ingredients with potatoes and stir, slightly mashing the potatoes. This should have a more mashed consistency than potato salad, but not mashed like mashed potatoes. ; name: peppered potatoes ; ingredients: idaho potato, garlic, black peppercorns, skim milk, salt, paprika ; preparation:Peel potatoes and thinly slice. Place potatoes in saucepan with garlic and peppercorns. Cover with water and bring to a boil. Cook 20 minutes or until potatoes are soft. Drain well, and puree in a food processor, food mill, or blender. Return potato mixture to pot, add milk and salt and heat through. Sprinkle paprika over potatoes to garnish if desired. ; name: potato crusted snapper ; ingredients: salt and pepper, low-fat buttermilk, garlic, instant potato flakes, red snapper fillets, butter, lemon wedges ; preparation:

name: asian marinated rack of lamb ; ingredients: rack of lamb, hoisin sauce, honey, dark sesame oil, dry sherry, sesame seeds, black beans, orange zest, curry powder ; preparation:Trim the rack of lamb removing fat and silver skin. Mix the marinade ingredients in a blender jar until well blended. Put the meat in a ziplock bag and pour the marinade over. Seal the bag well and place in refrigerator for 24 hours. Set out the meat and allow to stand at room temperature for 1 hour before cooking. Run the bones under cool water before roasting. Preheat oven to 425 degrees, spray and broiler pan with non-stick cooking spray and place rack meat side down. Place 1 cup of water in bottom of broiler pan, place the pan in the oven and roast uncovered for 30 minutes or until a meat thermometer registers between 145 and 150 degrees for medium-rare. Check the meat a couple of times during cooking. If the water has cooked out of pan, add additional water. To serve, carve the rack into individual chops allowing 2 chops per person. ; name: rosemary beef fillet ; ingredients: beef tenderloin, kosher salt, black pepper, garlic cloves, fresh rosemary, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Put oven rack in middle position and preheat oven to 350 degrees. Pat tenderloin dry, then coat all sides with salt, pepper and garlic. Tuck rosemary sprigs under strings on all sides of roast, leaving a few inches between each. Heat oil in a heavy skillet over high heat until hot but not smoking, then brown tenderloin on all sides about 10 minutes. Transfer pan to oven and roast until thermometer inserted diagonally 2 inches into center of meat registers 120 degrees, 25-30 minutes. Transfer beef to a cutting board and let stand 15 minutes. Temperature of meat will rise to about 130 degrees. Discard string and rosemary sprigs before slicing. ; name: asian pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, honey, molasses, garlic, fresh gingerroot, light soy sauce, sesame oil, sesame seeds, green onions ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Remove all visible fat from pork. Place in a shallow baking pan. In a small bowl, whisk together remaining ingredients except sesame seeds and onions. Brush honey mixture over pork. Sprinkle with sesame seeds. Bake uncovered for 45 minutes. To serve, slice thinly and garnish with green onions. ; name: lamb marinade ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, thyme, coriander, garlic cloves ; preparation:Mix all the ingredients above in a bowl. Add your desired cut of lamb. Cover in the fridge for at least 24 hours. Cook your lamb in your preferred way. Enjoy a nice new taste to your meat. ; name: herb roasted lamb chops ; ingredients: garlic cloves, fresh thyme leave, fresh rosemary leaf, kosher salt, extra virgin olive oil, lamb loin chops ; preparation:Mix first 4 ingredients and 1 tb olive oil in a large bowl. Add lamb. Turn to coat. Let marinate at room temperature at least 30 minutes and up to 1 hour. Preheat oven to 400f. Heat remaining 1 tb olive oil in heavy large ovenproof skillet over high heat. Add lamb. Cook until browned, about 3 minutes per side. Transfer skillet to oven and roast lamb chops to desired doneness, about 10 minutes for medium-rare. Transfer lamb to platter, cover, and let rest 5 minutes. ; name: curried pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, brown sugar, curry powder, dry mustard, hungarian paprika, salt, pepper ; preparation:Trim fat from pork. Mix sugar and spices in a small bowl. Rub pork with spice mixture. Place pork on a broiler pan coated with cooking spray. Insert a meat thermometer in the thickest part. Bake at 425 degrees for about 25-35 minutes, or until the thermometer registers 160 degrees. Let stand 5 minutes before slicing. Serve with mango chutney. ; name: turkish lamb chops ; ingredients: onion, salt, olive oil, fresh thyme leave, lamb loin chops, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon wedge ; preparation:Sprinkle the onion with the salt. Squeeze the juice out of the onion and discard it. Add the oil and thyme to the onion. Apply the mixture to both sides of the chops and marinate for 1 hour. Grill chops or broil close to heat source. Season with salt and lots of pepper. Garnish with lemon wedges. ; name: motanjen khoreshe ; ingredients: lean lamb fillets, onion, salt, pepper, oil, beef broth, split peas, almonds, dried apricot, prune ; preparation:

name: green beans with herbs ; ingredients: green beans, water, butter, onion, celery, garlic, rosemary, basil ; preparation:Place beans and water in sauce pan and bring to a boil. Cook for 6-8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain and return to pan. Add remaining ingredients to pan. Cover and cook for 4-6 minutes or until vegetables are tender. ; name: green beans with garlic sauce ; ingredients: oil, green beans, soy sauce, garlic, honey, ginger ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: greens and beans ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, dried oregano, fresh parsley, escarole, white beans, chicken broth ; preparation:Heat oil in saucepan. Stir in garlic and seasoning and saute for 3 minutes. Stir in greens. Cover and cook until wilted. Remove cover and stir in beans. Cook for 3 minutes. Add chicken broth for juice and most importantly, flavor. ; name: green beans with garlic butter ; ingredients: green beans, butter, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Cook beans according to package directions. In a separate bowl, combine butter, garlic and pepper. Drain beans. Place in serving bowl. Add butter mixture. Toss to coat evenly. Serve immediately. ; name: orange glazed green beans ; ingredients: water, garlic, fresh green beans, orange marmalade, dried rosemary, orange zest, salt, butter ; preparation:Trim beans and break into 1 inch lengths, wash. In medium saucepan bring water and garlic to a boil. Add green beans, reduce heat to low, cover and simmer for 10 to 15 minutes or until beans are crisp tender. If any water remains at end of cooking, drain and return beans to pan. Turn up heat to medium add remaining ingredients and heat to boiling, stirring occasionally. Serve immediately. ; name: basil green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, spring onion, margarine, dried basil leaves, garlic powder, pepper ; preparation:Trim and snap green beans into thirds. Mince the onion. Put water on to boil to steam beans. As soon as water boils, steam beans for 12 to 17 minutes or until tender. Melt margarine for beans and saut onions until tender. Add steamed beans, basil, garlic powder and pepper. Toss beans with basil sauce to coat evenly and serve. ; name: asian green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, soy sauce, vegetable oil, vinegar, sesame oil, garlic clove ; preparation:Wash the beans and snap the ends off. Blanche them in boiling water for 3-4 minutes. Drain immediately and put into an ice cold water bath to retain crispness. Mix remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over cooled green beans and refrigerate for at least half an hour, then serve. The longer they marinate the more intensely the flavors will develop. ; name: garlic and rosemary green beans ; ingredients: frozen green beans, olive oil, garlic clove, dried rosemary, salt ; preparation:

name: creole okra ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, green bell pepper, tomatoes, dried thyme, fresh parsley, cayenne pepper, salt and pepper, frozen cut okra ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Saute the onion and garlic until limp. Add the green pepper. Cook and stir until tender. Drain the tomatoes, reserving juice, and pour them into the skillet. Season with thyme, parsley, cayenne, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes over medium heat. Add the frozen okra, and pour in enough of the reserved juice from the tomatoes to cover the bottom of the pan. Cover, and cook for 15 minutes, or until okra is tender. ; name: cajun okra stew ; ingredients: fresh tomatoes, lima beans, black-eyed peas, fresh okra, onion, garlic cloves, cajun seasoning, salt & pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large stew pot. Add chopped onions and garlic and saute for 2-3 minutes. Add chopped tomatoes, lima beans, blackeye peas and cajun seasoning. Bring to a boil, stir well. Reduce heat and simmer on low 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. If the stew gets too thick add water as needed. Add chopped okra, stir well. Simmer another 15 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: okra goulash ; ingredients: ground beef, whole tomatoes, water, okra, onions, worcestershire sauce, creole seasoning, pepper, cooked rice ; preparation:Cook ground beef in a large dutch oven until the meat is browned, stirring to crumble the meat. Drain well. Add the tomatoes and the next 6 ingredients. Stir well. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer, uncovered, 3 hours or until thickened. Serve over rice, if desired. ; name: baked okra etouffe ; ingredients: okra, olive oil, tomatoes, onion, green pepper, salt, pepper, cayenne, cracker crumbs ; preparation:Spread okra in a greased casserole. Sprinkle a little of the olive oil on and mix with okra. Cover okra with tomatoes, onion, green pepper and seasonings. Cover loosely with foil. Bake at 400f for 1 hour, or until tender, stirring occasionally. Uncover. Top with crumbs and brown lightly. ; name: okra in lemon butter ; ingredients: okra pods, butter, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Wash okra weell. Trim stem end, leaving enough on the pod to keep the juice inches. Cover with boiling water and boil gently until tender, approximately 15 minutes. When half done add a little salt. To serve, drain very well, pour into a hot dish and add melted butter and lemon juice. ; name: tanzanian vegetable rice ; ingredients: basmati rice, vegetable oil, onion, garlic cloves, vegetable stock, sweet corn, red bell peppers, carrot ; preparation:Wash the rice in a sieve under cold water, then leave to drain about 15 minutes. Heat the oil in a large saucepan and fry the onion for a few minutes over a moderate heat until soft. Add the rice and stir-fry for about 10 minutes, taking care to keep stirring all the time so that the rice doesnt stick to the pan. Add the garlic and the stock or water and stir well. Bring to the boil and cook over a high heat for 5 minutes, then reduce the heat, cover and cook the rice for 20 minutes. Scatter the corn over the rice, then spread the pepper on top and lastly sprinkle over the grated carrot. Cover tightly and steam over a low heat until the rice is cooked, then mix together with a fork and serve immediately. ; name: cameroon suya ; ingredients: round steaks, sugar, garlic powder, ground ginger, paprika, ground cinnamon, chili powder, onion salt, peanuts, vegetable oil ; preparation:Trim the steak of any fat and then cut into thin strips. Place in a bowl or shallow dish. Mix the sugar, garlic powder, spices and onion salt together. Add the crushed peanuts, then add this mixture to the steak. Mix well so that the spices are worked into the meat. Thread the steak onto 6 satay sticks, pushing the meat close together. Place in a shallow dish, cover loosely with foil and allow to marinate in a cool place for a few hours. Preheat the grill. Brush the meat with a little vegetable oil and then cook over moderate heat for about 15 minutes or until evenly brown. ; name: bamya alich a ethiopian style okra ; ingredients: okra, olive oil, red onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, cardamom, jalapenos ; preparation:

name: potato yogurt soup ; ingredients: potatoes, plain yogurt, fresh garlic, dill seed ; preparation:First peel and slice potatoes and rinse in cold water. Place potatoes in a heavy large pan and cover with water, just to cover. Boil until soft but not mushy. Pour about half of the water off of the potatoes, but save half, the starch that boils off the potatoes helps the soup to thicken and holds more nutrients. Add yogurt and spices and simmer 5-10 minutes to let the flavors mingle, and serve. I like a little shredded cheese in mine, grew up with cheddar, but like mozzarella now. ; name: taco soup with beans ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, pinto beans, tomatoes and green chilies, tomatoes, tomato paste, ranch dressing mix, taco seasoning mix, corn ; preparation:Brown meat and onions in skillet. Drain. Add meat and remaining ingredients in slow cooker. Cover. Cook on low 4 hours or until ingredients are heated through. ; name: picnic orange apricot yogurt soup ; ingredients: plain yogurt, apricots, milk, orange juice, oranges, mint ; preparation:Combine the yogurt, apricots, milk& orange juice in a blender and blend at medium speed for 1 minute. Refrigerate until well chilled. Pour into a well chilled thermos. Carry orange slices and mint separately. Float orange& mint on the soup when serving. ; name: cool raspberry soup ; ingredients: frozen raspberries, water, white wine, cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon, whole cloves, lemon juice, raspberry yogurt ; preparation:In a blender, puree raspberries, water and wine. Pour into a large saucepan, add the cranberry-raspberry juice, sugar, cinnamon and cloves. Bring just to the boil over a medium heat. Strain into a large bowl, and let cool. Whisk in the lemon juice and yogurt, then chill several hours before serving. ; name: quick tava rice ; ingredients: cooked rice, onion, garlic, turmeric powder, chili powder, tomatoes, red capsicum, oil, curds, salt ; preparation:Heat oil in a tava and fry the onions till they turn golden brown. Add the garlic and fry for a few seconds. Next, add the chilli & turmeric powders, capsicum, tomato and curds. Fry for a few minutes. Add the cooked rice and salt. Cook for a few minutes. Serve hot. ; name: indian spiced cauliflower soup ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, onion, garlic, curry paste, cauliflower, chicken stock, natural yoghurt, cream, pappadams ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a large saucepan. Add onion and cook over low heat until soft. Add garlic and cook for a further 30 seconds. Add curry paste cook for 30 seconds. Add cauliflower and stir to coat with the curry paste. Add stock. Simmer for 15 minutes. Cool slightly before pureeing. Return to the heat and stir in the yoghurt. Serve drizzled with cream and with pappadums. ; name: chicken taco soup ; ingredients: chicken breasts, diced tomatoes with green chilies, diced tomatoes, diced green chilies, kidney beans, black beans, whole kernel corn, taco seasoning mix, ranch dressing mix, sour cream ; preparation:Shred the chicken, if desired. Do not drain the remaining cans. Combine all the ingredients into a crock-pot and stir. Cook on high for 2 hours or on low for 4 hours. Garnish as desired. ; name: tahnabour hot yogurt soup ; ingredients: wheat, yogurt, water, egg, flour, salt, onion, butter, mint, parsley ; preparation:

name: creamy white bean soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrot, garlic cloves, cannellini beans, water, italian seasoning, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a 4 quart saucepan on medium high heat. Add onion, carrots and garlic and cook, stirring occasionally until they are soft. Add beans, water, and seasonings. Stir and reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes or until carrots are tender. Take half of soup and blend in blender until smooth. Return soup to bean mixture in pan and stir. Ladle into bowls and drizzle with olive oil before serving. Top with freshly grated parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: lima bean soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, diced tomatoes, pinto beans, frozen lima beans, brown sugar, salt, water, white kidney beans ; preparation:Heat oil in large saucepan over medium heat. Add onion and cook until onion is translucent, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes with their liquid, pinto beans, lima beans, brown sugar, salt and water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low. Cover and simmer 15 minutes or until lima beans are tender, stirring occasionally. Stir in white kidney beans, heat through. To serve, ladle soup into warm serving bowl. Sprinkle with 1 to 2 ounces shredded cheddar cheese if desired. ; name: ham and bean soup ; ingredients: white beans, black beans, cooked ham, carrots, onion, herbs, pepper, low sodium chicken broth, fresh kale, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In crock pot, combine beans, ham, carrots, onion and pepper. Stir in undrained tomatoes and broth. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hrs or high for 3-4 hours. Stir in kale or spinach just before serving. Sprinkle each serving with parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: creamy bean tortilla soup ; ingredients: bacon, onion, celery, salt, red pepper, garlic powder, rotel tomatoes, chicken broth, refried beans, water ; preparation:Saute onion and celery in bacon grease you get from frying your bacon strips. Combine all ingredients including the crumbled bacon and heat till hot. Add water to desired consistency. Soup should be creamy. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: old fashioned bean soup ; ingredients: mutton, bacon, beef broth, olive oil, onion, celery, carrot, navy beans, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place meat, bacon and broth in a pot and bring to a boil. Cover and simmer for 1 hour. Heat oil in pan and saute onion, celery and carrot for 10 minutes. Add vegetables to the meat and simmer for 20 minutes. Add salt and pepper and serve. ; name: soupy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, scallions, garlic cloves, green chilies, black beans, water, salsa, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salsa and stir until heated through. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: three bean tortilla soup ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, garlic, chili beans, black beans, small white beans, chicken broth, 6-inch corn tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat a small non-stick skillet over medium-high heat until hot. Add whole tomato to skillet and heat until skin is blistered and slightly charred, turning frequently. Cool tomato slightly and coarsely chop. In a large saucepan, combine tomato, onion, and garlic. Cook over medium heat until onion and garlic are softened, about 5 minutes. Stir in beans and broth, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, simmer 15 to 20 minutes. Meanwhile, heat oven to 425f cut tortillas into strips and place in a single layer on a large baking sheet. Bake for 5 to 8 minutes or until crisp. To serve, ladle soup into bowls and top with tortilla strips and cheese. ; name: traditional bean soup ; ingredients: beans, white onion, avocado, tortillas, cream, chiles guajillos, white cheese, garlic ; preparation:

name: cran apple pie ; ingredients: 9-inch double-crust pie shells, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, tart apples, butter, sugar, cinnamon, fresh cranberries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Combine sugars, flour and cinnamon in large bowl. Add fruit. Mix well. Turn into pastry-lined pan. Dot with butter. Cover and cut slits in top crust. Seal edges. Bake 40 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: baked apples and cranberries ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, apples, sugar, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, pecans, butter ; preparation:Grease a 2-qt baking dish. Spread cranberries and apples in the dish. Sprinkle with 1 cup sugar. In a small bowl mix the oats, brown sugar, and pecans until well combined. Add the butter, stirring until mixed. Sprinkle the oat mixture over the fruit in the baking dish. Bake at 325 degrees for 45 minutes. ; name: cranberry apple sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, apple pie filling, cranberry sauce, apricot preserves, orange marmalade ; preparation:Cut fresh potatoes into bite size pieces. In a large saucepan cook potatoes, covered in enough boiling water to cover, about 15 minutes or until tender. Drain and set aside. Spread pie filling in an 8x8 inch baking dish. Arrange cooked fresh or canned sweet potatoes on top. In a small mixing bowl, stir together cranberry sauce, apricot preserves, and orange marmalade. Spoon over sweet potatoes. Bake uncovered in a 350f oven for 20 to 25 minutes or until heated through. ; name: crumb top apple pie ; ingredients: sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, water, lemon juice, butter, tart apples, brown sugar, flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Combine sugar, cinnamon and nutmeg in a large bowl. Add apple slices. Sprinkle water and lemon juice over apple slices and toss until coated with sugar. Spoon into a deep dish pie pan. Dot with butter. Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add flour and stir until smooth. Dab on top of apples. Bake for 50- 60 minutes. Serve warm. ; name: apple peach pies ; ingredients: apple pie filling, peach slices in syrup, caster sugar, olive oil flavored cooking spray, shortcrust pastry, egg, double cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c combine the apple, peach and 2 tablespoons of sugar in a medium bowl. Spray four 185ml capacity ramekins or ovenproof dishes with olive oil spray to lightly grease. Divide the apple mixture evenly among the prepared ramekins. Use a 9cm-diameter round pastry cutter to cut 4 discs from the pastry. Place a pastry disc on top of each ramekin and gently press the edges to seal. Use a fork to prick the pastry of each pie. Brush the pies with egg and sprinkle over the remaining sugar. Place the pies on a baking tray and bake in oven for 20-25 minutes or until the pastry is golden brown. Serve the pies immediately with cream. ; name: yummmmy crustless apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, eggs, vanilla sugar ; preparation:Pre-heat oven 350 degrees. Cut up the apples into small chunks and place them on the bottom of a lightly greased pie pan. Combine the sugar, flour, eggs and half of the vanilla into a bowl and mix well. Pour the mixture over the apples and sprinkle with remaining vanilla. Put into preheated oven for 20-30 minutes. ; name: classic apple pie ; ingredients: apples, sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, lemon zest, butter, lard, salt, cold water ; preparation:Pastry for double crust pie-------------. Combine flour, lard and salt with a pastry blender or fork until balls are the size of a large pea. Add cold water by the spoonful and blend until the bowl starts to clean itself as you work the dough. Then it is ready for rolling. Preheat oven to 450f. Combine sliced apples with sugar, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg and lemon rind. Line pie plate with unbaked pie crust, trim pastry, crimp to edge of pie plate. Fill pie crust with apple mixture and dot with softened butter. Brush crust edge with water and place pie crust top on top of pie, crimp to the bottom crust. Make some slits in the top crust for steam to escape. Bake for 10 minutes. Turn oven down to 350f and bake for 45 minutes longer. ; name: apple and cranberry pie ; ingredients: pastry for double-crust pie, fresh cranberries, sugar, minute tapioca, water, orange zest, baking apples ; preparation:

name: sauteed chicken breasts w fresh herbs and ginger ; ingredients: peanut oil, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, kosher salt & freshly ground black pepper, lime, juice of, chicken broth, fresh gingerroot, fresh basil leaf, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium skillet over medium-high heat. Season both sides of the chicken breasts with salt and pepper. Cook, turning once, until firm to the touch, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add the lime juice to the skillet, and scrape up any browned bits that cling to the pan with a wooden spoon. Add the chicken broth and ginger, and bring to a boil. Remove from heat and add the basil and mint to the pan and swirl the pan to combine. Spoon the herb sauce over the chicken. ; name: saucy baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: sour cream, lemon juice, worcestershire sauce, celery seed, paprika, garlic, salt, pepper, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix first 8 ingredients in plastic bag. Add chicken and marinate in refrigerator overnight. Remove chicken from bag and coat with crumbs. Heat oven to 350. Place chicken on shallow baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 45 minutes, or until juices run clear. ; name: delicious chicken ; ingredients: chicken broth, cornstarch, prepared mustard, dried dill weed, butter, boneless skinless chicken breast, onion, wide egg noodles ; preparation:In a bowl, combine chicken broth, cornstarch, mustard and dill weed. Mix well and set aside. Heat butter in large skillet. Saute chicken and onion until lightly browned. Slowly add chicken broth to chicken, stirring constantly over medium heat, bring mixture to a boil. Reduce heat and cook until slightly thickned. Pour chicken mixture over hot cooked noodles and toss, serve. ; name: crispy chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, buttermilk, garlic, hot sauce, all-purpose flour, cornmeal, cornstarch, salt, vegetable oil ; preparation:Flatten the chicken breasts between parchment paper or between plastic sheets. Mix the buttermilk with the hot sauce and the garlic, put the chicken covered in the buttermilk mixture in a non-metallic dish, marinate for at least two hours turning them over once. Mix the flour, cornmeal, cornstarch and seasoning in a shallow dish, take the chicken out of the marinade, let the buttermilk drip off, coat in the flour, coat the other breast then repeat the coating again starting with the first one. If you still see wet parts on the breasts, coat again. Put the chicken back in the fridge for at least half an hour. Discard the marinade. Heat the vegetable oil in a frying pan until it is pretty hot. Fry the breasts until golden brown on both sides, lower the temperature and fry them until they are done, approx 10 minutes in total depending on the thickness of the breasts. ; name: crispy balsamic baked chicken breasts ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, dry parsley flakes, garlic powder, garlic salt, balsamic vinegar, egg whites, boneless chicken breasts, salt & pepper ; preparation:Put bread crumbs, parsley, garlic powder, and salt in medium bowl and mix. Whisk together vinegar and egg whites in smaller bowl. Dip chicken in vinegar mixture then dry mixture. Place on sprayed cookie sheet. Spray the top of the chicken breasts with cooking spray. Sprinkle with a little salt and pepper. Bake 400 for 30-40 minutes, till fork tender and juices run clear. ; name: herbed chicken en casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, butter, cream of chicken soup, sauterne, water chestnut, canned mushroom, green peppers, dried thyme ; preparation:Lightly season chicken with salt and pepper. Brown slowly in butter in skillet arrange browned chicken skin side up in baking dish. To dripping in skillet add mushroom soup and wine, stirring to combine. Add remaining ingredients and stir to combine. Heat to boiling. Pour sauce over chicken. Cover and bake at 350 degrees for 25 minutes. Uncover and cook for an additional 15 to 20 minutes or until chicken is done. Serve with hot, fluffy rice. ; name: tarragon chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, vegetable oil, shallots, chicken stock, tarragon vinegar, light cream, cornstarch, grainy mustard, dried tarragon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the vegetable oil in a large frying pan. Add the chicken breasts and brown on both sides. Add the shallots, chicken stock and vinegar. Cover and simmer on low heat until the chicken is no longer pink inside, about 30 minutes. Remove the chicken from the pan and keep warm. Blend together the cream and cornstarch. Stir into the cooking liquid in the frying pan. Cook until thickened, stirring the sauce to keep it smooth. Stir in the mustard, tarragon, salt and pepper. Arrange the chicken on a serving platter and pour the sauce over it. ; name: sauteed chicken breasts with mustard and sage ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, all-purpose flour, salt and pepper, olive oil, white wine, fresh sage leaves, chicken broth, whole grain mustard, butter ; preparation:

name: candied sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, brown sugar, orange zest, vanilla, cinnamon, salt, nutmeg ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Place potatoes in 13x9 baking pan. In lg saucepan combine remaining ingredients. Bring to a boil. Boil for 2 minutes. Pour over potatoes. Cover and bake for 45 minutes. ; name: really really good candied sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, butter, maple syrup, brown sugar, cinnamon ; preparation:Cover potatoes with water, bring to a boil. Lower heat and simmer for 25 minutes, until done. When cooled, peel and cut into chunks. Place in 2-qt baking dish. In small saucepan combine remaining ingredients, cook and stir until mixture boils. Pour over potatoes. Bake at 350f for 40 minutes. ; name: bourbon brown sugar sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, brown sugar, bourbon, butter, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg ; preparation:Cube sweet potatoes and boil in water until soft. Add brown sugar, bourbon, butter and mash well. Add cinnamon, nutmeg, and vanilla. Mix all ingredients well. If you want to add more cinnamon and not so much bourbon, for example, feel free. ; name: candied sweet potatoes southern traditional ; ingredients: butter, sweet potatoes, white sugar, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, salt ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet over medium-low heat. While butter is melting, in a small bowl combine sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt. Add sliced potatoes to melted butter and turn to coat. Sprinkle sugar mixture over potatoes, stir to coat. Cover skillet, reduce heat to low. Stirring occasionally, cook for 50-60 minutes, or until potatoes are tender. ; name: orange honey sweet potatoes ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, half-and-half, orange juice, golden brown sugar, unsalted butter, orange zest, ground coriander, salt, ground ginger, honey ; preparation:Roast the sweet potatoes at 400 degrees f for about one hour depending on the size of the potatoes. Place the rest of the ingredients in a saucepan, stirring to blend and heat thoroughly. Spoon out the sweet potato from the skins into a large bowl. Add the hot liquid to the potatoes and whip together. Serve immediately, or place in a casserole to be reheated and served later. ; name: luau sweet potatoes ; ingredients: yams, bananas, lemon juice, crushed pineapple, butter, rum, brown sugar, macadamia nuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Place yams in an ovenproof dish and add bananas. Combine remaining ingredients, except nuts. Pour over yams and bananas. Sprinkle with nuts. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes until bubbly. ; name: spiced sweet potatoes in peaches ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, lemon juice, brown sugar, ground cloves, canned peach halves ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine potatoes, lemon juice, brown sugar and cloves. Drain peach halves and arrange in baking dish. Fill centers with sweet potatoes. Bake for 20 minutes. ; name: paula deen sweet potato balls ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, brown sugar, orange juice, orange zest, nutmeg, shredded coconut, granulated sugar, ground cinnamon, marshmallows ; preparation:

name: chicken noodle casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken, medium noodles, onions, cream of mushroom soup, salt, pepper, mixed mushrooms, buttered bread crumbs ; preparation:Mix onions with noodles. Add chicken and seasonings. Add soup and mix well. Put mixture in greased 2 quart casserole dish. Sprinkle buttered bread crumbs or corn flake crumbs over top. Cover and bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. Uncover 10 minutes before done and let brown. ; name: good broccoli casserole ; ingredients: broccoli, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, eggs, tabasco sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, butter, herbed breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine first 6 ingredients. Sprinkle cheddar cheese on top of broccoli mixture. Combine crumbs and melted butter and sprinkle on top of cheese. Bake 35 minutes in a pre-heated 350 degree oven. This dish will serve 8. Any leftovers are reheated very nicely in microwave. ; name: tuna noodle broccoli casserole ; ingredients: wide egg noodles, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, milk, mild cheddar cheese, tuna in water, frozen peas, fresh broccoli ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. Prepare a medium baking dish by spraying with cooking spray. In a large pot of water, boil noodles until al dente. Drain well. In a medium saucepan, combine flour, butter, and salt. Stir until butter is melted and ingredients are combined evenly. Add milk, and whisk until the sauce thickens. Add cheese to mixture, and whisk until cheese is melted and mixture is well blended. Stir in tuna, peas, broccoli, and noodles. Spread the mixture evenly in prepared dish. Bake in preheated oven for 20 minutes or until the top noodles begins to turn golden brown. ; name: chicken broccoli cheese casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, french fried onion rings ; preparation:Cut up chicken into small pieces and cook throughly. You may want to spice up the chicken with the spices of your choice in a bowl, mix the cream of celery, cream of mushroom and mayo together. Empty the bag of broccoli into a rectangular casserole dish. Spread the cooked chicken evenly over the broccoli. Spread the cream of celery, mushroom and mayo mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese evenly over the entire casserole. Cook at 350 for 30-35 minutes. Sprinkle the french onion toppings over the cheese and cook for another 5 mins. ; name: chili noodle casserole ; ingredients: egg noodles, cream cheese, sour cream, kosher salt, black pepper, chili, cheddar cheese, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f begin cooking noodles according to package directions. Have cream cheese and sour cream ready. Remove noodles from heat, drain in collander, and return directly to pot. Add cream cheese, sour cream, salt, and black pepper. Stirr thoroughly, mixing well. Lightly grease a 9x9 pan with butter or spray butter. Spread half the noodle mixture into pan. Spread chili over top, then spread remaining noodles. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese and cayenne pepper. Bake for 30-45 minutes or until heated through. ; name: chicken casserole with broccoli ; ingredients: baking mix, cooked chicken, frozen chopped broccoli, cheddar cheese, milk, eggs, seasoning salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400, grease 2 quart casserole dish. In prepared casserole dish, place chicken, broccoli and cheese. In a separate mixing bowl, blend baking mix, milk, eggs, salt and pepper on high speed until well mixed. Pour into dish over chicken, broccoli and cheese. Bake for 35-40 minutes until knife inserted in center comes out clean. Let cool 5 minutes before serving. ; name: tangy chicken noodle bake ; ingredients: corn flake crumbs, butter, egg noodles, flour, milk, water, chicken bouillon cubes, sour cream, cooked chicken, canned mushroom slices ; preparation:Combine cornflake crumbs and butter. Set aside for topping. Cook the noodles according to package directions. Drain and set aside. In a saucepan, combine the flour, milk, water, and bouillon cubes. Cook until thickened and bubbly. Remove from heat. Stir in the sour cream, chicken and mushrooms. Add the cooked noodles. Put in greased casserole dish. Sprinkle with buttered crumbs. Bake at 400 degrees for about 20 minutes or until it bubbles. ; name: good eats broccoli noodle casserole ; ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, eggs, salt, black pepper, broccoli, mushrooms, chicken-flavored ramen noodles ; preparation:

name: apple cheese salad ; ingredients: red apples, fresh lemon juice, celery, swiss cheese, mayonnaise, prepared mustard, salt and pepper, lettuce leaf, filberts ; preparation:Put apples in a serving dish. Sprinkle with lemon juice. Add celery and cheese. Mix mayonnaise and mustard. Season with salt and pepper. Add to apple mixture. Refrigerate 1 hour to blend flavors. Serve in lettuce cups sprinkled with nuts. ; name: baby greens pear walnut and blue cheese salad ; ingredients: lemon juice, dijon mustard, shallot, fresh thyme, olive oil, mixed baby greens, pears, blue cheese, walnuts ; preparation:Whisk first 4 ingredients in small bowl to blend. Gradually whisk in oil. Season dressing to taste with salt and pepper. Toss greens in large bowl with enough dressing to coat. Divide greens among 6 plates. Top with pear slices, dividing equally. Sprinkle with cheese and walnuts. Drizzle lightly with remaining dressing and serve. ; name: sauteed pear salad ; ingredients: boston lettuce, olive oil, bosc pears, cider vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In large serving bowl, place lettuce. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat oil on medium-heat 1 minute. Add pears and cook 10 to 15 minutes or until they begin to soften and turn golden. Meanwhile, in cup, stir vinegar, dijon mustard, sugar, salt, and pepper. Add vinegar mixture to pears in skillet, and cook 1 minute or until liquid begins to thicken. Pour pears and liquid from skillet into bowl with lettuce, toss to coat. Serve immediately. ; name: pear and blue cheese pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, vegetable oil, salt, black pepper, pears, butter, green peppercorn, blue cheese ; preparation:Brush chops lightly with oil. Season with salt and pepper. In a large skillet, cook chops 4-5 minutes per side or until juices run clear. Remove chops from the skillet and keep warm. In the skillet used to cook the pork, cook the pear slices in the butter for 1 minute, stirring gently to coat. Stir in peppercorns. Cook and stir about 2 minutes. Spoon pears over the chops. Sprinkle with blue cheese and serve. ; name: greens apple and walnut salad ; ingredients: mixed baby greens, apple, dried cranberries, walnuts, parmesan cheese, walnut oil, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix greens, apple, cranberries, and walnuts in large bowl. Mix dressing ingredients in small bowl, pour over salad. Toss. Sprinkle parmesan on top. Can substitute bleu cheese crumbles for the parmesan, if desired. Can also add a bit of red onion, if you like. ; name: roasted pear salad ; ingredients: pears, fig jam, goat cheese, olive oil, lemon juice, dijon mustard, watercress, red onion, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f place pear halves cut-side up in 2 large baking dishes. Spoon 1 teaspoons jam in center of each pear half. Top with goat cheese rounds, and lightly drizzle with oil. Bake pears 30 minutes, or until cheese begins to brown. Whisk together remaining 2 tbs. Fig jam, lemon juice, and mustard in bowl. Whisk in 1 tbs. Olive oil. Divide watercress among 8 serving plates. Sprinkle with onion and walnuts. Top each with pear half, and drizzle with dressing. ; name: shrimp and mixed green dinner salad ; ingredients: walnut halves, water, balsamic vinegar, sugar, mixed greens, zucchini, baby shrimp, strawberries, feta cheese, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:Toss the walnut halves with water and vinegar. Place in a heavy skillet over medium heat and toast until water and vinegar have evaporated. Sprinkle with the sugar and warm, stirring frequently until the sugar melts and coats the nuts. Set aside to cool. Divide the baby greens between two well chilled salad plates. Assemble the salad by distributing each plate with zucchini slices, 6 of the strawberries sliced and feta cheese. Top with shrimp, quarter the boiled eggs and divide evenly on each of the plates. Cut the reserved strawberries from bottom to stem without cutting through stem. Fan out slices and place on top of salad. Drizzle each salad with prepared dressing of your choosing and enjoy. ; name: blue cheese and pear salad ; ingredients: fresh pears, maytag blue cheese, walnut halves, lettuce, oil, raspberry vinegar, sugar, salt, fresh ground pepper, tabasco sauce ; preparation:

name: spinach with olives and lemon ; ingredients: baby spinach, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, rind of, kalamata olive, sea salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Wash the spinach and place in a large covered pan over low heat. Steam for 1-2 minutes until the spinach wilts. Drain well. Heat the garlic in 1 tablespoon of the olive oil until fragrant. Add the preserved lemon, olives and spinach. Cook for another minute, season with salt and pepper, and stir in the remaining olive oil. Serve immediately or chill and serve cold as a salad. ; name: spinach with chickpeas ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, onion, cumin, cayenne pepper, turmeric, canned chick-peas, baby spinach, pimientos, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes, or until golden, but not brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the onion and cumin, turmeric and cayenne and cook, stirring for about 5 minutes or until soft. Add the chickpeas and stir until coated with the oil and spices. Stir in the spinach with just the water clinging to it, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes until wilted. Uncover, stir in the pimientos and continue cooking, stirring gently until the liquid evaporates. Season to taste and serve. ; name: seasoned spinach ; ingredients: fresh spinach, green onion, sesame seeds, low sodium soy sauce, dark sesame oil, kosher salt, garlic cloves ; preparation:Steam half of spinach, covered, for 5 minutes or until the spinach wilts. Place steamed spinach in a colander. Repeat proceduce with remaining spinach. Cool slightly, and squeeze dry. Place spinach in a bowl. Add onions and remaining ingredients. Toss mixture well to combine. Serve chilled or at room temperature. ; name: efo spinach ; ingredients: fresh spinach, onion, tomatoes, red bell pepper, olive oil, chicken bouillon cubes, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Wash and drain spinach leaves, removing any thick stems. Slice onions, tomatoes and red peppers into strips. Heat oil in a saute pan. Add onions and peppers and cook until wilted. Add tomatoes and cook. Crumble bouillon cubes into pan and add spinach with whatever water clings to the leaves. Cook until spinach wilts. Season with salt and white pepper, to taste. ; name: roma style spinach ; ingredients: golden raisin, pine nuts, garlic, salt, ground red pepper, extra virgin olive oil, fresh spinach, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook raisins, pine nuts or pecans, garlic, salt and ground red pepper in hot oil in a 6-quart dutch oven over medium heat for 1 to 2 minutes or until garlic is light brown. Add spinach. Toss well to coat. Cook and stir 2 minutes more or just until spinach is wilted and heated through. To serve, sprinkle with parmesan cheese. ; name: spinach with rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, cooked rice, fresh spinach, carrot, garlic clove, italian dressing, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Generously spray a wok or non stick deep frypan with veggie spray. Heat to medium. Add cooked rice and grated carrot into wok and mix. Add minced garlic. Stir fry to heat through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Add spinach. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Turn over with a spatula several times to mix the spinach evenly with the rice mixture, heat and turn until the spinach is starting to wilt, about 3 minutes. Pour the italian dressing evenly over and turn several times to mix. Cook about 3 minutes or until the spinach is well wilted and the dressing is heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: arabian spinach ; ingredients: onion, oil, garlic, spinach, cumin, chickpeas, butter ; preparation:In a large wok, fry onion in oil for about 5 minutes, until softened. Add the garlic and cumin, and then fry for another minute. Add spinach in stages, stirring until leaves begin to wilt. Stir in chickpeas, butter and salt and pepper to taste. Reheat. ; name: spinach and penne ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, tomatoes, kalamata olive, fresh spinach, fresh parsley, penne ; preparation:

name: mushroom toasties ; ingredients: butter, chestnut mushrooms, garlic clove, thyme leaves, white bread, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Heat grill to high. Melt butter in a frying pan and fry mushrooms until tender. Add garlic and thyme and cook for another minute. Toast the bread, top with the mushrooms and then the cheese. Grill until cheese is brown and bubbly. ; name: polenta toasties with mushroom sauce ; ingredients: water, polenta, salt, butter, mushrooms, garlic cloves, cream, fresh ground black pepper, italian parsley ; preparation:Make the polenta by bringing the water to the boil in a wide saucepan. Add 1 teaspoon salt and sprinkle on the polenta a handful at a time, stirring continuously using a wooden spoon. Once the polenta has been added, turn down the heat and cook for about 20 minutes. 5cm thick. Allow to cool. Cut into squares and cook on a oiled heavy based saucepan or bbq until browned. Dish onto serving plates and serve with mushroom gravy. To make mushroom sauce, melt butter in a frypan over medium heat. Add mushrooms and toss well and cook until lightly browned and tender. Add garlic and cook 2 minutes. Cook till creamy then add parsley and serve. ; name: new twist for mushrooms on toast ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, fresh mushrooms, fat-free cottage cheese, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, 8-grain bread, margarine, tomatoes ; preparation:In a frypan heat the oil and brown the mushrooms. Add the cottage cheese. Sprinkle the parmesan cheese over. Add salt and pepper to taste. Stir and turn over and over so it does not stick. When cottage cheese becomes liquid, let it bubble for 2 or 3 minutes. Meanwhile toast bread crisp. Lightly spread with a very little margarine. Place tomato slices on toast. Sprinkle salt and pepper over. Pour mushrooms and cheeses over tomatoes. Serve immediately. ; name: sweet soy mushrooms on toast ; ingredients: butter, garlic clove, small mushrooms, ciabatta, ketjap manis, salt and pepper, chives ; preparation:Melt the butter in a large frying pan. Add the garlic and mushrooms and stir fry over a high heat for 2-3 minutes. Meanwhile, toast 6 slices of the ciabatta bread. Add the ketjap manis to the mushrooms and toss over a high heat for a few seconds more - it should caramelize instantly. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Put the toast onto warmed plates, and spread with a little butter if you wish. Spoon on the mushrooms and sprinkle over the chives if using. Serve immediately. ; name: finnish baked mushrooms ; ingredients: mushroom, lemon juice, onions, butter, salt and pepper, flour, heavy cream, egg yolks, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Mix the breadcrumbs with 1 tbsp butter and toast until golden brown, stirring often to prevent burning. To the sliced mushrooms add the lemon juice, onion, butter, salt, and pepper. Saute until onions tender. Heat the cream to just short of the boiling point. Stir the flour into the mushrooms, stirring rapidly to prevent lumping. Stir in a bit of the cream. Stir in each egg yolk separately. Stir in the remaining cream. Cook, covered, until the sauce is just short of boiling. Sprinkle with the toasted bread crumbs and let sit 5 minutes before serving. Half and half is better than milk and whipping cream is best of all. ; name: roasted mushroom medley ; ingredients: fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, olive oil, salt & pepper, fresh rosemary, fresh sage, fresh parsley, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees f. Remove the stems from the caps, chop off the ends, and cut into large pieces. Cut the mushrooms into pieces no larger than 2 inches in size. Mix the olive oil with the garlic, herbs and seasonings in an ovenproof casserole dish large enough to fit all of the mushrooms. Add the mushrooms, and mix well, coating the mushrooms with the flavored oil. Bake for about 30 to 40 minutes, or until cooked through. Remove from the heat, and drizzle with the balsamic vinegar. ; name: cheese stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: mushrooms, green onion, garlic cloves, butter, dry breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, basil, pepper ; preparation:Remove mushroom stems and chop finely. In a small pan, cook stems, green onions, garlic and butter over medium heat til tender, about 5 minutes. Remove from heat and add all remaining ingredients except caps. Fill caps with mixture, place in baking dish. Bake 350f for 15 minutes. ; name: mushroom toast ; ingredients: mushroom, butter, garlic cloves, salt, white pepper, nutmeg, lemon juice, whipping cream, bread, parsley ; preparation:
