Cook until well heated. ; name: tuscan style stew ; ingredients: carrots, celery rib, onion, kale, zucchini, olive oil, thyme, cannellini beans, diced tomatoes, vegetable stock ; preparation:Heat 2 tablespoons of the olive oil in a skillet over medium-high heat. When the oil is hot add the thyme, carrots, celery and onions. Sweat these over very low heat for about 5 minutes. Then, add the kale. Cover tightly and cook the kale until it wilts to half its volume. Add the tomatoes and 2 cups of stock. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover. Allow the stew to come a boil. Add the zucchini. Simmer for one more hour, then add the beans. If necessary, add more water to your desired consistency, and cook 45 minutes longer. ; name: sausage potatoes and peas ; ingredients: italian sausages, sweet peas, potatoes, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, butter, parsley, oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spread sausage links, potatoes and peas in 13 x 9 baking dish. In saucepan over medium heat mix rest of ingredients until boullion cube is dissolved. Pour over sausage, potatoes and peas. Cover tightly with aluminum foil. Bake in 350 degree oven 45 minutes to 1 hours. ; name: italian white bean soup ; ingredients: italian turkey sausage, onion, garlic cloves, cooking oil, cannellini beans, nonfat chicken broth, plum tomato, oregano, kale ; preparation:In a large sauce pan cook onion and garlic in hot oil about 5 minutes or until onion is tender. Stir in beans, broth, tomatoes and marjarom. Bring to boiling. Reduce heat. Simmer covered for 15 minutes. Stir in cooked sausage, kale or spinach simmer for about 5 minutes more or until kale is tender. Season to taste with pepper. ; name: sausage florentine pizza ; ingredients: hot italian sausage, fresh mushrooms, garlic, pizza sauce, dried oregano, dried basil, frozen chopped spinach, salt and pepper, boboli pizza crust, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:In a big skillet, saute the sausage, mushrooms, and garlic until the meat is browned. Crumble the sausage while cooking. Drain off fat. Remove excess fat by patting meat mixture with paper towels. Add pizza sauce, oregano, basil, chopped spinach, and salt and pepper to taste. Cook, stirring frequently, until heated through. Place pizza crust on a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake at 400 for 5 minutes. Spread meat mixture evenly over pizza crust. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake for 8-10 minutes or until cheese melts and pizza is heated. ; name: tuscan sausage vegetable soup ; ingredients: italian sausage, zucchini, summer squash, onion, tubettini pasta, water, pasta sauce, garbanzo beans, beef bouillon cube ; preparation:

name: comfort casserole ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, celery, garlic, pepper, fresh mushrooms, beef bouillon powder, boiling water, soy sauce, long grain white rice ; preparation:Scrambly-fry the beef, onion, celery, garlic, and pepper in a non-stick skillet until the beef is no longer pink. Drain. Add the mushrooms, saute for 5 minutes. Dissolve the bouillon powder in the boiling water. Add to the beef mixture. Mix well. Stir in the soy sauce and rice. Simmer, covered, for 30-40 minutes or until the rice is tender. ; name: ground beef stuffing casserole ; ingredients: onion, celery, poultry seasoning, dry bread, cream of mushroom soup, milk, ground beef, prepared mustard, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Mix onion, celery, poultry seasoning and bread cubes. Add one can of the soup and the milk. Set aside. In a large bowl mix the ground beef and the mustard and worcestershire. Add the bread mixture. Mix thoroughly. Spread into a 9x13 pan. Spread the other can of cream of mushroom soup over the top. Bake at 375 for about 1 hour. If this starts to get brown on top or looks too dry, cover with foil. ; name: beef broth with semolina dumplings ; ingredients: unsalted butter, extra-large egg, semolina flour, all-purpose flour, salt, nutmeg, beef broth, chives ; preparation:In a food processor, cream the butter and egg until light. Add the flours, salt and nutmeg, then process for 1 minute. Scrape down the bowl, and process for another minute. The dough should forma ball around the middle spindle. Wrap the dough in plastic, and let rest, chilled, for about 2 hours, until stiff enough to shape into dumplings. After the dough is rested, bring the broth to a simmer in a large soup kettle. Adjust the heat if needed to maintain a gentle simmer. Scoop the dough into balls, 1 rounded tablespoon at a time, roll into ovals, and drop into the simmering broth. After all dumplings are in the broth, simmer, covered, for 18 - 20 minutes, until the dumplings are light and puffy. Ladle the soup into serving bowls, and top with the chives. ; name: meat cholent ; ingredients: beef brisket, dried lima beans, onions, pearl barley, fat, salt, pepper, ginger, flour, paprika ; preparation:Submerge beans in water and soak overnight. Drain well. Use a heavy saucepan or dutch oven and brown the meat and onions in the fat. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and ginger. Add the beans and barley. Sprinkle with the flour and paprika. Add enough boiling water to cover one inch above the mixture. Cover tightly. Cholent may be baked for 24 hours in an oven 250f, or, for quicker cooking, bake in a 350f oven for 4 to 5 hours. Slice the meat and serve with the barley and beans. ; name: spiced beef ; ingredients: eggs, green onions, sour cream, dry breadcrumbs, dry oregano leaves, salt, dry thyme leaves, ground beef ; preparation:Whisk together eggs with onion and sour cream. Stir in bread crumbs and seasonings. Crumble in beef using your hands, work until mixed. Form into burgers, meatballs or whatever you fancy. Cook now or freeze for later. ; name: down home beef skillet ; ingredients: lean ground beef, onion, water, salsa, mexican-style corn, tomatoes in puree, quick-cooking rice, peas ; preparation:Brown beef and onion in a large skillet until no longer pink, drain. Add remaining ingredients except peas. Bring to a boil. Cook 2 minutes. Blend in peas. Cover and remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Serve. ; name: beef fillets with moroccan couscous ; ingredients: mild curry paste, filet of beef, onions, beef stock, couscous, tomatoes, of fresh mint, slivered almonds ; preparation:Rub half of the curry paste over the beef fillet. Cook beef in oiled pan until brown all over, but still a bit pink inside. Remove beef from pan and set aside. Add remaining curry paste and onion to pan and cook until onion is soft. Add stock and bring to boil. Remove from heat and add couscous. Let stand for 5 minutes. Add tomatoes, mint and half of the almonds and fluff gently with a fork. Slice beef and serve on top of couscous, sprinkling with the remaining almonds. ; name: beefy seitan log ; ingredients: vital wheat gluten, nutritional yeast, ground cumin, onion powder, garlic powder, mushroom stock, soy sauce, vegetarian worcestershire sauce ; preparation:

name: portuguese potato and cilantro soup ; ingredients: onions, garlic cloves, olive oil, potatoes, vegetables, salt, cayenne, cilantro ; preparation:In a large saucepan, saute the onions and garlic in 3 tablespoons of oil for 5 minutes, until limp, then add the last tablespoon of oil and the potatoes and stir-fry for a minute. Add the stock, cover, and simmer for 45 minutes, until the potatoes are mushy. Remove from heat and puree. Return the soup to the pot, season with salt and cayenne, and stir in the chopped cilantro. You can serve the soup cold--or reheat by slowly bringing it to a simmer. Ladle into soup plates and top with a sprinkling of cilantro or chives. ; name: spanish chickpea soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, carrot, chickpeas, vegetable stock, salt and pepper, bay leaf, butter, lemon juice ; preparation:Add oil and onions to a medium saucepan and saute on low heat, stirring, until very well done. Add the carrot and chickpeas, and saute for 2 minutes, stirring continuously. Add stock and bring to boil. Add seasonings and simmer on low until veggies are tender, adding water if necessary and stirring on occasion. Remove bay leaf and puree soup. Add butter and lemon juice. Simmer until heated through. Serve hot. ; name: garlic and kale soup ; ingredients: wheat berries, olive oil, shiitake mushrooms, garlic cloves, white wine, vegetable broth, water, kale, salt and pepper ; preparation:Soak wheat berries in large bowl of cold water overnight. Heat oil in 2 qt saucepan over medium heat. Add mushrooms, and season with salt, if desired. Saute mushrooms 10 minutes or until beginning to brown. Add garlic and saute 2 minutes more. Sir in white wine and simmer until vinegar is almost evaporated, stirring to scrape up browned bits from pan. Drain wheat berries and add to mushroom mixture with vegetable broth and water. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat to medium-low and simmer 20 minutes. Add kale, and cook 10-20 minutes more, or until kale is tender. Season with salt and pepper, if desired. ; name: quick and easy garlic soup for one ; ingredients: garlic, extra virgin olive oil, tomatoes, chicken broth, egg, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper, hot sauce ; preparation:In a small saucepan over medium-low heat, saute the garlic until aromatic. Add the tomatoes, and saute for another minute or so, then add the broth. Scramble the egg, parmesean cheese, hot sauce, salt and pepper in a serving bowl. When the broth comes to a boil, add the egg mixture while stirring. Remove from heat, place in a bowl, top with fresh ground pepper, and enjoy. ; name: garlic soup soupe a l ail ; ingredients: water, garlic clove, potato, carrot, whipping cream ; preparation:Combine first 4 ingredients in medium saucepan. Bring to boil. Cover, reduce heat to low and simmer until vegetables are tender, about 25 minutes. Puree in batches in blender. Season with salt and pepper. Rewarm over medium heat. Drizzle with cream, if desired. ; name: chestnut and chorizo soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, chestnuts, chicken stock, chorizo sausage, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy bottomed pan and add the onion and garlic and saut for 4-5 minutes, until soft. Add the tomatoes and simmer for five minutes. Then add the chestnuts and simmer for a further three minutes. Add the stock, bring to the boil and simmer until everything is tender. Allow the soup to cool a little, then liquidise it in batches. Return the soup to the pan, add the chorizo and simmer for a few minutes, or until hot. Serve with the parsley as garnish. ; name: lime and garlic soup ; ingredients: peanut oil, garlic, chicken stock, diced tomatoes, lime juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place the peanut oil in the bottom of a large, deep saucepan or dutch oven and turn the heat to medium. Add the garlic and stir. Cook, stirring occasionally, just until garlic becomes blond, about 5 minutes. Add the stock and tomatoes and turn the heat to medium-high. Cook, stirring, until the mixture boils, then turn the heat down to medium. Stir in lime juice and salt and pepper. Taste and add more salt, pepper and lime juice to taste. ; name: spanish garlic soup ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic cloves, chicken broth, salt, pepper, bread cubes, egg ; preparation:

name: cheese and sour cream potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, butter, onions, salt, ground black pepper, corn flakes ; preparation:In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden. ; name: chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, milk, fresh chives, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes for 10-12 minutes or until fork-tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Mash potatoes, adding cream cheese until it is blended. Stir in milk, chives, and seasonings. Heat on medium heat until just warmed through, then serve at once. ; name: sour cream chive and olive burgers ; ingredients: ground beef, salt and pepper, swiss cheese, sour cream, black olives, green onions, onion rolls ; preparation:Season beef with salt and pepper. Form into four patties. Grill to your taste. Top with cheese to melt. Lightly toast rolls. Spread sour cream on rolls and top with olives and green onions. Place burger on this then place top bun. Enjoy. ; name: blue cheese and chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: russet potatoes, blue cheese, butter, fresh chives, garlic salt, pepper ; preparation:Peel potatoes and cut into chunks. Cook in boiling water for 15 to 20 minutes or until tender when pierced with a fork. Drain well. Mash with a potato masher or mixer until smooth and stir in remaining ingredients. Return to stove and cook for a few minutes more until very hot. ; name: twice baked mashed potatoes ; ingredients: mashed potatoes, cream cheese, sour cream, fresh chives, bacon, seasoned pepper, salt, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Prepare potatoes according to package directions. Stir in cream cheese and next 5 ingredients. Place in a 2-quart, lightly greased, baking dish. The recipe states to divide the mixture evenly between 6, 6-oz. Lightly greased ramekins or custard cups- i preferred to make it in one big dish but you all can do as you like. Sprinkle evenly with cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or till thoroughly heated. ; name: twice baked potatoes with cream cheese ; ingredients: potatoes, fat free cream cheese, nonfat milk, onion salt, butter, fresh ground pepper, parsley, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Put cream cheese out to soften. Scrub potatoes. Dry them off and grease them with butter and salt the skins. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. Remove from oven and cool to handle. Cut potatoes in half, lengthwise, remove cooked potato and put in large bowl. Be carefully to leave the skin intact. Mash with cream cheese, hot milk, onion salt, butter, and pepper. Pile mixture back into skins. Sprinkle with paprika and parsley and bake 20 more minutes. ; name: baked parmesan and garlic sweet potato fries ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, olive oil, garlic granules, parmesan cheese, sea salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450. Cut up sweet potatoes into wedges, rounds or thin strips. In a large bowl add the fries. Coat them with oil. You may substitute just water if desired. Then add the garlic granules, parmesan and sea salt. Spay a cookie sheet with pam or oil and lay fries out on top. Bake for 10 mins then turn them over. Put back in the oven for 10 more minutes. If you have thicker fries you may need an additional 5-10 minutes baking time. ; name: sour cream and chive potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream, parmesan cheese, cheddar cheese, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: chicken salad ; ingredients: chicken breasts, celery, green onions, mayonnaise, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil chicken for 40 minutes. Cool. Shred cooled chicken with two forks. Add mayo to desired consistency. Add celery and green onions. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill. Enjoy. ; name: easy homemade chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, green onion, lemon juice, pepper, mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, prepared mustard, hard-boiled eggs ; preparation:In medium mixing bowl combine first three ingredients. Stir in the lemon juice and pepper. Combine the mayo, pickle relish and prepared mustard. Add this sauce to chicken and gently stir in the eggs. Cover and chill until ready to serve. ; name: chutney chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, bell pepper, raisins, celery, green onion, miracle whip light, mango chutney, romaine lettuce ; preparation:Toss chicken, bell pepper, raisins, celery and onions in large bowl. Stir mayonnaise and chutney in small bowl until blended. Add to salad. Toss to evenly coat. Serve at room temperature or chilled. Line 4 individual plates with lettuce leaves. Top with salad. ; name: different but delicious chicken salad for parties ; ingredients: pineapple juice, lemon pepper seasoning, boneless skinless chicken breasts, almonds, garlic powder, mayonnaise ; preparation:Poach chicken breasts in pineapple juice with plenty of lemon pepper seasoning until cooked through and the poaching liquid has thickened into a partial glaze. Discard the poaching liquid and allow the chicken to cool. Run the chicken breasts through a food processor until crumbly and then pour into a large bowl. Run almonds through the food processor until coarsely or finely chopped. Add almonds to chicken. Now add garlic powder to the mix -- the more the better. Do not be afraid that you will overpower the chicken salad as the garlic powder is what makes the dish so addictive. Add mayo to desired consistency. Serve chicken salad with croissants, toasted french bread slices or a bread of your choice. ; name: chicken and chickpea salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, cherry tomatoes, chickpeas, flat leaf parsley, red onion, feta, olive oil, lemon juice, baby spinach ; preparation:Combine chicken, tomatoes, chickpeas, parsley, onion and feta in a large bowl. Season with black pepper. Toss gently to combine. Whisk oil, juice and salt and pepper together in a small bowl until well combined. Add spinach to chicken, drizzle with dressing and toss again to combine. Serve with crusty bread. ; name: chicken salad oriental ; ingredients: cooked chicken, pineapple tidbits, green onions, water chestnuts, sour cream, ground ginger, salt, pepper, slivered almonds ; preparation:Combine and chill first four ingredients. Blend sour cream, ground ginger, salt, and pepper. Add to chicken mixture. Toss lightly. Serve on bed of greens. Sprinkle with toasted almonds. ; name: salad dressing chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, light honey dijon salad dressing, fresh rosemary, dried breadcrumbs, seasoning salt, black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 f. Spray a roasting rack and shallow roasting pan with nonstick spray or grease lightly with some oil. Remove skin from chicken, rinse well, and pat dry. Using a pastry brush, coat both sides of each piece of chicken well with the salad dressing. Set breasts, meaty sides up, onto the sprayed roasting rack and sprinkle with rosemary. If you like, season to taste with a little seasoned salt& pepper. Sprinkle bread crumbs on top of the chicken. Bake 20 minutes, then flip pieces over using a pair of tongs and brush with some more salad dressing. Bake another 40 minutes or until cooked through. Cook time will vary based on the actual weight of your chicken pieces-allow 15 minutes per pound plus 10-15 extra minutes to calculate the total cooking time. ; name: two sisters chicken salad ; ingredients: cooked chicken, celery, onion, salt, lemon juice, seedless grapes, mayonnaise, mandarin oranges, toasted almond, romaine lettuce ; preparation:

name: white choc chip cookies ; ingredients: brown sugar, white sugar, butter, egg yolk, vanilla essence, self-raising flour, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 c. Grease or line cookie tray. Mix together sugar and butter. Add egg yolk and vanilla, mix well. Stir in flour and choc chips. Place teaspoonfuls onto tray and bake for 12 minutes. ; name: chocolate chippers cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, caster sugar, egg, vanilla essence, self-raising flour, salt, miniature chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Place butter and sugar in bowl and, using an electric beater beat for 3 minutes or until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla and beat till well combined. Add flour, salt and chocolate also add nuts now is using. Mix well until combined. Taking heaped teaspoonfuls roll into balls and flatten slightly between palm of hands. Place on prepared tray 5cm apart and bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden around the edges. Remove from oven and cool for a few minutes on tray before removing to cooling racks. ; name: one of a kind grandma s choc chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla essence, self raising flour, milk chocolate chips, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees celcius. Grease 2 40cm x 30cm baking trays with oil spray. Cream butter until close to white. Add caster and brown sugar and beat until light and fluffy. Gradually add egg and vanilla essence. Beat well. Fold in sifted flour, chocolate chips and salt. Combine. Pinch off tablespoons of mixture and place on greased trays. Bake for 15 minutes or until firm. Cool on wire rack and place in airtight container. ; name: semi sweet chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, white sugar, brown sugar, egg, flour, oatmeal, baking soda, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre-heat oven to 350f. Cream butter, sugars and eggs until smooth. Combine flour, salt and baking soda together in a separate bowl. Mix wet ingredients with dry ingredients, and lastly stir in the oats and chocolate chips. Form into small balls with hands and bake on cookie sheets lined with parchment paper for 8-10 minutes or until very light golden, they should almost look un-cooked. Store in a tupperware box to keep them chewy. ; name: peanut butter chip chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, flour, cocoa, baking soda, salt, peanut butter chips ; preparation:Cream butter, sugar, eggs, and vanilla. Add flour, cocoa, baking soda, and salt. Mix well. Stir in peanut butter chips. Bake at 350 degrees for 8 - 10 minutes. ; name: soft and chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: sugar, brown sugar, margarine, vanilla, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. In large bowl, beat sugar, brown sugar and margarine until light and fluffy. Add vanilla and eggs. Blend well. Add flour, baking soda and salt. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop dough by rounded tablespoonfuls 2 inches apart onto ungreased cookie sheets. Bake at 375f for 8 to 10 minutes or until light golden brown. ; name: soft chewy chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: plain flour, baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, salt, vanilla extract, eggs, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. In a small bowl sift together flour and baking soda, set aside. In a large bowl, combine butter and both sugars. Beat on medium speed until light and fluffy, about 3 minutes. Reduce speed to low, add salt, vanilla, and eggs. Beat until well mixed, about 1 minute. Add flour mixture, mix until just combined. Stir in chocolate chips. Drop heaping spoonfuls about 2 inches apart onto baking trays lined with parchment paper. Bake until golden around the edges and soft in the middle, about 8-10 minutes. ; name: milo choc chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla essence, self-raising flour, chocolate chips, milo ; preparation:

name: frosty fruity smoothie ; ingredients: blueberries, unsweetened sliced peaches, milk, vanilla yogurt, honey, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg ; preparation:Combine blueberries or huckleberries, peaches and milk in a blender. Cover and process on high until smooth. Add yogurt, honey, cinnamon and nutmeg. Process until well blended. Serve immediately. ; name: afternoon smoothie ; ingredients: low-calorie cran-raspberry juice, ice cubes, raspberries, apple, raspberry low-fat yogurt, splenda sugar substitute ; preparation:Put juice and ice cubes in a blender. Mix until ice cubes are completely chopped. Add raspberries and apples. Mix until completely blended. Scoop in yogurt and add splenda. Blend to desired consistency. ; name: strawberry banana papaya smoothie ; ingredients: strawberries, banana, papaya nectar, sugar, ice cubes ; preparation:Wash then hull strawberries. Slice in half. Peel banana and slice into thirds. Place in a blender or food processor. Pour in juice and optional ice cubes. Whirl until pured and frothy. Pour into tall glasses and serve. ; name: green tea berry smoothie ; ingredients: water, green tea bag, ground flax seeds, oat bran, frozen mixed berries, low-fat vanilla yogurt, cranberry juice, honey ; preparation:Microwave water on high until boiling, about 45-60 seconds. Add tea bag and steep for 3 minutes. Meanwhile, in a blender or food processor, combine ground flaxseed, oat bran, berries, yogurt and juice and blend until smooth. Squeeze and remove tea bag and add tea to berry mixture, blending until smooth. Adjust consistency with additional water, if needed and sweeten with honey, if desired. Makes 1 large or 2 small servings. ; name: fruit shake ; ingredients: fresh peaches, strawberry, apple juice, vanilla frozen yogurt ; preparation:Combine peaches, strawberries, and apple juice in container of blender or food processor, process until smooth. Add frozen yogurt, and process until blended. Serve immediately. Can exchange fresh peaches with frozen ones. Use 2 cups frozen peach slices. ; name: creamy fresh cranberry and fruit salad ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, crushed pineapple, green grape, apples, miniature marshmallow, macadamia nuts, heavy cream ; preparation:Mince the cranberries in a food processor. Do this in two batches. Stir together the cranberries and sugar. Let sit and chill for about 8 hours. After about 8 hours, drain the cranberries well and stir in the well-drained crushed pineapple. Add the grapes and apples and stir. Then fold in the marshmallows and nuts. Let sit overnight in the refrigerator. A few hours before serving, whip the cream until it is becoming stiff. Fold into the fruit mixture. Chill until serving. ; name: banana coconut cream pie smoothie ; ingredients: light coconut milk, pineapple juice, vanilla, sugar, ground nutmeg, ice cubes, bananas, sweetened coconut, whipped cream ; preparation:Place coconut milk, pineapple juice, vanilla, sugar, nutmeg, ice cubes, and frozen banana pieces in a blender. Blend on high until mixture is frothy and ice cubes are finely ground, about 30 seconds to 1 minute. Pour into 4 glasses. Garnish with whipped cream and sprinkle on a little toasted coconut if desired. For vegan omit whipped cream. ; name: white cranberry peach banana smoothie ; ingredients: cranberry-peach juice, banana, vanilla yogurt, ice ; preparation:

name: southern style pecan fudge ; ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, cocoa powder, milk, vanilla, salt, pecans ; preparation:Butter a 9x5-inch pan. In a medium saucepan, heat sugar, butter, cocoa, milk, vanilla and salt over low heat, stirring until smooth. Stir in chopped pecans. Spread quickly in a buttered 9x5-inch loaf pan. Cool. Cut into squares. ; name: pecan butter cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool. ; name: sinfully delicious pecans ; ingredients: egg whites, vanilla extract, light brown sugar, georgia pecan halves ; preparation:Combine egg whites and vanilla. Add brown sugar. Mix well. Fold in pecan halves. Using a fork, individually remove pecan halves from mixture and place on a greased baking sheet. Bake for 20 minutes in 200 degree f oven. Cool completely before storing in an airtight container. ; name: pecan bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, milk, egg, pecans ; preparation:Sift dry ingredients together. Mix milk and egg and add to dry ingredients. Mix, do not beat. Stir in pecans. Baked in greased loaf pan in a 350 preheated oven about 1 hour. Best kept a day or two before eating. Freezes well, great thinly sliced with cream cheese. ; name: cinnamon toast pecans ; ingredients: butter, light corn syrup, sugar, ground cinnamon, salt, pecan halves ; preparation:Oreheat oven to 250 degrees f,. Stir together first 5 ingredients. Add pecans. Tossing to coat. Spread coated nuts in a single layer. On a jelly roll pan. Bake for 1 hour. Stirring everu 15 minutes. Let cool. Store in an airtight container. Up to 2 weeks. ; name: white chocolate pecan drop cookies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, light brown sugar, egg, vanilla extract, pecans, white chocolate ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. In a bowl, combinte the first 3 ingredients. Set aside. In a larger bowl, cream the butter with the sugars for 2 minutes or until smooth. Add in the egg and vanilla. Beat well. Add in the dry ingredients and mix thoroughly. Stir in the pecans and white chocolate. Drop by rounded teaspoonfuls onto ungreased cookie sheet. Bake for 10-12 minutes or until lightly golden. Let cookies cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes. Then tranfer to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: sand tarts ; ingredients: butter, sugar, pecans, all-purpose flour, powdered sugar ; preparation:Cream butter until soft. Add sugar, pecans, and flour, mixing well. Shape into balls and bake at 300 degrees on ungreased cookie sheet for 45 minutes. While hot, roll balls in powdered sugar. Roll in sugar again after all have been rolled once. ; name: noel pecan logs ; ingredients: powdered sugar, marshmallow cream, vanilla, caramels, margarine, pecans ; preparation:

name: spinach and cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, cottage cheese, flour, sharp cheddar cheese, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 inch baking dish. Drain spinach well. Saute onion and garlic in 2 tbsp of the melted butter until onion is translucent. Mix spinach with the eggs, cottage cheese, cheddar cheese, flour, and the remaining butter. Add the sauteed onions and garlic. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared dish and bake for 1 hour. ; name: vegetarian spinach cheese and sausage casserole ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, frozen spinach, mozzarella cheese, soy sausage, green onion, eggs, salt and pepper ; preparation:Thoroughly mix all ingredients. Pour mixture into a greased 9 inch pie plate. Bake at 350 for about 40 minutes or until center is set. Once out of the oven, i usually let it sit for 5 or 10 minutes. To serve, either cut into wedges, or squares, depending on what type of dish you used. ; name: scalloped spinach casserole ; ingredients: bacon, onion, eggs, spinach, flour, milk, salt and pepper, cracker crumb, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Butter an 8-inch square, 3-inch deep baking pan or casserole. Cook bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crisp. Drain off all but 1 tbls of the bacon grease. Add the onion to skillet and fry until tender but not browned, about 3 minutes. Beat the eggs in a large bowl, then add the spinach, flour and milk. Stir until well blended. Add the bacon-onion mixture and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper. Pour into prepared pan. Cover top with cracker crumbs and dot with butter. Bake until a knife inserted in center comes out clean, about 20 to 30 minutes. ; name: spinach cheese patties ; ingredients: low fat cottage cheese, egg yolks, flour, wheat germ, fresh spinach, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix together the first four ingredients. It gets thick and gooyey. Add spinach and mix again. Pour olive oil in a skillet. I use about 2 t. Get it hot. Fry the patties until golden brown. ; name: mashed potato spinach casserole ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt, pepper, butter, milk, frozen spinach, cheddar cheese, dill seed, chives ; preparation:Peel, cook and mash potatoes. Add sour cream, salt, pepper. Mix in enough milk to bring it to your favorite mashed potato consistency. Add spinach. Place in casserole dish and top with grated cheddar cheese. Bake in 350 oven for 20-30 minutes. We like to serve this with corn, which usually ends up mixed in with all the rest. ; name: chicken spinach pasta casserole ; ingredients: elbow macaroni, bacon, cooked chicken, french-fried onions, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, frozen chopped spinach, garlic powder, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Cook and drain pasta. Cook and crumble bacon. Cook and drain chicken. In a bowl combine soup, sour cream, spinach and garlic powder. Add pasta, bacon, chicken, 1 c fried onions and 1 c cheese. Spread into a baking dish. Bake at 375 for 30 minutes or until heated through. Top with extra onions and cheese. Bake another 3-5 minutes. ; name: spinach and cheese mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, salt and pepper, green onions, butter, spinach, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Set oven to 400 degrees. Butter a 2-quart casserole dish. In a large bowl, combine all ingredients, except the grated cheddar cheese. Spoon into prepared baking dish. Bake, uncovered for 15 minutes. Remove from oven, top with grated cheddar, bake for 5 minutes longer. If desired, roasted garlic may be added to mixture. ; name: spinach cheese casserole ; ingredients: frozen spinach, onion, garlic cloves, butter, eggs, low fat cottage cheese, all-purpose flour, low-fat sharp cheddar cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: spinach with olives and lemon ; ingredients: baby spinach, garlic cloves, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, rind of, kalamata olive, sea salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Wash the spinach and place in a large covered pan over low heat. Steam for 1-2 minutes until the spinach wilts. Drain well. Heat the garlic in 1 tablespoon of the olive oil until fragrant. Add the preserved lemon, olives and spinach. Cook for another minute, season with salt and pepper, and stir in the remaining olive oil. Serve immediately or chill and serve cold as a salad. ; name: white bean dip spread ; ingredients: cannellini beans, pesto sauce, lime juice, garlic clove, cumin, salt, parmesan cheese, extra virgin olive oil, whole grain baguette ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Drain the beans and add to a food processor or blender. Add pesto, lime juice, garlic, cumin, salt, parmesan cheese, and 1 tablespoon of the olive oil and process or blend until smooth. Cut the baguette into 1-inch slices and brush the remaining tablespoons of olive oil over them, then broil on the lower rack until lightly browned. Put the toasted baguette slices on a platter. Scrape the spread into a nice bowl and set it in the middle of the platter and serve. ; name: spinach with chickpeas ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, onion, cumin, cayenne pepper, turmeric, canned chick-peas, baby spinach, pimientos, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large, lidded skillet over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and cook for 2 minutes, or until golden, but not brown. Remove with a slotted spoon and discard. Add the onion and cumin, turmeric and cayenne and cook, stirring for about 5 minutes or until soft. Add the chickpeas and stir until coated with the oil and spices. Stir in the spinach with just the water clinging to it, cover and cook for 4-5 minutes until wilted. Uncover, stir in the pimientos and continue cooking, stirring gently until the liquid evaporates. Season to taste and serve. ; name: seasoned spinach ; ingredients: fresh spinach, green onion, sesame seeds, low sodium soy sauce, dark sesame oil, kosher salt, garlic cloves ; preparation:Steam half of spinach, covered, for 5 minutes or until the spinach wilts. Place steamed spinach in a colander. Repeat proceduce with remaining spinach. Cool slightly, and squeeze dry. Place spinach in a bowl. Add onions and remaining ingredients. Toss mixture well to combine. Serve chilled or at room temperature. ; name: spinach with rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, cooked rice, fresh spinach, carrot, garlic clove, italian dressing, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Generously spray a wok or non stick deep frypan with veggie spray. Heat to medium. Add cooked rice and grated carrot into wok and mix. Add minced garlic. Stir fry to heat through, about 2 or 3 minutes. Add spinach. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Turn over with a spatula several times to mix the spinach evenly with the rice mixture, heat and turn until the spinach is starting to wilt, about 3 minutes. Pour the italian dressing evenly over and turn several times to mix. Cook about 3 minutes or until the spinach is well wilted and the dressing is heated through. Serve immediately. ; name: warm bean and spinach salad ; ingredients: fresh spinach, cannellini beans, italian dressing, bell peppers, garlic powder, pepper, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Remove tough stems from spinach and tear into bite-sized pieces. Place in a large bowl. Add beans and set aside. Heat dressing and bell pepper to boiling, then reduce heat. Cook uncovered, for 2 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in garlic powder and pepper. Pour heated mixture over spinach and beans. Toss, then sprinkle with mozarella. Serve warm. ; name: saute spinach with garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, garlic, fresh spinach, salt & freshly ground black pepper, cooking spray ; preparation:In a large saut pan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add garlic, and cook until golden brown, 2 to 3 minutes. Using a slotted spoon, transfer garlic to paper towels. Reserve. Discard oil. Spray pan with cooking spray, and heat over medium heat. Coarsely chop spinach and stalks. Working in batches, add damp spinach to the pan. Cover, and cook until spinach just begins to wilt, 4 to 5 minutes. Transfer the cooked spinach to a metal bowl, and cook remaining spinach. Season with salt and pepper. Sprinkle reserved garlic over spinach, and serve warm. ; name: healthy spinach and cannellini bean dip ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, spinach, cannellini beans, lemon juice, balsamic vinegar, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: scrambled egg and bacon sandwich ; ingredients: bread, mayonnaise, egg, water, salt and pepper, bacon ; preparation:Slice the 2 slices bacon in half and cook to a crisp. Drain on paper towel, and pour drippings out of pan. Whip egg with water, add salt and pepper and scramble eggs in same pan in which the bacon was cooked. Remove egg to cool. After bread has toasted, spread with mayo and layer on eggs and bacon. Slice and serve with favorite breakfast beverage. ; name: spicy cod with tomatoes and spinach ; ingredients: cod, frozen chopped spinach, chopped tomatoes, tomatoes and green chilies, onion, shallots, garlic, tomato paste, cumin, olive oil ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a large pan over medium high heat. Add the onions, shallots, and garlic. Cook until the onion is translucent. Add all the tomatoes, the tomato paste, and the cumin. Stir and let it simmer 3-5 minutes or until it starts to thicken slightly. Add the spinach and stir until it is combined. Let it cook 2-3 minutes. Meanwhile chop the cod into small even pieces. Add it to the tomato sauce, stirring to make sure it is all covered with sauce. Let it simmer 5-8 minutes or until the fish is opaque and flakes easily with a fork. ; name: roasted cod with potatoes and olives ; ingredients: new potatoes, garlic cloves, dried rosemary, olive oil, salt and pepper, cod fish fillets, cherry tomatoes, kalamata olive ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 450f. On a large rimmed baking sheet, toss the potatoes with the garlic, rosemary, and 1 tbs oil. Season generously with salt and pepper. Arrange potatoes in a single layer, cut side down. Bake, tossing potatoes once, until beginning to brown, about 20 minute. Meanwhile, rub fillets with remaining tsp oil and season all sides with salt and pepper. Remove baking sheet from the oven. Add the tomatoes and olives to the potatoes. Stir to combine. Push the vegetable mixture to one side of the baking sheet and place the fillets flat on the baking sheet next to the vegetables. Return the baking sheet to the oven and roast until the fish is cooked through and potatoes are brown and tender, about 15-20 minute. Transfer the fish and vegetables to a serving platter and serve immediately. ; name: baked cod with cheese ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, sage, salt, pepper, swiss cheese, sour cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Wash and dry fish. Sprinkle both sides with sage, salt, and pepper. Place in greased shallow baking dish. Sprinkle cheese on top and cover with sour cream. Bake 25 minutes. Adjust sour cream, sage, salt, pepper to taste as desired. ; name: country style scrambled eggs ; ingredients: bacon, red potatoes, onion, green pepper, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium heat until crisp. Using a slotted spoon, remove to paper towels to drain. Cook and stir potatoes in drippings over medium heat for 12 minutes or until tender. Add onion and green pepper. Cook and stir for 3 or 4 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Stir in the reserved bacon. In a large bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Add to skillet. Cook and stir until eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with cheese and let stand until cheese has melted. ; name: panini with scrambled eggs and tomatoes ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, fresh black pepper, olive oil, pesto sauce, panini bread, tomatoes, provolone cheese ; preparation:In a bowl, mix eggs, milk, salt and pepper. In a skillet, heat oil at medium heat. Add the mixture of egg and cook, stirring often, until it makes big creamy pieces. Spread pesto in the panini, add scrambled eggs and garnish with slices of tomatoes and cheese. Heat another large skillet or a skillet with ridges at medium heat. Add panini and cook, pushing them, for about 8 minutes or until golden and crispy and cheese has melted. ; name: scrambled egg with smoked salmon ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, basil leaves, smoked salmon, salt, black pepper, butter ; preparation:Warm a pan and add the butter to coat it. Mix the egg and milk and pour into pan. Cooking on a warm to medium heat gently stir the eggs until almost ready for serving. When the mixture is still a little runny add the salmon and chopped basil. Cook for another minute so the salmon just starts to change colour. Serve on freshly toasted bread. Spinkle a little extra basil over. If you have any left also garnish with a twist of salmon. Eat at once. ; name: salt cod with scrambled eggs ; ingredients: salt cod fish, bacon, green pepper, tomatoes, eggs, black pepper ; preparation:

name: great eggplant dip ; ingredients: eggplant, onion, breadcrumbs, plain yogurt, cloves, parsley, cider vinegar, lemon juice, olive oil ; preparation:Place whole eggplant on oven tray. Bake in a hot oven for one hour or till soft. Remove from oven, cool slightly. Peel eggplant, chop flesh roughly. Combine flesh with remaining ingredients in food processor. Process till smooth. Refrigerate mixture overnight. ; name: green curry with chicken and eggplant ; ingredients: chicken, green curry paste, coconut milk, fish sauce, sugar, eggplant, bamboo shoot, kaffir lime leaves, basil leaves, red chili pepper ; preparation:Combine chicken with sauce ingredients and bring to a boil. Continue to simmer until chicken is done. Add eggplant, bamboo shoots and lime leaves. Cook until eggplant is tender. Garnish with basil leaves and chili pepper before serving. Serve with rice. ; name: curry yogurt dip ; ingredients: plain yogurt, green onions, mayonnaise, ketchup, curry powder ; preparation:Drain yogurt for 4 hours, or overnight. Combine drained yogurt, 1 tablespoon green onion, mayonnaise, ketchup and curry powder. Stir well. Garnish with remaining green onions. Refrigerate for at least 1 hour to blend flavours. ; name: spicy cajun dip ; ingredients: sun-dried tomato, reduced-fat cream cheese, nonfat plain yogurt, chili sauce, green pepper, green onion, garlic clove, celery seed, ground red pepper ; preparation:In small bowl, pour 1 cup boiling water over tomatoes. Let stand at room temperature 5-10 minutes. Drain and chop tomatoes. Meanwhile, in another small bowl, combine cream cheese, yogurt and chili sauce. Mix well. Add tomatoes and all remaining ingredients. Mix well. Refrigerate till serving time. Just before serving. Stir dip. Serve with cut up fresh veggies or garlic flavored bagel crisps. ; name: eggplant and potato indian ; ingredients: oil, black mustard seeds, potato, eggplant, coriander, cumin, turmeric, cayenne, salt ; preparation:Heat oil over medium-high heat in a big skillet. When hot, put in the mustard seeds. When they start to pop, put in the vegetables. Stir once. Add seasonings. Stir and fry for a minute. Add 3 tablespoons of water, lower heat, cover, and simmer 10-15 minutes. Stir every now and then. If vegetables stick, add a little water. Dish is done when the potatoes are tender. ; name: thai chicken and eggplant aubergine curry ; ingredients: unsweetened coconut milk, green curry paste, boneless skinless chicken breast, japanese eggplant, kaffir lime leaves, fish sauce, brown sugar, sweet basil, hot chili pepper, jasmine rice ; preparation:Heat coconut milk in wok and whisk curry paste in until smooth. Bring coconut milk to a boil, add chicken, then simmer for 8-10 minutes until chicken is opaque. Add eggplant, lime leaves, fish sauce, brown sugar. Taste for sweetness, saltiness etc, and correct if needed. Continue to simmer until eggplant is tender and chicken is cooked through, about 8-10 minutes more. Stir in basil leaves and chilies and serve with steamed jasmine rice. ; name: spicy thai one pot ; ingredients: cold water, soy sauce, cayenne pepper, meat, red bell pepper, jasmine rice, green onions, cilantro ; preparation:Combine water, soy sauce and cayenne pepper. Heat large wok or fry pan over high heat. Add meat and stir fry for 4-5 minutes or until browned. Add bell pepper. Stir fry for one more minute. Mix in rice and soy sauce mixture. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Mix in green onions and cilantro. Serve. ; name: roasted eggplant dip with thai flavors ; ingredients: eggplant, palm sugar, soy sauce, salt, chili paste, lime juice, fresh cilantro, green onions, cilantro leaf ; preparation:

name: roasted asparagus mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, fresh mushrooms, garlic cloves, salt, fresh ground black pepper, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees f. Arrange asparagus and mushrooms on aluminum foil-lined 15x10x1-inch jelly roll pan. Sprinkle garlic, salt and pepper on top. Drizzle melted butter over vegetables. Bake, stirring occasionally, for 15-20 minutes or until vegetables are tender and lightly browned. Serve immediately. ; name: pan roasted asparagus ; ingredients: olive oil, unsalted butter, asparagus spears, kosher salt, ground black pepper, lemon ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat. When butter has melted, add half of the asparagus to the skillet with. Using tongs, distribute spears in an even layer. Cover skillet. Cook until asparagus is bright green and still crisp, about 5 minutes. Uncover, increase heat to high and season asparagus with salt and pepper to taste. Cook until spears are tender and well-browned along one side, 5 - 7 minutes, using tongs to occasionally move spears from the center of the pan to the edge of the pan to ensure all are browned. Transfer to serving dish, adjust seasonings as needed and, if desired, squeeze lemon over spears. Serve immediately. ; name: roasted asparagus onions and mushrooms ; ingredients: asparagus, mushroom, red onion, olive oil, salt, pepper, garlic powder, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oven to 425f. Line a 10 x 15 inch rimmed baking sheet with foil. Place vegetables in pan and sprinkle with olive oil and toss until covered evenly. Sprinkle with salt, pepper and garlic powder. Roast 10 minutes, stir, sprinkle with parmesan cheese and roast an additional 10 to 15 minutes until vegetables are slightly charred and tender. ; name: asparagus with mushrooms fresh coriander ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, butter, mushroom, shallots, salt, fresh ground black pepper, fresh coriander ; preparation:Trim off tough part of asparagus stalk, about 2 to 3 inches from bottom. Use a vegetable peeler to scrap asparagus to about 1 inch from top. Cut asparagus on diagonal into 1 inch pieces. Melt butter in a non-stick frying pan. Add mushrooms and cook over high heat, tossing and shaking, until mushrooms are lightly browned. Add asparagus. Cook, stirring and tossing for about 1 minute. Add shallots, salt and pepper. Sprinkle with coriander. Cook for 30 seconds. ; name: oriental asparagus and mushrooms ; ingredients: green asparagus, sesame seed oil, garlic cloves, fresh mushrooms, white wine, soy sauce, unsalted cashews ; preparation:Wash and trim the asparagus. Cut the asparagus into pieces about 1 inch long, reserving. Heat the oil in a skillet or wok until hot. Add the garlic, the asparagus and mushrooms. Stir fry for about 2 minutes. Now add the wine, soy sauce, the asparagus. Mix well and stir fry for 2 more minutes. Serve warm. ; name: roasted asparagus and tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, balsamic vinegar, dried thyme leaves, garlic clove, salt, black pepper, brown sugar, grape tomatoes, asparagus ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 300 degrees f. Whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, thyme, garlic, salt, pepper and brown sugar. Cut the tomatoes in half and toss to combine with the olive oil mixture. Spread the tomatoes in a roasting pan and place in the oven. Cook, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes, or until the tomatoes are shrivelled. Break the ends from the asparagus at their natural breaking point. Add the tender lengths of asparagus to the tomatoes and continue to cook for 25 minutes or until the asparagus is tender. ; name: white asparagus with mushrooms in brown butter ; ingredients: white asparagus, sugar, unsalted butter, mushroom, shallots, fresh thyme, fresh lemon juice, parsley ; preparation:Bring a large pot of sugar-salted water to a boil. Add asparagus and cook until tender, 5 to 6 minutes. Drain and pat dry with paper towel. Melt the butter in a large skillet. When the butter begins to turn brown, add the mushrooms, and cook over fairly high heat, stirring often, until just tender, about 8 minutes. Add shallots and fresh thyme and stir until softened, for about 2 minutes. Add the asparagus and continue to cook until warmed through. Add lemon juice, chopped parsley and whole parsley leaves. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: roasted asparagus shiitake mushrooms ; ingredients: fresh asparagus, shiitake mushroom, extra virgin olive oil, coarse salt, balsamic vinegar, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:

name: cream filled oat bars ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, lemon rind, fresh lemon juice, all-purpose flour, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, butter, salt, baking soda ; preparation:Heat oven to 375f. Grease 9 x 9-inch square pan. Mix milk, lemon peel and lemon juice until thickened. Reserve. Mix remaining ingredients until crumbly. Press half of the crumbly mixture in pan. Bake about 10 minutes or until set. Spread milk mixture over baked layer. Sprinkle remaining crumbly mixture on milk mixture. Press gently into milk mixture. Bake about 20 minutes or until edge is golden brown and center is set but soft. Cool completely. ; name: oatmeal granola cookie balls ; ingredients: rolled oats, whole wheat flour, almond meal, salt, pure maple syrup, peanut butter, pure vanilla extract, unsweetened flaked coconut ; preparation:Mix wet ingredients. Mix dry ingredients. Combine until well incorporated. Use a cookie scoop to form dough into balls. Arrange on cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees for 9 minutes. ; name: chocolate oat delights ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, butter, milk, vanilla, flaked coconut, instant oats ; preparation:Combine sugar, cocoa, butter and milk in a saucepan. Bring to a boil. Add vanilla. Remove from heat and stir in coconut and oats. Drop by spoonfuls onto wax paper. Chill. ; name: lancaster farmhouse baked oatmeal ; ingredients: old fashioned oats, unsalted butter, milk, light brown sugar, ground cinnamon, salt, dried apple, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Butter a medium baking dish. Add the oats and butter to a heatproof mixing bowl. Pour 1 cup boiling water over them and let stand 5 minutes. Stir in the milk, brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt. When well mixed, stir in the apples. Spoon mixture into the prepared dish. Cover and bake for 35 minutes, then uncover and continue to cook for 5-10 minutes, until thick and bubbly. Spoon into bowls and serve hot with cream drizzled around the cereal and a dusting of cinnamon. ; name: healthier no bake chocolate oatmeal cookies ; ingredients: sugar, cocoa, milk, salt, peanut butter, butter, vanilla extract, rolled oats ; preparation:Mix sugar, cocoa, milk and salt in saucepan. Boil for one minute. Add peanut butter, butter, and vanilla to hot mixture. Stir until combined. Stir in oats thoroughly and drop by spoonfuls onto waxed paper. Cool thoroughly before removing from paper. ; name: oaties ; ingredients: sugar, butter, milk, vanilla, cocoa, rolled oatmeal, coconut ; preparation:Melt together sugar, butter and milk. Take off heat and mix in vanilla and cocoa until smooth. Stir in oatmeal and coconut. Drop by spoonfuls on waxed paper or foil. Chill. Can also be frozen. ; name: oatmeal treats ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, oil, evaporated milk, vanilla, oats, self-rising flour, salt, raisins, walnuts ; preparation:Combine eggs, sugar, oil, milk, and vanilla in mixing bowl. Combine oats, flour, and salt, and add to egg mixture. Stir in raisins and nuts. Drop by tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 12-14 minutes or until set. ; name: coconut cream oatmeal ; ingredients: flaked coconut, morton lite salt, water, quick-cooking oats, fat-free sweetened condensed milk, coconut extract ; preparation:

name: baked chicken lemon and pea risotto ; ingredients: olive oil, chicken breast fillets, leeks, lemon zest, arborio rice, chicken stock, frozen peas, lemon juice, parmesan cheese, mint ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200c 400f. Heat a fry pan over high heat add oil and chicken and cook for 3 mins each side or until well browned, set aside. Add leeks and zest to the pan and cook for 5 mins until leeks are golden. Place leek mix, rice and stock in a baking dish, cover tightly with lid or foil and bake for 20 mins. Add chicken and peas to the risotto and cover tightly and bake for further 20 mins. The risotto will be quite liquid at this stage. Stir the parmesan, lemon juice, mint and salt and pepper through the risotto. Stir for 2 mins to thicken then serve. ; name: simple asian lemon chicken ; ingredients: oil, chicken breast, frozen asian-style vegetables, red pepper, lemon jell-o gelatin, cornstarch, chicken broth, italian salad dressing, garlic cloves ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add chicken, and stir fry for about 4 minutes, or until cooked through. Add peppers and veggies. Cook about 2 minutes. Mix dry jello and cornstarch, in small bowl. Add broth, dressing, and garlic. Stir until jello is dissolved. Add to skillet. Reduce heat to medium. Cook about 3 minutes, or until sauce is thickened, stirring frequently. Serve over hot rice. ; name: brown rice and vegetable saute ; ingredients: quick-cooking brown rice, vegetable broth, olive oil, onion, broccoli florets, baby portabella mushrooms, garlic clove, thyme, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:Prepare rice as directed on box using broth of your choice. Meanwhile over medium-high heat, heat olive oil and add onion. Saute for 3 minutes, stirring often. Add broccoli and cover for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add mushrooms and remaining ingredients to pan and saute until mushrooms release their juices, approximately 5 minutes. Serve over brown rice. ; name: saucy chicken and green beans ; ingredients: green beans, boneless chicken breasts, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, cream of chicken soup, mayonnaise, lemon juice, curry powder, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Place greens in baking dish. Brown chicken in oil. Season with salt and pepper. Arrange chicken over green beans. In a bowl mix soup, mayo, lemon juice, and curry powder. Pour over chicken. Cover and bake at 375f for 40 minutes or until chicken juices run clear. Sprinkle with cheese. Let stand for 5 minutes. ; name: sweet tangy chicken ; ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, condensed tomato soup, water, brown sugar, vinegar, cooked rice ; preparation:Heat butter in skillet. Add chicken and cook until browned. Add soup, water, sugar and vinegar. Heat to a boil. Cover and cook over low heat 5 minute or until done. Serve over rice. ; name: broccomoli ; ingredients: broccoli, low-fat yogurt, onions, low-fat mayonnaise, lemon juice, chili powder, garlic clove ; preparation:Place all ingredients in a food processor and blend until very smooth. Chill at least a few hours before tasting. Can serve with chips, crackers, or as a veggie dip. Keeps well in fridge. Cooking time listed is for chilling time. ; name: chicken and rice oriental ; ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breast, betty crocker chicken helper chicken and herb rice, hot water, soy sauce, brown sugar, crunchy peanut butter, frozen oriental-style vegetables ; preparation:Melt butter in 10 inch skillet over high heat. Cook chicken in butter 3 to 5 minutes, stirring occasionally, until outside turns white. Stir in uncooked rice, sauce mix, and hot water. Heat to boiling, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat and cover. Simmer about 9 minutes, stirring occasionally, until most of the liquid is absorbed. Stir in soy sauce, brown sugar and peanut butter and stir until peanut butter is melted. Stir in vegetables. Heat to boiling, stirring frequently. Stir before serving. ; name: chicken saffron risotto low fat ; ingredients: arborio rice, chicken stock, chicken breasts, leek, saffron strands, lemon, zest of, lemon juice, frozen peas ; preparation:

name: creamy chicken pies ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, vegetable soup, milk, pepper, cooked chicken, cream cheese, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits ; preparation:In a medium saucepan stir flour into soup. Stir in milk and pepper. Cook and stir over medium heat till mixture is thickened and bubbly. Cook for 1 minute more. Stir in chicken and cream cheese. Heat through, stirring to melt cream cheese. Pour hot chicken mixture into three 10-ounce. Custard cups. Separate the biscuits and arrange 2 biscuits atop each custard cup. Bake in a 375 degree oven for 12 to 15 minutes or till biscuits are golden brown. ; name: hot chicken casserole ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, cooked chicken, slivered almonds, celery, water chestnuts, potato chips ; preparation:In large bowl, combine first 4 ingredients. Stir until smooth, then mix in the remainder of the ingredients. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of either crumbled potato chips or chow mien noodles. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. ; name: easiest chicken pot pie ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup, cooked chicken breasts, crescent rolls, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving. ; name: chicken egg pie ; ingredients: crescent roll dough, cheddar cheese, bacon, cooked ham, eggs, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Unroll crescent dough. Separate into triangles. Arrange in a greased 9 inch pie plate, forming crust. Seal seams and perforations. Sprinkle with 1 cup cheese, bacon and ham. In a bowl, beat eggs, milk, salt and pepper. Pour over the ham. Sprinkle with remaining cheese. Cover edges of crust loosely with foil. Bake at 350 for 20 to 25 minutes. Remove foil. Bake 20 minutes longer or until a knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: basic chicken pot pie ; ingredients: onion, flour, margarine, mixed vegetables, chicken broth, milk, cooked chicken, pie crust ; preparation:Melt butter, add onions- saut for a minute, add flour, mix till pasty, add broth and milk. Stir constantly until creamy and thick,. Add veggies & chicken. Dump into a pie crust. Freeze now for later or bake 40-50 minutes at 350. ; name: super easy chicken broccoli pie ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, frozen chopped broccoli, sharp cheddar cheese, eggs, bisquick, milk, dried onion flakes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. In a greased pie plate, mix chicken, broccoli, 2 cups of cheddar, and onion flakes. In a separate bowl, whisk together eggs, bisquick, milk, salt, and pepper. Pour egg mixture over chicken mixture. Bake 30-40 minutes or until an inserted knife comes out clean. Sprinkle remaining cheese over the top and bake a few more minutes until it melts. Let cool slightly before cutting. ; name: chicken and rice with bacon ; ingredients: chicken pieces, bacon, rice, cream of chicken soup, chicken broth, milk, salt, pepper, poultry seasoning, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Line large baking dish with bacon. Pour rice evenly over top of bacon. Place chicken on top of rice. Season chicken with salt, pepper, poultry seasoning and paprika. Mix together soup, broth, milk and pour over chicken and rice. Cover and bake for 3 hours at 325. Uncover and bake for 15 minute more. ; name: chicken and cheese pie ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cooked rice, cream of chicken soup, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: almond sponge cake ; ingredients: egg whites, baking soda, salt, sugar, cornstarch, almond meal ; preparation:Whip the egg whites till very stiff with salt and baking soda. Add the sugar a little at a time while continuously beating. Mix cornstarch and almonds. Fold into meringue. Spread batter into two circles, roughly 21 cm in diameter, on baking paper. Bake in the middle of the oven at 150 degrees celcious for about an hour. Let cool on a grill. ; name: flourless lemon almond cake ; ingredients: blanched slivered almonds, sugar, eggs, lemon zest, ground cinnamon, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f and butter and flour a 9-inch cake pan with high sides, line bottom with parchment paper. Finely grind almonds with 2 tablespoons of sugar in food processor. Mix yolks, 2 tablespoons sugar, lemon zest, cinnamon and a pinch of salt in a bowl until thick and smooth. Add almond mixture, stir. Separately beat egg whites until soft peaks form, then gradually add 4 tablespoons sugar, beating until egg whites are stiff but not dry. Fold half of egg whites gently into almond mixture, then add other half and finish folding in gently. Transfer to prepared pan. Bake until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean, about 30-35 minutes. Cool on rack, turn out onto serving platter. ; name: low fat lemon tea cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, baking soda, salt, milk, egg, oil, lemon juice, poppy seeds ; preparation:Mix flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a large bowl. Make a well in the middle, set aside. Mix the rest of the ingredients together in another medium sized bowl. Pour it in the middle of the dry ingredients, and stir just until it is mixed together. If you overstir it, it will become a tough piece of crap. Preheat an oven to 350 degrees and wait 2 minutes. Grease a loaf pan. Bake for about 45 minutes, until the crust is brown and if you stick a toothpick inside it will come out clean. ; name: lemongrass pound cake ; ingredients: unsalted butter, caster sugar, eggs, milk, heavy cream, lemongrass, cake flour, baking powder ; preparation:In a saucepan, bring milk, heavy cream and lemongrass to a simmer. Remove from heat and let steep, covered for about 30 minutes strain cream mixture through a sieve into a bowl. Generously butter a bundt pan and dust with flour, knocking out excess flour. Sift together cake flour and baking powder. Repeat sifting into another bowl. Flour will have been sifted 3 times total. Beat together butter and sugar at medium-high speed until pale and fluffy. Add eggs 1 at a time, beating well after each addition. Reduce speed to low and add half of the flour, then all of the cream, then remaining flour, mixing well after each addition. Scrape down side of bowl, then beat at medium-high speed for about 2 minutes batter will become creamier and satiny. Pour batter into buttered and dusted pan and hit pan against work surface once or twice lightly to eliminate any air bubbles. Bake at a 160c pre-heated oven until golden brown and a wooden pick or a skewer inserted in the middle of the cake. ; name: lemon lava cake ; ingredients: lemon cake mix, instant lemon pudding, milk, sugar, water, lemon juice, powdered sugar ; preparation:Prepare cake mix as directed on box. Pour cake mixture into greased 9x13 baking dish. Combine dry pudding, milk, sugar, water, and lemon juice in bowl. Whisk together for 2 minutes until well combined and slightly thickened. Pour pudding mixture over cake mixture in pan. Do not spread it. Place baking dish onto a cookie sheet to catch any drips while baking. Bake at 350 for 55 minutes to an hour. Allow to cool 20 minutes while sauce thickens slightly. Dust with powdered sugar. ; name: low fat citrus pound cake ; ingredients: butter recipe cake mix, instant lemon pudding mix, mandarin orange sections, egg substitute, powdered sugar ; preparation:Place the cake mix and pudding mix in a large bowl and stir well. Add the mandarin oranges in their liquid and the egg substitute. Beat for about 2 minutes or until the mixture is smooth and the oranges are pureed. Spray a 12-cup bundt pan well and spread batter evenly. Bake for 35-40 minutes, until the top springs back when touched and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean. Allow cake to cool in the pan for 45 minutes, then invert onto a platter. Sprinkle powdered sugar on top, if desired. ; name: grandma chin s sponge cake ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, salt, vanilla, butter, milk, flour, baking powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Beat eggs until light. Beat in sugar, salt and vanilla. Beat in milk and butter. Add dry ingredients very quickly and pour into a greased 9x13 pan. Bake 25 to 35 minutes or until toothpick placed in middle comes out clean. Serve with strawberries and whipped cream. ; name: easy lemon sponge cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, self-raising flour, lemon juice, lemon, rind of ; preparation:

name: easy beef and noodle skillet ; ingredients: ground beef, egg noodles, mixed vegetables, diced tomato, beef stew seasoning, cheddar cheese, water ; preparation:Brown beef, drain. Add water, tomatoes, veggies, seasoning and noodles. Simmer until noodles are tender. Turn off power. Sprinkle cheese on top, cover till melted. ; name: beef noodle bake ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, tomato sauce, seasoning salt, pepper, cream-style cottage cheese, cream cheese, medium noodles ; preparation:Cook beef, onion and pepper in skillet until meat is browned and vegetables are tender. Drain. Stir in tomato sauce, seasoned salt, and pepper. Blend cottage cheese and cream cheese together until fluffy. Spoon noodles into grease 10x6x2 inch baking dish. Spread cheese mixture over noodles. Pour meat sauce on top. Bake uncovered at 350 for 30 to 40 minutes or until heated through. ; name: johns noodles ; ingredients: ground beef, ramen noodles, diced tomatoes with juice, peas, sour cream, onion, salt, pepper, hot sauce ; preparation:In large skillet brown the ground beef, and onion. Drain. Add 6 cups of water to skillet and bring to boil. Add mr. Noodles. Bring to boil. Add tomatoes, peas, salt, pepper and hot sauce, stir well. Add beef and onion mixture, stir well to mix. Reduce heat to simmer and simmer for 5 minutes. Add sour cream mixing well. ; name: simply delicious skillet dinner ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, parsley, tomato paste, water, sugar, salt, pepper, egg noodles, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Brown beef and onion, drain and add parsley. Combine tomato paste, water. And spices in a bowl. Add to ground beef. Cover and simmer 10 minutes. Add noodles and cover and cook until tender, stirring occasionally. Remove. From heat and sprinkle with cheese. ; name: cheesy beef noodles ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato sauce, taco seasoning, sharp cheddar cheese, egg noodles ; preparation:Brown and drain ground beef. Cook and drain noodles. Mix ground beef, tomato sauce and taco seasoning. Spread noodles in the bottom of a 9x13 pan. Spread beef mixture over noodles. Mix slightly. Cover with cheese. Bake 350 for about 20 minutes until heated though and cheese is melted. ; name: seafood pasta ; ingredients: thin spaghetti, bay scallop, medium shrimp, garlic cloves, butter, onion salt, worcestershire sauce, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place spaghetti into 2 quarts boiling water to which 2 heaping teaspoons salt has been added. Cook for 6 to 8 minutes or till your desired doneness. Drain and serve. Over medium heat, melt butter in saute pan, add garlic and remaining seasonings, stir. Add shrimp and scallops, saute just until shrimp are no longer translucent, do not overcook. Serve over spaghetti topped with parmesan cheese and additional butter if desired. ; name: rosemary beef and tomato over noodles ; ingredients: butter, onion, beef base, salt, pepper, beef stew meat, wide egg noodles, plum tomatoes, fresh rosemary ; preparation:In a 4-6 quart slow cooker, combine butter, onion, beef base, salt, pepper and beef. Mix well. Cover. Cook on low for 9-10 hours. About 15 minutes before serving, cook noodles as directed on package. Add tomatoes and rosemary to beef and mix well. Increase heat to high. Cover and cook an additonal 10 minutes. Serve beef over noodles. ; name: super suppers beef and noodles ; ingredients: thin egg noodles, ground beef, onion, green pepper, garlic, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: buttered herb noodles ; ingredients: egg noodles, water, salt, butter, fresh parsley, fresh chives, fresh rosemary, pepper ; preparation:Cook noodles in boiling water and salt in dutch oven for 10-12 min, stirring occasionally, until tender but firm. Drain well. Turn into large bowl. Add remaining 6 ingredients. Toss until well coated. ; name: buttered noodles with garlic and sun dried tomatoes ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, garlic cloves, sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, tomato paste, fresh parsley, salt and pepper ; preparation:Melt butter in small sauce pan. Add garlic and cook under low heat for about five minutes. Add tomatoes and tomato paste and stir until well blended. Combine noodles, sauce and chopped parsley in a large bowl. Toss until well mixed. Salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately. ; name: egg noodles ; ingredients: white flour, egg, egg yolks, salt, vegetable oil, water ; preparation:In a large bowl combine flour and salt. Make a well. Mix together the wet ingredients and pour into well. Mix well. Turn out onto a floured board and knead until firm, shiny and elastic. At this point cover and chill for 1 hour, up to 24 hours. When ready to use follow instructions for manual pasta machine or cut into manageable pieces and roll out to desired thickness, cut into desired shape. ; name: buttered noodles with eggs and parmesan cheese ; ingredients: noodles, eggs, parmesan cheese, parsley, salt, black pepper, butter ; preparation:Cook noodles in a large pot of lightly salted water until al dente. While the pasta is cooking, place the eggs, grated cheese, parsley, salt and pepper into a mixing bowl and beat with a whisk until well combined. When the noodles are almost cooked, melt the butter in a large nonstick skillet over medium heat. Quickly drain the pasta and add it to the skillet. Toss briefly to coat it with the butter. Add the egg mixture to the skillet and using a flat wooden spoon, mix quickly together for less than a minute until the eggs and noodles become creamy and thick. Do not cook the eggs too long or they will scramble and ruin the dish. Serve immediately. ; name: rice herbs ; ingredients: oil, long grain rice, onion, green pepper, chicken broth, salt, dried oregano, bay leaf, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place oil in a large saucepan coated with cooking spray. Place pan over med-high heat until pan is hot. Add rice and saut until golden brown. Add onion and pepper. Saut till tender. Add chicken broth, salt, oregano and bay leaf. Bring to boil and then reduce heat. Simmer 20 minutes. Remove from stove and let sit for about 5 minutes, or till liquid is absorbed. Remove bay leaf and stir in parsley. ; name: chicken noodle soup ii ; ingredients: chicken pieces, rosemary, hot water, pepper, celery, salt, carrot, thin egg noodles, dried basil ; preparation:In a 5-qt casserole combine chicken, 4 cups hot water, celery, carrots, basil, rosemary, pepper and salt. Microwave at high 30-40 minutes, or until chicken falls easily from the bone, stirring twice during cooking. Remove chicken from the bones. Discard bones and skin. Dice meat and return to caserole. Add 2 cups hot water and noodles. Cover. Microwave at high 8-10 minutes, or until water boils. Then, microwave at high 7-10 minutes, or until noodles are tender. ; name: buttered noodles with fresh sage ; ingredients: egg noodles, butter, onion, fresh sage leaves, salt, black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions. Drain. Melt butter in the empty pot. Simmer onion and sage leaves 5 minutes. Add salt and pepper. Toss with noodles. Top with parmesan cheese just before serving. ; name: noodles herbs ; ingredients: egg noodles, thyme leaves, basil leaves, parsley, chives, butter ; preparation:

name: cinnamon thins ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, egg, all-purpose flour, baking powder, salt, cinnamon ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar until light and fluffy. Add egg and beat well. Combine flour with baking powder and salt. Add to creamed mixture and mix well. Drop onto greased cookie sheet in marble-sized balls. Press flat with bottom of greased glass dipped in the sugar-cinnamon mixture. Bake in 350f oven 10 minutes. Remove from cookie sheet and cool. ; name: animal crackers ; ingredients: oatmeal, honey, salt, flour, baking soda, butter, buttermilk ; preparation:Blend oatmeal in blender. Add next 4 ingredients in bowl with oatmeal. Cut in butter and mix in buttermilk. Roll thin layer and cut in shapes. Bake at 400 10 minutes. Yum yum. ; name: whole wheat graham cracker cookies ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda, butter, honey ; preparation:Mix together flour, cinnamon, baking powder, baking soda. In a seperate bowl combine honey and butter then pour into dry ingredients. Mix well then drop onto a greased baking sheet. Press out the mixture to the corners of the baking sheet. Bake at 400 for 10 minutes. Cut them quickly when they come out or use cookie cutter for fun shapes. ; name: cracker cookies ; ingredients: dates, nuts, eagle brand condensed milk, cracker, butter, vanilla, powdered sugar, milk ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients together. Put in double boiler, cook till thick. Cool. Spread on townhouse crackers. Place on greased cookie sheet. Bake at 300 degrees for 10 minutes. Cool, then ice. ; name: flax meal cinnamon muffins south beach ; ingredients: eggs, canola oil, sugar-free syrup, water, vanilla, ground flax seeds, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Beat together eggs, oil, syrup, water and vanilla. Set aside. In small bowl, combine flaxmeal, baking soda, baking powder, cinnamon and salt. Slowly stir dry ingredients into egg mixture. Let stand 5 minutes. Spoon batter into 10 well-greased muffin tins. Bake at 350 for 12-15 minutes or until muffins are lightly browned and seem set to the touch. Remove from muffin pan immediately and allow to cook on rack. Store in refrigerator. ; name: low fat cinnamon rolls ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, water, cinnamon ; preparation:Mix the first three ingredients together. Then mix in the water. Knead the dough on a firm surface. Take 2 tablespoons of dough and dip it in cinnamon. Roll it with a rolling pin. Bake at 450 degrees for 10 minutes. ; name: danish cinnamon bars ; ingredients: egg, all-purpose flour, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, vanilla, granulated sugar ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. Beat egg. Add remaining ingredients except granulated sugar and mix well. Press dough into ungreased 13x9x2 inch pan. Sprinkle granulated sugar evenly over bars. Bake 15 to 20 minutes. Cool slightly. Cut into bars. Cool completely. Remove from pan and store in airtight container. ; name: cinnamon crackers ; ingredients: flax seed meal, almond flour, splenda granular, cinnamon, water ; preparation:

name: honey garlic chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, flour, honey, soy sauce, garlic cloves, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. In a bowl with tight fitting lid, put the flour. Add chicken, in batches, and shake to coat. Shake off excess flour and place pieces in a greased 8x8 baking dish,. Making sure not to lay them flat. They should have the same shape as they were in the package. In a small bowl, mix the honey, soy sauce, garlic and seasonings. Pour evenly over the chicken. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake an additional 15 minutes, basting occasionally with the sauce. Serve. ; name: sweet spicy garlic grilled chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, pepper jelly, garlic cloves, fresh parsley, dried italian herb seasoning, oil, seasoning salt ; preparation:Combine jelly, garlic, herbs, and oil. Spread mixture between skin and meat of each thigh. Place in a large ziplock bag with thighs. Refrigerate overnight. Prepare grill. Remove chicken sprinkle lightly seasoned salt. Cook marinade for 5 minutes over medium low flame. Grill 25-30 minutes, turning occasionally until cooked throughout. Discard skin if you want before serving. Top with spicy marinade. ; name: spicy sweet chicken thighs ; ingredients: lemon juice, molasses, worcestershire sauce, garlic, skinless chicken thighs, cooking spray, salt, pepper, lemon wedge ; preparation:Combine first five ingredients in a plastic zip-locked bag. Marinate for 1 hour, turning occasionally. Preheat oven to 425. Remove chicken from bag and reserve marinade. Arrange chicken in a shallow baking dish coated with cooking spray. Pour reserved marinade over chicken. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake at 425 for 20 minutes, baste chicken with marinade. Bake an additional 20 minutes or until chicken is done. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: honey fried chicken ; ingredients: chicken legs, chicken tenderloins, flour, garlic salt, ground pepper, honey, vegetable oil ; preparation:Combine flour, garlic salt and pepper in mixing bowl.
