Brush chicken with honey. Coat with flour mixture. Fry in oil to a nice golden brown, taking care as the chicken can burn rather easy. Turn often. Serve with mashed potatoes, a vegetable and gravy. ; name: thai grilled chicken thighs ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, fresh basil, fresh coriander, ginger, garlic, chili, soy sauce, fish sauce, olive oil, brown sugar ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except chicken in a bowl. Mix thoroughly. Add chicken and leave to marinate at least one hour, preferably longer. Grill chicken on the bbq, hotplate or in the griller until golden brown and cooked through. Ususlly you would expect 12 thigh fillets to feed 4 to 6 people- in my family the kids eat 4 each so this recipe serves 3. ; name: lemon garlic roasted chicken thighs ; ingredients: skinless chicken pieces, lemons, lemon juice, garlic, olive oil, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Spray a deep baking dish, or roaster with non stick spray. Combine 1 tbs of olive oil, the juice and zest of both lemons, plus the additional lemon juice, and the 4 cloves of garlic minced in a small bowl. Place the chicken in the roasting pan. Sprinkle liberally with the lemon pepper salt. Pour the lemon mixture over all- you can throw the lemon rinds into the baking dish too. Bake at 400 for about 45 minutes to an hour, turning the chicken over halfway through baking. I sometimes make this, and seal it in a ziplock bag in the freezer, then when you are ready, thaw, dump in the roaster and bake- just adding the lemon pepper salt. My family likes this when i take the sauce from the chicken, combine it with a small amount of half and half and serve it over pasta. ; name: ginger hot thighs ; ingredients: chicken thighs, olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, red wine, gingerroot, ground cumin, chili powder, fresh parsley ; preparation:In large, nonstick skillet over medium heat, heat oil. Add chicken. Cook 7 to 8 minutes on each side, or until browned. In small bowl, combine onion, garlic, wine, ginger, cumin and chili powder. Add mixture to skillet. Partially cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook about 20 to 30 minutes, or until chicken is fork tender and liquid has been reduced to a glaze. To serve, sprinkle with parsley. ; name: sweet bbq chicken thighs ; ingredients: chicken thigh, honey, garlic cloves, ginger, soy sauce ; preparation:

name: cheesy chicken and rice bake ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, water, white rice, onion powder, ground black pepper, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cheddar cheese, salt & pepper ; preparation:Mix soup, water, rice, onion powder and black pepper in 2-qt shallow baking dish. Top with chicken. Sprinkle chicken with additional pepper & salt. Cover and bake at 375 for 45 min or until chicken is no longer pink and rice is done. Uncover and sprinkle cheese over chicken. ; name: cheesy rice and broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli florets, chicken broth, minute white rice, cheese ; preparation:Place broccoli and broth in medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Stir in rice, cover. Remove from heat. Let stand 5 minutes. Stir in cheese, cover. Let stand 5 minutes. Stir until cheese is melted. ; name: cheesy broccoli rice casserole ; ingredients: frozen chopped broccoli, cream of broccoli soup, broccoli cheese soup, velveeta cheese, minute rice, butter, chicken in a biscuit crackers ; preparation:Melt the soups and velveeta in microwave until smooth. Stir in broccoli and rice. Pour miixture into a greased 13 x 9 pan or glass baking dish. Stir cracker crumbs into melted butter. Sprinkle bread crumbs over casserole. Cover with foil and bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake 10-15 minutes longer or untilcasserole is golden brown. ; name: cheesy broccoli noodle soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chicken broth, fine egg noodles, frozen chopped broccoli, salt, garlic powder, fresh ground pepper, milk, american cheese ; preparation:Heat olive oil in large saucepan. Add onion and saute over medium heat till onions are golden. Add chicken broth and bring to a boil. Add salt and noodles. Cook uncovered for about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in broccoli and garlic powder and cook for another 4 minutes. Add milk, cheese and pepper stirring constantly until the cheese is melted. ; name: too easy cheesy chicken broccoli and rice casserole ; ingredients: broccoli and cheese flavored rice mix, boiling water, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic powder, frozen broccoli, low-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees and boil water. In a 13x9 casserole dish, combine rice and contents of seasoning packet. Add boiling water to dish and mix well. Add chicken, sprinkle with garlic powder. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Add broccoli and cheese. Cover and continue to bake for another 8-10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink in center. ; name: easy broccoli and rice ; ingredients: condensed cream of chicken soup, water, milk, rice, frozen broccoli florets, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix all the ingredients except the cheese in a 2 quart casserole dish. Cover and put in the oven until rice is tender. Remove from oven and add cheese to taste, wait about 2 minutes or until cheese has melted - there will be a little liquid left, you can let it sit longer for the rice to absorb it. Serve and enjoy. ; name: healthy cheesy broccoli casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, flour, low-fat milk, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, mustard, dried onion flakes, reduced-fat cheese, broccoli, corn flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Stir the flour, milk, chicken broth, mustard, and onion flakes in a glass baking dish. Microwave on high for 4-6 minutes, stirring well every 2 minutes until the cream sauce is thick and bubbly. While cooking the cream sauce, steam the broccoli for about 4 minutes. Mix the cheese into the cream sauce. Put the broccoli and diced chicken in a 9 x 13 pan. Pour the cheese sauce over the top. Mix the cornflakes and parmesan together, and pour over the top. Broil until golden brown. ; name: chic broc chee rice ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, onion, butter, instant rice, cream of chicken soup, milk, garlic salt, pepper, provolone cheese ; preparation:

name: creamy dill pickled potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, pickle juice, mayonnaise, mustard powder, onion, fresh dill, dill pickle, eggs, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Put the potatoes in a large bowl. Sprinkle with the pickle juice and gentle toss. Mix 1 cup mayonnaise with mustard, onion, dill, pickle and eggs add to potatoes stirring in and season with salt and pepper. Adding more mayonnaise to the creaminess you desire. Serve room temperature or chilled. ; name: new potato salad for a crowd ; ingredients: red potatoes, hard-boiled egg, onion, dill pickle, celery seed, sour cream, mayonnaise, salt & pepper ; preparation:Peel, cube, and boil potatoes in large pot of salted water. In another pan, boil eggs. When both have been cooked through, drain and let cool. Peel eggs and chop. In large mixing bowl add cooled potatoes, chopped egg, onion, pickles, and celery seed, salt and pepper. Add sour cream and mayonnaise and stir gently to combine being careful not to mash potatoes. Refrigerate until completely cooled before serving or overnight. ; name: dilled scandinavian style potato salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, red onion, radishes, fresh peas, hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, fresh dill, salt and pepper, fresh parsley, fresh dill sprig ; preparation:Add potatoes to large saucepan. Cover with water and bring to a boil. Cook until tender about 20 minutes. Drain and cool slightly. When cool enough to handle cut into halves or wedges. Transfer to large serving bowl. Add remaining ingredients. Toss gently. Cover and chill for at least 1 hour to meld flavors. Serve chilled or at room temperature, garnished. ; name: kittencal s dill and sour cream potato salad with eggs ; ingredients: baby potatoes, radishes, hard-boiled eggs, green onions, sour cream, sugar, garlic powder, fresh dill, seasoning salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Wash and scrub the outside of the new potatoes. Place into pot and cover with cold water. Add in 2 tablespoons salt and bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Cook intil just fork tender. Remove to a bowl and cool to room temperature. Slice the cooled potatoes in half. Add in green onions and sliced eggs. Toss to combine. In a small or medium bowl bowl combine the sour cream with sugar, garlic powder, fresh dill and seasoned salt. Pour over the potatoes and toss to combine. Season with black pepper to taste if desired. Chill for a minimum of 3 or more hours before serving. ; name: mustard potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, green onions, dill pickles, mayonnaise, mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes for 20 minutes. In the meantime mix the rest of the ingredients together in a bowl. Peel potatoes and chop into bite size pieces. Add chopped potatoes to mixture in bowl and carefully combine until everything is mixed up. Either chill in fridge or serve at once. ; name: yankee potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, mayonnaise, red wine vinegar, fresh dill, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Boil the potatoes whole for about 20-30 minutes or until easily pierced with a fork. Drain and cool completely. Large dice the potatoes. Plece in a bowl with enough room for stirring. Add the remaining ingrdients, using salt and pepper to taste. Stir and chill until ready to serve. Feel free to add more sour cream if salad seems dry. ; name: easy loaded baked potato salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, salt & pepper, sour cream, cheddar cheese, green onions, bacon bits ; preparation:Cut potatoes into bite sized pieces. Boil for about 12 minutes or until fork tender. Drain potatoes and allow to cool completely. Add remaining ingredients. All of which can be adjusted to your liking. ; name: red skin potato and dill salad ; ingredients: red potatoes, sour cream, mayonnaise, fresh dill, celery, onion, garlic, cracked black pepper, salt ; preparation:

name: warm bean and herb salad ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic, italian parsley, basil leaves, rosemary, sage leaves, cannellini beans, salt & freshly ground black pepper, lemon, juice of, oil-cured black olive ; preparation:In a large saute pan combine the oil, garlic and herbs. Warm over very low heat for about 4 minutes. Add the beans and salt and pepper to taste. Toss gently. Cook over low heat until the beans are warm and have absorbed the flavors of the olive oil, about 5 mins. Remove from the heat, add lemon juice and toss gently. Arrange beans on a platter and surround with olives. Serve immediately. Makes 4 servings. ; name: green bean and mint salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, red onion, garlic cloves, of fresh mint, lemon, juice and zest of, dijon mustard, olive oil, sour cream, tabasco sauce, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a small bowl, whisk together the garlic, mint, lemon zest and juice, and mustard. While whisking, slowly add the olive oil and whisk until thick and emulsified. Whisk in the sour cream and tabasco sauce. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Put green beans and red onion into a large bowl. Pour the dressing over the beans and toss well. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or up to 24 hours before serving. The 30 minutes is not cooking time, but is the time allowed to blend the flavors while in the refrigerator. ; name: green bean and basil salad ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, vinegar, fresh basil leaf, garlic, salt, fresh ground black pepper, scallions ; preparation:Steam the green beans for about 10 minutes, until tender. You can also cook them in the microwave for about 4 minutes. Set aside in a bowl. Whisk together the oil, vinegar and seasonings. Pour this over the green beans. Add the scallions and toss gently. Cover and place in the fridge until cold. The flavor really intensifies if you let the salad chill for 24 hours. ; name: mixed bean and tomato salad ; ingredients: fresh green beans, balsamic vinegar, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, black pepper, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil, red onion, feta cheese ; preparation:Cook green and yellow beans in boiling water for 5 minutes. Drain beans and put in a bowl of ice water to stop the cooking, then drain. Combine vinegar, oil, salt and pepper with a whisk in a large bowl. Add beans, onion and tomatoes and toss gently. Cover and refrigerate. Right before serving, add basil and feta cheese and toss. ; name: three can bean salad ; ingredients: olive oil, lemon juice, dried rosemary, corn kernels, black beans, ham ; preparation:In medium-sized bowl, combine oil, lemon juice, and rosemary. Add drained corn and beans. Break ham into chunks with fork. Add to bowl. Toss all ingredients together. Refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: simple italian bean salad ; ingredients: spring onions, garlic cloves, red chile, cannellini beans, butter beans, olive oil, white wine vinegar, salt and pepper, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine the spring onions, garlic and chili. Add the three cans of beans and mix thoroughly. Whisk together the olive oil and white wine vinegar and season. Drizzle over the bean salad and stir in with the parsley. Serve straight away or refrigerate until ready. ; name: green bean cherry tomato and basil salad ; ingredients: green beans, shallot, red wine vinegar, salt and pepper, extra virgin olive oil, cherry tomatoes, fresh basil leaves ; preparation:Bring large pot of salted water to a boil. Add the green beans and cook about 4 minutes. Drain and set aside on a towel to cool. In large bowl, stir together shallot, vinegar, salt and pepper. Set aside for 15 minutes, then whisk in oil. Add cherry tomatoes and toss. Add beans and basil and toss again. Adjust seasoning. ; name: hot white bean salad ; ingredients: butter, shallots, garlic clove, white beans, fresh parsley, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, olive oil, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: shiitake bok choy soup ; ingredients: dried shiitake mushrooms, carrots, onion, soy sauce, sesame oil, sugar, salt and pepper, ground ginger, bok choy ; preparation:In a soup pot, combine onion, carrot and mushrooms. Add 5 cups water. Bring to a boil and simmer until the carrots and mushrooms are soft. Add sesame oil, sugar, ginger and soy sauce. Add salt and pepper to taste. Bring back to a boil, add bok choy and simmer until bok choy is tender. ; name: miso shiitake breakfast soup ; ingredients: fresh shiitake mushrooms, boiling water, light miso, tofu, scallion ; preparation:If using dried mushrooms, soak in warm water for 20 minutes then drain. Slice the mushrooms thinly. Pour the boiling water into a saucepan, stir in the miso. Add the mushrooms and simmer for 5 minutes. Divide the tofu between 4 warmed soup bowls. Ladle in the broth. Scatter chopped scallions on top and serve. Try this with my chanterelle croissants. ; name: cream of shiitake and corn soup ; ingredients: olive oil, leeks, vegetable broth, potato, celery, frozen corn kernels, shiitake mushroom, unsweetened soymilk, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a big pot, over medium heat, put half of the oil. Add the leeks and cook until they are tender. Add the broth, the potato, the corn and the celery. Cover and let cook until the vegetable are tenders. Meanwhile, in a frying pan, saut the mushrooms in the rest of the oil. Season to taste. Cream the soup with a blender. Put the soup in bowls. Make a nest of mushrooms over and serve piping hot. ; name: chicken and watercress soup ; ingredients: chicken breast, shiitake mushrooms, watercress, chicken stock, salt, cornflour, rice wine, pepper, sesame oil ; preparation:Marinate chicken with salt, cornflour and rice wine, pepper and sesame oil. Bring chicken stock to boil in a saucepan. Add in the mushrooms and cook for 2 minutes. Add in the chicken and stir to separate the chicken slices. When soup starts to boil, add in the watercress and stir. Cook for 1-2 minutes. Remove and serve in a soup bowl. ; name: oriental vegetable noodle soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, sugar snap pea, fresh bean sprout, fresh mushrooms, ginger, noodles ; preparation:Combine the chicken broth, soy sauce, scallions, and peas in a large saucepan. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, cover, and simmer for an additional 5 minutes. Add the bean sprouts, mushrooms, and ginger. Simmer for 5 more minutes. Add the cooked noodles and heat for 2-3 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: chicken and mushroom soup ; ingredients: boneless chicken breast, sesame oil, chicken stock, sherry wine, fresh mushrooms, fresh parsley ; preparation:Thinly slice the chicken breast meat. Bring the chicken stock to a rolling boil and add the chicken and mushrooms. When the soup starts to boil again and all of the ingredients float to the top, remove from the heat. Add the sesame oil and sherry and taste for seasoning. Add salt and pepper if necessary. Serve in individual soup bowls and sprinkle the parsley on top. ; name: chinese style noodle and pork soup ; ingredients: noodles, cabbage, cooked pork, green onion, low sodium chicken broth, white mushroom, fresh gingerroot, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Cook noodles according to package directions, or until of desired consistency, drain. Meanwhile, in a large pot combine all remaining ingredients. Stir in the cooked noodles. Bring to a full boil over high heat, stirring occasionally. Boil for about 10 minutes. Sprinkle each serving with chopped green onions if desired. ; name: shiitake mushroom soup ; ingredients: shiitake mushrooms, fresh ginger, olive oil, chicken stock, water, soba noodles, spinach, soy sauce, lime juice ; preparation:

name: sausage potatoes and peas ; ingredients: italian sausages, sweet peas, potatoes, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, butter, parsley, oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spread sausage links, potatoes and peas in 13 x 9 baking dish. In saucepan over medium heat mix rest of ingredients until boullion cube is dissolved. Pour over sausage, potatoes and peas. Cover tightly with aluminum foil. Bake in 350 degree oven 45 minutes to 1 hours. ; name: solo italian sausage and pasta medley ; ingredients: cooked italian sausage, dry pasta, green bell pepper, onion, garlic clove, tomato sauce, dried basil, olive oil, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place pasta in 2 quarts of salted water and cook until soft, which should take about 10 to 12 minutes. Chop the pepper and onions into half inch pieces and saute in olive oil. After 5 minutes, add the garlic, basil, and the tomato sauce and simmer until it starts to thicken. If the sauce become to thick, add a little of the water from the pasta. Add the precooked sausage to the vegetable and sauce mixture, and stir over low heat while waiting until the pasta is done. Add drained pasta to the pan, stir, check to see if salt is needed, and plate. Serve with grated parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti squash ; ingredients: spaghetti squash, extra virgin olive oil, yellow sweet onion, garlic clove, chopped tomatoes, feta cheese, black olives, fresh basil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Lightly grease a baking sheet. Place squash, cut sides down, on the baking sheet. Bake for 30 minutes, or until a sharp knife can be inserted with only a little resistance. Set squash aside until cool enough to be easily handled. Heat oil in a skillet over medium heat. Saut onion oil until tender. Add garlic, and saut for 2-3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, and cook only until tomatoes are warm. Use a large spoon to scoop the stringy pulp from the squash, and place in a medium bowl. Toss with sauted vegetables, feta, olives, and basil. Serve warm. ; name: family sausage supper ; ingredients: spaghetti, oleo, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, frozen broccoli cuts, oregano, garlic powder, kielbasa, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package directions. While spaghetti is cooking, melt the 3 tbsp. Butter in large pot and brown the onion, green pepper, mushrooms and kielbasa, about 10 minutes. Add broccoli, oregano and garlic powder. Continue cooking over med heat until broccoli is heated through. Drain cooked spaghetti and stir 1 tbsp. Butter into it, stirring to coat well. Place spaghetti on platter and top with kielbasa-veggie mix then sprinkle with grated parm. ; name: grilled summer squash and tomatoes with angel hair pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, fresh lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, dried basil, yellow squash, tomatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package, drain. In a medium bowl, combine squash, tomatoes, oil, garlic, salt, basil, and pepper. Set aside. Heat up grill. Grill the vegetables 3-5 minutes per side until they are slightly softened and browned. Remove from grill and allow to cool enough for you to handle. Cut the veggies into bite-sized pieces. Toss pasta and vegetables together in a large serving bowl. Top with cheese. ; name: baked rigatoni with sausage ; ingredients: rigatoni pasta, broccoli florets, hot italian sausage, onion, marinara sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta by following the package directions, adding broccoli during the last 2 minutes of cooking. Drain, then return to pan. In a large skillet, cook sausage and onion over medium heat until meat is brown and onion is tender. Drain. Stir in marinara sauce. Heat through. Stir meat sauce and cheeses into the cooked pasta. Transfer to a lightly greased 3-quart rectangular casserole dish. Bake, covered, at 375 for 20-25 degrees or until mixture is heated through. ; name: sausage cavatelli with broccoli rabe ; ingredients: italian sausages, pasta shells, garlic, broccoli rabe, chicken broth, butter, olive oil, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Saute sausage, breaking into small pieces. Remove from pan. Pour off excess grease. Cut rabe into bite size pieces and saute in olive oil. Add garlic and saute another minute or two. Add chicken broth and simmer until rabe is tender. Add butter and cooked sausage to pan. Stir until butter is melted. Pour over cooked shells. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: sausage and summer squash ; ingredients: italian salad dressing, garlic cloves, polish sausage, summer squash, italian bread, oregano leaves, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: parsley rice ; ingredients: long grain rice, water, butter, dried parsley ; preparation:Rinse rice under the faucet to remove excess starch. Bring rice and water to a rapid boil in a 2 quart saucepan. Cover rice and reduce heat to low. Cook on low 20 minutes. Cut butter into 4 pieces. When rice had doubled in volume, add the butter and replace lid. Once butter has melted, sprinkle parsley even over ther the rice. Stir to fully mix rice, butter and parsley. Serve with any meat dish. Pairs up exceptionally with chicken breasts. ; name: rice herbs ; ingredients: oil, long grain rice, onion, green pepper, chicken broth, salt, dried oregano, bay leaf, fresh parsley ; preparation:Place oil in a large saucepan coated with cooking spray. Place pan over med-high heat until pan is hot. Add rice and saut until golden brown. Add onion and pepper. Saut till tender. Add chicken broth, salt, oregano and bay leaf. Bring to boil and then reduce heat. Simmer 20 minutes. Remove from stove and let sit for about 5 minutes, or till liquid is absorbed. Remove bay leaf and stir in parsley. ; name: peas n peppers ; ingredients: red peppers, water, frozen peas, butter, orange rind, dried rosemary, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut the peppers in half lengthwise, remove stems, seeds and white membrane. Bring the water to a boil, add peas, return to boil cook 5 minutes until peas are tender, drain, reserve the cooking water. Puree the peas in your food processor add 5 tbsp of the reserved water and the butter return to saucepan and stir in the orange peel& rosemary heat through. Meanwhile immerse the peppers in boiling water and blanch for apprx 5 minutes or until the peppers are hot but still crisp fill the peppers with the pureed peas. Serve hot. ; name: onion rice ; ingredients: long-grain white rice, chicken broth, salt, butter, yellow onion, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a medium saucepan over medium-high heat, combine rice, broth, and salt. Bring to a boil. Decrease heat to low and cook, covered, until rice is tender and liquid is absorbed, about 20 minutes. Remove from heat. Meanwhile, in a small skillet over medium heat, melt butter. Add in onion. Saute about 5 minutes, until tender. Stir sauteed onions into cooked rice. Add in parsley and fluff with a fork before serving. ; name: creamy rice with peas and mushrooms ; ingredients: onion, italian dressing, fresh mushrooms, chicken broth, frozen peas, quick-cooking rice, cream cheese, lemon peel, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook and stir onion in dressing in large saucepan on medium-high heat for 2 minutes or until tender. Add mushrooms. Cook 2 to 3 minutes, or until mushrooms are tender. Add broth and peas. Stir. Bring to boil. Stir in rice and cream cheese. Cover. Remove from heat. Let stand 8 minutes. Stir in lemon peel and parmesan cheese. Garnish with lemon slices and fresh dill, if desired. ; name: italian rice and peas ; ingredients: fresh peas, long grain rice, onion, celery, dry white wine, boiling water, chicken stock cubes, butter, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Melt 2 oz of butter in a saucepan. Add chopped onion and celery, cook until just translucent. Add rice, cook a few minutes more, stirring to coat the rice with butter. Add wine, 1 cup of boiling water and crumbled stock cubes. Bring to a boil, add peas. Reduce heat, simmer uncovered until the water has evaporated. Add another cup of boiling water, cook until evaporated. Add the final cup of boiling water. Keep cooking until the water is almost absorbed. Overall cooking time is about 20 minutes. Stir in the parmesan cheese and 1 oz butter. Add salt& pepper to taste. ; name: egg fried rice ; ingredients: frozen peas, eggs, sesame oil, peanut oil, cooked rice, salt, pepper, spring onions, fresh bean sprouts ; preparation:Thaw frozen peas. Drain in colander. Combine eggs and sesame oil in a small bowl and set aside. Heat a wok over high heat until hot. Add the oil and when it is hot and slightly smoking, turn the heat to medium and add the eggs. Stir fry the eggs for 2 minutes, then add the cooked rice and stir fry for 3 minutes, mixing well. Then add the peas, salt and pepper. Stir fry 5 minutes over high heat. Add spring onions and bean sprouts and stir fry for 2 minutes. Turn onto a platter and serve at once. ; name: parsleyed rice with peas ; ingredients: butter, onions, rice, water, bay leaf, salt & freshly ground black pepper, hot pepper sauce, frozen peas, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: squash snackers ; ingredients: yellow squash, olive oil, balsamic vinegar, fresh garlic, fresh basil, celery salt, asiago cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Coat the bottom of a casserole dish with olive oil. Line the bottom of the dish with the squash making sure that they are laid out evenly and sprinkle with vinegar. Top with even amounts of garlic, basil and celery salt. Bake uncovered at 350 for 20 minutes. Remove from oven and add about one cube of cheese per slice. Cook for another 15 minutes remove and let cool for five minutes and serve on crackers or eat by themselves. ; name: savory squash ; ingredients: yellow squash, onion, sour cream, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, ritz crackers, butter ; preparation:Boil squash and onion until tender. Drain. Mix seasonings, sour cream, and cheese with squash and onions. Pour into greased baking dish. Mix crushed crackers and melted butter and put on top of squash. Bake at 350 for about 30 minutes or until bubbly. ; name: simple risotto ; ingredients: long grain rice, tomatoes with juice, water, sugar, salt, parsley flakes, sharp cheddar cheese ; preparation:Combine 6 first ingredients in a casserole. Bring to boil stirring often. Cover. Let simmer for about 20 minutes, until rice is tender. Add cheese and stir until melted. ; name: spinach risotto ; ingredients: onions, garlic, fresh lemon rind, mushroom, arborio rice, chicken stock, white wine, spinach leaves, fresh thyme ; preparation:Heat oil in large pan. Cook onion, garlic, rind and mushrooms. Stir until mushrooms are browned lightly. Add rice, stock and wine, bring to boil. Simmer, covered 15 minutes, stirring midway through cooking. Remove from heat. Let stand, covered 10 minutes. Stir in spinach and thyme. Cover for 1 minute and serve. ; name: sweet potato barley risotto in the crock pot ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, garlic, dried rosemary, pearl barley, vegetable stock, sweet potatoes ; preparation:Chop your onions finely. Peel the sweet potato and chop into small pieces. I like to keep my chopped sweet potato in a bowl of water until i need it because i think it keeps it from changing color. Heat a large skillet over medium heat with the oil in it. When the oil gets hot add the onions and cook until softened, stirring frequently. Then add the garlic and rosemary and stir for about a minute. Stir in the barley and stir until the barley is combined well. Add the stock and bring to a boil. Drain the sweet potatoes and place into a large crockpot. Pour the boiling stock mixture over top and stir well. Cook on low for 8 hours until the barley and sweet potato are cooked through. If possible open the crockpot about halfway through and stir well. ; name: summer squash saute ; ingredients: butter, onion, garlic, fresh tarragon, crookneck yellow squash, zucchini ; preparation:Melt butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Add onion, garlic and tarragon. Saute until onion is just tender, about 2 minutes. Add yellow squash and zucchini. Saute until crisp-tender, about 8 minutes or less. Season with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: sweet savory butternut squash and wild rice saut ; ingredients: butternut squash, cooked wild rice, green beans, garlic cloves, shallot, olive oil, thyme, sage, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Warm oil in a large saut pan over medium heat. Place green beans and shallots in pan and cook 3 minutes. Add garlic, squash and herbs. Cook another 2-3 minutes, until beans are crisp but tender. Add rice and cook until heated through. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Spray cut surface with olive oil, and place cut side up on a baking pan. Place pan on center rack in a preheated 400f oven and roast 45 minutes, until fork-tender. When squash is cool enough to handle, scoop out flesh and cut into cubes. ; name: weight watchers ww roasted squash risotto ; ingredients: butternut squash, fresh rosemary, red onion, risotto rice, vegetable stock, garlic cloves, light cream cheese, balsamic vinegar, cooking spray ; preparation:

name: caramel pecan cheesecake pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, unbaked pastry shells, pecans, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:In a small mixing bowl, beat the cream cheese, sugar, 1 egg and vanilla until smooth. Spread into pastry shell. Sprinkle with pecans. In a small bowl, whisk remaining eggs. Graduall whisk in caramel ice cream topping until blended. Pour over pecans. Bake at 375 for 35-40 min or until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for one hour. Refrigerate for 4 hrs or overnight before slicing. Refrigerate leftovers. ; name: turtle cheesecake quick and easy ; ingredients: chocolate wafer pie crust, cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, eggs, pecans, caramel candies, milk, mini chocolate chip ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325 degrees. Beat cream cheese, sugar and vanilla on medium speed until well blended. Add eggs. Mix just until blended and pour into oreo pie crust. Bake for 35-40 minutes until center is about set. Cool for 45-60 minutes. While cooling, microwave caramels and milk for 3 minutes on high or until melted. Pour caramel over cooled cheesecake. Sprinkle chocolate chips and pecans on cake. Refrigerate for at least two hours. ; name: chocolate fudge pecan pie ; ingredients: chocolate crumb crusts, cornstarch, water, unsweetened chocolate squares, condensed milk, eggs, butter, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Meanwhile, combine cornstarch and water in a small bowl. In saucepan, melt chocolate and condensed milk over low heat, stirring occasionally. Add the cornstarch mixture, then the eggs, butter, and salt. Stir until well-combined and smooth. Remove from the heat and add pecans. Mix well and pour into crust. Bake for approximately 30-35 minutes, until a knife inserted into the center of the pie comes out clean. Cool on a rack, then cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 2 hours. ; name: southern hospitality pie ; ingredients: pecans, coconut, butter, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, cool whip topping, graham cracker pie crust, caramel ice cream topping, ice cream topping ; preparation:Melt butter or margarine in skillet over low heat. Add pecans and coconut stirring constantly to brown. Cool. Mix cream cheese and sweetened condensed milk until smooth. Fold in non dairy whipped topping. Pour evenly into crust. Sprinkle with coconut and pecan mixture. Drizzle with the caramel and chocolate toppings. Cover and freeze until frozen hard. Remove from freezer 10 -15 min before serving. ; name: chocolate chip pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, marshmallows, milk, whipping cream, chocolate candy bars ; preparation:Make crust. Melt marshmallows with milk in double boiler. Let cool. Fold in whipping cream and grated chocolate bar. Spread in pan and refrigerate. ; name: pecan delight pie ; ingredients: egg whites, salt, cream of tartar, vanilla, granulated sugar, brown sugar, soda crackers, pecan pieces ; preparation:Beat egg whites to foam. Add salt and cream of tartar. Beat to stiff peaks. Add vanilla extract and both sugars. Beat until consistency of 7 minute frosting. Fold in crackers and nuts. Grease bottom and sides of pyrex dish and add mixture to dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes. Top with cool whip or whipped cream when pie is completely cool, or slice and add topping on individual slices when serving. ; name: peanut pecan pie ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, sugar, butter, eggs, cinnamon, vanilla, pecans, semi-sweet chocolate chips, peanut butter morsels, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Combine first seven ingredients in a large bowl. Stir well. Stir in pecans and all the chocolate and peanut butter morsels. Pour filling into graham cracker crust. Bake at 325f for 1 hour or until set. Cool on rack. ; name: chocolate turtle pie ; ingredients: eggs, sweetened condensed milk, butter, pecans, milk chocolate, graham cracker pie crusts, caramel ice cream topping ; preparation:

name: lentils with onion and garlic ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, dried red chili, green lentil, water ; preparation:Heat oil in medium saute pan or saucepan over medium-high heat. Fry onion until crisp and reddish-brown, about 10 minutes, then drain on paper towels. Put garlic and chile in saucepan and fry for 20 seconds or until just beginning to brown. Add lentils and water. Partially cover and cook for 30-35 minutes, or until lentils are soft. Serve lentils with onions on top. ; name: tomato lentil stew ; ingredients: lentils, onions, oil, chopped tomatoes, water, oregano, basil, black pepper, salt ; preparation:Cook lentils in the water. Meanwhile, chop the onions. Saut onions in a little oil. Add the tomatoes when the onions are translucent. Cook 5-10 min then add the lentils. Cook 5 more minutes. ; name: lentils couscous recipe ; ingredients: lentils, couscous, onions, olive oil, water, salt, black pepper, cumin, cayenne ; preparation:Saute onions with olive oil until golden brown. Reserve 4 tablespoons of browned onions for garnish. Meanwhile place lentils, water salt, and black pepper in a different saucepan and cook for around 20 minutes or until lentils are tender. Add couscous, browned onions, cumin, and dash of cayenne to the lentils, stir, cover and simmer for about 5-10 minutes or until water is absorbed. Place lentils and couscous in serving dish and garnish with 4 tablespoons of reserved browned onions. This recipe is best when served with tomatoe salad. See my recipe for tomatoe salad. ; name: lentil chili soup ; ingredients: vegetable oil, fresh garlic, onions, frozen carrots, dry lentils, low-sodium v8 juice, water, chili powder, ground cumin, dried oregano ; preparation:Pour the vegetable oil into a large cooking pot or dutch oven. Over medium-high heat, saute the onion and garlic until golden, about 2-3 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and stir. Bring to a boil and then reduce the heat to a simmer. Cook uncovered until the lentils are tender, about 45 minutes. Serve. ; name: delicious and easy lentils ; ingredients: canadian bacon, butter, carrot, onion, water, lentils, salt, marjoram, dried parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Lightly brown the canadian bacon over med heat. Add butter, onion, and carrots and saute for 5 minutes. Add water, lentils, salt and herbs. Cover and simmer on low for 20 minutes. Uncover and simmer for 5 more minutes. Add the parmesan cheese and serve. ; name: warm chorizo and thyme lentils ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, chorizo sausages, celery, garlic cloves, thyme, green lentils, chicken stock, salt and pepper, red wine vinegar ; preparation:Heat oil in deep frypan. Add onion and chorizo, cook about 8 minutes till browned. Add celery, garlic and thyme, cook further 5 minutes. Add lentils, stock, salt and pepper, cook 25 minutes till lentils are tender. Remove from the heat, stir through vinegar. ; name: steamed lentils with saffron ; ingredients: brown lentils, olive oil, onion, prosciutto, dry white wine, saffron thread, vegetable stock, salt ; preparation:Rinse the lentils well. Heat the vegetable stock in a small pot. Meanwhile, in a different medium pot heat the olive oil. Add the onion and cook until translucent, 5 to 8 minutes, then add the prosciutto and cook for a few more minutes. Add the lentils, cook for another 2-3 minutes, and pour the white wine. Add the saffron and cook until the alcohol has evaporated, 4-5 minutes. Add the stock, salt to taste, and cook over low heat for 50 minutes to 1 hour, covered. Add water or more stock if necessary. ; name: ranch style lentils ; ingredients: dry lentils, salt, water, lean ground beef, garlic cloves, onion soup mix, ketchup, prepared mustard, vinegar, pepper ; preparation:

name: german potato kraut soup ; ingredients: water, potatoes, salt, kielbasa, sauerkraut, onion, sour cream, flour, garlic powder, dill ; preparation:Boil potatoes until tender. Add sausage, sauerkraut, onion, garlic and dill. Bring to boil. Add 1 cup hot mix to sour cream and flour. Combine with soup and heat. Serve immediately. ; name: swiss potato bake ; ingredients: frozen hash browns, half-and-half, swiss cheese, butter, salt and pepper, paprika ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray a 13x9 pan with pam. Put hash browns in pan and add salt and pepper to taste. Top with grated cheese and pour half and half over top. Drizzle with melted butter. Sprinkle with paprika, if desired. Bake for 1 to 1. 5 hours. I like to cover mine with foil and then uncover the last half an hour. ; name: cheese and sour cream potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, butter, onions, salt, ground black pepper, corn flakes ; preparation:In a 4-quart dutch oven cook potatoes in enough boiling water to cover for 20 to 25 minues or until just tender. Drain. Cool slightly. Peel and coarsely shred or finely chop potatoes. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In large bowl stir together sour cream, soup, cheese, melted butter, onion, salt and pepper. Gently stir in potatoes. Transfer to greased 3-quart rectangular baking dish. Sprinkle with cornflakes. Bake, covered, for 40 minutes. Uncover, bake about 15 minutes more until golden. ; name: dutch style potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, tart apples, sauerkraut, cooking oil, dijon mustard, salt, black pepper, bacon, green onions ; preparation:Toss together the potatoes, apples, sauerkraut, oil, mustard, salt and pepper. Transfer to a lightly greased 9x13-inch baking dish. Bake at 400f for 1 hour, stirring occasionally, until potato and apple are tender and just starting to brown. Scatter crumbled bacon and sliced green onion on top. Serve hot. ; name: mushroom potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, salt, cream of mushroom soup, milk, onion, paprika ; preparation:Cover potatoes with water, add salt and cook until tender. Mix soup, milk and onion. Add potatoes and toss to mix well. Pour into greased 2-quart casserole dish. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes. ; name: potato egg bake ; ingredients: butter, onion, frozen hash browns, eggs, milk, salt, pepper, cheddar cheese, bacon ; preparation:Cook, drain and crumble bacon. Melt butter or margarine in a skillet. Add onions and hash browns. Cook and stir until potatoes are lightly browned. Grease a 9x13 inch pan and place hash browns in the bottom of the pan. Beat eggs, milk and salt and pepper 1- 2 minutes. Stir in grated cheese and bacon. Pour over potatoes. Bake at 350 degrees 45-50 minutes, until a knife inserted comes out clean. ; name: kielbasa and potato bake ; ingredients: condensed cream of mushroom soup, onion, milk, kielbasa, salt, ground black pepper, russet potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: kilasara potato bake ; ingredients: potatoes, condensed cream of chicken soup, sour cream, cheddar cheese, butter, onion ; preparation:

name: tropical grilled tuna ; ingredients: fresh pineapple, onion, jalapeno peppers, fresh cilantro, lime juice, tuna steaks, extra virgin olive oil, kosher salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Grill pineapple slices, uncovered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side. Chill for 30 minutes. Dice the pineapple. Place in a bowl. Stir in the onion, jalapenos, cilantro and lime juice. Refrigerate for 1 hour or until chilled. Brush tuna steaks with oil. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5 minutes. ; name: honey lime tuna steaks ; ingredients: light olive oil, old bay seasoning, lime juice, honey, basil leaves, tuna steak ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in shallow dish or self-closing plastic bag. Add tuna steaks. Turn to coat. Refrigerate 20 minutes. Turn occasionally. Grill or broil 8 to 10 minutes per inch of thickness. Discard leftover marinade. ; name: tuna with apricot chipotle glaze ; ingredients: apricot jam, chipotle chili sauce, cilantro, honey, lime, juice of, olive oil, tuna steaks, limes, salt and pepper, oil ; preparation:Combine first six ingredients and heat on stove top just until warm. Generously sprinkle tuna steaks with salt and pepper. Sear tuna in non stick skillet with a small amount of oil until rare. This takes a very short time. Slice tuna steaks and place on rice. Drizzle sauce over tuna. Serve with lime wedges. ; name: grilled yellowtail tuna and pineapple salsa ; ingredients: yellowtail fish fillets, kosher salt, cracked black pepper, pineapple, red onion, red bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, cilantro, salt & pepper ; preparation:Season yellowtail with salt & pepper on both sides, and place on hot grill. Grill to medium, as overcooking will lead to a dry finished product. While fish is cooking, place all ingredients for the pineapple salsa in a bowl and toss. When the fish is cooked, place a piece of banana leaf on the plate. Place fish on top of banana leaf and top with pineapple salsa, serve with rice and garnish with a grilled lemon. Salsa can be made 1-2 hours in advance, no need to chill. ; name: tuna glazed with ginger and lime ; ingredients: tuna steaks, garlic cloves, ginger, sugar, crushed red pepper flakes, fresh lime juice, soy sauce, dark sesame oil ; preparation:Place steaks in a large shallow dish. Combine garlic and remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Stir well. Pour marinade mixture over tuna steaks. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for 1 hour, turning once. Remove steaks from the marinade, reserving marinade. Bring marinade to a boil in a small saucepan. Grill tuna steaks, covered, over medium hot coals about 20 minutes or until fish flakes easily. Baste often with marinade. ; name: mexican tuna salad ; ingredients: albacore tuna in water, tomatoes, red onion, cilantro, fresh lime juice, jalapeno peppers, salt, boston lettuce, baked corn tortilla chips ; preparation:Place tuna in a medium bowl and break into large pieces with a fork. Add tomatoes, onion, cilantro, lime juice, peppers, and salt. Stir to mix. Cover and refrigerate 30 minutes or up to 6 hours. Line plates with lettuce leaves and top with tuna salad. Serve with chips. ; name: tuna with pineapple and peppers ; ingredients: tuna steaks, pineapple ring, low sodium soy sauce, garlic, fresh ginger, red bell pepper, green bell pepper ; preparation:In small bowl stir together the soy sauce, garlic, pineapple juice and ginger. Place the tune steaks in a shallow dish and pour half the marinade over them. Flip to coat both sides. Place the peppers and pineapple in another dish and cover with remaining marinade. Toss lightly to coat. Cover both dishes and marinate in refrigerator for at least an hour. Coat broiler pan with non-stick cooking spray. Place the tuna steaks, pineapple and peppers on pan and broil for approximately 4-5 minutes per side. You may use the marinade from the pineapple and peppers to baste while cooking. Do not use the marinade from the tuna. ; name: caribbean grilled tuna ; ingredients: tuna steaks, lime juice, olive oil, jamaican jerk spice ; preparation:

name: baked beans southern style ; ingredients: pork and beans, onion, yellow mustard, maple syrup, brown sugar, ketchup, worcestershire sauce, pepper bacon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl combine first seven ingredients, stir well. Lightly spray pam in a medium size casserole dish and pour in bean mixture. Place slices of bacon over top of beans. Cover and bake 30 minutes. Uncover and bake extra 15 minutes. ; name: french canadian baked beans ; ingredients: white pea beans, onion, dry mustard, ground black pepper, pure maple syrup, salt pork, salt ; preparation:Pour the beans onto a plate, and pick-over looking for bad beans, or stones. Place beans in bowl, cover with water by at least 2 inches, and soak overnight. Preheat oven to 250 degrees f. Drain beans and place in 4-quart bean pot. Add onion, dry mustard, pepper, salt, and maple syrup. Add water to cover. Cut salt pork into 1-inch pieces and place on top of beans. Bake covered, approximately 8 hours. Check each hour to see if water needs to be added. You can add more maple syrup in place of water for flavor, if desired. Serve the beans with brown bread, franks, or ham. For breakfast, serve with eggs, bacon, and home-fries. ; name: awesome baked beans ; ingredients: pork and beans, tomato sauce, mustard, worcestershire sauce, white onion, green bell pepper, deli ham, brown sugar ; preparation:Set pork-n-beans in a collander to drain while you mix together the rest. In large bowl stir together tomato sauce, mustard, worcestershire sauce. Stir in onion, bell pepper and ham. Once it is well mixed stir in the brown sugar til it is dissolved. Now add beans to the mix. Bake at 425 for one hour. This is always a crowd pleaser. ; name: dutch baked beans ; ingredients: bacon, onion, white kidney beans, salt, brown sugar, catsup, garlic powder, chili powder ; preparation:Cook bacon until not quite done. Drain and set aside. Saute onions in 2 or 3 tablespoons bacon fat. Take 1 can of beans and rinse and drain well. Use other can as is. Pour the unstrained can into large frying pan. Add brown sugar. Stir until sugar is melted. Add onions and rest of the beans. Chop bacon. Add to mixture, along with catsup, spices and salt. Simmer for 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: canadian baked beans with maple syrup no molasses ; ingredients: white pea beans, onion, dry mustard, summer savory, ground black pepper, chili powder, maple syrup, salt pork, salt ; preparation:Soak beans overnight to cut down on cooking time. Drain and place in a 4 quart bean pot. Mix seasonings and maple syrup together and stir into beans. Add enough water to cover. Peel onion and remove root and blossom ends. Push whole onion down into beans and place the salt pork next to it. Bake covered in a 250 degree oven for about 8 hours. Check on them every hour or so and see if you need to add water so they never dry out. When finished if you want the sauce to be thicker then you can always stir in some refried bean flakes and let sit to thicken. ; name: oven baked beans for 2 ; ingredients: bacon, onion, baked beans, ketchup, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, prepared mustard ; preparation:Heat oven to 350 degrees. In large skillet, cook and stir bacon and onion until bacon is crisp. Drain off fat. Stir in remaining ingredients. Pour into ungreased 1-quart casserole. Bake uncovered until hot and bubbly, about 45 minutes. ; name: barbecued butter beans ; ingredients: butter beans, ketchup, dark corn syrup, liquid smoke, hot sauce ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Spray 13x9 pan with cooking spray. Drain butter beans and pour into pan. Add all other ingredients and mix well. Bake for 1 hour or until brown and bubbling. ; name: margaret lefever s wonderful baked beans ; ingredients: dried navy beans, brown sugar, catsup, barbecue sauce, dry mustard, bacon ; preparation:

name: avocado orange salad ; ingredients: navel oranges, orange juice, white wine vinegar, olive oil, red leaf lettuce, avocado, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine orange juice, white wine vinegar, olive oil, salt and pepper. Set aside. In a seperate bowl, lightly toss segmented oranges, red leaf lettuce, and avocado. Pour vinegar dressing over all. Enjoy. ; name: romaine salad with avocado and oranges ; ingredients: oranges, lemon juice, olive oil, dijon mustard, salt, romaine lettuce, scallions, avocado ; preparation:With a paring knife remove the skin and pith from the oranges. Working over a large salad bowl to catch the juices, cut out the orange segments. Set aside. Add the lemon juice, oil, mustard, and salt to the juice, whisking to blend. Add the lettuce and scallions, tossing well. Add the avocado and toss gently to combine. ; name: tossed romaine and orange salad ; ingredients: orange juice, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, romaine lettuce, mandarin oranges, slivered almonds ; preparation:Prepare the dressing by whisking together the orange juice, olive oil, vinegar, pepper and salt. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine the romaine and oranges. Add enough dressing to coat and toss well. Sprinkle with almonds and serve. ; name: mandarin orange salad ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, cashews, mandarin oranges, radishes, mayonnaise, gingerroot, seasoned rice vinegar, white pepper ; preparation:Tear lettuce into small bite sized pieces. Combine lettuce, nuts and radishes in a large bowl. Mix the dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Toss the lettuce and dressing and place in serving bowls. Arrange the chilled mandarin orange sections on top and serve. ; name: avocado blt salad ; ingredients: avocado, sour cream, milk, mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic salt, hot pepper sauce, lettuce, tomatoes, bacon ; preparation:In small bowl, combine all dressing ingredients. Beat at low speed until smooth. Cover and refrigerate for several hours to blend flavors. Combine salad ingredients in large bowl. Serve with dressing. ; name: strawberry melon avocado salad ; ingredients: honey, sherry wine vinegar, of fresh mint, fresh ground pepper, salt, baby spinach, avocado, cantaloupe, strawberries, sesame seeds ; preparation:Whisk honey, vinegar, mint, pepper and salt in a small bowl. Divide spinach among 4 salad plates. Arrange alternating slices of avocado and cantaloupe in a fan on top of the spinach. Top each salad with strawberries, drizzle with dressing and sprinkle with sesame seeds. Add sesame seeds and stir constantly until golden and fragrant, about 2 minutes. Transfer to a small bowl and let cool. ; name: chicken avocado salad ; ingredients: avocados, hard-boiled eggs, cooked chicken, celery, lemon juice, mayonnaise, hot pepper sauce, salt and pepper, lettuce leaf ; preparation:Scoop the pulp out of the avocado shells, reserving the shells. Dice pulp. Combine the chicken, celery, lemon juice, mayonnaise and hot pepper sauce in a large bowl. Salt and pepper to taste. Add the diced avocado pulp to the chicken mixture and toss gently. Fill avocado shells with chicken mixture and top with egg slices. Serve on a bed of lettuce leaves. ; name: tangy avocado orange salad ; ingredients: oranges, red leaf lettuce, avocado, white balsamic vinegar ; preparation:

name: crock pot swiss cheese chicken ; ingredients: turkey bacon, potatoes, boneless chicken breasts, garlic clove, onion, carrot, cream of chicken soup, swiss cheese ; preparation:In skillet cook bacon until crispy, remove and crumble. Set aside. Add potatoes to crockpot. Add chicken to crockpot. Add garlic, onion, carrot and soup to crockpot. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours. Remove individual pieces of chicken to plates along with vegetables and place one slice of cheese on each piece of chicken. Sprinkle bacon on top of cheese. Enjoy. ; name: crock pot chicken ala king ; ingredients: cooked chicken, green pepper, dried onion, celery, pimiento, cream of chicken soup, sliced mushrooms, frozen peas, uncooked rice ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a crock pot. Stir to mix well. Cover and cook on low 6-9 hours. Cook rice as directed. Serve chicken a la king over a mound of rice. ; name: crock pot stuffed chicken breasts ; ingredients: ricotta cheese, parmesan cheese, pesto sauce, chicken breasts, salt, pepper, cream of mushroom soup, milk, white wine, fresh basil leaf ; preparation:Combine cheeses and pesto sauce. Place a spoonful of the pesto cheese mixture onto each chicken breast. Roll up and secure with a toothpick. Sprinkle with salt and pepper and place into crock. In a bowl whisk the soup, milk and wine together and pour over the chicken breasts. Cook on low 4-6 hours, or on high 3-4 hours. Garnish with basil leaves. ; name: crock pot chicken cheese dip ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, rotel tomatoes & chilies, water, velveeta cheese, onion powder, garlic powder, flour, light sour cream, tortilla chips ; preparation:Blend the tomatoes & chilies in a food processor then pour into a crock pot. Add the water & frozen chicken breasts, cover with a lid & cook on low for 3 hours. Remove the chicken & shred, place back into the crock pot. Stir in the velveeta & spices. Mix the flour with a small amount of water. Stir into the crock pot & recover with a lid. Cook for another hour. Turn off the pot then stir in the sour cream. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: crock pot cheesy chicken and mushrooms ; ingredients: bacon, boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoning salt, pepper, cream of chicken soup, parmesan cheese, mushrooms, onion, garlic, swiss cheese ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook the bacon until crisp. Drain on paper towels then crumble. Season the chicken breasts with salt and pepper the, brown in the bacon drippings for about 5 minutes on each side. Place the breasts in a 4-6-quart slow cooker. Sprinkle with mushrooms. In the same skillet heat the soup and parmesan cheese with onions and garlic for 5 minutes until bubbly, then pour over the chicken and mushrooms. Cover and cook on low setting for about 4 hours. After about 4 hours sprinkle with the cheese cubes and bacon. Cover and cook on high for about 20 minutes, or until the cheese is melted. ; name: creamy italian crock pot chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing mix, water, cream cheese, cream of chicken soup, mushroom stems and pieces ; preparation:Place chicken in slow cooker. Combine salad dressing mix and water. Pour over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours. In a small mixing bowl, beat cream cheese and soup until blended. Stir in mushrooms, pour over chicken, and cook 1 hours longer or until chicken juices run clear. Serve over rice or noodles. ; name: tomato crouton casserole ; ingredients: tomatoes, bread, butter, salt, dried basil, thyme, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Arrange tomatoes in a greased dish. Top with bread cubes. Combine butter, salt, basil& thyme. Drizzle over bread. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake at 350 for 30-35 minutes or until light brown. ; name: crock pot chicken cordon bleu ; ingredients: chicken breasts, swiss cheese, deli ham, cream of chicken soup, milk, italian seasoned breadcrumbs, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:

name: mandarin orange salad ; ingredients: romaine lettuce, cashews, mandarin oranges, radishes, mayonnaise, gingerroot, seasoned rice vinegar, white pepper ; preparation:Tear lettuce into small bite sized pieces. Combine lettuce, nuts and radishes in a large bowl. Mix the dressing ingredients in a small bowl. Toss the lettuce and dressing and place in serving bowls. Arrange the chilled mandarin orange sections on top and serve. ; name: grapefruit orange medley salad ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, mandarin oranges, grapefruits, green seedless grapes ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated. ; name: tossed romaine and orange salad ; ingredients: orange juice, olive oil, red wine vinegar, ground black pepper, salt, romaine lettuce, mandarin oranges, slivered almonds ; preparation:Prepare the dressing by whisking together the orange juice, olive oil, vinegar, pepper and salt. Set aside. In a large bowl, combine the romaine and oranges. Add enough dressing to coat and toss well. Sprinkle with almonds and serve. ; name: sweet cucumber and mandarin orange salad ; ingredients: cucumber, mandarin oranges, sweet onion, granulated sugar, white vinegar, fresh tarragon, salt & pepper ; preparation:In a serving bowl, combine the cucumbers, oranges, and onion rings. In a small bowl, stir together the sugar and vinegar until the sugar dissolves. Pour the vinegar mixture over the cucumber salad. Toss well. Add chopped tarragon. Season with salt and pepper. Chill 1 hour before serving. ; name: avocado orange salad ; ingredients: navel oranges, orange juice, white wine vinegar, olive oil, red leaf lettuce, avocado, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine orange juice, white wine vinegar, olive oil, salt and pepper. Set aside. In a seperate bowl, lightly toss segmented oranges, red leaf lettuce, and avocado. Pour vinegar dressing over all. Enjoy. ; name: mandarin jell o salad ; ingredients: orange jell-o, boiling water, lemon juice, mandarin oranges, pineapple tidbits, orange sherbet, miniature marshmallow, whipped topping ; preparation:Add lemon juice to boiling water, then add water to jell-o. Stir in sherbet until dissolved. Mix oranges, pineapple, marshmallows and whipped topping together. Fold into mixture. Chill for two hours. ; name: broccoli ramen noodle salad ; ingredients: broccoli coleslaw mix, red pepper, yellow pepper, scallions, slivered almonds, sunflower seeds, ramen noodles, balsamic vinegar, sugar, oil ; preparation:Combine the slaw, peppers, scallions, and nuts in a large bowl. Mix together vinegar, oil, sugar, and the seasoning packet from the ramen mix. Stir the dressing into the salad. Crumble the ramen noodles and add to salad. Toss the whole thing to get everything coated. ; name: broccoli mandarin orange salad ; ingredients: broccoli florets, sliced almonds, mandarin orange sections, orange, juice and zest of, green onions, vinegar, sugar, olive oil ; preparation:

name: caramel pudding cake ; ingredients: butter, flour, salt, brown sugar, granulated sugar, baking powder, milk, boiling water ; preparation:Cream butter and granulated sugar. Add flower, baking powder and salt. Stir in milk and mix until smooth. Spread into greased 8x13-inch pan. Boil water and dissolve brown sugar. Pour over batter. Bake at 350f for 1 hour. ; name: orange and almond cake gluten free ; ingredients: orange, eggs, caster sugar, almond meal, baking powder, icing sugar, butter ; preparation:Place orange in boiling water for 2 hours. Remove and allow to cool. This can be done ahead of time. Preheat oven to 180c. Break eggs into a blender. Add caster sugar and blend together. Cut up orange and place into egg mix, and blend together to a smooth consistency. Add the almond meal and baking powder and blend. Grease baking pan and dust with caster sugar. Pour batter into the pan and sprinkle caster sugar on top and bake for 1 hour or until top is golden brown. Dust with icing sugar to serve. ; name: gluten free fairy cakes ; ingredients: margarine, caster sugar, eggs, vanilla essence, gluten-free flour, milk, baking powder ; preparation:Make sure you have 12 paper cases handy. Preheat oven to 200 degrees. Cream together margarine and sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in eggs and vanilla, followed by the sifted baking powder, sifted flour and milk. Half fill paper cases standing on baking tray. Bake for 10-12 minutes. When cold, decorate the top with jam or icing or just icing sugar, if desired. ; name: butterscotch cake with marshmallows ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, salt, shortening, brown sugar, water, vanilla, eggs, milk, marshmallows ; preparation:Sift the flour. Measure and sift again with the baking powder and salt. Mix the shortening, sugar, and water and cook over low heat until the sugar is dissolved. Cool and add vanilla. Add eggs one at a time, beating well after each addition. Alternately add dry ingredients with the milk. Beat until smooth, being careful not to overheat. Pour into 9 inch cake pan lined with paper. Place marshmallows at intervals on top of the batter. Bake at 350 for 50 minutes. ; name: deep dark chocolate pudding cake ; ingredients: unbleached flour, baking powder, salt, unsweetened cocoa powder, sugar, water, vanilla, butter, pecans ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Whisk together first five ingreadients until there are no lumps. Add the water, vanilla, butter, and nuts. Slowly stir together until just combined. Pour into a lightly greased 8-inch square or 9-inch round cake pan. Bake the cake for 45 minutes. When the cake is done, the top will be set, and the bottom bubbly. ; name: caramel coffee cake ; ingredients: refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, margarine, brown sugar, almonds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Split each biscuit in two, rolling into small balls. Layer rolled biscuit pieces in a bundt pan. Combine margarine and brown sugar in small sauce pan. Bring to a boil and allow to boil for 2 minutes. Pour caramel mixture over biscuits and bake for approximately 40-45 minutes, or until golden brown. Carefully invert bundt pan onto a serving dish. Sprinkle nuts on top and serve immediately. ; name: pistachio and lemon cake naturally gluten and lactose free ; ingredients: lemons, pistachios, sugar, eggs, salt, baking powder, icing sugar ; preparation:Boil the whole lemons in boiling water for 1 hour. Pre heat oven to 180c grease and line a 22cm cake tin with baking paper drain the lemons and cool. Cut the cooked lemons in half and remove the pips. Puree in a blender until smooth. Blanch 200g of the pistaccios in boiling water for 30 seconds then blend with the other 100g. Sererate the egg yolks from the egg whites. Whisk the yolks with the sugar until light then fold in the pistaccio cream, the lemon cream and baking powder. Whisk the egg whites with a pinch of salt till stiff. Fold into the lemon pistacchio mixture. Pour th emixture int th eprepared cake tin and bake for about 40-45 minutes. Cool, remove from cake tin and dust lightly with icing sugar. Decorate with some candied peel. ; name: caramel mud cake gluten free ; ingredients: unsalted butter, white chocolate, brown sugar, golden syrup, milk, gluten-free flour, baking powder, eggs, thickened cream ; preparation:

name: easy falafel ; ingredients: chickpeas, onion, garlic, fresh parsley, coriander, cumin, salt, flour, canola oil ; preparation:Combine chickpeas, garlic, onion, coriander, cumin, salt and pepper in medium bowl. Add flour and combine well. Mash chickpeas, ensuring to mix ingredients together. You can also combine ingredients in a food processor. You want the result to be a thick paste. Form the mixture into small balls, about the size of a ping pong ball. Slightly flatten. Fry in 2 inches of oil at 350 degrees until golden brown. ; name: tuna croquettes ; ingredients: canned tuna, wheat germ, eggs, tomato juice, fresh dill, black pepper, cooking oil ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine all the ingredients. Nix well. Shape the mixture into 4 equal size patties. Heat 1 to 2 tablespoons oil in heavy frying pan add the formed patties and fry on both sides until golden brown. Drain on paper towels to absorb excess oil. ; name: cajun fish croquette ; ingredients: flour, cornmeal, cajun seasoning, salt, ground black pepper, light mayonnaise, fresh dill, lemon juice, tilapia fillets ; preparation:In a not too deep bowl, mix flour, cornmeal, cajun seasoning, salt and pepper. In another bowl not too deep, mix mayonnaise, dill and lemon juice. Soak fish fillets in the mixture of mayonnaise, then in the mixture of flour flipping them to coat well. Put fish fillets on a greased baking sheet. Cook in a preheated oven of 450 f for about 10 minutes or until croquettes are golden. Keep cooking under the broiler for about 4 minutes or until crispy. Serve with the mixture of mayonnaise that you set aside. ; name: the original veggie burger falafel ; ingredients: chickpeas, tahini, flat leaf parsley, garlic cloves, lemon juice, curry powder, eggs, soy sauce, olive oil ; preparation:Drain and rinse the chickpeas and put them, along with all the other ingredients, in a blender or food processor. Pulse, scraping down the side of the bowl, to form a coarse paste. Scrape the paste into a bowl. In a nonstick frying pan, heat the olive oil. Scoop a couple of tablespoons of the falafel mixture into your hands and smooth down to form a small patty. Place a few patties in the pan and fry in small batches, turning halfway through cooking, until browned and crisp and cooked through. Drain on paper towels and serve with tahini sauce. Also delicious cold in a pita sandwich with cucumbers and tomatoes. ; name: fagiolini con pomedore ; ingredients: green beans, olive oil, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, salt and pepper ; preparation:Add green beans to a pot of water and cook until the beans are tender---about 20 to 30 minutes, and drain well. I believe that canned green beans could be used. In a frying pan, add olive oil and garlic. Saute the garlic, but make sure the garlic does not get brown in color. Strain the tomatoes and discard liquid. Smash up the tomatoes with a fork and drain away any excess juice. Add the tomatoes to the olive oil & garlic and season with salt and pepper. Cook for 10 to 15 minutes. While the tomatoes are cooking, the water will begin to evaporate, and you will notice more of the olive oil. That is when the sauce is ready. Add the cooked green beans to the frying pan and incorporate the sauce with the greens beans, serve. ; name: mashed favas broad beans greens ; ingredients: fava beans, spinach, olive oil, garlic ; preparation:Shuck the fresh beans, put in boiling water for apprx 10 minutes, dash with cold and remove outer membrane from each bean. If using frozen check that they are already cooked, if not follow instructions. Canned are ready as is, drained. Coursely mash the fava beans. I used a fork, you do not want to puree them just mash a bit. If using collards for the greens pre boil for 20 minutes, squeeze when cooked to get as much moisture out as possible, coarsely chop. With other greens wash them and allow the water to cling to the leaves. Coarsely chop. Pour half the oil into a skillet using medium heat saute the chopped garlic, stir, cook until it starts to color, apprx 5 minutes. Add favas, stir& heat through. Add greens, cover, allow the greens to wilt 3 minutes, and serve. ; name: clam croquettes ; ingredients: baby clams, mashed potatoes, egg, lemon juice, green onion, salt, pepper, fine breadcrumbs, oil ; preparation:Drain and rinse the clams. Press to remove excess water. Chop finely. Add the potato, beaten egg, lemon juice, green onion, salt and pepper. Blend well and add 1-2 tbsp bread crumbs or enough to be able to shape the croquettes. Roll into small balls, and roll in the egg then the breadcrumbs. Refrigerate for 1 hour. Fry in oil in batches until brown about 5 minutes. Drain and serve plain or with a sauce of your choice. ; name: falafel croquettes ; ingredients: canned chick-peas, garlic cloves, ground coriander, ground cumin, fresh chives, salt and pepper, oil ; preparation:

name: pan fried apples ; ingredients: butter, apple, honey, yogurt ; preparation:Melt butter in a shallow pan. Add apple pieces and cook over medium-high heat until golden and tender, about 10 minutes. Add the honey. Turn up heat a little to crisp up the outside a little. Remove and let cool a little before serving. Serve with cold thick yogurt. ; name: harvest baked apples ; ingredients: apples, quick oats, lemon juice, brown sugar, cinnamon, butter, pecans ; preparation:Cut all ingredients together in a bowl except apples. Place apples in a glass baking dish. Stuff each of them as full as you can get them with the oatmeal mixture, sprinkling the remainder over the tops. Bake in a 425f oven for 20 min or till very soft. Serve while still warm with vanilla or caramel ice cream. ; name: stir fried chicken apples ; ingredients: chicken breasts, honey, curry powder, apples, oil, celery, raisins, parsley ; preparation:Cut chicken into cubes and place in bowl. Combine honey and curry and mix thru chicken. Stir in apple slices. Heat oil in heavy skillet over high heat. Saute celery for 1 minute. Add apple mixture and stir fry 3-4 minutes, just until chicken is no longer pink. Add raisins and parsley, stir well and serve over rice. ; name: almost unsweetened applesauce homemade ; ingredients: apples, water, sugar, cinnamon, ground cloves ; preparation:Put apples and water in saucepan. Cover and bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Stir in sugar, cinnamon and cloves. Cook until all sugar is dissolved. Serve warm or let cool. ; name: cinnamon baked apples ; ingredients: cooking apples, raisins, honey, ground cinnamon, butter ; preparation:Core the apples and pare a 1-inch strip of skin from around the middle of each to prevent splitting. Place the apples in two 10-oz custard cups. Pack the raisins into the apples. Mix the honey and cinnamon, pour over the raisins and into the apples. Top with butter. Cover tightly and microwave on high until tender when pierced with a fork, 3 to 4 minutes. If you prefer, they can also be baked at 375f for 30 minutes. Serve warm with cream, if desired. ; name: spiced applesauce ; ingredients: apples, sugar, lemon juice, fresh lemon rind, cinnamon stick, nutmeg, allspice, clove ; preparation:Place all ingredients in the slow cooker and set on low. Cook for approximately 4 to 6 hours or until apples are tender. The time will vary depending on the type of apples used. Remove cinnamon stick. Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve warm or cold. ; name: quick homemade applesauce no sugar added ; ingredients: apples, cinnamon, nutmeg, water, lemon slices, salt ; preparation:Peel and core apples. Cut apples into approximately 1 inch cubes. Add all ingredients to pot, and turn heat on high. Bring to a boil, then cover and reduce heat to low. Simmer for 20 minutes or until the apples have softened significantly. Stir frequently, making sure that the apples are not sticking to the bottom of the pot. Add more water if necessary. Remove lemon slices. Mash with a potato masher or use a food mill for a smoother consistency. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: fried apples stekte epler ; ingredients: apples, butter, brown sugar, cinnamon, cardamom, raisins ; preparation:

name: all in one breakfast ; ingredients: english muffins, bulk pork sausage, eggs, sour cream, diced green chilies, cheddar cheese ; preparation:In the bottom of a greased 3 quart rectangular baking dish, arrange muffin halves in the bottom. Overlap muffins as neccesary to make them fit well. Set aside. Using a large skillet, cook sausage until brown, drain. In a large bowl whisk the eggs. Add sausage, sour cream, and chilies and mix until well combined. Pour egg mixture over the muffins and press lightly to thoroughly moisten the muffins. Sprinkle with cheese, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate overnight. Bake in a 375 degree oven uncovered for 35 to 40 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. Prep and cook time does not include chilling time. ; name: hearty german farmer s breakfast bauernfruhstuck ; ingredients: bacon, potatoes, green pepper, onions, salt and pepper, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk ; preparation:In a skillet over low heat, cook bacon until crisp. Remove to paper towel. Reserve 2 tablespoons drippings. Add potatoes, green pepper, onion, salt and pepper. Cook and stir over medium heat until the potatoes are golden brown. Stir in eggs and milk, and cook and stir until eggs are almost set, about 2 minutes. Reduce heat to low. Add cheese and bacon, stirring gently until heated through and eggs are set. Serve immediately. Leftovers are tasty the following day. Good wrapped in a flour tortilla for a breakfast burrito, breakfast on the go. Serves 4 to 6. ; name: southern egg scrambled breakfast ; ingredients: eggs, sour cream, cheddar cheese, ham, onion, fresh mushrooms, green bell pepper, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add mushrooms, bell peppers, and onions. Saute until onions are translucent and tender. Add diced ham and stir until steaming. In the meantime, in large mixing bowl, crack and add the dozen eggs, salt and pepper to taste, one heaping tablespoon of sour cream. Beat with wire whisk until smooth. Pour over the ham and vegetable mixture in the skillet. Sprinkle the top with the cheese. Stir as it cooks until the eggs are no longer shiny. ; name: company breakfast bake ; ingredients: frozen hash browns, sausage, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, dry mustard, salt, pepper ; preparation:Cover the bottom of a 9-inch square pan with frozen hash browns. Cover hash browns with sausage. Sprinkle with cheddar cheese. Stir together the remaining ingredients. Pour this mixture over everything. Refrigerate overnight. Bake at 350 degrees f for 30 minutes. Let stand for 30 minutes before cutting into squares and serving. ; name: frontier breakfast ; ingredients: pie crusts, sausage, green onion, picante sauce, eggs, milk, cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, green chili, olive ; preparation:Grease a 9x13x2 pan. Layer pie crusts. Brown sausage and onion, drain, then layer on top of pie crusts. Layer picante sauce on top of sausage and onion. Beat eggs, add milk, and beat again. Add everything else to the milk and egg mixture. Pour this mixture over the picante sauce and bake at 350 for 1 hour. ; name: make ahead breakfast ; ingredients: sausage, bread, cheddar cheese, eggs, milk, salt, mustard ; preparation:Brown sausage in skillet and drain well. Grease 13 x 9 inch casserole dish. Line dish with bread, then top with cheese and sausage. In bowl, combine eggs, milk, and seasonings. Beat well and pour into casserole. Refrigerate overnight. In the morning, bake casserole at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: breakfast sandwich quick healthy ; ingredients: whole wheat english muffin, egg, lean ham, fat free cheese ; preparation:On a microwaveable plate lined with a paper towel, place one of the english muffin halves. Carefully crack egg onto english muffin. Pierce yolk membrane with a fork. Microwave on high for about 40 seconds. Top with folded ham slice, cheese slice, and remaining english muffin half. Microwave on high for about 30 seconds, or until eg white is completely set and yolk is thickened around edge. Makes 1 serving. ; name: russ s ploughman s lunch style toasted jaffles ; ingredients: bread, butter, chutney, ham, cheddar cheese, pickled onion ; preparation:

name: ham asparagus strata ; ingredients: english muffins, cooked ham, asparagus, swiss cheese, egg substitute, fat free sour cream, skim milk, onions, dijon mustard, black pepper ; preparation:In a greased 2-quart baking dish spread half the muffin pieces. Top with ham, asparagus, and cheese. Top with remaining muffin pieces. In bowl whisk together eggs and sour cream. Stir in milk, onion, mustard, and black pepper. Pour over layers in dish. Cover, chill for 2 to 24 hours. Baked, uncovered in 325 degrees f oven 60 to 65 minutes or until internal temperature registers 170 degrees f on an instant-read thermometer. Let stand 10 minutes before serving. ; name: cheesy asparagus and ham ; ingredients: butter, flour, milk, mild cheddar cheese, salt, pepper, asparagus, ham, breadcrumbs ; preparation:In large skillet, melt butter, stir in flour, cook 1 minute. Slowly stir in milk, cook until bubbly. Add cheese, salt and pepper, mix well. Remove from heat. Put 3 pieces asparagus on each ham slice. Roll up and place in 13x9 baking pan. Cover with the cheese sauce. Sprinkle with crumbs. Bake at 375 for 20 minutes. ; name: grilled asparagus with garlic and fresh lemon ; ingredients: asparagus, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, lemon ; preparation:Toss asparagus in extra virgin olive oil and minced garlic. Place asparagus on hot grill. Liberally season asparagus with salt and pepper. Grill asparagus until lightly charred and tender-crisp. Remove from grill and squeeze lemon juice onto asparagus. ; name: glazed asparagus ; ingredients: asparagus, butter, brown sugar, chicken broth ; preparation:Melt butter in skillet. Stir in sugar until dissolved. Add asparagus and saut about 2 minutes turning gently. Add broth. Cover and cook over low heat 3 minutes. Cook uncovered about 2 minutes until sauce thickens and asparagus is tender, serve. ; name: pan roasted asparagus ; ingredients: olive oil, unsalted butter, asparagus spears, kosher salt, ground black pepper, lemon ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a 12-inch skillet over medium-high heat. When butter has melted, add half of the asparagus to the skillet with. Using tongs, distribute spears in an even layer. Cover skillet. Cook until asparagus is bright green and still crisp, about 5 minutes. Uncover, increase heat to high and season asparagus with salt and pepper to taste.
