name: cherry cream cheese dessert ; ingredients: cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling, slivered almonds ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat cream cheese until fluffy. Beat in sweetened condensed milk, lemon juice, and vanilla. Lightly swirl pie filling into cream cheese mixture. Spoon into serving dishes. Cover and chill. Garnish with almonds. Prep time includes refrigeration time. ; name: cherry almond creamy cheese pie ; ingredients: flour, butter, almonds, cream cheese, sugar, cool whip, cherry pie filling, almond liqueur ; preparation:Mix flour, butter and almonds to make crust and press into an 8 in pie pan. Bake at 350 deg for about 15 minutes or until brown. Mix sugar, 2 teaspoon almond liquor and cream cheese together thoroughly till creamy. Fold in cool whip. Put mixture into pie shell. Mix 1 teaspoon of almond liquour with cherry pie filling. Top cheese mixture with cherry pie filling. Chill 2 hours or overnight. ; name: cherry o creamy cheesecake pie ; ingredients: graham cracker crust, cream cheese, sweetened condensed milk, bottled lemon juice, vanilla extract, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Whip cream cheese until fluffy. Gradually beat in sweetened condensed milk and blend. Blend in reallemon lemon juice and vanilla extract. Pour into pie crust and chill until firm. Top with chilled cherry pie filling and chill for at least 2 hours. ; name: chocolate cherry pie ; ingredients: graham crackers, cream cheese, sugar, cocoa, egg, almond extract, cool whip, cherry pie filling ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Cream together cream cheese and sugar. Add cocoa and mix well. Add egg and almond extract. Mix well. Pour filling into crust. Bake for 35 minutes. Cool completely, then spread an even layer of cool whip over pie, then top with cherry pie filling. Refrigerate 2-3 hours before serving. ; name: cherry tiramisu cups ; ingredients: mascarpone cheese, kahlua, brewed coffee, white sugar, fresh cherries, water, amaretto, lemon juice, shortbread, powdered chocolate milk mix ; preparation:To make the cherry sauce, bring the water to a boil in a small saucepan. Add as much sugar as will dissolve into the water, then add the amaretto and lemon juice. Just before it starts to boil, add the cherries, and stir it over a high heat until the liquid takes on the color of the cherries. Reduce the heat, and simmer until most of the liquid has evaporated. Place the mixture in a small bowl, cover tightly, and place in the fridge. To make the coffee cream, simply combine the cheese, kahlua, and coffee in a bowl, and stir until the mixture is uniform in color. Add sugar to taste, if necessary. Once the cherry sauce has cooled, arrange the three components in layers in a martini glass, with the biscuit crumbs on the bottom, cherry sauce in the middle, and coffee cream on top. Refridgerate until the coffee cream is firm. Decorate with powdered sugar, and place a cherry on top. ; name: cherry chocolate cream pie ; ingredients: sweetened condensed milk, semi-sweet chocolate chips, salt, cherry pie filling, almond extract, vanilla extract, pie crusts, cool whip, maraschino cherry ; preparation:In a saucepan, combine chocolate chips, milk and salt. Cook and stir over low heat until chocolate melts. Stir in pie filling and extracts. Pour into crust. Chill 2-3 hours or until firm. Garnish with cool whip and cherries. ; name: chocolate cherry cobbler ; ingredients: dark sweet cherries, brownie mix, water, egg, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degree oven. Lightly grease a 13 x 9 pan, i use cooking spray. Place cherries in pan. In a large bowl combine brownie mix, water, egg and oil. Mix until well combined. Spread over the cherries. Bake for 50 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the middle comes out with moist crumbs. Serve warm with vanilla ice cream or whipped cream or cool whip. ; name: christmas cherry cream cheese jello mold ; ingredients: cherry jell-o, cream cheese, nuts, cola, dark sweet cherry ; preparation:

name: pasta house pasta con broccoli actual recipe ; ingredients: shell pasta, cream, butter, garlic, tomato sauce, broccoli, salt and pepper, button mushroom, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta until half done. Drain. Return pasta to the pot. Add cream, butter, garlic, tomato sauce, broccoli, salt and pepper. Bring to a hard boil. When noodles are fully cooked and sauce is starting to thicken, add mushrooms and stir to combine. Remove from the heat. Add cheese. Toss and serve. ; name: broccoli and noodles supreme ; ingredients: medium egg noodles, broccoli florets, cream of chicken and broccoli soup, sour cream, parmesan cheese, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:In large saucepan prepare noodles according to package directions. Add broccoli for last five minutes of cooking time. Drain. In same pan mix soup, sour cream, cheese, pepper, garlic powder, and noodle mixture. Over medium heat, heat through, stirring occasionally. ; name: pasta shells with chicken and broccoli ; ingredients: oil, broccoli, onion, garlic cloves, carrot, cooked chicken, salt, tomatoes, pasta shells, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Heat oil in a 10-inch skillet over medium heat. Cook broccoli, onion, garlic and carrot in oil about 10 minutes, stirring occasionally, until broccoli is crisp- tender. Stir in chicken, salt, and tomatoes. Cook about 3 minutes, stirring occasionally, just until chicken is hot. Toss with pasta. Sprinkle with cheese and parsley. ; name: parmesan chicken broccoli pasta ; ingredients: whole wheat spaghetti, italian dressing, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breast, broccoli florets, tomatoes, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti as directed on package. Meanwhile, heat dressing and garlic in large nonstick skillet on medium heat. Add chicken and broccoli. Cook and stir 5-7 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. Stir in tomatoes and half of the mozzarella cheese. Cook 1-2 minutes or until heated through, stirring occasionally. Drain spaghetti. Place on serving plate. Top with chicken mixture, remaining mozzarella cheese, and the parmesan cheese. ; name: chicken broccoli cheese casserole ; ingredients: chicken breasts, frozen broccoli, cream of celery soup, cream of mushroom soup, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, french fried onion rings ; preparation:Cut up chicken into small pieces and cook throughly. You may want to spice up the chicken with the spices of your choice in a bowl, mix the cream of celery, cream of mushroom and mayo together. Empty the bag of broccoli into a rectangular casserole dish. Spread the cooked chicken evenly over the broccoli. Spread the cream of celery, mushroom and mayo mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle shredded cheddar cheese evenly over the entire casserole. Cook at 350 for 30-35 minutes. Sprinkle the french onion toppings over the cheese and cook for another 5 mins. ; name: cunetto s spaghetti con broccoli actual recipe ; ingredients: spaghetti, half-and-half cream, butter, broccoli floret, sliced mushrooms, parsley, garlic, black pepper, salt, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Combine cream, butter, broccoli, mushrooms, parsley and seasonings in a sauce pan over medium heat for 3-5 minutes. Increase the heat of the cream sauce slightly and bring to a boil. When cream sauce boils, add cooked and drained spaghetti noodles to the sauce. Reduce over medium heat until cream sauce clings to the spaghetti. Remove from heat and toss in parmesan cheese, a little at a time until desired sauce consistency is achieved. ; name: cream of broccoli and cheddar soup ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, chicken broth, butter, flour, milk, black pepper, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Clean broccoli, chop florets and thinly slice stems. In a medium-size saucepan, combine broccoli and chicken broth. Heat to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 7 minutes, or until broccoli is fork tender. Transfer, one third at a time to a food processor. Process until fairly smooth. In the same saucepan, melt butter over medium heat, add flour. Cook, stirring constantly until bubbly. Add milk and pepper. Heat to a boil, stirring constantly. Reduce heat to medium and add the broccoli puree. Stir in cheese until the cheese melts, stirring constantly. ; name: pasta con broccoli ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, cream of chicken soup, cream of broccoli soup, half-and-half, butter, garlic, parmesan cheese, frozen broccoli, shell noodles ; preparation:

name: sauteed black olives with tomatoes ; ingredients: black olives, tomatoes, salt, olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh thyme leave, ground pepper, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:Rinse and drain olives. You can pit them or not, whichever you prefer. Combine tomatoes and salt in a medium bowl. Set aside. Heat olive oil in a medium skillet, add garlic, and cook over medium-low heat until just starting to brown, 2 to 5 minutes. Add olives and thyme. Cook over medium heat, stirring often, 3 to 4 minutes. Add tomatoes, cook over medium heat until juices thicken a bit and flavors are combined, 5 to 8 minutes. Season to taste with pepper. Serve this colorful an. Just before serving, stir in the parsley. ; name: wine and black olive pate ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, olives in brine, cumin seed, celery salt, clear honey, red wine ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium sized saucepan, add the cumin seeds and allow them to sizzle for a few seconds. Add the onions and garlic and saute gently for 3-5 minutes, or until soft. Add the tomatoes, olives, honey, a pinch of celery salt and honey. Mix together and cook gently for 10 minutes. Pour in the red wine, bring to the boil and simmer for another 20 minutes, uncovered. Turn up the heat and stir vigorously until the mixture has reduced to the consistency of a soft pate. This final stage will take about 5 minutes, but cooking time will depend on the thickness of the juice the chopped tomatoes are packed in. Turn into a serving dish and allow to cool. The flavours will intensify, the longer you leave the pate before eating. ; name: chicken with tomatoes and capers ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, olive oil, butter, onion, garlic, tarragon, italian-style tomatoes, red wine vinegar, capers, dry white wine ; preparation:Sprinkle chicken with salt& pepper. Heat oil and butter in skillet. Add chicken and saute over medinm-high heat, turning often to lightly brown. Put chicken into baking pan. Saute onions and garlic, add tomatoes, tarragon, vinegar, capers& wine. Pour over chicken and bake in 350 degress oven for 30 to 45 minutes, depending on size of chicken breast. ; name: broiled orange roughy ; ingredients: orange roughy fillets, olive oil, tabasco sauce, oregano, cayenne, thyme, dry breadcrumbs ; preparation:Stir oil and a bit of tabasco together set aside. Mix together bread crumbs with herbs set aside. Brush olive oil mixture on filets. Roll in breadcrumbs mixture. Broil 4-5 inches from the heat for 10 minutes. Flip it on the other side and broil another 4-10 minutes until fish flakes easily with a fork. The broiling time depends on the thickness of the filet. ; name: mediterranean vegetables in a creamy white wine sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, white onion, garlic clove, zucchini, mushrooms, dry white wine, chicken stock cube, heavy cream ; preparation:In a skillet over medium heat, warm up the olive oil. Add the green and red bell peppers, onion and garlic and cook, stirring, for 4 minutes. Add the zucchini and mushrooms and cook, still stirring, for a further 4 minutes. Add the dry white wine and simmer uncovered for 4 minutes. By the end of the 4 minutes, the wine should have reduced a little. Crumble in the chicken stock cube, stir it in and simmer for 2 minutes. Add the cream. Turn up the heat a little and simmer for 5 minutes, until the sauce has reduced and thickened. Serve over pasta, rice, baked potatoes, chicken or as a side dish. ; name: flounder saute ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onions, italian peppers, plum tomatoes, capers, black olives, italian parsley, flounder fillets, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in non-stick skillet. Cook onion until translucent. Add pepper and tomatoes. Cover and simmer about 10 minutes. Add capers, olives, parsley. Put flounder fillet on top and spoon some juices over it. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Cover and simmer about 5 minutes, until done. ; name: tomato olive caper tapenade ; ingredients: olive oil, shallot, cherry tomatoes, olive, capers, fresh oregano, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Heat oil in skillet over medium heat. Add the shallot and cook until begins to soften. Add the tomatoes and cook, stirring until soft. Add olives and capers and cook for 30 seconds more. Stir in oregano and vinegar and remove from heat. Spoon over fish. ; name: orange roughy with sauteed olives capers tomatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, orange roughy fillets, fresh parsley, dry crushed red pepper, cherry tomatoes, kalamata olives, capers, garlic cloves, sauvignon blanc wine ; preparation:

name: shrimp in mustard sauce ; ingredients: butter, large shrimp, garlic clove, shallots, all-purpose flour, dry white wine, chicken broth, dijon mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt 1 tbs butter over medium high heat. Add the shrimp and garlic. Cook, tossing, until the shrimp starts to turn pink on the outside but is stil translucent on the inside, about 2 min. Transfer to a plate and set aside. Reduce the heat to medium and in the same skillet, melt the remaining butter. Add the shallot and cook until softened, 1-2 minute. Add the flour and cook for 30 secs, whisking constantly. Gradually add the wine, broth, and mustard - whisking constantly. Simmer until it is as thick as heavy cream, about 5 minute. Return the shrimp to the skillet. Bring to a simmer and cook until the shrimp are opaque throughout, about 2 minute. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: curried shrimp with cilantro ; ingredients: olive oil, shallots, garlic cloves, curry powder, reduced-sodium vegetable broth, shrimp, fresh lime juice, low-fat sour cream, fresh cilantro, salt and pepper ; preparation:Over medium heat, heat oil in skillet. Add shallots and garlic. Cook and stir about 2 minutes until tender. Add curry powder. Cook and stir about 1 minute until the mixture becomes fragrant. Add the broth and bring to simmer. Add the lime juice and shrimp. Simmer until the shrimp are cooked through, about 3 minutes. Remove from heat. Stir in sour cream and cilantro. Season with salt and pepper, serve immediately. ; name: broiled shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, olive oil, garlic, parsley, crushed red pepper flakes, oregano, salt and pepper, fresh breadcrumbs ; preparation:Preheat broiler. Put shrimp in lg. Bowl. Add all other ingredients. Toss well to coat shrimp. Place on shallow baking sheet. Broil 7 in from heat for about 6-7 min, turning once. Serve with sauce from pan. Add a little butter if you like. ; name: garlic shrimp ; ingredients: vegetable oil, butter, garlic, shrimp, salt and pepper, lemons ; preparation:Heat oil and butter in a large skillet. Add garlic and shrimp. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Saute 2-3 minutes or until shrimp turn pink. Turn shrimp with spatula. Cook shrimp 2 minutes longer on other side. Remove shrimp to serving platter. Garnish with lemon wedges. We give this a little squirt with the lemon wedge. ; name: outrageously good broiled shrimp ; ingredients: shrimp, butter, garlic salt, unseasoned breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, dried parsley ; preparation:Butterfly shrimp and place on non-stick baking pan or line pan with aluminum foil for easier cleanup. Brush shrimp with melted butter. Sprinkle lightly with garlic salt. Mix together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese and parsley. Sprinkle lightly over shrimp. Drizzle lightly with additional melted butter. Broil until light brown. ; name: garlic shrimp with basil tomatoes ; ingredients: grape tomatoes, fresh basil, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, olive oil, raw shrimp, garlic ; preparation:If using larger than cherry or grape tomatoes, cut them in segments about the same size as your shrimp. In a medium bowl, combine tomatoes & basil. Season with salt & pepper. Set aside. Rinse, drain & pat shrimp dry. Season with salt & pepper. Heat a large saute pan or skillet over medium heat. When hot, add shrimp and saute for about 1 minute. Add garlic, and continue to saute shrimp until pink and cooked through. Add shrimp and garlic to bowl of tomatoes & basil, and toss well. May be served hot. ; name: boat shrimp ; ingredients: butter, shrimp, onion, garlic salt, salt, basil, flour, vinegar ; preparation:Grab a cast iron pan. Set it on the stove. Melt butter on medium-high heat. Add shrimp and onion. Stir while cooking until shrimp are coated. Sprinkle on spices to taste. Sprinkle on flour. Turn and coat shrimp. Add enough water to make gravy. Add vinegar. Serve over rice. ; name: fig and horseradish glazed shrimp ; ingredients: large raw shrimp, butter, olive oil, garlic cloves, figs, horseradish, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: barbecued black eyed peas ; ingredients: bacon, celery, onion, carrot, black-eyed peas, prepared mustard, barbecue sauce, green pepper, potato chips, liquid ; preparation:Soak the black eyes in water overnight. Next day add 1 tsp salt and gently boil for about 30 minutes. Dice the bacon and fry until crisp. Remove from pan. In the hot bacon fat, cook the onion, celery and carrot until thoroughly heated. Add the black eyes, liquid, bbq sauce and mustard. Gently mix. Simmer for 15 minutes, adding more liquid if needed. Just before serving, stir in the green pepper and crushed potato chips. Serve topped with the bacon. ; name: black eyed pea skillet dinner ; ingredients: ground beef, onions, green pepper, black-eyed peas, whole tomatoes, dried thyme, salt, pepper, hot sauce ; preparation:Add ground beef, onion, and green pepper to a skillet. Cook and crumble meat over medium heat until beef is browned. Drain well. Add the rest of the ingredients to the skillet. Bring to a boil, lower heat, and simmer 30 minutes. ; name: mama amanda s black eyed peas ; ingredients: black-eyed peas, bacon, onion, garlic cloves, chicken broth, salt, pepper, garlic powder ; preparation:Take your bacon in a cast iron skillet and fry until crispy. You will have bits of crunchy goodness in bottom of pan. Take diced onion and cook in drippings until translucent. Add garlic and stir for just a moment or two. Pour in broth and de-glaze pan by scraping up all of the bacon yummies. Pour in peas and stir together. Season with salt and pepper to taste and add garlic powder. Cover and let cook for about 2 hours. ; name: the black eyed peas baked squash ; ingredients: yellow squash, eggs, whole wheat rolls, butter, sugar, salt, pepper, onion ; preparation:Cut squash and onion in pieces, boil together, then reduce heat until tender. Drain & mash squash some. Combine squash, onion, eggs, bread bits, butter, sugar, salt. Put into a 3 quart dish that has been oiled. Bake at 350 until lightly browned. Sometimes i toss in some velveeta - when the kids were small they liked it with the cheese. ; name: corn black bean salsa ; ingredients: black beans, corn kernels, rotel diced tomatoes, green onion, fresh cilantro, oil, red wine vinegar, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Combine beans, corn, diced tomatoes, green onions and cilantro in large bowl. Whisk together oil, vinegar, salt and black pepper. Pour dressing over bean mixture. Stir gently to combine. Can be served immediately, or chilled for a few hours before serving. ; name: classic black beans and rice ; ingredients: onion, bell peppers, garlic cloves, black beans, water, oregano, salt, cider vinegar ; preparation:Saute the onion till it begins to caramelize. Add garlic, then bell pepper. Saute some more, then add the black beans. Add the remaining ingredients and simmer till thickened. If you need more water, add a bit at a time. Instead of salt, use a packet of goya sazon, available in the spanish section of your local supermarket - at least in the east coast. Otherwise just use salt. Serve over rice. ; name: soupy black beans ; ingredients: olive oil, scallions, garlic cloves, green chilies, black beans, water, salsa, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, heat olive oil over medium heat. Add scallions and garlic cloves and saute until fragrant, about 1 minute. Add black beans and water. Increase heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add salsa and stir until heated through. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: black eyed peas w rice ; ingredients: bacon, fresh onion, black-eyed peas, stewed tomatoes, cooked rice, hot sauce, garlic powder, black pepper, salt, salsa ; preparation:

name: new potato salad for a crowd ; ingredients: red potatoes, hard-boiled egg, onion, dill pickle, celery seed, sour cream, mayonnaise, salt & pepper ; preparation:Peel, cube, and boil potatoes in large pot of salted water. In another pan, boil eggs. When both have been cooked through, drain and let cool. Peel eggs and chop. In large mixing bowl add cooled potatoes, chopped egg, onion, pickles, and celery seed, salt and pepper. Add sour cream and mayonnaise and stir gently to combine being careful not to mash potatoes. Refrigerate until completely cooled before serving or overnight. ; name: cooked potato or pasta salad dressing ; ingredients: sugar, flour, salt, ground mustard, eggs, water, half-and-half, white vinegar, black pepper, mayonnaise ; preparation:In a medium saucepan mix all ingredients together. Bring to a light boil, whisking constantly until thickened. Remove from heat, cool slightly then whisk in mayo. Season with salt and pepper. Cool completely before adding to you potato or pasta salad. ; name: simple tasty potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, hard-boiled eggs, sweet pickle, mayonnaise, salt and pepper, onion ; preparation:Boil potatoes, with skins on, until just tender. Drain and let cool. When potatoes are cooled, peel and cut into bite-size pieces. Place in a large bowl. Coarsely chop eggs. Add eggs and pickle chunks to potatoes. Gently toss in mayonnaise. Be sure to toss lightly to avoid breaking up the potato too much. Add salt and pepper to taste. Also add onion, if using. Stir gently again, just to combine. At our house, we usually serve a small bowl of onion on the side so people can add as much as they like, or none at all. ; name: marinated potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, water, white wine vinegar, white sugar, green onion, hard-boiled eggs, salt and pepper, celery seed, mayonnaise ; preparation:Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil. Add potatoes and cook until tender but still firm, about 15 minutes. Drain and allow to cool. Slice cooled potatoes and layer in a large bowl or dish. In a saucepan combine water, vinegar and sugar. Bring to a boil and cook for one minute. Remove from heat and pour over potatoes. Cover and chill for at least 12 hours. Drain excess marinade and add onions, eggs, salt, pepper, celery seed and mayonnaise. Mix well and serve chilled. ; name: favorite potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, eggs, onion, pickle, salt and pepper, mayonnaise, ranch dressing mix ; preparation:Cook, peel, and cut potatoes into bite-sized pieces. In a bowl, mix some mayonnaise and ranch powder. Add potatoes, egg, onion, and some finely chopped pickle in bowl. Mix ingredients together. Add salt, pepper, and a little pickle juice. Refrigerate and serve. ; name: traditional egg salad ; ingredients: eggs, water, mayonnaise, salt, white pepper ; preparation:Fill a medium pot with three to four quarts of water and bring to a boil. Gently place each egg one at a time into the pot with a long-handled slotted spoon, resting them on the bottom of the boiling water. Bring back to a full boil and cook for 5 minutes. Turn off the heat and let eggs sit in the hot water for 13 minutes. Drain all the water and then shake the pot with the eggs still inside to break the shells. Under running warm water, peel off shells and set cooked eggs on a paper towel to dry. Roughly chop eggs into a medium bowl and add mayonnaise, salt and pepper. Stir and taste. Add more salt or pepper if needed. Cover bowl and place in the refrigerator until egg salad is below 40 degrees. Serve with crisp lettuce and your favorite bread. ; name: prize winning potato salad ; ingredients: potato, hard-boiled eggs, green onions, carrot, celery, radishes, miracle whip, prepared horseradish, pepper, frozen green pea ; preparation:Cook potatoes in boiling water until tender. Drain potatoes and cut cup but not too small. Cook, peel and cut up hard boiled eggs. Chop green onions, shred carrot, and finely chop celery and radishes. Add to potatoes and eggs. Add enough miracle whip to moisten. Add horseradish and pepper. Lastly, add still frozen green peas just 5 to 10 minutes prior to serving. ; name: potato egg salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, italian dressing, salt, celery, green onion, hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, sour cream, dry mustard, horseradish ; preparation:

name: basted baked potato ; ingredients: olive oil, oregano, italian seasoning, fresh ground black pepper, baking potatoes ; preparation:Mix the olive oil and spices together. Wash the potatoes and pierce the skin a few times with a fork. Smear the oil mixture over the potatoes, best done with a pastry brush. Place the potatoes on a baking tray, lined with foil, and bake as you normally would. I do mine in a 200 c fan oven for 30-40 minutes. Serve with lots of butter. ; name: greek lemon roasted potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, water, olive oil, fresh lemon juice, dried oregano, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Place potatoes in a large baking dish. Add remaining ingredients to the dish and toss until well coated. Bake uncovered about 50 minutes until tender and brown on the edges. Turn the potatoes halfway into cooking time and add more water if the water is all absorbed. Turn on the broiler for a few minutes to make them nice and brown. ; name: mediterranean vegetables ; ingredients: vegetable oil cooking spray, red onion, zucchini, crookneck yellow squash, balsamic vinegar, fresh thyme, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Spray large baking sheet with nonstick spray. Toss onion and next 5 ingredients together on prepared baking sheet. Spread in single layer. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Bake vegetables until tender and brown around edges, stirring occasionally, about 35 minutes. Makes 4 servings. ; name: herb roasted mediterranean vegetables ; ingredients: vegetables, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, dried rosemary leaves, salt, sugar, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Toss vegetables with oil, garlic, rosemary, salt and sugar. Place in 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Add a little water. Bake at 375 degrees f for 20 minutes. Stir and cover with aluminum foil. Bake another 20 minutes or until tender. Drain of any extra liquid before storing. Sprinkle with cheese. ; name: skillet italian herbed country potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, butter, olive oil, garlic clove, rosemary, sage, thyme, salt, black pepper ; preparation:In a large non-stick skillet over medium heat, melt butter and olive oil together. Add the remaining ingredients to the skillet. Stir until potatoes are evenly coated with spice mixture and onion slices are evenly distributed. Cook covered on medium heat for 15 minutes, tossing and turning the potatoes every few minutes. Potatoes will be done when slightly browned and fork-tender. ; name: tunisian potato olive salad ; ingredients: baby potatoes, salt, sugar, paprika, cumin, cayenne pepper, garlic cloves, oil-cured black olives, extra virgin olive oil, lemon, juice of ; preparation:Place the potatoes in a pot with water to cover. Add 1 teaspoon salt and the sugar. Bring to a boil over high heat then reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender. Drain the potatoes, return them to the pan and shake in the dry pan for a few minutes, until thoroughly dry. Cut the potatoes into thick slices, several per potato, or into quarters. Place in a bowl and toss with the cumin, paprika, cayenne, garlic and olives. Dress with the olive oil, lemon juice and salt. Refrigerate until ready to serve, or serve at room temperature. ; name: broccoli potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, broccoli floret, low-fat sour cream, green onions, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Prick the scrubbed potatoes and bake for about 1 hour. Cool on a rack for about 15 min. Meanwhile steam the broccoli for 5 minutes. Slice each potato in half and gently scoop out most of the flesh leaving the shells in tact. In a blender or food processor, using the metal blade, combine the potato flesh, sour cream, broccoli, green onion, garlic, salt& pepper. Process until smooth. Spoon the potato mixture into potato shells. Place on a baking sheet. Bake until heated through about l5 to 20 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: mediterranean topped baked potatoes ; ingredients: low-fat yogurt, sun-dried tomato, kalamata olives, feta, dried italian herb seasoning, ground pepper, russet potatoes ; preparation:

name: roasted red pepper provolone panini ; ingredients: bread, prosciutto, roasted red pepper, provolone cheese, olive oil ; preparation:Place prosciutto, pepper, and cheese on bread. Heat grill pan and have something heavy near by to weigh down the lid. Lighty oil pan and add panini. Press down on top with another pan or heavy plate, cook untill ightly browned. Flip and cook other side. Enoy. Add whatever additions. ; name: panini with scrambled eggs and tomatoes ; ingredients: eggs, milk, salt, fresh black pepper, olive oil, pesto sauce, panini bread, tomatoes, provolone cheese ; preparation:In a bowl, mix eggs, milk, salt and pepper. In a skillet, heat oil at medium heat. Add the mixture of egg and cook, stirring often, until it makes big creamy pieces. Spread pesto in the panini, add scrambled eggs and garnish with slices of tomatoes and cheese. Heat another large skillet or a skillet with ridges at medium heat. Add panini and cook, pushing them, for about 8 minutes or until golden and crispy and cheese has melted. ; name: scrambled egg and breakfast sausage panini ; ingredients: butter, green onions, breakfast sausage, pecan pieces, eggs, salt and pepper, italian bread, bocconcini, fresh fruit ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt butter over medium heat. Add the onions, sausages and pecans. Saut until onions are just softened, about 3 minutes. Add eggs and cook, stirring with a wooden spoon, until eggs are firm but not dry. Remove from heat and set aside. Meanwhile, heat a panini maker or a grill pan over medium-high heat. Divide sausage mixture into 4 portions and mound each portion on one slice of bread. Top each with bocconcini slices and top with remaining bread slices. Lightly butter the outside of each panini. Cook until both sides of each panini are golden. Serve immediately. Serve warm and garnish with maple syrup and fresh fruit if desired. ; name: tomato cheese basil tea sandwiches ; ingredients: white bread, butter, mayonnaise, tomatoes, provolone cheese, fresh basil leaves, salt and pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Cut 16 small rounds of bread with a round cookie cutter--should be able to get two out of each piece of bread, otherwise, use a larger cutter and more bread. Spread one of the rounds with a little butter and then a little mayonnaise. Top each with a slice of tomato, cheese round, and a couple of basil leaves. Lightly salt and pepper each one and put a couple of drops of olive oil on top. Place other bread round on top. Refrigerate till ready for the tea. ; name: fettuccini with pancetta and tomato cream sauce ; ingredients: pancetta, olive oil, garlic cloves, diced tomatoes, dry white wine, whipping cream, dried basil, fettuccine pasta, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pancetta or bacon in large skillet until crisp. Transfer to paper towels and drain, using slotted spoon. Add olive oil and garlic to drippings and saute 30 seconds. Add tomatoes, with juices, wine, and cream and bring to a slow boil. Add basil. Reduce heat and simmer until slightly reduced. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Toss with cooked pasta and serve topped with parmesan. ; name: grilled portabella sandwiches or panini ; ingredients: portabella mushroom caps, vidalia onions, olive oil, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, italian bread ; preparation:Mix together oil, salt and pepper, and garlic. Marinate mushrooms and onions with this for about thirty minutes. Grill mushrooms and onions over medium heat until done, brushing on the oil mixture liberally throughout cooking time. Cut the bread open length-wise, brush it with the oil, then lightly toast on the grill. Layer on the onions and mushrooms. Press sandwich together for a few minutes. Cut into 6 pieces or so and serve. ; name: open face tomato basil sandwiches ; ingredients: fresh basil leaves, parmesan cheese, olive oil, garlic clove, greek yogurt, english muffins, tomatoes, salt, pepper ; preparation:Blend basil, parmesan cheese, olive oil and garlic in food processor or blender until well combined. Add yogurt, and process until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. Preheat broiler. Place muffins on baking sheet. Broil 1 to 2 minutes, or until lightly toasted. Spread each half with basil mixture, and top with some tomato slices. Broil 1 to 2 minutes or until heated through. ; name: no press panini with mozzarella roasted red pepper and basil ; ingredients: butter, white bread, mozzarella cheese, roasted red peppers, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, basil leaves ; preparation:

name: tropical green beans ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh green beans, yellow onion, garlic cloves, salt, balsamic vinegar, hearts of palm, sun-dried tomato, pine nuts, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: garden green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, fresh mushrooms, onions, garlic, olive oil, sliced water chestnuts, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: jazzed up frozen green beans ; ingredients: frozen green beans, bacon, chicken broth, onion powder ; preparation:Cook frozen green beans according to package directions, using the lowest time given. In a large skillet, fry bacon until desired doneness. Drain on paper towel and return to skillet. Add cooked green beans, chicken broth, and onion powder to the skillet. Stir to combine. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium and cook for ten minutes or until most of the liquid is evaporated, stirring occasionally. ; name: asian green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, soy sauce, vegetable oil, vinegar, sesame oil, garlic clove ; preparation:Wash the beans and snap the ends off. Blanche them in boiling water for 3-4 minutes. Drain immediately and put into an ice cold water bath to retain crispness. Mix remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over cooled green beans and refrigerate for at least half an hour, then serve. The longer they marinate the more intensely the flavors will develop. ; name: green beans with garlic butter ; ingredients: green beans, butter, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Cook beans according to package directions. In a separate bowl, combine butter, garlic and pepper. Drain beans. Place in serving bowl. Add butter mixture. Toss to coat evenly. Serve immediately. ; name: green beans with tomato onion and bacon ; ingredients: green beans, bacon, onion, tomatoes, garlic clove, dried oregano, salt, lemon juice, pepper ; preparation:In a 2 quart saucepan, add green beans in enough water just to cover them, and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, uncovered about 15 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain and immediately rinse with cool water to stop cooking. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium-high heat until crisp. Stirring frequently. Reserve 1 tablespoons of bacon fat and drain off the rest and place bacon on plate covered with paper towels. In the same skillet add onion and 1 tablespoons bacon fat and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until tender. Stir in tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper into onions and simmer about 5 minutes. Stir in green beans and heat through. Add bacon and stir to blend. Transfer mixture to serving dish and drizzle with lemon or lime juice. ; name: green beans with herbs ; ingredients: green beans, water, butter, onion, celery, garlic, rosemary, basil ; preparation:Place beans and water in sauce pan and bring to a boil. Cook for 6-8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain and return to pan. Add remaining ingredients to pan. Cover and cook for 4-6 minutes or until vegetables are tender. ; name: homestyle green beans ; ingredients: frozen green beans, onion, garlic cloves, bacon, butter, chicken broth, salt and pepper, tabasco sauce ; preparation:

name: garlic skillet red potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, small red potatoes, garlic cloves, salt, pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat oil over medium-high heat. Stir in potatoes. Cover skillet. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are almost tender, about 12-15 minutes. Uncover, reduce heat to low. Stir in garlic, salt and pepper. Cook, stirring, until potatoes are tender, about 2 minutes. Sprinkle parsley and add salt to taste if desired. ; name: parmesan garlic potatoes ; ingredients: butter, garlic powder, parmesan cheese, red potatoes, olive oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Set oven to 375f. Grease a 13 x 9-inch baking dish. Pour the melted butter into the bottom of the baking dish, then sprinkle with garlic powder, then parmesan cheese. In a large bowl toss the potato halves in olive oil and season with salt and pepper. Place the potatoes cut-side down over the parmesan cheese in the baking dish. Bake for about 40-45 minutes, or until tender. ; name: broccoli potatoes ; ingredients: baking potatoes, broccoli floret, low-fat sour cream, green onions, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425f. Prick the scrubbed potatoes and bake for about 1 hour. Cool on a rack for about 15 min. Meanwhile steam the broccoli for 5 minutes. Slice each potato in half and gently scoop out most of the flesh leaving the shells in tact. In a blender or food processor, using the metal blade, combine the potato flesh, sour cream, broccoli, green onion, garlic, salt& pepper. Process until smooth. Spoon the potato mixture into potato shells. Place on a baking sheet. Bake until heated through about l5 to 20 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: potatoes gourmet ; ingredients: potatoes, cheese, butter, sour cream, green onions, salt, pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes in skins and cool, peel and grate. Combine with 4 tblsp butter, melted. Stir in cheese until almost melted. Blend with rest of the ingredients. Put in a 2 quart pan sprayed with cooking oil. Dot the top with 2 tblsp butter. Cover and bake at 300 about 25 minutes. ; name: potatoes sauteed with shrimp ; ingredients: red potatoes, olive oil, shrimp, garlic, lemon juice, parsley, salt, red pepper flakes ; preparation:Fry potatoes in 3 t olive oil until browned and tender. Remove and keep warm. Add remaining oil to skillet, add shrimp. Cook for 2 minutes. Add remaining ingredients and saute for 3 minutes. Return potatoes and mix well. ; name: roasted garlic and rosemary potatoes ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh rosemary, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Combine oil, rosemary, garlic, salt and pepper in large bowl. Add potato slices and turn them until throughly coated with the dressing. Arrange in baking dish, slightly overlapping each slice. Place in the oven and bake for 60 minutes until golden crisp. ; name: couch potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, mozzarella cheese, pepperoni, dried oregano, garlic salt ; preparation:In 12x8 baking dish, arrange potato halves, cut side up, around edges of dish. Add 1 tablespoon water and cook, covered, on high, 8-10 minutes until tender, rotating dish halfway through cooking time. Drain. Meanwhile, combine all remaining ingredients. Place this mixture on cut sides of potatoes and cook on high 1-2 minutes until cheese melts. ; name: portuguese potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, salt, garlic salt, parsley flakes, diced pimento, cheddar cheese, seasoned stuffing mix, butter ; preparation:

name: fried cabbage bacon ; ingredients: cabbage, onion, bacon, olive oil, garlic clove, salt and pepper ; preparation:Saute the onion and bacon in the olive oil in a large pot until the onion is softened and the bacon is cooked through. Add the garlic and cook for about another two minutes, stirring frequently. Add the cabbage to the pot. It will take up a lot of room but will wilt down as it cooks. Cook until the cabbage is done, stirring frequently. It will take about ten to twelve minutes. If you want a softer cabbage, cover the pot and let it steam for about an extra five minutes or so. If desired, a little bit of sugar and vinegar can be added near the end of cooking time. ; name: slow cooked garlic and onions with toasted baguette ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, onions, anchovy fillets, fresh rosemary leaf, baguette, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a saucepan over medium heat. Add garlic and onion. Cook, stirring, for 6 minutes or until onion has softened. Add anchovies and rosemary. Stir to combine, then cover, reduce heat to low and cook for 20 minutes or until onion and garlic are very soft. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Preheat grill to high. Split baguette in half lengthways and cut widthways into 8cm pieces. Toast under grill until golden brown. Top with garlic and onion and serve. ; name: creamy cabbage and potato soup ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, russet potatoes, water, cabbage, skim milk, flour, velveeta reduced fat cheese product, salt, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Spray soup pot with cooking spray over medium-high heat. Add the garlic and onion and saute for 3-5 minutes. Add the potatoes and 3c water. Bring to a boil. Then reduce heat and simmer for for 15 minutes. Stirring occasionally. Add shredded cabbage and cook for 10-15 minutes or until cabbage is tender. Whisk the water, flour and skim milk together and add to to soup. Add cubed cheese and stir until cheese is melted and soup is heated through. Add salt and pepper to taste. ; name: onion and olive tart ; ingredients: olive oil, white onions, garlic cloves, shortcrust pastry, roma tomatoes, anchovy fillets, black olives ; preparation:Heat the olive oil in a preferably non-stick pan over a low heat, and saut the onions and garlic, until they are softened but not browned, for about 25 minutes. Drain and reserve the oil. And cool. Preheat the oven to 200c, lightly grease a 29cm x 21cm rectangular flan pan, and press the pastry firmly into the pan. Trim and discard any excess pastry and chill the pastry-lined pan for 15 minutes. Spread the onions and garlic over the pastry, top with the sliced tomatoes, anchovy fillets and olives, and drizzle with the reserved oil. Bake for 40-45 minutes, until the pastry is crisp and golden. Serve. ; name: garlic pork cutlets with buttered cabbage ; ingredients: olive oil, pork loin chops, potatoes, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, white wine, butter, cabbage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 200 degree celsius. Heat oil in a frypan that will take the cutlets in a single layer and which will go into a preheated oven. Over a moderately high heat, brown the chops on both sides until they are golden, remove to a plate. Add the potatoes and cook them until they are a golden colour, remove to a plate. Add the bruised garlic and cook for a minute of so longer. Add the chops back into the pan, and top with the potatoes and some of the bruised garlic. Season with salt and pepper and pour over the wine and boil for a few minutes. Put pan into the oven and cook for 15 minutes. Meanwhile melt the butter in a medium pot and add the cabbage and season with pepper and salt, cover and cook over a low heat for 3 to 5 minutes. To serve place a bed of cabbage on the plates and top with a chop and a portion of the garlic and potatoe wedges. ; name: simple cabbage and mushroom side ; ingredients: butter, rindless bacon, mushrooms, cabbage, spring onion, black pepper ; preparation:Chop bacon, slice mushrooms and shred cabbage. Slice spring onion if using. Set aside. Heat butter on medium heat in a large fry pan. Add bacon and mushrooms and cook for 1 minute. Add the cabbage and cook for a further 4 or 5 minutes until wilted. Stir in spring onion, if using, and season with black pepper. ; name: wilted cabbage ; ingredients: bacon, onion, sugar, vinegar, salt, pepper, cabbage ; preparation:Cook bacon in large skillet until crisp. Remove bacon, reserving drippings in skillet. Crumble bacon, set aside. Add onions and next 4 ingredients to drippings in skillet, stirring until blended. Stir in cabbage. Cook over medium heat, uncovered, 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. Sprinkle with reserved bacon. ; name: perogies with cabbage bacon and onions ; ingredients: pierogies, olive oil, bacon, onion, garlic cloves, savoy cabbage, water, salt, fresh dill ; preparation:

name: baked fillet of sole ; ingredients: fillet of sole, rosemary, white wine, lemon juice, scallions, mushroom, parsley, salt & pepper ; preparation:Place fillets in a greased baking dish. Combine rosemary, wine, lemon juice and pour over the fish. Top with scallions and mushrooms. Cover with aluminum foil. Bake in preheated 350-degree oven for about 15 minutes or until flaky. Sprinkle with parsley and season with salt and pepper. ; name: baked sole fillets ; ingredients: sole fillets, onion, sour cream, white wine, all-purpose flour, lemon, juice of, paprika, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f degrees. Butter a shallow baking dish and arrange fish pieces in it. Cover fish with onion slices. In a small bowl, whisk together sour cream, wine, flour, lemon juice and the seasonings. Pour over the fish and onions. Bake, uncovered, for 25 minutes or until fish is tender. Do not overcook or fish will dry out. ; name: baked rolled sole ; ingredients: breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, fresh parsley, oregano, lemon zest, salt and pepper, flounder fillets, lemon juice, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400. In a small bowl, combine the bread crumbs, parmesan, parsley, oregano, lemon zest, salt and pepper. Place the fish, smooth side up, on a work surface. Sprinkle the mixture over the fish and roll up from one short end. Place the rolls seam-side down in a 9 inch square glass baking dish. Drizzle the lemon juice over the fish. Bake uncovered for 10 minutes or until the fish is just cooked through and the filling is hot. ; name: sole with light lemon sauce ; ingredients: low sodium chicken broth, garlic cloves, carrots, asparagus, sole fillet, flour, butter, dry white wine, lemon peel ; preparation:In large deep skillet, add broth, garlic, carrots and asparagus and bring to boil. Reduce heat to medium low, add fish and cook for about 3 minutes until fish is done. Carefully remove fish and veggies with a slotted spoon to serving plate. Cover and keep warm. Mix together flour and butter. Bring the broth to a boil and gradually whisk in the butter mixture until sauce begins to thicken. Remove from heat and whisk in wine, lemon rind and juice. Season with pepper is desired. Pour sauce over fish and veggies. Serve with potatoes, brown rice or a multigrain roll. ; name: pan sauteed sole flounder parmesan ; ingredients: sole fillets, eggs, parmesan cheese, vegetable oil, salt, white pepper, paprika, lemon juice ; preparation:Season the grated cheese with pepper and paprika to taste. Dip fish in the eggs and then coat in the parmesan. Heat oil in frying pan and add fish cooking about 2 minutes on each side, depending on thickness, over medium-high heat,. Season with salt and pepper during cooking. Serve with lemon juice. ; name: crispy pan fried sole ; ingredients: eggs, breadcrumbs, fresh thyme, salt, pepper, sole fillets, extra virgin olive oil, unsalted butter ; preparation:In a shallow bowl, beat eggs. In another shallow bowl, combine the following four ingredients. Dip the fish pieces into the crumbs, into the egg, and than into the crumbs again. Pat crumbs into fish fillets. In 12-inch non-stick skillet, heat 1 tablespoon butter and 1 tablespoon oil until butter melts. Add 2 pieces of fish and cook. Only turn fish once while browning both sides, approximately 6 minutes. When fillets are golden brown add remaining butter, oil, and fish. Repeat the steps above to cook fillets. ; name: sole with pesto cream ; ingredients: sole fillets, salt and pepper, olive oil, butter, heavy cream, basil pesto, lemon peel ; preparation:Season both sides of sole with salt and black pepper. In a large skillet, heat oil and butter over medium high heat. Add sole and cook 1 to 2 minutes per side, until golden brown. In medium bowl whisk together heavy cream, pesto, and lemon zest. Add mixture to pan and bring to a simmer, until sauce thickens. Serve fish with rice and spoon sauce overall. ; name: portuguese filet of sole ; ingredients: sole fillets, lemon juice, butter, dry sherry, soy sauce, parsley, egg yolk ; preparation:

name: chocolate chewy cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, unsifted flour, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a bowl, combine flour, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt. Set aside. In a large mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla, mix well. Gradually beat in the flour mixture then add chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto greased baking sheets. Bake 10-12 minutes. Let cookies rest on baking sheets for 2 minutes before removing with a spatula to wire racks to cool completely. ; name: cherry chocolate cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, pure vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cocoa powder, cream of tartar, baking soda, salt, dried cherries ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a large cookie sheet. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl with mixer at high speed, until light and fluffy. Add egg and vanilla. Beat until well blended. Combine flour, cocoa, cream of tartar, baking soda and salt in a medium bowl. Add to butter mixture. Mix until uniform. Mix in chopped cherries. Drop dough by tablespoonfuls onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake about 10-12 minutes or until set. ; name: birthday cookie ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream butter and sugars. Add egg and vanilla. Mix on low speed, add dry ingredients. Mix well. Stir in chocolate chips or m&ms. Spray a 12 inch round pizza pan with pam and spread cookie dough evenly to the edges. Bake at 325 degrees f for 15 to 20 minutes, or until light golden brown. When cool, decorate as desired. ; name: cherry gems cookies ; ingredients: butter, eggs, brown sugar, flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, dried cherries, almonds ; preparation:Mix butter, eggs, brown sugar, and flour until well combined. Add baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, vanilla, cherries, and nuts. Roll dough into logs that are approximately 1 inch around. Wrap in waxed paper and place in the refrigerator until ready to bake. When you are ready to bake, preheat oven to 350 degrees. Slice logs into 1 inch rounds and place on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake 12 minutes or until golden brown. Cool 5 minutes before transfering to a cooling rack. ; name: fat free chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, baking soda, salt, karo syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg white until blended. Drop by rounded teaspoon onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack. ; name: dark chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, unsalted butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together in a bowl. Cream butter and sugar in another bowl, add eggs and vanilla. Mix in dry ingredients. Drop by tablespoonsful on ungreased cookies sheets, 2 inches apart, and bake in preheated 375 oven about 12 minutes, til tops are puffed and set. Cool on rack. ; name: chocolate chip and peanut cookies ; ingredients: butter, granulated sugar, brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, salt, baking soda, semisweet chocolate piece, peanuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Cream butter and sugars. Add egg, vanilla, and beat until light and fluffy. Sift together flour, salt and baking soda. Stir into creamed mixture. Blend well. Add chocolate pieces and peanuts and stir by hand. Drop from teaspoon about 2 inches apart on a greased cookie sheet. Bake in 375f oven for 12 minutes. Remove from sheet immediately. ; name: baby ruth cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, baby ruth candy bars ; preparation:

name: mandarin orange bread ; ingredients: eggs, sugar, flour, salt, baking soda, quick-cooking oats, mandarin oranges, orange gelatin, nuts ; preparation:In a large bowl combine the eggs and sugar. Beat until light and fluffy, about 2 minutes. In a small bowl sift together the flour, salt, and baking soda. Add the flour mixture to the egg mixture and stir until smooth. Add the remaining ingredients and mix well. Spoon into greased and floured 9 x 5-inch loaf pans. Bake at 325-degrees for 1 hour. Remove from pans immediately. Let stand for 24 hours before slicing. Makes 2 loaves. ; name: orange honey bread ; ingredients: shortening, honey, egg, orange rind, sifted flour, baking powder, baking soda, orange juice, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Cream shortening. Add honey, orange rind and egg. Sift dry ingredients and add to creamed mixture. Add orange juice and nuts. Bake 70 minutes. ; name: orange french toast ; ingredients: milk, eggs, salt, thick bread, powdered sugar, oranges ; preparation:In a large bowl beat the eggs, milk, and salt. Dip bread in batter. Fry in a frying pan with butter. Add powdered sugar on top. Add the juice of an orange on top. ; name: orange shortbread ; ingredients: unsalted butter, superfine sugar, orange zest, salt, all-purpose flour, coarse sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Blend together butter, superfine sugar, zest, and salt in a bowl with a fork. Sift flour into butter mixture and blend with fork until mixture forms a soft dough. Transfer dough to an ungreased large baking sheet and pat into a 10- by 5-inch rectangle. Prick dough all over with fork and sprinkle with coarse sugar, pressing it gently into dough with your finger. Score dough crosswise with back of a knife into 6 rectangles, then score each rectangle into 2 triangles. Bake shortbread in middle of oven until edges are golden but center is pale, 12 to 17 minutes. Cool on baking sheet on a rack 10 minutes, then cut into 12 triangles along scored lines while still warm. Transfer triangles with a long spatula to a rack to cool completely. Shortbread keeps 1 week. ; name: orange ginger tea loaf ; ingredients: sugar, margarine, eggs, flour, baking powder, ground ginger, orange juice, milk, orange rind, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c. Cream together sugar and margarine. Add eggs, beat till light and fluffy. Combine dry ingredients in another bowl. Mix together orange juice and milk. Add the orange juice mixture alternately with the dry ingredients to the batter, beating till blended. Fold in orange rind and walnuts. Bake in a loaf pan about for 45 minutes or until the cake is cooked when tested with a skewer. ; name: orange breakfast coffee cake ; ingredients: sugar, pecans, orange zest, reduced-fat cream cheese, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits, butter, powdered sugar, orange juice ; preparation:Combine first 3 ingredients in small bowl - set aside. Place about tsp cream cheese in center of each biscuit. Fold biscuit half over cheese, pressing edges to seal. Dip folded biscuit in melted butter, and dredge in sugar mixture. Place biscuits, curve side down in a single layer in curves of a lightly greased 12-cup bundt pan, spacing evenly. Place any remaining biscuits around center of tube pan filling in spaces if necessary. Drizzle any remaining butter over biscuits, sprinkle with any remaining sugar mixture. Bake at 350 for 35 to 40 minutes or until done. Immediately invert onto a serving plate. Combine powdered sugar and oj, stirring well. Drizzle icing over warm coffee cake. ; name: raisin bread not bread machine ; ingredients: flour, fast rising yeast, cinnamon, sugar, brown sugar, salt, butter, raisins, water ; preparation:Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl. Melt butter in the microwave, let cool it cool to lukewarm temperature. Add warm water or milk to dry mixture, then add butter. Mix all ingredients together and let stand for a minute. Add flour to the mixture and stir until it forms a ball. Flour countertop, dump out the dough and knead for at least five minutes or until dough no longer sticks to counter. Place in greased bowl and cover. Let rise for 1 hour, then punch the dough down. Let rise for 1 hour and 30 minutes. Place dough into breadpan and bake at 325 for 1 hour and 30 minutes. ; name: orange bread ; ingredients: oranges, cold water, sugar, egg, milk, salt, nuts, baking powder, flour ; preparation:

name: chicken green curry with basil ; ingredients: coconut milk, green curry paste, chicken stock, fish sauce, brown sugar, fresh basil, bamboo shoot, chicken, snow peas ; preparation:Bring 4 ounces of coconut milk to a boil with the curry paste, sugar, stock and fish sauce. Simmer for 15 minutes. Add the remaining cocnut milk, basil, bamboo, and chicken and simmer another 10 minutes. Just before serving, stir in the snow peas. Serve over rice. This recipe also works well with fish or shrimp. ; name: green curry with chicken and eggplant ; ingredients: chicken, green curry paste, coconut milk, fish sauce, sugar, eggplant, bamboo shoot, kaffir lime leaves, basil leaves, red chili pepper ; preparation:Combine chicken with sauce ingredients and bring to a boil. Continue to simmer until chicken is done. Add eggplant, bamboo shoots and lime leaves. Cook until eggplant is tender. Garnish with basil leaves and chili pepper before serving. Serve with rice. ; name: thai chicken and noodles ; ingredients: rice noodles, sweet chili sauce, chicken fillets, chicken stock, red capsicum, brown sugar, fish sauce, coriander ; preparation:Heat a wok and spray with olive oil spray, add sweet chilli sauce. Add chicken and cook 3- 4 minutes until cooked. Add chicken stock, capsicum and noodles. Toss over low heat for 8- 10 minutes, then add sugar, fish sauce and coriander. Heat through. ; name: thai green curry shrimp soup ; ingredients: large shrimp, green curry paste, straw mushrooms, carrot, green beans, chinese cabbage, tamarind paste, brown sugar, fish sauce ; preparation:In a large saucepan, simmer shrimp in enough water to cover, until cooked or orange-pink in color, about 1-2 minutes. Cool shrimp in the stock and then peel. Reserve 4 cups of the stock. Set aside. Heat the reserved 4 cups of stock in a saucepan over high heat. Stir in the green curry paste. Add the mushrooms, carrot, green beans, and cabbage. Bring to a boil then reduce heat and simmer until vegetables are just tender. Stir in tamarind paste, sugar, and fish sauce. Place some shrimp in a bowl and ladle in the soup. ; name: chickpea and broccoli curry stew ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, garlic clove, curry powder, roma tomatoes, chickpeas, tomato ketchup, broccoli, tabasco sauce, salt ; preparation:In a medium pot, heat the oil on medium heat. Add the onion, the garlic and the curry powder. Saute for 2-3 minutes, then add the rest of the ingredients, plus a cup of water. Simmer for 30 minutes. Serve over basmati rice with a squirt of lime juice. ; name: chinese chicken ; ingredients: chicken parts, soya sauce, water, sugar, ginger, garlic, onion powder, dry mustard, pepper ; preparation:Put chicken in roaster. Combine ingredients and pour over. Cover with lid. Bake 30 minutes at 350. Remove lid. Baste and cook 30 minutes longer uncovered. ; name: chicken tuscany ; ingredients: chicken, green bell pepper, sliced mushrooms, lipton onion soup mix, whole canned tomatoes, orange juice, brown sugar, vegetable oil ; preparation:In 13 x 9-inch baking pan, arrange chicken,. Red pepper and mushrooms. Blend remaining ingredients. Pour over chicken. Bake 50 minutes at 425 degrees or until chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: thai green chicken curry with spaghetti ; ingredients: chicken breast, coconut milk, sweet basil, eggplants, green curry paste, fish sauce, sugar, thai chile, kaffir lime leaf, spaghetti ; preparation:

name: ranch smashed potatoes ; ingredients: small red potatoes, milk, ranch salad dressing, pepper, chives ; preparation:In large pot, combine potatoes with enough salted water to cover. Bring to boil. Cook until tender, about 15 minutes. Drain. Heat milk in same pot. Return potatoes to pot. Add salad dressing and pepper. Mash, keeping some potato pieces chunky. Stir in chives. ; name: low fat roasted potatoes ; ingredients: red potatoes, parmesan cheese, onion, fat-free italian salad dressing, fresh ground pepper, salt, cooking spray ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400-425. Spray cooking dish with spray if using fat free dressing. Put all ingredients into large zip bag and toss. Put in dish and bake for 15 minute then toss and bake. 20-25 min cooking time. Keep your eye on them. The thinner the slice the faster it cooks. Check in and toss to keep from over drying and baking. If you use a fattier dressing then it is less checking time. ; name: as good as mashed potatoes but fat free ; ingredients: baking potatoes, water, garlic cloves, parsley, tabasco sauce, salt, yellow mustard, grainy mustard, prepared horseradish, nonfat sour cream ; preparation:Pare the potatoes or leave skin on, according to taste. Cut into 1 inch cubes, and place in heavy medium saucepan. Add water, garlic, parsley, tabasco and salt, bring to a boil over medium-high heat. Reduce heat, cover and let cook for about 20 minutes, stirring and breaking potatoes up with a fork. Add more hot water if potatoes seem too dry. Continue stirring and mashing potatoes for about 5 minutes until the water is absorbed and the potatoes are soft and lumpy. Remove from heat, stir in the mustards, horseradish and sour cream. As good as mashed potatoes uses a unique combination of garlic, tabasco, mustard and horseradish to spice up an american favorite. ; name: buttered potatoes ; ingredients: new potatoes, butter, lemon zest, lemon juice, chives, fresh parsley, salt, pepper, nutmeg ; preparation:Wash potatoes, peel, and quarter. To cook heat 1 inch of salted water to boiling, and add potatoes. Cover and reduce heat to medium and cook potatoes until tender, 20 to 25 minutes. In small saucepan, heat the rest of the ingredients to boiling and keep warmed on low heat to wait for potatoes to cook. Drain potatoes in colander and put into a serving dish. Stir in lemon butter and mix throughly with potatoes. ; name: easy special supper potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, water, sweet onion, garlic clove, butter, dill weed ; preparation:Boil potatoes, onions and garlic, dash of salt, till potatoes are soft. Drain. Add butter and dill. Salt and pepper to taste. Stir. Serve. ; name: impressive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onion, water, fresh parsley, cheese, milk, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in a saucepan, adding the onion. And enough water to cover. Simmer until the potatoes are just cooked. And drain. Mash well, adding enough milk to make creamy. Adding the butter. Mix in the parsley and cheese. Mix well. Serve hot. Can also be heated in the oven for 20-30 minutes or until the top has slightly browned. Also a nice variation as a topping for casseroles, and meat pies. ; name: chive mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, cream cheese, milk, fresh chives, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes for 10-12 minutes or until fork-tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Mash potatoes, adding cream cheese until it is blended. Stir in milk, chives, and seasonings. Heat on medium heat until just warmed through, then serve at once. ; name: smashed loaded potatoes low fat ; ingredients: new potatoes, smart balance light butter spread, nonfat milk, nonfat sour cream, bacon bits, fresh chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: garden spaghetti ; ingredients: garlic cloves, green onions, canola oil, swiss chard, vegetable broth, fresh black pepper, kosher salt, spaghetti ; preparation:Heat oil on medium heat using a large skillet. Add garlic & onions. Stir-fry about 2 minutes. Add swiss chard, broth, salt and pepper and cook until greens are wilted. Stir frequently. Remove from heat & set aside. Cook spaghetti until al dente. Drain. Toss all together and serve at once. Can subsitute spinach for swiss chard. ; name: baked vegetarian chili spaghetti ; ingredients: spaghetti, fat free spaghetti sauce, vegetarian chili, mushrooms, chili powder, garlic powder, reduced-fat sharp cheddar cheese, onion ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package. Drain. While pasta cooks, mix sauce and next 4 ingredients in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil. Cover, reduce heat, simmer 10 minutes. Coat a 13 x 9 baking dish with spray. Add pasta and top with sauce. Bake at 375f for 25 minutes. Remove from oven and sprinkle with cheese. Top with onions if desired. ; name: garlic pasta ; ingredients: garlic, dried basil, salt, pepper, crushed tomatoes, olive oil, spaghetti ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except pasta in small sauce pan. Cook on high heat until bubbly, stirring often. Turn down heat and cover. Simmer at least 30 minutes for best flavor. Cook pasta according to package directions. Sauce may be thinned with water reserved from pasta if desired. Serve with parmesan cheese. ; name: spaghetti with summer tomatoes ; ingredients: cherry tomatoes, yellow cherry tomato, shallots, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt, pepper, spaghetti, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large skillet combine cherry tomatoes, yellow cherry tomatoes, shallots, olive oil, red pepper flakes, salt and pepper. Bring to a simmer over medium heat. Simmer for 5 minutes or until tomatoes are tender. Remove from heat. Bring a pot of water to a boil over high heat. Add spaghetti and cook according to package directions. Just before pasta is done reheat sauce. Slice basil leaves and add to the sauce. Drain pasta and return to pot. Add sauce to pasta and toss. Serve. ; name: pasta with zucchini and roasted garlic ; ingredients: rotini pasta, garlic, dried thyme, dried rosemary, canola oil, zucchini ; preparation:Preheat oven or toaster oven to 450 degrees. Lay a 12-inch square piece of foil on the counter and put the garlic on it. Sprinkle the thyme and rosemary over the garlic. Pour the oil over the garlic and herbs. Draw up the edges of the foil and make a sealed packet. Bake 20 minutes. While the garlic is baking, cook pasta according to package directions. Two minutes before pasta is done add the zucchini to the cooking pasta, cook 2 minutes. Drain zucchini and pasta. Open the foil and mash the garlic lightly with a spoon. Toss mashed garlic with the pasta and zucchini. Season with salt and pepper and serve. ; name: spaghetti with zucchini and garlic ; ingredients: zucchini, extra virgin olive oil, garlic, salt & freshly ground black pepper, spaghetti, parmigiano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Pile up 2 or 3 layers of paper towels on a work surface. Working on the paper towels, shred zucchinis using a grater holding the zucchini at an angle. Heat a large skillet over moderate heat. Add extra-virgin olive oil to the pan add chopped garlic to the oil. When garlic starts sizzling in oil, add shredded zucchini. Season zucchini with salt and pepper. Saute shredded zucchini 7 to 10 minutes. Add hot, drained pasta to the pan. Toss spaghetti with zucchini and garlic oil. Add a couple of handfuls of grated cheese to the pan. Adjust seasoning and serve. ; name: spaghetti pork chops ; ingredients: tomato sauce, condensed tomato soup, onion, bay leaf, celery seed, italian seasoning, pork chops, olive oil, cooked spaghetti ; preparation:In a 5 quart slow cooker, combine the tomato sauce, soup, onion, bay leaf, celery seed and italian seasoning. In a large skillet, brown pork chops in oil. Add to the slow cooker. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hours or until meat is tender. Discard bay leaf. Serve chops and sauce over spaghetti. ; name: campfire spaghetti ; ingredients: hamburger, whole mushrooms, onion, dried basil, dried italian seasoning, garlic powder, chicken broth, tomato paste, water, spaghetti noodles ; preparation:

name: italian bread bread machine ; ingredients: water, olive oil, sugar, dry yeast, all-purpose flour, salt, egg white, cornmeal ; preparation:Add into bread machine container, warmed water, olive oil, sugar, yeast. Let yeast foam a bit. Dump in flour. Add salt on top of flour. Turn on bread machine to dough setting. Watch for the first bit and add flour as needed to get a good dough. Get cookie sheet ready by lightly oiling with olive oil and sprinkle on cornmeal. Form dough into loaf and set on cookie sheet with tea towel to cover until doubled in size. Preheat oven to 375f. Cut slits diagonally in loaf with sharp knife. Brush with egg white. Bake in preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, until golden brown and when you knock the bottom of bread it sounds hollow. ; name: healthy household bread ; ingredients: plain flour, brown flour, lsa, honey, salt, oil, yeast, sunflower seeds, water ; preparation:Dissolve honey in water. Add yeast. Leave 10 - 15 minutes to bubble. Sift flours, adding husks left over from sifting into the sifted flour, and salt. Stir in the lsa and sunflower seeds. Add yeast mixture and oil. Knead until texture has developed. This takes about 4 - 5 minutes in the kenwood mixer, but would take longer if doing it by hand. Grease and flour a bread tin. Place dough into tin and leave to rise. Bake at 190 degrees c for about 30 - 32 minutes. ; name: pecan bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, milk, egg, pecans ; preparation:Sift dry ingredients together. Mix milk and egg and add to dry ingredients. Mix, do not beat. Stir in pecans. Baked in greased loaf pan in a 350 preheated oven about 1 hour. Best kept a day or two before eating. Freezes well, great thinly sliced with cream cheese. ; name: whole wheat flat bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, water, extra virgin olive oil, flax seeds ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl. The dough should form a ball -- not too dry, but not too sticky either. If you have mixed for a long time, and there is still a lot of flour in the bowl, add a tiny bit more water. If the dough is too wet, add more flour. Cover the ball of dough with a thin dusting of flour, so you can remove it from the bowl. Using floured hands, spread the dough onto a greased cookie sheet -- the dough should be thin enough cover the entire sheet. Bake for 25 minutes at 350. Transfer to a cooling rack to cool, and cut into 12 slices. ; name: hawaiian banana bread ; ingredients: granulated sugar, margarine, bananas, eggs, cake flour, salt, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees farenheit. Cream sugar and margarine. Add bananas and eggs. Sift cake flour, salt, and baking soda 3 times. Blend flour mixture into banana mixture, making sure not to overmix. Turn batter into 2 greased 9x5x3-inch loaf pans. Bake for 55 minutes, or until toothpick inserted in center of loaf comes out clean. Turn out immediately to cool on wire rack. ; name: luscious strawberry bread ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, cinnamon, sugar, eggs, frozen strawberries, vegetable oil, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325. Combine dry ingredients in a large bowl. Add eggs, strawberries and oil and mix until just combined. Fold in nuts and pour into a greased 9 x 5 loaf pan. Bake for 1 hour or until center tests done. ; name: swedish thin bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, whipping cream, milk ; preparation:Mix dry ingredients together. Add cream and milk to form soft dough. Divide into 7 balls. Roll each ball out on floured surface using poky rolling pin. Fry at 400 degrees on greased griddle until browned. Makes approximately 28 pieces, depending upon how thinly you roll it and how you cut it after its cooked. ; name: olive bread ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, sugar, salt, egg, milk, walnuts, stuffed green olive, chopped pimiento ; preparation:

name: vanilla pudding dessert ; ingredients: milk, vanilla instant pudding mix, sweetened condensed milk, cool whip, vanilla wafers, fresh strawberries ; preparation:In a large bowl, whisk milk and pudding mix for 2 minutes. Let stand for 15 minutes. Fold in condensed milk. Set aside 1 tablespoon whipped topping and 2 tablespoons wafer crumbs. Fold remaining whipped topping into pudding. In a 2 quart serving bowl, layer a third of the strawberries, wafer crumbs and pudding mixture. Repeat layers twice. Sprinkle with reserved wafer crumbs. Top with reserved whipped topping. Refrigerate until serving. ; name: bread chocolate pudding ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the bread and chocolate chips in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the bread. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: farmer s old fashioned vanilla pudding ; ingredients: milk, sugar, eggs, flour, pure vanilla extract, butter, heavy whipping cream ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, heat milk and sugar, over medium to low heat. When hot, stir in eggs and flour. Beat together well and boil until thick. Stir in butter and vanilla after it is cooked. Cool and served chilled. Before serving, whip up heavy cream and fold in to chilled pudding. ; name: white chocolate pudding cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, vanilla instant pudding mix, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, white chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and two sugars until well combined. Beat in vanilla pudding mix. Add eggs, one at a time, until well incorporated. Mix in vanilla extract. In another small bowl, mix together flour, baking soda, and salt. Add the dry ingredients to the wet ingredients, mixing until just incorporated. Fold in m&ms and white chocolate chips. Drop tablespoon size cookie dough onto prepared cookie sheet. Bake for 10 minutes, or until just turning golden brown. Cool on cookie sheet for 5 minutes before removing to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: pudding au chomeur ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, light brown sugar, boiling water, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the milk. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: soft serve vanilla ice cream ; ingredients: milk, vanilla instant pudding mix, sugar, cool whip, vanilla flavoring ; preparation:Place milk in electric mixing bowl. Make pudding according to directions on box. Add pudding & sugar to mixer, blend well. Add cool whip and vanilla to mixer, blend well. Pour mixture into 1 gallon ice cream maker. ; name: classic banana pudding ; ingredients: vanilla instant pudding mix, milk, sweetened condensed milk, vanilla extract, cool whip, vanilla wafers, bananas ; preparation:Beat pudding mix and milk 2 minutes. Blend in condensed milk until smooth. Stir in vanilla and fold in most of cool whip. Layer wafers, bananas, and pudding mixture in glass serving bowl. Top with bananas, wafers, and remaining cool whip. Serve chilled. ; name: oreo pudding ; ingredients: cream cheese, powdered sugar, milk, vanilla, cool whip, oreo cookies, butter, instant vanilla pudding ; preparation:

name: chocolate bread and butter pudding ; ingredients: bread, butter, chocolate chips, eggs, milk, sugar, sherry wine, vanilla ; preparation:Cut crusts from bread. Butter and bread, cut into triangles and layer with chocolate in a ovenproof dish. Beat eggs, milk, sugar, sherry and vanilla together and pour over the bread. Leave to stand for 15 minutes to fully absorb liquid. Heat oven to 160 c. Bake for 30 minutes until golden and set. Dust with icing sugar to serve. Hope it tastes good. ; name: bread chocolate pudding ; ingredients: bread, eggs, milk, sugar, salt, vanilla extract, chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f have ready a 9x13-inch baking pan. Spread the bread and chocolate chips in the pan. Beat together remaining ingredients. Pour this custard over the bread. Bake about 35 minutes, or until firm but not dry. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: sweet bread bread pudding ; ingredients: sweet bread, raisins, butter, milk, sugar, eggs, apple pie filling, cinnamon, vanilla ; preparation:Grease a 9x12 pan. Scald milk. Add sugar and butter. Mix until butter is melted. Cool. Break sweet bread into pieces. Spread apple pie filling on top of the sweet bread. Sprinkle raisins over the filling. Combine cooled milk mixture with beaten eggs. Pour liquid over the bread. Sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes. ; name: pudding au chomeur ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, milk, light brown sugar, boiling water, butter, vanilla ; preparation:Mix first 3 ingredients. Then add the milk. Pour into ungreased 9x13 pan. Mix final 4 ingredients. Let butter melt. Pour over back of wooden spoon over cake batter. Bake at 350 degrees for 30 minutes. ; name: cinnamon bread pudding ; ingredients: rolls, milk, eggs, sugar, brown sugar, butter, vanilla extract, nutmeg, pecans ; preparation:Place cubed bread or rolls in slow cooker sprayed with vegetable cooking spray. In a mixixng bowl, combine milk, eggs, both sugars, butter, vanilla, and nutmeg and beat until smooth. Stir in pecans. Cover and cook on low for 3 hours.
