Stir in broccoli and rice. Pour miixture into a greased 13 x 9 pan or glass baking dish. Stir cracker crumbs into melted butter. Sprinkle bread crumbs over casserole. Cover with foil and bake at 350 for 30 minutes. Uncover and bake 10-15 minutes longer or untilcasserole is golden brown. ; name: healthy cheesy broccoli casserole ; ingredients: cooked chicken breasts, flour, low-fat milk, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, mustard, dried onion flakes, reduced-fat cheese, broccoli, corn flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Stir the flour, milk, chicken broth, mustard, and onion flakes in a glass baking dish. Microwave on high for 4-6 minutes, stirring well every 2 minutes until the cream sauce is thick and bubbly. While cooking the cream sauce, steam the broccoli for about 4 minutes. Mix the cheese into the cream sauce. Put the broccoli and diced chicken in a 9 x 13 pan. Pour the cheese sauce over the top. Mix the cornflakes and parmesan together, and pour over the top. Broil until golden brown. ; name: cheesy chicken casserole ; ingredients: chicken stove top stuffing mix, cooked chicken, condensed cream of chicken soup, velveeta cheese ; preparation:Prheat oven to 350 degrees. Prepare stuffing mix as directed on package. Stir in remaining ingredients. Mix well. Spoon into 2 quart baking dish. Bake 30 minutes or until heated through. ; name: hot chicken casserole ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, cheddar cheese, mayonnaise, salt, pepper, cooked chicken, slivered almonds, celery, water chestnuts, potato chips ; preparation:In large bowl, combine first 4 ingredients. Stir until smooth, then mix in the remainder of the ingredients. Put mixture into a baking dish. Top with a thick layer of either crumbled potato chips or chow mien noodles. Bake at 350f for 45 minutes or until hot and bubbly. ; name: creamy chicken and chilies casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, salt, pepper, mozzarella cheese, sliced mushrooms, cream of chicken soup, tomatoes, green chilies, cooked rice ; preparation:Sprinkle chicken breasts evenly with salt and pepper and place in a lightly greased 11x7 inch baking dish. Combine cheese and next 3 ingredients, and pour over chicken. Sprinkle with chilies. Bake, uncovered at 350 for 35 minutes. Serve over rice. ; name: too easy cheesy chicken broccoli and rice casserole ; ingredients: broccoli and cheese flavored rice mix, boiling water, boneless skinless chicken breasts, garlic powder, frozen broccoli, low-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees and boil water. In a 13x9 casserole dish, combine rice and contents of seasoning packet. Add boiling water to dish and mix well. Add chicken, sprinkle with garlic powder. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Add broccoli and cheese. Cover and continue to bake for another 8-10 minutes or until chicken is no longer pink in center. ; name: chicken and rice cheesy casserole ; ingredients: healthy request cream of chicken soup, water, white rice, onion powder, vegetables, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, reduced-fat cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: light carrot cocoa snack cake brownies ; ingredients: cocoa, flour, baking powder, sugar, carrot, skim milk, applesauce, egg whites, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 and spray a 9 inch square pan with sprayable oil. Mix cocoa, flour and baking powder in a bowl. Mix in shredded carrots and sugar. In another small bowl, mix egg whites, milk, apple sauce and vanilla. Lightly beat with fork and add to dry ingredients. Mix just until blended. Pour batter into pan and bake for 20-25 minutes. Cool and cut into squares. ; name: easy chocolate sauce cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, baking powder, sugar, cocoa powder, salt, milk, oil, brown sugar, hot water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix all ingredients except the brown sugar and 4 tbsp cocoa and hot water. Spread into a 9x9 pan or equivalent. Mix brown sugar and cocoa and spread over batter. Carefully pour the hot water over all. Bake at 350f for approximately 40 minutes. ; name: pumpkin bread with mini chocolate chips ; ingredients: flour, granulated sugar, baking soda, ground cinnamon, ground nutmeg, semisweet mini chocolate chips, eggs, canola oil, water, canned pumpkin ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine all dry ingredients, except chocolate chips, in a large mixing bowl and mix well. In a seperate bowl, slightly beat the eggs with a fork or wire whisk. Add thwe remaining wet ingredients to the eggs and stir well. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients. Stir just until evenly mixed. Fold in chocolate chips. Coat 2 bread pans evenly with cooking spray. Pout half of the mixture into each pan. Bake for 50-60 minutes. ; name: boiled chocolate cake ; ingredients: sugar, water, butter, bicarbonate of soda, cocoa, self raising flour, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180 degrees c. Place sugar, water, butter, bicarb soda& cocoa in a saucepan& bring to the boil. Once boiling, time for 2 minutes, then remove from heat. Grease& line base of a loaf pan. Once chocolate mixture has cooled, add the flour& egg. Mix well until smooth. Place in pan& cook in oven for 35 minutes. ; name: double chocolate cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, cocoa, baking soda, salt, water, vegetable oil, vinegar, vanilla, semi-sweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Mix flour, brown sugar, cocoa, baking soda, and salt with fork together. Mix in remaining ingredients except chocolate chips and pour into an ungreased 8x8x2-inch baking pan. Sprinkle chocolate chips over batter. Bake until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean, 35-40 minutes. Sprinkle with powdered sugar if desired. ; name: quick coconut bread ; ingredients: flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, egg, coconut milk, butter, vanilla extract, unsweetened coconut, currants ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Sift dry ingredients into mixing bowl. Blend in egg, milk, butter, and vanilla. Mix in the grated coconut and the currants or raisins, if used. Turn out onto a floured board and knead slightly. Shape into two loaves and pat into two buttered medium loaf pans. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes, until a toothpick in the centre comes out clean. ; name: chocolate cherry loaf ; ingredients: flour, unsweetened cocoa powder, baking powder, salt, baking soda, cherries, sugar, sour cream, eggs, unsalted butter ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350f grease a 5-by-9-inch loaf pan. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt and baking soda. In a medium saucepan, combine the whole cherries and the sugar. Using a potato masher, crush the cherries. Cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, for 15 minutes. Transfer to a large bowl and let cool. Whisk in the sour cream and eggs. Stir in the flour mixture. Fold the chopped cherries into the batter. Gradually stir in the butter. Pour the batter into the prepared loaf pan, then bake until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, about 55 minutes. Let cool in the pan for 15 minutes, then turn out onto a rack to cool completely. ; name: quick domino slice ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, egg, cocoa, plain flour, coconut, icing sugar, boiling water ; preparation:

name: my blonde brownies ; ingredients: butterscotch chips, margarine, eggs, brown sugar, vanilla, self-rising flour, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. Combine chips and margarine. Melt over low stir until well blended. Cool slightly. In bowl beat eggs with wire whisk until light yellow in color and foamy. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour and pecans if using. Mix well. Pour into greased 13x9-inch pan. Bake for 45 minutes or until brownies are pulled away from edges of pan and set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: brown sugar brownies ; ingredients: golden brown sugar, butter, eggs, unsweetened chocolate, all-purpose flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat over to 325 degrees. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool in pan and cut into bars. ; name: chocolate chip blondies ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:In a large bowl, combine brown sugar, butter, eggs and vanilla just until blended. Combine flour, baking powder and salt. Add to brown sugar mixture. Stir in chocolate chips. Spread into a a greased 13x9 pan. Bake at 350 for 18-20 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool on a wire rack. Cut into bars. ; name: glazed brownies ; ingredients: sugar, butter, water, semisweet chocolate morsels, vanilla, flour, baking soda, salt, eggs, pecans ; preparation:Cook first 3 ingredients in a large saucepan over high heat stirring constantly, until sugar melts. Add 2 cups chocolate morsels and vanilla, stirring until mixture is smooth. Let cook 15 minutes. Add flour, baking soda, and salt to cooled chocolate mixture, stirring until blended. Stir in eggs and pecans until blended. Spread batter into a greased 13x9 pan. Bake at 325 for 30 minutes. Sprinkle remaining 2 cups chocolate morsels evenly over warm brownies and let stand 5 minutes to soften. Spread over top. Cool on wire rack before cutting. ; name: milk brownies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, margarine, eggs, sugar, vanilla, self-rising flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: hazelnut chocolate brownies ; ingredients: hazelnuts, dark chocolate, butter, eggs, brown sugar, vanilla, plain flour, baking powder ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 160 c. Grease 16 x 16 cms pan and line with baking paper. Melt chocolate and butter together in bowl over saucepan of boiling water. Cool slightly. Beat eggs, sugar and vanilla with electric beaters till thick and pale. Stir in cooled chocolate. Sift in flour and baking powder, stir till just combined. Add hazelnuts, mix in well. Pour into prepared pan, bake for 35 - 40 minutes. Cool in pan for 10 minutes then turn onto wire rack. ; name: absolutely best brownies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, cocoa, salt, self-rising flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees fahrenheit. Grease and flour a 9 x 9-inch pan. In a bowl, beat together the butter and sugar. Add eggs and vanilla. Mix well. Combine the cocoa, salt, and flour together. Stir into the sugar mixture. Stir in the walnuts. Spread evenly into prepared pan. Bake for 25 to 30 minutes or until firm. ; name: blond brownies ; ingredients: light brown sugar, self rising flour, eggs, vegetable oil, vanilla extract, semisweet chocolate morsel, pecans ; preparation:

name: moroccan saffron rice ; ingredients: rice, water, saffron thread, olive oil, salt, butter, pistachios ; preparation:Wash the rice in a sieve until the water runs clear, then drain well and set aside. Bring the water to a boil, remove from heat and add the saffron. Allow to infuse for 20 minutes. Heat the oil in a heavy saucepan and add the rice, stirring well so that all the rice is coated evenly in the oil. Add the saffron water and salt and stir well. Bring to a boil and boil for 1 minute. Cover with a tight fitting lid, then simmer for 10-12 minutes until the water is absorbed. Turn off the heat and let stand, covered, for at least 10 minutes. Add the butter and fluff lightly with a fork. Serve and garnish with pistachios. ; name: brown rice and vegetable saute ; ingredients: quick-cooking brown rice, vegetable broth, olive oil, onion, broccoli florets, baby portabella mushrooms, garlic clove, thyme, fresh ground black pepper, sea salt ; preparation:Prepare rice as directed on box using broth of your choice. Meanwhile over medium-high heat, heat olive oil and add onion. Saute for 3 minutes, stirring often. Add broccoli and cover for 3 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add mushrooms and remaining ingredients to pan and saute until mushrooms release their juices, approximately 5 minutes. Serve over brown rice. ; name: tomatoe rice ; ingredients: olive oil, butter, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes, vegetable stock, long grain rice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Heat olive oil and butter in saucepan until butter melets in a medium saucepan add the onion and garlic and saut for about 5 minutes or until onion is softened. Add the tomatoes, mix well, cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Add the stock, rice, salt and pepper, mix well and bring to the boil. Cover and simmer very gently for about 20 minutes. Serve hot or cold. ; name: garlic rice india ; ingredients: cooked rice, garlic, chilies, cashews, almonds, cilantro, ghee, salt, pepper ; preparation:Using a heavy wok, heat it up and add the clarified butter. Then add the garlic and green chilies to it. Once garlic turns golden in color, add the dry fruits and roast for half a minute. Now add the cooked rice, sprinkle salt and pepper and mix well. Garnish the garlic rice with fresh coriander and serve. ; name: easy texas rice ; ingredients: white rice, oil, onion, bell pepper, chicken stock, diced tomatoes, chili powder, garlic salt ; preparation:In a saute pan, brown the rice in oil over low to medium heat, stirring constantly. When the rice is brown, add the onion, bell pepper, chili powder and garlic salt. Turn the heat to high, and cook for 1 minute, stirring constantly. Add the tomatoes, and then chicken stock. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce the heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat, and let stand for 15-20 minutes. ; name: garlic dill rice ; ingredients: minced garlic cloves, olive oil, rice, chicken broth, dill weed, salt, onion powder ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute garlic in hot olive oil until softened. Add rice and saute for 2 minutes over high heat. Add broth and seasonings and bring back to a boil. Lower heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until done. Fluff and mix rice and allow to stand uncovered for a few minutes before serving. ; name: spiced lemon rice ; ingredients: vegetable oil, mustard seeds, ground turmeric, onion, garlic cloves, chilies, long-grain white rice, fresh lemon juice, kosher salt, roasted cashews ; preparation:Heat oil in a large heavy saucepan over medium heat. Add mustard seeds and turmeric and cook, shaking pan, until mustard seeds pop, 1-2 minutes. Add onion, garlic, and chile and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is translucent, about 7 minutes. Add rice and stir to coat, add lemon peel, salt, and 3 cups water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover, and cook until rice is tender, 20-25 minutes. Stir in lemon juice. Cover and let stand off heat for 15 minutes. Fluff with a fork and stir in cashews. ; name: low salt savoury rice ; ingredients: white rice, olive oil, margarine, chopped tomatoes, garlic clove, onion, green capsicum, pepper, boiling water ; preparation:

name: simply guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocado, mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, and salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: really good guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, garlic cloves, salt, lime juice, tomatoes, red onion, jalapeno, cilantro, hot sauce ; preparation:Open each avocado by running a knife around the long end until the blade hits the seed. Twist the halves and pull apart. Insert the knife blade firmly into the seed and twist to pull out. Scoop out the avocado flesh and place in a medium bowl. Gently mash together the garlic cloves and the salt with the side of a knife until it forms a paste. Add this to the avocado. Add the lime juice. Gently fold in the tomatoes, onion, jalapeo, cilantro leaves, and hot sauce. Refrigerate until using. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: guacamole perfecto ; ingredients: avocados, serrano chilies, tomatoes, fresh cilantro, red onions, lime, oregano, salt & pepper ; preparation:Scoop the avocado out of the skin into a bowl. Coarsely mash with fork or potato masher. Add all other ingredients except the lime juice. Lightly blend - authentic guac is chunky, not pureed. Squeeze in lime juice, mix gently and taste for seasoning adjustments. ; name: guacamole sandwiches ; ingredients: avocados, cottage cheese, lemon juice, garlic salt, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, alfalfa sprouts, taco sauce ; preparation:Position knife blade in food processor bowl. Add first 4 ingredients, and process until smooth. Set aside. Place tortillas on a lightly greased baking sheet. Top with cheese slices. Broil 6 inches from heat just until cheese melts. Spoon avocado mixture evenly onto tortillas. Top evenly with tomato slices and sprouts. Fold tortillas in half. Serve with taco sauce, if desired. ; name: healthy guacamole ; ingredients: avocado, soft tofu, garlic, olive oil, lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut the avocado in half, remove pit and scrape the pulp from the skin into food processor. Add lemon juice. Process till smooth. Squeeze the water from the tofu using paper towels. Break up the tofu and add to the avocado mixture. Add remaining ingredients. Process again till smooth. ; name: purist s guacamole ; ingredients: avocados, white onion, fresh cilantro, kosher salt ; preparation:Cut onion into small dice. In a mortar and pestle or molcajete, pound onion and salt to a rough paste. Add cilantro and pound until well incorporated. Peel and seed avocados, add to mortar, and mash until mixture is a lumpy puree. Place one avocado pit in the center of the mixture and serve from the mortar or molcajete with tortilla chips. Makes about 2 cups. ; name: low fat guacamole with cottage cheese ; ingredients: avocado, low fat cottage cheese, fresh lime juice, green onion, jalapeno, garlic cloves, salt and pepper ; preparation:Slice the avocado in half and scoop out the flesh. In a food processor, combine the avocado, cottage cheese, lime juice, green onions, jalapeo and garlic. Pure until smooth. Add salt and pepper to taste. Serve immediately or chill. Serve with raw veggies or tortilla chips. ; name: sizzlin southwest guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocadoes, limes, juice of, cilantro leaf, corn kernel, red bell pepper, red onion, jalapeno jack cheese, hot sauce, salt ; preparation:

name: easy corn casserole cooking light ; ingredients: egg substitute, butter, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, corn muffin mix, plain yogurt, cooking spray ; preparation:Prehat oven to 350. Combine first 6 ingredients in a medium bowl. Stir well. Pour into an 8-inch square baking dish coated with cooking spray. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes or until set. ; name: best corn casserole ; ingredients: butter, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, sour cream, cheese, egg, corn muffin mix ; preparation:Melt butter or margarine in large pan. Add whole kernel corn, cream style corn, sour cream, grated cheese, egg, and corn muffin mix. Stir until well blended. Place in an oblong baking dish, approximately 8 x 11 inches, that has been sprayed with nonstick vegetable spray. Bake at 350 for 40 minutes. ; name: easy creamy corn casserole ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, wide egg noodles, onion, carrot, velveeta cheese, salt and pepper, saltine crackers, butter, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Grease a 1-quart baking dish. Set oven to 350 degrees. In a bowl, combine the first seven ingredients. Transfer to a baking dish. Mix cracker crumbs and parmesan cheese together, then add in the butter and butter. Mix to combine, then sprinkle over top. Bake uncovered for 45-50 minutes or until heated through. ; name: home style creamed corn casserole ; ingredients: cream-style corn, minute rice, egg, salt, pepper ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix well. Pour into greased 9 inch square baking dish. Bake uncovered at 375 degrees for 25 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. To microwave this recipe, do the same as above but cover and cook at high for 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. ; name: savory egg casserole ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, butter, cream, prepared mustard, salt, pepper, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle cheese in 9x9 inch square baking dish. Dot with butter. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour half of the mixture over the cheese. Pour eggs on top. Pour remaining cream mixture over the eggs. Bake 25 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: broccoli cheddar muffins ; ingredients: eggs, butter, cheddar cheese, corn muffin mix, frozen chopped broccoli, scallion ; preparation:In a large bowl, beat eggs with an electric mixer until light colored. Add butter and cheese and mix on low. Add muffin mix, broccoli and scallions and mix at low speed for another minute. Coat a 12 cup muffin pan with cooking spray. Divide batter among muffin cups. Bake at 375 degrees for 15 minutes until light golden brown. Cool on a rack before turning muffins out of pan. ; name: cheesy corn bites ; ingredients: cream cheese, monterey jack pepper cheese, egg, frozen corn kernels, tortilla chips, chives ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. In a large bowl, mix the cream cheese, pepper jack cheese, egg & corn. Arrange the chips on a large baking sheet and place 1 tsp corn mixture in each. Bake until the filling sets, approx 20 minute. Sprinkle the corn bites with garnish, serve warm. ; name: easy cheesy corn bake casserole ; ingredients: cream cheese, milk, eggs, whole kernel corn, cream-style corn, corn muffin mix, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: peanut butter krispies energy bars ; ingredients: margarine, marshmallows, creamy peanut butter, quaker oats, sesame seeds, rice krispies, peanuts, raisins ; preparation:Melt together margarine, marshmallows, and peanut butter. Roast oats and sesame seeds seperately in a skillet over a low heat. Very swiftly mix together marshmallow mixture and the rest of the ingredients. Pat mixture on a greased jelly roll pan or cookie sheet. Let cool. Loosen sides and turn onto cutting board. Cut into bars. Wrap individually in waxed paper. ; name: low fat granola bars ; ingredients: oats, whole wheat flour, wheat germ, ground cinnamon, honey, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 300f. Coat an 8-inch square pan using nonstick cooking spray. Combine oats, flour, wheat germ, and cinnamon. Stir until well mixed. Add honey, stirring until mixture is moist and crumbly. Fold in raisins. Press mixture into pan and bake for 18 to 20 minutes or until lightly browned. Cool to room temperature, cut into 12 bars and serve. ; name: chocolate peanut butter granola ; ingredients: margarine, peanut butter, honey, vanilla, oatmeal, miniature semisweet chocolate chips, banana chips, pecans, heath candy bar ; preparation:Melt together margarine, peanut butter and honey. Add vanilla. Pour over oatmeal and toss to coat. Spread on baking sheet. Bake at 350, for 10-15 minutes, stir frequently as the edges may burn easily. Let cool a few minutes. While oats are still mostly warm, transfer to a bowl and stir in chocolate chips. The warmth of the oats should melt the chips. Cool completely. ; name: chewy peanut butter bars ; ingredients: butter, creamy peanut butter, sugar, all-purpose flour, eggs, vanilla ; preparation:In a large saucepan, melt the butter and peanut butter. Remove from the heat. Add sugar and flour. Stir in the eggs and vanilla. Spread into a greased 13-in. X 9-in x 2-in baking pan. Bake at 350 for 28-32 minutes or until lightly browned and edges start to pull away from sides of pan. ; name: simple granola bars ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, oatmeal, crispy rice cereal, mini chocolate chip, skor english toffee bit ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Melt butter or margarine. Stir in brown sugar until dissolved. Stir oatmeal and cereal into butter and sugar. Stir in chocolate chips and skor bits, or any other tasty fillers you would like. Line a cookie sheet with parchment paper. Pack oatmeal mix into cookie sheet. Bake in oven for 10 minutes. Cool, and cut into 24 pieces. ; name: incredible granola bars ; ingredients: rolled oats, oat bran, brown sugar, sunflower oil, honey, salt, cocoa nibs, dried banana ; preparation:Mix all ingredients thoroughly,. Press into an oiled 9 inch square tray,. And bake for 20-25 minutes at 350 degrees. Allow to cool before cutting into bars. Will keep for weeks stored in airtight container in fridge. Also freezes well. ; name: yummy bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, baking powder, eggs, semi-sweet chocolate chips, nuts ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Combine crust ingredients in small bowl and blend well. Press into bottom of ungreased 9x13 baking pan. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, or until lightly browned. Remove from oven to cool slightly. Increase oven temp to 375. In medium bowl combine 1 cup brown sugar, 2 tbsp flour, baking powder and eggs. Blend well. Stir in chocolate chips and nuts. Pour topping evenly over crust, spreading lightly, if necessary. Bake at 357 for 13 to 18 minutes or until deep golden brown. Cool completely before cutting into bars. ; name: whole grain energy bar ; ingredients: honey, mini chocolate chip, millet, wheat germ, puffed kashi, oatmeal, natural-style peanut butter, raisins ; preparation:

name: simple zucchini soup ; ingredients: butter, olive oil, sweet onion, zucchini, chicken stock, fresh oregano, salt, black pepper, plain yogurt ; preparation:Heat butter and oil in a 3 quart saucepan. Add onion and saute on low until translucent. Add zucchini and saute another 2 minutes. Add the stock and 2 tablespoons oregano, bring to a simmer. Cover and simmer 30 minutes until tender. Pour into a blender and puree. Return to the pan and add salt and pepper. Add cream if serving it hot. If serving it cold, cool soup to room temperature and whisk in the yogurt. Garnish with remaining oregano. ; name: potato and zucchini soup ; ingredients: onion, zucchini, potatoes, chicken stock cubes, cream, butter, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Chop vegies as roughly as you like. Saute with a tablespoon of butter. Add enough water to cover, add stock cubes. Cook until tender. Blend and mash the vegies. Add the cream to taste. Serve with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: tomato zucchini and rice soup ; ingredients: canola oil, garlic cloves, onion, stewed tomatoes, chicken broth, water, dried basil, pepper, long grain rice, zucchini ; preparation:Heat oil in saucepan. Add garlic and onions and cook and stir for 2 minutes. Stir in tomatoes, broth, water, basil and pepper. Bring to a boil. Stir in rice. Cover and simmer over low heat, about 20 minutes or until rice is cooked, stirring occasionally. Stir in zucchini, heat through 1 minute. ; name: curried carrot potato soup ; ingredients: carrots, potatoes, white onions, red onions, garlic clove, oil, vegetable broth, curry powder, caraway seed, salt and pepper ; preparation:Peel and chop carrots and potatoes into small chunks. Slice the onions, mince the garlic. Heat the oil in a large heavy pot. Add the garlic, the curry powder, caraway seeds and the onions and saute for some minutes until lightly browned. Add the potatoes and carrots and saute on medium heat for another 10 minutes. Add the broth, cover and let simmer for about 35-40 minutes or until all veggies are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Puree soup using a hand held blender until it has the desired consistency-i like it to be still chunky. Serve with some warm bread of your choice. ; name: curried zucchini ; ingredients: butter, zucchini, onion, tomatoes, brown sugar, curry powder, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Melt butter in a large skillet, that is coated with cooking spray. Add zucchini and onion. Saute until tender. Stir in tomato, brown sugar, and curry powder. Cover and cook 1 minute, sprinkle zucchini mixture with parmesan cheese, serve warm. ; name: chilled curried yellow squash soup ; ingredients: leek white, extra virgin olive oil, curry powder, turmeric, garlic clove, yellow squash, water, sour cream, chutney ; preparation:In a medium saucepan, cook leek in oil over medium-low heat, stirring occasionally, until softened. Add curry powder and turmeric and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add garlic, squash and water and simmer, stirring occasionally, until squash is very tender, about 15 minutes. Cool mixture slightly and in a blender puree in batches until smooth, transferring to a bowl. Season soup with salt and pepper. Chill soup, covered, at least until cold, about 6 hours, and up to 1 day. Before serving, season with salt and pepper, if necessary. Serve soup with dollops of sour cream and chutney. ; name: basil and zucchini soup ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic, boiling water, chicken stock cubes, zucchini, fresh basil, evaporated low-fat milk ; preparation:Heat the oil in a large saucepan and lightly cook the onion and garlic untilgolden. Add the water, stock, zucchini and basil. Bring to the boil, lower heat and simmer for about 10 minutes or until vegetables are soft. Process in a food processor until smooth return to pan, add the milk. And heat do not boil. ; name: easy low fat curried zucchini soup ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, curry powder, zucchini, baking potato, broth, salt ; preparation:

name: herb coated cod ; ingredients: butter, butter flavored cracker, parmesan cheese, dried oregano, dried basil, garlic powder, cod fish fillet ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees fahrenheit. Grease a 13-inch x 9-inch x 2-inch baking dish. Crush butter-flavored crackers either in a ziploc bag with a rolling pin or bottle of sherry, or in a food processor. Melt butter over low heat, and place in a shallow bowl. In another bowl, combine the crackers, cheese and seasonings. Dip fillets in butter, then coat with crumbs. Place coated cod fillets in baking dish. Bake, uncovered, at 400 degrees fahrenheit for 15-20 minutes or until fish flakes easily with a fork. ; name: crunchy topped cod ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, tomatoes, whole wheat bread crumbs, fresh parsley, sunflower oil, lemon, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. Arrange the cod fillets in a wide ovenproof dish. Arrange the tomato slices on top. Mix the bread crumbs, fresh parsley, oil, lemon zest and juice. Season to taste. Spoon the crumb mixture evenly over the fish, then bake for 15-20 minutes. Serve. ; name: cod fish cakes ; ingredients: eggs, dijon mustard, pepper, cajun seasoning, cod, dill relish, onion, dry breadcrumbs, light vegetable oil cooking spray ; preparation:Whisk together eggs, mustard, pepper and cajun seasoning. Add chopped cod, onion and relish, mix well and add breadcrumbs. Spray non stick frypan well with veggie spray, heat to a sizzle. Divide cod mixture into 4 patties, brown well, approximately 5 minutes. Turn and brown other side for another 5 minutes. Turn onto a hot platter and garnish with ketchup or chili sauce. ; name: cod portuguese ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, green pepper, chopped tomatoes, paprika, orange, juice of, cod fish fillets, salt and pepper, fresh parsley ; preparation:Heat the oil in a heavy fry pan and saute the onion, garlic and pepper for about 5-7 minutes until softened. Add the tomatoes, paprika and orange juice. Season, stir well and simmer for a further 5 minutes. Lay the fish fillets on top, cutting them to fit the pan if necessary. Season lightly, cover and simmer gently for 12-15 minutes or until the fish is cooked but still firm. Transfer to serving dishes and sprinkle with parsley. Serve. ; name: easy oven baked cod ; ingredients: plain breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, garlic cloves, lemon, zest of, coarse salt, cod fish fillets, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f line your pan with aluminum foil and lightly brush with olive oil, or use a bit of cooking spray. Combine parsley, garlic, lemon zest, and coarse salt on the cutting board. Finely chop, then combine with the breadcrumbs in a shallow plate. Brush top of each fillet with olive oil. Press fillet into the crumb mixture. Place fillets in baking dish, crust-side up. Bake until firm, about 12-15 minutes, depending on the thickness of the fish. Serve with lemon wedges. ; name: fish house panko cod fillets ; ingredients: cod, flour, egg, panko breadcrumbs, onion powder, black pepper, dried parsley, pam cooking spray ; preparation:Lay out the flour, beaten egg and panko bread crumbs on three separate plates, or shallow pans. Mix the onion, black pepper and parsley into the panko. Blend well. Dip the seasoned fish in the flour, then egg and then press the fish into the seasoned panko bread crumbs, coating the fish evenly on all sides. Grease or line a baking pan with parchment paper. Place the fish carefully in the baking pan. Spray the top with pam or oil. Bake at 350 for 15 to 20 minutes. ; name: cod with onions and chives kabeljau mit schnittlauch zwiebeln ; ingredients: cod fish fillets, onions, chives, oil, white wine, lemon juice, salt ; preparation:Lightly fry onions and chives in oil and lightly salt. Salt the fish and sprinkle with lemon juice. Place the fish on the onions and pour the white wine over. Simmer over low heat for 5 minutes. Serve with boiled potatoes. ; name: horseradish topped cod ww ; ingredients: horseradish, lemon, garlic cloves, fennel seed, panko breadcrumbs, parsley, pepper, salt, cod fish fillets, dijon mustard ; preparation:

name: brown sugar glazed carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, brown sugar, salt ; preparation:In a medium saucepan cook carrots, covered, in a small amount of boiling salted water for 8 to 10 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain. Remove carrots from pan. In the same saucepan combine butter, brown sugar, and salt. Cook and stir over medium heat until combined. Add carrots. Cook and stir about 2 minutes or until glazed. ; name: candy coated carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, butter, brown sugar, lemon juice, hot pepper sauce, salt ; preparation:Cook carrots to crisp tender, drain. Set carrots aside and keep warm. In same pan cook butter and sugar until bubbly. Stir in lemon juice, hot sauce and salt. Return carrots and heat through. ; name: dressed up baby carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, brown sugar, butter, salt ; preparation:Use either a bag of whole baby carrots from the produce section or 2 15 ounce cans of sliced carrots. Add carrots to a medium sized sauce pan over medium heat. Quickly add the butter and brown sugar and toss the carrots in the melting butter. Just when they begin to bubble, reduce to low heat and simmer 15 minutes. Remember, sugar can scorch quickly, so stir occasionally and keep the heat low. ; name: sweet roasted carrots ; ingredients: honey, butter, bacon, baby carrots, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 425 degrees. Stir together honey, butter and crumbled bacon in a small bowl until smooth and set aside. Place carrots and water into an ungreased 9-by-9-inch baking dish, cover with foil and bake 30 minutes. Remove foil and stir in butter mixture. Bake another 15 minutes, stirring occasionally. ; name: baby carrots with lemon and parsley ; ingredients: baby carrots, sugar, butter, lemon juice, parsley, salt, pepper ; preparation:Put carrots in pan and cover with water. Add the sugar and cook just til soft. Drain& return to the pan. Stir in butter, lemon juice and parsley. Salt and pepper to taste. ; name: sweet and sour cabbage and carrots ; ingredients: butter, green cabbage, carrots, onion, brown sugar, reduced sodium soy sauce, cider vinegar, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium-high heat, melt butter. Add to the skillet the cabbage, carrots, onion and brown sugar. Cook, stirring often, for about 10-12 minutes until the veggies are well-browned and softened. Remove from heat and stir in the soy sauce, vinegar and pepper. Serve hot. ; name: carrots with raisin sauce ; ingredients: carrots, brown sugar, cornstarch, water, cider vinegar, raisins, butter ; preparation:Cook carrots in salted water until tender, drain. While carrots are cooking, mix brown sugar and cornstarch in a small saucepan. Stir in water, vinegar and raisins. Cook over low heat until sauce is thickened. Remove from heat, add butter, stir until melted and pour over carrots. ; name: sweet carrots ; ingredients: baby carrots, water, brown sugar, butter, white wine vinegar, salt ; preparation:

name: sauted mushrooms with garlic and lemon juice ; ingredients: lemon juice, soy sauce, sugar, olive oil, butter, garlic paste, mushrooms ; preparation:Stir together lemon juice, soy sauce, and sugar. Set aside. In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat butter, olive oil, and garlic over medium-high heat until butter melts. Add mushrooms and saut, stirring until golden brown and butter has been absorbed. Add lemon mixture to mushrooms, stirring until sauce is absorbed. ; name: raspberry balsamic mushroom saute ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, raspberry vinegar, dijon mustard, unsalted butter, fresh portabella mushroom, fresh chives ; preparation:Combine the first three ingredients in a jar and shake well to mix. Saute mushrooms in a little oil until cooked and set aside. Pour the dressing into a sauce pan and heat on medium. Add the butter 1 tablespoon at a time, whisking until each one has been incorporated completely before adding the next tablespoon. When all the butter is incorporated pour over mushrooms stir to coat and garnish with chives. ; name: all day mushrooms ; ingredients: button mushrooms, butter, burgundy wine, worcestershire sauce, garlic, dried dill, pepper, chicken bouillon cubes, beef bouillon cubes ; preparation:Wet a paper towel and wipe any dirt from the mushrooms. Place the mushrooms in a large stockpot. Add the remaining ingredients to the pot. The liquid will not cover the mushrooms at first. Cook, covered, over very low heat for 4 hours. Stir occasionally so that all of the mushrooms are completely coated with the cooking liquid. Remove the cover and cook for an additional 4 hours. The mushrooms will shrimk by half and become saturated with cooking liquid. Remove with a slotted spoon and serve in a bowl. ; name: good housekeeping s braised mushrooms ; ingredients: butter, shallot, sage leaves, red wine, salt, pepper, mushroom ; preparation:Melt butter on medium heat in a 10-inch skillet. Add shallots and sage. Cook for 2 minutes. Add wine, salt and pepper. Boil on high for 1 minute. Stir in mushrooms. Reduce heat to medium. Cover. Cook for 5 minutes. Uncover. Cook for 12 minutes or until tender, stirring. ; name: italian mushrooms in vinegar funghi al salamoia ; ingredients: button mushroom, spices, garlic clove, wine vinegar, salt ; preparation:Wipe mushrooms well with damp cloth. Heat vinegar until lukewarm. Put mushrooms in a sterilized glass jar. Add spices, garlic, warm vinegar, & salt & stir thoroughly. Cover jar tightly. Set aside in dry place for 2 days. ; name: stir fry mushrooms and bell peppers ; ingredients: olive oil, green onions, garlic cloves, bell peppers, champignon mushrooms, chinese rice wine, soy sauce, sesame oil ; preparation:Heat oil til really hot. Stir fry onions, then garlic. Then add peppers and mushrooms. Stir-fry until it becomes a bit soft,. Add the wine and soy sauce and continue to stir for 2 minutes. When done, remove from heat and add the sesame sauce mixing it all together, and serve. ; name: wild mushroom and bean salad ; ingredients: chanterelle mushrooms, green beans, bacon, white wine vinegar, mustard, parsley ; preparation:Boil the beans until tender and drain when done. Cut the bacon into small cubes and fry in a shallow pan until golden. Add the vinegar and let it bubble for a few seconds. Season with salt, pepper, the mustard and parsley. Mix the beans and mushrooms together and serve. ; name: marvelous mushrooms ; ingredients: button mushrooms, olive oil, water, balsamic vinegar, dijon mustard, lemon juice ; preparation:

name: peanut butter and banana cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking soda, banana, light brown sugar, butter, peanut butter, egg, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. Grease cookie sheets. Combine flour and baking soda in a small bowl. In a medium mixing bowl, beat together banana, brown sugar, butter, and peanut butter until light and fluffy, using a mixer on medium speed. Beat in egg and vanilla. Gradually beat in flour mixture until a dough forms. Shape dough into one inch balls and place them two inches apart on cookie sheets. Using the tines of a fork dipped in flour, press a criss-cross pattern onto each cookie. Bake cookies until edges are set, about 10 minutes. Place cookie sheets on wire racks and cool for about 5 minutes. Then take cookies off the sheets and cool them completely on the wire racks. ; name: no flour peanut butter cookies ; ingredients: peanut butter, sugar, eggs, baking powder, baking soda ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Mix ingredients together in a large bowl until well-blended. Roll peanut butter mixture into tablespoon size balls. Bake 12 minutes for chewy cookies. Bake 15 minutes for crisp. ; name: banana cookies ; ingredients: margarine, brown sugar, egg, baking powder, flour, banana, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 350f. Cream together margrine and brown sugar. Add egg and beat. Then add baking powder and flour. Mash banana and add chocolate chips if using. Drop by teaspoon onto ungreased cookie sheet and bake for 15 minutes ot until browned. ; name: peanut butter chocolate chunk cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, chunky peanut butter, sugar, dark brown sugar, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, baking soda, bittersweet chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream the butter and peanut butter together until fully incorporated. Add the sugars and cream on medium speed. Add the egg and vanilla and mix until completely incorporated. Add the flour and baking soda, mix until no white remains, then add the chocolate and mix on low just until everything comes together. Drop by teaspoonfuls onto parchment-lined baking sheets. Bake at 350 for 9 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: fat free chewy chocolate cookies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, unsweetened cocoa, baking soda, salt, karo syrup, egg whites ; preparation:Spray cookie sheets with cooking spray. In large bowl, combine flour, sugar, cocoa, baking soda and salt. Stir in corn syrup and egg white until blended. Drop by rounded teaspoon onto prepared cookie sheets. Bake at 350 degrees for 7 to 9 minutes or just until set. Do not overbake. Cool on wire rack. ; name: peanut butter and banana oat cookies ; ingredients: bananas, peanut butter, rolled oats, oat flour, raisins, butter, salt, vanilla extract ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Let sit for 30 minutes. Preheat oven to 350. Drop by spoonfuls onto parchment lined or lightly greased baking sheet. Bake for 15-20 minutes until lightly golden. ; name: almond sugar cookies ; ingredients: flour, butter, sugar, milk, baking powder, almond extract, salt, eggs ; preparation:Cream butter and sugar. Add eggs and almond extract. Combine dry ingredients, add to sugar mixture. Drop onto cookie sheet. Bake 350 for 1012 minutes. ; name: peanut butter n banana cookies sugar free ; ingredients: peanut butter, fat-free margarine, banana, egg, vanilla, all-purpose flour, splenda granular, baking soda, salt ; preparation:

name: authentic salsa ; ingredients: whole tomatoes, onion, fresh tomato, ground cumin, pepper, salt, fresh cilantro leaves, jalapenos, habanero ; preparation:Follow ingredient instructions to microwave peppers. Cut ingredients to fit in blender. All all ingredients to blender and blend to desired consistency. Refrigerate leftovers. Adjust ingredients according to taste or heat desired. If too hot, add another tomato. ; name: ultimate warm salsa ; ingredients: tomatoes, jalapenos, serrano pepper, onion, fresh cilantro, olive oil, garlic, comino, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Using a food processor, process the tomatoes to a chunky puree, do not liquify. In a large skillet or frying pan, heat the oil and add the peppers and onions. Saute until the onion softens and is clear 5-10 minutes. Add the tomato puree and spices. Simmer for 20-30 minutes or until desired consistency. Serve warm with tortilla chips. ; name: fresh garden salsa ; ingredients: zucchini, yellow squash, plum tomatoes, roasted red pepper, poblano pepper, red onion, oregano, lime, salt and pepper ; preparation:Dice the zuccini and squash into uniform pieces. Transfer to a bowl and combine with the tomatoes, bell and poblano peppers, and onion. Mix in the oregano and lime juice. Season to taste with salt and black pepper. Let the salso sit 15 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld. ; name: potato and carrot salsa ; ingredients: carrots, potatoes, tomatoes, fresh oregano, jalapeno chiles, orange, juice of, salt ; preparation:Wash and peel the carrots and potatoes. Cook separately in boiling water until tender. Dice and put into a bowl. Set aside. In blender, liquify tomatoes, oregano jalapeos, and salt. Add to carrot and potato mixture along with the orange juice. ; name: fiesta shrimp and avocado salsa ; ingredients: avocados, roma tomatoes, baby shrimp, spring onions, minced garlic cloves, chili sauce, serrano pepper, lime, cilantro, salt and pepper ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except for avocados. Blend well to incorporate flavors. Finally mix in avocados. Chill till serving. We serve with flour tortillas cut into triangles and deep fried till lightly browned. ; name: barbara s hot salsa ; ingredients: lime, juice of, tomatoes, onions, jalapeno peppers, hot peppers, sugar, cumin, coriander, kosher salt ; preparation:Sprinkle salt in bottom of crock. Add tomatoes, onions, peppers, sugar, spices, and lime juice. Daily, sprinkle just a little salt into crock and stir. On the 4th or 5th day, pack into hot sterile pint jars. Process in boiling hot water bath for 10 minutes. ; name: citrus salsa ; ingredients: grapefruit, orange, tomatoes, green bell pepper, jalapeno pepper, red onions, cilantro, sugar, salt ; preparation:Peel, section and chop the grapefruit and orange. Place in a medium bowl. Seed and dice the tomato, green pepper and jalapeno. Add to the fruit. Dice the red onion and cilantro. Add to the bowl. Add the sugar and salt to the the salsa ingredients. Stir to combine. Drain juice before serving. Serve with tortilla chips. Also good as a condiment with grilled chicken or pork. ; name: lebanese tomato salsa banadurah harrah ; ingredients: tomatoes, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, cayenne pepper, dried mint ; preparation:

name: pecan pie topped brownies ; ingredients: cocoa, oil, vanilla essence, eggs, flour, baking powder, salt, butter, pecans, brown sugar ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f and ligthly grease a large baking tin, approximately 9 x 12 inches. Melt the butter or margarine over low heat in a small saucepan. Add the flour and stir until smooth. Add the vanilla, sugar and eggs and stir constantly for 5 or so minute. Remove from heat and stir in nuts. Set aside. Mix brownie ingredients together in a large bowl. Spread into baking pan. Spread topping over. Bake for 35-40 minute be careful not to overbake. Cool and cut into bars. ; name: chocolate chip pecan pie muffins ; ingredients: pecans, brown sugar, flour, eggs, butter, chocolate chips, sugar ; preparation:Combine pecans, brown sugar, flour and chocolate chips. Make a well in center of mixture. Beat eggs until foamy. Stir together eggs and butter. Add to dry ingredients. Stir until moistened. Spoon batter into cups, makes 4 large muffins, or 6 smaller muffins. Mix topping ingredients together. Sprinkle on top of each muffin. Bake at 350f 20-25 minutes. Remove from pan immediately. Serve warm. ; name: french pecan pie ; ingredients: egg whites, sugar, vanilla, ritz crackers, pecans, whipping cream, german chocolate ; preparation:Beat egg whites until stiff but not dry. Gradually add sugar. Add vanilla, broken crackers and pecans. Bake in a 10-inch buttered pie pan for 30 minutes at 300 degrees fahrenheit. Cool. Top with sweetened whipped cream. Garnish with shaved chocolate. ; name: pecan pie award winning ; ingredients: pie crusts, eggs, sugar, light corn syrup, dark corn syrup, butter, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Defrost frozen pie crust. Combine eggs and next 5 ingredients. Stir in pecans. Pour into pie shell. Bake 350 degrees for 50 minutes. Cool on a rack. 1 frozen deep-dish pastry shell may be substituted. ; name: chocolate fudge pecan pie ; ingredients: chocolate crumb crusts, cornstarch, water, unsweetened chocolate squares, condensed milk, eggs, butter, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Meanwhile, combine cornstarch and water in a small bowl. In saucepan, melt chocolate and condensed milk over low heat, stirring occasionally. Add the cornstarch mixture, then the eggs, butter, and salt. Stir until well-combined and smooth. Remove from the heat and add pecans. Mix well and pour into crust. Bake for approximately 30-35 minutes, until a knife inserted into the center of the pie comes out clean. Cool on a rack, then cover and refrigerate for a minimum of 2 hours. ; name: pecan delight pie ; ingredients: egg whites, salt, cream of tartar, vanilla, granulated sugar, brown sugar, soda crackers, pecan pieces ; preparation:Beat egg whites to foam. Add salt and cream of tartar. Beat to stiff peaks. Add vanilla extract and both sugars. Beat until consistency of 7 minute frosting. Fold in crackers and nuts. Grease bottom and sides of pyrex dish and add mixture to dish. Bake at 350 degrees for 15-20 minutes. Top with cool whip or whipped cream when pie is completely cool, or slice and add topping on individual slices when serving. ; name: chunky pecan pie bars ; ingredients: flour, butter, brown sugar, eggs, corn syrup, sugar, vanilla, semisweet chocolate chunks, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350deg. Grease 13x9 inch baking pan. Crust. Beat flour, butter, and brown sugar in small mixer bowl until crumbly. Press into pan, bake for 12-15 min until lightly brown. Filling. Beat eggs, cornsyrup, granulated sugar, butter and vanilla in med bowl with wire wisk. Stir in chunks and nuts. Pour evenly over baked crust. Bake for 25-30 min or until set. Cool completely in pan on wire rack. ; name: kahlua chocolate pecan pie ; ingredients: sugar, eggs, kahlua, pecan pieces, flour, butter, semi-sweet chocolate chips, deep dish pie shell ; preparation:

name: yummy apple cake ; ingredients: apples, eggs, sugar, vegetable oil, flour, cinnamon, baking soda, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven 350 degrees. Grease 9x13 pan. Beat eggs, sugar and oil, together. Add flour, soda and cinnamon. Mix well. Add apples and walnuts, mix together. Pour into prepared pan. Bake 40 to 45 minutes. ; name: apple hill cake ; ingredients: sugar, oil, eggs, apples, flour, baking soda, nutmeg, cinnamon, salt, walnuts ; preparation:Combine sugar, oil, and eggs in a large bowl, stirring until well mixed. Stir in diced apples and nuts. Sift together flour, baking soda, nutmeg, cinnamon and salt, then add to bowl. Stir all ingredients together to form a batter. Pour into 9x13 inch greased pan. Bake one hour in a 350 degree oven. ; name: apple and sultana cake ; ingredients: self-raising flour, cinnamon, caster sugar, eggs, almond essence, margarine, pie apple, sultana ; preparation:Preheat oven to 180c line base and sides of a 10. 5cm by 21 cm loaf pan with baking paper. Sift flour and cinnamon together into a large bowl. Add sugar and mix. Combine eggs, essence and cooled melted margarine, and stir into dry ingredients until just combined. Fold in apples and sultanas. Spoon mixture into prepared pan and smooth surface. Bake for approximately 55 mins or until a skewer inserted in the centre comes out clean. Allow to cool for 10 mins in pan, then turn out to wire rack to cool completely. ; name: super low fat turkish apple cake ; ingredients: cooking apples, lemon, juice of, mixed nuts, sultanas, brown sugar, plain flour, salt, baking powder, vanilla essence ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 180 degrees celcius. Put the chopped apples into a large bowl and sprinkle with the lemon juice. Combine the nuts, sultanas, sugar, flour, salt and baking powder and mix well. Stir this mixture into the apples. Add in the vanilla essence and mix again. Pour the mixture into a lightly oiled cake tin and bake in the preheated oven for 20 minutes, or until lightly browned on top. Serve hot or cold. For a moister cake. Add to the ingredients a little fruit juice or water. ; name: nineteen forty eight cocoa cake ; ingredients: cocoa, cold water, baking soda, butter, eggs, flour, sour milk, sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Mix water, cocoa, and baking soda first, set aside while mixing remaining ingredients. Cream butter and sugar add eggs. Add half the flour and half the milk beat then add rst of flour and rest of milk. Last, add the cocoa mixture and mix well. Stir in vanilla. Bake in two well greased and floured pans at 350f for 30 minutes or until cake test done. Frost with your favorite icing. Cake will take on a red color after cooling. ; name: cinnamon chip applesauce cake ; ingredients: butter, sugar, eggs, vanilla, applesauce, all-purpose flour, baking soda, cinnamon baking chips, powdered sugar, water ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Beat butter and sugar in a large bowl on until well blended. Beat in eggs, vanilla, and applesauce. Combine flour, baking soda and salt and add to butter mixture, beating until well blended stir in cinnamon chips. Pour into two loaf pans. Bake for 60 minutes or until wooden pick inserted in center comes out clean cool completely in pan. Drizzle with glaze or wait until the cake is sliced and then drizzle with glaze to maximize the glazed area. ; name: low fat apple spice cake ; ingredients: apple pie filling, spice cake mix, egg, egg whites ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray bundt pan with non stick cooking spray. Combine all ingredients in bowl using hand mixer, until well blended. The apples should be pretty well pulverized. Pour into bundt pan. Bake for approximately 40 minutes. ; name: portuguese apple cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, oil, milk, eggs, baking powder, vanilla, apples, cinnamon ; preparation:

name: butterscotch cookies no bake ; ingredients: smooth peanut butter, butterscotch chips, corn flakes, pecans ; preparation:Heat and stir peanut butter in large saucepan on medium until hot. Add butterscotch chips. Stir until melted. Remove from heat. Add cereal and pecans. Stir until well coated. Drop by rounded tablespoonfuls into mounds onto waxed paper. Let stand until firm. Companys coming home for the holidays. ; name: southern style pecan fudge ; ingredients: powdered sugar, butter, cocoa powder, milk, vanilla, salt, pecans ; preparation:Butter a 9x5-inch pan. In a medium saucepan, heat sugar, butter, cocoa, milk, vanilla and salt over low heat, stirring until smooth. Stir in chopped pecans. Spread quickly in a buttered 9x5-inch loaf pan. Cool. Cut into squares. ; name: caramel butter pecan bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, pecans, caramel ice cream topping, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour and brown sugar in a bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Press into bottom of an ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Top with pecans. Drizzle warmed caramel topping evenly over pecans. Bake at 350 f for 15-20 minutes or until caramel is bubbly. Place on wire rack. Sprinkle with chocolate chips. Let stand 5 minutes, then spread chocolate chips over caramel-pecan layer. Cool for at least 6 hours at room temp or until chocolate has set. Cut into bars. ; name: cinnamon toast pecans ; ingredients: butter, light corn syrup, sugar, ground cinnamon, salt, pecan halves ; preparation:Oreheat oven to 250 degrees f,. Stir together first 5 ingredients. Add pecans. Tossing to coat. Spread coated nuts in a single layer. On a jelly roll pan. Bake for 1 hour. Stirring everu 15 minutes. Let cool. Store in an airtight container. Up to 2 weeks. ; name: pecan crunch fudge ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, evaporated milk, butterscotch chips, marshmallow creme, pecans, almond brickle chips, vanilla, pecan halves ; preparation:Combine brown sugar, butter and evaporated milk in a 3 quart saucepan. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly until mixture reaches soft ball stage. Remove from heat. Stir in butterscotch morsels and marshmallow creme. Beat vigorously with a wooden spoon until mixture is smoooth and just begins to cool. Stir in chopped pecans, brickle chips and vanilla. Spread mixture evenly into 2 buttered 8-inch square pans. Cool completely, and cut into squares. Gently press pecan half on each square if desired. Store in airtight container. ; name: pecan butter cookies ; ingredients: unsalted butter, light brown sugar, eggs, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, baking soda, salt, pecans ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cream together butter and sugar until smooth. Add eggs and vanilla, mixing well. In a separate bowl, mix flour, baking soda, and salt. Add to creamed mixture. Stir in pecans. Drop by heaping tablespoonfuls onto an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 11-14 minutes or until light golden. Transfer cookies to wire rack to cool. ; name: scotchy chocolate pecan candy ; ingredients: chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, peanut butter, pecans ; preparation:Melt chocolate and butterscotch in a double boiler. Add peanut butter. Stir. Add pecans. Mix well. Drop by the teaspoonful onto waxed paper. Allow to cool. ; name: butterscotch apple pecan cobbler ; ingredients: nestl toll house butterscotch flavored morsels, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, cinnamon, tart apples, butter, pecans, quick oats ; preparation:

name: sausage stroganoff without mushrooms ; ingredients: bulk pork sausage, onion, chicken broth, worcestershire sauce, pepper, all-purpose flour, sour cream, parsley, cooked noodles ; preparation:In a large skillet over medium heat, add sausage and onion, cook until meat is no longer pick and onion is tender. Add 1 cup broth, worcestershire sauce, and pepper. Cover and simmer for 5 minutes. Stir together remaining broth, and flour, until smooth. Stir into skillet, and bring to a boil and stir for 2 minutes. Reduce heat and add sour cream. Stir until heated through, do not boil. Add parsley if using. Serve over cooked noodles. ; name: family sausage supper ; ingredients: spaghetti, oleo, onion, green pepper, sliced mushrooms, frozen broccoli cuts, oregano, garlic powder, kielbasa, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook spaghetti according to package directions. While spaghetti is cooking, melt the 3 tbsp. Butter in large pot and brown the onion, green pepper, mushrooms and kielbasa, about 10 minutes. Add broccoli, oregano and garlic powder. Continue cooking over med heat until broccoli is heated through. Drain cooked spaghetti and stir 1 tbsp. Butter into it, stirring to coat well. Place spaghetti on platter and top with kielbasa-veggie mix then sprinkle with grated parm. ; name: sausage potatoes and peas ; ingredients: italian sausages, sweet peas, potatoes, chicken bouillon cube, hot water, butter, parsley, oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Spread sausage links, potatoes and peas in 13 x 9 baking dish. In saucepan over medium heat mix rest of ingredients until boullion cube is dissolved. Pour over sausage, potatoes and peas. Cover tightly with aluminum foil. Bake in 350 degree oven 45 minutes to 1 hours. ; name: italian turkey sausage ; ingredients: lean ground turkey, garlic powder, fennel seeds, sugar, salt, dried oregano, pepper ; preparation:Combine all ingredients until well mixed. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Shape into 8 patties. Cook in a skillet coated with nonstick spray about 3 minutes each side, meat thermometer should read 165 degrees. You can also crumble the turkey into the skillet for crumbled sausage. ; name: italian tomato sausage sauce ; ingredients: olive oil, italian sausage, shallots, garlic clove, plum tomatoes, mixed italian herbs, sugar, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large saucepan, heat oil. Add sausage and cook until meat is no longer pink. Add shallots and garlic. Cook one minute. Add tomatoes, herbs and sugar. Bring to a fast boil, then simmer uncovered for 40 minutes. Stir frequently and skim off fat. Add salt and pepper. Serve over pasta. ; name: tasty sausage patties ; ingredients: sausage meat, spring onions, minced meat, fresh pineapple, salt, thyme, sage, flour, parsley ; preparation:Pre-heat grill. Finely dice the spring onions. Add them to a bowl with sausage meat, ground beef, pineapple, salt, thyme and sage, mixing well. Shape into patties approximately 6 cm in size. Mix together the flour and finely chopped parsley on a plate and coat each patty. Grill for about 4 minutes until golden. Lower the heat and cook for a further 6-8 minutes. ; name: pizza turkey burgers ; ingredients: ground turkey, egg, onion, mushroom, garlic powder, oregano, black pepper, pizza sauce, breadcrumbs ; preparation:Combine all ingredients in a large bowl. Mix thoroughly. Form into 4 -6 patties. Grill on med. For 5 - 7 minutes on each side. Top with mozzarella cheese slices. Sliced black olives and extra pizza sauce. ; name: sausages with oregano mushrooms and olives ; ingredients: sausages, sunflower oil, dried oregano, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, beef stock, black olives, mushrooms ; preparation:

name: tomato onion pork chop ; ingredients: corn oil, pork chops, onion, water, tomato basil soup mix, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:In skillet, heat corn oil over medium heat, add chops& onion, brown. Set chops aside. Add remaining ingradiants. Stirring constantly, bring to a boil, return chops to skillet. Reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes or until tender. Spoon sauce over pork chops. ; name: skillet pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, onion, chicken broth, grape jelly, ginger, cornstarch, water ; preparation:Brown chops in oil. Add onion, cook until tender. Add broth, bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer for 12 minutes. Remove chops, keep warm. Stir in jelly and ginger. Mix cornstarch with water, add to skillet. Bring to a boil, cook and stir 2 minutes. Serve over the chops. ; name: ranch marinated pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, ranch dressing, worcestershire sauce, dry mustard, garlic cloves, onion powder ; preparation:Wash and pat dry pork chops with paper towel. Poke several holes in them with a fork. In a shallow baking pan, mix together rest of ingredients. Place pork in marinade, turning to coat completely. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour, turning at least once. Preheat oven to 275 degrees. Remove cover from pan, bake chops for about 30 minutes, turning at least once during cooking. Serve with baked potatoes, using cooked marinade and pan drippings to top. ; name: pan fried pork chops with onions ; ingredients: pork chops, creole seasoning, all-purpose flour, vegetable oil, onions, water ; preparation:Sprinkle pork chops with creole seasoning. Dredge pork chops in flour, shaking off excess. Cook pork chops in hot vegetable oil in a large skillet over med-high heat 1-2 minutes on each side or until golden brown. Remove from skillet and keep warm. Add in onions and water, stirring to loosen particles from the bottom of the skillet. Saute 10 minutes or until golden brown. Return pork chops to skillet. Lower heat to low. Cover and simmer 5 minutes. ; name: pork chops with cherry mustard sauce ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, pork chops, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper, dry white wine, dijon mustard, fresh cherries, unsalted butter ; preparation:Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Lightly season pork chops with salt and pepper, then, two to four at a time, depending on the size of your skillet, brown well on each side, removing to warm oven. Deglaze the skillet with the wine, scraping up brown bits, reduce heat to medium and stir in the mustard, then add the cherries. Season to taste with salt and pepper. When the sauce begins to bubble, add all the pork chops back into the skillet, spooning sauce over them to coat, cover and reduce heat to medium low. Cook over medium low about 5 minutes, then rearrange chops so those on the bottom are now on the top, and spoon sauce over. Cover and cook an additional 5 minutes or more, until chops are cooked through, but still very slightly pink inside. Remove chops to serving platter or individual plates. Melt butter into remaining sauce in skillet, heat and spoon over chops. ; name: grilled rosemary pork chops ; ingredients: olive oil, red wine vinegar, garlic clove, fresh rosemary, coarse sea salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, worcestershire sauce, center-cut pork loin chops ; preparation:Mix oil, vinegar, garlic, rosemary, salt, & pepper, and brush on chops. Refrigerate at least 30 minutes or as long as overnight. Preheat grill. Grill 5-8 minutes on each side, depending on thickness. Let rest 1-2 minutes before serving. ; name: braised pork chops with tomatoes ; ingredients: pork chops, kosher salt, fresh ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, red onion, rosemary sprigs, garlic cloves, plum tomatoes, anchovy fillets, polenta ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Pat pork chops dry with paper towels and generously season with salt and pepper. Heat a large ovenproof skillet over medium high heat. Sear chops in 1 tablespoon of oil until well browned, about 3 to 4 minutes per side. Transfer to a plate. Add remaining tablespoon of oil to skillet and cook onion and rosemary, stirring occasionally, until onions begin to caramelize and turn golden, about 5 minutes. Add garlic and cook another minute. Stir in tomatoes, anchovies, remaining salt and pepper and cook, stirring occasionally, until tomatoes break down, about 8 minutes. Return pork chops to skillet and spoon sauce over chops. Cover skillet and place in preheated oven and cook until internal meat thermometer reads 145 degrees f, about 15 minutes. Serve over polenta, egg noodles, or rice. ; name: pork chops in onion sauce ; ingredients: pork chops, pepper, vegetable oil, red wine, cornstarch, salt, unbleached flour, onions, beef broth ; preparation:

name: squirrel pot pie ; ingredients: onion, celery, garlic clove, beef broth, fresh ground black pepper, squirrel, mexicorn, cornstarch, pastry for double-crust pie ; preparation:Combine the onion, celery, garlic, broth, pepper and squirrel in a large pot and bring to a boil. Simmer until meat is very tender and easily removed from bones. Debone the meat and set aside. Researve 1 cup cooking liquid. Fit the bottom crust into a pie pan. Combine the meat, vegetables reserved broth and cornstarch in a large bowl and mix well. Spoon the mixture into the pie shell. Top with the second crust, press the edges to seal and cut vents in the top for steam to escape. Bake at 350 degrees until crust is browned, about 1 hour. ; name: veg all pot pie ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, cooked chicken, cream of mushroom soup, thyme, pie crust ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In medium bowl, combine vegetables, chicken, soup, and seasoning. Fit one pie crust into 9-inch pie pan. Pour vegetable mixture into pie crust. Top with remaining crust, crimp edges to seal and pick top with fork. Bake at 350f for 60 minutes or until crust is golden brown and filling is hot. Allow pie to cool slightly before cutting into wedges to serve. ; name: egg and vegetable pie ; ingredients: eggs, bacon, zucchini, red capsicum, carrot, cheese, vegetable oil, self raising flour ; preparation:Whisk eggs together. Add flour and oil gradually and beat until smooth. Add all other ingredients. Place in a greased pie dish. Bake at 200 celcius for 30 minutes. Serve hot with tomato sauce. ; name: basic chicken pot pie ; ingredients: onion, flour, margarine, mixed vegetables, chicken broth, milk, cooked chicken, pie crust ; preparation:Melt butter, add onions- saut for a minute, add flour, mix till pasty, add broth and milk. Stir constantly until creamy and thick,. Add veggies & chicken. Dump into a pie crust. Freeze now for later or bake 40-50 minutes at 350. ; name: turkey and sausage veggie pot pie ; ingredients: butter, kielbasa, flour, milk, mixed vegetables, cooked turkey, salt, pepper, pie crust ; preparation:Melt butter in a large saucepan. Add sausage and saute 5 minutes. Stir in flour and cook 2-3 minutes. Whisk in milk and cook, stirring constantly, 5 minutes or until sauce thickens. Remove from heat and stir in canned veggies, diced turkey and salt and pepepr. Pour into a lightly buttered pie plate. Roll out pie curst to fit over pie plate. Place pie crust over pie plate, trimming to fit. Crimp edges and cut steam slits in top. Bake at 400 for 20 minutes or until crust is golden. ; name: easiest chicken pot pie ; ingredients: mixed vegetables, cream of mushroom soup, cream of celery soup, cooked chicken breasts, crescent rolls, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Cut chicken into small cubes. In large pot mix vegetables, soups, butter and chicken. Cook on medium heat for 10 minutes. Put soup mixture in 10 x 13 inch baking dish. Unroll cresent rolls and cover mixture with unrolled cresents. Bake for 20 minutes or until cresent cover is golden brown. Let cool pie cool down for about 5 minutes before serving. ; name: green tomato pie ; ingredients: pie crust, green tomatoes, lemons, sugar ; preparation:Place the crust in a 9-inch pie plate and flute the edges. Place a layer of green tomatoes in bottom of pie. Cover with a layer of lemon slices, sprinkle with a layer of sugar. Layer tomatoes, lemon and sugar until pie is full. Bake at 350f until brown and bubbly, about 50 to 60 minutes. ; name: veggie pot pie ; ingredients: olive oil, red onion, celery, vegetables, garlic cloves, salt and pepper, cumin, tomatoes ; preparation:

name: scallop martinis ; ingredients: vodka, lime juice, jalapeno peppers, olive oil, fresh scallops, salt & freshly ground black pepper, red pepper, yellow pepper, green onions, coriander ; preparation:Combine vodka, lime juice and jalapeo pepper in bowl. Heat oil in a skillet over high heat. Season scallops with salt and pepper and place in skillet. Sear about 2 minutes per side or until scallops are browned on the outside but still raw in the centre. Place scallops on board and cut into quarters and add to vodka mixture. Let marinate for 4 hours in the refrigerator. Stir in peppers and green onions. Divide scallop mixture between 4 martini glasses adding some marinade. Garnish with coriander. Serve at once. ; name: tropical cream martini ; ingredients: vodka, midori melon liqueur, peach schnapps, coconut rum, frangelico, orange juice, half-and-half ; preparation:Fill a cocktail shaker halfway with ice. Add all the ingredients to the shaker. Shake vigorously for 5-10 seconds. Strain mixture into a chilled martini glass. May garnish with a kiwi slice, if desired. ; name: santa fe shrimp martini cocktails ; ingredients: mild salsa, avocado, cayenne pepper sauce, lime juice, fresh cilantro leaves, large shrimp, french-fried onions, lime ; preparation:Combine salsa, avocado, cayenne pepper sauce, lime juice and cilantro. Alternately layer shrimp and salsa mixture in 6 margarita or martini glasses. Microwave french fried onions for 1 minute until golden. Sprinkle over shrimp. Garnish with lime. ; name: ginger pear martini ; ingredients: vodka, simple syrup, pear liqueur, ice, limes, juice of, pear, superfine sugar ; preparation:Chill four martini glasses. Peel, core and slice the pear. Combine the vodka, syrup, liquer, ice and lime juice in a cocktail shaker and shake vigorously. Dip the rims of the chilled glasses in the sugar. Pour the cocktails and garnish the glasses with pear slices. ; name: official blue thong martini ; ingredients: vodka, rum, cointreau liqueur, blue curacao, prepared sweet-and-sour mix, pineapple juice, ice, orange slice, lime, sugar ; preparation:Rub rim of martini glass with lime and dip rim in sugar to coat. Chill glass. Fill cocktail shaker with vodka, rum, cointreau, blue curacao, sweet & sour and pineapple together with ice. Shake and strain into chilled martini glass. Garnish with orange slice. Should be sweet to taste with a deep turquoise color. ; name: cranberry ginger martini ; ingredients: ice, vodka, cranberry juice, lime juice, powdered ginger, sparkling water, cranberries, candied ginger ; preparation:Put the ice in a shaker. Add the vodka, cranberry juice, and lime juice. Shake. Place the powdered ginger in a chilled martini glass. Add the vodka-cranberry mixture and top with the tonic. Place 1 cranberry, some candied ginger, and another cranberry on a toothpick or cocktail skewer. Place in the martini glass. Use a light hand when sprinkling the powdered ginger into the glass, or it will overpower the drink. ; name: cucumber basil martini ; ingredients: sugar, hot water, fresh ginger, cucumber, basil leaves, gin, fresh lime juice, ice ; preparation:In a small bowl, dissolve the sugar in the hot water. Press the grated ginger through a fine strainer set over the bowl, releasing the juice. In a cocktail shaker, muddle the diced cucumber with the 2 torn basil leaves. Add the ginger syrup, gin, lime juice and a handful of ice. Shake well, then strain into a martini glass. Garnish the martini with a cucumber slice and the remaining whole basil leaf and serve. ; name: martini by the sea ; ingredients: sliced almonds, white fish fillets, water, vermouth, salt, fresh ground pepper, butter, parsley, lemon wedge ; preparation:

name: baked seasoned beet crisps ; ingredients: beets, balsamic vinegar, sugar, allspice, parsley, garlic powder, onion powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. Peel beets and slice into very thin slices. Mix the remaining ingredients together in a small bowl. In a large ziploc bag place the beets and contents of bowl. Shake well to make sure beets are completely coated with liquid. Place beets on a baking sheet coated with nonstick cooking spray and bake for 45 minutes to an hour turning beets halfway through. Keep an eye on them to make sure they dont burn. ; name: happy beets ; ingredients: beet, cornstarch, salt, cider vinegar, vodka, sugar ; preparation:Bring saved liquid to a boil. Add cornstarch, salt, vinegar, and sugar. Simmer until thickened and bubbles. Add sliced beets to sauce. Heat for three minutes. ; name: honey maple pork chops ; ingredients: honey, maple syrup, allspice, pork loin chops, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat grill. In small bowl, combine honey, syrup and allspice. Mix well. Sprinkle pork chops with salt and pepper. When ready to grill, brush pork chops with honey mixture. Place chops on gas grill over medium heat or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Cook 10 to 15 minutes or until pork is no longer pink in center, turning once and brushing occasionally with sauce. ; name: beet greens with raisins and pine nuts ; ingredients: dark raisin, crusty bread, olive oil, pine nuts, beet leaves, allspice, garlic cloves, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Place the raisins in a small heat proof bowl. Pour boiling water over the raisins and let soak for 10 minutes. Drain. Meanwhile, cut the bread slice up into small cubes. Heat up 2 tablespoons of the olive oil on medium heat and saute the bread cubes until golden. Drain. Heat the remaining olive oil in the pan and saute the pine nuts until they begin to turn golden color. Add the beet greens, allspice and garlic. Cook quickly and cook just until beet greens start to wilt. Stir in the drained raisins and season with salt and pepper to taste. Transfer the greens to a serving platter. Sprinkle with the croutons and serve hot. ; name: savory organic golden beets with greens ; ingredients: garlic clove, water, beet, salt, limes ; preparation:Clean and dice beets. Clean green tops of beets. Crush and chop the garlic clove. Add the beets, garlic, salt into a hot fry pan. There is no need for oil because you are trying to braise the beets to keep the flavor. Turn the heat down to medium, once the beets start to brown add the water until the beets are soft and can push a fork into them - about 20 minutes. The water will evaporate down, chop and add the greens and squeeze the lemon or lime into the dish cover and cook on medium heat until wilted. Serve right away and enjoy. ; name: honey ginger baked beets ; ingredients: beets, butter, honey, ground ginger, salt and pepper ; preparation:Scrub beets but do not peel. Place beets in a large saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-low and simmer for 40 minutes, or until just tender. Drain. When cool enough to handle, peel beets, cut into quarters and place them in a oven-proof casserole dish, with a lid. Pre-heat oven to 350f. In small saucepan, melt butter and mix in honey and ginger. Season with salt and pepper and pour over beets. Cover with lid and bake 45-60 minutes, stirring occasionally, until beets are well glazed. ; name: beet and raisin salad ; ingredients: beets, raisins, brown sugar, oil, lemon juice, lettuce leaf, parsley ; preparation:Peel and grate the beets. Chop the raisins coarsely and mix with the beets and the brown sugar. Mix together the oil and lemon juice. Pour over the beets and raisins and mix well. Serve on crisp lettuce leaves sprinkled with chopped parsley. ; name: maple glazed beets ; ingredients: beets, margarine, maple syrup, lemon ; preparation:

name: apple braised pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, onion, garlic clove, olive oil, flour, salt, pepper, apple juice, dried tart cherry ; preparation:In a heavy skillet, saute onion and garlic in olive oil until just about ready to carmelize. Remove vegetables from skillet and set aside. Season chops with salt and pepper. Dredge with flour on both sides. Brown chops for about five minutes on each side. After browning both sides, pour apple juice over chops. Let the chops cook in the juice for another five minutes over med-low heat. Do not cover. Remove chops and add onion and garlic back into the pan. Reduce sauce slightly, adding dried cherries in last 2-3 minutes of cooking. To serve, plate chops with wild rice and spoon a bit of the sauce over each chop. Depending on thickness of the chops, you may need to adjust cooking time slightly. ; name: baked pork chops with apples ; ingredients: boneless pork chops, apples, brown sugar, ground cinnamon, butter, salt, pepper, cranberry juice ; preparation:Sear pork chops, 2 minutes per side. Reserve. Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Arrange apple slices in the bottom of a prepared 9x12 baking dish. Sprinkle with brown sugar and cinnamon. Dot with butter. Top apples with seared pork chops. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Pour cranberry juice over all and cover. Bake for 1 hour.
