Make sure pork reaches an internal temperature of 160 degrees f. ; name: roast pork and apple dinner ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, sliced mushrooms, balsamic vinaigrette, minute white rice, condensed chicken broth, water, red apples, dried thyme leaves ; preparation:Spray large nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Add chops. Cook on medium-high heat 4 minutes on each side or until browned. Add onion, mushrooms and dressing. Cook an additional 3 minutes. Stir in rice, broth, water, apples and thyme. Reduce heat to medium. Simmer 10 minutes or until heated through. ; name: glazed pork chops and apple bake ; ingredients: pork steaks, salt & pepper, apples, water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce, lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Spray a pan large enough to hold the chops in a single layer with non-stick spray. Season the pork steaks or chops with salt& pepper. Arrange them in single layer in the prepared pan. Cover and bake for 30 minutes. Remove the chops from the pan and pour off the fat. Place the apples in the pan and top with the baked chops. Combine the water, brown sugar, worcestershire sauce and lemon juice, and pour over the pork and apples. Bake uncovered, basting occasionally, for 45 minutes or until pork is tender. ; name: savory pork ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, olive oil, butter, fresh mushrooms, fresh green beans, garlic cloves, condensed cream of mushroom soup, water, pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet brown pork chops in oil and butter on each side. Remove the chops and keep warm. In the same skillet, saute the mushrooms, beans and garlic until vegetables are tender. Stir in the soup, water and pepper. Bring to a boil. Top with pork chops. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer for 10-15 minutes until pork juices run clear, stirring occasionally. Serve sauce over chops. ; name: easy crunchy pork chops ; ingredients: pork chops, egg, mustard, dried oregano, dried thyme, salt & freshly ground black pepper, breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, cooking oil ; preparation:Trim the fat off the pork chops. Lay the chops between 2 pieces of plastic wrap and, using a mallet or a rolling pin beat them until their thickness is reduced by half. Beat the egg and place in shallow wide bowl. Add the mustard, oregano, thyme, salt and pepper. On a large plate, combine the breadcrumbs and the parmesan. Press each of the pork chops into the egg mixture, coating both sides. Then put the chops into the bread crumbs, covering them evenly. Place them on a cooling rack to dry slightly while you heat the oil in a large frying pan until it sizzles if water is dripped into it. Cook the pork chops until they are a deep golden color, about 5 to 7 minutes on each side. ; name: honey apple pork chops ; ingredients: boneless pork loin chops, apple juice, lemon juice, gluten-free soy sauce, honey, garlic clove ; preparation:Place chops in a shallow dish. Combine remaining ingredients and mix well. Pour marinade over chops. Cover and refrigerate overnight, turning occasionally. Remove chops from marinade. Place on grill, approximately six inches from medium-hot coals. Grill for 10-15 minutes, turning once and basting with remaining marinade. Discard remaining marinade when meat is grilled. ; name: mini pork and apple meat loaves ; ingredients: ground lean pork, onion, apple, fresh parsley, garlic, egg, breadcrumbs, barbecue sauce ; preparation:

name: simple baked tofu ; ingredients: firm tofu, soy sauce, balsamic vinegar, garlic powder, ground ginger, salt, white pepper, olive oil ; preparation:Cube tofu. Mix all ingredients into a large bowl. Let marinade in the fridge for about one hour. Preheat oven to 350. Place tofu on a cooling rack with a baking pan underneath to catch excess liquid. Bake for 10 minutes, turn tofu and bake for another 15 minutes, or until the edges start to brown. ; name: mexican chocolate tofu pudding ; ingredients: sugar, water, silken tofu, bittersweet chocolate, vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, chili powder, chocolate shavings ; preparation:In a small pot, combine sugar and water. Bring to a boil and cook until sugar is dissolved. Let cool for a few minutes. In a blender, combine syrup, tofu, melted chocolate, vanilla, cinnamon and chili powder. Puree until completely smooth. Divide into 4-6 serving bowls and refrigerate at least 30 minutes. Garnish with chocolate shavings if desired. ; name: tofu quick lemon cream pie ; ingredients: extra-firm silken tofu, fresh lemon juice, lemon peel, sugar, egg white, graham cracker pie crust, frozen light whipped dessert topping ; preparation:Blenderize tofu, lemon juice and sugar. Add lemon peel. Fold in thawed whipped topping. Brush graham cracker crust with slightly beaten egg white. Bake at 375 degrees f for 5 minutes. Allow crust to cool. Pour lemon filling into cooled pie crust. Chill. When ready to serve, garnish with fresh berries or other fruits. Can also be frozen. ; name: asian tofu pitas ; ingredients: cooking spray, onion, red bell pepper, garlic, extra firm tofu, soy sauce, black pepper, baby spinach, tomatoes, pita bread ; preparation:Spray a large skillet with cooking spray then heat until hot. Add the onion, peppers, & garlic and cook over medium heat for 2 minutes. Add the tofu, soy sauce, & pepper to the vegetables, stir. Continue to cook another 3-4 minutes or until the tofu is heated through. Remove from the heat & cool slightly. Mix the tomatoes & spinach in with the tofu & vegetables then stuff each pita half with the mixture. Serve immediately. ; name: tofu dip ; ingredients: silken tofu, extra virgin olive oil, lime juice, dijon mustard, garlic, shallot, salt & pepper ; preparation:Using paper towels, blot excess water from tofu. Break up the tofu and put into food processor. Add remaining ingredients and blend till smooth. Refrigerate in a container with a tight lid. Stir or shake before serving. ; name: coat bake tofu ; ingredients: firm tofu, breadcrumbs, cornmeal, seasoning salt, sugar, black pepper, cayenne pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Mix all the dry ingredients in a medium sized plastic bag or in a bowl. Pat dry the tofu on paper towel. Place the slices or cubes inside a plastic bag and gently shake to coat tofu with the dry mixture. Place on a greased baking sheet. Lightly spray tofu with cooking oil spray. Place in oven and bake for approximately 25-30 minutes until golden brown. Serve with your favorite dip. ; name: spicy tofu with sesame and five spices ; ingredients: firm tofu, rapeseed oil, low sodium soy sauce, sesame oil, chinese five spice powder, honey, sesame seeds ; preparation:Place the tofu on a plate and pat dry with kitchen paper. Slice into 1cm thick slices. Heat the rapeseed oil in a non stick frying pan, once oil is hot add the tofu and cook over a medium heat for 5-8minutes either side or until tofu is golden brown. Place the soy sauce, sesame oil, 5 spice powder and honey in a large bowl. Mix well and toss. In the warm tofu. Sprinkle over the sesame seeds. Serve with steamed tender stem broccoli or stir fried vegetables. ; name: baked curry tofu ; ingredients: frozen orange juice concentrate, fresh lime juice, curry powder, firm tofu ; preparation:

name: roasted brussels sprouts with hazelnut brown butter ; ingredients: butter, brussels sprout, hazelnuts, salt, fresh ground pepper, water ; preparation:Position rack in bottom third of oven and preheat to 450f. Put butter on a large rimmed baking sheet and roast until the butter is melted, browned and fragrant. Remove baking sheet from oven and toss brussels sprouts and hazelnuts with the browned butter. Sprinkle with salt and pepper. Return to oven and roast for 7 minutes. Sprinkle with water, toss, and continue roasting until the sprouts are tender and lightly browned. ; name: brussels sprouts in garlic butter ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, butter, olive oil, garlic, parmesan cheese, salt and pepper ; preparation:Melt butter and olive oil in a medium skillet until butter is foamy. Reduce heat to medium, add smashed garlic and cook until lightly browned. Remove garlic and discard. Add sprouts cut side down, cover, and cook without stirring on medium-low heat 10-15 minutes or until tender when pierced with a knife. The cut side of the sprouts should get nice and browned, with a nutty, buttery flavor enhanced by garlic. Top with freshly grated parmesan and salt& pepper to taste. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, olive oil, kosher salt, lemon-pepper seasoning ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Cut off the ends of the brussels sprouts and pull off any yellow outer leaves. Mix them in a bowl with the olive oil, salt, and lemon-pepper seasoning. Transfer them to a sheet pan and roast for 35 to 40 minutes, until crisp outside and tender inside. Shake the pan from time to time to brown the brussels sprouts evenly. Sprinkle with more kosher salt, if you like, and serve hot. ; name: brussels sprouts with black pepper butter hazelnuts ; ingredients: black peppercorns, butter, brussels sprouts, olive oil, hazelnuts, vegetable stock, salt ; preparation:Crush the peppercorns in a mortor and pestle and then combine in a small bowl with the softened butter. Refrigerate until needed. Cut a small slice from the stalk end of each brussel sprout to help separate the leaves, pull off the outer leaves of the sprouts very carefully and finely slice the tight centres. Heat the oil in a large frying pan and add the hazelnuts and saut for 2 minutes until toasted. Add the brussel sprouts and stock and saut for a further 2 minutes then season with salt to taste. Remove from the heat and toss through the black pepper butter. Put into a serving bowl or on individual plates. ; name: awesome brussels sprouts ; ingredients: brussels sprout, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Clean sprouts by peeling off any dark, dry, and discolored leaves. Cut off the stubby bottom stem. Rinse in cold water. While wet microwave on high for about 3 minutes, till fork tender. In fring pan on medium heat, add butter and sprouts. Turn every couple of minutes until the sprouts are mostly browned. Can even look a little burned. Add salt, pepper and serve. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts ; ingredients: fresh brussels sprouts, extra virgin olive oil, garlic powder, ground black pepper, salt, dried sage ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. Cut the bottom of each brussels sprout off and then slice in half lengthwise. Toss all ingredients and place in a single layer on a baking dish. Roast for 25 minutes or until brussels sprouts are slightly browned and tender throughout. Serve hot or cold. ; name: roasted brussels sprouts with almonds and honey ; ingredients: brussels sprouts, unsalted butter, slivered almonds, salt & freshly ground black pepper, honey, fresh lemon juice ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Place sprouts, butter, and almonds on a rimmed baking sheet. Season with salt and pepper. Toss to combine. Roast, stirring, until golden brown and tender, 35 to 40 minutes. Transfer to a serving bowl. Immediately dress with honey and lemon juice, and season with salt and pepper. Serve warm or at room temperature. ; name: brussels sprouts in browned butter ; ingredients: brussels sprout, butter, nutmeg, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: green beans with garlic sauce ; ingredients: oil, green beans, soy sauce, garlic, honey, ginger ; preparation:Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Add green beans and saute till beans are just crisp but tender, about 5 minutes. In a small bowl stir together soy sauce, minced garlic, honey and ginger. Pour over green beans in skillet and boil until sauce thickens and coats vegetables, about 2 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: asian green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, soy sauce, vegetable oil, vinegar, sesame oil, garlic clove ; preparation:Wash the beans and snap the ends off. Blanche them in boiling water for 3-4 minutes. Drain immediately and put into an ice cold water bath to retain crispness. Mix remaining ingredients in a small bowl. Pour over cooled green beans and refrigerate for at least half an hour, then serve. The longer they marinate the more intensely the flavors will develop. ; name: green beans with garlic butter ; ingredients: green beans, butter, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Cook beans according to package directions. In a separate bowl, combine butter, garlic and pepper. Drain beans. Place in serving bowl. Add butter mixture. Toss to coat evenly. Serve immediately. ; name: tropical green beans ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh green beans, yellow onion, garlic cloves, salt, balsamic vinegar, hearts of palm, sun-dried tomato, pine nuts, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Brush a large baking dish with 2 tablespoons of the olive oil. Put green beans, onion, and garlic in dish, drizzle with remaining oil and sprinkle with salt. Bake for 25 minutes, stirring beans at least 3 times. When tender, remove beans from oven and transfer to bowl. Immediately drizzle with vinegar. Add hearts of palm, tomatoes, pine nits and pepper to taste and toss. Serve warm or room temperature. ; name: green beans with herbs ; ingredients: green beans, water, butter, onion, celery, garlic, rosemary, basil ; preparation:Place beans and water in sauce pan and bring to a boil. Cook for 6-8 minutes or until crisp-tender. Drain and return to pan. Add remaining ingredients to pan. Cover and cook for 4-6 minutes or until vegetables are tender. ; name: green beans with tomato onion and bacon ; ingredients: green beans, bacon, onion, tomatoes, garlic clove, dried oregano, salt, lemon juice, pepper ; preparation:In a 2 quart saucepan, add green beans in enough water just to cover them, and bring to a boil, reduce heat and simmer, uncovered about 15 minutes or until crisp tender. Drain and immediately rinse with cool water to stop cooking. Drain and set aside. In a large skillet, cook bacon over medium-high heat until crisp. Stirring frequently. Reserve 1 tablespoons of bacon fat and drain off the rest and place bacon on plate covered with paper towels. In the same skillet add onion and 1 tablespoons bacon fat and cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally, until tender. Stir in tomato, garlic, oregano, salt and pepper into onions and simmer about 5 minutes. Stir in green beans and heat through. Add bacon and stir to blend. Transfer mixture to serving dish and drizzle with lemon or lime juice. ; name: garden green beans ; ingredients: fresh green beans, fresh mushrooms, onions, garlic, olive oil, sliced water chestnuts, italian seasoning, salt, pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Place beans in a saucepan and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat. Cover and simmer until crisp-tender. Meanwhile, in a skillet, saute mushrooms, onion and garlic in oil until tender. Stir in water chestnuts and seasonings. Heat through. Drain beans and stir into skillet. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: arkansas green beans ; ingredients: green beans, bacon, brown sugar, butter, soy sauce, garlic powder ; preparation:

name: italian marinated chicken breasts ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, italian salad dressing, oregano, parmesan cheese, salt & pepper ; preparation:In a glass 9 x 11 baking dish, place cleaned and trimmed chicken breasts, and season with salt and pepper, if desired. Pour italian salad dressing over to coat and let marinate in the fridge for 1 hour. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. After the hour of marinating, turn chicken breasts over and sprinkle evenly with oregano and grated parmesan cheese. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 1 hour, checking after 45 minutes to make sure they do not get over-cooked. ; name: special occasion chicken ; ingredients: butter, boneless skinless chicken breasts, sliced mushrooms, shallots, salt, pepper, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Melt butter in skillet over medium heat. Add chicken and cook 10 minutes. Turn chicken. Add shallots and mushrooms, sprinkle with salt and pepper. Cook 10 minutes or until cooked through. Chicken should be browned on both sides. Remove and sprinkle with cheese. ; name: chicken breasts stuffed with spinach sun dried tomatoes ; ingredients: fresh spinach, sun-dried tomatoes with italian herbs, reduced-fat mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, dried italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt, ground black pepper, extra virgin olive oil ; preparation:Coat a large nonstick skillet with nonstick cooking spray. Add the spinach, and cook over medium-high heat, 2 minutes, or until the spinach is wilted. Remove from heat, and toss in the sun-dried tomatoes, mozzarella and parmesan. Set aside. Cut a deep pocket into the thickest side of each piece of chicken, and stuff a quarter of the spinach mixture into each pocket. Close by pressing flesh together and securing with a wooden toothpick, if necessary. Combine the italian seasoning, garlic powder, salt and pepper, and sprinkles both sides of the chicken pieces with some of the mixture. Wipe out the skillet, add the olive oil, and preheat over medium-high heat. Add the chicken, and cook for 2 minutes on each side, or until nicely browned. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and cook for about 8 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot. ; name: chicken and mushroom skillet ; ingredients: chicken breasts, cream of mushroom soup, mushrooms, broccoli florets, minute rice ; preparation:Cook chicken with cooking spray in skillet. When done, add cream of mushroom, mushrooms, and cooked broccoli. Warm. Seperately cook rice. Put chicken on top of rice when serving. ; name: mushroom muenster chicken ; ingredients: eggs, seasoned bread crumbs, boneless skinless chicken breast, vegetable oil, cajun seasoning, fresh mushrooms, muenster cheese ; preparation:In a shallow bowl, beat eggs. Place bread crumbs in a large resealable plastic bag. Dip chicken into eggs, then place in bag and shake to coat. In a large skillet, cook chicken in oil over medium heat until almost done. Transfer chicken to a greased 13x9-inch baking dish. Sprinkle with cajun seasoning. Top with mushrooms and cheese. Cover and bake at 350f for 30-35 minutes or until chicken juices run clear. ; name: chicken in casserole ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken thighs, condensed cheddar cheese soup, condensed cream of mushroom soup, vermouth, artichoke heart, whole mushroom ; preparation:Place raw chicken pieces in casserole. Mix together the soups and vermouth. Pour over raw chicken. Place artichoke quarters around in the sauce. Cook at 350f for 1 hour. Then put the whole mushrooms around in the sauce and return to the oven for 10 minutes. ; name: chicken and mushroom saute ; ingredients: butter, chicken breasts, mushroom, onion, bacon, cream of mushroom soup, milk, parmesan cheese, noodles ; preparation:Melt half of butter in large skillet over medium-high heat. Saut chicken until no longer pink, about 5 minutes. Remove from skillet. Set aside. Melt remaining butter in same skillet over medium heat. Saut mushrooms and onion until tender and liquid is evaporated, stirring often. Stir in soup, milk, and cheese. Bring to boil. Return chicken to skillet and add bacon. Heat through, stirring occasionally. Serve over noodles. ; name: chicken breasts with portabella mushrooms ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, seasoned bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, egg, shallot, olive oil, portabella mushrooms, parsley, black pepper, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:

name: creamy fresh cranberry and fruit salad ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, sugar, crushed pineapple, green grape, apples, miniature marshmallow, macadamia nuts, heavy cream ; preparation:Mince the cranberries in a food processor. Do this in two batches. Stir together the cranberries and sugar. Let sit and chill for about 8 hours. After about 8 hours, drain the cranberries well and stir in the well-drained crushed pineapple. Add the grapes and apples and stir. Then fold in the marshmallows and nuts. Let sit overnight in the refrigerator. A few hours before serving, whip the cream until it is becoming stiff. Fold into the fruit mixture. Chill until serving. ; name: cranberry salad ; ingredients: cranberries, oranges, gala apples, crushed pineapple, jello gelatin, raspberry jell-o gelatin, pecans, sugar ; preparation:In a large mixing bowl, dissolve sugar and jell-o in 2 cups boiling water. Add to the jell-o mixture the juice of both oranges, the zest of one orange, chopped nuts, and the entire can of crushed pineapple. Shred apples and cranberries. Add to jell-o. Mix well. Chill overnight or until set. ; name: baked apples and cranberries ; ingredients: fresh cranberries, apples, sugar, quick-cooking oats, brown sugar, pecans, butter ; preparation:Grease a 2-qt baking dish. Spread cranberries and apples in the dish. Sprinkle with 1 cup sugar. In a small bowl mix the oats, brown sugar, and pecans until well combined. Add the butter, stirring until mixed. Sprinkle the oat mixture over the fruit in the baking dish. Bake at 325 degrees for 45 minutes. ; name: cranberry apple waldorf gelatin salad ; ingredients: unflavored gelatin, sugar, boiling water, cranberry juice cocktail, apple, fresh cranberries, celery, walnuts ; preparation:In a large bowl, mix gelatin and sugar. Add boiling water and stir until gelatin is completely dissolved. Add juice. Chill in refrigerator until mixture has consistency of unbeaten egg whites. Fold in apple, cranberries, celery, and walnuts. Pour into a 8-inch square pan. Cover with plastic wrap and chill in refrigerator until firm. To serve, cut into squares. ; name: southern cranberry salad ; ingredients: strawberry gelatin, boiling water, whole berry cranberry sauce, mandarin oranges, crushed pineapple, pecans, cool whip ; preparation:Mix jello with boiling water. Stir until dissolved. Add cranberry sauce, oranges, pineapple, and pecans. Lightly spray a 4 cup ring mold or pretty glass dish that it will be served. Add salad. Cover with plastic wrap and chill at least 3 hours or till firm. Serve with dollop of cool whip. ; name: cranberry apple sweet potato packet ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, granny smith apples, dried cranberries, brown sugar, butter, ground cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 or a grill to medium high. Center sweet potatoes, apple slices and cranberries on 18x24-inch sheet of heavy-duty aluminum foil. Sprinkle with brown sugar. Combine melted butter or margarine and cinnamon and drizzle over brown sugar. Bring up sides of foil. Double-fold the top and ends of foil to make a large foil package, leaving room for heat to circulate inside. Bake 25 to 30 minutes on cookie sheet in oven or place on covered grill 20 to 25 minutes until potatoes are tender. ; name: apple walnut salad with cranberry vinaigrette ; ingredients: walnuts, salad greens, gala apples, fresh cranberries, balsamic vinegar, red onion, honey, dijon mustard, vegetable oil, salt and pepper ; preparation:Toast walnuts for 8-10 minutes in a 350f oven. In a food processor or blender, combine cranberries, vinegar, onion, honey and mustard. Puree until smooth. Gradually add oil and season to taste with salt and pepper. In a salad bowl, toss together greens, apples and enough dressing to coat. Sprinkle with walnuts. ; name: cranberry apple salad ; ingredients: cranberries, heavy whipping cream, sugar, walnuts, fuji apple, powdered sugar ; preparation:

name: hash brown bake ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, butter, cooked ham, shredded cheddar cheese, red peppers, eggs, milk, salt, pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425 degrees. Thaw potatoes between layers of paper towels to remove excess moisture. Press into bottom and up sides of an ungreased 9-inch pie plate. Drizzle with butter. Bake for 25 minutes until lightly browned. Cool on wire rack for 10 minutes. Combine ham, cheese and red and green peppers. Spoon into potato shell. Combine eggs, milk, salt and pepper, stirring well. Pour over ham mixture. Bake at 350 degrees for 25 to 30 minutes or until set. Let stand for 10 minutes before serving. ; name: georgia hash ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, green bell pepper, red bell pepper, corned beef, frozen hash browns, cajun seasoning ; preparation:In electric frying pan or large skillet saute onions and peppers until onions soften. Add corned beef. Continue to cook until cubes fall apart. Add frozen hash browns. Add seasoning if desired. Cook, stirring often until potatoes are done and start to brown. ; name: hot dog and fries hash with variations ; ingredients: chicken hot dogs, onion, yukon gold potatoes, olive oil, garlic, salt and pepper, cayenne, cheese ; preparation:Parboil potatoes until they are starting to tender, slightly soft with a fork poke. Cool and julienne or dice. Cut hot dogs into coins about inch thick. Heat oil in a large non-stick skillet. Add garlic and onion. Saut over medium heat until onion starts to soften and brown, about 5-7 minutes. Add hot dogs, salt and pepper to taste, and any seasonings you are using. Saut over medium heat for about 10 minutes, until hot dogs are browning. Add potatoes. Saut over medium heat for 10 minutes more, until potatoes are golden and heated through. ; name: grilled hash browns ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, onion, beef bouillon cube, seasoning salt, pepper, butter ; preparation:Place potatoes on a piece of heavy duty foil coated with nonstick spray. Sprinkle with onion, boullin, seasoned salt and pepper. Drizzle with butter. Fold foil around potatoes and seal tightly. Grill, covered over direct medium heat for 10-15 minutes or until potatoes are tender, turning once. ; name: sunrise chicken hash ; ingredients: olive oil, yukon gold potatoes, fennel, celery, cooked chicken, ripe olives, chives, dill, kosher salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add potatoes and fennel and cook 5 to 6 minutes until golden. Add red onion, celery and chicken. Cook and stir 4 to 6 minutes, until vegetables are tender and chicken is golden. Mix in california ripe olives, chives, dill, salt and pepper and remove from heat. Divide evenly among 4 plates. ; name: salmon hash ; ingredients: red salmon, red potatoes, butter, scallions, salt and pepper ; preparation:Remove and discard skin and bones from salmon. Flake with a fork and set aside. Saut potatoes in margarine 12 minutes or until golden and tender. Add scallions to skillet and saut 2 to 3 minutes. Stir in salt and pepper. Add the salmon to the skillet, mixing it carefully into the potatoes. Cook over medium heat, without stirring again, until thoroughly heated. Serve with a poached egg on top if you like. ; name: open faced hash browns with ham tomato and swiss cheese ; ingredients: potato, table salt, ground black pepper, butter, ham, tomatoes, swiss cheese ; preparation:Toss fully dried grated potatoes with salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Meanwhile, heat half the butter in a 10-inch skillet over medium-high heat until it just starts to brown, then scatter potatoes evenly over entire pan bottom. Using a wide spatula, firmly press potatoes to flatten. Reduce heat to medium and continue cooking until dark golden brown and crisp, about 5 minutes. Turn potatoes with spatula, adding remaining butter as they are turned. Continue to cook over medium heat until remaining side is dark golden brown and crisp, about 5 minutes longer. Once potatoes are fully browned, top each with a portion of ham, tomato, and cheese. Cover and continue to cook over medium heat until cheese melts, 1 to 2 minutes longer. Serve immediately. ; name: lumberjack hash ; ingredients: vegetable oil, butter, onion, green bell pepper, garlic cloves, frozen hash brown potatoes, salt, black pepper, ham, cheddar cheese ; preparation:

name: hot tuna sandwich cups ; ingredients: refrigerated biscuits, celery, onion, butter, mayonnaise, dry mustard, dill weed, tuna, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Separate biscuits, and pinching a small section off each, form 12 instead of 10. Flatten, and spread over the bottom of muffin cups. Place dough side up on a baking sheet and bake at 400 degrees for 5-7 minutes or until lightly browned. Meanwhile, saute celery and onion in butter until tender. Stir in mayonnaise, mustard, and dillweed. Stir in tuna and half the cheese. Spoon evenly into biscuit cups. Bake 5-7 minutes or until bubbly. Top with remaining cheese, and bake 2-3 minutes more until cheese melts. ; name: quick and easy tuna salad sandwich for kids of all ages ; ingredients: tuna, mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, lettuce, american cheese, bread ; preparation:Empty tuna into bowl. Add mayonnaise and pickle relish. Mix well and taste. Add more mayo or pickle relish if necessary. Toast bread. Add lettuce, tuna chef and cheese. ; name: open face tuna melt sandwich ; ingredients: bread, tuna in water, mayonnaise, onion, lemon juice, old bay seasoning, salt and pepper, tomatoes, provolone cheese ; preparation:Mix the tuna, mayo, onion, lemon juice, old bay seasoning, salt and pepper. Mix well. Place enough tuna on a toasted slice of bread and spread to cover slice. Top with slice of tomato and then top with a slice of cheese. Place sandwich slices on a cookie sheet. Placing rack not too close to the broiler, broil sandwiches until the cheese is golden brown. ; name: hot tuna buns ; ingredients: mayonnaise, sweet pickle relish, prepared mustard, tuna, cheddar cheese, celery, green onion, onion rolls ; preparation:In a bowl, stir together mayo, relish and mustard. Add tuna, cheese, celery and onions, stir until well combined. Spread tuna mixture evenly over bottom halves of rolls and top with remaining roll halves. Wrap each sandwich in foil. Place on a baking sheet into a pre-heated 350 oven for 15-20 minutes or until cheese is melted. Unwrap and serve immediately. ; name: original tuna melts ; ingredients: hot dog buns, solid white tuna packed in water, pickle, onions, cheese, mayonnaise ; preparation:Drain and flake tuna in a medium bowl. Add pickles, onion and cheese and mix well. Add mayonnaise and mix well. Fill hot dog rolls and wrap each in tin foil, twisting both ends to close. Place on cookie sheet and bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Serve in corn-on-the-cob dishes with french fries and a salad. These can also be cooked on a grill, making them suitable for camping. ; name: hot tuna and cheddar sammies sandwiches ; ingredients: tuna, celery, onion, cheddar cheese, green olives, mayonnaise, pepper, hamburger buns ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. In a large bowl, combine tuna, celery, onion, cheese, olives, mayo and pepper. Divide tuna mixture evenly among 4 buns. Wrap sandwiches loosely in aluminum foil. Place on baking sheet. Bake 15-20 minutes or until heated through. ; name: gingered tuna salad ; ingredients: tuna in water, curry powder, olive oil, red onion, crystallized ginger, mayonnaise, rice vinegar, dijon mustard, pecans, cayenne pepper ; preparation:In a small saucepan over low heat, saut the curry powder in olive oil for 5 minutes, stirring frequently. While the curry powder is cooking, mince the onion and chop the crystallized ginger. In a medium bowl, add the mayonnaise, rice vinegar and dijon mustard. Whisk to blend. Add the cooked curry powder, crystallized ginger, onion, pecans and cayenne pepper. Whisk again to thoroughly blend. Add the tuna and mix with a fork until tuna is well blended and coated with the dressing. Serve and enjoy. ; name: pafect tuna sandwich ; ingredients: tuna, mayonnaise, pickle relish, honey mustard, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: stir fried chicken apples ; ingredients: chicken breasts, honey, curry powder, apples, oil, celery, raisins, parsley ; preparation:Cut chicken into cubes and place in bowl. Combine honey and curry and mix thru chicken. Stir in apple slices. Heat oil in heavy skillet over high heat. Saute celery for 1 minute. Add apple mixture and stir fry 3-4 minutes, just until chicken is no longer pink. Add raisins and parsley, stir well and serve over rice. ; name: baked sauerkraut with apples ; ingredients: butter, onion, sauerkraut, apples, white wine, vegetable stock, brown sugar, celery seed ; preparation:Heat the butter in a large oven proof lidded casserole dish, add the onions and saut until soft and transparent. Add the sauerkraut, mix well and cook, uncovered, over a low heat for 5 minutes. Add the apples to the sauerkraut mixture together with the wine and enough stock to cover. Mix well then continue to cook over a low heat for 30 minutes. Preheat the oven to 170c, 325f, gas mark 3 during this cooking time. Stir in the sugar and celery seeds then cover and transfer to the oven. Bake for 30 minutes and serve hot. ; name: apple celery salad ; ingredients: tart apples, lemon juice, celery ribs, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, cider vinegar, sugar, dried tarragon, salt ; preparation:Toss the diced apples with the lemon juice. Add the diced celery. In a small bowl, whisk together mayonnaise, mustard, vinegar, sugar and tarragon. Pour mayo mixture over salad and toss to coat. Season with salt if desired. Chill and serve. ; name: almond celery ; ingredients: butter, blanched almond, celery, salt, pepper, sherry wine ; preparation:In lg skillet, melt butter. Add almonds and saute for 1 minute. Remove almonds with slotted spoon. Add all other ingredients to skillet. Cover and cook till crisp-tender, about 5-6 minutes. Return almonds and mix well. ; name: couscous with apples chives ; ingredients: apple juice, tart apple, green onion, fresh chives, curry powder, couscous, chicken broth, salt ; preparation:Heat apple juice in 2-quart saucepan over medium-high heat. Bring to boil. Stir in apples, green onions, chives and curry powder and cook 1 to 2 minutes, stirring. Add couscous and cook 1 minute. Add broth and bring to boil. Cover and remove from heat. Let stand 10 to 15 minutes or until liquid is absorbed. Fluff with fork. Season to taste with salt and pepper. ; name: spiced applesauce ; ingredients: apples, sugar, lemon juice, fresh lemon rind, cinnamon stick, nutmeg, allspice, clove ; preparation:Place all ingredients in the slow cooker and set on low. Cook for approximately 4 to 6 hours or until apples are tender. The time will vary depending on the type of apples used. Remove cinnamon stick. Taste and adjust seasonings. Serve warm or cold. ; name: cinnamon sicles ; ingredients: plain yogurt, applesauce, honey, cinnamon ; preparation:Blend yogurt, applesauce and honey. Pour into paper cups. Cover with foil, make a slit in center of foil. Insert popsicle stick. Freeze. ; name: curried apples and celery ; ingredients: celery, onion, butter, tart apple, flour, curry powder, salt, pepper ; preparation:

name: 1 brownies in the world best ever ; ingredients: bittersweet chocolate, unsalted butter, eggs, granulated sugar, unsweetened cocoa powder, vanilla extract, brewed espresso, kosher salt, all-purpose flour ; preparation:Heat the oven to 350f and arrange the rack in the middle. Line an 8-by-8-inch glass baking dish with aluminum foil. Combine chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and cook over medium-low heat, stirring frequently, until evenly melted. Remove from heat and let cool to room temperature. Combine eggs, sugar, cocoa powder, vanilla extract, espresso, and salt in a large bowl and briefly stir until just evenly incorporated. Add cooled chocolate and mix until uniform in color. Add flour and stir until just incorporated. Transfer batter to the prepared baking dish. Bake until a tester inserted in the center of the brownies comes out clean, about 25 to 30 minutes. Remove from the oven and cool completely before cutting. ; name: milk brownies ; ingredients: semi-sweet chocolate chips, margarine, eggs, sugar, vanilla, self-rising flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 325f. In small saucepan, melt chips and margarine over low heat, stirring until well blended. Cool slightly. In a large bowl, beat eggs with whisk until foamy and light yellow in color. Beat in sugar, vanilla, and chip mixture. Add flour, mixing well. Pour into a lightly greased 13x 9-inch pan. Bake for 40 to 45 minutes or until brownies pull away from pan or until set in center. Cool completely before cutting into squares. ; name: hazelnut chocolate brownies ; ingredients: hazelnuts, dark chocolate, butter, eggs, brown sugar, vanilla, plain flour, baking powder ; preparation:Pre heat oven to 160 c. Grease 16 x 16 cms pan and line with baking paper. Melt chocolate and butter together in bowl over saucepan of boiling water. Cool slightly. Beat eggs, sugar and vanilla with electric beaters till thick and pale. Stir in cooled chocolate. Sift in flour and baking powder, stir till just combined. Add hazelnuts, mix in well. Pour into prepared pan, bake for 35 - 40 minutes. Cool in pan for 10 minutes then turn onto wire rack. ; name: brown sugar brownies ; ingredients: golden brown sugar, butter, eggs, unsweetened chocolate, all-purpose flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat over to 325 degrees. Grease 8x8x2-inch baking pan. In large bowl beat sugar and butter until fluffy. Beat in eggs, one at a time. Beat in chocolate, then flour. Stir in nuts. Pour into pan. Bake 25 minutes. Cool in pan and cut into bars. ; name: sugar brownies with chocolate chips ; ingredients: milk, french vanilla liquid coffee creamer, baking powder, butter, sugar, vanilla extract, flour, egg, chocolate chips ; preparation:Pour ingredients into a mixing bowl. Mix until slightly lumpy. Add chocolate chips. Pour onto cookie sheet and spread. Heat the oven to 400f and bake for 20-25 minutes. ; name: dark chocolate butterscotch brownies ; ingredients: unsweetened chocolate, butter, sugar, egg whites, vanilla, flour, bittersweet chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Melt together butter and unsweetend chocolate in microwave, stir until smooth, then cool slightly. In a large bowl, combine sugar and chocolate mixture. Stir in egg whites and vanilla. Stir in flour. Stir in the chips. Spread into greased 13 x 9 inch pan. Bake at 350 for 25-30 minutes. Melt together chips and butter, stir until smooth. Spread over warm brownies. Cool completely before cutting. ; name: can t be beat brownies ; ingredients: flour, sugar, cocoa, salt, shortening, eggs, vanilla, nuts ; preparation:Mix the flour, sugar, salt and cocoa in a bowl until they are blended well. Cut the shortening into the dry ingredients as you would into a pie crust dough. Add the eggs and vanilla and mix until dough is moist. The batter will be stiff. Pour into a greased pan and bake at 350 until a toothpick comes out clean. I use an 8 x 8 pan because i like thick brownies. I bake them between 25- 30 minutes. A 9 x 13 pan would bake between 20- 25 minutes. ; name: chocolate espresso brownies ; ingredients: dark chocolate, butter, eggs, caster sugar, espresso, plain flour, salt ; preparation:

name: red onion confit ; ingredients: red onion, olive oil, red wine vinegar, marsala wine ; preparation:Slice the onion very thin and evenly. A mandolin is perfect for this. Sweat the onions in olive oil on low till very soft. Add the red wine vinegar and marsala. Simmer till all the liquid has reduced. ; name: wine and black olive pate ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic cloves, chopped tomatoes, olives in brine, cumin seed, celery salt, clear honey, red wine ; preparation:Heat the oil in a medium sized saucepan, add the cumin seeds and allow them to sizzle for a few seconds. Add the onions and garlic and saute gently for 3-5 minutes, or until soft. Add the tomatoes, olives, honey, a pinch of celery salt and honey. Mix together and cook gently for 10 minutes. Pour in the red wine, bring to the boil and simmer for another 20 minutes, uncovered. Turn up the heat and stir vigorously until the mixture has reduced to the consistency of a soft pate. This final stage will take about 5 minutes, but cooking time will depend on the thickness of the juice the chopped tomatoes are packed in. Turn into a serving dish and allow to cool. The flavours will intensify, the longer you leave the pate before eating. ; name: beef chestnut and red wine stew ; ingredients: beef, onion, fresh thyme, vegetable oil, beef stock, chestnuts, carrots, red wine, seasoned flour ; preparation:Cube the beef and dredge it in the seasoned flour. Fry the beef in oil over a high heat until browned in a dutch oven. Add the onions and keep frying until they start to brown. Add the thyme, wine and stock, bring to the boil, then turn down the heat and simmer for 1 hour, lid on. Add the carrots and chestnuts, season and cook gently for a further hour, lid off. ; name: red wine couscous ; ingredients: garlic clove, olive oil, red pepper flakes, couscous, capers, red wine, water, salt and pepper ; preparation:Combine garlic and olive oil in small saucepan with tight-fitting lid. Add red pepper flakes if desired. Cook briefly over medium heat, until garlic becomes fragrant. Add couscous to pan. Saute over medium heat until golden brown, approximately 5 minutes. Add capers, red wine, and water. Season with salt and pepper to paste. Bring mixture to a boil. Cover and remove from heat. Let stand 4-5 minutes. Fluff with a fork before serving. ; name: tender pork tenderloin ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, garlic clove, salt, pepper, ground cumin, extra virgin olive oil, chicken broth, dry white wine ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400. With the top of a sharp knife, make deep little slits all over the tenderloin and insert the garlic slivers. Season with salt, pepper and cumin. Place the oil in an oven-proof skillet and sear the tenderloin well over medium-high heat for about 10 minutes, turning the meat over as it browns. Add the chicken broth and white wine to the pan, and place it in the oven for 10 minutes. Remove it and let it rest, covered with foil, for 10-12 minutes before carving. It will continue to cook as it sits. Slice and serve immediately. ; name: white wine pork chops ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, white onion, green bell pepper, salt, pepper, white wine, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Salt and pepper the pork chops in a baking pan. Cut onion and bell pepper into pieces. Sprinkle on top and sides of pork chops. Pour wine over pork chops. Pour water in between pork chop pieces. Bake covered for 25 minutes. Flip chops over and bake uncovered for 15 minutes. ; name: red onion borscht ; ingredients: butter, red onions, beets, red wine vinegar, flour, chicken broth, port wine, salt & freshly ground black pepper, sour cream, fresh chives ; preparation:Melt butter in a large pot, add onions, beets and vinegar. Cook vegetables over low heat, 25-30 minutes or until soft. Add flour, cook and stir 1-2 minutes until flour is incorporated. Remove pot from heat, gradually add broth while stirring. Return pot to stove, increase heat to medium high and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, simmer 10 minutes, add port and season with salt and pepper. Ladle into soup bowls and top with sour cream and chives. ; name: red wine essence ; ingredients: onion, carrot, garlic, celery rib, apple, vegetable oil, dry red wine, ruby port, reduced-sodium chicken broth ; preparation:

name: just plain carrot cake ; ingredients: eggs, vegetable oil, sugar, vanilla, flour, ground cinnamon, baking soda, salt, baking powder, carrots ; preparation:Combine eggs, oil, sugar, and vanilla. Mix well. In a separate bowl, combine and mix dry ingredients. Add to wet mixture, mixing well. Stir in finely crated carrot. Pour batter into 13x9 cake pan that has been sprayed with nonstick cooking spray. Bake at 350 degrees for 50-60 minutes. Allow to cool before frosting with your favorite cream cheese frosting. ; name: carrot cake muffins ; ingredients: oil, brown sugar, egg, applesauce, carrots, flour, baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt ; preparation:In a large mixer, combine oil, brown sugar and the egg on medium speed. Blend in the baking powder, cinnamon, nutmeg, salt, and applesauce. Add the carrots and flour, mix well. Preheat oven to 400. Spoon batter to top of muffin cups. Bake at 400 for 25-30 minutes. ; name: carrot cake cake mix ; ingredients: carrot cake mix, water, vegetable oil, eggs, crushed pineapple with juice, nuts, raisins ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease and flour a bundt pan. I use bakers joy spray. Beat cake mix, water, oil, eggs and pineapple on low speed 3 minutes. Stir in nuts and raisins. Pour into prepared pan. Bake for 50-55 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean. Cool in pan 15 minutes. Remove from pan and cool on wire rack. Cool at least 1 hour before frosting. ; name: bolo de cenoura brazilian carrot cake ; ingredients: carrots, sugar, eggs, vegetable oil, flour, salt, baking powder, cocoa, butter, milk ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 375. In a blender combine eggs, sugar, oil, and carrots. Blend on high until all is combined and is a pureed mixture. Combine the blended mixture with the flour in a bowl. Mix in the baking powder. Pour batter into a cake pan and bake for about 30 minutes, or until a toothpick comes out dry. Meanwhile make the chocolate glaze. Combine all ingredients in a saucepan and cook over medium heat until it begins to boil, stirring constantly. It should be thick enough to coat the back of a spoon. When the cake is done let it cool. Once it is cool to touch, pour the chocolate glaze over it and let it harden a bit. Serve and enjoy. ; name: eggless moist chocolate cake ; ingredients: cake flour, granulated sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda, salt, vanilla extract, white vinegar, vegetable oil, cold water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Combine flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking soda and salt in a bowl and mix well. Make three holes in mixture for next three liquid ingredients. Pour vanilla into 1st hole, vinegar into 2nd and oil into 3rd. Pour cold water over all. Mix with fork or wire wisk just until well blended. Pour into two 9 inch pans coated with cooking spray. Bake for 25 - 30 minutes. Cool completely in pans on a wire rack. ; name: light carrot cocoa snack cake brownies ; ingredients: cocoa, flour, baking powder, sugar, carrot, skim milk, applesauce, egg whites, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 and spray a 9 inch square pan with sprayable oil. Mix cocoa, flour and baking powder in a bowl. Mix in shredded carrots and sugar. In another small bowl, mix egg whites, milk, apple sauce and vanilla. Lightly beat with fork and add to dry ingredients. Mix just until blended. Pour batter into pan and bake for 20-25 minutes. Cool and cut into squares. ; name: cinnamon carrot pie ; ingredients: carrots, evaporated milk, sugar, eggs, salt, ground ginger, cinnamon, unbaked pie shells ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees. Combine first seven ingredients in a medium mixing bowl. Beat for two minutes. Pour into unbaked pie crust. Bake for 15 minutes. Lower heat to 350 degrees and bake 45 minutes longer or until the filling is set. ; name: no oil carrot cake ; ingredients: white sugar, eggs, all-purpose flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, carrots, walnuts ; preparation:
